Comment: Began awkwardly, raced 3 wide in midfield, wider turning in, hard ridden 300M, showed very good response, hit the front 150M, ran on very well to the line, easily scored, impressive debut.
Began well from gate 1, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, easy run on turn, finished off well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Average to begin, positioned 4 lengths behind the leader on rail, angled out after passing 600M, made good progress in straight to take a place.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Taken back from gate 13, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some headway in straight, not clear close home.
Jumped well, raced behind midfield on the outside, 5 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, made little progress in straight.
Began well, raced 3 wide slightly better than midfield, wider turning in, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Began fairly and made contact, raced towards rear on the inside, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, finished off evenly.
Shifted in at start, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, a length back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Moderately away, raced at rear on the outside, 7 lengths back, very wide turning in, finished off evenly.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider turning in, made no progress in straight.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide towards rear, 7 lengths back on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Pushed to keep up in front of midfield, progressed steadily 300M to score.
Pushed to take rail and lead, hung on well until 50M overhauled.
Eased to rear, trapped 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 300M.
Eased back, lack room 4-2, made steady ground when clear.
Eased back for cover, trapped 2-3 wide, made steady ground 250M.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, on heels 500M, lack room 400M, progressed steadily 300M.
Pushed to obtain box seat, weakened 200M.
Hard ridden early, midfield, trapped 2-3 wide, no progress.
Pushed forward, 2 wide, out of fuel 400M.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 3 wide, emptied 250M.
At back, 2 wide, no progress.
Slow away, never competitive.
Eased back, trapped 3-4 wide, raced keenly, no progress.

Placing: PU
Comment: Pressed forward, dropped off 600M.
For some distance approaching the 700M proved difficult to settle and got its head up, settled behind leaders, quickened near 100M to score.
Began awkwardly, raced behind leaders on outside rail, near 250M was momentarily crowded, finished solidly.
Settled behind leaders near the central of track, worked home nicely when asked.
In the early stages lost its left front plate, shared lead, finished well when placed pressure.
Ridden along to take lead on outside rail, gave ground passing 200M, failed to make impression, must trial.
Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Held up momentarily on straightening when 4L behind before making strong late ground in the straight to strike lead inside last 50m to win strongly.
Held position in midfield on the rail throughout. Moved away from the rail on cornering before closing off nicely in last 200m to move to second inside final 50m.
Steadied after start & shifted back to last. Moved 5 wide when improving around field near the 500m mark, cornered the widest runner before making continual late ground to hold third on line.

Raced in midfield on the rail throughout. Moved over the heels of the leading pair entering the last section, dashed to lead approaching the 200m, passed by winner at the 100m before giving a length late. (See report).
Began well before being steadied & racing in midfield between runners. Came under hard riding near the 600m before finishing off one paced in the straight. Beaten just over 3L & wasn't the worst.

Hampered at start before hard ridden from wide barrier to improve & assume lead near 1200m before crossing to rail soon after. Headed in the lead on straightening, emptied out at 200m before weakening thereafter.

Steadied, shifted behind runners after first furlong before drifting back to 3rd last. Relegated to last near 700m. Shifted to be the widest runner entering last section, 7L behind, before making some late ground to midfield.

Began well but couldn't muster speed & shifted back to race worse than midfield. Shifted wider to improve near 600m, relegated to second last, 6.5L behind entering last section before running onto midfield (Blood in trachea).
Was the slowest into stride & was hard ridden early before racing just worse than midfield on rail. Four lengths behind on straightening before making no headway in dash to line.
Began well before drifting back to midfield when racing three wide with cover throughout. Hard ridden prior to cornering before holding rearward position in straight. No threat.

Began well, held early lead before being headed near the 1200m & crossed soon after. Moved away from rail at 850m. Moved up to assume lead on straightening, emptied out at 250m before tiring in last furlong. (Lame post-race).
Had no early speed & raced second last throughout. Continued rearward, over 6L behind on straightening before failing to improve. Well beaten.
Improved after start to share lead early before racing third from the 1200m. Got cover near the 850m & raced 1,1 thereafter. Weakened poorly in the final 300m & was well beaten. (Mucus in trachea).

Ridden forward to be prominent before ultimately settling wide in midfield before being left without cover from the 1100m. Hard ridden prior to straightening before weakening significantly in straight to be long last.
Average to begin, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, saved ground on turn, no daylight early in straight, cleared 200M, finished off strongly to score.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, very wide turning in, showed very good response, hit the front 150M, kept on well but still headed final 50M.
Inconvenienced at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider on turn, closed off well to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Slowly away, raced behind midfield on the inside, angled out after passing 500M, finished off well to make frame without threatening.
Shifted out on jumping and made contact, raced 3 wide in midfield, very wide turning in, hard ridden after passing 300M, only showed limited response, weakened final 50M.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 6 lengths back turning in, made some headway in straight.
Jumped well from the widest draw, sent forward to race prominently but trapped 3 wide early, 2 wide from 900M, challenged the leader turning in, kept on evenly to 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, hard ridden after passing 500M, no clear running early in straight, awkwardly placed 250M, peaked 150M, weakened thereafter.
Away with them, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, one-paced in the run home.

Jumped well from a wide draw, sent forward to take the lead, challenged by rival turning in, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened final 100M. (See Racing Incidents.) (Mucus.)
Jumped well, positioned on rail better than midfield, easy run on turn, kept to inside after straightening, only showed limited response, weakened final 100M.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, 2 wide turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (Mucus.)
Lifted front feet on jumping, raced prominently, 2 wide, allowed rival to cross 900M, 2 lengths or so back on turn, commenced move 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, angled out after passing 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, improved steadily and hit the line strongly in the last 50M.
Raced next to the leader, 2 wide, battled on to the line for 2nd.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail after 750M, 200M checked and shifted ground, made ground significantly for 3rd thereafter.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, improved steadily in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, closed off well in the Straight.
At rear, along the rail, inconvenienced at 200M and ran on okay thereafter.
Sent forward, 3 wide no cover, flattened in the last 75M.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, weakened at 150M.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, only one paced.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, weakened in the last 200M.
Midfield, along the rail, pretty one paced.
At rear, 2 wide, did not feature.
At rear, 2 wide after 750M, nothing in the Straight.
Raced in behind midfield, 3 wide but with cover, at 200M became badly unbalanced and lost ground in the Straight. (Intermittent displacement of the soft palate)
Settled in midfield in 7th some 4L back, became closer in joint 5th when pace slackened on top of home bend, came under pressure to tackle leader on straightening, gained upper hand close to home.
Some 2L back in 3rd on the rail early, switched off rails on top of home bend to share 3rd one back, hit the front under pressure briefly over 100M out, had no more to give close to home.

Began well from a middle gate before taken over 3L back to forward of midfield 3-wide, slightly further back when baulked for a run upon straightening, obtained a clear passage 300M out to finish off the race nicely.

Broke well from the widest gate but snatched back towards the rear, raced keenly on heels just over 5L back rounding home bend, baulked for a run early in straight, finished off the race well. (Jockey questioned)

Taken back from a wide gate to just better than midfield early stages,made swift progress past the 900M to join the leader, gained narrow advantage briefly over 300M out, unable to sustain effort inside final 100M.
Hampered at start, travelled wide without cover just worse than midfield some 5L back, shifted slightly wider entering home straight, produced good late impression inside final 100M.
Began well but soon taken back to 5th about 3L off the lead, travelled 3-wide around home bend, unable to quicken to challenge in straight.
Quickly taken back from a wide gate, travelled one from last before dropping to last passing the 600M, produced good late impression under pressure inside final 150M.

Ridden positively to lead from a wide gate, obtained rails run coming onto home bend before steadying the tempo shortly after, led until narrowly headed on straightening, folded up quickly inside final 150M.
Reared at start losing considerable ground, detached until 700M out, saved ground on the inside turning for home, made moderate progress along the rail in the straight.
Moderate start, travelled just worse than midfield most of the way to home straight, found nothing under pressure.
Began well, tracked leader to home straight, faded steadily despite reminders.
Jumped fairly but dropped steadily towards last few while racing keenly, awkward rounding home bend and the widest runner on home turn, made no impression in straight.
Crowded at start settling worse than midfield about 5L off the pace on the rail, saved ground in similar position turning for home, faded steadily inside final 200M.
Reserved at the rear, saved ground on inside, last at 600M 5Ls to make up, made swift progress turning in, led 250M out, kept on strongly to the line.
Not hurried after the start, settled at the rear 5Ls behind leader in a steadily run race, widest turning for home, ran on well to go 2nd near 100M, held by winner closing stages.
Slow to muster, settled midfield in 5th, unbalanced when crowded onto 450M, closed off steadily final 350M, held by winner final 150M.
Held up behind midfield in a steadily run race, badly unbalanced top of straight, made some progress when placed under full pressure 300M, got up for 4th near 50M.
Tracked leader on outside early stages, moved up to prompt the pace home turn, fought on one paced under top weight in straight, out of contention 200M.
Close up behind leaders, moved away from fence 500M, found disappointingly little under pressure. (Jockey : did not travel as comfortably as it normally does.)
Went forward as expected, crossed into the lead before home turn, unable to hold off rivals 250M, weakened towards the line.
Set early pace, prominent behind leader making home turn, badly checked top of straight, soon out of contention.
Slightly slow out, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, there to turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, finished off strongly to score by a neck.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, challenged by rivals turning in, kept on very well in straight, just unable to hold off the winner late.

Shifted out at start and made contact, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, moved a bit closer in the middle stages, angled out after passing 550M, finished off well to take a place. (Blood in trachea.)
Commenced well, positioned a length behind the leader on rail in the early stages, 2 wide on turn, challenged the leader from 550M, hard ridden after passing 300M, kept on well to the line.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide towards rear, similar position on turn, taken wide in straight and made good progress to be nearest on line.
Away with them, raced 3 wide with cover towards rear, there to turn, closed off well without threatening.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail behind midfield, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, unable to obtain clear running in straight, not able to test properly.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 10 lengths back, closer on turn but still the last into straight, made good progress in the run home without threatening.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the outside, very wide into straight, made some headway in the run home.
Made contact at start, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, no daylight early in straight, cleared 200M, only showed limited response, weakened final 100M.
Began well, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, 3 wide turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Began awkwardly and crowded, raced in midfield on the outside, similar position on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Jumped well, raced 3 wide, 2 lengths or so back, no cover throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Crowded start, raced 2 wide better than midfield, wider after passing 700M, peaked turning in, weakened gradually in straight.

Shifted out at start and made contact, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground on turn, angled out 450M, hard ridden 300M, showed very good response, hit the front 150M, kept on very well to the line and scored.
Taken back from gate 11, raced towards rear on the outside, a bit closer on turn, very wide into straight, finished off well to take 2nd, always held.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide towards rear, wider on turn, closed off well to take a place without threatening the first two.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, there to turn, finished off well to make frame without threatening.
Inconvenienced at start, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, made minor progress in straight.

Began awkwardly and made contact, raced prominently but trapped wide in the early stages, sent forward 900M, took the lead 800M, 2 wide turning, peaked and headed early in straight, ran on evenly to 50M, weakened thereafter.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 10 lengths back, moved closer on turn, very wide into straight, made very good progress in straight, nearest on line.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, 3 wide on turn, finished off evenly.
Made contact at start, sent forward to take the lead, headed near 800M, travelled well on turn, regained the lead early in straight, peaked 200M, headed 150M, weakened thereafter.
Jumped well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, commenced move after passing 550M, bumped near 450M, showed some response early in straight, peaked 200M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Average to begin, raced prominently, 2 wide, allowed rival to cross 800M, angled out and made contact near 450M, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the inside, angled out after passing 500M, no clear running until 150M, showed some response thereafter, blocked final 50M.
Taken back from gate 13, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed some response early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened thereafter.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move after passing 550M, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Raced in midfield, 3 wide with cover throughout. Eased 4 wide on cornering, dashed quickly to snatch lead inside final 100m before sprinting clear late to win easily.

Raced wide in midfield after start before improving quickly to assume lead approaching 900m before crossing to the rail soon after. Raced nearly two lengths clear entering last section before over-run by winner in final 75m.

Raced wide in midfield before being left without cover from 900m. Improved position in second section to be only 2L form the lead at 800m. Dashed quickly near the 200m to be within a neck of lead before holding third on line.

Held the rail in early before eventually being crossed & racing on leaders back from the 1100m. Shuffled further back when pace slowed passing the 800m. Moved away from rail on cornering before finishing well in late stages.

Raced in midfield between runners in early stages. Shuffled further back passing half-way when pace slowed. Was over 4L behind entering last section before finishing off strongly from 10th to be only 2.5L behind on line.

Shifted behind runners after the start before racing worse than midfield away from rail. Moved three wide & continued wide from the 900m. Eased wider on cornering before closing off evenly in straight to not be far behind.
Steadied from widest barrier & shifted back to race third last. Moved 4 wide to improve passing the 600m, closed off well to be only 3L behind in on-speed race.
Began well before being dragged back to race near the tail throughout. Was last on straightening before making some late ground as the widest runner to midfield from poor position.
Shifted back to last after the start. Continued at the back before passing a few in the closing stages but was never seriously involved in a slowly run race.

Drifted back after the start & raced in midfield between runners. Restrained heavily when awkwardly placed due to the slow pace in middle stages. Continued rearward on straightening before making no headway in dash to line.

Had no early speed, shifted down to rail before improving to midfield after 300m. Lost position when awkwardly placed due to slowing speed near 700m. Near the rear on straightening & could make no ground in sprint to line.
Strode forward to race in first three before getting good position 1,1 near the 1100m. Hard ridden passing the 500m before weakening out in the straight. Well beaten.

Raced prominently after the start before improving position to race outside the leader from near the 1100m. Dropped off the leader on straightening before weakening out in the final 300m. Well beaten.

Held narrow lead when racing three wide after start before eventually crossing to rail near the 1100m. Headed in lead approaching the 900m before racing on leaders back from 850m. Weakened badly in straight to be long last.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Shifted out at start and made contact, sent forward to race prominently, 2 wide, half-length back on turn, hard ridden after turning in, hit the front 150M, kept on well to the line and scored.
Shifted out at start and made contact, positioned on rail better than midfield, easy run on turn, finished off well to take 2nd.
Taken back from gate 11, raced behind midfield on the outside, no cover after passing 800M, moved a bit closer on turn, closed off well to take a place.
Began awkwardly, raced 3 wide in midfield early, found a 2 wide position near 800M, 3 lengths back on turn, made some progress in straight to make frame.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, similar position on turn, finished off evenly. (Lame right front leg next day morning.)
Slightly slow out, positioned 4 lengths behind the leader on rail, there to turn, made some progress in straight.
Made contact at start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened final 100M.
Inconvenienced at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, there to turn, made little progress in straight.
Began well from gate 1, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on the inside, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened thereafter. (Blood in trachea.)
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 6 lengths or so back on turn, made little progress in straight.
Average to begin, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from gate 10, raced at rear on the outside, 5 lengths back on turn, one-paced in straight.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, ran on well to score.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, overhauled 200M, ran on for 2nd.
Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, made steady ground 300M.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, progressed steadily 250M.
Pushed to secure box seat, just held ground in straight.
Pushed early, midfield, 2 wide, progressed steadily 250M.
Eased at start, took rail at back, lack room 4-2 and hampered, ran on ok.
Eased back, trapped 3-4 wide, made ground 200M.
Eased at start, trapped 3-4 wide at rear, made ground 200M.
Slow away, at back, no dash.
Pushed early, trapped 3 wide throughout in front of midfield, emptied 250M.
Never a factor.
Settled behind midfield, at the 800M was left racing wide and without cover, finished strongly to score.
Travelled keenly in the early stages, settled well in the lead, responded solidly in the straight, missed by SH.
Settled in front of midfield, improved near 300M, worked home solidly.
At 1300M was left racing wide and without cover, then ridden forward to race outside the lead, worked home nicely.
Taken back at start, raced at rear, commenced to improve passing 500M, gained some ground in the straight.
Raced towards rear on rail, asked for effort near 300M, finished one-paced.
Settled midfield, tried to improve passing 400M, worked home one-paced.
Raced midfield on rail, placed pressure but no response in the straight.
Slow out, raced at tail, no response in the straight when asked.
Ridden along to take forward position, settled in box seat, gave ground in the straight.
Raced behind midfield, tried to improve passing 800M, faded out near 100M.
Ridden forward, raced in front of midfield on rail, came under heavy pressure prior to the Home Turn, eased down in the straight, irregular heart rhythm.

Raced just worse than midfield away from rail before moving 3 wide with cover near half-way. Travelled strongly between runners approaching corner, 3L behind, before finishing strongly to charge to lead inside final 100m.

Steadied & shifted back to rear after start. Eased wider & improved quickly around field approaching corner, straightened the widest runner before closing strongly to second in late stages, beaten under a length.
Enjoyed good run in 1,1 throughout. Eased 3 wide entering last section, dashed to assume narrow lead near the 150m before over-run by first two in closing stages. Only beaten 2L.

Raced rearward after start before being checked & losing some ground near the 1300m. Relegated to second last, nearly 4L behind entering last section before being hampered soon after. Closed off steadily but was no threat.
Enjoyed economical run in midfield on the rail throughout. Continued on rail on straightening, 3L from lead, shifted outwards at the 250m before finishing off evenly to midfield late.
Pushed forward to lead before crossing to rail near the 1250m. Joined & shared lead soon after straightening before peaking at the 150m & weakening out thereafter.
Raced prominently before settling second, away from rail for majority. Moved up to share lead soon after straightening before being headed at the 150m & weakening a few lengths thereafter.
Pushed forward before racing in leaders back from the 1250m. Travelled well on corner, checked & disappointed for clear running after straightening before weakening a length or two in last furlong.
Taken back after the start before being hampered near 1300m & racing second last. Relegated back to last approaching the 450m before weakening out sharply in the straight. (Lame post-race).
Raced in midfield but was caught wide & without cover throughout. Hard ridden passing the 500m mark before weakening out significantly in the last section. Long last.
Crowded shortly after start, raced at rear, 6 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, made contact early in straight, made very good progress thereafter to score.
Away with them, raced behind midfield on the inside, 5 lengths back turning in, finished off strongly to take 2nd.
Began smartly, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the first two close home.
Jumped well, raced prominently on the outside, a length back on turn, finished off well but not able to challenge.
Moderately away, positioned a length behind the leader on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Out in line, raced slightly better than midfield on the outside, no cover on turn, finished off evenly.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Began awkwardly, raced at rear on the outside, 6 to 7 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, one-paced in the run home.
Made contact at start and unbalanced, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 wide on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.
Slow to begin, raced behind midfield on the outside, very wide on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.
Crowded start and made contact, raced 2 wide better than midfield, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight.
Shifted in at start and made contact, raced very greenly on the first turn, dropped to last after entering the back straight, detached from the main group on the home turn, eased early in straight.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, ran on impressively in the Straight and scored by 3-1/2L.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, stayed on but only headed in the last 125M.
Raced next to the leader, 2 wide after 500M, ran on well but emptied in final 50M.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, made ground steadily in the Straight.
Slow to begin and at rear, along the rail, saved ground and closed off strongly to the line.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, only one paced.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, made ground steadily.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, pretty one paced.
Flat-footed and missed the start, at rear, 3 wide but with cover, did not feature. (See incident report)
Raced in behind midfield, 3 wide but with cover, hung out rounding the first turn and lost ground, no progress.
At rear, 2 wide, did not run on. (See incident report)
Sent forward and raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, lost ground in the Straight.
Settled in midfield, commenced move rounding home bend, tight between runners when about 2L 5th on straightening, quickened well to hit the front 150 metres out, just held off runner-up's late rally.
Settled just better midfield on the rail, commenced move rounding home bend, fought on gamely to just fail to get up on line.
Moderate start, settled in midfield, became closer to pace rounding home bend, ran on well in straight to be nearest at finish.

Settled in 4th mainly about 2L off the lead in back straight, commenced move to gain closer passing the 600 metres, 3 wide rounding home bend, kept on same pace without quickening under pressure in straight.
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, settled in worse than midfield, made up good late ground inside final 200 metres.
Niggled at early, settled just over 1L back in 2nd in back straight, came to take up running approaching home turn, unable to sustain effort inside final 150 metres.
Recovered from a moderate start to lead passing winning post the first time, maintained a clear in most of back straight, headed passing the 500 metres and folded up quickly inside the 200 metres.
Settled in last few, saved ground on the inside turning in, went past well-beaten horses in home straight.
Broke well from a low draw, travelled not far off in 3rd on the rail, carried backward slightly when race leader lost advantage coming out of back straight, found nothing after straightening.
Settled in last from the widest gate, commenced move coming onto home bend and went very wide into straight, never recovered.
Travelled wide in and about midfield most of the way to home straight, dropped out tamely after straightening. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Travelled wide and keenly in last few, dropped to last under pressure 600 metres out.
Jumped well, raced outside leader, led near 250M, continued on well final stages to keep rivals at bay.
Settled midfield, driven out 450M and swung widest home, finished off well to go 2nd near line, nearest finish.
Began only fairly, recovered to race in midfield, did best work final 200M, nearest finish.
Tracked leaders 2-wide, had every chance turning home, went 2nd near 100M, edged out to 4th final few strides.
Chased leaders in a steadily run race, fought on under pressure in straight, faded late.
Settled 2-wide ahead of midfield, kept on steadily final 300M, always held by leaders.
Taken back from wide draw, held up near last 7Ls off the pace, made non-threatening progress final 300M.
Moved up to take the lead, took them along at steady pace, headed 250M, weakened final stages. (Lame LH leg.)
From draw 12 taken across in early stages and settled towards the rear, gave limited response turning home, not reached leaders.
Caught wide no cover chasing leaders, gave ground in the straight.
Reserved near the rear, ran home one paced, never in contention. (epiglottic entrapment)
Dropped back to last from wide draw, always in rear, failed to go on in the straight.
Began well from gate 1, raced better than midfield on the inside, easy run to turn, finished off strongly to score by a narrow margin.
Shifted in at start and made contact, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on very well in straight, just unable to hold off the winner on line.
Made contact at start, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, closed off well to take a place.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, angled out after passing 650M, improved on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Taken back from gate 10, raced towards rear on the inside, 2 wide after passing 600M, moved a bit closer on turn, made some headway in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, positioned on rail in midfield, 2 wide on turn, finished off evenly.
Inconvenienced at start, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide turning in, finished off evenly. (See Racing Incidents.)
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 4 to 5 lengths back on turn, finished off evenly. (See Racing Incidents.) (Roarer.)
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 8 lengths or so back, commenced move after passing 550M, very wide turning in, finished off evenly. (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped with them, raced towards rear on the outside, checked off heels near 1350M, 4 wide on turn, made no progress in straight.
Moderately away, raced better than midfield on the outside, moved a bit closer on the first turn, a length back in the middle stages, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight.

Away with them, sent forward to race prominently, 2 wide, allowed rival to cross after entering the back straight, 2Ls back in the middle stages, 3 wide from 550M, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)

Moderately away, raced in 2nd, 2 wide turning in, hit the front 300M, kept on very well to the line and scored.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the inside, angled out after passing 500M, no daylight early in straight, cleared 300M, finished off well to take 2nd, good debut.
Made contact at start, raced 3 wide in midfield, made the home turn awkwardly, closed off well without threatening.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, angled out after passing 450M, finished off evenly.
Out with rest, raced 2 wide at rear, wider turning in, made some progress in straight.
Taken back from gate 10, raced 3 wide at rear, there to turn, made some headway in straight.
Began awkwardly, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, peaked and headed 300M, weakened gradually final furlong.
Jumped well, taken back to race 3 wide behind midfield, very wide turning in, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Slightly slow out, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Commenced well, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, peaked on run 300M, weakened final furlong.
Began well, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 lengths or so back, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.

Slightly slow out, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, kept to inside after straightening, showed limited response early in straight, weakened 200M, eased thereafter. (Irregular heart rhythm.) (Bled.)
Eased back, took rail, lack room 4-2, progressed steadily when clear.
Midfield, 2 wide, progressed steadily 350M.
In front of midfield, 2 wide, ran on well for 3rd.
Slow away, at back, 2 wide, bumped 300M, made steady ground.
Pressed forward, sat 2 wide, weakened 200M.
Pushed early, in front of midfield, 2 wide, ran on fairly.
Pushed to sit in midfield, 2-3 wide, made ground 300M, run ended 100M.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, blocked whole straight, not properly tested.
Eased back, took rail, lack room 400M, checked 200M, no progress.
Took rail and lead, out of fuel 250M, checked 150M.
Checked early, at back, trapped 3-4 wide, made ground 400M, run ended 100M.
At back, no progress.
Bumped start, never a factor.
Box seat, emptied 400M.
Settle in box seat, asked for effort passing 400M, quickened passing 200M, scored unchallenged.
Settled in front of midfield on rail, improved at 350M, gained some nice late ground.
Raced outside the lead with nice early speed, asked for effort at 400M, responded nicely in the straight.
Took lead with nice early sped, placed pressure on straightening, worked home nicely.
Raced in one-back-one-off position, responded nicely when placed pressure, finished well.
Raced wide and without cover in midfield position, one-paced in the straight.
Settled midfield, limited response when placed pressure, never travelled comfortably.
Travelled behind midfield on rail, fought hard but only one-paced.
Raced at rear, limited response in the straight.
Settled towards rear, placed pressure but no response.
Ridden along but failed to muster speed, raced behind midfield, weakened passing 200M.
Raced at tail, no response when asked, finished last.
Raced prominently after start before getting good position 1,1 near the 900m. Moved up to join lead at the 250m & dug deep in closing stages to hold neck advantage over challenger on the line.

Raced in midfield away from the rail throughout, 5L behind passing the 800m. Eased wider passing the 500m, entered last section over 3L behind before making good late ground in last furlong to get within a neck on the line.

Caught wide early before drifting back & ultimately settling forth last. Shifted to be the widest runner on cornering when over 5L behind before closing strongly down the outside to get with half-length on line. Big run.

Began fast & continued to improve from wide gate before racing outside the leader from the 1100m. Moved up to assume narrow lead entering last section, joined by the winner at the 250m but fought bravely to be close behind.

Held lead momentarily after the start before being headed & racing on leaders back from the 1000m. Continued behind leading pair on straightening before finishing off well along the inside rail to be under 2L behind on line.

Bumped heavily at start & lost ground before shifting down to rail. Improved along rail after first furlong to race in midfield thereafter. Moved away from rail passing the 600m before finishing off steadily to midfield.
Steadied from wide gate & shifted back to the tail. Continued near the tail on cornering, over 6.5L behind before closing off well in late stages to not be beaten far from rearward position.

Bumped heavily after start before steadying & shifting behind runners to race third last. Continued rearward on corner, 6L behind, began to make steady ground before being tightened & steadied near 125m. Should have been closer.

Drifted back after the start & raced in midfield between runners for the majority. Ridden along passing the 600m, shifted out & bumped on straightening, moved closer to lead at 200m before weakening in late stages. No threat.

Showed speed after start to race just behind lead before steadying & settling behind leading quartet. Eased into clear running on straightening before emptying out at the 250m & weakening last furlong.

Steadied & shifted across to midfield but was caught wide & without cover for the majority. Continued wide, over 6L behind at the 800m. Forced wider around bend, unbalanced on straightening before weakening. (See report).
Crowded at the start before mustering speed quickly to improve to the lead passing the 1200m. Joined in the lead entering the last section before weakening out meekly in final 300m. Well beaten.
Had soft run in midfield on the rail throughout. Continued along the rail entering last section when 4.5LK behind before peaking at the 300m & weakening poorly in last 250m. Well beaten.
Steadied after the start & shifted back to second last. Relegated back to last, 7.5KL behind on cornering before weakening out further in straight to be long last.
Bumped shortly after start, positioned a length behind the leader on the stands' side, hard ridden after passing 350M, finished off very strongly to score by a narrow margin.

Jumped well, positioned 3 away from the stands' rail, a length back, moved a bit closer in the middle stages, hard ridden 250M, hit the front 200M, kept on well, just unable to hold off the winner late.
Commenced well, sent forward to race prominently in the middle of the track, hard ridden after passing 300M, kept on well to take a place.
Began fairly and inconvenienced, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on the middle track, hard ridden after passing 400M, finished off well to make frame without threatening.
Jumped well from gate 1, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on the middle track, made some headway after passing 400M, peaked on run 50M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced towards rear on the stands' side, gradually moved to the middle of the track after passing 500M, hard ridden 350M, made some progress thereafter.
Began well, raced prominently on the stands' side, hard ridden 350M, showed limited response, peaked 200M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Jumped with them, raced at rear on the stands' rail, only passed some weakened rivals final 400M, never dangerous.
Made contact at start, sent forward to take the lead, hard ridden after passing 400M, peaked and headed 250M, weakened final 100M.
Began awkwardly and made contact, raced at rear in the middle of the track, one-paced final 400M.
Moderately away, raced in midfield, nearer to the stands' side, showed limited response after passing 400M, weakened final 200M.
Average to begin, raced at rear on the middle track, failed to make any progress final 400M.
Made contact at start, positioned a length behind the leader on the stands' side, showed limited response after passing 400M, crowded near 300M, weakened thereafter.
Made contact at start and unbalanced, sent forward to race prominently on the middle track, outpaced 400M, weakened after passing 300M, eased final furlong.
Taken back and 3 wide but with cover, showed good kick approaching 200M, continued on to score by a neck.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide after 950M, showed dash at the entrance to the Straight, stayed on but headed in the last 25M.
Raced in behind midfield, 3 wide no cover after 800M, was inconvenienced passing 300M and ran on well to the line.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, swung widest on Straightening, bumped at 300M and then improved and closed off well thereafter.
At rear, 2 wide, swung wide on straightening, made ground and ran on well in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, was one paced.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, near the 150M was checked, one paced thereafter. (Blood in trachea)
At rear, along the rail, checked passing the 300M, pretty one paced.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, lost ground passing the 150M. (See incident report)
Raced in midfield, along the rail, checked at 200M, nothing in the Straight.
Raced in front of midfield, found no extra passing 250M.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, raced tight approaching the 300M and lost ground thereafter.
Sent forward and raced next to the leader, 2 wide, did not featured.
At rear, 2 wide, no progress.

Broke well, disputed lead on the rail, drifted slightly further back rounding home bend, quickened under pressure to hit the front inside the 300 metres, went over 2L clear 50 metres out, won confidently.

Quickly recovered from moderate start to 4th within 2L of pace, held same one-out-one-back position to home straight, switched out for a run 300 metres out, reached 2nd 150 metres out but never threatening.
Jumped well from a wide gate, shifted back gradually for cover in 6th some 3L back at the 900 metres, fought on steadily to reach 3rd 50 metres out, never threatening.
Settled wide towards the rear, ran on steadily near the centre of the track but without threatening.
Soon took narrow lead 2-wide, went 1L clear 600 metres out, headed by eventual winner inside the 300 metres, found no extra.
Soon dropped to last over the sprint trip, trailed the field to home straight, produced good late impression inside final 200 metres.
Midfield throughout, ran home one-paced.
Soon dropped to last few, ran on past well-beaten horses inside final 200 metres.
Moderate start, soon recovered to 2L 5th along the rail, held similar to home straight, faded under pressure inside final 200 metres.

Began moderately from the widest gate, wide in rear of midfield when racing fiercely and restrained and lost about 2L 900 metres out, towards the rear in 8th rounding home bend, found nothing from wide into straight.
Began awkwardly and then hampered losing ground, travelled wide in last few throughout, never seen with a chance.
Soon picked up to prominent 3rd and wide without cover, dropped away quickly from about 500 metres out.
Awkwardly away and stumbled at the start, towards rear and caught wide throughout the race, closed off strongly over final 300M under top weight, got up in time.
Up with the pace, saved ground along the inside, emerged as leader 450M, kept on well, caught late.
Driven forward, caught 3-wide no cover in the battle for the lead, stuck to task well despite tough trip, fought on to the finish for a close 3rd.
Jumped well, held up to a race near the rear, over 4Ls to make up top of straight, did best work final 200M to go 4th close home, not reached first 3.
Ridden forward, from wide draw caught 4-wide without cover throughout the race, kept on evenly in straight, safely held by leaders.
From draw 1 settled down midfield along the inside, went 3rd briefly 250M, effort flattened out final stages. (Lame RF leg / Blood in trachea.)
Taken back to last from widest gate, over 5Ls to make up 400M, made non-threatening progress over final 300M.
Did not show early speed despite being ridden along, fell back to a rearward spot entering home turn, kept on one paced in straight, never threatened.
Chased the pace along the 3-path, well placed to strike turning home, could not go on passing 200M, weakened.
Close up to leaders early stages, caught very wide home turn, found little under pressure in straight, eased when no chance.
Made a lot of early use to take up a forward position, came under pressure home turn, weakened rapidly in the straight.
Chased leaders, struggled from 600M, soon weakened on straightening.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider turning in, finished off very strongly to score by a neck.

Began well, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross near 800M, sat right behind the leader on turn, angled out 450M, took the lead 300M, kept on well, just unable to hold off the winner late.
Commenced well, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, finished off strongly to take a place.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, made very good progress in straight to make frame.
Slow to begin, raced 2 wide at rear, 5 lengths back turning in, closed off well without threatening.
Out with rest, raced 2 wide better than midfield, very wide turning in, made some progress in straight.
Taken back from gate 13, raced behind midfield on the outside, very wide turning in, made some headway in straight.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out after passing 500M, finished off evenly.
Began fairly from gate 1, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground to turn, angled out after passing 500M, finished off evenly.
Jumped well, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground on turn, angled out 450M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Taken back from gate 10, raced towards rear on the outside, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made no progress in the run home.
Jumped well from a wide draw, sent forward to take the lead, found rail 800M, led by a length on turn, peaked and headed 300M, weakened thereafter.
Commenced well, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths back, angled out after passing 600M, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Moderately away, raced prominently on the outside, 2 wide from 800M, weakened from 550M, finished tailed out.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, kept to inside after straightening, finished off very strongly to score.
Moderately away, sat right behind the leader on rail, easy run to turn, made contact 350M, hit the front 200M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner 100M, finished 2nd.
Slightly slow out, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, there to turn, finished off well to take a place.
Commenced well, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 200M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Began smartly, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, a length back on turn, made contact 350M, showed limited response thereafter.
Slow to begin, raced behind midfield on the inside, difficult to settle early, saved ground on turn, made some headway in straight.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, wider turning in, finished off evenly. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from gate 11, raced at tail, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Began fairly from the widest draw, raced 3 wide with no cover better than midfield, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 100M. (Mucus.)
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, 5 lengths back, same margin back on turn, one-paced in straight.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, angled out after passing 450M, made no progress in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Away with them, unable to slot in, trapped very wide behind midfield, moved closer on turn, no cover throughout, weakened gradually in straight.
Taken back from gate 12, raced at rear on the outside, very wide turning in, made no progress in straight.
Began fairly, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M.

Taken back from gate 10, raced at tail, 11 lengths back, commenced move after passing 900M, took the lead 650M, led by a length on turn, kept on well in straight to score.
Out with rest, raced 2 wide behind midfield, commenced move after passing 750M, bumped 650M, a length or so back on turn, finished off well to take 2nd, always held.
Made contact at start, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, dropped to midfield 600M out, 2 wide on turn, made some progress in straight to take a place.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 wide on turn, made some progress in straight.
Made contact at start, positioned on rail better than midfield, dropped towards rear inside 600M out, made minor progress in straight.
Taken back from gate 9, raced at rear on the inside, angled out after passing 800M, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made minor progress in the run home.
Moderately away from the widest draw, raced 2 wide better than midfield, angled out and bumped 650M, 2 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, dropped towards rear after passing 800M, 5 lengths back turning in, very wide into straight, one-paced in the run home.
Away with them, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, peaked on turn, ran on evenly early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Average to begin, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length, headed 650M, weakened from 600M, eased final 150M.
Taken back to raced 2 wide at rear, commenced move after passing 750M, peaked on turn, weakened and eased early in straight. (See Racing Incidents.) (Blood in trachea.)
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, closed off strongly 300M to score.
At back, 2-3 wide, unleashed strong finishing efforts 300M.
Slow away, on heels early, at back, 2-3 wide, dashed strongly 250M.
Took rail and lead easily, hung on well until 50M overhauled.
Eased at start, 2 wide, blocked most straight, dashed well.
Pushed to sit in midfield along the fence, lack room 4-2, little dash.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 3 wide throughout, ran on ok in straight.
Hard ridden early, trapped 3 wide in midfield, checked 1000M, ran on ok in straight.
Pushed to take box seat, out of fuel 250M.
At rear, never improved.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, emptied 300M.
Never a factor.
Raced in one-back-one-off position, asked for effort passing 400M, quickened near 200M to score.
Taken back at start, settled at rear on rail, responded strongly in the straight, rider questioned.
Raced midfield on rail, placed pressure passing 350M, finished solidly.
Taken back at start, raced at tail, widest on straightening, worked home nicely.
Raced outside the lead, placed pressure in the straight, worked home one-paced.
Settled in box seat, tried to improve rounding the Home Turn, finished one-paced.
Began awkwardly then taken back, settled behind midfield on rail, kept on rail rounding the Home Turn, limited response in the straight.
Travelled midfield, proved difficult to settle in middle stages, limited response in the straight, rider questioned.
Raced towards rear, wide on straightening, no response in the straight.
Niggled to take lead, placed pressure in the straight, faded our near 200M, at 100M rider momentarily dropped his left rein.
Began awkwardly, settled in handy position, 3 wide with cover, emptied near 100M.
Throughout the race travelled wide and without cover in forward position, weakened passing 400M.

Strode forward to lead passing winning post first time before being headed & racing on leaders back from the 900m. Moved over heals on cornering before dashing underneath runners to regain lead near the 75m & win well.

Slow to begin before sharing last position after first section. Commenced mid-race move from the 700m, circling the field to assume lead near the 450m. Continued to hold lead until passed by winner near the 75m. Held second.

Raced in midfield on the rail throughout early stages. Shuffled further back passing half-way. Shifted away from rail passing the 450m when 5L behind before closing off strongly in late stages to be beaten under a length.

Raced 3 wide with cover in midfield before being left without cover from the 950m. Improved position after the 800m before entering last section only 2L behind. Finished well in straight to be beaten only 1L after wide run.

Shifted back to race worse than midfield on rail early. Relegated to second last at 650m before moving 3 wide soon after to improve. Held up on cornering before shifting in & closing off strongly to be beaten only a length.

Held 1,1 early before racing in midfield away from rail from the 1000m. Continued in midfield nearly 4L behind at half-way. Shifted out to be the second widest in straight before finishing well late to be close behind.

Raced ungenerously in early stages & settled third last. Moved into 3 wide line past 1000m, improved position wide, entered last section 3.5L from lead, cornered the widest runner before finishing off one paced to midfield.

Raced on leaders back momentarily before a pair further back from the 950m. Continued 3.5L from lead in middle stages before making no headway in straight & holding non-threatening margin in dash to line.
Steadied & shifted back to the tail after the start. Continued at rear, 8.5L form lead at half-way. Made no relative headway in straight and was 7L behind on line.

Improved position quickly after start, raced outside leader for the majority of early & middle stages. Came under heavy pressure passing the 500m before weakening out poorly in straight to be well beaten.

Raced in midfield between runners, 5.5L from the lead at half-way. Lost position passing the 600m, crowded, lost ground & relegated to second last at 450m. Weakened out significantly in straight & was beaten big margin.

Raced wide without cove early before improving to lead near the 1000m before crossing to rail at the 900m. Headed passing the 450m before weakening badly in the straight to be long last. (See report).
Slightly slow out, raced at rear on the inside, checked near 500M, saved ground on turn, finished off very strongly to score.
Began well, raced prominently, 2 wide, half length back on turn, took the lead 250M, kept on well, just unable to hold off the winner late.
Inconvenienced at start, raced at rear on the outside, no cover on turn, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home.
Began awkwardly and made contact, raced at tail, 5 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, taken wide in straight and finished off strongly to make frame.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced prominently on rail, allowed rival to cross near 650M, sat right behind the leader on turn, kept on well early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Moderately away, positioned on rail behind midfield, shifted out slightly and made contact near 500M, 4 lengths back turning in, finished off evenly.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, made contact and carried wider 500M, very wide into straight, one-paced in the run home. (Lame right front leg.)
Began well from the widest draw, raced 3 wide with cover slightly behind midfield, angled out after passing 400M, failed to close off in straight.
Made contact at start, sent forward to take the lead, found rail near 650M, led by half length on turn, peaked early in straight, headed 250M, weakened and eased thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Inconvenienced at start, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, failed to make any progress in straight, eased final 100M.
Moderately away, raced slightly better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, weakened early in straight when hard run took effect.
Raced in behind the leader, kept on going to score rather comfortably by 1-1/2L. (Lame left hind)
Sent forward, 2 wide, kept on going but was no match to the winner.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, kept rolling and closed off well.
At rear, 2 wide, made ground steadily to the line. (See incident report)
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, only one paced to the line.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, flattened passing the 200M. (Lame left front)
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, pretty one paced.
Began awkwardly and at rear, 2 wide, showed some dash in the early part of the Straight. (Roarer)
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, one paced only.
Taken back, along the rail after 550M, not competitive in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, in the Straight lost ground. (Mucus in trachea)
Raced in front of midfield, wide no cover, nothing in the Straight.
Travelled wide in 4th some 3L off the speed and keenly at times, commenced move turning into home straight and hit the front 200 metres out, won comfortably.
Soon taken back to wide in midfield in 6th, similar turning for home, ran on under pressure without threatening.
Shared early pace before taken one back in back straight, renewed effort passing the 400 metres to tackle for lead, unable to quicken further to threaten.
Pressed forward from a middle gate to lead 3-wide turning into back straight, obtained rails run coming onto home bend, led until finding no extra 200 metres out.
Settled in 5th within 4L of pace most of the way to straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Taken back to last few from the widest gate, improved to within striking distance turning into home straight, unable to sustain effort inside final 200 metres.
Travelled in midfield on the rail, snuck up on the inside turning for home, raced somewhat awkwardly early in straight, one-paced.
Taken back towards the rear, saved ground turning for home on the inside, baulked for a run 200 metres out, made no impression thereafter. (Questioned for riding in home straight)
With leaders early, taken back to 3rd on the rail some 1.5L back, similar turning for home, weakened under pressure inside final 200 metres,

Wide without cover towards the rear early making steady headway to reach midfield, taken back for cover passing the 800 metres, renewed effort on home bend and swung widest into straight, run ended shortly after straightening.
Lost position shortly after start, soon dropped well behind, never seen with a chance.
Jumped awkwardly and lost ground at start, well back throughout, wide into straight and made no show.
From wide draw moved forward to race outside leader, took over nearing 400M, opened up a clear lead mid-straight, kept on latter stages, held on just.
Very slow to begin, not hurried, settled 9Ls back in last early stages, wide from 600M, closed off well down outside, just failed to catch winner.
From draw 12 taken to a position near the rear, switched 3-wide halfway, chased on well final 300M to take 3rd, nearest finish.
Settled 3-wide in midfield, driven out 500M, stayed on mildly to the line, not going the pace to challenge leaders.
Settled just behind midfield in early and middle stages, shuffled back to rear entering the final turn, taken wide to challenge on straightening, stayed on moderately.
Steadied to a position towards the rear, 5-6Ls off the pace, held up rounding the home turn, made non-threatening progress over final 300M.
Reserved in midfield along the inside, held up behind a weakening runner home turn, ran on same pace over final 250M, no threat to leaders.
Held up 3-wide towards the rear early stages, strode forward from 800M to join leaders on outside, tired passing 300M, couldn't go on.
Chased leaders early stages, shuffled back to midfield down the back-straight, unbalanced and lost ground near 400M, ran past well beaten horses only in the straight.
Tracked leaders, came under severe pressure 600M, gave ground rapidly, eased when well beaten.
From draw 1 driven forward to track leaders along the fence, under pressure home turn and struggled to hold position, dropped out early straight, eased when no chance.
Crossed to the lead 1300M, led steadily, came under pressure home turn, beaten top of straight, finished tailed out. (Jockey : awkward in its action when ridden rounding home turn / Mucus.)
Moderately away, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off strongly to score.
Crowded at start, raced towards rear on the inside, angled out after passing 450M, very wide turning in, finished off strongly to be nearest on line. (Dead-heat 2nd.)
Moderately away, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, kept to inside after straightening, closed off well to take a place. (Dead-heat 2nd.) (See Racing Incidents.)
Began well from gate 10, raced prominently, 3 wide, similar positioned on turn, finished off well without threatening.
Jumped with them, positioned 1 out 1 back, a bit closer turning in, finished off evenly.
Average to begin, showed no early speed, raced at tail, 6 lengths back, same margin back turning in, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home, nearest on line.
Began awkwardly, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Away with them, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, 2-1/2L back, there to turn, finished off evenly.
Made contact at start, raced 3 wide with cover, 2-1/2L back, similar position on turn, finished off evenly.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced 2 wide towards rear, 4 lengths back on turn, no clear run early in straight, found a small gap 200M, made contact 150M, blocked final 100M.
Moderately away, raced 4 wide in midfield, there to turn, made no progress in straight.
Jumped well from a wide draw, unable to slot in, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.

Commenced well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on very well in straight to score.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide better than midfield, angled out after passing 500M, finished off well to take 2nd.
Began fairly, raced 2 wide in midfield, wider turning in, made good progress in straight to take a place on line.
Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the inside, angled out after passing 500M, showed good response early in straight, peaked 150M, ran on evenly, missed 3rd on line.
Began well, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Made contact at start, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, 2 wide turning in, no clear run early in straight, cleared after passing 150M, showed limited response thereafter.
Commenced well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, no daylight early in straight, cleared after passing 150M, finished off evenly.
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide towards rear of midfield, 4 to 5 lengths back turning in, finished off evenly.

Jumped well from the widest draw, unable to slot in, raced better than midfield on the outside, moved a bit closer after passing 1050M, 2 wide on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Shifted in at start and bumped, sent forward to race prominently, 2 wide, allowed rival to cross near 900M, a length back on turn, angled out 450M, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Taken back from gate 10, raced 2 wide towards rear, wider on turn, showed nothing in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear, 6 lengths or so back on turn, very wide turning in, showed nothing in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 7 to 8 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, showed nothing in the run home.
Jumped well from gate 13, raced 3 wide in midfield, hung out making the home turn, emptied early in straight, finished tailed out. (Lame right front leg.)
Eased to obtain box seat, closed off strongly to score.
Midfield, 2 wide, dashed strongly 250M.
Settled in front, 2 wide, closed off strongly for 3rd.
Pressed forward, sat 2 wide, ran on until 50M overhauled.
Pushed to take rail and lead, hung on well until 100M overhauled.
Eased back, 2 wide, dashed strongly 300M.
At back, trapped 3 wide, checked 400M, dashed well 250M.
Slow away, trapped 3 wide in midfield, little dash 300M.
Slow away, behind midfield along the fence, no dash.
Failed to muster, took rail at rear, dashed fairly.
Eased at start, raced 3-5 wide, bumped 400M, hung in badly, ran on ok.
Eased at start, at rear, 2-4 wide, checked 400M, no progress.
Slow away, trapped 4-5 wide, never competitive.
Never a factor.
Began awkwardly, raced at tail, mid-race move to outside the lead passing 900M, responded strongly when asked for effort, scored unchallenged.
Settled at rear on rail, placed pressure passing 500M, responded solidly.
Raced in handy position, commenced to improve on straightening, worked home well.
Raced at back, approaching 800M was left racing wide and without cover, then lay out and made the Home Turn awkwardly, one-paced in the straight.
Ridden along to take lead, no response when placed pressure, failed to make impression, rider reported that the horse did not stretch out, must trial.
Settled towards rear, placed pressure but no response.
Settled midfield on rail, faded out near 200M, bled.
Raced prominently early before getting good run 1,1. Eased 3 wide approaching corner, sprinted quickly to assume lead at 225m before drawing away in concluding stages for very easy win.

Raced wide at first bend before working hard & improving position around field to assume lead near 950m. Continued on to cross to rail when leading soon after. Joined & headed approaching 200m, held second, clear of third.

Raced in midfield on the rail throughout. Moved away from the inside approaching the corner when 5.5L from lead before closing off strongly to third in late stages. Well behind easy winner but ran on well.
Pushed forward to race outside leader in early stages before racing third, away from rail from the 900m. Cornered in second position, only 1L from lead before battling away to hold distant fourth.
Raced in midfield on the rail throughout. Hard ridden passing the 500m, eased away from the inside on cornering when over 4L behind before weakening a few lengths in straight. Well beaten.
Raced in midfield away from rail throughout. Continued around 5L from the lead in middle stages before weakening in the straight to be well beaten in midfield. (Bled).

Shifted back after the start & raced worse than midfield in the clear. Continued with only 3 runners behind at half-way, over 9L behind. Moved very wide on cornering before passing a few when running on late.
Held lead before being headed near the 950m, crossed & raced on leaders back from half-way. Hard ridden on straightening when 2L behind before weakening badly in straight to be beaten over 10L.

Steadied after start & shifted back to race just worse than midfield away from rail, nearly 8L behind at half-way. Came under hard ridding near 600m before making no headway in straight. Well beaten. (Blood in trachea).
Steadied & shifted behind runners after start & raced near the rear throughout. Ridden along passing half-way when 11L from lead. Continued a long way behind on cornering & made no headway.

Raced on leaders back in early stages before shuffled a pair further back, around 4L from lead passing half-way. Came under hard ridding at the 500m before weakening significantly in straight to be long way behind.

Crowded on jumping before holding position in midfield away from rail. Continued in midfield around 6L from lead at half-way. Eased to be the second widest on cornering before weakening badly in final 300m. Long way behind.
Shifted behind runners after the start & raced near the tail throughout. Continued second from last, over 11L behind passing half-way. Weakened further in the straight to be beaten over 18L. Poor.
Shifted back to last after the start. Became somewhat detached approaching corner before weakening badly to be beaten over 20L. (Must trial)
Began only fairly, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, 5 lengths or so back, there to turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 300M, finished off very strongly to score.

Began fairly, raced 2 wide towards rear, wider turning in, hard ridden after passing 400M, showed very good response, hit the front 100M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner late, finished 2nd.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, very wide turning in, closed off well to take a place.

Jumped well from gate 14, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, 1 to 2 lengths back turning in, showed good response early in straight, took the lead 200M, peaked and headed 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Began well, positioned 2 wide, 3 lengths or so back, there to turn, angled out 450M, made some headway in straight.
Jumped well, raced 3 wide in midfield, angled out after passing 500M, made some progress early in straight, peaked on run 150M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, no clear run in straight, not able to test properly.
Moderately away, raced at rear on the inside, 5 lengths back on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared after passing 200M, finished off evenly.
Away with them, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, unable to obtain clear running early in straight, cleared after passing 150M, showed limited response thereafter.
Began only fairly from gate 1, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, no daylight early in straight, cleared final 100M, showed limited response thereafter.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length, travelled well on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 200M, weakened thereafter.
Bumped on jumping, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, a length back, same position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Average to begin, sat right behind the leader on rail, easy run on turn, no clear run until final 100M, showed nothing thereafter.

Out with rest, raced behind midfield on the outside, 4 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, showed no response early in straight, eased final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.) (Irregular Heart Rhythm.)
Sent forward, 2 wide, improved steadily and hit the line strongly in the last 100M.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, made ground and battled on to the line for 2nd.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, improved steadily to the line.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, ran on only fairly to the line.
Sent forward, 2 wide, stayed on but headed passing 200M.
Raced in behind the lead, 2 wide, pretty one paced
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, ran on okay to the line.
Raced in worse than midfield, wide no cover, did not threaten.
Raced behind the lead, along the rail, did not feature.
At rear, along the rail, found nothing.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, never a factor.
At rear, 2 wide, nothing in the Straight.
At rear, 2 wide, made no ground in the Straight.
At rear, 2 wide, no progress.
Broke well, settled mainly 2 back on the rails, baulked for a run from the 400 metres to over 150 metres out, quickened well to take command over 50 metres out.
Broke well to hold slender lead 2 off stands rails, came under pressure to hold place inside final 100 metres but quickly overshadowed.
Settled just over 2L off the pace near the centre of the track, came to challenge under pressure inside the 300 metres, ran on until finding no extra nearing the finish.
Amongst the leading trio, came under pressure to hold place passing the 400 metres, unable to sustain effort inside final 100 metres.
Settled mainly one back behind the leading trio, came under pressure coming onto the course proper, ran home one-paced.
Broke well, travelled mainly 2L off the pace down the centre of the track, held some chance under pressure 200 metres out, unable to sustain effort inside final 100 metres.
Began well from a middle gate, gradually taken 2 back for cover in first quarter, weakened under pressure inside final 200 metres.
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, soon dropped to last few on stands rails, went past well-beaten horses in closing stages.
Shared pace on stands rails, weakened under pressure inside final 300 metres.
Ridden positively from the lowest gate to a prominent position nearer stands side, found no extra inside final 400 metres.
Restrained to last few travelling near the centre of the track, came under pressure inside the 400 metres, faded gradually. (Lame next day)
Slightly slow out and soon dropped to tail-end, never seen with a chance despite ridden along most of the way.
Gradually taken back to the rear, never seen with a chance.
Began well from a middle gate, dropped steadily back to midfield, came under pressure from half-way out, found nothing.
Led entering first turn, set fast tempo all the way, continued on strongly final 400M for a wide margin victory.
Chased leader in a fast run race, not pace to challenge winner on straightening, fought on well to hold 2nd.
Caught wide racing at the rear, no cover from 1000M, inclined to lay out, widest turning for home, ran on well to take 3rd near line.
In mid-division about 7Ls behind leaders in a fast run race, made some ground in the straight but no threat to the runaway winner.
Chased leaders in a fast run race, raced wide no cover until 1000M, battled on in the straight, went 3rd near 200M. Peaked on its run 100M, lost 2 places near line.
Settled down behind mid-division, 7Ls off the fast pace, wide into straight, stayed on fairly to the line.
In midfield racing along the 2-path, stayed on fairly final 400M, never threatened. (Jockey : not suited by strong tempo.)
Never far off from leaders, in 3rd spot making home turn, stayed at same pace early straight, weakened away 200M.
Crossed to a 3-wide position in midfield, no cover from 1000M, moved closer nearing home turn, kept on same pace early straight before fading 200M.
Settled behind midfield, came under pressure near 600M and soon bustled along, found little in the straight. (Lame next day.)
Held up in mid-division along the fence, driven along 500M but not quickened, weakened from 200M.
Dropped back from draw 14, held up at the rear over 10Ls off the pace, struggled from 500M, never in the picture
Taken back from wide draw, settled near last 9Ls off the pace, driven along 600M, failed to make progress.
Restrained after the jump an raced fiercely early stages, remained at the rear throughout the trip, already beaten turning for home.
Began smartly from gate 14, positioned a length behind the leader on the stands' rail, hard ridden 350M, showed very good response, hit the front 200M, kept on very well to the line and scored.
Made contact at start, positioned a length or so back, 2 away from the stands' rail, hard ridden after passing 350M, finished off well to take 2nd, always held.
Moderately away, raced in midfield on the stands' rail, made good progress final 400M to take a place, nearest on line.
Began well, sent forward to take the lead on the stands' rail, travelled well in the middle stages, peaked and headed 200M, ran on evenly to the line.
Average to begin, raced in midfield, 3 away from the stands' rail, hard ridden 300M, showed limited response, slightly hampered 75M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Jumped with them, raced at rear, nearer to the middle track, 6 lengths back at 400M, hard ridden after passing 300M, showed some response, no extra final 100M.
Made contact at start, raced slightly behind midfield on the stands' side, made no progress final 400M.
Began awkwardly, raced behind midfield, nearer to the middle track, hard ridden after passing 400M, showed limited response, weakened final furlong.
Average to begin, raced behind midfield, peaked 400M, weakened final 200M.
Out with rest, raced towards rear, 3 away from the stands' rail, hard ridden after passing 400M, showed limited response, weakened final 100M.
Began fairly, raced prominently, 3 away from the stands' rail, weakened final 300M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Commenced well, raced prominently on the stands' side, weakened gradually after passing 400M.
Average to begin, raced at rear throughout, never a threat.
Began well from gate 1, sent forward to race prominently, peaked 550M, weakened thereafter, eased final 150M.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide better than midfield, wider turning in, finished off very strongly to score.
Struck its head on the side of the gate on jumping, raced 3 wide slightly better than midfield, no cover throughout, 2 lengths or so back turning in, finished off well to take 2nd.
Moderately away from the widest draw, raced prominently, 2 wide, there to turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Jumped well, taken back to race 3 wide behind midfield, very wide turning in, made good progress in straight to make frame, nearest on line.
Commenced well, positioned on rail better than midfield, easy run on turn, showed some response early in straight, peaked 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Made contact at start, taken back to race at rear on the inside, still 8 lengths back turning in, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Taken back to race 2 wide towards rear, wider turning in, made some headway straight.
Made contact at start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed near 250M, weakened final 100M.
Moderately away, showed no early speed, raced at tail, 7 to 8 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made some progress in the run home.
Shifted out at start and made contact, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, wider turning in, made no progress in straight.
Made contact shortly after start, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, peaked 200M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Crowded shortly after start, raced towards rear on the inside, very wide turning in, showed no response in straight.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider turning in, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Made contact at start, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.
