Moderately away, raced slightly better than midfield on the inside, 2 wide after entering the back straight, 3 lengths back turning in, finished off strongly to score by a neck.
Began well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well in straight, just unable to hold off the winner close home.
Moderately away from gate 1, raced 2 wide at rear, 6 lengths or so back on turn, very wide into straight, made good progress in straight to take 3rd on line. (See Racing Incidents.)
Average to begin, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, made some headway in straight to make frame.
Jumped with them, sat right behind the leader on rail, saved ground to turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back to race 2 wide behind midfield, there to turn, angled out after passing 350M, finished off evenly. (See Racing Incidents.)
Away with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, hard ridden after passing 800M, very wide turning in, one-paced in straight.
Out with rest, raced 2 wide better than midfield, sent forward after passing 900M, 2nd on turn, weakened gradually in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear throughout, never a threat.
Jumped well, raced prominently, 2 wide, allowed rival to cross 700M, 2 lengths back on turn, showed limited response early in straight, eased after passing 150M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Slightly slow out, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, sent forward after entering the back straight, peaked 700M, weakened from 500M, emptied early in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Hard ridden to sit in front of midfield, 2 wide, progressed steadily 300M to score.
Eased to sit just off the leaders, 2 wide, ran on well for 2nd.
Pressed forward, sat outside the leader, held ground for 3rd.
Eased to obtain box seat, raced keenly, emptied 150M.
Pushed to take rail and lead, hung on until 100M weakened.
At rear, raced 3 wide, progressed steadily 200M.
Slow away, at back on the fence, made ground 250M.
Slow away, at back, 2 wide, made ground 200M.
Slow away, behind midfield along the fence, no dash.
Never a factor.
Hard ridden early, however trapped 3 wide throughout in midfield, emptied 300M.
Trapped 3 wide throughout, raced greenly, never competitive.
Settled in box seat, asked for effort passing 300M, responded strongly in the straight to score.
Raced outside the lead, worked home strongly, missed by Nose.
Ridden to take lead, placed pressure in the straight, finished well.
Began awkwardly, passing 800M was severely hampered, settled behind midfield, gained nice ground in the straight.
Settled midfield on rail, made the turn passing 600M awkwardly, worked home well.
Raced in one-back-one-off position, passing 800M was checked, blood in trachea, finished OK.
Wide and without cover throughout in handy position, gave ground near 100M.
Raced behind midfield, placed pressure but only one-paced in the straight, mucus in trachea.
Ridden along to race in one-back-one-off position, gave ground passing 200M.
Hard ridden but no early speed, passing 800M was severely hampered, raced towards rear, limited response in the straight.
Slow to begin, raced at tail, remained one-paced in the straight.
Slow to begin, travelled at rear, no response in the straight.

Began well before steadying after first bend & shifting down to rail in midfield. Moved away from the inside on cornering, closed very strongly in final 100m to strike lead inside final 50m & win drawing away.
Mustered speed after the start to lead after 100m. Kicked clear in the lead after straightening & held lead until being passed quickly by winner inside final 50m. Held second.
Began fast & strode forward to race outside the leader. Dropped off the leader who kicked clear passing the furlong marker before digging deep in late stages to hold third. Only 1.5L behind.
Slow to begin & shifted back to race at the tail. Continued at the rear on cornering before making good late ground between runners to be beaten only 2L.
Obtained good position 1,1 after start & raced only 2L from lead by the 800m. Moved wider entering last section when 2.5L from the lead before finishing only evenly to midfield.
Crowded just after start & consequently raced worse than midfield on the rail. Continued along the rail on straightening before making up a length or two to midfield without threatening.

Strode forward from outside gate but was left racing 3 wide without cover behind leading pair. Continued wide passage around bend, entered last section only 1L from lead before emptying out at the 200m & weakening thereafter.
Began well before being crossed & racing on leaders back. Continued to follow the leader on cornering before weakening out in the straight. (Never travelled comfortably-rider).

Had no early speed & consequently settled third last away from rail. Continued rearward, 5.5L behind entering last section, shifted to be the widest runner at the 250m but made no headway in charge to line.
Raced just worse than midfield, 3 wide with cover throughout. Entered last section just over 4L behind before offering no response in the straight & weakening to be beaten over 5L.
Raced close to the lead early before steadying after first bend & racing midfield away from rail. Came under hard riding at the 450m before weakening out in the straight to be well beaten.
Raced very wide around first bend before steadying & drifting back to second last passing the 900m. Continued near the tail on cornering before failing to improve & finishing a well beaten last.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide better than midfield, commenced move after passing 500M, 3 wide turning in, took the lead early in straight, kept on well to the line and scored.
Began well, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, a bit closer on turn, made good progress in straight to take 2nd.
Made contact at start, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, challenged the leader turning in, kept on well early in straight, peaked on run 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Jumped with them, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length, challenged by rivals turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Away with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, there to turn, made some headway in straight.
Began well from gate 1, positioned 1-1/2L behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Bumped start and unbalanced, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 2 wide at rear, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide turning in, finished off evenly.
Began fairly, raced at rear, 7 to 8 lengths back on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Raced at tail throughout, never competitive.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, showed a good kick and closed off strongly to the line and scored by 1-1/2L.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, difficult to settled after 600M, closed of well to the line for 2nd.
At rear, 2 wide after 650M, made ground and ran on strongly to the line.
At rear, along the rail, made ground and raced tight near 100M, ran on okay to the line for 4th.
At rear, 2 wide after 650M, made ground steadily to the line in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, pretty one paced.
At rear, along the rail, raced tight near 100M, made minor ground only.
Sent forward, 2 wide, made no ground in the Straight. Unacceptable performance, must trial. (See incident report)
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, flattened after passing 100M.
Raced behind the leader, along the rail, checked approaching 200M, did not feature thereafter.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, lost ground in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, wide no cover, never a factor.

Quickly settled in midfield from the widest gate, circled the field under pressure rounding home bend and went widest into straight, sustained effort to assert authority 200 metres out, won confidently.
Settled in forward of midfield in 6th 3L off the pace, commenced move rounding home bend, ran on under pressure but found winner too good.
Settled towards the rear in 10th, commenced move on home bend and went wide into straight, ran on down the centre of the track but without threatening.
Settled well behind, came under pressure making home turn, finished off the race strongly inside final 200 metres, did best work late.
Settled in 9th towards the rear on the rail from a wide gate, kept on steadily in home straight without threatening.
Settled not far off in 6th on the rail early, carried backward on stables bend to midfield in 7th some 3L off the pace, baulked and switched for a run 200 metres out, kept on at the one pace.
Pressed forward from a wide gate to cross for the rails in front 1200 metres out, ceded advantage to settle just inside the leader turning into back straight, weakened inside final 200 metres.

Began well, close up in 3rd when travelling keenly round stables bend, became 4th in similar one-out-one-back position turning into back straight, came to challenge after home turn but soon found no extra.
Settled well behind from a wide gate, trailed the field from 800 metres out, ran on past well-beaten horses in closing stages.

Inconvenienced at start, soon recovered to join the leaders 3-wide round first bend, came to take up running 2-wide passing the 1200 metres, led the field until finding no extra inside final 200 metres.
Jumped awkwardly, soon picked up to wide in first few, pulled his way forward 3-wide to reach 3rd without cover into back straight, remained similar to home turn, dropped out under pressure.

Began well from the one draw settling one back, hampered and carried 2-back to 5th rounding shortly after on stables bend, remained similar into home straight where badly baulked and not fully tested throughout.
Always prominent behind leaders, travelled strongly into contention 400M, came through a narrow gap inside 200M, kicked on well over final 150M to score.
Restrained in mid-division, switched wide 400M, closed off fastest down outside while too late to threaten the winner.
From draw 1 settled down behind midfield along the fence, chased on steadily final 300M for 3rd.
From draw 12 caught very wide and no cover in the battle for the lead, stayed in contention until passing 200M.
Began awkwardly, restrained to race towards the rear of the field, ran on moderately final 300M.
Unable to slot in, forced to race 3-wide behind leaders, gave limited response on straightening, no threat final 200M. (Jockey : felt short in its action.)
Sent forward from draw 8, crossed to the fence 750M vying for lead, fought on early straight, headed near 200M, weakened away. (Jockey: more prominent than was intended to avoid racing wide.)
Fractious in stalls, missed the start, ended up in rear of the field, widest into straight, responded fairly over final 300M.
From wide draw sent forward to be sharing the lead along the 2-path, held ground early straight before weakening final 200M. (Jockey dropped right rein 100M.)
Hard driven out the gate, not far off leaders early stages, struggled to hold position 500M, beaten turning for home.
Went forward from draw 11, caught wide no cover chasing leaders, under pressure 500M, soon gave ground, eased.
Fractious in stalls, reared when the start being effected and missed the start badly, detached from field despite ridden along, finished tailed out. (Unacceptable Performance.)
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length, travelled well to turn, kicked clear early in straight, ran on strongly to the line and scored.
Commenced well, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, 3 lengths back, very wide turning in, finished off well to take 2nd on line. (See Racing Incidents.)
Out with rest, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, a length or so back, same position on turn, finished off evenly, lost 2nd close home.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out after passing 350M, finished off evenly.
Began well, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Slowly away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 4 lengths back, same position on turn, finished off evenly.
Began only fairly, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide at rear, 5 to 6 lengths back, similar position on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made no progress in straight.
Moderately away, raced 3 wide with cover towards rear, there to turn, made no progress in straight.
Average to begin, trapped 4 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, weakened gradually in straight.
Away with them, unable to slot in, raced 3 wide with no cover, 2 lengths or so back, there to turn, weakened early in straight when hard run took effect. (See Racing Incidents.)

Began well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well throughout, hard ridden after passing 300M, kept on well to the line, easily scored.
Slightly slow out and made contact, raced at rear, 4 lengths or so back, made very good progress final 300M to take 2nd.
Clean jump, positioned 1-1/2L behind the leader, hard ridden after passing 300M, kept on well to the line without threatening.
Shifted in at start and made contact, sent forward to race prominently, hard ridden after passing 300M, peaked on run 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Bumped start, positioned 1 to 2 lengths back, nearer to the middle track, one-paced final 400M.
Jumped well, sent forward to race prominently on the stands' rail, hard ridden after passing 400M, peaked 300M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Began awkwardly, raced in midfield, 2 away from the stands' rail, inconvenienced near 350M, hard ridden thereafter, only showed limited response, weakened inside final furlong.
Moderately away from gate 1, raced in midfield, 3 away from the stands' rail, hard ridden from 400M, showed limited response, weakened gradually final 150M.
Lifted front feet on jumping and away tardily, raced behind midfield on the stands' rail, hard ridden from 400M, showed limited response, weakened final furlong.
Began awkwardly, raced towards rear on the stands' side, made no progress final 400M.
Jumped well from gate 14, positioned a length behind the leader on the stands' side, peaked 400M, weakened final 300M.
Bumped start, raced behind midfield, nearer to the middle track, peaked 300M, weakened final furlong. (Blood in trachea.)
Average to begin, raced behind midfield, 2 away from the stands' rail, peaked 400M, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Raced at rear throughout, never competitive.
Hard ridden to sit 1 out 1 back, ran on strongly to score.
In front of midfield, 2 wide, close off well 300M for 2nd.
Eased at start, took rail, lack room 400M, made steady ground when clear.
Eased back, trapped 3-4 wide, progressed steadily 300M.
At back, made steady ground 350M, run ended 150M.
Slow away, midfield, 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 300M. (Blood in trachea.)
Eased back, 2-3 wide, made ground 250M.
Eased at start, 2-3 wide, ran on ok in straight.
Eased at start, trapped 3-4 wide, ran on fairly.
Box seat, lack room 400M, out of fuel 200M.
Never better than midfield.
Hard ridden forward, emptied 400M.
Took rail and lead, faded 400M.
Very slow away, never competitive.
Settled in front of midfield on rail, asked for effort on straightening, finished strongly.
Taken back at start, commenced to improve near 400M, worked home solidly, missed by Neck, rider questioned
Niggled along to take lead, responded solidly in the straight, missed by 1/2L.
Raced in handy position, asked for effort near 400M, finished nicely
Raced towards rear on rail, responded nicely in the straight.
Raced behind midfield, 3 wide with cover, worked home well.
Settled in box seat, tried to improve passing 500M, gave ground near 50M.
Slow to begin, settled midfield on rail, finished one-paced.
Settled outside the lead, placed pressure passing 500M, gave ground passing 200M.
Settled in front of midfield, weakened passing 200M, mucopus in trachea, roarer.
Travelled midfield, tried to improve passing 500M, limited response.
Settled midfield, at 900M was left racing wide and without cover, no response when asked.
Taken back at start, near 900M proved difficult to settle and checked away from heels, no response in the straight.
Raced at rear, no response when placed pressure.

Raced close to the speed before getting great position 1,1 from the 900m. Obtained clear running on straightening before making continual headway to strike lead passing the 200m & continuing on well to hold neck advantage on line.

Raced in midfield on the rail throughout. Entered last section under 3L from the lead before being held up for clear running until shifting outwards at the 225m & closing strongly to get within a neck on the line.

Steadied from wide gate & shifted rearward early before improving position when 3 wide without cover in middle stages. Continued to improve around field, cornered only 1L behind before finishing well to hold close up third.

Slowest to begin before mustering along the inside to settle just worse than midfield. Held up for clear running on straightening before dashing strongly between runners in final furlong for rapidly closing fourth.
Began very fast to lead from gate 12 before crossing to rail after 100m. Headed in lead near the 1200m & race don leaders back thereafter. Battled on well in the straight to be under 2L behind.

Shifted behind runners from outside gate to settle second last. Continued rearward before improving position when racing wide in middle stages. Cornered the widest but only 3L behind before finishing well to be close behind.

Raced in midfield away from the rail throughout. Shifted 3 wide when the field bunched near the 600m before straightening only 2L from lead. Battled on well to midfield & was only beaten 2L in a somewhat bunched finish.
Mustered speed after the start & improved to take the lead near the 1200m mark. Continued in lead until being headed by the winner passing the furlong pole before weakening slightly late.

Raced in midfield on the rail throughout. Moved away from the rail near the 600m when the field bunched before entering last section just over 3L behind. Maintained relative margin in the dash to the line but threatened.

Crowded at the start & consequently raced at the rear throughout. Moved very wide passing the 600m when field bunched, shifted to be the widest runner entering final section before making up a length without threatening.

Mustered speed after the start before improving position when racing wide to get outside the leader by the 900m. Continued second until the 300m mark before tiring out in final furlong to be beaten just under 4L.

Shifted behind runners after 100m to get good position in midfield away from rail. Shuffled further back in middle stages before being awkwardly placed on cornering. Made no headway in the straight & never threatened.
Had no early speed & drifted back to race at the tail throughout. Hard ridden on straightening when 5L behind before making no improvement in dash to line.

Crowded at start & raced worse than midfield early. Shifted three wide with cover near 850m before moving closer to lead when field bunched at 600m. Cornered wide, 2.5L behind before emptying 350m & weakening to last (Mucus).
Made contact at start, positioned 1-1/2L behind the leader on rail, angled out after passing 500M, hard ridden 400M, showed very good response, hit the front 150M, kept on strongly to the line.
Made contact at start, positioned on rail in midfield, 3 lengths or so back, saved ground on turn, finished off strongly to take 2nd. (Blood in trachea.)
Moderately away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, there to turn, made good progress in straight to take a place.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed near 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Commenced well, raced prominently, 2 wide, there to turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 7 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out after passing 500M, finished off evenly. (See Racing Incidents.)
Slowly away, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 3 wide at rear, there to turn, one-paced in straight.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide at rear, 6 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, made no progress in straight.
Began smartly, raced 2 wide, 2 lengths back, wider turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Raced behind the lead, along the rail, battled on to the line to score.
In front of midfield, 3 wide but with cover after 1000M, battled on to the line to take 2nd.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, crowded for room around 250M, ran on well for 3rd.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, kept rolling and ran on fairly.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, saved some ground and close off fairly.
At rear initially, midfield after 1000M and along the rail, pretty one paced.
Sent forward, 2 wide after 1350M, found nothing in the straight.
Sent forward, along the rail, showed no turn on foot.
At rear, 2 wide, made minor ground in the Straight. (See incident report)
Raced in behind the lead, 2 wide, not competitive in the straight.
At rear, along the rail, saved no ground.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, didn't threaten.
Raced in front of midfield, 3 wide no cover, raced tight passing 250M, lost ground thereafter.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, did not feature. (Epiglottic entrapment)
Broke well, settled in rear, gained slightly closer to 6th passing the 1100 metres, shifted wide into straight, ran on under pressure to gain upper hand close to home.
Tracked the leader in 3rd on the rail, soon came to challenge upon straightening, hit the front 200 metrers out and only to be denied inside the last 50 metres.
Soon took up running, quickened up the pace rounding home bend going 1L clear 300 metres out, unable to sustain effort and overhauled inside final 200 metres.
Taken back to last few after beginning well from a wide gate, shifted off the rail for a run entering straight, ran on to be nearest at finish despite minor interferences inside 100 metres out.
Settled at the back from a wide gate, trailed the field most of the way, did best work late.
Jumped fairly settled some 3L back in 5th early, gained slightly closer to 4th over 1100 metres out, fought on steadily in home straight without threatening.
Settled some 3L back in 4th on the rail, became 5th in similar position over 1100 metres out, yielded ground gradually after straightening.
Ridden forward after moderate start, chased the leader some 1L back most of the way, came under pressure to challenge turning for home but soon weakened.
Settled towards the rear 7Ls off leader in a fast run race, swung wide for home, quickened up strongly to lead near 150M, kept on well to the line.
Held up behind midfield along the fence, no clear run until 300M then ran on well to go 2nd near line, held by leader.
Reserved behind midfield 5Ls behind leader in a fast run race, held up until 200M, finished off strongly final 150M to take 3rd.
Moved up to take the lead, set fast pace down the back-straight, stuck to task well on straightening, headed 150M, faded to 4th.
Urged forward to sit just off the pace, more prominently than usual, vied for lead early straight, no extra final 100M. (Blood in trachea / Galloped on the RH leg.)
Settled 2-wide in midfield, found less than expected when driven out in straight, went home one paced and well held by leaders. (Jockey : raced flat.)
From wide draw unable to get closer than 3-wide midfield, no cover from 900M, ran on fairly in straight, no threat to leaders.
Settled midfield along the fence, checked at 1100M, had difficulty obtaining clear running early straight, but never going the pace to challenge when clear.
Shifted across behind runners early stages, held up in last 8Ls off the pace, wide into straight, ran past beaten horses only.
Tracked leaders in 3rd, could not go on passing 300M, weakened away (Mucus.)
Tracked the pace, over-raced when steadied for cover behind leaders, battled on same pace early straight, no extra 300M. (Lame next day.)
Fractious when the gates opened and consequently missed the start, recovered to race towards the rear, switched to outside near top of straight, failed to finish off.

Placing: PU
Comment: Chased leaders, went amiss 1100M, lost ground abruptly and out of the race. (Injury LF leg.)
Began fairly, raced 2 wide at rear, a bit closer on turn, angled out after passing 450M, finished off very strongly to score by a narrow margin.
Taken back from gate 10, raced at tail, 9 lengths back, moved closer on turn, made very good progress in straight to take 2nd, just narrowly beaten.
Shifted out at start and made contact, positioned on rail better than midfield, easy run to turn, hard ridden 300M, took the lead 150M, kept on well but unable to hold off the first two late.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced 3 wide with no cover in midfield, a bit closer on turn, kept on well in straight to make frame.
Jumped with them, positioned on rail behind midfield, saved ground to turn, angled out 450M, made some progress in straight.
Began well, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, angled out after passing 500M, made some progress early in straight, peaked on run 200M, ran on evenly to the line.
Away with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, angled out after passing 500M, made some progress in straight.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, showed limited response thereafter.
Made contact at start, sent forward to take the lead, shared the lead with rival on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Began smartly, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, allowed rival to cross near 650M, showed limited response after turning in, weakened close home.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 3 wide with cover towards rear, very wide turning in, one-paced in straight.
Moderately away, raced 3 wide with cover slightly behind midfield, very wide turning in, failed to close off in straight.
Average to begin, raced at rear on the inside, still well back on turn, made no progress in straight.
Began well from the widest draw, raced 2 wide better than midfield early, commenced move after passing 800M, shared lead on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Began well from a wide draw, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on very well in straight, easily scored.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, there to turn, kept on well in straight to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Moderately away, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, saved ground on turn, closed off well to take a place.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced in midfield on the outside, similar position on turn, finished off evenly.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide better than midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Began only fairly, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, angled out after passing 450M, made minor progress in straight.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, similar position on turn, finished off evenly.
Shifted in at start, raced 2 wide, 3 lengths back, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Lunged at start and slow into stride, raced at tail, 6 to 7 lengths back on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, similar position on turn, made no progress in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Average to begin, raced 2 wide towards rear, angled out after passing 500M, made no progress in straight. (See Racing Incidents.) (Mucus.)
Began fairly, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made no progress in straight.
Began awkwardly, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, very wide turning in, showed no response in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began well, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began smartly, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on very well to the line and scored.
Began well, sat right behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, closed off well to take 2nd.
Average to begin, raced at rear, 5 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, very wide into straight, finished off strongly to be nearest on line.
Commenced well from gate 9, raced 3 wide slightly better than midfield, no cover after passing 750M, 2-1/2L back on turn, finished off well to be nearest on line.
Jumped well from gate 11, raced prominently but 3 wide in the early stages, 2 wide after passing 750M, 1/2L back on turn, finished off evenly.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, no clear running in straight, not able to test properly.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, there to turn, made minor progress in straight.
Out with rest, raced at tail, 7 lengths back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Away with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.
Slowly away, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made no progress in straight.
Away with them, raced 2 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide with cover slightly behind midfield, similar position on turn, weakened gradually in straight.
Settled in box seat, drifted away 200M to score.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2 wide, dashed well 300M for 2nd.
Pushed to take the rail in front of midfield, held ground for 3rd.
Slow away, at back, on heels early, 2-3 wide, dashed well 250M.
Eased to sit in midfield along the fence, lack room 4-2, little dash.
Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, weakened 200M.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, 2 wide, little dash in straight.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, out of fuel 250M.
Slow away, at back, no dash.
Eased back, took rail, no progress.
Eased at start, never competitive.
Slow away, never a factor.
Began awkwardly, settled behind midfield on rail, passing 500M lost ground when reluctant to maintain its position, worked home strongly to score.
Raced in front of midfield, near 100M bumped with a runner and became unbalanced, finished solidly, missed by SH.
Settled midfield, niggled passing 500M, wide on straightening, made up some nice late ground, missed by Neck.
Settled midfield, wide on straightening, made some ground passing 100M.
Travelled towards rear, gained some nice ground near 100M.
Settled in handy position, placed pressure passing 500M, finished one-paced.
Taken back at start, widest on straightening, gained some ground in the straight.
Settled at tail, placed pressure passing 450M, gained some late ground in the straight.
Raced in front of midfield on rail, fought hard but kept one-paced in the straight, blood in trachea.
Slow out, raced at rear on rail, worked home one-paced.
Ridden along to take lead, placed pressure but gave ground passing 150M.
Settled in box seat, tried to improve but weakened near 100M.

Showed speed after the start before being crossed & racing on leaders back from the 900m. Stayed on rail in straight, dashed through to share lead at 200m before rallying in closing stages to win (Blood in trachea post-race).
Obtained good position 1,1 throughout. Eased 3 wide on cornering, sprinted well to share lead at the 200m until the 100m before just overpowered by winner in late stages. Well clear of third.

Showed speed after start to improve & race outside the leader at first bend. Assumed narrow lead after cornering before being joined soon after, hampered when laying inwards near 200m before battling away to hold distant 3rd.

Raced very wide around first bend before being steadied & drifting back to third last to get cover. Continued a long way back on cornering before closing strongly in last 150m to just miss third. May need further.
Began only fairly before improving along rail to midfield. Continued along rail on straightening before only battling away to midfield.

Raced behind leading trio in early stages before settling just better than midfield on rail at half-way. Hung out badly & checked away from heels at 600m turn. Finished only fairly to midfield in closing stages. (Must trial).
Limited early speed & raced worse than midfield on the rail throughout. Shifted away from the rail entering last section when just over 4L behind before maintaining margin in drive to line.

Began only fairly before improving slightly approaching first bend & ultimately settling in midfield away from rail. Moved three wide approaching the 400m mark when just over 3L behind before weakening out in final furlong.
Inconvenienced at start before shifting back to race second from last. Continued near the rear entering last section, nearly 6L behind before making no real headway in straight & being well beaten.
Ridden forward to lead before crossing to rail near the 900m. Raced keenly in middle stages before being headed at the 300m & weakening poorly thereafter. (See report).
Began awkwardly before racing a clear last throughout. Shifted to be the widest runner on cornering before failing to make any noteworthy headway in dash to line.
Raced in midfield before being severely hampered & taken wider by hanging horse around 600m bend. Cornered over 4L behind before weakening to last in the straight.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well in straight to hold off the challenger.
Commenced well from gate 1, sat right behind the leader on rail, easy run to turn, finished off well to take 2nd, always held.
Bumped shortly after start, positioned 2 lengths back on rail, saved ground on turn, finished off strongly to take a place, nearest on line.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, similar position on turn, finished off well to make frame.
Inconvenienced at start, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some progress in straight, no threat to the first few.
Bumped shortly after start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, there to turn, made some headway in straight.
Began smartly, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, 2 lengths or so back on turn, finished off evenly. (Mucus.) (Lame left front leg.)
Away with them, taken back to race at tail, 6 lengths back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Jumped well from a wide draw, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Slightly inconvenienced at start, raced 2 wide at rear, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, one-paced in straight.
Moderately away from the widest draw, raced better than midfield but trapped very wide, no cover throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Settled in one-out one-back, ran on nicely to the line and score.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, closed off gamely, only to miss by a neck.
Sent forward to take rail and led, along the rail, kept rolling and ran on well to the line.
Rolled forward, 2 wide, stayed on but headed by first three inside final 150M.
At rear, along the rail, made ground steadily to the line.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, ran on one paced.
Raced in behind the lead, along the rail, only one paced in the Straight. (See incident report)
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, made some ground only in the Straight.
At rear, 2 wide, saved no ground in the straight.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide no cover, in the starlight lost ground. (Blood in trachea)
Raced in worse than midfield, 2 wide, did not run on.
Worse than midfield, along the rail, nothing in the Straight.
Began well settling on the rail just inside the leader, hit the front shortly after straightening, won confidently.
Settled 3-wide with cover in midfield, commenced move rounding home bend, finished off the race strongly inside final 150 metres.
Travelled very wide without cover towards the rear, in similar position turning for home, ran on well to be nearest at finish.
Jumped very awkwardly losing considerable ground, trailed the field to the 500 metres, saved ground turning in, ran on well to be nearest at finish.

Travelled very keenly from the 700 and checked back to rear of midfield over 600 metres out, saved ground near the rail turning for home, unable to quicken under pressure in straight and gave ground inside final 100 metres.
Soon took up running holding narrow lead 2-wide to home straight, drifted out under pressure while yielding ground after straightening.
Tightened and lost position shortly after short dropping towards the rear, in similar position on the rail turning in, kept on at the one pace in home straight. (Tactic questioned)
Began from a wide gate, with leaders 4-wide early before taken 2 back to 4th approaching home bend, found nothing under pressure in home straight.
With leaders early stages, dropped some 2L back to 3rd over 650 metres out, kept on until finding no extra inside final 150 metres.
Travelled wide with cover in midfield, lost position when widest turning into straight, never recovered.
Slightly slow out settling well behind, dropped to last 500 metres out, never seen with a chance
Began fairly but soon dropped to midfield along the rail despite niggling along, saved ground on the inside turning in, soon weakened in straight.
Began awkwardly, settled down 5Ls off the pace in mid-division, travelled strongly into the straight, quickened to lead near 100M, held on well late stages.
Reserved towards the rear, 6Ls off the pace middle stages, swung widest into straight, ran on strongly to be nearest at the finish.
Held up in mid-division along the 2-path, gave good response when pressed passing 400M, stayed on well final stages to take 3rd.
Failed to muster speed after beginning fairly, settled towards the rear 6Ls behind, held up 200M-150M then ran on well towards the finish.
Tracked leader early stages, moved up passing 800M vying for the lead, held slender lead from top of straight, headed near 100M, lost several places near line.
Slow to begin, held up near last 8Ls off the pace, raced keenly 1100M, scrubbed along 450M, lay in under pressure final 300M, stayed on without threat.
From draw 1 settled along the fence just ahead of midfield, moved closer home turn, had every chance on straightening, out-finished final 200M.
Settled 2-wide just ahead of midfield, moved closer to 4th spot halfway, driven wide into straight, kept on same pace only.
Crossed to the lead 1200M, taken on by rival from 700M, came under pressure home turn, weakened and out of contention nearing 200M.
Took up a prominent spot as expected, tracked leaders in 3rd, held ground early straight, swamped by rivals 200M, eased when beaten.
Steadied from wide draw and taken across behind runners, settled in last 9Ls back, under pressure 600M, struggled to keep up and soon detached from field.
Taken back from gate 11, positioned 2 wide, 5 lengths back, same margin back on turn, very wide into straight, made very good progress in the run home to score.

Commenced well, positioned right behind the leader on rail, easy run to turn, hard ridden 300M, showed very good response, hit the front near 100M, kept on strongly but still unable to hold off the winner on line.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced towards rear on the inside, 6 lengths back, saved ground on turn, finished off very strongly to take a place. (See Racing Incidents.)

Jumped well, unable to slot in, raced 3 wide slightly better than midfield, sent forward after passing 900M, shared lead on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Inconvenienced at start, raced behind midfield on the inside, 4 lengths or so back, saved ground on turn, finished off well without threatening.
Slightly slow out, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, checked off heels near 1000M, saved ground on turn, kept on well early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Began well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, showed some response early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Began only fairly and inconvenienced, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 lengths or so back, very wide turning in, made some progress early in straight, peaked 100M, ran on evenly to the line.
Shifted out at start, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide, allowed rival to cross near 600M, a length back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.

Moderately away, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably in the middle stages, shared the lead with rival on turn, peaked and headed 200M, weakened gradually thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Shifted out at start, taken back to race at rear on the outside, 7 lengths back, same margin back on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Raced at rear throughout, never a factor.

Began smartly from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on very well in straight, easily score, impressive debut.
Made contact at start, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide, 3/4L back, same position on turn, kept on well in straight to take 2nd, always held.
Commenced well, positioned right behind the leader on rail, easy run to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked on run 150M, stayed on evenly to take a place.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide 1 to 2 lengths back, there to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked 200M, ran on evenly to the line.
Taken back from gate 13, raced at rear on the inside, 6 lengths or so back, 2 wide turning in, passed some weakened rivals in straight, no threat to the first few.
Away well, raced 3 wide with no cover in midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Shifted in at start and made contact, unable to slot in, trapped wide behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Made contact at start, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Away with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, angled out after passing 500M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced 4 wide at rear, no cover on turn, very wide into straight, made no progress in the run home.
Made contact at start, raced towards rear on the inside, 5 lengths or so back, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Taken back from gate 10, raced 2 wide at rear, 7 lengths back turning in, failed to make any progress in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, 6 to 7 lengths back turning in, showed nothing in straight.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, closed off strongly 300M to score.
Eased back, trapped 3 wide, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Pushed to hold the rail in midfield, progressed steadily 300M.
Slow away, took rail at rear, lack room in straight, made steady ground.
Box seat, ran on fairly.
Slow away, at back along the fence, lack room in straight, progressed steadily.
Slow away, took rail at rear, blocked most straight, made ground when clear.
Pushed early, trapped 3-4 wide in midfield, made ground 400M run ended 150M.
At back, 2 wide, lack room 400M, made ground when clear.
In front of midfield, 2 wide, weakened 200M.
Eased back, blocked whole straight, not fully tested.
Never competitive at rear.
Hard ridden to taka rail and lead, out of fuel 300M.
Trapped 3 wide in midfield, emptied 300M,
On jumping stumbled, then was hampered and lost ground, raced behind midfield on rail, made the turn near 600M awkwardly, continued to make ground in the straight, finished strongly to score.
Settled in one-back-one-off position, responded solidly when asked in the straight.
Settled midfield on rail, commenced to improve passing 300M, worked home nicely.
Jumped well, travelled midfield, gained some ground in the straight when placed pressure.
Settled in box seat, responded well in the early part of straight, gave ground passing 100M.
Urged along to race outside the lead, placed pressure near 300M, finished one-paced.
Raced towards rear on rail, made some ground in the straight.
At the start was hampered and lost ground, then ridden along but failed to muster speed, raced detached, limited response in the straight.
Raced towards rear, wide on straightening, limited response in the straight.
Ridden along for some distance to take lead, gave ground passing 200M.
Began awkwardly, raced behind midfield, faded out passing 200M, rider questioned tactic.
Raced at rear, no response when asked for effort, never in it.

No early speed but improved along rail to midfield, 6L behind leader at 800m in solidly run first-half. Moved away from the rail approaching corner, held up momentarily at 350m before closing hard to dash to lead near 125m.

Raced in midfield on rail throughout. Entered last section 3L behind run-away leader, made continual headway between runners to move to second near the 100m mark before finishing only a neck behind on line.

Drifted back after start & raced second last. Continued rearward over 10L from lead at half-way in strongly run race. Cornered widest runner before closing strongly in last section to charge to third, beaten under a length.

Drifted back after the start before settling third last passing the 1000m. Continued well back, 8.5L form the lead entering the final section before closing off well in final furlong to secure well held 4th on the line.
Obtained good position 1,1 in solidly run race early. Eased 3 wide on cornering, entered last section 3L behind before finishing off evenly in last section.
Had nice run on leaders back throughout. Moved over leaders heals on straightening, held narrow second place approaching the 150m before peaking late. Not beaten far.

Inconvenienced after start & consequently raced worse than midfield before improving along the rail to be nearly 8L behind near half-way. Stayed along the rail in the straight before making steady late ground to be beaten 3L.

Steadied from widest gate & shifted back to a clear last. Hard ridden passing the 500m mark, entered last section 11L from lead before making some late ground when running onto midfield from the rear.

Steadied in the early stages before racing worse than midfield, 3 wide with cover. Continued with only 3 runners behind at half-way when over 9L from lead. Finished off only moderately in final section & was never a threat.

Showed speed when ridden hard to come across & lead. Set fast mid-race sections throughout. Continued to hold length advantage at the 300m mark before being joined at the 100m & tiring thereafter. (See report).

Bumped, lost ground at start before improving to get good position in midfield off rail. Continued in midfield, 5.5L from lead at half-way in fast run first-half. Hard ridden before straightening before emptying at 250m.
Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Continued just under 8L from the lead passing half-way, came under hard riding on straightening before making no headway in final section. Well beaten.

Restrained after the start before being caught 3 deep in midfield. Left without cover from the 1100m when around 6L from lead. Entered last section a similar margin from the lead before weakening poorly beaten a big margin.

Raced wide in the early stages before improving to second place near the 1300m. Continued second, over a length from the lead passing the 600m before coming under heavy pressure soon after & weakening to long last.
Commenced well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, angled out 450M, finished off very strongly to score.
Began well, raced behind midfield on the outside early, moved closer in the middle stages, no cover throughout, made good progress in straight to take 2nd.
Began smartly from the widest draw, raced prominently, 2 wide, 3/4L back, same position on turn, kept on well in straight to take a place.
Jumped well from gate 11, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well in straight, just unable to hold off the first few final 50M.
Away with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, 5 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, made good progress in straight without threatening.

Began well, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths back, wider after passing 600M, same margin back on turn, showed limited response early in straight, peaked 200M, ran on evenly to the line. (Blood in trachea.) (Lame left hind leg next day.)
Made contact at start, sat 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, angled out 400M, one-paced in the run home.
Began well, raced 2 wide towards rear, 3 wide on turn, made minor progress in straight. (Lame left front leg.)
Crowded start, raced at tail, 8 lengths back on turn, made little progress in straight.
Slightly slow out, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, kept on evenly early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, peaked on turn, weakened gradually in straight.
Began fairly, raced 3 wide with cover, 5 lengths or so back, there to turn, weakened early in straight, finished last. (See Racing Incidents.)
Settled in one-out one-back, closed off strongly in the last 200M and scored by 3/4L
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, made ground and ran on strongly in the last 100M.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, ran on fairly to the line
Rolled forward and took lead, along the rail, kept rolling and ran on fairly.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, swung widest on Straightening and closed of okay.
Settled in box-seat, weakened in the last 50M.
At rear, 2 wide, made minor ground in the Straight.
At rear, along the rail, showed some dash only.
Rolled forward, 2 wide, was one paced in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, wakened noticeably after passing 150M. (Lame left hind)
At rear, along the rail, saved no ground.
Raced in behind midfield, 3 wide but with cover, nothing in the Straight (See incident report)
Slow to begin, at rear, did not feature.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide no cover, lay in through out the race and difficult to ride, lost ground in Straight. (See incident report)

Settled within 3L of pace on the rail, became further back when pace quickened round home bend, commenced move shortly after straightening and quickened well to hit the front over 100 metres out, won readily.

Began well settling back in 4th some 3L back, improved steadily to reach 2nd 1100 metres out settling some 2L off the quickening race leader round home bend, kept on same pace without quickening in the run to the line.

Inconvenienced at start, soon dropped 4L back in 6th on the rail becoming 7th in similar position 1150M out, slight further back from quickening pace on home bend, produced good late impression inside final 100M.

Broke well from a wide draw, soon crossed to settle for one back 2nd position before becoming 3rd some 3L back from quickened pace round home bend, came to challenge upon straightening and fought on steadily without threatening.

Jumped best to lead, steadied pace in the front early, quickened up pace from approaching home bend going over 2L clear, maintained a similar margin to early straight, unable to sustain effort when overhauled inside final 150M.
Settled in rear, mainly 3-wide but with cover in back straight, similar coming onto final turn, ran home one-paced.(Jockey reported feeling awkward in horse's action.)
Slightly slow out settling well behind, commenced move entering home straight but failed to quicken to feature.
Settled towards the rear, gained slightly closer to 6th passing the 1200 metres, came under pressure to keep with the quickened pace around home bend, found no extra inside final 150 metres.

Broke well before taken back to midfield in 5th 3-wide without cover, improved to 4th 1000M out but became further back from accelerated pace round the bend, dropped away quickly inside final 300 metres. (See Racing Incidents.)
Soon taken back well behind, ridden along round home bend and given reminders from the 500 metres, found nothing. (Mildly lame after race.)
Settled just ahead of midfield, took a while to get going on straightening, motored home final 200M, got up just in time.
In mid-division, left 3-wide no cover nearing 800M, gave good response inside 400M, just outpaced by winner final stages.
From draw 1 moved forward to track leaders, quickened to lead 300M, kept on well under pressure, caught by first 2 close home.
Taken back from draw 14, settled in rear 6-7Ls off the pace, switched wide 600M, ran on well down outside, just missed 3rd.
Crossed to the lead near 1000M, set steady pace, headed near 300M, fought on to hold 2nd until 50M, lost several places near line.
Slow to begin, settled near the rear of the field, over 5Ls to make up 400M, no clear run early straight, closed off well over final 250M but had too much to do.
Crowded for room at the start, failed to muster speed, raced behind mid-division, ran on moderately in straight, no impression on leaders final 150M.
In mid-division along the fence, kept on steadily over final 400M but always held by leaders.
Held up 3-wide behind midfield, driven out passing 500M, stayed on without threatening.
Settled down midfield, 4Ls to make up 400M, responded fairly and not going the pace to challenge, inconvenienced 50M.
Strode forward from draw 12, vied for lead on outside from 850M, outpaced from 300M, weakened towards the finish.
Taken across from wide draw, held up in the rear 6Ls behind leader, failed to close off passing 400M.
Chased leaders along the 2-path, weakened turning for home, soon dropped out of contention.
Unable to slot in from draw 11, raced very wide throughout, no cover from 900M, gave ground in the straight, eased when no chance.
Began well, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, angled out after passing 450M, finished off very strongly to score.
Out with rest, positioned 2 wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, similar position on turn, finished off well to take 2nd.
Taken back from gate 11, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 5 lengths or so back on turn, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to be nearest on line.
Jumped with them, raced slightly behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back on turn, very wide turning in, finished off well to make frame.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide at rear, very wide turning in, made very good progress in straight without threatening the first few.
Commenced well, positioned 2 wide, 3 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Began smartly, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked 100M, headed 75M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Moderately away, positioned on rail, 3 to 4 lengths back, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Began well, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide, there to turn, kept on well to 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Jumped with them, positioned 3 wide, 2 to 3 lengths back, no cover on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 8 lengths or so back on turn, passed a few tired runners in straight.
Slowly away, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Average to begin, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, showed no response early in straight, eased final 300M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Fast into stride, sent forward to race prominently on the outside, travelled well on turn, hit the front early in straight, kept on very well to the line and scored.
Taken back to race 2 wide at rear, 6 lengths back, wider after passing 600M, finished off very strongly to take 2nd.
Made contact at start, positioned 3 wide with cover, 2 lengths or so back, there to turn, kept on well in straight to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Moderately away, positioned 1 out 1 back, similar position on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked on run 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Began well, raced 2 wide, 4 lengths or so back, there to turn, no clear running early in straight, made good progress final 250M, no threat to the first few.
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, unable to obtain clear running in straight, not able to test properly.
Began well from gate 1, sat right behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, showed limited response early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Began awkwardly, positioned 2-1/2L behind the leader on rail, same margin back on turn, kept on evenly early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, there to turn, kept on evenly early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide at rear, 5 lengths or so back turning in, passed some tired runners in straight.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced prominently but 3 wide, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.
Bumped start and unbalanced, raced 2 wide, 2 to 3 lengths back, same position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced at rear throughout, never a threat.

Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the inside, 4 lengths or so back, angled out 350M, finished off very strongly to score.
Began smartly, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground on turn, closed off well to take 2nd.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced towards rear on the outside, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly in the run home to be nearest on line.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, commenced move after passing 400M, 3 wide turning in, made good progress in straight, peaked 50M, missed 3rd late.
Slowly away, raced at tail, 7 lengths back on turn, made very good progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back, wider turning in, made some headway in straight.
Made contact at start, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, made some progress early in straight, blocked 150M, cleared 100M, showed limited response thereafter.
Began only fairly, raced at rear on rail, 6 lengths or so back, there to turn, made some headway in straight.
Fast into stride, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, one-paced in straight.
Began well from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked 150M, headed 100M, weakened gradually thereafter. (Blood in trachea.)

Out with rest, unable to slot in, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover after passing 650M, 2 lengths or so back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Bumped start, raced prominently on the outside, 3/4L back on turn, weakened gradually in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield along the rails, made steady ground 300M to score.
Eased back, 2 wide, progressed steadily 250M for 2n.d
Pushed forward, took box seat, ran on well for 3rd.
Slow away, at rear, lack room 300M, progressed steadily when clear.
Hard ridden early, trapped 3 wide throughout, ran on well to the line.
At back, along the fence, blocked most straight, made good ground.
Midfield, 2 wide, lack room 300M, ran on ok.
Eased at start, took cover, 2 wide, made ground 250M.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, no progress.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, out of fuel 250M.
Pushed forward, sat 2 outside the leader, emptied 200M.
In front of midfield along the fence, weakened 200M.
Niggled along to take lead, travelled nicely, responded well when asked for effort, scored unchallenged.
Travelled behind midfield, placed pressure passing 600M, made up some nice ground in the straight.
Settled in one-back-one-off position, commenced to improve passing 550M, worked home well.
Settled midfield, improved near 500M, finished well.
Taken back at start, settled towards rear on rail, gained some ground in the straight.
Began only fairly, settled midfield on rail, worked home one-paced.
Taken back at start, widest on straightening, fought hard in the straight.
Taken back at start, improved rounding the Home Turn, finished one-paced.
Raced at tail, near 500M moved to handy position, limited response in the straight.
Raced in the lead, tried to improve passing 400M, faded out passing 100M.
Settled in box seat, niggled from 1000M, came under pressure rounding the Home Turn, no response in the straight.
Travelled midfield, wide and without cover throughout, came under pressure along the back straight, finished tailed out, must trial.

Obtained position in midfield away from the rail throughout early & middle stages. Improved quickly between runners approaching the 400m before closing strongly to strike lead inside final 50m to win narrowly.

Raced in midfield on rail for the majority. Continued 3L from lead approaching corner, shifted inwards to get clear running at 200m, squeezed between runners to assume lead near 50m before caught in final strides.
Raced on leaders back for the majority. Moved away from the rail on cornering, moved up to share lead near the 100m before passed in late stages. Beaten under a length.
Missed the start & consequently raced near the rear. Continued rearward, 6L behind approaching the corner before closing off very strongly in closing stages to be beaten just over a length.
Crowded at the start & consequently raced just worse than midfield on the rail. Stayed close to the rail on cornering when around 4L behind before making good late ground to be beaten only 2L.

Raced in midfield early before drifting back after the first bend to race worse than midfield away from the rail in middle stages. Moved wider on cornering before closing off evenly in late stages to midfield. Not beaten far.

Showed early speed to lead before being headed near the 1000m, moved away from rail soon after when racing second. Moved up to share lead near the 125m before emptying out late. Not beaten far. (Rider question-see report).

Shifted behind runners after the start & raced third last away from rail. Continued second last over 6L behind on cornering before making up late ground when running on to midfield finish from rearward position.
Ridden forward before racing 1,1 for majority. Hung outwards on cornering before emptying out & weakening out weakening a few lengths in the dash to the line.
Showed speed after the start before improving to assume lead near the 1000m & crossing to rail soon after. Held lead until emptying out passing the 150m & weakening out thereafter.

Steadied & shifted back to the tail after the start. Continued a clear last on cornering when over 7L from lead before finishing off steadily before not being tested in final 50m when close to heels. (Lame next day).
Raced in midfield away from rail for majority. Made the turn at the 500m awkwardly & hung out, losing ground before cornering very wide. Weakened out poorly in straight to be last.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, hampered 1250M, there to turn, commenced move after passing 450M, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to score.

Quickly into stride, sent forward to take the early lead, headed 1050M, allowed the rival to cross after entering the back straight, easy run to turn, angled out early in straight, closed off well to take 2nd on line.

Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the inside, moved closer along the rail on turn, hit the front 250M, kept on well, shifted out 125M, weakened gradually thereafter, missed 2nd on line. (See Racing Incidents.)

Taken back from a wide draw, raced behind midfield on the outside early, hampered 1250M, dropped to rear thereafter, moved closer after passing 500M, very wide turning in, finished off strongly to be nearest on line.
Began only fairly from gate 1, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, angled out after passing 450M, finished off well without threatening.
Made contact at start, raced at tail, 11 lengths back, moved closer on turn but still 7 lengths behind, made some progress in straight without threatening.
Made contact at start, unable to slot in, trapped very wide, a length or so back, 2 wide after passing 850M, challenged the leader turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Jumped with them, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made minor progress in straight.

Began well, sent forward to race prominently, hampered 1250M, took the lead 1050M, travelled well in the middle stages, challenged by rival turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, hampered 1250M, 3 wide after passing 600M, peaked turning in, weakened gradually in straight.
Shifted in at start, raced better than midfield on the outside, bumped near 1250M, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Lunged at start and slow into stride, raced 2 wide in midfield early, severely checked 1250M, weakened gradually after passing 800M, eased final 500M. (Lame both front legs.)
Sent forward and raced next to the leader, 2 wide, ran on nicely and held off challenge to score.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, headed at 200M but still stayed on and took 2nd.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, made some ground in the Straight for 3rd.
Settled to race in behind midfield, 2 wide, kept on going to the line.
Midfield, along the rail, saved ground and ran on well to the line.
Raced in behind midfield, 3 wide but with cover, pretty one paced. (See incident report.)
At rear, 2 wide, made some ground until flattened in final 100M.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, only one paced.
Raced in front of midfield, wide no cover, showed no turn on foot.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, did not improved in the Straight. (Blood in trachea.)
Settled in midfield, came to challenge inside the 400 metres, quickened well under pressure to assert authority 50 metres out.
Pressed forward from the widest gate settling just outside the leader, came under pressure to challenge entering home straight holding every chance, outsprinted by the winner close to home.
Ridden forward from a wide gate settling just over 2L back in 4th, commenced move 3-wide around home bend, ran on steadily without threatening.

Soon took up running setting a sedate pace, challenged for lead and momentarily headed inside the 500 metres, re-gained advantage under pressure turning into straight, swamped for a placing inside final 50 metres.

Crowded shortly after the start settling in midfield on the rail, travelled keenly in the slow pace in back straight, angled out for a run turning for home, produced good late impression inside final 50 metres.

Moderate start, settled just worse than midfield in the slow pace, charged forward from the 700 metres to hit the front over 500 metres out, just outside race leader turning in, unable to sustain effort inside final 100 metres.

Soon taken across in rear for rails run, gained steadily to reach midfield turning into back straight, lost position when pace quickened on home bend, made up good late ground inside final 200 metres.
Taken back for cover from a wide gate, improved towards the rear along the rail on stables bend, fought on steadily near the centre of home straight to be nearest at finish.
Settled just off the slow pace in 3rd on the rail, came under pressure to hold place when pace quickened around the bend, unable to sustain effort inside final 150 metres.

Gradually taken back to last few for cover, travelling awkwardly when steadied passing the 800 metres, improving on outside when steadied for a run over 400 metres out, made no impression in home straight.
Settled at the back, went very wide into home straight, made no impression.
Travelled keenly in midfield in the slowly-run race, made short-lived effort rounding home bend, dropped quickly out of contention from 400 metres out.
Chased leaders, sprinted home well and moved up to take the lead 150M, drew clear final stages winning cosily.
Quickly into the lead, set steady pace, kept on well in straight, headed 150M, faded late stages but held 2nd comfortably.
Checked on jumping, ended up near last, awkwardly placed behind rival near top of straight, closed off well final 250M and got up for 3rd near 50M, not able to challenge first 2.
Shifted across behind runners early stages, waited with near last, wide into straight, stayed on for non-threatening 4th.
From wide draw shifted across behind runners early stages, raced as the back marker 6-7Ls off the pace, made limited progress over final 300M.
Reserved in midfield, kept on one pace on straightening, never seriously threatened.
Rushed forward after the start, raced outside leader, battled on early straight, held 3rd until nearing 50M, no extra close home.
Sent forward, chased leaders 2-wide, ran on same pace final 300M, no impression. (Jockey unable to offer any reason for the disappointing run.)
Restrained after the jump, held up 2-wide towards the rear, failed to close off passing 300M. (Jockey unable to explain for the disappointing run.)
In mid-division, saved ground on inside, failed to pick up on straightening, weakened over final 200M.
Jumped fairly, caught wide no cover entering back-straight, gradually improved to be chasing leaders, gave ground passing 300M.
Held up 3-wide in midfield, not quickened when driven along 400M, weakened mid-straight.
Fast into stride, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on strongly in straight, won by 1-1/4L.
Began smartly, raced in 2nd, 2 wide on turn, finished off well without threatening the winner.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2-1/2L back on turn, kept on well in straight to take a place.
Slowly away, raced at rear on the inside, 6 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, made some headway final 200M to make frame, no threat to the first few.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide, 5 lengths or so back, there to turn, made good progress early in straight, peaked 100M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Began fairly, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 lengths or so back, there to turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 7 lengths back, commenced move after passing 450M, very wide turning in, finished off evenly.
Away with them, raced 3 wide behind midfield, 5 lengths back, same margin back on turn, one-paced in straight.
Jumped with them, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Began fairly from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, 3 lengths back, saved ground on turn, weakened gradually in straight.
Jumped well, raced 3 wide with no cover, 2 lengths or so back, there to turn, weakened early in straight when hard run took toll.
Moderately away, taken back to race at rear on the outside, no cover on turn, weakened early in straight.
