Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, angled out early in straight, finished off strongly to score.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, 3 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, finished off strongly to take 2nd, just narrowly beaten.
Began well, unable to slot in, raced 3 wide with no cover, a length or so back, similar position on turn, closed off well to take a place.
Commenced well from gate 1, raced prominently on rail, travelled well to turn, hit the front 400M, kept on well, just unable to hold off the first few final 50M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Away with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, made some progress early in straight, no clear run final 100M, not able to be fully ridden.
Began very awkwardly, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some progress in straight.
Jumped well, raced 3 wide with cover towards rear, 5 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, made some headway in straight.
Bumped start and unbalanced, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, not enough room 200M, ran on evenly thereafter.

Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 6 lengths or so back, a bit closer on turn but still 5 lengths behind, made some progress early in straight, blocked 100M, ran on evenly to the line. (See Racing Incidents.)
Slightly slow out, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, one-paced in straight.
Average to begin. sent forward to take the lead, 2 wide, travelled well to turn, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 3 wide slightly better than midfield, hampered near 900M, 2-1/2L back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
At back, made steady ground 300M to score.
Behind midfield, held up badly, progressed steadily for 2nd.
Eased to sit just off the speed, ran on well for 3rd.
At rear, progressed steadily 250M.
Pushed forward, led 300M, emptied 100M.
Eased to sit behind the leaders, lack room 4-2, ran on ok.
Behind midfield, made steady ground 200M.
Eased back for cover, made some ground 300M.
Eased at start to take cover at rear, lack room until 150M, made steady ground.
Hard ridden to share the lead, out of fuel 250M, eased 100M.
Back, held up badly and checked 150M, not properly tested.
Hard ridden forward, weakened 200M, on heels 100M.
Eased at start, never improved.
Pushed forward, emptied 300M, on heels 150M.
Travelled strongly in the lead, responded strongly in the straight to score.
Settled midfield on rail, asked for effort on straightening, worked home solidly.
Crowded on jumping, raced at back, niggled from 500M, made up some nice ground in the straight.
Raced outside the lead, in the early part of straight lay out, fought hard in the straight, finished well.
Raced midfield, made the turn at 900M awkwardly, gained some ground in the straight.
Settled towards rear, fought hard but only one-paced.
Taken back at start, widest on straightening, placed pressure but no response.
Began well, 3 wide and without cover throughout, limited response in the straight, lame left front and right hind.

Raced in midfield on rail throughout. Moved away from rail on cornering, entered last section just over 3L from lead, made continual headway before dashing between runners to strike lead near 50m mark. Strong late.
Showed good early speed to lead. Continued to hold lead until being passed by winner near the 50m mark. Held second narrowly.
Raced prominently after start before racing on leaders back. Entered last section only 1.5L from lead before finishing off well to just miss second, beaten only 1L.

Began well, pushed forward to race outside the leader from 900m. Hung out around home bend & lost some ground. Continued a length behind at 200m before shifting out under pressure & weakening slightly late. Not beaten far.
Didn't begin fast but improved slightly to race just worse than midfield on rail. Entered last section 5L from lead before making some late ground to be beaten under 3L.
Raced prominently after start before getting good position 1,1 from the 900m. Eased wider on cornering, entered last section only 2.5L from lead before failing to improve in dash to line.

Steadied from wide gate & shifted back to race second last. Continued well back, 9L from lead entering last section before making late ground to midfield. Fastest last section but too far back to threaten. (Lame.)

Began awkwardly before improving position between runners to settle in midfield by the 900m. Raced keenly & awkwardly placed passing half-way. Weakened a few lengths in straight to be 6L behind in midfield.
Began awkwardly before steadying & shifting back to third last on rail. Hard ridden passing the 500m, cornered 8L behind before making no real improvement in straight. Well beaten.
Caught three deep without cover in midfield throughout. Began losing ground from the 500m before weakening significantly in straight to be long way behind.

Raced just worse than midfield away from rail, 6L from lead after first section. Hard ridden near the 600m, entered last section 8L from lead before weakening poorly to be a long second last, over 13L behind.

No early speed, shifted behind runners to race at tail. Continued a clear last on cornering, 11L behind entering last section before weakening very badly in straight to be 30L last. (Irregular heart rhythm.)
Began well, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider on turn, finished off very strongly, joined leader last stride. (Dead-Heat.)
Moderately away, raced at rear on the outside, commenced move after passing 800M, very wide turning in, hit the front 200M, kept on strongly to the line. (Dead-Heat.)
Began well, raced prominently, 2 wide, took the lead 500M, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 200M, ran on evenly to take 3rd.
Bumped shortly after start, raced towards rear on the inside, angled out after passing 650M, very wide turning in, made good progress in straight to make frame on line, no threat to the first few.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide towards rear, hard ridden after passing 650M, very wide turning in, made some headway in straight.

Jumped with them, taken back to race at tail, 10 lengths back, moved closer after passing 800M, very wide turning in, made good progress early in straight, peaked near 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Taken back from gate 9, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, finished off evenly.
Bumped shortly after start, raced 2 wide better than midfield early, found rail near 900M, saved ground on turn, showed limited response in straight, weakened final 100M.

Began only fairly, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared after passing 300M, made no progress thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.) (Lame right front leg next day morning.)
Away with them, trapped very wide in midfield early, found a 2 wide spot near 1300M, 3 wide with no cover from 800M, 2 to 3 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.

Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 3 wide slightly better than midfield, 2 wide after entering the back straight, 3 lengths back on turn, showed no response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced prominently, 3 wide, slightly taken back after passing 1000M, found cover 800M, 2 lengths back on turn, weakened gradually in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Bumped start, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight. (Lost left front plate in the early stages.)
Fast into stride, sent forward to race prominently on the inside, led by half-length in the middle stages, peaked and headed 500M, weakened early in straight.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail after 1200M, stayed on and scored by 2L.
Raced in midfield initially, in front of midfield after 1000M, wide no cover, closed off strongly in the Straight to take 2nd.
Raced in worse than midfield, 3 wide but with cover, made ground and ran on well to the line.
At rear, wide but with cover, closed off strongly in the last 200M.
Settled in front of midfield, 2 wide, showed some dashes in the straight and saved ground.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, showed some dash in the last 150M.
Attempted to obtain cover behind the lead, difficult to settle, 2 wide, show no turn on foot. (See incident report)
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, remained one paced to the line.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, made no ground in the straight.
At rear, 2 wide, did not feature.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, nothing in the Straight.
Raced behind the leader, along the rail, lost ground in the Straight.
At rear, along the rail, failed to make any progress in Straight.

Began from a wide gate, settled in 4th some 2L off the distant 2nd in the brisk middle stages, commenced move rounding home bend, ran on from 3.5L back into straight to assert authority over 150 metres out.

Ridden forward early, settled in distant 2nd from tear-away leader in back straight, closer to the pace when leader dropped back to the main field, commenced move 500 metres out, hit the front briefly 250 metres out, no extra.

Soon led, went clear of the main field setting a fast pace on the first bend going nearly 7L ahead in back straight, dropped back to the main field on home bend and headed under pressure 250 metres out. (Tactic questioned).

Recovered quickly from very awkward start, settled 1L off the distant 2nd becoming over 3L behind the same horse on home bend, came to challenge under pressure entering home straight but unable to quicken to threaten.
Settled mainly in midfield, lost position under pressure into home straight, made up some late ground.
Settled in last few, given reminders when wide from approaching home turn, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish
Taken well back, detached from the main body of the field when ridden early in back straight, ran on steadily under hard driving to be nearest at finish.
Failed to muster and soon dropped to last few, came under pressure rounding home bend, kept on steadily past well-beaten horses in the straight.
Broke well settling in midfield, came under pressure rounding home bend but failed to quicken to feature. (Mucus)
Settled wide towards the rear after beginning from the widest gate, dropped out under pressure on home bend. (Mucus)
Led steadily along the stands' rail, found plenty when asked final 300M, well in control closing stages scoring in fast time. Impressive debut win.
Never far off the pace, 4th at 400M, kept on well to claim 2nd, not pace to challenge winner.
Up with leaders early and middle stages, driven along inside 400M, no match for winner final 200M, lost 2nd close home (Jockey reminded of his obligation to ride his mounts out.)

Began fairly, obtained a forward position, could not keep up with leaders 200M, battled on to hold 4th. (Jockey : did not finish as strongly as anticipated but satisfied with the manner it raced today / Mucus.)
Towards the rear early stages, moved closer middle stages, stayed on without threat over final 400M.
Began awkwardly, settled in midfield, 7th at 400M, closed off fairly.
Held up in midfield, 3Ls to make up 400M, responded fairly to line.
In midfield but never far off from leaders, outpaced final 300.
Began awkwardly, crowded for room after the start, ended up in rear, failed to pick up final 400M, weakened out of contention 250M.
Close up behind leaders early stages, struggled to keep up halfway, soon weakened.
Went forward, not far off from the early pace, weakened rapidly from 400M, finished tailed out. (Jockey : not comfortable action.)
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, travelled comfortably to turn, hard ridden 250M, hit the front 200M, kept on very well to the line, easily scored.
Began smartly, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably throughout, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 200M, ran on evenly to take 2nd.
Got head up on jumping, positioned 5 lengths behind the leader on rail, 2 wide turning in, finished off strongly to take a place, nearest on line.
Began well from gate 1, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, finished off evenly.
Inconvenienced at start, raced 2 wide in midfield, wider turning in, finished off evenly.
Taken back from gate 9, raced at rear, 8 lengths back, similar position on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Average to begin, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide, 6 lengths or so back, checked off heels near 900M, same margin back on turn, made no progress in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced towards rear on the inside, 6 lengths or so back, there to turn, made no progress in straight.
Began very awkwardly, raced at tail, 12 lengths back, still well back on turn, failed to make any progress in straight. (Mucus in trachea.)
Began well from a wide draw, raced 3 wide slightly behind midfield, no cover throughout, gradually dropped to rear on turn, emptied early in straight.
Moderately away from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on very well in straight to score.

Jumped well, raced prominently on the outside, 2 wide from 850M, half-length back on turn, hard ridden after passing 400M, drifted out under pressure 250M, difficult to ride, hung out again final 100M.
Slowly away, recovered, positioned on rail better than midfield, 2 lengths back on turn, kept on well in straight to take a place, no threat to the first two.

Taken back from a wide draw, positioned 4 lengths behind the leader on rail, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, unable to obtain clear running early in straight, cleared 300M, finished off well without threatening.
Began well, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, there to turn, finished off evenly.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, similar position on turn, finished off evenly.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, 3 wide from 500M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Began well from a wide draw, raced behind midfield on the outside, 5 lengths back on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from gate 12, raced at rear on the inside, travelled keenly after passing 1100M, angled out after passing 500M, 6 lengths back turning in, finished off evenly.
Away well, raced 3 wide in midfield, no cover in the middle stages, carried wider turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 2 wide at rear, carried wider after passing 500M, one-paced in straight.
Bumped shortly after start, raced 2 wide towards rear, found rail after passing 800M, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Bumped shortly after start, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, there to turn, showed no response in straight, eased final 100M. (Lost right front plate near 700M.)

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Jumped well, raced in 3rd, a length or so back, easy run on turn, showed very good response after turning in, hit the front 150M, kept on strongly to the line.
Began smartly, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, 3 lengths or so back on turn, finished off well to take 2nd.
Moderately away, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, closed off well to take a place.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, made some progress in straight to make frame, no threat to the first few.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide behind midfield, found rail 400M, kept to inside after straightening and made some progress. (Bled.)
Bumped start, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2 lengths or so back, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Began only fairly, raced towards rear on the inside, 7 lengths back on turn, angled out early in straight, made minor progress in the run home.
Bumped start, sent forward to race prominently, found rail 700M, led briefly after passing 550M, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened thereafter. (Blood in trachea.)
Inconvenienced at start, raced at tail, 9 lengths back on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Slowly away, raced 2 wide at rear, 8 lengths back on turn, made no progress in straight.
Taken back from gate 10, raced 3 wide at rear, still well back on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Jumped well from a wide draw, raced prominently on the outside, 2nd on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Eased to sit just off the leaders, sat 2 wide, ran on well to score.
Pushed to take rail and lead, drifted away 300M, just beaten in last 2 strides.
Slow away, took rail at back, lack room 4-2, progressed steadily when clear.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, 2 wide, progressed steadily 250M.
Behind midfield, 2 wide, on heels 500M, lack room 4-2, made steady ground when clear.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, progressed steadily 250M.
Eased to sit in midfield, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden forward, sat outside the lead, out of fuel 200M, badly hampered 100M.
Hard ridden early, midfield, 2-3 wide, ran on fairly.
Prominent, on the fence, weakened 200M.
Slow away, never a factor.
Eased to sit in midfield, trapped 3 wide, moved forward 900M, emptied 350M.
Settled midfield on rail, asked for effort near 450M, responded strongly in the straight to score.
Raced in front of midfield, niggled near 600M, worked home strongly.
Settled behind midfield, kept on rail rounding the Home Turn to save ground, worked home solidly.
Settled towards rear, placed pressure near 500M, finished well.
Raced behind midfield, near 950M was checked away from heels, widest on straightening, made up some nice late ground.
Settled behind midfield, mid-race moved to outside the lead, gave ground passing 50M, rider questioned.
Raced midfield, asked for effort near 500M, worked home one-paced.
Ridden along in the lead, placed pressure near 600M, gave ground passing 100M.
Taken back at start, wide on straightening, limited response when placed pressure.
Bounded in the air as the gates opened and lost ground, no response in the straight, stalls test.
Settled outside the lead, came under pressure rounding the Home Turn, weakened near 200M.
Settled in handy position, came under pressure rounding the Home Turn, faded out in the straight.

Raced worse than midfield on rail, just over 3L form the lead near half-way. Shifted into clear running on cornering before sprinting quickly, assuming lead near the 75m before drawing away for soft win.

Raced second last in early stages before commencing mid-race-move to assume lead approaching 650m. Continued on to race over a length clear on straightening before being passed by winner near 75m (Rider suspended-see report).

Raced on leaders back in early & middle stages. Shuffled a pair further back passing 550m, moved away from rail entering last section when under 3L from lead, closed off well in straight to just miss second, beaten only 2L.

Pushed forward to lead. Continued in lead until being passed near the 650m before being crowded & losing ground near the 550m. Cornered in second place, over a length behind before weakening to well beaten midfield finish.

Slow to begin, raced 3L last passing winning post first time before rejoining field soon after. Continued at tail, over 5L behind approaching corner, passed a few when running to midfield but well behind winner.

Pushed forward after the start before racing 1,1 from the 1200m. Shuffled back to midfield approaching the 600m. Niggled along entering last section when 4L behind before weakening poorly to be beaten 10L.

Raced in midfield early before drifting back to second last near half-way. Moved wide to improve entering last section when 4.5L from lead, cornered the widest before weakening sharply in straight to be long second last.

Pushed forward but raced wide passing winning post first time before improving to race outside the leader from the 1200m. Came under hard ridding approaching the 600m before weakening sharply in straight to be long last.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, moved closer along the rail on turn, finished off strongly to score.
Well enough away, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length, travelled comfortably on turn, kept on well in straight but not able to hold off the winner final 50M.
Fast into stride, raced 2 wide better than midfield, wider on turn, made good progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Began only fairly, raced behind midfield on the inside, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, made some progress in straight to make frame, no threat to the first few.
Began well, positioned on rail better than midfield, angled out after passing 500M, showed some response early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, finished off evenly.
Jumped well, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, carried wider after passing 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on rail, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 6 lengths back, same margin back on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide behind midfield, 5-1/2L back, there to turn, made no progress in straight.
Out with rest, raced 3 wide, 3 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail throughout, never a factor.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, made ground impressively to score by 1-1/4L.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, swung wide on Straightening, made ground and closed off strongly to the line.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, ran on well to the line.
Raced in behind the lead, along the rail, kept on going for 4th.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, stayed on but emptied passing 50M.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, pretty one paced.
Midfield, along the rail, only one paced.
Raced next to the leader, 2 wide, flattened in the last 100M.
At rear, 2 wide, saved no ground in the Straight.
At rear, 2 wide, did not feature.
Slow to begin, 2 wide, nothing in the Straight.
At rear, along the rail, no progress.
Broke well, taken back to 3rd on the rail just behind the leader, responded well to take charge over 200 metres out, won cozily.
Broke well, settled over 2L back in 5th, became 4th in a similar position rounding home bend, finished off the race well inside final 200 metres.
Ridden positively from the widest gate, improved steadily on the outside before settling some 1.5L back 2-wide in 2nd, unable to sustain effort inside final 100 metres.
Began well from a wide gate, settled wide in midfield in 7th, kept on same pace under pressure without quickening in straight.
Crowded jumping out, settled towards the rear on the rail, remained in similar position into straight, made some late impression closing stages.
Settled just worse than midfield in 8th, inconvenienced over 500 metres out, saved ground turning for home, produced good late impression closing stages.
Ridden positively to take up running out wide passing the 1000 metres, obtained rails run inside the 900 metres and led until tiring inside the 200 metres.
Jumped awkwardly, settled just off the pace on the rail, gradually shifted back towards midfield in 6th, saved ground turning for home, faded steadily inside final 200 metres.
Soon dropped well behind trailing the field most of the way, went widest on home turn, ran on under pressure past well-beaten horses.
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, always in last few and never seen with a chance.
Ridden early from a wide gate, gradually shifted back towards the rear 3-wide down the back straight, went very wide making final turn, kept on one pace in straight.
Began well, travelled wide with the leaders early, gradually drifted back to 4th or 5th 3-wide without cover in back straight, yielded ground steadily from home bend.
Travelled strongly behind leaders, soon led on straightening, went clear under hands and heels riding, comfortably.
Held up in midfield along the fence, switched out top of straight to challenge, ran on well to claim 2nd near line but no threat to winner.
Went forward to be sharing the lead along the fence, not finishing pace of winner final 150M, held 2nd until last stride.
Jumped on terms, reserved towards the rear, stayed on moderately for non-threatening 4th.
Crowded at the start, raced keenly from 800M, hampered by rival 550M shuffled back to rear, awkwardly placed top of straight before closing off well final 200M. (Jockey questioned re his riding.)
From wide draw steadied and shifted across behind runners, at the rear 5Ls off the pace home turn, made limited progress final 300M.
From wide draw sent forward to race outside leader, ridden but not quicken early straight, weakened final 200M.
Held up 2-wide in midfield, kept on same pace final 300M, never dangerous.
Settled in mid-division, lost ground 600M and shuffled back to near the rear, weakened in straight.
From wide draw caught 3-wide no cover in midfield, lacked further response on straightening.
Chased leaders along the 2-path, came under pressure 500M, soon beaten turning for home.
Jumped well, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, easy run to turn, finished off strongly to score by a neck.
Began smartly, sent forward to race prominently on the inside, kept on very well in straight but not able to hold off the winner late.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 6 lengths or so back on turn, made very good progress in straight to take a place, nearest on line.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced behind midfield on the outside, there to turn, made good progress in straight to make frame.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, finished off well without threatening.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide in midfield, no cover on turn, finished off evenly.
Bumped start, raced towards rear on the outside, very wide turning in, made minor progress in straight.
Bumped start, sent forward to race prominently, 2 wide, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide in midfield, awkwardly placed near 650M, 3 lengths back on turn, made no progress in straight.
Taken back from gate 9, raced towards rear, 6 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, made no impression in the run home.
Bumped start, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, there to turn, angled out 350M, peaked early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Began awkwardly, raced behind midfield on the inside, 4 lengths back, saved ground on turn, weakened early in straight.

Slightly slow out, raced behind midfield on the inside, angled out 850M, 3 wide on turn, hard ridden after passing 300M, showed very good response, hit the front 200M, kept on strongly to the line.
Began well, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, angled out 500M, finished off well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide at rear, 6 lengths back on turn, made good progress in straight to take a place.
Commenced well, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, made some progress to make frame.
Began awkwardly, raced at rear on the inside, angled out after passing 600M, 5 lengths back on turn, made reasonable progress in straight without threatening.

Crowded on jumping, positioned slightly behind midfield on the inside early, 2 wide after entering the back straight, 3 wide from 900M, moved closer on turn, made some progress early in straight, peaked 250M, weakened final 100M.

Jumped well, raced prominently, allowed rival to cross near 1400M, commenced move after passing 700M, a length back turning in, showed some response early in straight, peaked 200M, weakened gradually thereafter.

Began fairly, raced prominently on the outside, took the lead 1350M, led by a length turning in, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 200M, weakened gradually thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began well, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, wider on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Moderately away from the widest draw, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 13 lengths back, moved closer along the rail on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Jumped with them, sent forward to take the early lead, headed near 1350M, 4 lengths back in the middle stages, moved closer on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.

Made contact at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield in the early stages, 3 wide after entering the back straight, moved closer after passing 1000M, 2 lengths or so back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Away with them, raced 2 wide better than midfield, carried wider on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, closed off well to score.
Just off the leaders, lack room 400M, ran on well for 2nd.
At back, 2 wide, held up 4-2, dashed strongly when clear.
Slow away, at back along the fence, lack room in straight, dashed well.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 3 wide, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, took rail, blocked most straight, dashed strongly when clear.
Eased back early, however trapped very wide, improved to sit in midfield, 3-4 wide, ran on until 150M run ended.
Pressed forward, took rail and lead, out of fuel 300M.
Pushed early, trapped 3-4 wide in front of midfield, emptied 200M.
Eased to rear, took rail, lack room 400M, little dash.
Midfield, 2 wide, no dash, checked final stages.
Eased back, trapped 3-4 wide, crowded for room 800M, no dash.
Very slow away, at rear, no progress.
Eased back, on heels 400M, never improved.
Raced in front of midfield, 3 wide with cover, responded strongly when placed pressure, quickened passing 200M to score.
Taken back at start, 4 wide and without cover, wide on straightening, responded strongly in the straight, missed by Neck.
Taken back at start, improved passing 500M, widest on straightening, quickened passing 200M, finished solidly.
Niggled along to take lead, placed pressure passing 400M, responded nicely.
Raced midfield, 3 wide with cover, made some late ground in the straight, rider questioned riding.
At the start stumbled, raced wide and without cover in forward position, worked home one-paced.
Settled midfield on rail, asked for effort passing 400M, finished one-paced.
Settled in box seat, tried to improve passing 500M, gave ground passing 200M.
Began very awkwardly then was crowded, then taken back, raced greenly, limited response when placed pressure.
Travelled behind midfield, limited response when placed pressure.
Settled outside the lead, placed pressure but weakened passing 150M.
Raced towards rear on rail, kept on rail rounding the Home Turn, had difficulty to obtain clear running passing 200M and was not properly tested.
Raced towards rear, no response when placed pressure.
Raced in one-back-one-off position, faded out passing 400M, roarer.

Began well but steadied & shifted back behind runners to settle third last away from rail. Continued rearward 5.5L from lead entering last section before finishing very strongly to strike lead in final stride.

Had a soft run in midfield on rail throughout. Entered last section under 3L from lead, shifted wider at 350m, badly held up when crowded for room near 275m before closing strongly to be beaten narrowly on line.

Pushed forward before getting good run on leaders back. Disappointed for a run near the 350m, raced tight thereafter before getting clear running at the 250m, dashed to narrow lead near 75m before caught in final few stride.

Bumped & raced keenly at start before being steadied when caught 3 deep in midfield. Left without cover from the 800m. Cornered the widest runner when hanging outwards before closing strongly to be only beaten 2L. Good run.

Crowded soon after start & consequently raced with only 3 runners behind. Continued along the rail on cornering, 4.5L from lead before making continual steady ground along the inside to be beaten only 2L.
Raced in midfield away from rail early in early & middle stages. Cornered around 4L from lead, eased wider on straightening before finishing off steadily to midfield to be only beaten just over 2L.

Crowded before improving after start to race in midfield between runners. Eased wider on straightening, entered last section 3L from lead, was finishing steadily before shifting out sharply at the 100m. Not beaten far.
Wasn't fast to begin before improving slightly to midfield on rail throughout. Moved away from the rail on cornering before finishing off only evenly to midfield without threatening.

Ridden forward at start. Slightly wide early before improving past the 900m mark to race outside the leader from the 800m. Continued second, only 1L from the lead at the furlong marker before weakening a few lengths late.
Pushed forward before getting nice run 1,1 form the 800m. Continued just over a length from the lead near the furlong marker before peaking & giving a length or two late.
Showed good speed after the start to lead. Continued to hold lead entering final furlong before being headed at the 125m & giving a few lengths late.
Steadied & shifted back to last after start. Continued at the tail entering last section, 7.5L from lead before making no real improvement in dash to line. Well beaten.

Had no early speed before settling worse than midfield away from rail. Continued 3 wide around first bend, eased wider on cornering when 5.5L from lead before weakening a further few lengths in straight to be well beaten.
Steadied after the start & shifted back to the rear. Continued rearward on cornering but failed to make any headway & finished last, nearly 10L behind.
Average to begin, raced prominently on the outside, travelled well to turn, hard ridden after passing 300M, showed very good response, took the lead 150M, kept on strongly to the line and scored.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well in the middle stages, led by a length turning in, hard ridden 250M, peaked and headed 150M, kept on evenly to take 2nd.
Jumped with them, positioned 2 wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, there to turn, kept on well in straight to take a place, no threat to the first two. (Roarer.)
Bumped start, raced 2 wide, 4 lengths or so back, same position on turn, finished off well to make frame without threatening.
Bumped start and unbalanced, positioned 2 wide, 3 lengths back, there to turn, finished off evenly.
Bumped start and unbalanced, raced prominently on the inside early, allowed rival to cross near 800M, sat right behind the leader on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Moderately away, positioned on rail, 3 lengths behind the leader, easy run on turn, finished off evenly. (Roarer.)
Taken back from gate 13, raced 2 wide at rear, 9 lengths back turning in, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home, nearest on line.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, 8 lengths back turning in, very wide into straight, made minor progress in the run home.
Made contact shortly after start, raced at rear on the inside, 8 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Out with rest, raced 2 wide towards rear, 9 lengths back on turn, one-paced in straight.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced slightly behind midfield on the outside, 7 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, eased final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.) (Mucus.)
Inconvenienced at start, raced towards rear on the outside, 8 lengths back on turn, showed nothing in straight.
Crowded start, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened and eased final furlong.
At rear, along the rail, closed off strongly in the last 100M to score.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, battled on to the line to take 2nd.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, ran on gamely for 3rd.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, made some ground after 200M to finish.
At rear, 2 wide, swung widest on Straightening, closed off the race fairly.
At rear, 2 wide, ran on only fairly to the line.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, emptied in the last 150M.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, found no extra for final 100M.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, was one paced.
At rear, 2 wide, did not improve in the Straight.
At rear, along the rail, showed nothing.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, lost ground passing the 200M.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, did not feature.
Sent forward and raced next to the lead, 2 wide, lost ground in the Straight.
Settled just worse than midfield off the rails, came to challenge inside final 400 metres and quickened well to take charge 100 metres out.
Taken back from a wide gate for rails run, improved steadily on home bend to reach 8th some 3L back 400 metres out, baulked early in straight, produced good late finish inside final 120 metres.
Soon taken well back and waited with, trailed the field to the 500 metres, came to challenge inside final 400 metres, ran on well to be nearest at finish.

Ridden early, settled just over 3L back in 8th on the rail, slightly closer in 7th rounding home bend, had difficulty getting a clear run early in straight, fought on under pressure to hold every chance over 100 metres out.
Taken back to last few from a wide gate, remained in similar position to home straight, did not find much room behind runners until late in the closing stages, finished off the race well.

Broke well from the widest gate, travelled very wide without cover in prominent position, joined the leader onto home bend, kept on without quickening under pressure in straight, no extra inside final 50 metres.

Began well from a wide gate and soon led, obtained rails run in front over 800 metres out and joined rounding home bend, kicked 1L clear under pressure early in straight but unable to sustain effort inside final 100 metres.
Ridden forward to first few, drifted slightly backward to 5th while travelling 3-wide round home bend, kept on well without making any serious impression in the run to the line.
Travelled keenly in in 9th just worse than midfield, baulked for a run in straight before producing good late impression inside final 150 metres.
Slightly slow out, niggled along in last few on the rails, last turning into home straight, kept on at the one pace without threatening.
Travelled mainly in one-out-one-back position and keenly in early stages, held some chance upon straightening but dropped out tamely inside final 200 metres.
Unbalanced at start, travelling keenly 3-wide when taken back to 8th in midfield just some 4L back rounding home bend, came wide turning in and faded steadily under pressure inside final 200 metres.
Settled in 7th within 3L of pace, in similar position rounding home bend and into straight, baulked for a run after straightening and dropped out tamely inside final 300 metres.
Moderate start, improved steadily to one-back position on the rail, dropped quickly out of contention shortly after straightening.
Settled in midfield, 5th of 9, quickened to lead near 250M, kept on strongly to the line for comfortable win.
Held up near last, responded well on straightening, went 2nd near 100M, always held by winner.
Reserved near the rear, held up for clear running 350M, ran on steadily to line.
Tracked leaders 2-wide, moved up to lead 300M, not finishing pace of leaders final 200M.
Crowded for room on jumping, settled towards the rear, responded fairly on straightening, no threat to leaders.
Dropped back to race in the rear, wide into straight, over 4Ls off the pace 400M, never going the pace to challenge.
Chased leaders, failed to pick up under pressure from 400M, eased when beaten final 150M. (Jockey : did not feel comfortable in its action / Blood in trachea)
Led early stages before settling one out one back, regained lead passing 400, out-finished over final 300M. (Jockey questioned re riding tactics.)
Led from 1100M, headed passing 400M, weakened rapidly.
Average to begin, positioned 2 wide, a length or so back, angled out after passing 500M, hit the front 350M, kept on very well to hold off the challenger.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, angled out 550M, made very good progress in straight to take 2nd.
Jumped well, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, finished off well to take a place.
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide behind midfield, similar position on turn, made good progress in straight to make frame, no threat to the first few.
Crowded on jumping, raced 2 wide at rear, last turning in, taken wide in straight and finished off strongly to be nearest on line.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, finished off evenly.
Moderately away, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, peaked and headed 350M, weakened final 150M. (Lame right front leg.) (Mucus.)
Crowded start, raced towards rear on the inside, moved closer along the rail on turn, angled out 450M, showed limited response early in straight, hampered 250M, ran on evenly to the line.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, moved closer along the rail on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced prominently but wide, 2nd on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Began well, raced 3 wide at rear, no cover on turn, carried wider 550M, weakened early in straight when hard run took effect.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced prominently, 3 wide, no cover throughout, showed very good response after turning in, hit the front 200M, kept on well to the line and scored.

Shifted in at start and bumped, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, unable to obtain clear running early in straight, cleared 150M, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Out in line, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 lengths or so back, angled out after passing 500M, closed off well without threatening.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide towards rear of midfield, there to turn, no daylight early in straight, cleared 200M, made good progress thereafter to make frame without threatening.

Lifted front feet on jumping and away tardily, recovered, raced slightly behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, made some progress after passing 250M, no extra final 100M.
Moderately away, positioned 2 wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, same position on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, showed limited response thereafter.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide with cover, 4 lengths back, similar position on turn, made minor progress early in straight.
Bumped start, raced towards rear on the outside, 5 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, made little progress in straight.
Jumped with them, unable to slot in, raced behind midfield on the outside, 5 lengths or so back on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 8 lengths back, still well back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Bumped start and unbalanced, sent forward to take the lead, led by half-length, challenged turning in, peaked early in straight, headed 200M, weakened thereafter.
Away with them, raced slightly better than midfield on the outside, 3 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Shifted in at start and bumped, sent forward to race prominently, 2 wide, challenged the leader turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Began fairly from gate 1, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground on turn, weakened early in straight.

Drifted back after start & raced in midfield in the clear after first section. Continued in midfield over 8L from lead at half-way. Eased wider on turn, closed strongly to strike lead at 75m mark & continuing strongly to win.
Raced worse than midfield on the rail throughout. Shifted wider on cornering when over 8L from lead before finishing strongly in closing stages to charge to fast finishing second. DH 2nd.

Pushed forward to race second. Continued in second but nearly 3L from the lead at half-way. Dashed to the lead at the 225m, continued to hold lead until being joined by the winner passing the 75m. DH 2nd.
Raced in midfield away from rail throughout. Entered last section 6.5L from lead before making continual steady ground to be beaten under 2L.

Shifted back to race second last after start. Continued a long way back, 11L behind at half-way. Shifted 3 wide to improve near 550m, cornered widest, still 9L behind before closing very strongly to be beaten under 2L.

Raced in midfield away from rail throughout early & middle stages, 5.5L from lead passing half-way. Similar margin behind on straightening before making continual steady headway to hold midfield finish, only 2L behind on line.

Raced on leaders back momentarily after start before a pair further back when 4L from the lead at half-way. Continued close to the lead near the 200m mark before being swamped & finishing midfield. Only beaten around 2L.

Drifted back after start & raced third last on rail. Relegated to second last near half-way when 12L from lead. Moved away from the inside approaching corner before running on steadily to midfield, beaten only 2L.

Lifted feet off the ground at start & consequently didn't begin fast before improving quickly to midfield. Cornered 8L from lead, shifted inwards passing the 300m when making steady ground to be beaten 3L on line.

Steadied from outside gate & shifted behind runners to race worse than midfield away from rail. Relegated to second last on straightening, 10L behind, before finishing off only moderately, beaten over 6L. (Mucus in trachea).

Strode forward to lead soon after start. Continued boldly in lead, racing nearly 3L clear at half-way. Continued to hold lead before emptying at the 250m mark & weakening sharply in the last furlong. Went too keenly in lead.

Pushed forward, raced 1,1 momentarily before racing third, away from rail without cover from 950m. Continued third entering last section, 4L from lead before peaking on effort at the 300m mark & weakening sharply thereafter.
Didn't begin fast before bumping, losing ground & racing at the tail. Continued last approaching corner, 12L from lead entering last section before failing to improve. Long second last.
Raced in midfield on the rail throughout early & middles stages, 6L from the lead passing half-way. Cornered a similar margin behind before weakening very poorly in the straight to be a long last.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, 2 lengths or so back, saved ground on turn, finished off strongly to score, really good debut.
Jumped well, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross near 800M, sat right behind the leader on turn, closed off well to take 2nd.

Average to begin, raced slightly behind midfield on the inside early, 2 wide in the middle stages, commenced move after passing 400M, made good progress in straight to take a place, nearest on line, good debut.
Moderately away, raced 3 wide better than midfield, no cover after passing 800M, 1-3/4L back on turn, showed good response early in straight, peaked 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Jumped well from a wide draw, raced prominently on the outside, 3/4L back on turn, showed limited response early in straight, peaked on run 200M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Taken back to race behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some progress in straight.
Began well, sent forward to take the lead, found rail near 800M, travelled well to turn, peaked on run 200M, headed 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Slowly away, raced at rear on the inside, 6 to 7 lengths back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 lengths or so back on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 2 wide at rear, 7 lengths back on turn, taken wide in straight and finished off evenly.
Began only fairly, raced behind midfield on the outside, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Jumped well, hampered near 1050M, raced 2 wide better than midfield, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight.
Hard ridden to secure box seat, ran on strongly to score.
Pushed forward to take rail and lead, hung on until 200M overhauled.
Midfield, 2 wide, progressed steadily 300M.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, raced 3 wide, dashed well 200M.
Behind midfield, progressed steadily 250M.
Eased at start, took rail, made steady ground 250M.
Slow away, at back on the fence, blocked and checked 250M, made ground when clear.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, out of fuel 250M.
Eased back, 2 wide, no progress.
Midfield along the fence, weakened 200M.
Hard ridden forward, 2 wide, emptied 300M.
Never a factor.
Settled midfield on rail, improved near 300M, quickened near 100M to score.
Settled in handy position, commenced to improve on straightening, finished strongly.
Wide and without cover throughout in handy position, responded solidly in the straight when asked for effort.
Urged along to take lead, placed pressure on straightening, worked home well.
Taken back at start, wide on straightening, made up some nice late ground in the straight.
Taken back at start, tried to improve near 300M, one-paced in the straight, blood in trachea.
Began awkwardly and then was crowded for room, raced outside the lead, gave ground passing 100M.
Ridden along to settle in midfield, wide on straightening, limited response in the straight.
Began awkwardly then ridden along to race in box seat, in the straight fought hard but only one-paced.
Settled in front of midfield on rail, limited response in the straight.
Travelled at rear, no response in the straight.
Raced at tail, in the straight placed pressure but no response.

Held narrow lead when racing 4 wide without cover in back straight. Crossed to rail causing severe interference near the 600m corner. Held over length lead on straightening & maintained that advantage to line. Tough win.

Raced just behind lead when 3 wide without cover down back straight. Hampered when tightened by leader/winner near 600m bend. Cornered just over a length behind before being beaten similar margin into second, clear of 3rd.
Raced in just worse than midfield on rail throughout. Closed off ok along the inside in the closing stages to snare third but over 3L from the lead. Sound debut.

Raced just behind leading quartet on the rail after the start. Lost some ground when steadying to avoid hampered horses near 600m bend. Shifted outwards when asked for full effort near 250m before finishing ok last furlong.

Pushed forward before holding the rail in a line of 4 at the front. Badly checked & lost ground near the 600m bend. Battled on to non-threatening midfield finish in dash to line but did have legitimate excuse.

Slow to begin & consequently raced near the rear early before settling third last. Moved away from the rail near the 450m, hampered slightly when making ground near the 250m before finishing off fairly to midfield late.

Steadied from widest gate & taken back to last. Continued at the back, 8.5L from lead entering last section, shifted back towards the rail after straightening before making up a few lengths to midfield along the inside.

Improved position after the first bend to race in midfield away from rail. Continued behind the leading quartet, around 3L from lead passing half-way. Cornered around 4L behind before making no improvement.

Shifted across after first turn to race midfield off rail. Continued in midfield over 5L from lead passing half-way before forced 3 wide to avoid interference soon after. Cornered widest but made no impression in straight.
Steadied & taken back towards the rear. Continued near the back over 8L behind approaching the corner before making no noteworthy headway in dash to line. Well beaten.
Didn't begin fast & settled worse than midfield away from rail. Entered last section just under 7L from the lead before failing to make any improvement & running second last. Well beaten.

Raced close to lead in a line of 4 down back straight. Tightened & lost ground when hampered near the 600m bend when 2L from lead. Emptied out before being hampered near the 200m before weakening to long last.
Crowded on jumping, raced 2 wide towards rear, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide turning in, finished off very strongly to score.
Began smartly, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, angled out after passing 450M, finished off well to take 2nd.
Made contact at start, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made good progress in straight to take a place.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, there to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked 100M, weakened final 50M.
Average to begin, positioned on rail better than midfield, moved closer along the rail on turn, made some progress early in straight, peaked 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide at rear, commenced move after passing 400M, very wide turning in, made some headway in straight.

Commenced well from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, travelled keenly in the early and middle stages, led by a length on turn, peaked and headed 150M, weakened thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)

Began well, raced prominently but trapped very wide early, slightly taken back 1400M, found rail 1200M, 3Ls behind the leader in the middle stages, angled out 450M, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter. (Epiglottic entrapment.)
Taken back from gate 8, raced at rear on the inside, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, finished off evenly.
Away with them, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, 4 lengths back, there to turn, weakened early in straight.
Raced behind the lead, along the rail, ran on impressively to score by 4L.
Settled in one-out one-back, continued on to take 2nd.
Raced in worse than midfield, 3 wide but with cover, made some ground and ran on reasonably for 3rd.
At rear, 2 wide initially, 3 wide but with cover after 1100M, swung widest on straightening, made ground and ran on nicely.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, pretty one paced.
Raced in midfield, wide no cover, remained one paced to the line.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, did not make ground in the Straight.
Crowded start and taken back, at rear along the rail, was one paced.
Eased back, 2 wide, did not feature.
At rear, along the rail, nothing in the Straight.
Raced next to the leader, 2 wide, lost ground in the Straight. (See incident report)
Sent forward, along the rail, lost ground after 250M, never a factor. (See incident report) (Roarer)

Settled in last few on the rail and waited with, came under pressure from the 600 metres and angled out for a run entering straight, obtained clear passing over 150 metres out and ran on to assert authority close to home.

Wide amongst the leaders early, taken back for cover first bend, 4L back in 7th early in back straight, steady headway from 700M to reach 3rd 3-wide within 2L of pace, hit the front over 150M only to be headed close to home.
Settled at the back, saved ground on the rail turning for home, ran on under pressure to be nearest at finish.

Broke well, taken two back in 5th on the rail, travelled keenly for majority of back straight while dropping to midfield, gained closer coming onto home turn and hit the front momentarily over 100 metres out, lost 3rd place late.

Broke well from the one draw, taken one back for box seat behind the leader from the 1200 metres and mainly in 4th in back straight, saved ground on the rail turning in, kept on steadily without quickening.

Pressed forward from the widest gate, settled wide without cover in midfield on first bend, made steady headway from the 900 metres to reach outside of leader 700 metres out, held some chance when 2nd early in straight.
Tightened at start, settled in midfield on the rail, shifted out for a run at the 800 metres improving 4-wide round home bend, kept on steadily without threatening down the centre of the straight.
Soon took up running, obtained rails run over 1100 metres out travelling somewhat keenly around first bend, found no extra and headed inside the 200 metres
Settled in last few, made short-lived effort when widest rounding home bend, kept on same pace.

Pressed forward from a wide gate, taken back for cover in rear of midfield before first turn, travelled keenly in 9th early in back straight, 4-wide round home bend, unable to sustain effort in straight. (Tactic questioned)

Ridden along in first few, settled some 2L back in 3rd on first bend, carried backward passing the 800 metres and badly checked inside the 600 metres losing considerable ground, made no impression from last into home straight.
Vied for lead early travelling wide around first bend, disputed lead early in back straight, lost position inside the 550 metres, never recovered. (Intermittent displacement of soft palate)
Behind leaders early stages, caught wide no cover before going forward to race outside the pace 700M, took over early straight, kept on well, joined by rival final 100M, held on just.
Settled just ahead of midfield, switched wide 550M, responded well on straightening, pressed winner final 100M, lost out in photo finish.
Shifted across behind runners early stages, ended up in rear 6-7Ls off the pace, closed off fastest in straight to claim 3rd near line but posed no threat to first 2.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, kept on moderately passing 300M, not going the pace to challenge first 2.
Taken back from wide draw, settled towards the rear 5Ls off the pace, stayed on mildly over final 300M, not reached first 2.
Began well, restrained and tracked leaders in a steadily run race, battled on early straight, well held by leaders final 200M.
Began only fairly, held up 3-wide behind midfield, wide into straight, fought on same pace to line.
Began awkwardly, caught racing 3-wide in midfield, lost cover from 700M then moved up to race outside leaders, battled on same pace in straight before fading from 150M.
Soon crossed to the lead, led steadily, headed inside 300M, no extra final 200M.
Taken back from draw 11, settled near last, no response in straight, never able to challenge.
From draw 1 took up a midfield position along the inside, failed to pick up passing 400M, soon out of contention.
Jumped well, settled behind leaders along the fence, weakened away in the straight to finish last.
Moderately away, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on very well in straight to hold off the challenger.
Began well, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground to turn, angled out after passing 400M, finished off very well to take 2nd.
Began smartly from a wide draw, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide, 2 lengths back on turn, kept on well early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Away with them, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground throughout, kept on well early in straight, peaked on run 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Out with rest, raced 2 wide towards rear, 7 lengths back on turn, made good progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, similar position on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back to race towards rear on the inside, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, kept to inside after straightening, showed some response early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, 8 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made some progress in the run home.
Began well, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, peaked on turn, weakened gradually in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back to race at tail, 8 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, showed some response early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Moderately away, raced in midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, very wide turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.

Began fairly from the widest draw, trapped very wide in midfield early, slightly taken back after entering the back straight, 3 wide with cover behind midfield in the middle stages, weakened gradually in straight.

Moderately away from gate 1, positioned a length or so back on rail, a bit closer on turn, took the lead early in straight, kept on very well to the line, won by 1-1/2L.
Began well, sent forward to take the lead on the outside, 3 wide on turn, headed early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Stumbled start, raced in midfield, 4 lengths back on turn, made some progress in straight to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Bumped start, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some progress in straight to make frame without threatening.
Away with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 5 to 6 lengths back turning in, showed some response early in straight, no extra final furlong.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide at rear, 7 lengths back on turn, angled out after passing 500M, passed some tired runners in straight.
Began only fairly, raced 3 wide, a length or so back, moved closer after passing 800M, 2 wide on turn, weakened early in straight. (See Racing Incidents.) (Blood in trachea.)
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 9 lengths back on turn, finished off evenly.
Jumped well from a wide draw, unable to slot in early, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, weakened early in straight when hard run took effect.
Made contact at start, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, still well back on turn, showed nothing in straight.
Bumped start, trapped wide slightly behind midfield, peaked on turn, weakened final 400M. (Irregular heart rhythm.)
Began well, raced prominently, 2 wide, steadied off heels near 700M, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight. (Bled.)
Pushed to secure box seat, closed off strongly 400M to score.
Eased back, took rail, progressed steadily 300M.
Pushed to take rail and lead, overhauled 300M, ran on for 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 2 wide, made ground 400M, run ended 150M.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, 2-3 wide, dashed well 250M.
At rear along the fence, progressed steadily 250M.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, out of fuel 250M.
Pushed forward, sat one out one back, emptied 400M.
Eased back, never competitive.
Settled midfield, asked for effort passing 450M, quickened near 200M to score.
Raced in front of midfield, placed pressure passing 400M, finished solidly.
Began awkwardly, raced behind midfield on rail, made up some nice late ground when placed pressure in the straight.
Settled towards rear on rail, improved near 450M, gained some nice ground passing 150M.
Ridden forward and took lead near 800M, responded nicely in the early part of straight, finished well.
Settled behind midfield, fought hard but worked home one-paced.
Travelled midfield on rail, had some difficulty obtaining clear running near 200M, finished one-paced.
Ridden along to settle behind the lead, placed pressure on straightening, gave ground passing 200M.
Raced at tail, came under pressure rounding the Home Turn, no response in the straight.

Strode forward, obtaining lead near 1500m. Set up significant lead, over 4L clear of second passing half-way. Continued to hold 4.5L advantage on straightening, 2L clear at the 100m before having just enough in hand to win.

Raced in midfield away from rail throughout. Eased wider passing 600m to commence pursuit of leader who cornered 7L in front, moving to second at the 175m but fell a neck short of leader/winner who had just enough in hand.

Raced in midfield away from the rail, a long way from tear away front runner throughout. Entered last section over 8L form the lead before finishing very strongly in the final 300m to be beaten under a length on the line.

Steadied & shifted back to last from a wide gate. Cornered at the tail over 12L from the lead before making up significant late ground down the outside to be beaten under a length. Huge finishing section.

Drifted back after the start & raced worse than midfield on the rail. Moved away from the rail nearing the corner, entered last section 10L from the lead before making solid late ground to be beaten only 2L.

Showed speed, shared early lead before racing second away from rail. Continued second over 5L behind bond frontrunner at the 800m. Entered last section 4.5L behind before finishing off steadily to be beaten only 2L in midfield.
Drifted back after the start & raced second last along the rail. Continued near the tail over 14L from the lead at the 800m before finishing off steadily to midfield, beaten under 3L.

Shifted behind runners from the outside barrier to settle worse than midfield away from rail. Ridden along from the 500m to improve, entered last section 10L from lead before finishing off evenly to midfield, beaten under 3L.

Showed no early speed & consequently raced worse than midfield. Continued with only two runners behind at the 800m when 13L behind tear away leader before finishing only evenly along the inside to midfield. (See report).

Began awkwardly before shifting behind runners & racing near the tail & slightly keenly early. Continued third from last over 13L from lead passing the 800m. Passed only a few tiring runners in straight & was never a factor.
Had soft run in midfield on rail throughout but some 8.5L from the tear away leader passing the 800m. Cornered 7.5L from the lead before weakening out to finish worse than midfield.
Had good position 1,1 throughout early & middles stages. Began yielding ground passing the 600m mark before weakening poorly in the straight to be beaten just under 10L.
Held narrow early lead before racing third on rail for majority. Continued 6L from the lead behind free-wheeling leader at the 800m mark before weakening badly in the straight to be long second last.
Raced in midfield on the rail throughout. Hard ridden from the 500m mark, entered last section 9L from the lead before weakening poorly to long last.
Began smartly from the widest draw, raced prominently on the outside, 2 wide on turn, hard ridden after passing 400M, hit the front 200M, kept on well to the line and scored.
Bumped start and unbalanced, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, 3 wide after passing 600M, finished off strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Taken back to race at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made good progress in straight to take a place, nearest on line.
Commenced well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 200M, weakened gradually final 50M.
Bumped start, sent forward to race prominently, allowed rival to cross near 900M, sat right behind the leader on turn, finished off evenly.
Began awkwardly, raced 3 wide with no cover in midfield, moved a bit closer on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 6 lengths or so back, moved a bit closer on turn, no clear running early in straight, made some progress final 200M.

Began awkwardly and bumped, positioned 4 lengths behind the leader on the inside, angled out after passing 500M, unable to obtain clear running early in straight, cleared near 200M, made some progress thereafter.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, wider after passing 500M, no clear running early in straight, showed limited response thereafter.
Began well, taken back to race 3 wide with cover at rear, commenced move after passing 550M, very wide turning in, made some progress early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, 2-1/2L back, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, moved a bit closer in the middle stages, wider turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, same margin back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 200M.
Out in line, raced at rear on the outside, no cover for the majority of the race, very wide turning in, weakened early in straight when hard run took effect.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, in the straight saved ground and closed off strongly to score.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover initially, hung out and wide no cover after 700M, ran on gamely but couldn't hold off the winner.
Raced at rear, along the rail, made ground and close off strongly for 3rd.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, kept up and stayed on well to the line.
Sent forward, one-out one-back after 650M, made some ground in the Straight only.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, ran on and made minor ground.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide with cover, only one paced.
Raced detached and at rear, only made minor ground in the Straight.
Raced in front midfield, along the rail, showed no turn on foot after 200M. (See incident report)
Sent forward, 2 wide, lost ground after passing 200M.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, never a factor.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, did not feature.

Just over 2L back in 4th early, dropped to 6th over 3L back when pace quickened at the 1100 metres, commenced move wide round the bend and the widest turning for home, sustained effort inside 200 metres to claim narrow victory.

Settled in 5th on the rail within 3L of the slow pace, became 6th in a similar position passing the 1200 metres, quickened up with the pace rounding home bend drawing level momentarily over 200 metres out, just denied.

Settled just off the pace in 3rd on the rail, maintained a similar 2L back position when pace quickened around home bend, commenced move 3-wide entering straight, held some chance over 150 metres out but unable to sustain effort.
Settled well behind and waited with, obtained a clear passage 300 metres out, ran on under pressure to claim 4th and never threatening.
Broke well to lead setting a sedate pace early stages, quickened up the pace to maintain lead when challenged 1100 metres out, found no extra when swamped inside the final 250 metres.

Settled at the back in the slowly-run early stages, made rapid progress forward from the 1250 metres to join race leader briefly, shifted one back to stalk the pace on home bend, renewed effort home turn but run ended quickly.

Ridden forward to travel just outside the leader, one-out-one-back in 3rd passing the 1100 metres dropping further back to 4th some 3L back when pace quickened, dropped out from 4-wide into home straight.
Began only fairly then crowded for room, taken back to race at the back, into clear 350M, closed off strongly to get up close home.
Quickly into stride, led steadily along the fence, battled on well to the line, couldn't hold off winner late.
Settled outside leader, responded well to lead briefly near 100M, unable to hold off winner late stages
Chased leaders 3-wide without cover, kept on steadily under pressure in straight, just missed the minor placings.
Caught 4-wide in midfield, ran on moderately to the line, always held by leaders.
Held up 3-wide behind midfield, ran on mildly under top weight, no serious threat to leaders.
Settled behind midfield, fought on steadily over final 300M, safely held by leaders.
Dropped back to rear from wide draw, ran home fairly on straightening, not going the pace to challenge leaders.
Eased back to the rear from widest gate, 3-wide home turn, lacked a strong response on straightening, no extra 200M.
Tracked leaders, caught 3-wide no cover throughout, pushed along 500M, weakened gradually from 300M.
Chased leader along the inside, came under pressure home turn, failed to quicken and gave ground rapidly passing 200M. (Substantial blood in trachea.)
From draw 1 took up a midfield position along the inside, gave way passing 400M, soon left behind.
Began well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on very well in straight to hold off the challengers.
Shifted in at start and made contact, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out after passing 600M, very wide turning in, finished off strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Jumped well, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, 2 wide on turn, closed off well to take a place, lost 2nd last stride.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide towards rear, commenced move after passing 600M, very wide turning in, finished off well to make frame.

Made contact at start, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, commenced move after passing 600M, very wide turning in, showed good response early in straight, peaked 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Crowded on jumping, raced at rear on the inside, moved closer along the rail on turn, made good progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider after passing 500M, no clear running until final 50M, not able to test properly.
Crowded on jumping, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, no clear running until passing 150M, showed limited response thereafter.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced behind midfield on the inside, a bit closer on turn, angled out 500M, no clear running early in straight, cleared 150M, showed limited response thereafter.
Jumped well, taken back to race 2 wide at rear, 9 to 10 lengths back, closer on turn, finished off evenly.
Hampered start, raced at tail, 10 lengths or so back in the middle stages, closer on turn, finished off evenly.

Made contact at start, sat right behind the leader on rail in the early stages, angled out after passing 800M, commenced move 550M, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.) (Mucus.)
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, challenged the leader turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Jumped well from a wide draw, raced 2 wide better than midfield, carried wider on turn, weakened early in straight. (Mucus.)
Out with rest, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, there to turn, finished off strongly to score.
Slowly away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, no daylight early in straight, cleared after passing 200M, finished off strongly to take a place.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, very wide turning in, made good progress in straight to make frame, no threat to the first few.
Away with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, finished off evenly.
Moderately away, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, 2 lengths or so back, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 150M, finished off evenly.
Taken back from gate 12, raced at rear on the outside, 7 lengths back, very wide turning in, made good progress in straight without threatening. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began only fairly from gate 1, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, saved ground on turn, no clear running in straight, not able to test properly. (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide better than midfield, got cover after passing 900M, wider turning in, showed some response early in straight, peaked on run 150M, weakened final 100M.
Began well, sent forward to take the lead, led by 3/4L, travelled well to turn, peaked and headed 250M, weakened final 100M.
Jumped well, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross near 700M, 2 wide turning in, hit the front 250M, peaked and headed near 150M, weakened thereafter.
Inconvenienced at start, positioned 2 wide, a length or so back, similar position on turn, crowded near 400M, showed limited response early in straight, peaked 250M, weakened final 100M.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced 3 wide with no cover, a length or so back, similar position on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Taken back to race 2 wide at rear, 6 to 7 lengths back, very wide turning in, failed to make any progress in straight.
