Jumped well, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths back, commenced move after passing 600M, took the lead 450M, kept on very well in straight to hold off the challengers. (Lame left front leg.)
Commenced well, raced in midfield on the inside, 2 to 3 wide turning in, finished off well take 2nd, nearest on line.
Made contact at start, raced at rear, commenced move after passing 700M, very wide turning in, closed off well to take a place.
Crowded shortly after start, raced behind midfield on the inside, hard ridden after passing 550M, made some headway in straight to make frame, no threat to the first few.
Crowded shortly after start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, moved closer after passing 1050M, very wide turning in, finished off evenly.
Jumped well from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, headed near 450M, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Jumped with them, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, there to turn, showed some response early in straight, peaked 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, moved a bit closer after passing 650M, 3 to 4 wide on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, commenced move after passing 800M, very wide on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.

Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide towards rear, commenced move after passing 600M, found rail 550M, saved ground on turn, showed limited response early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened thereafter. (Lame left front leg.)
Jumped with them, raced prominently, 2 wide, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Made contact shortly after start, raced behind midfield on the inside, unable to maintain position after passing 700M, 7 lengths back turning in, showed nothing in straight.
Eased back, 2-3 wide, dashed well 300M to score.
Pushed to take rail and lead, hung on well until 50M overhauled.
Pushed early, in front of midfield, ran on well for 3rd.
Midfield along the fence, checked 600M, progressed steadily 250M.
Eased to rear, improved around the field steadily from 400M.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, lack room 400M, progressed steadily when clear.
Eased back, trapped 2-3 wide, made steady ground 300M.
Pushed forward, one out one back, just held ground in straight.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 2 wide, hampered 350M, no dash.
Midfield, trapped 3 wide throughout, no progress.
Pushed forward, sat outside the lead, emptied 400M.
Eased to take box seat, soon out of fuel 500M, checked 350M.
Jumped nicely, settled outside the lead, commenced to improve near 600M, quickened passing 100M to score.
Raced at tail, improved near 400M, issued challenge near 50M, missed by SH.
Settled midfield, placed pressure passing 500M, finished solidly.
Settled in front of midfield, asked for effort near 400M, worked home well.
Began well then took lead, responded well when asked for effort in the straight.
Slow to begin then taken back, raced behind midfield on rail, came home well.
Raced at rear, near 200M rider dropped left rein, near 150M was disappointed for running, over the concluding stages was awkwardly placed, not fully test.
Raced towards rear, travelled only fairly in middle stages, widest on straightening, no response in the straight, must trial.
Wide and without cover throughout in handy position, gave ground passing 500M and faded out in the straight, must trial.

Hard ridden after start to improve & challenge for lead, racing 3 wide without cover down back straight. Dashed to lead at 250m & despite getting tired late after tough run held narrow advantage on line. Brave win.
Shifted back from outside gate to race at the tail. Moved very wide prior to cornering when a long way from lead before finishing off very strongly in final 250m to just miss on the line. Big finish.

Hard ridden in early stages to hold midfield position on rail. Continued along rail only 2L from lea don cornering before finishing strongly in final 100m to be beaten only a neck in third. Clear of 4th.
Raced in midfield three wide with cover throughout. Entered last section only 2L from the lead before finishing off evenly in straight to be similar margin behind on line.
Steadied soon after the start & shifted across to race in midfield, 3 wide with cover throughout. Eased wider on cornering before finishing off evenly to midfield in dash to line.
Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Entered last section only 3L from the lead, made no headway in the straight & was beaten just under 4L in midfield.
Slow to begin & consequently raced near the rear. Continued last entering final section, nearly 7L form the lead before passing a few tiring runners in straight without providing a genuine challenge.

Showed speed after start to share lead when racing away from rail. Prevailed in the battle for the lead holding a neck advantage near the 600m turn. Joined & passed by winner at 250m before weakening thereafter.

Drifted back after the start despite being hard ridden & raced worse than midfield on the rail. Stayed along the rail on cornering, around 4L from lead, momentarily crowded near 200m mark but was never a likely challenger.
Shifted back from wide gate to race third last. Continued rearward & wide on the track around bend before making no headway in the straight & being beaten over 6L.

Held narrow lead momentarily after start before being headed & racing just behind the leading trio. Entered last section just over a length from the lead, emptied out soon after straightening & weakened sharply last furlong.

Hard ridden & improved along rail after start to share lead in a line of three after first furlong. Headed & raced second on rail after 600m turn. Hard ridden prior to straightening & weakened poorly in straight to long last.
Moderately away, raced 3 wide and without cover in midfield, moved a bit closer on turn, finished off strongly to score.
Began well, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 lengths or so back on turn, finished off strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Shifted out at start, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross near 600M, saved ground on turn, driven and every chance inside final furlong, no extra final 50M.
Bumped start and unbalanced, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, made some progress in straight to make frame without threatening.
Began very awkwardly and bumped, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, blocked early in straight, finished off evenly thereafter.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, found rail 600M, led by half-length turning in, peaked early in straight, headed 150M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Slightly slow out, raced 2 wide behind midfield early, found rail near 650M, hampered 600M, saved ground on turn, made minor progress in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 3 wide behind midfield early, 2 wide from 650M, checked off heels near 600M, very wide turning in, showed limited response in straight.
Away well, raced behind midfield on the outside, found rail near 500M, 5 lengths back turning in, showed limited response in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Bumped start, raced prominently on the outside, 2 wide from 600M, travelled well on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide at rear, 7 lengths back on turn, made no progress in straight.
Began very awkwardly, raced at tail, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight.
Raced in midfield, approaching 1000M lay out and along the rail, made ground and closed off strongly to score by a head.
Settled in behind the leader, along the rail, battled on gamely but couldn't hold off the winner, settled for 2nd.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, stayed on but headed in the last 50M.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, made ground steadily to the line. (See incident report)
At one-out one-back, ran on only fairly to the line.
Sent forward, 2 wide, weakened in the last 100M.
At rear, along the rail 800M, only one paced.
Taken back, 2 wide, difficult to settled in the middle stages, did not feature.

Soon dropped to rear of midfield on the rail despite ridden, saved ground in similar position turning for home, switched out for a clear run over 100 metres out, quickened well to assert authority near the line.
Soon took up running after a moderate start, obtained rails run 900 metres out attempting to make all, went off the rail on straightening, caught close to home.
Amongst leaders early before settling 2L back in 4th, became 3rd and came under pressure rounding home bend, fought on under pressure without threatening. (Bled)
Jumped awkwardly and soon dropped well behind, saved ground on inside turning for home, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Crowded at start and settled well behind, pulled forward to 8th on the rail passing the 700 metres, saved ground turning in, fought on steadily under pressure without threatening.

Broke well but soon taken back, steadied and dropped to midfield on 1000 metre bend, further inconvenienced dropping to last few over 600 metres out, ran home strongly from wide in rear into home straight.
Ridden early stages, travelled wide without cover in midfield in back straight, in similar position making home turn, finished off the race nicely.

Improved steadily to travel outside the leader, shifted 1L back 2-wide in 2nd over 600 metres out, hung in and a difficult ride early in home straight, made no further impression inside final 150 metres.
Taken back to last few, trailed the field into home straight, produced good late impression in the run to the line.

Ridden along for forward position, settled some 3L back in 5th in back straight, lost position from approaching the 600 metres, shared 6th some 4L back turning for home, kept on well inside final 200 metres.
Travelled keenly most of way 3-wide in 9th, dropped to 10th and becoming wide without cover rounding home bend, went widest entering straight and one-paced.

Pressed forward from the widest gate travelling 3-wide without cover with the leaders, shifted back to 2L 3rd passing the 700 metres, in similar position entering home straight, dropped out tamely. (Mucus)
Chased leaders, in 4th making the turn for home, closed off strongly final 150M to asset close home.
Began fairly, strode forward to take the lead passing 900M, 2L in front at 400M, fought on well to line, headed by winner 50M.
Crowded for room at start, reserved behind midfield, 6Ls behind leader at 400M, swung wide into straight but had to shift back to inner for clear running, closed off well but held by first 2.
Took up early running before taking a trailing position 700M, tried hard in straight but always held by first 2, missed out on 3rd narrowly.
Settled 3-wide midfield 4Ls off the pace, wide into straight, stayed on moderately to the line.
Held up 2-wide behind midfield, driven along nearing 400M, closed off mildly, no serious threat to first 2.
Failed to show anticipated early speed, took up a midfield position along the fence, raced keenly 1000M, hampered near 500M, ran on same pace in straight, never in contention.
Taken back to a position towards the rear, 3-wide home turn, failed to finish off on straightening. (Blood in trachea.)
From draw 1 settled along the rail just ahead of midfield, under pressure 500M, gave little response in straight, weakened final 200M.
Dropped back on jumping from wide draw, held up near last 6-7Ls off the pace, found nothing when asked early straight, never going the pace to challenge.
Began awkwardly, outpaced in last, left behind by main rivals on straightening, ran poorly on its seasonal return.
From wide draw went forward chasing leaders, caught wide without cover throughout, soon weakened turning for home, eased when no chance.
Shifted out at start and made contact, positioned on rail better than midfield, 2 wide on turn, finished off strongly to score.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail early, 8 lengths back, sent forward after passing 850M, 3 wide better than midfield on turn, closed off well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Hampered start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide turning in, made good progress in straight to take a place on line, no threat to the first two.

Bumped start, sent forward to take the early lead, headed 1100M, allowed rival to cross after entering the back straight, saved ground on turn, angled out 400M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 50M.
Crowded start, raced 3 wide in midfield, commenced move after passing 800M, took the lead 600M, 2 wide turning in, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened final 50M.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield early, dropped back to race near the rear in the middle stages, 4 lengths back on turn, finished off evenly.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 wide on turn, finished off evenly.
Began awkwardly and crowded, raced 3 wide at rear early, found rail 1000M, saved ground on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Bumped start and unbalanced, raced 2 wide towards rear, moved a bit closer after passing 650M, very wide turning in, one-paced in straight.
Moderately away, positioned on rail behind midfield, 2 wide after passing 450M, showed limited response in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Made contact at start, unable to slot in early, sent forward to race prominently on the first turn, took the lead 1100M, found rail 900M, headed 600M, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Jumped well, raced 2 wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, carried wider turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.

Slightly inconvenienced at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, angled out after passing 500M, finished off very strongly, easily scored.
Jumped with them, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, made contact 500M, closed off well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide towards rear, 5 lengths back on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared after passing 150M, finished off well to take a place, nearest on line.
Began fairly, positioned on rail in midfield, angled out after passing 500M, made some headway in straight to make frame.
Average to begin, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.

Made contact at start, raced prominently on the outside, took the lead 900M, found rail near 750M, led by a length on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Inconvenienced at start, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, wider turning in, finished off evenly.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out after passing 500M, no clear running early in straight, cleared 150M, showed some response thereafter.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, 6 lengths or so back on turn, very wide into straight, made some progress in the run home.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, no clear running until final 50M, showed some response thereafter.

Bumped start and unbalanced, raced 2 wide, 2 lengths so back, made contact 500M, peaked early in straight, inconvenienced 100M, weakened gradually thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.) (Blood in trachea.)
Jumped well from gate 1, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross 900M, a length back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Taken back from gate 13, raced at rear on the outside, found rail 550M, last turning in, failed to make any progress in straight. (See Racing Incidents.) (Epiglottic entrapment.)
Taken back from gate 9, raced 3 wide with cover towards rear, very wide turning in, failed to make any progress in straight.
Settled in front, closed off well to score.
Prominent, ran on strongly, just missed by narrow margin.
Eased to sit in midfield, progressed steadily 300M.
At back, progressed steadily 300M.
Just behind the front runners, just held ground.
Eased back, ran on ok.
Shared the lead, hung on until 200M weakened.
Hard ridden to share the lead, out of fuel 300M.
At back, just held ground.
Hard ridden early, at back, made ground 200M.
Eased back, no progress.
Slow away, never competitive.
Shared lead, emptied 400M.
Never a factor.
Jumped sharply, sat outside the lead, asked for effort near 400M, worked home strongly to score.
Raced in front of midfield, improved near 500M, fought well in the straight, missed by Head.
Began only fairly, settled midfield on rail, responded solidly in the straight.
Taken back at start, raced at tail, commenced to improve near 500M, in the straight made up some nice late ground.
Settled behind midfield, near 500M was buffeted for room, fought hard but only one-paced.
Taken back at start, tried to improve near 550M, widest on straightening, one-paced in the straight.
At the start stumbled, settled in box seat, gave ground passing 150M.
Ridden to take lead, came under pressure rounding the Home Turn, gave ground passing 200M.
Raced towards rear on rail, placed pressure but no response, weakened in the straight.

Enjoyed soft run in midfield on rail throughout. Cornered just over 3L from the lead, shifted away from the rail passing the 300m, dashed to the lead near the 100m mark & continued on strongly to win.

Raced in midfield between runners, 4.5L from the lead near the 800m. Continued a similar margin from lead on straightening before closing off strongly between runners to snare narrow second in a line-up behind winner.

Didn't begin fast & shifted back to race third last. Shifted wider, commenced to improve passing the 600m, cornered widest, entered last section 5L from lead before closing strongly to snare third in line-up for placings.

Shared narrow lead early before being crossed & racing on leaders back from 900m. Improved into tight running at 400m when second, bumped heavily, shared lead near 150m, continued close until caught for placing on line.

Ridden forward from outside barrier before improving position to race second, away from rail, 1L from the lead. Bumped heavily near 400m, dashed up within a head of the lead at 150m, continued close all the way to line.

Shifted back to last after the start. Continued near the tail throughout, nearly 7L from the lead on cornering before closing off strongly in the straight to get within 1.5L on the line in a big line-up behind the winner.

Pushed forward, raced wide early before improving to lead near 1100m. Maintained 1L lead entering last section, headed near 150m mark before fighting on gamely in late to be beaten only 1.5L in a line-up behind winner.

Good run two pairs back on rail throughout. Moved off rail on cornering, awkwardly placed & bumped entering last section when just over 2L from lead, continued close until emptying out at the 200m & giving a few lengths late.

Raced wide in midfield & was left without cover passing the 900m when around 3L from the lead. Entered last section 3.5L form the lead, hampered soon after before weakening slightly in late stages to be beaten 4L. (Mucus).

Steadied after first furlong & shifted across to race just worse than midfield, over 6L from the lead at the 800m. Shifted wider on cornering, entered last section 5L from lead & could only maintain that deficit on line.

Showed speed after start to hold narrow early lead before getting good run 1,1. Ridden along on cornering, entered last section just over 2L from lead before being bumped & unbalanced soon after before emptying at 250m.
Drifted back after the start to race 4th last on rail. Hard ridden on cornering, entered last section over 7L behind when second last before making no headway & straight & finishing near rear.

Raced wide in midfield before being awkwardly placed & steadied when close to heels near 1100m. Continued wide & without cover around bend, entered last section 4L from lead before being checked 375m & weakening thereafter.

Steadied from wide gate after start & shifted behind runners to race at the rear. Continued a long way back when shifting very wide on straightening, 8.5L from lead entering last section. Made no headway in straight. Last.
Began well from gate 12, raced prominently on the outside, 2 wide after passing 650M, bumped early in straight, finished off strongly thereafter to score by a narrow margin.
Taken back from gate 11, raced towards rear on the inside, 2 wide from 500M, made very good progress in straight to be nearest on line, just narrowly beaten.
Clean jump, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on very well in straight, just unable to hold off the first two late.
Bumped start, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, 2 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, made some progress in straight to make frame.
Bumped start, positioned 1-1/2L behind the leader on rail, easy run on turn, finished off evenly.
Quickly into stride, raced prominently but 3 wide in the early stages, 2 wide after passing 800M, commenced move 500M, bumped early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the outside, angled out after passing 500M, very wide into straight, made some progress in the run home.
Bumped start, raced slightly behind midfield on the outside, similar position on turn, made some headway in straight.
Shifted in abruptly at start and bumped, raced towards rear on the outside, 7 lengths back turning in, made some progress in straight.
Began fairly, positioned on rail in midfield, angled out 500M, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Hampered start, raced 3 wide slightly better than midfield, similar position on turn, one-paced in straight.
Hampered start, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Hampered start, raced 3 wide behind midfield early, 4 lengths or so back, found rail 600M, same margin back turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (Irregular heart rhythm.)
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, stayed on and scored by 1L.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, saved ground and improved well to the line for 2nd.
Raced in midfield, wide no cover after 900M, made ground steadily to the line.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, ran on well to the line.
Sent forward, 2 wide after 850M, kept on until 100M and faded gradually.
At rear, along the rail, saved ground and ran on fairly.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, pretty one paced.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, only one paced.
Sent forward, 2 wide, weakened in the last 200M.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, did not feature.
At rear, along the rail, nothing in the Straight.
Taken back, 2 wide, no progress.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, did not feature.
At rear, traveled keenly passing 1300M, nothing in the Straight.
Settled well behind and waited with, switched widest turning for home, finished off the race well inside final 300 metres to grab lead over 100 metres out.
Broke well, shared early lead to the 1400 metres before settling one out one back in 3rd, became 5th just over 2L back onto home bend, hit the front briefly inside the 200 metres, soon overhauled.
Moderate start, settled mainly 3-wide in midfield, commenced move rounding home bend and 5-wide into straight, kept on steadily under pressure without quickening.
Broke well, taken back to stalk the leader on the rail after the first 200 metres, did not much room until after the 150 metres, made no impression closing stages.
Settled in last few, commenced move out wide rounding home bend, very wide turning for home, failed to quicken under pressure.
Began well to lead, gained 1L break passing the 1400 metres, came under pressure to hold leading position upon straightening, headed inside the 200 metres and folded up quickly.
Settled mainly just better than midfield, drifted slightly backward rounding home bend, came under pressure when behind runners early in straight, one-paced closing stages.

Pressed forward from the widest gate, wide with leaders down back straight before gaining position just outside the leader passing the 1200 metres, unable to quicken under pressure in straight and weakened over 150 metres out.
Slowly away, travelled well behind to straight, ran home one-paced.
Moderate start, in rear of midfield most of way to straight, saved ground turning in but did not find much room behind runners early on, found no extra inside final 250 metres.
Niggled along not too far off the pace, made short-lived effort 3-wide without cover rounding home bend, folded up quickly upon straightening. (Mucus) (Roarer)
From draw 13 slotted into a 3-wide spot ahead of midfield, quickened up nicely to the fore nearing 200M, always doing just enough final stages to maintain the lead.
Settled 2-wide behind midfield, closed off well over final 300M to claim 2nd near line, nearest finish.
Quickly into stride from draw 1, chased leaders, came through narrow gap 300M to challenge but always held by winner to the line, lost 2nd close home.
Held up behind midfield along the 3-path, raced keenly from 800M, ran on moderately over final 400M.
Bustled along after the start to be racing outside leader, briefly led inside 300M, held ground final stages.
Began very awkwardly, settled near last 6Ls off the pace, switched wide in straight doing best work final stages, nearest finish.
Held up 2-wide in mid-division, had difficulty obtaining clear running early straight, ran on without threat to leaders final 200M.
Close up behind leaders, kept on fairly on straightening, never a threat to leaders.
Chased leaders in a 3 wide spot without cover, out-finished passing 200M.
Steadied to obtain cover after the start, restrained in a position behind midfield, responded fairly passing 400M, never reached contention.
Hampered at the start, recovered to race in midfield along the fence, never going the pace to challenge on straightening.
Vigorously driven to find the lead, pressed by rivals 600M, fought on to mid-straight then gave ground. (Lame RF leg)
Taken across behind runners after the start, settled towards the rear 6Ls back, failed to finish off on straightening.
Dropped back to last on jumping from draw 14, 8Ls off the pace turning home, couldn't go on.
Commenced well, raced prominently, 2 away from the stands' rail, hard ridden after passing 300M, showed very good response, finished off strongly to score.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced in the middle of the track, 1-1/2L back, hard ridden 350M, closed off well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Bumped start, positioned 2 to 3 lengths behind the leader on the stands' side, commenced move 350M, finished off well to take a place.
Bumped start, raced prominently on the stands' rail, hard ridden after passing 400M, showed limited response, ran on evenly to the line.
Moderately away from gate 1, raced in the middle of the track, 2-3/4L back, hard ridden 300M, finished off evenly.
Jumped well from gate 14, positioned a length behind the leader on the stands' rail, hard ridden after passing 400M, only showed limited response, ran on same pace to the line.
Shifted out at start and bumped, sent forward to race prominently on the stands' side, hard ridden after passing 300M, showed limited response, weakened gradually final furlong.
Bumped start, raced slightly behind midfield, 3 away from the stands' rail, one-paced final 300M.
Average to begin, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on the stands' side, hard ridden 400M, showed no response, weakened final furlong.
Began awkwardly, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader, 2 away from the stands' rail, peaked near 400M, weakened thereafter.
Bumped shortly after start, raced at rear on the middle track, failed to make any progress final 400M.
Stumbled at start and bumped, positioned a length behind the leader, nearer to the middle track, showed limited response after passing 400M, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.) (Mucus.)
Inconvenienced at start, raced in the middle of the track, a length or so back, hard ridden near 400M, weakened final 300M.
Began very awkwardly, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Moderately away, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably throughout, kicked clear after turning in, ran on very well to the line, easily scored.
Out in line, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, finished off well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Jumped with them, raced slightly behind midfield on the inside, 2 wide on turn, made good progress in straight to take a place.
Began well, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, easy run on turn, finished off evenly.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 wide on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Jumped well, raced prominently on the outside, 2 wide after passing 1000M, there to turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Taken back from gate 12, raced towards rear on the outside, 6 to 7 lengths back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced 2 wide at rear early, found rail near 800M, saved ground on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 7 to 8 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made minor progress in the run home.
Began fairly, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 5 lengths or so back, 3 wide on turn, commenced move after passing 500M, peaked early in straight, one-paced thereafter.
Bumped start, raced towards rear on the inside early, 2 wide in the middle stages, 5 lengths or so back turning in, failed to close off in straight.
Began well from a wide draw, raced 3 wide better than midfield, no cover after passing 1000M, 2 lengths or so back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began only fairly, positioned on rail behind midfield, 2 wide after passing 800M, 6 lengths back on turn, made very good progress in straight to score.
Away well, raced 2 wide in midfield, 4 lengths back on turn, finished off well to take 2nd.
Jumped well, took the early lead, allowed rival to cross near 1100M, 2 wide from 500M, 2 to 3 lengths back turning in, closed off well to take a place.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide, a length or so back, 2 wide from 800M, commenced move 500M, took the lead 400M, kept on well in straight, just unable to hold off the first few late.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, 4 lengths back on turn, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Away with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 6 lengths back on turn, made reasonable progress in straight.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide at rear, commenced move after passing 400M, very wide turning in, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Began awkwardly, raced at rear, 7 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, made reasonable progress in straight.

Average to begin, raced prominently but trapped very wide early, 2 wide from 1100M, hit the front near 1000M, travelled well to turn, headed 400M, peaked early in straight, weakened and eased final 100M.
Out in line, raced prominently but very wide, took the lead 1200M, headed near 1000M, 2 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Moderately away from the widest draw, raced behind midfield on the outside, no cover after entering the back straight, peaked on turn, weakened final 400M.
Began well, raced prominently, 2 wide, allowed rivals to cross near 1200M, 3 lengths back in the middle stages, peaked on turn, weakened final 450M.
Eased back, took rail, dashed well 300M to score.
In front of midfield, trapped 3 wide, closed off strongly for 2nd.
Pushed forward, took box seat, held up 4-2, ran on well when clear.
Hard ridden forward, 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 300M.
Pressed forward, took rail and lead, hung on until 150M emptied.
Pushed early, behind midfield, 2 wide, made ground 200M.
At back along the fence, ran on ok.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, out of fuel 400M, on heels 350M.
At back, 2 wide, ran on fairly.
Eased back, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, no progress.
Slow away, trapped 3 wide, never competitive.
Slow away, never a factor.
Settled midfield, 3 wide with cover, improved passing 500M, worked home strongly to score.
Travelled midfield on rail, asked for effort on straightening, worked home solidly, missed by Neck.
Settled in box seat, asked for effort near 350M, responded nicely in the straight.
Began awkwardly and rider lost his balance, settled midfield, made up some nice late ground in the straight.
Taken back at start, placed pressure near 500M, widest on straightening, gained some ground in the straight.
At start shifted in and bumped a runner, rider then lost right stirrup iron until 1150M, raced at tail, awkwardly placed near finishing line and was not properly tested.
Raced towards rear on rail, kept on rail rounding the Home Turn to save ground, one-paced in the straight.
Ridden forward to take lead, responded well in the early part of straight, weakened near 100M.
Raced outside the lead, came under pressure rounding the Home Turn, limited response in the straight.
Travelled in front of midfield, tried to improve passing 400M, limited response in the straight.
Taken back at start, raced behind midfield, wide on straightening, no response in the straight, bled.
Travelled wide and without cover for the majority of race in handy position, in the straight gave ground.
Had nice position 1,1 for the majority. Eased 3 wide to improve passing the 500m mark, dashed to lead approaching the furlong mark before finishing well no hold neck advantage over late closer.

Steadied & raced just worse than midfield away from rail. Continued around 7L from lead at half-way. Moved 3 wide with cover near 500m, cornered widest before closing strongly in last 150m to get within a neck on the line.

Raced worse than midfield on the rail throughout. Stayed along the inside & moved closer to lead when field bunched entering last section. Shifted wider near 200m before closing off well to third, beaten under 1L.
Strode forward to lead. Held narrow lead on cornering before being joined by winner at the furlong mark before fading to well held 4th in late stages.
Strode forward to challenge early lead before racing on leaders back for majority. Moved away from the rail approaching the corner before finishing off only fairly to midfield.

Raced in midfield in the clear for the first half, passing half-way around 4L from lead. Shifted 4 wide & improved when field bunched approaching corner, straightened only 1.5L from lead before emptying out in last 150m.
Raced in midfield on rail throughout early & middle stages, when racing around 6L from the lead at half-way. Moved off the rail passing the 500m mark before failing to make any headway in straight.

Shifted back & raced rearward, around 9L from lead at half-way. Moved wider & commenced to improve passing 600m, forced 5 wide when under 2L from the lead entering last section before finishing moderately to midfield.
Shifted behind runners after start & raced second last for majority. Continued near tail, around 10L from lead at half-way. Made no headway in last section & was beaten over 5L.

Raced in midfield away from the rail, around 6L from the lead at half-way. Moved within 3L of the lead when field bunched approaching the corner before failing to finish off & weakening to be beaten over 5L.
Pushed forward from outside barrier to race outside the leader. Shared lead entering last section before weakening out sharply in the straight to be long second last.
Slow to begin then had no speed & raced a clear last. Moved wider on the track when still last & over 5L from the lead before weakening further. Last.
Average to begin, tracked leaders, 2 lengths or so back, easy run to turn, commenced move after passing 400M, finished off very strongly, easily scored.
Away well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, carried wider after passing 450M, made good progress in straight to take 2nd.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened gradually thereafter, missed 2nd close home.
Inconvenienced at start, raced towards rear on the inside, 8 lengths back turning in, made good progress in straight to make frame without threatening.
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced 3 wide at rear early, 2 wide from 700M, still well back on turn, made good progress in straight without threatening the first few.
Jumped with them, sent forward to race prominently on the outside, a length back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail better than midfield, angled out 450M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Bumped start, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, one-paced in straight.
Bumped start and unbalanced, raced 3 wide behind midfield early, 2 wide from 700M, 6 lengths back on turn, made no progress in straight.
Made contact shortly after start, raced 2 wide towards rear, 9 to 10 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, showed limited response in the run home. (See Racing Incidents.)
Moderately away from the widest draw, raced behind midfield on the outside, found cover near 650M, 8 lengths back on turn, made no progress in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 11 lengths back on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Sent forward, 2 wide after 700M, closed off well to the line and scored by 1L.
Ran forward, one-out one-back after 700M, closed of well to the line in the last 100M.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, continued on well but headed in the last 100M.
Raced in midfield, along the rail after 700M, made ground and closed off strongly for 4th.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, only one paced to the line.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, made minor ground only.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, pretty one paced.
At rear, 2 wide, swung wide and lay in on Straightening, saved some ground in the Straight.
At rear, along the rail, pretty one paced.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, did not feature in the Straight.
At rear, 2 wide, lost ground in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, never a factor.
Settled towards the rear in 9th, commenced move out wide over 400 metres out, widest runner turning in, ran on well under pressure to grab victory 50 metres out.

Tracked the leader on the rail, commenced move inside the 500 metres and switched out for a run entering straight, ran on under pressure to hit the front inside the 200 metres only to be caught 50 metres out.

Jumped awkwardly losing ground, ridden to midfield on the rail, gained closer to 3L 6th into back straight, commenced move rounding home bend and shifted out for a run on straightening, fought on steadily without threatening.

Well there, shifted back to 5th 2-wide some 3L back into back straight, commenced move 3-wide at the 500 metres going wider into straight, fought on steadily under pressure without threatening. (Tactic questioned)

Began well but gradually taken back to midfield, travelled keenly at the 1000 metres, badly held up on straightening at the 300 metres, produced good late impression closing stages. (Tactic questioned)
Restrained towards the rear for rails run from a wide gate, gained slightly closer passing the 700 metres, snuck up to 3rd hugging inside rails turning in, failed to quicken to threaten.
Crowded at start, settled the back on the rail, saved ground on the inside turning in, made good impression under pressure early in straight.
Settled well behind, made up ground late ground down the centre of home straight.
Broke well, taken back to travel in last few on the rail, angled out for a run passing the 400 metres but badly hampered making home turn, made no further impression in straight.

Broke well sharing early pace on the rail, held about half a length advantage most of the way in back straight, went 1L clear rounding home bend and into straight, unable to sustain effort and headed 200 metres out.

Pressed forward from a wide gate, travelled with the leaders 3-wide round the first bend before obtaining one-out-one-back position on top of stables bend, mainly 2L back in 4th in back straight, gave ground on home bend.
Jumped sideway losing ground, quickly ridden forward to join the pace rounding first bend, travelled outside the leader in 2nd most of the back straight, gave ground quickly from 450 metres out.
Travelled strongly in a position ahead of midfield, driven nearing 300M, found plenty up the straight to lead 150M, continued on well late stages for overdue win.
Reserved in midfield 3-4Ls away, kept coming over final 300M and found enough to take 2nd near line.
Sat behind leaders, picked up well on straightening, not winner's pace mid-straight, held 2nd until concluding stages.
In midfield early stages, caught wide no cover from 900M, strode closer to be tracking leaders home turn, tried hard in the straight but came up short.
Shifted across behind runners early stages, settled down behind midfield, made some ground late without threatening.
Went forward, shared lead on inside, opened up a 2L lead top of straight, headed near 150M, weakened rapidly.
Held up behind midfield along the 3-path, kept on fairly over final 300M, no threat to leaders.
Took early lead before eased back to sit behind leaders, no extra passing 250M.
Ended up near the rear, 7Ls off the pace 400M, gave limited response on straightening.
From wide draw unable to slot in for cover, raced keenly after 1100M and ended up outside the lead, weakened from 250M.
Began fairly, settled towards the rear 6-7Ls behind, failed to respond under pressure home turn, already beaten top of straight.
Shifted across behind runners early stages, ended up in last detached, driven along 500M but couldn't make up any ground.
Began well, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, found rail near 650M, commenced move after passing 500M, hit the front 150M, kept on strongly to hold off the challengers late.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide at rear, 3 wide after passing 800M, moved closer on turn, finished off strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Bumped on jumping, positioned 2 wide, 3 lengths back, allowed rival to cross near 600M, 4 lengths back on turn, made good progress in straight to take a place.
Bumped start, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, there to turn, closed off well to make frame without threatening.

Crowded start, raced towards rear on the inside, 2 wide from 800M, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide turning in, made very good progress in straight to be nearest on line, no threat to the first few.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened gradually thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide towards rear, 3 wide from 850M, moved closer in the middle stages, wider turning in, made some progress early in straight, weakened gradually final 50M.

Taken back from the gate 12, raced at tail, 7Ls back, moved a bit closer 600M, 5-6Ls back turning in, showed good response early in straight, not enough room 100M, angled out thereafter and made some progress final 50M.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide, 4 lengths or so back, dropped to rear on turn, made some headway in straight.
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced slightly better than midfield on the outside, 2 wide from 600M, angled out 450M, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to 50M, eased thereafter.
Began fairly from gate 1, positioned 4 lengths behind the leader on rail, same margin back on turn, showed some response early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened final 100M.
Moderately away from a wide draw, unable to slot in early, trapped 3 wide, a length or so back, 2 wide from 600M, peaked on turn, weakened final 400M.

Began well from gate 11, sent forward to take the lead, found rail near 700M, enjoyed the easy lead on turn, kept on very well in straight to score.
Began fairly, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out after passing 400M, finished off well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Began smartly, tracked leader, 3 wide, 2 lengths back turning in, finished off evenly.
Away with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 lengths or so back on turn, made some headway in straight to make frame without threatening.
Taken back from gate 9, raced at tail, 7 lengths or so back, still 6 lengths behind on turn, made some progress in straight.
Clean jump, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, easy run to turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Jumped well, raced at rear on the outside, 5 lengths or so back, very wide turning in, passed some tired runners in straight.
Began well, raced slightly better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, 4 lengths back turning in, failed to close off in straight.
Began well from the widest draw, raced wide with cover slightly behind midfield, similar position on turn, made no progress in straight.
Average to begin, raced better than midfield on the outside, 3 to 4 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.) (Blood in trachea.)
Began fairly, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Moderately away, raced prominently, 2 wide, 2 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M. (Blood in trachea.)
Hard ridden forward, box seat, closed off strongly to score.
Pushed to take rail and lead, hung on until 200M overhauled.
In front of midfield along the fence, held ground for 3rd.
Behind midfield, trapped 3 wide, dashed well 300M.
Hard ridden early, settled in midfield 2 wide, little dash 250M.
Slow away, at rear, took rail, made ground 200M.
Pressed forward, 2 wide, weakened 200M.
Eased to sit in midfield, trapped 3 wide, no progress.
Eased at start, trapped 4 wide, never improved.
Checked start, at back, 3-4 wide, no progress.
Trapped 3-4 wide throughout, emptied 400M.
Hard ridden forward, 2 wide, soon dropped off rapidly 600M.
Settled midfield on rail, improved near 400M, quickened passing 100M to score.
Raced midfield, responded strongly when asked for effort, missed by 1/2L.
Led by 4L, asked for effort passing 400M, worked home nicely.
Began awkwardly, raced behind midfield, worked home well when placed pressure.
Raced at rear on rail, placed pressure near 500M, made up some ground passing 100M.
Travelled towards rear, asked for effort near 500M, worked home one-paced.
Settled in front of midfield, tried to improve near 400M, gave ground passing 100M.
Raced at rear, placed pressure but only limited response.
Stumbled badly at the start, settled midfield, weakened passing 200M.
Badly unbalanced at start before being steadied & drifting back to the rear. Eased wider passing the 500m mark, straightened 4L from the lead before dashing to lead inside final 100m to win.

Raced worse than midfield, 3 deep with cover throughout. Moved closer to lead as field bunched approaching the corner, sprinted well to assume narrow lead near the 150m before passed by winner soon after. Held narrow second.
Enjoyed nice run on leaders back throughout. Held up momentarily near the 300m mark before closing off well between runners inside the final 150m to hold third, beaten under 1L.

Had limited speed at start & was hard ridden to hold position between runners worse than midfield. Straightened under 3L from the lead as field bunched on turn, held up near the 300m mark before closing steadily late.
Began very fast to lead. Continued to share narrow lead until headed passing the 200m mark & weakening a length or two to midfield.

Bumped at start, improved position before being caught 3 deep without cover just behind leading pair throughout. Hard ridden approaching corner, straightened only 1.5L from lead before emptying out at 250m. (Lame next day).
Mustered speed after the start before racing outside the leader. Continued to share lead inside the final 200m before emptying out at the 150m mark & giving a few lengths to midfield late.
Began only fairly & raced worse than midfield on the rail. Stayed on the inside on cornering when just under 3L from the lead before finishing only fairly to midfield without threatening.

Raced 3 deep with cover in midfield in early stages before being forced wider & without cover passing half-way. Cornered very wide, straightened 3L from the lead before finishing evenly to midfield without threatening.
Steadied & taken back to tail. Raced tight approaching corner, straightened just over 2L from lead before being held up until the 300m mark. Held up again near the 100m before not really tested late.
Raced in midfield on rail. Was held up for clear running for the majority of the straight until shifting out at the 125m & finishing only evenly late. Had some excuse.

Steadied after first furlong & shifted back to race near rearward. Bumped & relegated to last near the 900m. Continued last entering final section when 5.5L from lead before failing to make any headway in dash to line. (Lame).

Strode forward before getting good position away from the rail just behind the leading pair. Straightening just over a length form the lead before emptying at the 275m mark & weakening poorly in final furlong.

Raced in midfield between runners in early stages before becoming keen & shifting wider passing half-way. Then commenced to hang out badly around the home corner before weakening badly in the straight to last. (Must trial).

Average to begin, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, there to turn, unable to obtain clear running early in straight, found daylight near 200M, finished off very strongly to score by a narrow margin.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, led by 3/4L on turn, kept on very well in straight, just unable to hold off the winner on line. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began awkwardly, raced 3 wide with cover slightly behind midfield, similar position on turn, angled out 450M, finished off well to take a place without threatening.
Made contact shortly after start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 3 lengths or so back, angled out after passing 450M, not enough room early in straight, cleared near 250M, finished off evenly.
Quickly into stride, taken back to race towards rear on the outside, difficult to settle throughout, very wide into straight, made some progress in the run home.
Shifted out abruptly at start, raced 2 wide at rear, 3 wide after passing 550M, no clear running early in straight, cleared 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Began fairly, positioned on rail behind midfield, saved ground on turn, no daylight early in straight, angled out after passing 200M, made some progress final 100M.
Jumped well, raced prominently, 3 wide, 2 wide from 800M, 3/4L back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared near 150M, made no progress thereafter.
Out in line, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, 6 lengths back on turn, one-paced in straight.

Shifted out at start and bumped, raced prominently on the inside early, allowed rival to cross approaching 800M, sat right behind the leader on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 250M.
Began well, raced 3 wide, 2 lengths or so back, no cover after passing 800M, a bit closer on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 250M.
In midfield, 2 wide, only found daylight from near 300M, kicked on strongly inside 100M to score by a head in a tight finish.
In one out one back position, lay in in straight, kept kicking but just headed by winner prior to the line.
Prominent but wide early, allowed to take rail and led at 1000M, stayed on well for 3rd. (See Incident Report)
Slotted into midfield, wide but with cover, ran on nicely in straight, just missed the minor placings.
Niggled along, and settled in midfield eventually, 2 wide, continued on well to the line.
Travelled in midfield, along the rail, held ground in straight.
Rolled forward, raced in box-seat, held up slightly near 250M, one paced nonetheless.
Raced towards the rear, 2 wide, continued to make ground steadily to the line.
Settled just behind midfield, along the rail, interrupted run from 350M to 250M, held ground nonetheless.
Sat in behind midfield, wide but with cover, closed off fairly late.
Taken back after the jump, remained at tail, improved position only slightly.
Bumped and then eased back, at rear, did not close off in straight.
Bumped start, then sent forward and sat outside lead, faded passing 300M.
Niggled along but only settled front of midfield, wide and without cover, emptied near 300M.
Travelled 3-wide in 3L 6th to straight, commenced move upon straightening, quickened well inside final 300 metres to hit the front over 100 metres out, won readily.
Ridden forward to soon take up running at the 1000 metres obtaining rails run shortly after, held narrow advantage early in straight, outlasted over 100 metres out.

Broke well to lead from a wide gate early, ceded advantage after the first 200 metres, remained just outside race leader on home bend and into straight, came to draw level briefly 300 metres out, no extra inside final 100 metres.
Travelled worse than midfield and mainly in 8th, came under pressure to challenge after straightening, kept on steadily without threatening.

Slightly slow out, recovered steadily along the rail to midfield some 3L back in 7th, in similar position on home bend and into straight, baulked for a run early on, made modest late impression inside final 200 metres.
Settled well behind from the widest gate, gained one better on the rail 850 metres out, saved ground turning in, produced good late impression inside final 150 metres.
Broke well, settled some 2L back in 3rd 3-wide without cover, in similar position turning in, gave ground under pressure. (Tactic questioned)
Settled just over 2L back in 5th, in similar position turning in, kept on until finding no extra inside final 150 metres.
Soon dropped to last few travelling mainly 3-wide, raced keenly between runners rounding home bend and the widest into straight, ran home one-paced.
Slow to muster, settled some 2L back in 4th on the rail, chased race leader into home straight, found nothing under pressure.
Began well from a wide gate, gradually settled wide towards the rear, in similar position into straight, made no impression.
Broke well from a wide gate but soon taken back to last, never a factor. (Jockey reported saddle shifted in early stages.)
Crossed to the lead just before home turn, travelled well into straight, maintained a strong gallop to the line holding rivals at bay.
Began fairly, soon bustled along to take up a spot ahead of midfield, soon into clear passing 400M, closed off well to go 2nd final stages, held by winner. (Blood in trachea.)
Tracked leaders along the 3-path, gave good response to go 2nd nearing 200M, chased hard but safely held by winner, lost 2nd close home.
Driven along early to obtain a midfield spot, worked home steadily final 350M, already held by first 3.
Hard driven forward from wide draw, raced outside leader making the home turn, battled on one paced under pressure in straight, no impression final 150M. (Lame next day.)
Chased leaders, tried hard on straightening but held ground only, out of contention for minor placings 150M.
Not hurried after the start, settled near last, 7Ls off at 400M, worked home well from the rear without threatening.
From draw 1 moved up to chase leaders on inside, vigorously driven 500M, kept on same pace in straight, no extra 150M. (Mucus.)
Settled down midfield, came under pressure 600M, never got into a threatening position, just plodded over final 300M.
Bumped by rival at the start, steadied to obtain cover from wide draw, 6Ls off the pace 400M, couldn't make much headway.
Ended up in last 7Ls off the pace, still well back on straightening, failed to make ground, never likely. (Blood in trachea.)
Settled ahead of midfield 3-wide, couldn't sustain run on straightening, weakened away.
Slowly away and bumped, positioned on rail behind midfield, saved ground on turn, finished off very strongly to score.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, there to turn, finished off well to take 2nd.
Quickly into stride, showed good speed to take the lead, enjoyed the easy lead to turn, kept on well in straight, just unable to hold off the first two late.
Commenced well, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, same position on turn, kept on well in straight without threatening.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the inside, 5 lengths or so back on turn, made good progress in straight without threatening the first few.
Began well from gate 1, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, easy run to turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from gate 12, raced 2 wide at rear, 6 to 7 lengths back, 3 wide on turn, inconvenienced near 450M, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 3 wide with cover towards rear, 6 lengths back turning in, made some progress in straight.
Out with rest, positioned 2 wide, 4 lengths back, carried wider after passing 500M, bumped near 400M, one-paced in the run home.
Moderately away, positioned on rail in midfield, angled out after passing 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 5 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, very wide turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Away with them, raced slightly better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, peaked on turn, weakened and eased early in straight.
Jumped well, positioned on rail better than midfield, easy run on turn, hit the front 200M, kept on strongly to the line, easily scored.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, 8 lengths back, moved a bit closer on turn, very wide into straight, made very good progress in the home run to take 2nd.
Commenced well, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on the inside, angled out 550M, closed off well to take a place without threatening.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 8 to 9 lengths back, a little bit closer on turn, very wide into straight, finished off strongly to make frame without threatening.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out after passing 750M, very wide turning in, finished off evenly.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, similar position on turn, finished off evenly.
Away with them, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, very wide turning in, made some progress early in straight, peaked 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Lifted front feet on jumping and crowded, raced towards rear on the inside, angled out after passing 500M, made little progress in straight.
Moderately away from gate 1, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Began well, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths back early, moved a bit closer after passing 1000M, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably to turn, peaked and headed 200M, weakened thereafter.
Out in line, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong. (Blood in trachea.)
Moderately away, raced 3 wide in midfield, carried wider after passing 750M, very wide turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Shifted in at start and made contact, raced at rear throughout, never a threat.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Began smartly from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, finished off well to score by a narrow margin.
Began well, raced 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, there to turn, commenced move after passing 400M, finished off strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length on turn, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the first two final 50M.
Taken back from gate 9, raced at rear, 5 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, made good progress in straight to make frame without threatening. (See Racing Incidents.)
Bumped start, positioned 2 wide, a length or so back, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Lifted front feet on jumping and away tardily, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 3 lengths or so back on turn, finished off evenly.
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made little progress in straight.
Moderately away, raced at tail, 6 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Bumped start, positioned on rail in midfield, 3 lengths back, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M. (Rider dropped whip 200M.)
Hard ridden early to keep up in midfield, made early move around the field in 4 wide from 550M and scored.
Eased back, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Took rail and lead, hung on well until 100M overhauled.
Hard ridden early, sat 2 wide, made early move in 3 wide from 550M, out of fuel 150M.
At rear, 2 wide, progressed steadily 250M.
Slow away, at back, 2-3 wide, no progress.
Pushed forward, box seat, emptied 300M.
Pressed forward after being trapped 3 wide, became unbalanced in its actions whilst weakening 400M.
Urged along to take lead, travelled nicely, responded solidly when asked for effort, scored unchallenged.
Travelled in front of midfield, near 550M was left racing wide and without cover, gained ground when asked for effort, worked home solidly.
Settled behind midfield, 3 wide with cover, wide on straightening, made up some nice late ground.
Niggled to race outside the lead, asked for effort near 400M, worked home nicely.
Taken back at start, raced at tail on rail, commenced to improve near 400M, made some ground passing 100M.
Raced behind the leaders, near 550M was hampered and lost running, gained some ground in the straight.
Settled midfield on rail, commenced to improve passing 400M, finished one-paced.
Began only fairly, then bumped a runner and lost ground, settled behind midfield on rail, one-paced.
Taken back at start, raced midfield, one-paced in the straight.
Slow out, raced towards rear, fought hard but limited response in the straight.
Settled in box seat, placed pressure in the straight, weakened passing 100M.
Taken back at start, raced at rear, tried to improve but no response in the straight.

Began fast to lead early before headed & crossed at first bend. Moved off the rail & raced outside the leader in middle stages. Dashed to lead soon after cornering before digging deep late stages to hold narrow advantage on line.
Bumped at start before improving to race just behind the leading pair. Eased 3 wide approaching corner when only 1.5L from lead before sprinting well to miss by a narrow margin on line.
Bumped at the start before holding position in midfield on rail. Moved away from the inside approaching the 400m when 3L from lead before making late ground when moving to third inside final 100m.

Showed dazzling early speed to come across from outside gate at the first bend. Continued in lead until being headed by winner soon after straightening before battling away late to hold forth, just under 3L behind.
Shifted back after the start & raced near the tail throughout. Continued along rail, 5.5L from the lead entering last section before finishing off evenly along the inside in the straight to midfield.

Steadied at start & shifted behind runners to race in second half along rail. Awkwardly placed near heels at 900m & again at 700m when pace slowed mid-race. Just over 4L behind on cornering & could only maintain that margin.
Improved position in middle stages when pace slackened to race on the leaders back from half-way. Peaked on effort soon after straightening before weakening out in final furlong.

Bumped at start, steadied & raced rearward before being relegated to last near the 650m. Moved very wide to improve nearing the 400m when 6L behind. Cornered the widest before passing a few tiring runners late.

Hampered at start before being steadied & taken back to race worse than midfield. Shifted out away from heels when awkwardly placed near 700m & relegated to 3rd last. Cornered over 5L behind, made no improvement in straight.

Hampered at start before being left 3 deep without cover in midfield after first bend. Moved closer to lead when continuing wide as pace slowed near half-way. Emptied out soon after cornering before weakening sharply late.

Bumped at start before racing in midfield away from rail. Travelled keenly when racing between runners near 700m when pace slowed. Came under hard riding at the 500m before weakening out poorly in straight.

Crowded at start & steadied before running very wide when ungenerous at first bend. Improved position from last to midfield near 600m when continuing keen & wide. Weakened to long last in straight after doing a lot wrong.
Bumped start, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, showed very good response in straight, hit the front 100M, ran on strongly to the line.
Began smartly, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length on turn, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the winner final 100M.
Began well, raced 2 wide towards rear, 5 lengths or so back, found rail 500M, same margin back turning in, made good progress in straight to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Jumped well, raced prominently but 3 wide in the early stages, 2 wide from 700M, a length back on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Began awkwardly, raced behind midfield on the inside, 4 lengths back, angled out after passing 400M, made minor progress in straight.
Shifted out at start and bumped, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide behind midfield, angled out after passing 450M, very wide turning in, one-paced in straight.
Began awkwardly, raced at rear on the inside, 7 lengths back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Jumped with them, raced prominently, 2 wide, allowed rival to cross near 700M, 2 lengths back on turn, failed to close off in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out near 400M, very wide turning in, failed to close off in straight.
Began fairly from the widest draw, raced at tail, 7 lengths back, same margin back on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Moderately away, raced prominently but trapped very wide, peaked on turn, emptied early in straight.
In midfield, 2 wide, swung widest on straightening, stormed home impressively to claim its maiden victory.
Eased and obtained position in midfield with cover, closed off nicely to the line.
Sent forward to take rail and led, kept on well to take 3rd. (Blood in trachea)
Raced in front of midfield, wide but with cover, kept kicking and looked likely until final 50M.
Travelled in one-out one-back position, lay in early in straight, one paced.
Sent forward, settled outside the lead, showed no kick in straight.
Urged forward, prominent but wide, gone passing 100M.
At rear, niggled along throughout, closed off fairly late.
Pushed and settled in box-seat, faded in final 150M.
Crowded start, in worse than midfield, 2 wide, made no ground.
Awkward start, settled midfield, on rail, did not threaten. (Mucus and roarer)
Slow out, always at rear, never a factor.

Jumped fairly, settled mainly in 7th in midfield, commenced move inside the 700 metres when wide without cover and came within 1L of race leader 3-wide rounding home bend, sustained effort to grab lead 100 metres out.

Broke well, gradually drifted back to 6th in midfield early in back straight, travelling keenly before swift headway inside the 800 metres to take up running over 600 metres out, led until headed by the winner 100 metres out.

Jumped awkwardly, gradually settled in forward of midfield in 6th on the rail, carried backward rounding the 500 metre bend, angled out for a run into home straight, fought on steadily inside final 100 metres.
Settled in last few from the widest gate, commenced move over 700 metres out circling the field 3-wide to come within 3L of the leader in midfield, made no impression from wide into home straight.

Settled at the back and waited with, came under pressure when detached from field passing the 700 metres, made swift progress round the field 3-wide and swung widest onto home turn, ran on steadily under pressure.

Ridden early before settling in rear of midfield on the rail, dropped back to 9th despite coming under pressure when pace quickened over 700 metres out, ran on steadily down the centre of home straight.

Began well from a wide gate, pressed forward to join the leaders 3-wide rounding first bend, hit the front briefly before taken back to settle outside race leader, remained similar into home straight but soon weakened.
Slightly slow out, settled in rear on the rail dropping to last 500 metres out, saved ground turning for home, kept on same pace without quickening under pressure.

Up with the pace on the rail early stages, pulled forward to lead by half a length turning into back straight, lost advantage 700 metres out and steadied at the 550 metres, gradually weakened under pressure after straightening.
Began well, settled just off the pace on the rail, carried back from 1L 3rd over 700 metres out to 2.5L 7th on home bend, kept on before fading inside final 100 metres.

With leaders early, shifted to one-out-one-back position coming onto first bend, became 2L 4th into back straight and 6th 550 metres out, came under pressure rounding home bend, dropped out tamely inside final 150 metres.
Dropped back early to obtain cover, settle near last 7Ls off the pace, into clear 300M, closed off strongly to get up near line.
Steadied early stages to find cover, held up behind midfield, driven along 400M, ran on well on straightening, couldn't hold off winner late.
Began awkwardly, eased back to last from wide draw, still 6-7Ls to make up at 400M, rallied home strongly to take 3rd before line, nearest finish.

Strode forward to lead, pressed by rival during race, kept on well in straight, run ended 100M, caught by first 3 late. (Jockey : had rival racing directly to its outside, did not believe the horse was disappointing.)
Chased leaders 2-wide, kept on steadily over final 300M, not pace to seriously challenge.
Held up 2-wide in mid-division, kept on mildly turning home, no threat to leaders final 150M.
Taken back to race near the rear, last turning for home, stayed on final 300M without threatening leaders.
Began well, up with early pace before settling ahead of midfield, kept on same pace on straightening, no threat to leaders.
Reserved in midfield 4Ls off leaders, held ground early in the straight, one paced and no threat from 200M. (Mucus.)
Moved up to press the pace on outside, fought hard to hold its position early straight, no extra 150M, weakened away.
Jumped well from draw 1, sat behind leaders, responded fairly turning home, faded mid-straight.
Settled behind mid-division 5-6Ls away, badly unbalanced top of the straight then eased. Unrepresentative run.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced behind midfield on the inside, 6 lengths back on turn, finished off very strongly to score by a narrow margin.
Jumped well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 3 lengths back on turn, finished off strongly to take 2nd, just beaten narrowly.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, found rail near 600M, 7 lengths back on turn, taken wide in straight and finished off very strongly to take a place, nearest on line.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide at rear, 8 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made very good progress in the run home, nearest on line.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide towards rear of midfield, wider turning in, closed off well to be nearest on line.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, 5 lengths back on turn, finished off well without threatening. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began smartly, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, there to turn, hard ridden 250M, hit the front 200M, ran on well to 50M, headed and weakened thereafter.
Began fairly from gate 1, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground throughout, showed limited response in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 10 lengths back, still well back on turn, very wide turning in, made good progress in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began well, trapped very wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, 2 wide from 700M, showed limited response after turning in, weakened final 150M.
Reared as stalls opened and started very slowly, raced at rear on the inside, 9 lengths back on turn, showed limited response in straight, eased final 50M.
Quickly into stride, sent forward to take the lead and set a fast tempo, led by a length on turn, peaked early in straight, headed 200M, weakened thereafter.
