Bumped on jumping, raced prominently, 2 away from the stands' rail, hit the front 450M, kept on very strongly to the line, easily scored, impressive debut.
Made contact shortly after start, sent forward to take the lead, found the stands' rail near 550M, headed 450M, hard ridden after passing 300M, outpaced by the winner final furlong, finished 2nd.
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced prominently on the middle track, hard ridden after passing 400M, finished off well to take a place, no threat to the winner.
Crowded on jumping, positioned 2 to 3 lengths behind the leader in the middle of the track, hard ridden 400M, made some progress to make frame without threatening.

Moderately away, positioned a length behind the leader on the middle track, a bit closer in the middle stages, hard ridden after passing 350M, only showed limited response, weakened gradually final 100M.
Began only fairly from gate 14, positioned a length behind the leader on the stands' rail, hard ridden 300M, finished off evenly.
Bumped start, positioned 2 length behind the leader in the middle of the track, hard ridden after passing 400M, showed limited response, kept on evenly to the line.
Began awkwardly and bumped, positioned 2 length behind the leader on the stands' side, not enough room 350M, bumped approaching 200M, one paced thereafter.
Bumped start, positioned a length behind the leader on the stands' side, hard ridden after passing 300M, showed limited response, weakened final furlong.
Commenced well, raced towards rear on the stands' side, 2 lengths or so back at 400M, no clear running until 150M, failed to make any progress thereafter.
Bumped start, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Bumped on jumping, positioned a length behind the leader, 3 away from the stands' rail, hard ridden after passing 400M, showed limited response, weakened inside final furlong. (Blood in trachea.)
Bumped start and unbalanced, raced in the middle of the track, a length or so back, peaked on run near 300M, weakened final furlong.
Began fairly, raced towards rear, nearer to the middle track, awkwardly placed 400M, peaked 250M, bumped and unbalanced near 200M, weakened thereafter.
Settled in box seat, closed off strongly to score.
At rear, dashed well 250M.
Eased back, trapped 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 550M, run ended 100M.
Midfield, 2 wide, made early move 600M, run ended 100M.
Pushed early, midfield along the fence, lack room 5-3, no dash.
Pushed to take rail and lead, soon emptied 350M.
Eased back, trapped 3-4 wide, no progress.
Settled behind midfield on rail, improved passing 400M, quickened near 100M to score.
Travelled midfield, near the 1000M was left racing wide and without cover, wide on straightening, responded solidly in the straight.
Settled in box seat, asked for effort near 400M, worked home nicely.
Raced at tail, commenced to improve passing 400M, gained some nice late ground in the straight.
Jumped well, settled midfield, placed pressure near 400M, finished well.
Raced towards rear, commenced to improve near 500M, widest on straightening, made some ground in the straight.
Began only fairly, settled midfield on rail, one-paced when asked for effort.
Raced in front of midfield, placed pressure but only one-paced.
Travelled well behind the lead, no response when placed pressure rounding the Home Turn, gave ground in the straight, failed to make impression.
On jumping was crowded, settled behind midfield, wide on straightening, no response in the straight.
Urged along to take lead, led by 2L, came under pressure passing 500M, weakened near 200M.

Raced prominently, checked near the 1100m before getting good run 1,1 after that point. Eased 3 wide approaching corner, dashed to lead at 350m, continued nearly 2L clear inside last 100m, held under 1L advantage on line.
Pushed forward to lead. Headed by winner shortly after cornering, tried hard all the way to line & bridged margin to under 1L on line after being further behind inside last 150m.
Raced on leaders back for majority. Steadied at the 400m when attempting to improve between runners, got clear soon after before finishing well in last 250m to run third.
Pushed forward from outside barrier, shifted to race outside the leader at the 1100m (rider suspended). Hard ridden on cornering, finished off evenly to hold 4th, and beaten 2.5L.
Began only fairly, drifted back to race at the tail. Continued near the tail, around 5L form the lead on cornering before making some late headway between runners in the straight.

Raced in midfield on rail, checked & lost ground near the 1100m. Drifted further back in the middle stages, cornered in second half, 3.5L from lead entering last section before finishing only evenly in straight.

Drifted back to worse than midfield, wide & with cover. Improved to midfield when being left without cover near half-way. Continued to improve when wide, 2L behind on straightening before finishing only fairly in straight.

No early speed, raced just worse than midfield on rail. Inconvenienced near 1100m. Continued near rear on cornering, over 4L from lead entering last section, passed a few tiring runners but never likely.

Steadied from wide gate after the start, shifted across to midfield, 3 wide with cover before shifting one off rail near the 900m. Entered last section under 2L from lead before peaking at the 250m & offering nothing thereafter.

Raced just worse than midfield between runners before being hampered near the 1100m. Shifted wider approaching the corner, straightened second widest 4.5L from lead before making no headway in race to line.

Improved position after the start, raced just forward of midfield before being checked near the 1100m, continued along rail on straightening when 2L from the lead before weakening poorly in the straight.

Had no speed after start, raced third from last early. Inconvenienced & moved 3 wide near 1100m. Forced wider & without cover near the 850m. Forced wider approaching corner before weakening out in straight. Well beaten.

Raced midfield between runners after start before being checked away from heels near the 1100m. Was steadied when awkwardly placed on multiple occasions in middle stages before weakening out poorly in straight. Well beaten.

Slow to begin & raced at tail after start. Moved into 3 wide line with cover after first section. Hampered near the 1100m & raced keenly. Forced very wide approaching corner, straightened the widest before weakening poorly.
Began well, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 4 lengths back turning in, finished off very strongly to score by a neck.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, a bit closer on turn, finished off strongly to take 2nd, just beaten by a neck.
Average to begin, positioned on rail behind midfield, angled out after passing 500M, not enough room early in straight, made good progress final 200M to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Jumped well, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, challenged the leader from 500M, kept on well until peaked 100M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Commenced well, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length, challenged by rival turning in, kept on well until passing 100M, headed 50M, weakened thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from gate 8, raced 2 wide at rear, very wide turning in, made some headway in straight.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2 lengths or so back on turn, showed limited response early in straight, peaked near 200M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Moderately away, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, made no progress in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 8 lengths back, closer on turn but still the last, failed to make any progress in straight.
Began smartly, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Raced handy, on stand-side, finished off strongly to take lead late and scored by a neck.
Sent forward, led outright along the outside rail, drifted inwards from 350M, stayed on well for 2nd.
Travelled in front of midfield, along the outside rail, ran on nicely to take 3rd.
Slow to jump then raced at the rear, along the outside rail, ran home strongly inside 150M.
Settled on-pace, remained on centre-track, remained one paced throughout. (Lame left front)
Checked 100M after the start, settled behind midfield on centre-track, continued on fairly.
Slow out, at rear along the outside rail, made good dash in final 150M.
Bucked shortly after the jump, recovered just in front of midfield on centre-track, faded from 200M.(Must trial)
Settled to race in midfield, on centre-track, ran on evenly to the line.
In behind midfield, on centre track, did not threaten
Slightly awkward to begin, midfield on stand-side, not competitive.
Jumped awkward, settled midfield on centre track, run ended 250M out.
Stumbled at start, settled some 3L back in 5th on the rail, baulked early in straight until obtaining a clear run 300 metres out, unleashed late burst of speed to snatch victory 70 metres out.
Ridden to lead after a moderate start attempting to make all, went over 1L clear under pressure early in straight but found winner too good when overhauled 70 metres out.
Slightly slow out, settled towards the rear some 5L back in 7th on the rail, remained similar into straight, obtained a clear passage inside the 300 metres out, ran on without threatening.
Settled just off the pace in 2nd 2-wide, faded steadily under pressure after straightening.
Ridden early, gradually shifted back to 2L 4th for cover, came under pressure upon straightening, kept on same pace without quickening.
Settled over 3L back in 6th 2-wide, looked yielding ground early in straight but produced some late impression inside final 100 metres. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Niggled along one back in 3rd on the rail, came under pressure upon straightening, dropped out inside the 200 metres.

Bumped at the start, taken back to the rear from the wide gate, detached rounding home bend, inconvenienced for a run 300 metres out and made no impression thereafter. (Multiple limb lameness next day)
Jumped awkwardly, settled in rear in 8th from a wide gate some 5L back, remained well behind into straight, unable to quicken to threaten. (Tactic questioned)
From draw 12 crossed to lead before home turn, quickened up pace 600M, kicked on strongly to be 4Ls clear mid-straight, won unchallenged.
Began well from draw 1, settled ahead of midfield, kept on to go 2nd 150M, no threat to the runaway winner.
Crossed to the fence tracking leader, not pace to challenge winner on straightening, lost 2nd 150M out, held on for 3rd late.
Settled down behind midfield 6Ls off the pace, stayed on moderately for 4th without threatening the runaway winner.
Taken back to last from wide draw, 10Ls off the pace middle stages, pushed along 550M, made some progress but no impression on leaders.
Tracked leader 2-wide, not quickened top of straight, faded passing 300M.
Held up behind mid-division, shuffled back home turn, stayed on final 400M passing beaten horses.
Chased leaders, wide no cover from 1000M, weakened from 300M, soon out of contention.
Began awkwardly, dropped back to race near the rear, wide into straight, made limited progress final 400M, never reached contention.
Began awkwardly, raced keenly behind midfield, ran on fairly in straight, never threatened.
In midfield, raced keenly 1100M, kept on one paced from 400M, no extra 200M.
Slow to begin, always towards rear, failed to pick up turning home.
Settled behind midfield, came under pressure 500M, dropped away in straight, finished tailed out. (Blood trachea.)
Held up 3-wide behind mid-division, struggled to hold position 500M, soon beaten, finished tailed out.

Began smartly from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably in the middle stages, challenged by rival turning in, kicked clear early in straight, ran on strongly to the line, easily scored.
Jumped well, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, closed off well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Began well, positioned 2 wide, 4 lengths or so back, commenced move after passing 650M, 3 wide turning in, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Taken back from gate 11, raced at rear on the inside, 7 lengths back, moved closer along the rail on turn, angled out 400M, made good progress final 200M to be nearest on line.
Began well, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, challenged the leader turning in, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly thereafter.

Reared leaving stalls and started slowly, raced behind midfield on the inside, commenced move after passing 600M, very wide turning in, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Average to begin, positioned on rail in midfield, 3 to 4 lengths back, saved ground on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, no clear running early in straight, made no progress final 200M.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide at rear, angled out 500M, very wide into straight, one-paced in the run home.
Out with rest, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 3 lengths back on turn, weakened gradually in straight.
Jumped with them, raced behind midfield on the outside, 5 lengths or so back, no cover throughout, weakened early in straight when hard run took effect.
Taken back from gate 9, raced towards rear on the inside, closer on turn, 3 wide into straight, finished off very strongly to score by a narrow margin.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, wider turning in, not enough room early in straight, cleared 300M, hit the front 150M, kept on very well, just unable to hold off the winner on line.

Average to begin, showed no early speed, raced behind midfield on the inside, unbalanced near 850M, angled out 450M, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, finished off well to take a place, just narrowly beaten.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, closer on turn, finished off well to make frame without threatening.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, 4 lengths or so back on turn, made very good progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Began well, sent forward to take the lead, found rail approaching 800M, challenged by rivals turning in, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Jumped well, raced 2 wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, 3 wide on turn, showed some response early in straight, peaked on run 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Shifted out at start and bumped, positioned on rail better than midfield, moved closer along the rail on turn, no clear running until passing 150M, showed limited response thereafter.
Away with them, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, carried wider after passing 650M, very wide into straight, finished off evenly.
Out with rest, raced 2 wide behind midfield, carried wider after passing 650M, very wide turning in, showed some response early in straight, no clear run from 300M, eased final 50M.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, 4 wide turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Slowly away, raced at rear, 7 lengths or so back, moved closer along the rail on turn, made no progress in straight.
Average to begin, sent forward to race prominently, allowed rival to cross after passing 900M, 2 wide from 750M, challenged the leader turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 200M.

Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Began well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on very well in straight to hold off the challenger.
Shifted out at start and made contact, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, there to turn, kept on well in straight to take 2nd, always held.
Taken back from gate 7, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground to turn, made good progress in straight to take a place.
Crowded start, raced in midfield on the inside, saved ground to turn, finished off evenly, missed 3rd on line.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide at rear, wider after entering the back straight, commenced move 600M, very wide turning in, finished off well to be nearest on line.
Crowded on jumping, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position to turn, angled out 450M, finished off evenly.
Jumped with them, raced towards rear on the inside, 6 lengths back on turn, taken wide in straight and made minor progress.
Began smartly, raced 2 wide, 2 to 3 lengths back, angled out 500M, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide behind midfield, dropped to last on turn, very wide into straight, one-paced in the run home.

Slowly away, raced at tail in the early stages, 10 lengths or so back, commenced move after entering the back straight, 4 wide better than midfield on turn, weakened early in straight, eased final 100M.
Began only fairly, raced at rear on the outside early, moved a bit closer after passing 1600M, raced 3 wide in midfield in the middle stages, peaked on turn, weakened 400M, eased final furlong.
Moderately away, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, there to turn, peaked 500M, weakened thereafter, eased early in straight.
Midfield along the fence, progressed steadily 300M to score.
Obtained box seat, ran on well for 2nd.
Pushed to take rail and lead, overhauled 150M.
Eased to rear, 2 wide, progressed steadily 250M.
Trapped 3 wide just off the leaders, held ground in straight.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 2-3 wide, made ground 200m.
Hard ridden early, trapped 3 wide in midfield, no dash.
Eased back, took rail, crowded for room 350M, no dash.
At rear, no progress.
Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, on heels 400M, emptied 300M.
Eased to rear, trapped 3 wide, never improved.
Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, dropped off rapidly 500M.
At the start heavily bumped with a runner and lost right front plate, niggled to race in box seat, issued challenged passing 100M, worked home strongly to score.
Raced in handy position, travelled keenly near 1000M, gained nicely ground in the straight, missed by SH.
Jumped sharply and took lead, travelled nicely, responded solidly in the straight, missed by Head.
Jumped well, raced outside the lead, placed pressure near 400M, finished well.
Settled midfield on rail, asked for effort passing 500M, made some nice ground in the straight.
Settled midfield, in middle stages lay out, finished one-paced.
Taken back at start, raced at rear, widest on straightening, worked home one-paced.
Very slow to begin, in middle stages travelled keenly, limited response when placed pressure, stalls test.
At the start heavily bumped with a runner, became badly unbalanced and lost ground, raced behind midfield on rail, no response in the straight.
Taken back at start, raced behind midfield, no response in the straight.
Taken back at start but wide and without cover throughout, raced behind midfield, gave ground in the straight.
Fractious in barriers and slow to begin, made the turn after the 1000M very awkwardly, raced towards rear, weakened in the straight, stalls test.
Made light work of gate 11 to come across & lead easily after start. Raced clear on straightening & maintained comfortable margin all the way to line to win with something in hand.

Bumped heavily at start before getting good position in midfield away from rail. Eased 3 wide to improve approaching 400m mark, closed off well in straight to move to second at the 125m. Clear of third.
Raced on leaders back throughout. Fought on satisfactorily in the straight to hold third, 2.5L behind easy winner.
Lost ground when crowded at start & consequently raced third last on rail for majority. Shifted inwards in the straight when making some steady ground from the rear.

Bumped after the start, raced wide at first bend before steadying and racing 1,1 from the 900m. Entered last section just over 2L from the lead before finishing only one paced in straight & beaten 3L on line.
Shifted down to rail after first bend & raced in midfield along the inside for the majority. Cornered around 3L from the lead before making no improvement & being beaten a similar margin on line.
Bumped heavily at start shifting across to race 3 wide with cover in midfield. Entered last section 5L from the lead before holding position in midfield in dash to line.
Bumped at start before racing in midfield on rail throughout. Moved away from the rail approaching the corner when 4.5L from lead weakening a further length in the straight. No threat.
Ridden forward at start before racing outside the leader. Hard ridden prior to cornering before weakening out in straight. (Bled).
Steadied after the start & shifted back to the tail. Continued over 7L behind approaching the corner before making no headway in dash to line.

Unbalanced & shifted out at start before being steadied & taken back near the tail. Raced ungenerously behind runners in middle stages. Shifted wider entering last section when 6.5L from lead before failing to improve.
Badly crowded on jumping & consequently raced at the tail. Stayed close to the rail in the straight but made no improvement & was long last.

Taken back from gate 10, raced at rear on the outside, 6 lengths or so back, commenced move after passing 800M, took the lead 500M, bumped 350M, kept on very well in straight to hold off the challengers.
Jumped with them, positioned a length behind the leader on the inside there to turn, finished off strongly to take 2nd, just beaten by a neck.
Began fairly, showed no early speed, raced at rear on the inside, sent forward after passing 800M, 3 wide on turn, showed good response early in straight, peaked 100M, ran on evenly to take a place.
Began well from gate 1, raced in midfield on the inside, angled out 450M, closed off well to make frame without threatening.

Jumped well from the widest draw, sent forward to take the lead, enjoyed the easy lead in the middle stages, headed near 500M, bumped and unbalanced 350M, kept on well early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Crowded on jumping, raced behind midfield on the inside, 6 lengths back, similar position on turn, made some headway in straight.
Began fairly, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Shifted in at start and made contact, raced 2 wide behind midfield, dropped to last on turn, 7 lengths back, made some headway in straight.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield in the early stages, 6 lengths back on turn, hard ridden from 400M, failed to make any progress in straight.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide towards rear of midfield, very wide turning in, weakened early in straight.
Began well, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, peaked on turn, emptied early in straight.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced better than midfield on the outside, found cover near 800M, unable to maintain position on turn, eased early in straight.
In midfield, 2 wide initially, shifted 3 wide to follow runner at 600M, kept kicking to score by 3/4L.
Settled in front of midfield, didn't have to make too much use of, tight at 150M, continued nicely for 2nd.
Bumped start, raced behind the lead, about 2L off, raced on fairly to take 3rd. (See Incident Report)
Travelled in about midfield, along the rail, tight near 150M, continued on well to the line.
Pushed then settled to race in front of midfield, 2 wide, ran on fairly. (See Incident Report)
Niggled in the early stages, in worse than midfield, 2 wide, making ground until lay in from 200M out.
Bumped start and lost ground, raced in worse than midfield, along the rail, ran on steadily.
At rear initially, made move 900M out, wide and no cover from thereon, crowded at 200M, didn't show much prior anyhow.
Sat just behind midfield, along the rail, closest near 200M, couldn't hold ground thereafter.
Took back, remained at the rear, improved a little in the straight.
Rolled forward, took lead on rail, travelled keenly, emptied near 200M.
Asked and settled on-pace, under pressure from 600M, run ended soon entering the straight. (See Incident Report)
Pressed forward to lead from a wide gate, obtained rails run over 600 metres out, held over 1L advantage turning in kicking 2L clear inside the 200 metres, won readily.
Taken back from the widest gate towards the rear racing wide without cover, commenced move rounding home bend and ran on well between runners in straight, did best work late.
Driven forward from a wide gate, obtained near rails run in 2nd inside the 700 metres, came under pressure turning in but failed to quicken to threaten.
Broke well, gradually settled in forward of midfield in 6th some 4L off the pace, came under pressure to challenge after straiightening but unable to sustain effort inside final 50 metres.

Soon dropped to rear of midfield despite ridden along, travelled mainly 3-wide without cover most of the way, went widest turning in, kept on same pace without quickening under pressure down the centre of the straight.
Jumped well, close up on the rail settling 2 back in joint 3rd, saved ground on the inside turning in, found nothing under pressure in the run to the line.

Slightly slow out, improved steadily along the rail to midfield in joint 7th some 5L back 700 metres out, lost about 1L inside the 600 metres, saved ground turning in, one-paced under pressure in the run to the line.
Began fairly, never far off and mainly 2 back in 4th, similar turning for home, one-paced under pressure. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Settled in rear from a wide gate, made some headway under pressure approaching home turn, made no impression after straightening.
Ridden along from a wide gate mainly 3-wide without cover in first few, went wider turning for home, found nothing under pressure, beaten when inconvenienced 150 metres out.
Crowded at start, soon dropped to last despite ridden along, tailed-off from rounding home bend.
Began fairly, settled just worse than midfield, hampered and lost position over 500 metres out, made no impression thereafter.
Taken back to last 8Ls off the fast pace, swung home widest, chased strongly from 300M, rattled home late to take lead near line.
Held up towards the rear in a fast run race, moved closer from 600M, responded well on straightening and tried right to the line, came up short.
Crossed to the lead 1200M, soon taken on by rival setting fast pace in front, kicked 2L clear early straight, caught by first 2 100M, held on well for 3rd.
Chased leaders in a fast run race, stayed on steadily over final 300M but never a winning hope.
Steadied early stages to find cover, reserved behind midfield in a fast run race, shaken up 600M, ran on well early straight, peaked on its run 150M, well held by leaders late stages.
Settled down in 5th just ahead of midfield, forward move from 600M chasing leaders, held 2nd from top of straight, run ended 150M, out-finished.
Taken back from wide draw, held up near last 7Ls off the fast pace, checked 300M and shifted out to obtain run, stayed on but never reached contention.
Settled behind mid-division, wide no cover after 1000M, driven out 500M, not going the pace to challenge.
Always prominent tracking leaders on inside, driven inside 400M but not quickened, faded mid-straight.
Held up in midfield, moved forward from 600M, wide final turn, couldn't sustain run passing 250M, dropped away.
Caught wide no cover until 1000M then settled outside the lead, struggled to hold position home turn, weakened turning in.
Began fairly from draw 1, settled midfield, lost ground 600M shuffled back to the rear, failed to run on in straight.
Began well from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, hit the front 200M, kept on strongly to the line and scored.
Began well from a wide draw, raced 3 wide with no cover, 2 to 3 lengths back, found a 2 wide position near 600M, commenced move after passing 450M, finished off strongly to take 2nd, always held.
Bumped start, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, closed off well take a place without threatening.
Out with rest, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made good progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Moderately away, positioned 2 wide in midfield, 4 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, taken wide in straight and finished off strongly to be nearest on line.
Taken back from gate 9, raced at rear on the inside, 6 lengths or so back, there to turn, showed good response early in straight, blocked near 150M, made some progress final 100M.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2 lengths or so back, a bit closer on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Moderately away, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide, challenged the leader turning in, showed limited response early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened gradually thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped with them, raced at tail, 6 to 7 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made minor progress in the run home.
Jumped well from the widest draw, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, peaked early in straight, headed 200M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Away with them, raced 3 wide with cover, 4 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, finished off evenly.
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide, 5 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, very wide into straight, one-paced in the run home.

Taken back from gate 12, raced at tail, 8 lengths or so back, closer on turn but still the last, no daylight early in straight, cleared near 250M, finished off very strongly to score.
Away with them, trapped wide, a length or so back, slightly taken back after passing 800M, 3 to 4 lengths back on turn, made good progress in straight to take 2nd on line.
Began well, raced 3 wide with cover, 3 lengths or so back, made contact near 800M, very wide turning in, finished off well to take a place.
Began fairly from gate 1, raced prominently on rail, allowed rival to cross 700M, sat right behind the leader on turn, hit the front 250M, peaked and headed 50M, missed 3rd on line.
Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the inside, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, hard ridden 300M, made some progress thereafter.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, unable to obtain clear running until 150M, finished off evenly.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 3 lengths or so back on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Began well, raced prominently but 4 wide early, 3 wide from 800M, 2 lengths or so back on turn, made some progress early in straight, peaked on run 100M, weakened thereafter.
Slightly slow out, raced at rear on rail, saved ground on turn, kept on evenly to 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Quickly into stride, sent forward to take the lead, trapped 5 wide early, found rail near 700M, led by a length on turn, peaked early in straight, headed 250M, weakened final furlong.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced behind midfield on the outside, made contact near 800M, very wide turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Quickly into stride, raced prominently but trapped very wide early, slightly taken back after passing 900M, 3 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, hampered 200M, weakened thereafter.
Average to begin, raced prominently but trapped very wide early, 2 wide from 700M, a length back turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Moderately away, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths back, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Eased to sit behind midfield along the fence, dashed well 300M to score.
Trapped wide and without cover throughout, ran on well for 2nd.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 2 wide, In the Straight raced greenly and shifted ground on a number of occasions, dashed well.
Hard ridden forward, 3 wide, just held ground.
Pushed to take rail and lead, weakened 200M.
Slow away, on heels early, at back along the fence, dashed well 250M.
Box seat, held up badly and checked in straight, not tested. After the race was noted to be making an abnormal respiratory noise. A subsequent endoscopic exam confirmed the horse to be a "roarer".
Eased at start, 2 wide, raced flat until 200M dashed well.
Eased at start, 2 wide, ran on ok.
Eased to sit in midfield, 2 wide, little dash 300M run ended 100M.
Pressed forward, sat 2 wide, out of fuel 250M.
At back, 3 wide, never competitive.
Hard ridden forward, 2 wide, emptied 400M.
Eased back, never a factor.
Raced behind midfield, commenced to improve near 600M, responded strongly in the straight, scored unchallenged.
Niggled to race in the lead, commenced to improve passing 500M, finished nicely.
Settled in one-back-one-off position, asked for effort near 500M, worked home well.
Raced at back, widest on straightening, gained some late ground in the straight.
Settled in box seat, tried to improve but only one-paced in the straight.
Settled midfield on rail, had difficulty obtain clear running in the early part of straight, worked home one-paced.
Slow out, raced towards rear, kept on rail rounding the Home Turn, one-paced.
Slow out, raced at rear, limited response when asked.
Urged along but failed to muster speed, left racing wide and without cover passing 1800M, then ridden to race outside the lead at 1400M, gave ground near 200M.
Settled midfield, placed pressure passing 450M, weakened passing 250M.
Raced detached despite being ridden along, no response when placed pressure.

Raced in midfield away from rail throughout. Eased 3 wide to improve near the 500m mark, entered last section under 3L from lead, dashed strongly to lead at the 200m before drawing away for very easy win.

Raced worse than midfield early before improving position in middle stages when left 3 deep without cover. Entered last section 4L behind before closing strongly to snare second in late stages. Ran well, no match for winner.

Raced outside the leader early before getting good position 1,1 near the 850m. Moved up to share lead fleetingly approaching the 200m before passed by winner. Held third after being caught for second in final few strides.

Enjoyed good run in midfield away from the rail throughout. Eased 3 wide approaching corner, dashed up to share lead momentarily approaching the 200m before battling away to just miss a placing. Not far from second.

Steadied after the start & shifted back from wide barrier to race second last. Continued a long way back on cornering, 6.5L from the lead entering last section before making steady late ground to midfield. (Rider questioned).

Shifted behind runners after the start. Raced third from last throughout middle stages. Eased wider on straightening, over 5L from the lead entering last section before making some late ground to midfield from the back.
Drifted back after the start to race just worse than midfield between runners. Entered last section 5L from the lead before battling away to midfield without threatening.
Enjoyed soft run on leaders back throughout. Offered little in the straight before weakening out in the final 250m.

Raced in midfield & shifted down to the rail near the 1000m mark. Raced tight & awkwardly placed when shifting off rail on cornering, entered last section under 3L from the lead before peaking mid-straight & weakening.

Slow to begin & consequently raced a clear last throughout. Continued at tail on straightening, 6.5L from the lead before passing a few tiring runners but never featuring. (Mucus in trachea, must trial).
Began only fairly before mustering & improving slightly to midfield along rail. Entered last section just over 4L from the lead before weakening in dash to line.

Crowded on jumping, shifted behind runners before improving slightly along the rail to race worse than midfield. Stayed along rail in straight, made some ground near the 300m before peaking & weakening sharply last furlong.
Showed early speed to come across from outside barrier to lead. Continued in lead until being headed at the 250m mark & weakening sharply in last furlong.
Pushed forward, raced wide early before improving to race outside leader from the 900m. Peaked on effort before the 300m mark & weakened poorly to long last.
Quickly into stride, took the lead easily, led by a length, challenged after passing 600M, kept on very well in straight to hold off the challengers.
Began only fairly, showed no early speed, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, kept to inside after straightening and made very good progress to be nearest on line.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, kept on well in straight to take a place.
Away with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, there to turn, not enough room and bumped early in straight, made good progress final 150M to make frame.
Jumped well, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, easy run on turn, kept on evenly in straight.
Moderately away, raced at tail, 6 lengths or so back turning in, taken wide in straight and finished off very strongly to be nearest on line.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider after passing 500M, made some progress in straight.
Began smartly from a wide draw, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide, challenged the leader from 600M, kept on well early in straight, peaked on run 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail behind midfield, saved ground on turn, bumped early in straight, not enough room near 200M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Began well from the widest draw, raced 2 wide in midfield, carried wider after passing 500M, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, very wide turning in, made little progress in straight.
Taken back from gate 13, raced 3 wide behind midfield, no cover for the majority of the race, 4 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, very wide turning in, showed limited response in straight.
Out with rest, positioned on rail in midfield, angled out after passing 550M, raced tight early in straight, not enough room 200M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Bumped start, in about midfield, wide and without cover until near 600M, fought on gamely and caught leader just in time to score by a nose.
Sent forward, took rail and led, kept kicking but couldn't hold off late challenge, missed by a nose.
Bumped start, settled midfield, 2 wide, awkward on heels near 400M, closed off strongly thereafter.
Sent forward, settled to race outside the lead, kept battling but missed out on the minor placings.
Travelled in midfield, along the rail, ran on nicely to the line.
Jumped only fairly, recovered to be front of midfield, along the rail, ran on well to the line.
Taken back, at the tail, 2 wide at turns, made impressive run home late.
Rolled forward, settled one-out one-back, emptied for final 150M.
Raced in behind midfield, 2-3 wide, ran on moderately.
Travelled in front of midfield, shifted out 3 wide without cover at 650M, bumped at 400M, found nothing in straight. (Minor laceration left hind heel and See Incident Report)
Niggled along, took box-seat, run ended approaching 200M.
In front of midfield, 2 wide, raced keenly, crowded at 500M and 400M, kept going nonetheless.
Took back from wide draw, at rear 2 wide, never threaten.
Eased back then shifted to rail, raced mid-back, not competitive.
Moderate start from the one draw, took up running on the rail over 900 metres out, cruised clear inside final 200 metres.
Soon dropped to forward of midfield in 6th despite ridden along, 3-wide rounding home bend and slightly wider into straight, produced good late impression to snatch distant 2nd on the line.
Ridden positively from a wide gate, settled just off the pace outside the leader coming onto home bend, kept on same pace without quickening in straight.
Began well, gradually settled over 2L back in 5th, in similar position turning in, kept on same pace without quickening.
Began fairly, improved steadily before settling within 2L of pace in 3rd on the rail, one-paced in home straight.
Crowded at start, travelled mainly in rear of midfield, switched for a run 300 metres out, produced good late impression closing stages.
Towards the rear to straight, kept on well. (Tactic questioned)
Settled in midfield, gained slightly closer along the rail rounding home bend, found nothing under pressure in straight.
Held up wide in midfield early, allowed to improve to joint 3rd when wide without cover coming onto home bend, gradually weakened after straightening.
Settled in last few from a wide gate, saved ground on the rail turning for home, ran home one-paced. (Lame next day)
Always in last few, behind runners early in straight, made no further impression.
Reserved in a 3-wide position behind midfield, kept on same pace when driven on straightening, never threatened.
Soon taken back to last, went wide rounding home bend and wider into straight, found nothing.
Settled midfield off the fast pace early stages, took closer order 800M, 3rd turning for home, quickened to a decisive lead 350M, driven out final 200M, held on just.
Restrained in mid-division early stages, moved closer home turn, picked up well passing 300M, hit the line hard to just miss.
Towards rear of midfield early stages, over 10Ls off the fast pace, moved closer to be 6Ls behind making home turn, stayed on well in straight, nearest finish.
Caught wide early, steadied towards the rear of the field to obtain cover, 8Ls off leader at 800M, swung wide into straight, chased right to the line, made ground late without serious threat.
Not hurried after the start, held up towards the rear of midfield, 4Ls to make up 400M, stayed on mildly to line, couldn't accelerate enough.

Crossed to the lead 1600M, set fast pace until 1200M, taken on by rival 600M out, fought on until no extra 100M, lost several places near line. (Jockey questioned re the fast pace he set early stages)
Drifted back from wide draw, settled near last over 15Ls off the pace early stages, moved closer when pace slackened 1000M, in the 13th spot 400M, made some ground but too far back to threaten.
Badly unbalanced and lost ground shortly after the start, in midfield along the 2-path, pressed along 600M, not quickened on straightening, never reached contention.
Chased leader, in clear 2nd until pace slackened halfway, moved up to vie for lead 600M, under pressure to stick with leader straightening, tried hard but faded over final 300m.
Never better than midfield, saved ground along the inside throughout, failed to make any impact on straightening.
Slow to begin, recovered to race ahead of midfield, moved closer to pace halfway, wide no cover from 900M, couldn't sustain run final 250M. (Mucus.)
In 3rd behind clear leaders, moved closer halfway when pace slackened, under heavy pressure 600M, gave ground shortly on straightening. (Jockey unable to explain for the disappointing run.)
Shifted across behind runners from wide draw, always at the rear, failed to run on final 400M, never in the picture.
From wide draw taken across behind runners, settled near the rear, pushed along 500M, lacked finishing effort in the straight.
Jumped well from a wide draw, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length on turn, kept on strongly in straight to hold off the challengers.
Began smartly, positioned 2 wide, a length or so back, angled out 500M, hard ridden after passing 300M, finished off strongly to take 2nd, always held.
Made contact shortly after start, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground to turn, bumped early in straight, finished off well to take a place without threatening.
Began well, raced 3 wide better than midfield, carried wider after passing 500M, finished off evenly.

Made contact at start, raced better than midfield but trapped very wide early, sent forward after passing 900M, positioned 2 wide in 2nd on turn, kept on evenly to 200M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Bumped start, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, there to turn, kept on evenly early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Bumped start, positioned 4 lengths behind the leader on rail, a bit closer on turn, finished off evenly.
Crowded on jumping, raced towards rear on the outside early, found a 2 wide spot near 700M, angled out 450M, made minor progress in straight.

Jumped with them, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, 3 wide after passing 800M and moved a bit closer, very wide into straight, showed some response early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Slowly away, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, one-paced in straight.
Out with rest, raced 2 wide at rear, 5 lengths or so back on turn, one-paced in the run home.
Made contact at start, raced behind midfield on the outside, 4 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, made no progress in straight.
Away with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, bumped early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Crowded on jumping, raced at tail, 7 to 8 lengths back, still last turning in, made no progress in straight.
Fast into stride, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on very well in straight to hold off the challenger.
Began smartly from a wide draw, raced prominently, 2 wide, there to turn, finished off well to take 2nd, always held.
Started very slowly, raced towards rear on rail, saved ground on turn, finished off strongly on the inside to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Taken back form gate 9, positioned on rail behind midfield, 2 wide turning in, made some progress in straight to make frame.
Slowly away, raced at rear on the inside, 2 wide on turn, hard ridden approaching 300M, made some headway in the run home.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide towards rear, 3 wide turning in, made some headway early in straight, peaked on run 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Bounded in air on jumping losing some ground, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 3 wide after passing 850M, very wide turning in, made some progress in straight.
Away with them, raced 3 wide slightly better than midfield, no cover after passing 1000M, moved closer on turn, showed some response early in straight, no extra final 150M.
Began well from the widest draw, raced 3 wide behind midfield, angled out after passing 500M, very wide turning in, bumped early in straight, made some progress thereafter.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, commenced move after passing 550M, very wide turning in, bumped 300M, made minor progress thereafter. (Lost right front plate near 950M.)
Bumped start, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out 550M, showed limited response in straight.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide, 2 lengths back, similar position on turn, angled out 450M, inconvenienced near 300M, weakened inside final furlong.
Shifted out at start and bumped, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, there to turn, angled out 450M, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter. (Lame right front leg.)

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Began smartly, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 3 wide turning in, finished off strongly to score.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail better than midfield, 2-1/2L back on turn, finished off strongly to take 2nd, always held.
Away with them, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, 5 lengths back on turn, taken wide in straight and finished off strongly to take a place, nearest on line.
Began fairly from a wide draw, raced 3 wide behind midfield early, 2 wide from 600M, 6 lengths back on turn, made very good progress in straight to make frame, nearest on line.
Shifted out at start and made contact, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, made some progress in straight.
Began only fairly and crowded, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some headway in straight.
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide at rear, commenced move 450M, very wide turning in, made very good progress in straight without threatening.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 lengths back on turn, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Moderately away, sent forward to race prominently, took the lead near 650M, led by 1/2L turning in, peaked and headed 200M, weakened final 100M.
Bumped on jumping, raced towards rear on the inside, 7 lengths back on turn, showed some response in straight. (Lame right front leg.)
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced at rear throughout, never a threat. (Lame right front leg.)
Jumped well from the widest draw, took the early lead but trapped wide, headed 650M, 2 wide on turn, weakened early in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Box seat, closed off strongly 300M to score by a narrow margin.
Made contact with a rail in Parade Ring and was passed suitable to race by the Vet. Eased back, 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 500M.
Hard ridden to take and rail and lead, ran on well for 3rd.
Slow away, pushed to sit in midfield, however trapped 3 wide, moved forward from 1000M into the lead, hung on well until 150M weakened.
Hard ridden early, midfield along the rails, progressed steadily 250M. Substantial amount of blood in the horse's trachea after racing.
In front of midfield, 2 wide, made steady ground 250M.
Slow away, behind midfield on the fence, progressed steadily 250M.
Eased back, lack room 300M, made steady ground.
Slow away, took rail at rear, lack room 4-2, made some ground.
Crowded for room on jumping, at back, 2 wide, ran on fairly. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Pressed forward, sat 2 wide, emptied 300M.
Eased back, 2 wide, never competitive. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Settled behind midfield, improved passing 400M, quickened near 100M to score.
Urged along then steadied to obtain cover passing 1600M, settled towards rear, improved near 700M, responded solidly in the straight.
Niggled forward, travelled wide and without cover throughout, raced in front of midfield, commenced to improve passing 600M, responded nicely in the straight.
Took lead with nice early speed, travelled keenly in middle stages, asked near 400M, finished well.
Settled in one-back-one-off position, asked for effort near 500M, worked home well.
Settled in box seat, kept on rail rounding the Home Turn, finished OK.
Taken back at start, near 1350M was checked when crowded, commenced to improve near 500M, widest on straightening, finished one-paced.
Settled behind midfield on rail, near 1350M was badly crowded, from passing 300M until 200M was badly held up, made some late ground.
Travelled midfield on rail, near 1400M was checked when crowded for room, worked home one-paced.
Settled midfield, tried to improve near 500M, limited response in the straight.
Taken back at start, in the straight placed pressure but no response.
Niggled to race outside the lead, placed pressure near 500M, gave ground in the straight.

Pushed forward to race prominently after start before hanging inwards when being left wide without cover around first bend. Only around 2L form lead on cornering before making continual ground to strike lead in late stages.

Prominent before being crossed & behind leading duo. Raced keenly & shifted ground around first bend before racing tight when near heals on straightening. Hung inwards when closing off well before narrowly beaten on line.

Raced wide when between runners in midfield before becoming keen, & being tightened & checked near half-way. Entered last section 3.5L from the lead before closing strongly to be narrowly beaten with legitimate excuse.

Steadied, taken back to rearward position. Cornered 5L from lead before shifting back inwards to obtain clear running. Closed strongly last furlong, squeezing into tight running in final strides before being narrowly beaten.

Raced in midfield on rail throughout, only 2L from lead at the 400m. Continued along inside in the straight, under 1L from the lead at the 100m mark before being hampered in the final 50m. Only beaten a length on line.
No early speed & raced at the tail. Continued a clear last entering last section, 7L from the lead, before making good late ground to midfield from a long way behind.
Mustered speed after the start to lead & shift down to rail near the 700m. Held narrow lead until being joined near the 75m mark before being badly tightened & checked near the 50m mark.

Raced just worse than midfield early before being forced 4 wide with cover after the first bend when racing tight with hampered opponent. Forced second widest on cornering before finishing only one paced in last furlong.
Showed customary early speed to come across from outside gate to race outside the leader. Emptied out soon after cornering before weakening quickly in last 150m.

Crowded on jumping before mustering speed to midfield when racing between runners. Crowded near the 600m mark before entering last section only 3.5L from lead. Peaked on effort soon after straightening & weakened late.

Began only fairly & raced very wide in midfield throughout. Left without cover after the first bend, widest runner on cornering before playing no part in dash to line after having poor run in transit.

Slowest to begin & consequently raced at the tail early before moving slightly closer near half-way. Steadied at first bend when continuing along inside. Cornered around 4.5L from lead before weakening to last in straight.
Commenced well, positioned 2 wide, 1-1/2L back, there to turn, angled out after passing 400M, finished off strongly to score.
Began well, positioned on rail better than midfield, 2 lengths or so back, saved ground throughout, hard ridden 300M, finished off well to take 2nd.
Crowded on jumping, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, angled out after passing 400M, no clear run early in straight, made good progress final 200M to take a place, nearest on line.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, 3 lengths back, 2 wide from 450M, awkwardly placed early in straight, closed off well to make frame without threatening.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide better than midfield early, found a 2 wide spot near 750M, commenced move after passing 450M, very wide turning in, finished off evenly.
Bumped start and unbalanced, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 lengths back, same margin back on turn, unable to obtain clear running until approaching final 50M, made some progress thereafter.
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced at rear on the inside, 6 lengths or so back, same position on turn, no clear run until final 50M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Slightly slow out and bumped, positioned on rail behind midfield, 5 lengths back, saved ground on turn, showed some response early in straight, peaked on run 100M, weakened thereafter.
Began only fairly, raced at tail, 7 lengths back, same margin back on turn, showed limited response in straight. (Blood in trachea.)
Jumped well, sent forward to race prominently on the inside, shared lead on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened thereafter.
Moderately away from the widest draw, raced prominently but 3 wide, a length back on turn, carried wider after passing 400M, weakened gradually in straight. (Lame right front leg next day morning.)
Bumped start, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide, shared lead on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened and eased final furlong.
In midfield, wide but always had cover, finished off strongly in the straight, scored by a short-head.
Slow to jump, remained at rear along the rail, kept challenging, impressive but had to settle for 2nd.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, awkward at 250M, kept on nicely to take 3rd.
Outside lead initially, got cover at 900M when another improved, ran on well to the line.
Sat just behind midfield, 2 wide, made ground and hit the line fairly.
Travelled in midfield, along the rail, held up near 250M, ran on nicely thereafter.
Raced in box-seat, about 1-1/2L off, kept on one paced to the line.
Jumped awkward then taken back, at tail throughout, closed off fairly late.
Showed no speed, midfield initially, improved slightly when left wide at 900M, emptied at 100M.
Eased back, at rear 2 wide, awkward to heels at 300M, improved slightly.
Handy initially, wide until improved to the lead near 900M, faded passing 200M.
Sent forward, shared lead on the rail, run ended approaching 200M.
Ridden forward to soon join the leader, settled about 1L back most of the way to home straight, hit the front just inside the 300 metres and soon drew clear under pressure.
Ridden along after a moderate start, settled just worse than midfield on the rail and saved ground turning for home, fought on steadily to reach 2nd about 70 metres out.
Settled just off over 2L off the speed 2-wide, held up behind runners around home bend, kept on same pace without quickening under pressure in straight.
Unbalanced and crowded early settling well behind, commenced move rounding home bend switching wide into straight, finished off the race well down the centre of the track.
Began well from the one draw, drifted backward steadily to forward of midfield in 6th on the rail, renewed pressure rounding home bend, fought on steadily without threatening.
Went forward to settle 3-wide in midfield, went wider turning in, inconvenienced upon straightening, fought on well to the line.
Travelled well behind from a wide gate, ran into heels and lost ground 850 metres out, went the widest turning for home, finished off the race well near stands side, did best work late.
Ridden to lead after a moderate start, obtained rails run over 900 metres out, led the field until headed shortly after straightening, soon weakened.
Soon dropped to rear of midfield despite niggling along, badly checked inside the 200 metres and never recovered.
Travelled wide without cover in midfield after beginning from a wide gate, made short-lived effort circling the field on home bend, unable to sustain effort inside final 150 metres.
Ridden early from the widest gate, settled 4-wide in last few, came under pressure rounding home bend and very wide into straight, made no impression.
Broke well travelling within 2L of pace 3-wide without cover, in similar position rounding home bend, dropped out tamely after straightening.
Reserved in midfield 2-wide, moved into contention 400M, knuckled down well to lead 100M, continued on well to line.
Jumped well, restrained to race in midfield, loomed up to challenge at 300M, came through narrow passage mid-straight to challenge, just held.

Settled in 4th, moved closer to pace home turn, within striking distance at top of straight, fought on well to hold 3rd in a bunch finish. (Jockey: saddle shifted back concluding stages, disadvantaged.)
Driven forward as expected, up with early pace before taking a trailing spot behind leader, battled on steadily on straightening, held by leaders final 200M.
Bounded in the air at start and lost ground, settled behind midfield along the fence, kept trying to the line, held by leaders in a blanket finish.
From wide draw shifted across to race towards the rear, further back than intended, made some ground at the finish, held by leaders in a bunch finish.
Chased leader 2-wide, took slender lead early straight, run ended 150M, faded and lost several places towards the finish.
Held up behind mid-division, driven out 400M, battled on without threatening.
Taken back from wide draw, towards the rear, 3-wide no cover from 800M, hooked wide straightening but failed to make any impression.
Began fairly, ended up racing at the back of the field, 7Ls to make up 400M, made limited progress on straightening.
Missed the start, raced at the rear of the field, driven wide into straight, never came on. (Jockey : did not travel comfortably at any stage.)
Began awkwardly, travelled keenly after being ridden forward to the lead, no extra 250M, weakened to last.
Began smartly from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on strongly in straight to hold off the challengers.
Away well, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, easy run to turn, kept on very well in straight to take 2nd, always held.
Jumped with them, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, there to turn, finished off well to take a place.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 8 to 9 lengths back, still well back on turn, made very good progress in straight to make frame, nearest on line. (Dead-heat 4th.)
Bounded in the air on jumping and lost ground, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, made some headway thereafter to make frame. (Dead-heat 4th.)
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide at rear, 8 lengths back, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide turning in, finished off strongly to be nearest on line.
Away with them, raced at rear on the inside, commenced move 450M, very wide into straight, slightly inconvenienced near 250M, made good progress thereafter to be nearest on line.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 3 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 7 lengths back on turn, showed limited response in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Commenced well, positioned 2 wide in midfield, angled out after passing 550M, very wide turning in, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Average to begin, positioned 5 lengths behind the leader on the inside, same margin back on turn, showed some response early in straight, weakened final 150M.

Shifted in at start, raced 3 wide behind midfield, no cover in the middle stages, unable to maintain position on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong. (Lame left hind leg next day morning.)
