Out in line, raced 2 wide behind midfield, angled out after passing 500M, finished off very strongly to score, won by 2 lengths.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, moved a bit closer in the middle stages, wider turning in, hit the front 300M, peaked and headed 150M, ran on evenly to take 2nd.
Lifted front feet on jumping and away tardily, raced behind midfield on the inside, slightly improved along the rail on turn, closed off well to take a place without threatening.
Began fairly, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, finished off well to make frame without threatening.
Away with them, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, very wide turning in, finished off evenly.
Began only fairly, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, 4 to 5 lengths back on turn, made some headway in straight.
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced at tail, 9 lengths back, a bit closer on turn, commenced move 500M, very wide into straight, made some headway in the run home.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide at rear, checked off heels near 1000M, 5 to 6 lengths back turning in, showed limited response in straight.
Bumped start, raced slightly better than midfield on the outside, 3 lengths or so back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 100M.

Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the inside, 6 lengths or so back, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, made some progress early in straight, blocked near 300M, cleared 200M, weakened thereafter. (Roarer.)
Bumped start, raced prominently on the inside early, allowed rival to cross near 950M, angled out 700M, challenged the leader turning in, peaked 250M, weakened thereafter.
Jumped well from a wide draw, sent forward to take the lead, found rail near 950M, challenged turning in, peaked and headed 300M, weakened final furlong.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 3 wide with cover slightly behind midfield, crowded near 950M, wider turning in, showed no response early in straight, eased final furlong.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, carried wider on turn, weakened early in straight, eased final furlong.
Eased at start, took rail, 1800M on heels, progressed steadily 350M to score.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, closed off strongly 400M for 2nd.
Eased back, 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 300M, dropped whip 200M.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, 2-3 wide, made steady ground 300M.
Eased to rear to cover, 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 300M.
Hard ridden to obtain box seat, blocked most straight and checked, not properly tested.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, ran on until 150M weakened.
Pushed early to hold the rail in midfield, just held ground in straight.
In front of midfield, 2 wide, made early move 1100M, emptied 150M.
At rear, took rail, ran on fairly in straight.
Hard ridden early, behind midfield, 2 wide, no dash.
Hard ridden early, 1800M on heels, no progress. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Eased at start, never a factor. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Pushed forward, dropped off quickly 450M. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Travelled in forward position, commenced to niggle near 500M, quickened passing 100M to score.
Jumped well, travelled nicely in front, fought nicely when placed pressure.
Settled among runners, commenced to improve near 400M, finished well.
Raced at back on outside rail, fought hard but only one-paced.
Raced at back, passing 500M hard ridden but only one-paced.
Began only fairly, raced on outside rail, one-paced when asked for effort.
Travelled among runners, passing 400M lay in when placed under pressure, worked home one-paced.
Raced in the middle of track, placed pressure near 400M, gave ground passing 100M.
On jumping crowded for room, raced close to the middle of track, weakened near 200M.
Raced at rear, placed pressure but weakened passing 200M, lame left front after racing.

Pushed forward from gate 11 before crossing to rail when leading approaching 1000m mark. Raced clear of nearest challenger before straightening, drew away in straight under little riding to win by 3L.
Caught 3 deep without cover in midfield throughout. Improved to third placed near the 700m when continuing wide. Battled well in straight to hold distant second.
Steadied away from heels after start & lost ground before improving to race in midfield, 3 deep with cover in middle stages. Eased wider on cornering before finishing steadily to third late.

Raced in midfield on the rail throughout. Steadied near the 500m when travelling well. Moved off the rail on straightening, entered last section 5.5L from lead before finishing steadily to be just behind placings.

Steadied after the start before drifting back to race worse than midfield away from rail. Eased wider on cornering, entered last section over 6L from lead before closing well in late stages to midfield. (Rider questioned).
Ridden forward after start before getting good position 1,1. Hard ridden on straightening, entered last section 4.5L from lead before weakening a few lengths.

Shifted behind runners after the start & raced at the tail. Continued near the tail, 7.5L from the lead entering last section, shifted away from heels before finishing strongest. Couldn't figure given race shape.

Had no speed after start, raced near the tail on the fence throughout. Stayed along rail on straightening, just under 7L from lead entering last section before making up a length or so to midfield. Never a threat.

Settled back after start & raced worse than midfield away from rail. Drifted further back approaching corner before coming under pressure when 7L behind. Failed to close off in straight and was no threat. (Rider questioned).
Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Raced tight on cornering when 6L from lead before emptying out near the 300m mark & weakening poorly to be beaten a big margin.

Showed speed after the start before being crossed & racing on leaders back from the 1000m. Dropped back 5L from lead entering last section as leader skipped clear, before weakening badly in last 350m.

Ridden forward to be prominent before racing second away from the rail. Moved up top leaders flanks at the 750m mark before coming under hard riding at the 550m mark & weakening badly in straight to be beaten big margin.

Steadied after the start & shifted back to race near the tail when 3 wide with cover. Hard ridden approaching the 600m mark before straightening in last place, 9L behind. Weakened badly to be long second last.

Fractious in gates, before drifting back after the start when racing very wide & without cover. Continued very hard run in middle stages, cornered near the rear before being retired out of the race in straight. (See report).
Began well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, commenced move after passing 500M, hit the front early in straight, kept on strongly to the line.
Moderately away, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, finished off strongly to take 2nd.
Lifted front feet on jumping and away tardily, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, angled out 500M, finished off strongly to take a place, useful debut.
Away well, raced 3 wide behind midfield, wider turning in, made good progress in straight to make frame, nearest on line.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, angled out 450M, bumped near 300M, finished off evenly.
Taken back from wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, 6 lengths back, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide turning in, made some headway in straight
Began awkwardly and bumped, positioned on rail behind midfield, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Quickly into stride, raced prominently on the outside, challenged the leader turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out after passing 500M, bumped early in straight, finished off evenly thereafter.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, 4 to 5 lengths back on turn, one-paced in the run home.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well in the middle stages, challenged turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Slightly slow out, showed no early speed, raced at rear on the inside, hard ridden from 500M, very wide turning in, failed to make any progress in straight.
Began only fairly, raced at rear on the outside early, moved closer after passing 1000M, peaked turning in, weakened early in straight.
In midfield, stayed 2 wide, kicked away nicely in the latter stages to score impressively by 1-3/4L.
Raced in one-out one-back position, ran on nicely but winner was impressive, finished 1-3/4L behind.
Sent forward, shared lead on the rail, kept going but was no match to first two.
Bumped start, raced in worse and midfield, along the rail, continued on well to the line.
Sat towards the rear, 2 wide, made ground in straight and ran on strongly.
Raced just behind midfield, 2 wide, closed off fairly to the line. (See Incident Report)
Settled to race in midfield, 2 wide, ran on moderately.
Jumped awkward, recovered to take box-seat, continued to the line one paced.
Niggled along, shared lead 2 wide, emptied approaching 200M.
Slow to jump, at tail along the rail, did not threaten.
Bumped start, settled front of midfield, wide and no cover, faded in the straight.
Hampered at start, had settle for midfield, very wide throughout and found nothing in straight.
Bumped start and lost ground, at rear and wide throughout, never in it.
In midfield, wide but with cover, pressured from 600M, not competitive.
Settled well behind on the rail and waited with, commenced move entering home straight obtaining a clear passage just inside the 400 metres, responded well to take charge inside final 100 metres.
Improved steadily early before settling just over 1L back in 4th or 3rd, slightly further away from pace when race leader quickened approaching home turn, fought on to reach 2nd over 250 metres out.
Settled in last few, obtained rails run over 1100 metres out, angled off the rail for a run 500 metres out, fought on steadily from over 6L back in 7th into straight, never threatening.
Slightly slow out, improved steadily along the rail to midfield some 5L back, fought on steadily from similar position into straight, hampered and lost position over 150 metres out.
Moderate start but quickly recovered to midfield, in similar position turning in, inconvenienced for a run just inside the 200 metres, fought on to the line.
Broke well to lead setting a quick pace, broke some 3L clear turning into straight, unable to sustain effort and folded up quickly inside final 150 metres.
Settled wide in midfield, dropped towards rear coming onto home bend, made no impression in straight.
Lacked early pace and soon dropped well behind, went wide into straight, kept on steadily past well beaten horses.
Began well from a wide gate travelling wide in prominent position early, gradually drifted back to midfield onto home bend, widest runner turning into straight, found nothing.
Settled in last few, ran home one paced.
Ridden positively from a wide gate, travelled 4-wide in early stages before gaining rails run behind race leader rounding home bend, weakened under pressure from 250 metres out.
Broke well, settled wide without cover in prominent position, weakened shortly after straightening.
Soon dropped to wide in rear of midfield after beginning from the widest gate, drifted further back to last few 1000 metres out, became last over 500 metres out.
Niggled along early, mainly in 5th on the rail just over 2L back in back straight, became 3rd in similar position coming onto home bend, dropped out tamely shortly after straightening.
Reserved towards the rear, 6Ls off the pace middle stages, driven near 400M, ran on strongly to get up close home.
In touch behind leaders, quickened up to lead 250M, kept on well, caught near line. (Jockey dropped whip 200M.)
Not far off from leaders, 3-wide chasing the pace on settling, driven and kept on final 300M, safely held by first pair.
Settled ahead of midfield, held up early straight, kept on moderately to line, not able to challenge first 2.
Began fairly, took up a midfield spot, steady headway from 400M, held up 200M and shifted out to obtain clear running, would have been closer to 3rd and 4th.
Caught wide from draw 14, ridden forward 1000M to track leader and more prominent than usual, fought on one paced in straight, out-finished final 150M. (Riding position questioned.)
Caught wide from draw 13, travelled in midfield, plodded on final 300M, not going pace to challenge.
Began awkwardly, held up near last, swung wide into straight, closed off steadily without threatening leaders.
Set slow pace early stages, quickened up tempo home turn, caught 250M, run ended mid-straight, weakened away.
Chased leader on inside, emptied 300M, weakened rapidly.
Drop back to last 8-9Ls off the pace, ran past well beaten horses in straight, never near to challenge.
Caught 3-wide behind midfield, 5Ls off the pace 400M, left flat-footed on straightening, soundly beaten.
Settled behind mid-division, driven along 500M, not quickened, lost touch 300M. (Vet : major laceration to RH tendon.)

Raced behind midfield, came under pressure 600M, gave ground noticeably in the straight, finished tailed out on 2nd consecutive occasion. (Jockey : did not travel comfortably at any stage / Blood in trachea.)
Clean jump, sent forward to take the lead, led by 3/4L on turn, kept on strongly in straight to score.
Bumped on jumping, raced prominently but 3 wide early, 2 wide from 800M, 2nd on turn, kept on well in straight to take 2nd, always held.
Bumped start, raced prominently 2 wide, allowed rival to cross near 800M, 2 lengths back turning in, closed off well to take a place.
Average to begin, positioned 2 wide, 3 lengths or so back, there to turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, closed off well to make frame without threatening the first few.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, found some daylight 100M, made some progress thereafter.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, kept on evenly in straight.
Away with them, raced 3 wide, 2 to 3 lengths back, there to turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, unable to obtain clear running until 150M, made minor progress thereafter.
Jumped with them, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, unable to obtain clear running early in straight, hampered 150M, eased final 100M.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide at rear, commenced move 550M, made minor progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Began fairly, raced 2 wide towards rear, commenced move 550M, showed limited response early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Out in line, raced at rear on the outside, very wide turning in, one-paced in the run home.
Bumped start and unbalanced, unable to slot in, trapped very wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, no cover throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Average to begin, sent forward to take the lead, 2 wide, led by a neck on turn, kept on very well in straight to hold off the challengers.
Began awkwardly, positioned 6 lengths behind the leader on rail, same margin back on turn, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Began awkwardly, sent forward to race prominently on the inside, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on well in straight to take a place, always held.
Away well, raced prominently on the outside early, found a 2 wide spot near 800M, 2 lengths back on turn, finished off well to make frame without threatening.
Taken back from gate 9, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 lengths or so back, there to turn, made good progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Slightly slow out, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, angled out 500M, made some headway in straight.
Shifted out at start and made contact, positioned 4 lengths behind the leader on rail, angled out 450M, made some progress early in straight, peaked on run 200M, ran on evenly to the line.
Began well, raced 3 wide with no cover slightly better than midfield, 3 lengths back, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, peaked 200M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Moderately away, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, very wide turning in, made minor progress in straight.
Taken back from gate 13, raced at tail, 7 lengths or so back, still well back on turn, made little progress in straight.
Made contact at start, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide at rear, 7 lengths back, same margin back on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide better than midfield, angled out after passing 450M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Jumped well from the widest gate, unable to slot in, trapped very wide in midfield, no cover throughout, weakened early in straight when hard run took toll.

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Made contact at start, trapped very wide early, 2Ls or so back, moved closer after passing 700M, 4 wide on turn, hard ridden 300M, hit the front 150M, kept on strongly to the line. (Laceration to the left front fetlock.)
Bumped start, positioned 2 wide, a length or so back, challenged the leader turning in, took brief lead 200M, peaked and headed 150M, weakened gradually close home, just stayed on to take 2nd.
Moderately away, positioned 2-1/2L behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, closed off well to take a place, nearest on line.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide with cover, 3 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, no clear running early in straight, made some headway final furlong to make frame. (See Racing Incidents.)
Bumped start, raced 3 wide in midfield, moved a bit closer on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide, 3 lengths back, there to turn, no clear run early in straight, cleared near 150M, only showed limited response thereafter. (Lame right front leg.)
Began well from a wide draw, trapped very wide towards rear, 4 lengths back on turn, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Began well from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.) (Lame right front leg.)

Made contact at start, unable to slot in, trapped 4 wide behind midfield, 2 to 3 lengths back on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Quickly into stride, sent forward to take the lead, found rail near 750M, challenged by rival turning in, peaked and headed 200M, weakened and eased thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Always prominent, closed off strongly 300 to score.
Box seat, led 300M, overhauled 100M.
Eased back, progressed steadily 300M for 3rd.
Took rail at back, progressed steadily 300M.
Midfield, 2-3 wide, just held ground in straight.
Took rail and lead, emptied 300M. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Never competitive. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Rolled forward, dropped off quickly 500M. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Never a factor. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Hard ridden and took lead, quickened in the straight, finished strongly to score.
Settled behind the speed, passing 700M was eased away from heels, made up nice ground in the straight.
Jumped well and raced outside the lead, responded solidly in the straight when placed pressure.
Settled midfield, commenced to improve passing 400M, worked home nicely.
Settled midfield on rail, asked for effort passing 500M, worked home one-paced.
Raced 3 wide with cover in handy position, placed pressure but only one-paced.
Niggled along but no early speed, raced detached in middle stages, gained some ground in the straight.
Stumble at start, passing 500M was checked and became badly unbalanced, limited response in the straight.
Taken back at start, settled behind midfield, hang out badly in middle stages, no response in the straight, must trial.
Throughout the race travelled wide and without cover in lead, faded out in the straight.
Settled behind midfield, came under pressure rounding the Home Turn, weakened in the straight.

Placing: PU
Comment: Passing 400M went amiss and was immediately eased down.

Raced in midfield away from rail early. Moved 3 wide with cover near 800m, travelled strongly on cornering when under 2L from lead, asked for full effort at 250m, strode to lead near 100m, held half-length advantage on line.

Raced wide in midfield & was left without cover near 1200m before improving position to race outside the leader from 700m. Assumed lead approaching the 250m until passed by winner inside last 100m. Clear of third.

Slow to begin, crowded and consequently raced in second half. Moved away from the inside passing the 600m mark, cornered over 6L from the lead, shifted to be widest runner on straightening before closing the fastest to third.

Ridden to be prominent before racing on the leaders back from the 1200m. Hard ridden on straightening when under 2L from lead, continued only a length behind at furlong marker before weakening slightly late.

Drifted back after the start & raced just worse than midfield along rail early. Moved off the rail near half-way when 4L from lead. Hard ridden prior to cornering when 6L behind before making steady late ground to midfield.
Ridden forward after start to lead. Headed in the lead approaching the 250m mark before giving a few lengths to midfield.

Raced very wide at first bend before shifting back to race worse than midfield. Moved wider & commence to improve approaching 700m mark, forced very wide on cornering when 5L behind & maintained that margin in straight.
Shifted behind runners after start & raced at the tail. Continued at the back, 8L behind entering last section before passing a few tiring runners when finishing well beaten in midfield.

Raced in midfield between runner & continued in this position, under 3L from the lead at half-way. Came under hard riding prior to the 600m mark, shifted wider on cornering but was a beaten horse on straightening.
Raced in midfield along the rail throughout. Hard ridden passing the 600m mark & began yielding ground soon after. Weakened further in the straight & was beaten over 12L.
Strode forward to race prominently before settling outside the leader, 1L from the lead for first-half. Hard ridden at the 500m & weakened out poorly in the straight to be beaten over 12L.
Didn't begin fast but mustered speed & improved after the first bend to race 1,1 from the 1200m. Hard ridden passing the 600m mark & began losing ground from prior to cornering. Long way behind.
Steadied & taken back near the tail. Continued with only 2 runners behind at half-way when 7L from lead. Hard ridden prior to the 600m mark & weakened badly in straight to be beaten over 15L. Poor.
Had no early speed despite being hard ridden & drifted back to the tail when racing around the first bend. Always ridden along when at the rear & weakened very poorly in last section to be long last.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the inside, 5 lengths or so back, commenced move after passing 450M, very wide turning in, finished off very strongly to score by a head.

Out in line, raced 2 wide at rear early, a bit closer after entering the back straight, 3 wide from 700M, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide turning in, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, just narrowly beaten.

Moderately away from the widest draw, trapped very wide towards rear early, sent forward after passing 1300M, raced 3 wide, a length or so back in the middle stages, pressed leader 500M, kept on well in straight to take a place.
Began only fairly, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well in the middle stages, challenged from 550M, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the first few late.
Began smartly from gate 1, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Away with them, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, carried wider on turn, showed limited response early in straight, peaked on run 200M, ran on evenly to the line.
Crowded on jumping, raced behind midfield on the inside, 4 lengths back, angled out 450M, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move after passing 450M, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Jumped with them, raced towards rear on the outside, very wide turning in, failed to close off in straight.
Crowded on jumping, raced 2 wide better than midfield, angled out 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened and eased final 200M.
Began awkwardly, trapped very wide at rear early, 2 wide after 1000M, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight, eased final furlong.
Average to begin, sent forward to race prominently, 2 wide, took brief lead 1050M, headed 650M, weakened from 500M, eased final furlong.
Took up lead along the rail, travelled nicely throughout, kept going nicely, scored by 1L.
In midfield, wide but with cover, stormed down the straight to finish 1L behind the winner for 2nd place.
Asked to be forward, settled box-seat about 2-1/2L off, continued on nicely for 3rd.
Sent forward and sat outside the lead, kept going with the leader until found no extra for final stages
Bumped start and lost ground, recovered in midfield along the rail, ran on well until awkward in final strides. (See Incident Report)
Travelled in just behind midfield, 2 wide, continued to make ground and closed off fairly.
Urged along early, settled one-out one-back, showed no turn of foot.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, continued on one paced to the line.
Eased back, settled towards the rear along the rail, ran on moderately late.
Taken back, at tail 2-3 wide at turn, showed nothing.
Crowded and lost ground at start, at rear along the rail, did not threaten.
Positive to begin, settled front of midfield but wide, emptied at 250M.

Raced prominently and wide without cover from a wide gate, settled one off the rail just behind the leaders in 3rd rounding home bend, quickened under pressure to hit the front 150 metres out, won readily.
Settled within 4L of pace in 7th early stages, lost position in chain reaction over 650 metres out, saved ground on the rail turning for home, produced strong late finish but had too much to do.
Began well from the widest gate, held narrow lead off the rail in back straight before joined onto home bend, gained narrow advantage early in straight but headed when no extra about 150 metres out.

Crowded at start dropping to last few, forced to steady in chain reaction inside the 700 metres, saved ground turning for home, baulked for a run until the 200 metres, finished off the race impressively.
Niggled along in 8th within 4L of pace, carried backward in chain reaction rounding home bend, renewed effort after straightening, finished off the race nicely.

Broke well from the one gate, improved to join the leaders 900 metres out, lost position passing the 700 metres when pace quickened on home bend, given reminders over 400 metres out, kept on steadily without threatening.
Began awkwardly losing ground, ridden to be up with the pace and shared the lead on the rail rounding bend, found no extra when headed shortly after straightening.
Began well, gradually dropped to 5th within 3L of pace despite niggling along, lost ground in chain reaction rounding home bend, made no impression thereafter. (Lame)
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, tailed-off despite ridden along, trailed the field to the 400 metres, saved ground turning in, ran past well-beaten horses.

Quickly recovered after inconvenienced at start to be up with the leaders, lost position when crossed by front-runners coming onto first bend gradually dropping to 5th some 5L back, folded up quickly after straightening.
Slow to begin, remained in second last despite coming under pressure, last turning into home straight. (Irregular heart rhythm) (Blood in trachea)
Taken across from wide draw, held up at the rear, driven wide into straight, closed off fastest to force a dead-heat at the line.
From draw 12 taken back to settle 3-wide towards the rear, lay out from 700M, bumped top of straight and unbalanced, recovered and stayed on well to get up near line for a dead-heat victory.
Tracked leaders 2-wide, chased on well from top of straight, just missed in a blanket finish.
Sent forward to press leader, driven and vied for lead from top of straight, narrowly missed out on a placing in a blanket finish.
Driven to lead, pressed by rival 700M, was challenged from top of straight, fought on hard, headed by first few concluding stages.
Settled down 2-wide in midfield 3-4Ls off the pace, chased on steadily over final 300M, nearest finish.
Dropped back to near the rear, badly checked near 300M, took a while to re-group, closed off well final stages, nearest finish.
Settled in midfield along the fence, took time to muster on straightening, restricted room 150M, stayed on towards the finish, readily held by leaders.
Jumped on terms from draw 1, dropped back towards the rear, made some progress without threatening over final 300M.
Held up in midfield along the 3-path, bumped and unbalanced top of straight, not going the pace to challenge leaders over final 250M.
From draw 10 caught 3-wide no cover chasing the pace, weakened passing 250M.
Chased leaders along the inside, shaken 450M, gave ground turning for home.

Average to begin, raced 2 wide towards rear, found rail near 600M, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, angled out early in straight, finished off strongly to score by a neck. (Distressed post race.)
Away with them, positioned on rail in midfield, angled out 500M, finished off strongly to take 2nd, just beaten by a neck.

Moderately away from a wide draw, sent forward to race prominently but 3 wide, took the lead near 1000M, found rail 700M, led by 3/4L on turn, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the first two final 100M.

Began well from gate 1, raced slightly better than midfield, hampered near 1200M, commenced move after passing 600M, made some progress early in straight, peaked on run 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Began smartly, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross near 700M, sat right behind the leader on turn, showed some response early in straight, no extra final 100M.

Moderately away, raced 2 wide better than midfield early, found rail after entering the back straight, moved a bit closer on turn, angled out 500M, showed some response early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, peaked on turn, ran on evenly in straight. (Mucus in trachea.)
Began fairly, raced 2 wide at rear, still 8 lengths back on turn, passed some tired runners in straight.
Jumped well, raced prominently, 2 wide, 3/4L back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Average to begin, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Out with rest, raced 2 wide behind midfield, commenced move 600M, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.

Began well, positioned 1 out 1 back, there to turn, angled out after passing 500M, finished off very strongly to score.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, finished off very strongly, just beaten by a narrow margin.
Began well from gate 12, sent forward to take the lead, shared the lead with rival after passing 600M, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the first two late.
Began smartly from the widest draw, raced prominently, 2 wide, shared lead on turn, kept on well in straight but always held.
Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made good progress in straight, nearest on line.
Began well from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, angled out after passing 500M, showed limited response early in straight, peaked 200M, ran on evenly to the line.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, there to turn, made some headway in straight.
Began only fairly, raced 3 wide with cover towards rear early, 2 wide after passing 800M, 5 lengths or so back on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide at rear, 7 lengths or so back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Made contact at start, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made minor progress in straight. (Roarer.)
Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the outside, 4 lengths or so back, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Began well from a wide draw, raced 3 wide, 2 lengths or so back, no cover on turn, weakened gradually in straight.
Moderately away, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 300M.
Shifted in at start and made contact, raced at rear on the outside, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Eased back, took rail, lack room 4-2, dashed well to score.
1 out 1 back, ran on well for 2nd.
Midfield along the fence, lack room 4-2, dashed well when clear.
Eased to rear, 2 wide, dashed well 300M.
Slow away, at back, 2 wide, little dash 350M, run ended 100M.
Took rail and lead easily, hung on until 200M weakened.
Settled outside the leader, out of fuel 200M.
Eased to obtain box seat, emptied 200M.
Never a factor. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Began only fairly, took soft lead, responded solidly when asking in the straight, finished strongly to score.
Raced outside the lead, asked for effort near 500M, worked home nicely, missed by 1/2L.
Raced at back, commenced to improve near 500M, gained some late ground in the straight.
Raced midfield on rail, placed pressure passing 500M, finished one-paced.
Raced midfield, no response when asked for effort, eased down over concluding stages, blood in trachea, must trial.

Showed good early speed to lead. Raced nearly 3L clear approaching the 300m mark, continued to hold significant margin inside the final 100m before cruising to the line to win easily. Impressive debut.

Bumped & badly unbalanced at start & consequently shifted back to last. Shifted down to rail 800m before cornering in second half, 5.5L from lead. Closed strongly last 250m, moved to second inside last 100m, beaten under 2L.

Began well & obtained good position 1,1 early before drifting slightly further back to midfield near the 800m. Entered last section 3.5L from lead before finishing well to finish third, 2.5L behind impressive winner.

Bumped & unbalanced & consequently settled just worse than midfield along rail. Moved away from rail approaching the 500m, entered last section 5L from lead before shifting wider & closing well in final stages.

Fractious in barriers, began awkwardly, bumped & lost ground before racing worse than midfield in middle stages. Awkwardly placed 550m, cornered over 7L behind before finishing strongly to midfield when racing greenly.

Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Shuffled further back mid-race before entering last section 6.5L from lead. Closed off well when making up a few lengths in closing stages to finish midfield.

Ridden forward after the start before eventually settling 3 deep with cover just behind leading trio. Moved to second place when 2L from the lead soon after entering last section before emptying out at 200m & weakening late.

Outpaced after start & drifted back to race worse than midfield, 4 wide early before 3 wide with cover after first bend. Cornered widest, 7L behind before passing a few tiring runners without closing margin. (Lame post-race).

Shifted across behind runners from wide gate & settled near the tail. Cornered a clear second last, 8.5L from the lead before passing a few runners late without making any headway into significant margin.
Bumped at start before mustering speed & improving position to race outside the leader from the 900m. Hard ridden approaching the corner before weakening badly in last section to be well beaten.
Raced in midfield on the rail throughout. Hard ridden prior to cornering, entered last section 4.5L from the lead before weakening out sharply in the concluding stages to be beaten a big margin.

Bumped & raced very keenly when being steadied after the start. Checked & lost ground when racing erratically near 850m & was consequently relegated to last before weakening out further in straight. (Must trial, see report).

Improved to midfield after moderate start before racing 3 wide without cover in middle stages. Drifted further back in middle section, straightened over 6L from lead before weakening poorly to long second last.

Raced wide in midfield early before hard ridden to improve position to be 3 deep without cover outside leader from 850m. Continued to apply pressure when racing wide before folding up & weakening to long last. (See report).
Moderately away from gate 1, raced in midfield on the inside, 2 wide on turn, finished off strongly to score.
Bumped shortly after start, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, there to turn, angled out early in straight, hit the front 200M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner late.
Moderately away, positioned right behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 150M, finished off well to take a place. (See Racing Incidents.)
Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some progress in straight to make frame.
Moderately away, raced at rear on rail, angled out and made contact near 550M, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home to be nearest on line.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 200M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Away well, raced 2 wide behind in midfield, wider from 550M, finished off evenly. (See Racing Incidents.)
Bumped start, raced prominently, 2 wide, same position on turn, peaked 200M, weakened final 100M.
Bumped shortly after start, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 wide after passing 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Taken back from gate 11, raced towards rear on the outside, no cover throughout, peaked early in straight, crowded 200M, weakened thereafter.
Slowly away, raced at tail, 6 lengths back, bumped and unbalanced 550M, very wide turning in, failed to make any progress in straight.
Rolled forward into the lead along the rail, ran on nicely to score by a neck.
Raced in one-out one-back position, continued to close in on the winner, missed by a neck.
Travelled in midfield, wide but with cover, contacted at 250M, finished off nicely for 3rd.
Awkward start, raced in behind midfield, along the rail, ran home fairly.
Awkward start, recovered to be in front of midfield, along the rail, kept on one paced to the line.
Crowded at start, raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, raced home steadily.
Bumped start, settled in midfield 2 wide, gave nothing in the straight. (Lame left front)
Bumped start, travelled towards the rear, along the rail, made no ground.
Bumped start then taken back, raced at the tail, continued on without threatening.
Sent forward, settled on-pace, about 1L outside and off the lead, run ended passing 250M. (See Incident Report)
Bumped start, in worse than midfield, wide but with cover, showed nothing.
Hard ridden forward before slotting into midfield near 1100M, faded in straight.
Bumped start, at rear 2 wide, never in it.
Very awkward start, ridden aggressively to be prominent, wide, gave ground from 600M. (Irregular heart rhythm)
Settled in last few on the rail, obtained a clear run 300 metres out and led 200 metres out, hung on well despite shifting ground close to home.
Settled in rear of midfield on the rail, soon came under pressure after straightening, produced good late run inside final 100 metres but never threatening.

Settled just over 2L off the pace in 6th on the rail, tracked the leaders into straight, forced to steady for a run from the 400 metres to 350 metres, held some chance until finding no extra inside the 150 metres.
Moderate start, gradually recovered to be just off the pace in 5th, travelled keenly briefly 1000 metres out, ducked in inside the 400 metres, kept on same pace under pressure without quickening

Began well from the widest gate, travelled wide without cover in first few, shifted one back 3-wide for cover over 900 metres out, came to challenge upon straightening holding every chance until inside the 200 metres.
Broke well but soon taken back to last few, switched widest into home straight, produced good late impression inside final 200 metres despite running into heels over 70 metres out.
Settled at the back, commenced move inside the 500 metres, travelled tight with runners early in straight, made no further impression inside final 100 metres.
Began well from a wide gate, gradually settled in forward of midfield in 6th some 3L back, went wide into straight, kept on same pace under pressure but made some late impression.
Began well, led or disputed lead to the 200 metres, unable to sustain effort under pressure.
Jumped moderately, gradually improved to rear of midfield, gave ground steadily from approaching home turn.
Improved steadily to gain narrow advantage 1200 metres out, joined by two others rounding home bend, weakened under pressure over 300 metres out.
Soon taken back to wide behind midfield from a wide gate, gave ground steadily after straightening.

Crowded at start, soon dropped towards the rear despite ridden along, made rapid progress from the 1200 metres to share the pace 3-wide coming onto home bend, gave ground noticeably from approaching home straight.
Quickly recovered to midfield after a moderate start, lost position steadily from over 1000 metres out, hung out and dropped to tail-end about 500 metres out, never recovered.
Jumped well, chased leaders early, checked 850M and shuffled back to midfield, 3-wide home turn, finished off well despite tough trip to get up near line.
Driven forward from wide draw, crossed to lead 850M, kicked nicely clear top of straight, faded late and caught by winner close home.
Towards the rear, 5Ls to make up 400M, closed off nicely over final 250M, nearest finish.
Began only fairly, soon recovered to be tracking leaders, travelled keenly from 1000M, battled on over final 400M, not finishing pace of first 2 late stages.
Jumped on terms from draw 1, held up behind mid-division along the fence, couldn't accelerate enough on straightening, well held by leaders over final 200M.
Held up 3-wide behind midfield, hampered 850M and lost ground, brought to outside on straightening, stayed on without threatening.
From draw 10 obtained a spot ahead of midfield, ran on same pace in the straight, held by leaders always.
Jumped fairly, rushed forward chasing leader in a 3-wide spot without cover, battled on to 200M, no extra after.
Badly unbalanced on jumping, taken back to race in the rear, struggled to keep up 500M, never involved.
Settled 2-wide in mid-division, not quickened when driven out 400M, never threatened. (Irregular Heart Rhythm.)
Crossed to the lead before taking a trailing position 850M, came under pressure home turn, gave ground rapidly in straight. (Jockey unable to explain for the disappointing performance.)
Shifted out at start and made contact, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, finished off strongly to score. (See Racing Incidents.)

Jumped with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, 5 lengths or so back, angled out after passing 450M, unable to obtain clear running early in straight, cleared approaching 200M, finished off very strongly, just narrowly beaten.

Began smartly, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross 700M, sat right behind the leader on turn, hard ridden early in straight, hit the front 150M, kept on well but unable to hold off the first two final 50M.
Average to begin, raced at rear on the inside, 6 lengths or so back, angled out 450M, bumped early in straight, finished off very strongly to make frame, nearest on line.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, 3 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, made minor progress in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, 2 wide, found rail near 700M, led by 1/2L on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Away well, tracked leaders on the outside, 2 wide on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Slightly inconvenienced at start, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Moderately away, raced 3 wide with cover towards rear, wider turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Away with them, positioned 2 wide, 4 lengths back, similar position on turn, one-paced in straight.
Out with rest, raced better than midfield on the outside, 2 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, weakened final 300M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began fairly from gate 1, positioned 5 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Taken back from gate 13, raced at rear on the outside, 6 lengths or so back, bumped early in straight, failed to make any progress in straight. (Blood in trachea.)
Away well, raced prominently but trapped wide early, found rail near 850M, angled out after passing 500M, ridden early in straight, took the lead 200M, kept on very well to hold off the rival late.
Moderately away, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, just beaten by a narrow margin.
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced behind midfield on the inside, angled out after passing 600M, made good progress in straight to take a place without threatening.
Bumped start, positioned 2 wide slightly behind midfield, angled out 600M, a bit closer turning in, made some progress in straight to make frame, no threat to the first few.
Bumped shortly after start, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some progress in straight without threatening.
Away with them, raced 3 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, bumped early in straight, ran on evenly to 100M, no extra thereafter.
Clean jump, raced prominently but trapped very wide early, 2 wide on turn, hit the front 250M, peaked and headed 200M, weakened thereafter.
Began well from the widest draw, raced prominently but trapped very wide early, found rail near 850M, led by 1/2L on turn, peaked early in straight, headed 250M, weakened inside final furlong.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide towards rear, 7 lengths back, commenced move 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Taken back from gate 13, raced at rear on the outside, 6 lengths or so back, very wide turning in, failed to make any progress in straight.
Moderately away from a tricky gate, raced 2 wide better than midfield, carried wider after passing 500M, bumped 350M, peaked on run 250M, weakened thereafter.
Average to begin, raced at tail, 8 lengths back, a bit closer on turn, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide into straight, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Moderately away from gate 1, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Out with rest, raced 2 wide in midfield, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight.

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide in midfield, moved closer after passing 800M, challenged the leader turning in, took the lead 200M, kept on strongly to the line, won by 2-1/4L.
Began smartly from gate 1, raced better than midfield on the inside, 2 wide from 500M, closed off well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, moved a bit closer after passing 800M, hard ridden on turn, finished off well to take a place without threatening.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide at rear, 5 lengths or so back on turn, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home to be nearest on line.
Moderately away, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, took the lead near 600M, challenged by rival turning in, peaked and headed 200M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Bumped on jumping, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, angled out 400M, passed some tired runners in straight.
Average to begin, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, angled out after passing 450M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Away well, raced 2 wide in midfield, checked near 1250M, wider after passing 600M, commenced move 400M, very wide turning in, failed to close off in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Bumped start, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground to turn, angled out after passing 400M, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Bumped on jumping, raced prominently but trapped wide in the early stages, positioned 2 wide better than midfield after passing 1100M, unable to maintain position on turn, showed nothing in straight.
Bumped start, raced at tail, 7 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Clean jump, sent forward to take the lead, found rail after passing 1200M, headed 600M, weakened 400M, emptied and eased early in straight, unacceptable performance.
Eased back, 2 wide, progressed steadily 400M to score.
Eased at start, took rail, made steadily ground 300M for 2nd.
Pressed forward, ran on for 3rd.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, progressed steadily 250M.
Pushed early, however trapped wide, eased back for cover, made some ground 250M.
Eased to obtain box seat, weakened 250M.
Pushed early, midfield along the fence, no progress. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, out of fuel 300M.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, emptied 400M. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Trapped 3 wide, never better than midfield.
Bumped start, midfield, dropped off 500M. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Slow out, raced towards rear, improved on straightening, quickened near 100M to score.
Raced midfield on rail, steadied away from heels passing 500M, worked home strongly.
On jumping was crowded then taken back, settled at tail, made up some nice late ground in the straight.
Ridden along for some distance to take lead, responded well in the early part of straight, gave some ground near 50M.
Settled in box seat, placed pressure passing 400M, ran on in the straight.
Settled midfield, commenced to improve rounding the Home Turn, one-paced in the straight.
Urged along then steadied near 900M to obtain cover, settled behind midfield, finished one-paced.
Raced outside the lead, faded out passing 100M, blood in trachea, must trial.
Wide and without cover throughout in handy position, gave ground in the straight.
Held lead momentarily after start before being crossed & racing second away from rail. Dashed up to lead near the 200m before drawing away in last 150m to score easily.

Bumped at start & raced third last on rail. Around 3L from lead on cornering, moved over the leader's heels near the 200m before making ground between runners to move to second near the 50m mark. Ran ok, no match for winner.
Raced 3 deep in midfield & was left without cover from the 550m. Cornered only 1.5L from the lead, moved to second at the 150m before being caught for that runner-up placing in concluding stages.
Held the rail in midfield before racing on the leaders back from the 600m. Moved off the rail & bumped on cornering before emptying out near the 125m & giving a length to midfield late.

Bumped & unbalanced at start before being outpaced & racing at the tail. Continued a clear last entering last section when 6.5L from lead before doing best work in the concluding stages when making up a few lengths to midfield
Bumped at start & was then steadied & drifted back to race second last. Shifted wider entering last section when 5.5L from lead, straightened the widest runner before running on only fairly out wide.
Had a good trip in midfield away from the rail throughout. Shifted wider on straightening but failed to finish off & weakened in late stages to be beaten 5L. (Lame next day).

Not bustled at start & drifted back to race just behind midfield & away from the rail in early stages. Eased three wide entering last section when 3.5L from the lead but failed to finish off & beat only one rival home.

Ridden forward from outside gate, assumed lead approaching 800m, continued to work hard before crossing to rail near 600m. Passed by winner at furlong pole before weakening quickly to last. (Rider questioned  see report).
Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, there to turn, angled out 350M, finished off very strongly to score.
Slightly slow out, raced at rear on the outside, 6 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, no daylight early in straight, made very good progress thereafter to take 2nd.
Taken back from gate 11, raced 3 wide behind midfield, very wide turning in, closed off well to take a place.
Began well, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length or so back, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, weakened after passing 100M, headed final 50M.
Away with them, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Moderately away, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, angled out 400M, made good progress early in straight, peaked on run 100M, ran on evenly to the line.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground throughout, finished off evenly.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, no clear running early in straight, showed limited response thereafter.
Began fairly from gate 1, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed some response early in straight, no clear run from 200M, not able to test properly.
Average to begin, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Quickly into stride, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, 3/4L behind the leader turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Jumped well into the lead, remained on rail, kept finding to score by 2L.
Eased and raced at the rear, wide but with cover, closed off strongly for 2nd after swinging widest when entering the straight.
Niggled along and was prominent, wide until shifted 2 wide near 800M, kept on going to take 3rd.
Jumped only fairly, sat in front of midfield along the rail, ran on well to the line.
Lost ground at start, recovered in midfield along the rail, awkward to heels near 150M, ran on nicely otherwise.
Began only fairly, in behind midfield, wide but with cover, continued on fairly.
Settled front of midfield, wide and without cover, ran on moderately.
Taken back, remained at the tail along the rail, made minor ground only.
Jumped smart, was prominent but shuffled back at 800M to be in midfield, 2 wide, showed nothing. (See Incident Report)
Eased back, raced at the rear, on rail at turn, did not threaten.
Urged then raced outside lead early, then eased and was about 3L off, run ended passing 150M. (See Incident Report)
In about midfield, wide whole trip, not competitive. (Bled from both nostrils)
Settled wide in last few, gained closer from 850 metres to reach midfield, circled the field from the 550 metres, sustained effort to hit the front 200 metres out.
Soon taken across from the widest gate for rails run in rear, commenced move 3-wide rounding home bend, baulked early in straight, fought on under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Moderate start from the one draw settling towards the rear, saved ground turning in, baulked for a run on straightening and forced to switch inside the 100 metres, did best work late.
Settled wide in midfield, improved closer passing the 850 metres, came under pressure and went wide into straight, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Settled in midfield mainly in 6th, saved ground turning for home, baulked for a run early in straight, produced good late impression closing stages.
Settled towards the rear, commenced move under pressure rounding home bend and went very wide into straight, kept on steadily without threatening.
Ridden forward from a wide gate, circled the field to lead on the rail inside the 1200 metres, led until headed over 200 metres out, no extra.
Began well to lead early, soon taken back to just off the pace and tracked race leader to straight, hung in upon straightening and unable to sustain effort inside the final 150 metres.
Began well, settled mainly in midfield on the rail, gradually shuffled back to last few when pace quickened around home bend, saved ground turning in, but soon weakened under pressure.

Made steady headway from a wide gate circling the field before settling 3-wide without cover over 2L back in 4th, improved to 2nd over 800 metres out, similar into straight but unable to sustain effort and steadily faded.
Gradually picked up to prominent position, gained slightly closer in back straight, soon weakened in home straight.
Soon taken back well behind, travelled keenly most of the way to the halfway mark, remained wide throughout and the widest turning for home, never recovered.
Crossed to the lead 1000M, let steadily, found plenty when asked early straight, held on well final 200M from pursuing rivals.
Went forward to be tracking the pace along the fence, pressed winner from top of straight but couldn't get past, held on for 2nd late stages.
Reserved in a rearward position, brought wide into straight, finished off nicely to take 3rd just before line. Nearest finish.
From wide draw strode forward to race one out one back, battled on well turning in, held by first 2 final 200M, lost 3rd near line.
Dropped back to the rear, 6Ls off the pace 400M, ran on well down outside of straight, nearest finish.
Chased leaders, raced keenly near 900M, checked at 800M, fought on without threat in the straight, always held by leaders.
Caught in a 3-wide position tracking leaders, raced keenly middle stages, gave limited response turning for home, no threat final 200M.
Held up 2-wide behind midfield, driven 450M but not pace to challenge leaders.
Settled in mid-division, failed to quicken when driven along 350M, never threatened.
Held up at the rear, lay in under pressure from 400M and bumped the rail, badly unbalanced and lost ground, never in contention. (Must be ridden by senior rider in future races.)
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, enjoyed the easy lead to turn, kicked clear early in straight, kept on very well to the line and scored.
Moderately away, positioned 5 lengths behind the leader on rail, 2 wide on turn, finished off strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Commenced well from gate 1, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, closed off well to take a place without threatening.
Began awkwardly, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, saved ground on turn, made some progress in straight to make frame.
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, angled out 700M, very wide turning in, made some progress in straight without threatening.
Jumped well, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross near 1150M, sat right behind the leader in the middle stages, angled out 400M, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 6 to 7 lengths back, a bit closer on turn, made some progress early in straight, blocked final 50M.
Average to begin, raced in midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, very wide into straight, made no progress in the run home. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide towards rear, very wide turning in, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, made no progress thereafter.
Away well, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, angled out 400M, crowed approaching 200M, weakened and eased thereafter.
Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the outside, peaked on turn, very wide into straight, weakened early in straight.
Moderately away from a wide draw, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight.
