Jumped well, raced in midfield on the stands' side, hard ridden after passing 300M, finished off very strongly to score.
Bumped start, raced prominently, 2 away from the stands' rail, hit the front 300M, kept on well to 50M, headed and weakened gradually thereafter.
Made contact at start, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on the stands' side, made good progress final 400M to take a place, nearest on line.
Shifted in at start and made contact, sent forward to take the lead on the stands' rail, peaked and headed 300M, weakened final 150M.
Made contact at start, positioned a length behind the leader on the stands' rail, showed limited response final 400M.
Bumped start and unbalanced, raced towards rear nearer to the middle track, 2 to 3 lengths back, only showed limited response final 400M.
Bumped start, raced prominently on the stands' side, peaked on run 300M, weakened final 150M.
Began well from gate 1, raced in the middle of the track, a length or so back, peaked near 400M, weakened final furlong.
Moderately away from gate 10, raced at rear on the stands' rail, failed to make any progress final 400M. (Blood in trachea.)
Made contact at start, raced behind midfield, 2 away form the stands' rail, peaked 400M, weakened thereafter.
Slow away, eased to sit just off the leaders, lack room 4-2, ran on strongly when clear.
Pushed to share the lead, hung on well until 50M overhauled.
Hard ridden to share the lead, ran on for 3rd.
Pushed early, sat off the leaders, just held ground.
At rear, made steady ground 300M.
Slow away, at rear, progressed steadily 300M, over the final 200M raced with its head on the side and lay out, requiring its rider to stop riding and correct his mount on a number of occasions.
Behind the leaders, out of fuel 250M.
Eased back, no dash.
Began very awkwardly, pushed forward emptied 400M (see incident report).
Behind midfield, no progress.
Midfield, never improved.
Slow away, never competitive. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings
Eased back, never a factor.
Never competitive. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Urged along to take forward position, wide and without cover throughout in handy position, asked for effort on straightening, worked home strongly to score.
Settled midfield, 3 wide with cover, responded solidly in the straight, missed by 1/2L.
Travelled behind midfield, 3 wide with cover, widest on straightening, gained some ground in the straight.
Taken back at start, then hard ridden to race behind midfield on rail, improved near 300M, made some ground passing 100M.
Crowded at start, raced towards rear, improved passing 400M, made nice ground in the straight.
Hard ridden to take lead, placed pressure passing 400M, one-paced in the straight.
Began only fairly, lost its right front plate passing 1100M, settled midfield on rail, one-paced when asked for effort.
Raced towards rear, 3 wide with cover, finished one-paced.
Settled in box seat, placed pressure near 400M, limited response in the straight.
Settled behind midfield, asked for effort but only limited response.
Raced in front of midfield, placed pressure but gave ground passing 200M.
Taken back at start, placed pressure rounding the Home Turn, no response in the straight.
Sat outside the lead with nice early speed, passing 300M was checked, weakened near 200M.
Began very awkwardly and lost ground, raced at rear, never responded.

Bumped at start, raced at the tail in first furlong. Made steady progress mid-race to be midfield at half-way, entered last section only 2.5L from lead before closing strongly to strike lead at the 75m & win drawing away.

Crowded at start before racing just worse than midfield in early stages. Moved closer to lead mid-race, shifted inwards at 400m when just over 2L behind before closing well to second near 100m, finishing 1.5L clear of third.

Drifted back from inside barrier & raced at the tail after first furlong. Continued near the tail when racing the closest to middle of the straight course. Entered last section 3.5L behind before finishing strongly to third.

Bumped at start before mustering speed & sharing lead in middle stages. Continued to share narrow lead until being joined by second at the 100m mark before being caught for third on line. Decent debut.

Raced in midfield throughput early & middle stages. Continued to track fancied rivals when entering last section only 1.5L behind. Continued only 1L from lead at 100m mark before peaking & holding fifth place.

Showed speed to share lead soon after the start before continuing to race within a length of the lead in middle stages when one horse away from outside rail. Battle don ok to midfield in the final furlong & wasn't beaten far.

Showed early speed & shared lead in early & middle stages when racing on the stand side rail. Continued to share narrow lead at the 100m before over-run in concluding stages. Weakened to midfield but wasn't beaten far.

Drifted back & raced rearward in early & middle stages. Second last entering last section, began making steady progress before being checked near 200m before again closing off steadily late. Not beaten far & slight excuse.

Began awkwardly, heavily bumped & consequently raced near the tail. Continued near the rear, 3.5L from lead entering last section before passing a few rivals when running on late despite being awkwardly placed in final 75m.
Shifted ground & bumped at start before settling within a length of the lead in early & middle stages. Gave ground in last furlong & was beaten 5L.

Showed some speed to race in midfield, closer to center of the track but only around a length from the lead for majority. Came under hard riding passing 400m, bumped & unbalanced 250m before weakening quickly last furlong.

Mustered speed after start to improve & race effectively in a line of three in lead. Continued keenly in middles stages, asked for full effort at 250m before weakening out sharply in final 150m. (See report, must trial).
Settled in midfield, following the co-leader when racing along the stand side rail. Came under hard riding approaching half-way before weakening out in final 300m to be second last, over 8L behind.
Began awkwardly, bumped & lost ground & raced near the tail throughout. Began yielding ground from half-way before weakening further to be long last.
Bumped start, raced behind midfield on the outside, 4 to 5 lengths back, wider turning in, finished off very strongly to score by a neck.
Taken back from gate 11, raced 2 wide at rear, commenced move after passing 550M, very wide turning in, finished off very strongly to take 2nd.
Average to begin, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross near 700M, angled out 450M, hit the front early in straight, kept on well but unable to hold off the first two late.
Jumped well, positioned 2 wide, a length or so back, wider turning in, kept on well in straight but always held.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, angled out after passing 300M, finished off evenly.
Began awkwardly, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, peaked 200M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, showed limited response in straight.
Began very awkwardly and bumped, raced at tail, 8 lengths back, a bit closer on turn, commenced move 500M, showed some response early in straight, peaked on run 200M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Jumped well from the widest draw, sent forward to take the lead, found rail near 700M, challenged turning in, headed early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide with no cover in midfield, 3 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced towards rear on the inside, 6 lengths back, same margin back on turn, made no progress in straight.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 6 lengths back on turn, showed limited response early in straight, steadied near 300M, weakened final furlong.
Brushed at start, found cover but wide in front of midfield, kept kicking in the straight and scored comfortably by 2L.
Sent forward, led on the rail from about 800M, kept going but was no match to the winner.
Began only fairly, in midfield along the rail, held up until found clear running near 250M, hit the line strongly.
Raced in worse than midfield, along the rail, closed off fairly once found daylight near 350M.
Urged along, prominent, taken out 3 wide near 700M, slightly crowded at 350M, one paced.(See Incident Report)
In front of midfield, along the rail, caught up with leader by 500M, held up from then till 200M, ran on fairly thereafter.
Stumbled after start, then taken back, at tail wide but with cover, ran on steadily.
In about midfield, 2 wide, crowded at 500M when disappointed for a run, made slight ground.
Began well, eased and slotted into midfield, wide but with cover, one paced and emptied late.
In worse than midfield, wide but had cover, travelled keenly, did not threaten.
Crowded start, raced in worse than midfield, wide and no cover at turn, no dash, faded passing 200M.
Hard ridden, settled outside lead, run ended approaching 200M.
Jumped smartly then eased, at tail 2 wide, badly checked at 500M, showed nothing thereafter.(Bled from both nostrils)
Ridden and was prominent, unable to hold position from near 900M, never a factor.

Settled wide in midfield, ridden forward from the 1000 metres to reach 6th some 3L back 3-wide rounding home bend, given reminders after straightening, quickened well inside 180 metres to hit the front passing the 50 metres.

Began well, pulled his way forward to hit the front over 1000 metres out, ceded advantage on the rail 750 metres out, renewed effort to lead inside the 300 metres, unable to sustain effort and caught inside the 50 metres.
Settled not far off in 5th on the rail, baulked for a run early in straight, obtained run 200 metres out, kept on same pace without quickening.
Taken back for inside run travelling in last few, saved ground on the rail turning in, baulked for a run early in straight, finished off the race well inside final 200 metres.
Prominent early, steadied slightly backward to 7th just over 3L off the pace, baulked behind runners until the 220 metres, finished off the race well inside final 100 metres.
Soon dropped to last few travelling wide most of the way, made up good ground down the centre of home straight. (Jockey warned for not riding out.)
Hampered early, improved steadily down back straight to reach 3rd 3-wide without coming onto home bend, in similar position entering home straight, weakened steadily after straightening.

Broke well from a wide gate, led on the far side of back straight until slightly headed over 1000 metres out, re-gained narrow advantage 2-wide home bend, unable to sustain effort and headed inside final 300 metres.
Taken back to last from the widest gate, came under pressure at the 900 metres coming onto home bend, remained last into straight, ran past well-beaten horses in closing stages.

Crowded early and soon given reminders, recovered to be just worse than midfield in 11th after first 200 metres, gained closer to 8th under reminders on the rail rounding home bend, had no more to give inside final 200 metres.
Restrained to just worse than midfield travelling 3-wide most of the way, went wider into home straight, one-paced.
Travelled keenly in or about midfield, 3-wide rounding home bend and wider into straight, faded steadily under pressure inside final 200 metres.
Ridden positively from a wide gate, settled just off the pace in 4th, weakened steadily under pressure shortly after straightening.
Settled in rear of midfield, gave ground steadily rounding home bend, made no further impression in straight.
Sent forward, crossed to the lead 700M, travelled strongly into straight, pushed out 250M, continued on well to win cosily.
Chased leader on inside, unable to obtain clear running until 200M, tried hard final stages to be nearest at the line.
Had a ground saving trip from draw 1, settled towards the rear of midfield, no clear run early straight, stayed on steadily over final 250M.
Reserved towards the rear, raced keenly 900M, closed off well from 350M, just missed 3rd.
Settled in midfield along the inside rail, stayed on mildly in the straight, not able to challenge first 2.
Taken back early stages to obtain cover, had to switch wide for clear run in straight, steadied 200M, stayed on and did best work towards the finish without threatening first 2.
Unable to slot in from wide draw, chased leaders into straight, had his chance, no extra final 150M.
Travelled in a 3-wide position midfield, no cover from 600M, ran home same pace, no threat to leaders.
Settled towards the rear, held up early straight, unable to finish off when placed under maximum pressure 250M.
In touch tracking leaders, steadied 650M, faded passing 200M to finish last.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, hit the front 250M, kept on very well to the line and scored.
Taken back from gate 12, raced towards rear on the outside, commenced move after passing 600M, very wide turning in, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Missed the start, raced at rear on the inside, 2 wide turning in, closed off well to take a place.
Jumped with them, raced prominently, 2 wide, allowed rival to cross near 1000M, commenced move after passing 600M, showed some response early in straight, no extra final furlong.
Taken back from gate 11, raced 2 wide at rear, commenced move after passing 600M, very wide turning in, finished off well without threatening the first few.
Began well, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, no clear running until final 100M, showed some response thereafter.
Jumped with them, sent forward to take the lead, led by 3/4L, challenged early in straight, peaked and headed 250M, weakened final 150M. (Roarer.)
Began only fairly, positioned behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.

Away well, unable to slot in early, trapped very wide, a length or so back, moved a bit closer after passing 1200M, 2 wide from 1000M, 3/4L back on turn, challenged the leader early in straight, peaked 250M, weakened thereafter.
Moderately away, trapped wide in midfield, 2 to 3 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Jumped well from gate 13, raced behind midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, commenced move after passing 700M, very wide turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, commenced move after passing 700M, very wide into straight, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide towards rear, 3 wide from 600M, showed nothing in straight, eased final 100M.
Moderately away, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, finished off very strongly to score.
Jumped well, positioned 2 wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, there to turn, angled out 450M, finished off well to take 2nd.
Moderately away from gate 1, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off well to take a place.
Shifted out at start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the first few late.
Slowly away, raced at tail, 10 lengths back in the middle stages, moved closer along the rail on turn, made some headway in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began fairly, raced 2 wide towards rear early, found rail near 800M, commenced move after passing 500M, made some progress in straight.
Slightly inconvenienced at start, raced at rear on the inside early, 2 wide approaching 800M, very wide turning in, made minor progress in straight.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 wide from 600M, very wide turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Began smartly, raced 2 wide better than midfield, angled out 500M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Jumped well, raced prominently but very wide early, 2 wide from 850M, 3/4L back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider turning in, failed to close off in straight.
Strode forward to race outside the leader throughout. Dashed up to assume the lead near the 300m mark before continuing on lead all the way to hold three-quarter length advantage on line.

Ridden forward from gate 12 but caught 3 deep without cover just behind leading trio throughout. Cornered under 2L behind before being badly hampered near 200m between runners before closing well to second. (See report).

Lovely run on leaders back throughout. Shifted wider approaching 300m mark before veering out badly, bumping & hampering rivals near 225m. Rebalanced at 150m before closing well to just miss second. (Must trial, see report).

Came across from widest gate to race in midfield, 3 wide with cover throughout. Eased wider on straightening when just over 2L behind before being badly hampered near 200m. Continued to close well late & was just behind 2nd.

Obtained good position in midfield between runners throughout. Entered last section just under 3L from lead, shifted over heels to obtain clear running at the 300m before closing strongly final 150m to be beaten under 1L.
Showed customary early speed to lead. Joined & headed by winner at the 300m mark before boxing away bravely in late stages to be beaten only 1.5L on line.

Bumped after start, had no early speed & drifted back to race third last along rail. Continued in second half, over 5L from lead entering last section before closing off the strongest off all in late stages. Only beaten 2L.

Drifted back to race worse than midfield after start. Raced slightly wide but with cover after first bend when 7L from lead. Shifted to be widest runner on straightening before closing well to midfield but only 2L behind.

Had soft run along the rail two pairs behind lead throughout. Entered last section 3L from the lead, stayed along the rail in the straight but finished off only fairly & was passed by a number of rivals late. (Blood in trachea).

Raced in midfield but was left racing 4 wide without cover from the 1000m mark. Continued wide around bend, straightened 4L from the lead before doing a relatively good job to maintain place & margin in dash to line. Excuse.

Bumped at start before improving position to race in midfield between runners. Shifting down to rail approaching first bend when 4.5L from lead. Shifted wider just prior to straightening before weakening in last section.
Steadied in early stages & shifted back to second last. Shifted wider entering passing the 400m mark when 6.5L from the lead before failing to make any headway in dash to line. Well beaten.

Raced in midfield three deep between runners but with cover. Checked away from heels near the 900m & lost some ground before continuing in second half approaching corner. Made no headway in straight & was second last.
Began only fairly before being shifted behind runners to race at the tail. Continued to race last on straightening before failing to make any headway & finishing 7.5L behind. Last.

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Away well, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground to turn, angled out after passing 400M, finished off very strongly to score. (See Incidents Report.)
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, took the lead near 600M, led by a length on turn, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the winner late.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail behind midfield, saved ground to turn, angled out after passing 400M, made very good progress in straight to take a place.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 lengths back on turn, finished off strongly to make frame.
Average to begin, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, kept to inside after straightening and made reasonable progress.
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced better than midfield on the inside, angled out 500M, made minor progress in straight.

Jumped with them, raced 3 wide slightly behind midfield, sent forward after passing 900M, positioned 2 wide, a length or so back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 200M. (See Incidents Report.)
Out with rest, sent forward to take the lead, headed near 600M, peaked on turn, weakened gradually in straight.
Away with them, raced better than midfield on outer, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight.
Taken back from gate 10, raced at tail, 8 to 9 lengths back, commenced move 550M, very wide turning in, peaked early in straight, eased final furlong.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, unable to maintain position 500M, emptied early in straight.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, peaked on turn, eased early in straight. (See Incidents Report.)
At back, 2 wide, dashed strongly 300M to score.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, dashed strongly 300M for 2nd.
Eased at start, 2-4 wide, dashed well 300M.
Eased to sit behind the leaders, 2 wide, led 300M, hung on until 100M overhauled.
Sat just off the leader, ran on until 100M weakened.
Eased back, trapped 3 wide, little dash 200M.
Bumped start, pushed to keep up in midfield along the fence, no dash.
Settled in front of midfield, no progress. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Trapped 3 wide throughout in front of midfield, weakened 200M.
Took rail and lead, out of fuel 300M. Was found to have sustained a minor laceration to left hind heel when back to Sha Tin.
Eased to obtain box seat, emptied 300M.
Never a factor. Was found to have a continuous displacement of the soft palate after racing.
Urged to race outside the lead, quickened near 200M to score.
At the start was hampered, took box seat with nice early speed, responded solidly in the straight.
At the start was hampered, settled midfield on rail, made nice ground near 100M.
At the start was hampered, travelled keenly in middle stages, responded well in the straight.
Niggled to take lead, lay out rounding the Home Turn, one-paced in the straight.
Raced midfield, tried to improve passing 400M, finished one-paced.
Began awkwardly and lost ground, raced at rear, placed pressure near 400M, gained some ground passing 100M.
Settled towards rear, one-paced in the straight, failed to make impression.
Wide and without cover in handy position throughout, weakened passing 200M.
Raced midfield, 3 wide with cover, gave ground in the straight.
Taken back at start, raced at tail, no response in the straight.
Raced in front of midfield, placed pressure rounding the Home Turn, faded out near 100M.
Began very awkwardly before improving position from outside barrier to lead. Enjoyed moderate early sections in front before finishing well to hold 0.75L advantage on line.

Raced three deep in midfield without cover before getting some cover momentarily near the 500m. Straightened around 2L from lead before closing well to improve to second approaching 100m, beaten under 1L on line.

Drifted back after start & raced just worse than midfield between runners. Shifted wider on straightening when around 3.5L behind before closing well in late stages to be beaten just over a length in third.

Steadied approaching first turn when racing close to heels before drifting back to third last near 800m when racing wide with cover. Cornered widest when improving before finishing well, beaten only 1.5L.
Began the fastest & held lead before being headed by winner near 1000m mark & crossed soon after. Continued on leaders back on straightening before maintaining 2L deficit all the way to line.

Checked at start & shifted behind runners to race at tail. Continued a clear last in middle stages, 7L behind at 800m. Shifted to be widest runner on straightening before closing well to be beaten only 2L in midfield.

Drifted back after first bend & relegated to second last near the 1000m. Continued near the tail approaching corner when 5L behind before shifting outwards to be second widest runner & making up a length or two to midfield.

Crowded start & consequently raced in second half when caught 4 wide without cover. Continued very wide before improving position to race outside leaders at 500m. Emptied near 200m, gave a length late after very tough run.

Raced outside lead early before being crossed & racing at the flanks of the new leader in middle stages. Dropped over a length behind on straightening before weakening out in final 250m to be beaten 5L.

Raced just behind leaders before racing keenly & being checked away from heels near the 1000m. Settled better near the 800m when racing 1,1. Hung inwards after straightening before weakening poorly in last 250m.

Raced on leaders back early stages before being shuffled further back near 600m. Continued along the inside on straightening around 3L behind before having limited room near 200m & playing no part thereafter. (See report).

Didn't begin fast & raced worse than midfield on rail early before moving slightly closer near 700m. Shuffled further back passing 600m mark, 4.5L behind on straightening before weakening to last, 8.5L behind on line.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move after passing 500M, hit the front 150M, kept on well to hold off the challengers.
Jumped with them, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, saved ground on turn, kept to inside after straightening and finished off strongly to take 2nd, just narrowly beaten.
Taken back from gate 9, raced 2 wide behind midfield, commenced move after passing 550M, very wide into straight, made very good progress in the run home to be nearest on line.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, angled out 450M, closed off well to make frame, nearest on line.
Away well, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, found rail near 550M, sat right behind the leader on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide at rear early, wider after passing 700M, moved a bit closer on turn, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home to be nearest on line.
Shifted out at start and bumped, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened close home.
Shifted out at start, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Crowded on jumping, showed no early speed, raced at tail, 10 lengths or so back, moved a bit closer on turn, very wide turning in, made minor progress in straight.
Out with rest, raced 2 wide, 5 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, made little progress in straight.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, peaked on turn, weakened gradually in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Niggled along, outside lead initially, got cover when a runner improved at 700M, continued on nicely to score by a neck.
Sent forward, took rail and led, kept kicking but had to settle for 2nd, finished a neck behind. (See Incident Report)
Eased back, at rear and raced 2 wide, made nice ground and hit the line strongly.
Settled in midfield, along the rail, made nice run home inside final 100M.
Hard ridden forward, wide until settled outside lead at 700M, one paced home. (See Incident Report)
One-out one-back initially, keen and shuffled back near 700M, finished off fairly.
Bumped start, raced in worse than midfield, wide and no cover, ran home steadily.
Slightly slow away, in behind midfield 2 wide, ran on moderately.
Taken back, at tail along the rail, one paced.
Crowded start, behind midfield along the rail, held ground until emptied near 150M.
Ridden along amongst the leaders from the one gate, taken one back to avoid speed battle turning into back straight, came to challenge over 200 metres out and gained upper hand close to home.

Driven along from a wide gate to vie for lead, obtained rails run over 900 metres out and narrow advantage eventually just inside the 800 metres, went over 1L clear into the straight but caught close to home.

Close up before inconvenienced and lost position 1000 metres out, travelled mainly within 3L of pace in 5th down back straight, in similar position in 6th rounding home bend, fought on steadily under pressure to claim 3rd late.
Travelled just worse than midfield, fought on steadily to narrowly miss 3rd.
Broke well from a wide gate vying for lead most of the way to the 700 metres, settled just off the pace from approaching home bend, ran home one-paced.
Inconvenienced and lost position passing the 1000 metres, travelled in midfield to straight swinging wide, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Taken well back from the widest gate, trailing in last when switched wide for a run 400 metres out, went the widest turning in, made up good ground under pressure down the centre of home straight.
Crowded early and settled in rear, remained wide in last few to straight, went past a few well-beaten horses in closing stages.
Soon dropped to midfield despite ridden along, travelled 3-wide in back straight dropping steadily to 9th approaching home bend, fought on steadily under pressure without threatening.

Stumbled at start, ridden to recover along the rail to forward of midfield in 6th, made steady headway to 3L 5th coming onto home bend, saved ground turning in but unable to sustain effort inside final 100 metres.
Crowded shortly after start, dropped well behind despite ridden along, saved ground on the inside turning for home, made no impression in straight.

Travelled wide without cover with the leaders, restrained some 2L back to 4th after turning into back straight but remained without cover, folded up quickly from over 400 metres out. (Irregular heart rhythm)
Taken across behind runners after the start, settled towards the rear 5Ls back, headway from 400M, ran on strongly to lead 80M out, won going away.
Began well, always in touch travelling ahead of midfield, stayed on well final 300M to go 2nd near line, not reached winner.
Quickly crossed to the lead after the start, pressed by rival 600M, opened up 2L lead early straight, headed 80M, faded and lost 2nd near line.
Tracked leaders, 2nd turning for home, fought hard but always held.
Settled towards the rear, driven wide from 450M, finished off well down outside of track without threating first 3.
From wide draw strode forward to race one out one back, shoved along 550M, not quickened on straightening, kept on same pace to line.
Crowded for room on jumping, settled towards the rear along the 3-path, moved closer passing 700M, responded only fairly on straightening.
Held up in midfield along the fence, bustled along 600M, not mustered the pace to challenge turning home, never threatened.
Held up 2-wide behind midfield, driven out nearing 500M, failed to finish off.
Switched off to race in last, 8Ls to make up 400M, didn't respond under pressure, ran past beaten horses only.
Chased leaders, wide no cover throughout the race, commenced to give ground 450M, struggled home.

Caught 3-wide in midfield, made forward move 750M to join leader, came under pressure home turn, soon beaten and eased. (Jockey : elected to improve his position when tempo of the race steadied up on entering back straight.)
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out 900M, moved closer after passing 800M, 1 to 2 lengths back on turn, finished off strongly to score.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced towards rear on the inside, 2 wide from 1000M, 4 lengths or so back on turn, very wide into straight, made very good progress in the run home to take 2nd.
Moderately away, positioned on rail in midfield, 2 wide from 700M, 2 lengths or so back on turn, closed off well to take a place.
Jumped with them, raced towards rear on outer, moved closer on turn, finished off well to make frame.
Began only fairly, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, angled out after passing 500M, very wide turning in, showed good response early in straight, peaked on run 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, moved a bit closer after passing 800M, 4 lengths or so back on turn, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home without threatening.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, very wide on turn, made some progress in straight.
Moderately away from gate 11, sent forward to take the lead, challenged from 800M, headed early in straight, remained prominent until no extra final 50M.

Began smartly, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross 1250M, 2W after entering the back straight, challenged the leader turning in, took the lead early in straight, peaked and headed 75M, weakened thereafter.
Away with them, raced slightly better than midfield on the inside, moved closer along the rail on turn, showed good response early in straight, no extra final 50M. (Jockey dropped whip 250M.)
Began well from gate 1, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed limited response in straight, eased final 50M.
Moderately away, raced at rear on the outside early, sent forward after passing 1100M, challenged the leader from 800M, 3 wide on turn, weakened final 400M. (See Racing Incidents.)

Bumped start and unbalanced, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, finished off very strongly final 200M to score.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, there to turn, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, just beaten by a neck.
Jumped well from gate 12, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length on turn, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the first two final 50M.
Taken back from gate 11, raced at tail, 8 lengths back, moved closer on turn but still 5-1/2L behind, made very good progress in straight to make frame.
Away well, positioned 2 wide, a length or so back, there to turn, kept on evenly in straight.
Average to begin, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide with no cover, a length or so back, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Made contact at start, taken back to race at rear, 6 lengths or so back, last turning in, made some headway in straight.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, showed limited response in straight, eased final 50M. (Blood in trachea.)
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced 3 wide in midfield, 3 lengths back, wider after passing 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, failed to close off in straight.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, similar position on turn, failed to close off in straight. (Lost right front plate near 900M.)
Slow away, midfield, unleashed strong finishing efforts 250M to score.
Pushed to share lead, hung on well until 100M overhauled.
Pushed to keep up just behind the leaders, ran on well for 3rd, dropped whip 150M.
Eased back, dashed well 250M.
Pushed early, behind midfield, dashed well 200M.
Very slow away, at rear, little dash 200M.
Shared lead easily, out of fuel 250M. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Slow away, pushed forward, emptied 200M.
Never better than midfield.
Slow away, never a factor.
Taken back at start, settled midfield on rail, improved near 300M, scored by 4L.
Raced inside the lead on rail, asked for effort on straightening, finished well.
Settled midfield, after 1100M raced wide and without cover, made ground passing 200M.
Raced behind the lead, niggled from 550M, ran on in the straight.
Raced at tail, placed pressure passing 500M, gained some ground in the straight.
Settled midfield, tried to improve near 450M, one-paced in the straight.
Raced towards rear, limited response when placed pressure in the straight.
Began only fairly and ridden along when raced tight, then steadied when unable to improve, near 1350M was checked away from heels, gave ground near 200M.
Ridden along to take forward position, took lead in one-off position, faded out passing 300M, rider questioned.
Settled behind midfield, 3 wide with cover, weakened in the straight, blood in trachea.
Strode to easy lead from gate 13. Set very slow mid-race sections, where rival was on leaders back with a six length gap to third. Raced clear mid-straight & held 0.75L advantage on line.

Raced third on the rail throughout but 6L from the lead passing the 800m. Continued third but multiple lengths behind the leading pair on straightening, before making continual ground to second. (Inquiry opened into riding).

Raced in midfield away from the rail, over 8L from the lead at the 800m mark where first two raced well clear of remainder. Eased wider on straightening, moved to second place at 175m before holding third on line.

Buffeted & lost ground after start & consequently raced worse than midfield along rail. Continued rearward, over 10L from lead at half-way. Shifted inwards on straightening before making good late ground in slowly run race.
Raced just worse than midfield between runners for the majority. Shifted wider on straightening when 3.5L from lead before making steady late ground down the outside to be beaten about 2L.
Raced in midfield on the rail throughout. Entered last section under 3L from the lead before shifting outwards at the 300m mark & making up a length when holding midfield finish.

Raced 4th, away from the rail but over 6L from lead passing half-way. Ridden along to improve approaching 600m before awkwardly placed at 500m. Kept on steadily in straight & wasn't beaten far in midfield (See report).

Pushed forward & raced at the leaders flanks when first two went well clear of the remainder of the field in the early & middle stages. Dropped off the leader passing the 250m before weakening a few lengths to midfield late.

Slow to begin, raced with only two runners behind soon after start. Checked away from heels at 700m when racing keenly. Shifted to be the widest runner on straightening when 5L behind before making no impression thereafter.

Steadied & shifted back to last soon after the start. Continued at the rear on straightening when over 5L from the lead before being unable to challenge in final section after getting too far back in very slowly run race.

Raced in midfield along the rail throughout. Shifted wider to obtain clear running on straightening when 3.5L behind before weakening out in last furlong (Not suited to slow tempo  rider, see report).

Raced worse than midfield, 3 deep without cover throughout. Improved slightly in middle stages but continued wide & over 9L from lead at the 800m. Emptied out soon after straightening & weakened to second last.

Shifted across behind runners & raced near the tail throughout. Moved wider & commenced to improve near 700m, forced very wide on straightening before weakening badly in straight. (Didn't feel comfortable-rider, see report).
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, found rail near 850M, saved ground on turn, angled out 200M, finished off strongly to score.
Began only fairly, raced in midfield on rail, saved ground throughout, hit the front near 150M, ran on very well but unable to hold off the winner late.
Commenced well, raced prominently, 2 wide, allowed rival to cross near 1100M, wider after passing 600M, 4 wide turning in, showed good response early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Away well, positioned 2 wide in midfield, 2 to 3 lengths back on turn, angled out 450M, finished off well to make frame, nearest on line.
Began well from gate 1, raced prominently on the inside, took the lead 1000M, challenged turning in, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened gradually close home.
Began only fairly, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, angled out after passing 600M, unable to obtain clear running early in straight, showed limited response thereafter.
Bumped start, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, no daylight early in straight, cleared 200M, made minor progress thereafter.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced 2 wide towards rear, 4 lengths back on turn, one-paced in straight.
Moderately away, raced 3 wide with cover, 2 lengths or so back, carried wider on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Away with them, unable to slot in, trapped very wide, a length or so back, 3 wide from 1000M, no cover throughout, challenged the leader turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Crowded start and unbalanced, sent forward to race prominently on the outside, 2 wide after passing 1100M, challenged the leader turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened and eased thereafter.
Rolled forward into the lead from barrier 1, kept going and maintained lead to score by a short-head.
Hard ridden forward, was prominent, 2 wide with cover at turn, ran on nicely, missed by a short-head.
Bumped start, at rear along the rail, ran on strongly once shifted to clear ground near 200M.
Niggled along, settled in front of midfield, 2 wide with cover, closed off fairly to the line.
Sent forward, obtained box-seat, pretty much one paced in the straight.
Travelled in about midfield, wide and had no cover, ran on moderately.
At rear, raced 3 wide with cover at turn, showed little dash in the straight only.
Jumped awkward, asked to recover forward position, sat outside lead, emptied passing 300M. (See Incident Report)
Bumped start, raced towards the rear, wide but had cover, never threaten.
In about midfield, 2 wide, pressured all the way, not competitive.
Bumped start, at the tail throughout, never in contention.
Ridden to gain narrow lead, obtained rails run passing the 700 metres when joined by eventual 2nd, narrowly headed upon straightening but fought back gamely to re-claim lead about 100 metres out.
Began fairly from a wide gate, worked his way forward out wide to join race leader rounding home bend, gained slender lead on straightening only to be outsprinted 100 metres out.

Ridden along to be up with the pace, taken back for cover inside the 600 metres, renewed effort when angled off the rail for a run shortly after straightening, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Closer up before settling some 2.5L back in 5th coming onto home bend, 3-wide into the straight, quickened inside the final 200 metres to narrowly miss the place-getters.

Taken back to last from the widest gate, snuck up on the rail passing the 800 metres towards midfield, saved ground and reached 6th some 3L back turning in, switched onto the rail for a run passing the 300 metres and ran on.
Moderate start, settled in last few dropping steadily rounding home bend to last into straight despite niggling along, produced good late impression inside final 200 metres.

Settled not far off on the rail, lost position and dropped to 6th some 3L back passing the 800 metres, fought on under pressure from a similar position into straight, unable to sustain effort inside final 100 metres.
Gradually settled wide without cover in last few, circle the field rounding home bend and the widest in midfield into straight, kept on one pace.
Broke well from a wide gate, gradually taken back to 3-wdie in rear of midfield, slightly worse turning into home straight, kept on steadily without threatening.
Niggled along in better than midfield, gained steadily 3-wide to be one back in 3rd rounding home bend, folded up quickly after straightening.
Stumbled shortly after start, soon dropped to last few becoming last 750 metres out, wide into straight and went past well-beaten horses.

Bumped and unbalanced at start losing ground, ridden steadily up the rail until running into heels when 2L 6th and lost position inside the 900 metres, continued to drop towards the rear rounding home bend, no extra in straight.
From wide draw sent forward and crossed to the lead before home turn, kicked nicely clear top of straight, kept on well to line, never seriously challenged.
Held up behind midfield along the 3-path, wider from 550M, ran on well to go 2nd 250M, tried hard but unable to catch the runaway winner.
Reserved towards the rear, brought wide passing 600M, stayed on well to go 3rd 150M. No impression on winner.
Chased leaders, briefly went 2nd early straight, run ended 150M, held on for non-threatening 4th just.
Dropped back from wide barrier, settled near rear, wide into straight, ran home mildly, never a threat to first 3.
Positioned ahead of midfield, kept on one paced over final 400M. No impression on leaders.
Steadied to obtain cover, held up in last, ran past beaten horses in the straight. (Jockey : did not travel comfortably at any stage and didn't stretch out in straight.)
Began fairly, recovered to race ahead of midfield, no clear run early straight, gave limited response when clear, weakened final 200M.
Settled in midfield along the inside, had difficulty obtaining clear running early straight, not quickened when driven out from 300M
Held up in mid-division, driven 500M but not going the pace to challenge leaders, never involved.

Began fairly, ridden along to make up lost ground, chased leaders on settling, travelled only fairly and came under pressure 600M, gave ground in the straight. (Jockey unable to explain for the disappointing run.)
Steadied to obtain cover early stages, raced 3-wide towards the rear, wide into straight, couldn't go on. Never in the picture.
In mid-division, wide no cover from 900M, crept closer to leaders 600M, run ended 300M, weakened away.
Chased leaders 2-wide, came under pressure 500M, quickly beaten early straight, finished tailed out. (Unacceptable Performance.)
Away well, sent forward to race prominently, allowed rival to cross near 700M, easy run on turn, finished off strongly to snatch win on the line.
Away with them, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, closed off well to take 2nd, just narrowly beaten.
Jumped well from gate 11, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, challenged the leader turning in, took the lead early in straight, kept on well but unable to hold off the first two late.
Moderately away, raced behind midfield on the inside, inconvenienced near 700M, 2 wide on turn, made good progress in straight to make frame, no threat to the first few.
Taken back from gate 8, raced at rear on the outside, bumped near 700M, 5 lengths back turning in, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Began well from a wide draw, trapped very wide in midfield, 3 lengths or so back, no cover throughout, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Crowded start, raced 2 wide behind midfield early, made contact near 700M, 3 wide on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Crowded start, showed no early speed, raced at rear, 5 lengths or so back, bumped near 700M, 4 wide on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Quickly into stride, sent forward to take the lead, found rail 700M, challenged turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Made contact at start, raced 3 wide in midfield early, found rail near 600M, 3 lengths back turning in, showed no response in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)

Average to begin, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, made heavy contact with the running rail near 700M, dropped to rear on turn, failed to close off in straight. (Superficial laceration to the right flank.)
Commenced well, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length on turn, kept on very well to the line, easily scored.
Began only fairly, raced slightly behind midfield on outer, 5 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Began well, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, there to turn, hard ridden from 400M, finished off evenly.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, finished off strongly to make frame, nearest finish.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide behind midfield early, found rail near 900M, saved ground on turn, showed some response early in straight, peaked on run 200M, ran on evenly to the line.
Away well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, wider after passing 500M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Moderately away, raced better than midfield on the outside, moved closer after passing 900M, no cover throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 2 wide at rear, still 8 to 9 lengths back turning in, passed some tired runners in straight.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M. (Minor lacerations to the right front and right hind fetlocks.)
Taken back from gate 13, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, very wide turning in, one-paced in the run home.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide slightly better than midfield, no cover on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Away with them, raced 2 wide, 7 lengths back, same margin back on turn, failed to close off in straight.

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began fairly, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, a bit closer on turn, angled out 400M, finished off strongly to score by a narrow margin.
Commenced well, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, 3 wide from 700M, moved closer on turn, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the winner on line.
Began well from gate 1, sat right behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, closed off well to take a place, just narrowly beaten.
Out with rest, raced 2 wide at rear, sent forward after passing 850M, shared lead on turn, peaked and headed 200M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, angled out after passing 750M, 3 lengths or so back on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Fast into stride, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length, shared the lead with rival on turn, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened thereafter. (Roarer.)
Moderately away, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, unable to maintain position after passing 700M, emptied early in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Raced at rear throughout, never a factor. (See Racing Incidents.)
Eased to sit in midfield, 2 wide, progressed steadily 300M to score.
Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, closed off strongly 300M for 2nd.
Hard ridden forward, took box seat, held ground for 3rd.
Eased it sit in midfield, 2 wide, progressed steadily 250M.
Eased at start, took rail at back, made steady ground 200M.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, lay out rounding the Home Turn, weakened 200M. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Slow away, at back along the fence, ran on ok.
Eased back, 2-3 wide, ran on ok.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, 2 wide, ran on fairly.
Pushed to take rail and lead, out of fuel 200M. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Eased at start, never a factor.
Midfield, emptied 300M. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Ridden along to take lead, responded strongly in the straight, scored unchallenged.
Raced outside the lead, asked for effort near 350M, finished solidly.
Shortly after the start lost its right front plate, settled in box seat, travelled keenly in middle stages, responded solidly in the straight.
Raced towards rear, wide on straightening, made up some nice late ground, rider questioned.
Raced in front of midfield, placed pressure passing 400M, finished well.
Began only fairly, raced behind midfield on rail, tried to improve on straightening, one-paced in the straight.
Hard ridden forward, after 800M was left racing without cover in midfield, wide on straightening, rider dropped whip at the 200M, finished one-paced.
Began awkwardly, settled midfield on rail, placed pressure but only one-paced.
Taken back at start, raced at rear, limited response when asked for effort.
At start was hampered and lost ground, raced at tail, limited response in the straight.
Hampered at start then failed to muster speed despite being ridden along, settled midfield, gave ground passing 200M.
Raced behind midfield, 3 wide with cover, widest on straightening, no response in the straight.

Raced just worse than midfield along the rail for the majority. Shifted away from the rail near 700m, commenced to improve between runners near 400m when 4L behind before closing strongly to strike lead in concluding stages.

Held early lead before being crossed & racing on leaders back 1100m. Held up momentarily on cornering before getting clear running & closing to lead at 200m, hung back inwards towards rail before caught in final stages.

Obtained good position in midfield on the rail throughout. Awkwardly placed near heels at 400m when just under 3L behind, shifted off the rail on cornering, bumped at 300m before closing well in late stages, beaten under 1L.

Steadied form outside gate & shifted back to race at the tail. Continued last at the 400m around 7L behind, shifted very wide on straightening before closing strongly out wide in concluding stages to 4th beaten a length.
Raced in midfield away from the rail throughout. Eased wider entering last section, wider on cornering before finishing evenly to midfield in dash to line.

Raced in midfield away from the rail, without cover before getting position 1,1 near 800m. Eased wider on cornering before, shifted in & bumped 300m, moved close to lead at furlong, before emptying & weakening final 150m.

Ridden forward after start & worked hard to improve to lead passing 1200m mark before crossing to rail soon after. Held 2L advantage at 800m before being joined near the 200m & weakening out thereafter. (Rider questioned).

Caught 3 deep without cover in midfield before working hard to improve to second place near 800m before shifting 2 wide soon after. Continued close to the lead at the furlong pole before emptying & weakening out thereafter.
Raced third last away from the rail for the majority. Hard ridden from the 600m mark, made no improvement in straight & was second last.
The slowest to begin & consequently raced second last throughout. Continued rearward entering last section before failing to make any headway & finishing last.
Clean jump, raced in midfield on the outside early, sent forward after passing 1200M, took the lead 950M, enjoyed the easy lead on turn, kept on very well in straight and scored.
Taken back from a wide gate, raced at tail, 6 lengths or so back, moved closer on turn, very wide into straight, made very good progress in the run home to take 2nd.

Jumped with them, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, allowed rival to cross near 950M, unbalanced near 450M, 3 lengths back turning in, no clear running early in straight, found daylight 200M, closed off well to take a place.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 lengths or so back, 3 wide from 600M, same margin back on turn, finished off well to make frame without threatening.
Began well from gate 1, sent forward to take the early lead, headed after passing 950M, peaked on turn, ran on evenly to the line.
Taken back from gate 9, raced behind midfield on the inside, 2 wide on turn, blocked early in straight, cleared near 200M, only showed limited response thereafter.
Taken back to race at rear on the inside, angled out after passing 750M, 6 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made some headway in the run home.

Out with rest, raced behind midfield on the outside, awkwardly placed near 1300M, moved closer after passing 1100M, 2 lengths or so back in the middle stages, peaked early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Away with them, raced better than midfield on the inside early, dropped to midfield in the middle stages, 4 lengths back turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider after passing 800M, closer on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened and eased final 100M.
Bumped start, recovered to be behind midfield, 2 wide, closed off impressively and won with something in hand.
Jumped awkward, sat in midfield 2 wide, closed off nicely but winner was too good.
In box-seat until shuffled back near 600M, travelled keenly, kept kicking but was no match to first two.
Raced in one-out one-back position, was only one paced in the straight.
Eased back, raced in worse than midfield, along the rail, closed off fairly in the final stages.
Contacted at start, on-pace throughout, wide and no cover from 600M, showed no turn of foot.
Taken back after bumped start, at rear 2 wide, ran on but saved no ground.
Niggled along, prominent, remained 2 wide, checked at 250M, showed nothing thereafter.
Hard ridden forward, wide then worked to take rail and led at 600M, emptied passing 200M.
Bumped start then eased back, at tail throughout, was never in it.
Sat just behind midfield, along the rail, never threaten.
Jumped well, on rail and led until near 800M, remained on pace, faded from 150M.
Ridden to one back position on the rail mainly in 3rd, saved ground on the inside turning for home, gained upper hand in closing stages.
Quickly recovered from moderate start, restrained outside race leader passing the 700 metres, hit the front under pressure over 200 metres out only to be collared close to home.

Began well from a wide gate, travelled prominently and wide without cover in back straight, taken slightly backward coming onto home bend but remained without cover, switched for a run 250 metres out and fought on without threatening.

Broke well from a wide gate but soon taken back, travelled keenly and wide without cover in rear of midfield most of the way to home straight, went very wide on the turn, fought on steadily without threatening.
Broke well from the one gate, gradually settled in around midfield along the rail, saved ground on the inside turning for home, kept on same pace without threatening.
Settled at the tail-end from the widest gate, picked up to the rear end of the field coming onto home bend, saved ground on the inside turning in, unable to sustain effort inside final 200 metres.
Gradually improved to just better than midfield, not far off in 5th turning into home straight, ran home one-paced.

Jumped fairly, soon dropped to one from last despite niggling along, steadied behind runners 600 metres out, commenced move rounding home bend and went widest into straight, ran on steadily down the centre of the track.
Travelled mainly wide in forward of midfield, lost position coming onto home bend, kept on same pace in the run to the line.
Quickly recovered from moderate start, steadied and lost 2L from rear of midfield over 800 metres out dropping to 3rd last, renewed effort from the 500 metres but found nil in home straight. (Lame)
Ridden forward from a wide gate, crossed for rails run in front over 800 metres out, led until dropped out noticeably inside the 200 metres. (Irregular heart rhythm)
Caught wide early stages on jumping from gate 11, moved forward gradually to press leader 750M, kept responding to pressure in straight, got up 50M from home.
Soon led, took them along at steady pace, kept on well turning home, headed near 50M.
Went forward early stages before being steadied to race in midfield, chased on well over final 250M, nearest finish.
Jumped well from draw 1, tracked leaders, raced keenly from 900M, fought on steadily on straightening but always held by leaders.
Settled in midfield along the fence, driven out 350M, held ground over final 200M.
Held up behind mid-division, stayed on mildly over final 300M but never likely.
Chased the pace along the 2-path, fought on same pace final 200M, always held by leaders.
Settled at the rear 7Ls off the pace, made limited progress on straightening, never dangerous.
Shifted across behind runners early stages, eased back to race in the rear, lost touch passing 400M, never a factor.
Crowded for room at the start, held up in midfield, came under pressure 500M, failed to finish off.
Dropped back to race in the rear, weak in the finish, never involved.
Bumped on jumping, raced 2 wide in midfield, 2 to 3 lengths back, there to turn, finished off very strongly to score by a narrow margin.
Bumped start, raced behind midfield on the inside, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, finished off very strongly, just narrowly beaten.
Jumped with them, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, briefly headed after passing 500M, retook the lead early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, ran on evenly to take a place.

Out in line, raced 3 wide with no cover early, 1-1/2L back, found a 2 wide spot with cover near 700M, wider turning in, showed some response early in straight, peaked on run 100M, ran on evenly to the line.
Bumped on jumping, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back, there to turn, no clear running early in straight, made good progress thereafter, nearest on line. (Rider dropped whip 200M.)
Bumped start, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back, very wide turning in, made some headway in straight.
Out with rest, taken back to race 2 wide at rear, 6 lengths back, hard ridden 400M, made some progress in straight.
Jumped well from a wide draw, raced 3 wide in midfield, no cover on turn, very wide into straight, showed limited response early in straight, peaked 150M, ran on evenly thereafter.

Began well from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, there to turn, angled out after passing 400M, showed some response early in straight, made contact 200M, weakened inside final furlong.
Away with them, raced prominently, 2 wide, took the lead 500M, peaked and headed early in straight, made contact 200M, weakened and eased final 150M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the inside, 6 lengths or so back, saved ground on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Began fairly from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, peaked on turn, emptied early in straight.

Began well, raced behind midfield on the outside, moved closer after passing 600M, hard ridden after turning in, finished off very strongly to score by a head.

Jumped well from gate 14, trapped very wide, a length or so back, no cover throughout, moved a bit closer in the middle stages, hit the front early in straight, kept on very well but unable to hold off the winner late.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced 3 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, kept on well in straight to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Began smartly, positioned 2 wide in midfield, angled out 450M, made contact 350M, closed off well to make frame.
Bumped start, sent forward to race prominently, 2 wide, took the lead near 450M, peaked and headed 300M, weakened gradually final furlong.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, showed some response early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Shifted out at start and bumped, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, showed limited response thereafter.
Away well, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground on turn, no daylight early in straight, cleared 250M, failed to make any progress thereafter.
Began awkwardly, positioned 2 wide at rear, crowded near 900M, checked off heels and unbalanced 700M, angled out after passing 600M, made contact near 350M, made no progress thereafter,
Slowly away, raced at rear, 5 lengths or so back, angled out after passing 600M, very wide turning in, showed limited response in straight.
Crowded start, raced at rear on the inside, inconvenienced near 900M, saved ground on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Shifted out at start and bumped, sent forward to race prominently on the inside, took the lead after passing 800M, headed 450M, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M.

Bumped start, raced 3 wide towards rear, made contact 900M, difficult to settle in the middle stages, moved closer after passing 700M, weakened early in straight. (See Racing Incidents.) (Lame right hind leg.) (Roarer.)
Began fairly, raced in midfield on the outside, difficult to settle after passing 1000M, very wide on turn, emptied early in straight.
Slow away, at back, 2-4 wide, progressed steadily 300M to score.
Eased at start, 3-4 wide, made steady ground 300M for 2nd.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 2 wide, progressed steadily 350M.
Hard ridden forward, 2 wide, ran on well 400M, run ended 100M.
Box seat, ran on until 150M weakened.
Slow away, at back on the rails, made ground 200M.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, weakened 250M.
Hard ridden early, 3 wide in midfield, out of fuel 200M. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
At back, 3 wide, ran on fairly in straight.
Behind midfield along the fence, blocked whole straight and checked, not tested.
Pressed forward, emptied 250M. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Eased at start, never competitive.

After being loaded proved fractious and reared on a number of occasions. Then on jumping stood flat-footed, and lost a significant amount of ground. Never a factor. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Pushed forward, dropped off 400M. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Ridden along to race outside the lead, responded solidly in the straight, scored by 1/2L.
Settled behind midfield, 3 wide with cover, made nice ground in the straight, rider questioned.
Raced at rear, improved passing 600M, widest on straightening, gained nice late ground in the straight.
Raced behind midfield on rail, held up in the early part of straight, ran on when asked for effort.
Settled midfield, placed pressure near 500M, worked home nicely.
Travelled wide and without cover throughout outside the leaders, placed pressure in the straight and finished one-paced.
Raced greenly, passing 800M shifted out to prevent causing interference and then raced wide and without cover in midfield, gave ground near 100M.
Jumped well, niggled to take lead, failed to make impression, weakened passing 200M, must trial.
Slow out, raced at tail, tried to improve near 450M, worked home one-paced.
Settled behind midfield, tried to improve passing 500M, weakened passing 300M.
Raced behind the speed on rail, placed pressure in the straight but faded out passing 200M.

Drifted back after the start to race worse than midfield along rail. Moved off the rail on straightening, entered last section 4.5L from lead, shifted wider at 350m before closing strongly to strike lead in final strides.

Raced in midfield between runners for the majority. Dashed between runners at the 200m mark under little riding, moved up to share lead in a line of 3 at the 100m mark before over-run by winner in final strides.

Pushed forward & raced second, away from the rail, about a length from the lead for majority. Continued in second place entering last section, moved to share lead in a line of 3 at 100m mark narrowly beaten on line.

Began well before being steadied & taken back to race worse than midfield, 3 deep but with cover throughout. Eased wider on cornering, entered last section 4.5L behind before finishing strongly in final stages, beaten 1L.

Drifted back after the start before settling third last between runners. Awkwardly placed near heels at the 400m when just under 5L from lead before shifting inwards at 250m & closing well between runners to be beaten under 2L.
Began well, strode forward from outside gate to get good position 1,1. Continued within a length of the lead at the furlong mark before peaking late.

Showed customary early speed to come across from gate 11 to lead. Continued to hold over 1L advantage entering last section, shared lead in a line of 3 at the 100m mark before over-run by fast finishers in concluding stages.

Slow to begin & consequently raced at the tail. Continued last on straightening when over 6L from the lead before doing best work in concluding stages, closing well between runners late to be beaten only 2L in bunched finish.

Shifted across behind runners to race at the tail. Ridden along to improve before cornering, entered last section 5.5L behind, shifted widest in straight before finishing evenly to be beaten just over 2L in bunched finish.

Raced in midfield but caught 3 deep before being left without cover from the 1100m. Battled away in the straight but couldn't finish as well as rivals & consequently only beat two home despite being under 3L behind.

Obtained good position on leaders back throughout. Moved away from the rail on cornering, lay inwards on straightening when continuing in third place before emptying out passing 300m mark & weakening thereafter.
Raced in midfield along the rail throughout. Continued along rail on cornering when around 4.5L from lead before weakening sharply in final 300m to be long last.
Average to begin, positioned 2 wide in midfield, 3 lengths or so back, there to turn, hard ridden after passing 300M, finished off very strongly to score.
Moderately away, sent forward to take the lead, enjoyed the easy lead to turn, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the winner final 50M.
Shifted out at start and made contact, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, 2 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, closed off well to take a place, nearest on line.
Moderately away, raced better than midfield on the outside, 2 lengths or so back, no cover throughout, kept on well in straight to make frame without threatening.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced behind midfield on the inside, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, made some headway in straight.
Began only fairly, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, similar position on turn, angled out 450M, finished off evenly. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 3 wide turning in, made some progress in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced towards rear on the inside, 5 lengths back turning in, finished off evenly.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 lengths or so back on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 7 lengths back, same margin back on turn, finished off evenly.
Jumped well, raced behind midfield on the outside, 6 lengths back turning in, made no progress in straight.
Made contact at start, sat right behind the leader, 2 wide after passing 850M, a length back turning in, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Away well, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, carried wider after passing 850M, same margin back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Asked after start, took box-seat for racing, kept going and won by 1-1/4L.
Niggled along, raced prominently, wide and no cover, continued on nicely for 2nd.
Settled one-out one-back, kept going and closed off strongly for 3rd late.
Raced just in front of midfield, 3 wide but with cover, closed off well under the circumstances. (See Incident Report)
Sat just in front of midfield, along the rail, continued on fairly to the line.
Sent forward, took rail and led, showed no turn of foot and headed passing 200M.
Positively ridden and settled outside the lead, one paced until weakened late.
Settled slightly further back in midfield, 2 wide, closed off moderately. (See Incident Report)
Eased back, raced at the rear, along the rail, ran home evenly.
Raced in worse than midfield, along the rail, made no ground.
In worse than midfield, 3 wide but with cover at turn, didn't close off like usual.
Took back, raced at the tail, never a factor.
Sat just behind midfield, 2 wide, showed nothing.
Raced just behind midfield, along the rail, not competitive.

Settled in rear of the small field, commenced move 600 metres out going 4-wide into straight, hit the front while shifting ground over 300 metres out, kicked over 2L clear inside the 150 metres and flattered, just held on.
Settled in rear of the small field, gained closer to pace coming onto home bend, came to challenge under pressure entering straight, ran on well under pressure to just fail to get up on line.
Settled just over 2L back in 4th, commenced move over 500 metres out going 3-wide when some 1L 4th into straight, run ended shortly after straightening.
Soon took up running setting a sound pace, held 1L advantage most of the way to home bend, headed by eventual winner over 300 metres out, faded inside final 100 metres.
Began well, taken one back 2-wide without cover, gained slightly closer rounding home bend, unable to sustain effort shoftly after straightening.
Niggled at early, settled one back in 3rd on the rail, soon dropped out of contention when pace quickened on straightening.
Settled 4th of 7, picked up strongly inside 400M, led mid-straight, kept on well to the line.
Held up near last, wide into straight, ran on well to take 2nd close home, nearest finish.
Close up behind leaders, travelled strongly into straight, not pace of winner passing 200M, lost 2nd close home.
Began only fairly, settled 5th of 7, stayed on mildly final 350M, not reached top 3.
Chased leader, driven along 500M, outpaced 300M, soon out of contention.
Held up in last, 5Ls off the pace home turn, responded fairly on straightening, no threat to leaders.
Soon led, took them along slowly early stages before quickening up middle stages, caught by rivals 200M, weakened away.
Clean jump, positioned 2 wide slightly behind midfield, commenced move after passing 600M, very wide turning in, finished off very strongly to score by a neck.
Bumped start, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide, travelled well to turn, took the lead early in straight, kept on very well but unable to hold off the winner late.
Away well, sent forward to race prominently, allowed rival to cross near 850M, easy run on turn, angled out 450M, closed off well to take a place.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide at rear, 4 lengths or so back turning in, made very good progress in straight to make frame, nearest on line.
Bumped start, raced behind midfield on the inside, angled out after passing 700M, 3 to 4 lengths back turning in, finished off well to be nearest on line.
Lifted front feet on jumping and away tardily, positioned on rail in midfield, awkwardly placed near 900M, angled out 500M, made some progress in straight.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced behind midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, very wide into straight, made some headway in the run home.
Stumbled at start, sent forward to take the lead, found rail near 850M, travelled well on turn, peaked and headed 300M, ran on evenly to the line.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide towards rear, wider after passing 600M, made some progress in straight.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide better than midfield, carried wider after passing 500M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Began well from gate 1, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, showed limited response early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move 550M, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Began very awkwardly, raced at rear on outer, very wide turning in, finished off evenly.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on rail, saved ground on turn, made no progress in straight.
Bumped shortly after start, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, angled out after passing 500M, took the lead 250M, kept on very well to the line, easily scored.
Began well from gate 12, raced prominently on the outside, 2 wide on turn, kept on well in straight to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Away well, positioned on rail in midfield, 3 lengths or so back, made some progress in straight to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Jumped well, positioned 2 wide, a length or so back, carried wider after passing 500M, kept on well early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, there to turn, no clear running early in straight, angled out 300M, made some headway thereafter.
Began smartly from a wide draw, sent forward to take the lead, found rail 650M, led by 1/2L turning in, peaked and headed 250M, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide towards rear, similar position on turn, made some progress in straight.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide, 2 to 3 lengths back, similar position on turn, made some progress early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.

Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail behind midfield, saved ground on turn, kept to inside early in straight, blocked 300M, angled out 200M, showed limited response thereafter, blocked again final 75M.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced 3 wide slightly better than midfield, no cover from 600M, very wide into straight, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Crowded start, raced at rear on outer, 6 lengths back, very wide turning in, finished off evenly. (See Racing Incidents.)
Made contact at start, raced at rear on the inside, 6 to 7 lengths back on turn, made no progress in straight.
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, 4 lengths back, there to turn, failed to close off in straight.
Slowly away, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
