Began awkwardly, sent forward to take the early lead, headed 1100M, allowed rival to cross near 800M, challenged the leader turning in, hit the front early in straight, kept on very well to the line and scored.
Bumped start, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off well to take 2nd.
Moderately away, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, made very good progress in straight to take a place, nearest on line.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out after passing 400M, finished off evenly.
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced 2 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the inside, there to turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, commenced move after passing 450M, very wide turning in, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Clean jump, raced prominently but 3 wide, took the lead near 1050M, found rail 800M, challenged by rival turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on rail, saved ground throughout, made no progress in straight.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide towards rear, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Taken back from gate 11, raced at rear on the outside, no cover for the majority of the race, a bit closer on turn, very wide into straight, peaked on run 250M, weakened final 150M.
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced at tail throughout, never a factor.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, closed off well 300M to score.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield along the fence, dashed strongly 300M for 2nd.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, hung on well until 100M overhauled.
In front of midfield, 2 wide, raced greenly in straight, dashed well 200M.
Eased at start, took rail at back, dashed well 250M.
At back, trapped 3 wide, dashed well 200M.
Eased at start, took rail, ran on ok in straight. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Pushed to secure box seat, emptied 250M. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Midfield, throughout the race travelled wide and without cover, weakened 300M.
At back, 2 wide, no dash.
At back, 2 wide, never improved.
Eased at start, never competitive.
Raced in box seat, improved near 400M, quickened passing 200M, finished strongly to score.
Took lead without asking, travelled nicely in the lead, responded solidly in the straight, missed by SH.
Settled behind midfield on rail, fought hard in the straight, gained some ground passing 100M.
Ridden along to race outside the lead, made the Home Turn awkwardly, one-paced when asked for effort.
Lost right front plate in early stages, settled midfield, placed pressure, finished one-paced.
Taken back at start, commenced to improve passing 400M, made up some ground in the straight.
Settled midfield on rail, rider dropped whip near 350M, gave ground passing 50M.
Taken back at start, raced towards rear, limited response when placed pressure.
Settled behind the speed, came under pressure in the early part of straight, no response in the straight.
Began only fairly, raced towards rear, placed pressure passing 700M, gave ground in the straight.
Taken back at start, raced towards rear, 3 wide with cover, widest on straightening, weakened near 200M.
Hard ridden along but failed to muster speed, wide and without cover in midfield, came under pressure rounding the Home Turn, faded out in the straight.

Shifted out & bumped at start before settling just worse than midfield. Moved three wide & commenced to improve near 500m, cornered widest before closing very strongly last furlong to strike lead in final stride.
Showed early speed to lead. Increased tempo In middle stages, continued to hold lead until caught by fast finishing winner in final stride. Narrowly beaten.

Shifted across behind runners when racing just worse than midfield along rail. Stayed close to the inside on cornering, shifted outwards at 200m before closing well between runners in concluding stages to be beaten only 1L.

Pushed forward to race outside leader in early stages before being crossed & racing being leading pair with cover from half-way. Stayed close to the inside on straightening before finishing off steadily, beaten only 1.5L.

Raced wide & without cover in midfield before improving position to race at leaders flanks near half-way. Continued under 1L behind entering last section before yielding a length in the straight to midfield. Not beaten far.

Obtained good position 1,1 for first half before drifting slightly further back near half-way. Entered last section 2L from the lead before finishing off steadily to be beaten a similar margin when finishing midfield.

Raced on leaders back in first half before drifting slightly further back near half-way. Hard ridden from 600m, entered last section 3L from lead, continued a similar margin behind at 200m before being crowded late.

Raced in midfield along the rail throughout. Awkwardly placed near heels when attempting to shift off rail near 500m, entered last section 4L from lead before holding that margin in straight. No threat.

Steadied after the start & shifted back to race third from last along the rail. Continued near the rear entering last section when 6L from the lead, made up a length or so but was too far back to challenge & was no threat.

Bumped & unbalanced at start before shifting across to midfield away from rail. Eased wider to improve entering last section when just over 3L from the lead before peaking near 200m mark & weakening late (Blood in trachea).
Steadied after start & taken back to second last. Continued at the rear before failing to make any headway & sharing last place. (Blood in trachea).
Had no speed & raced a clear a last throughout. Made no headway in straight & shared last place, over 6L behind.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, commenced move after passing 450M, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to score.

Began smartly, took the early lead, headed 1300M, allowed rival to cross 1200M, sat right behind the leader in the middle stages, commenced move 400M, hit the front 250M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner late.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground on turn, finished off well to take a place without threatening.
Away with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, commenced move after passing 550M, very wide turning in, made good progress in straight to make frame, nearest on line.
Began only fairly, raced behind midfield on the inside, a bit closer on turn, wide into straight, made good progress in the run home, nearest on line.
Jumped well, raced prominently but trapped wide early, took the lead near 1300M, travelled well to turn, peaked and headed 250M, ran on evenly to the line.
Taken back from gate 9, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, kept to inside after straightening and finished off evenly.
Began well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, angled out 450M, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Slightly slow out, raced at rear on the inside, 7 lengths back on turn, made no progress in straight.
Jumped well, raced prominently but trapped 3 wide early, 2 wide approaching 1200M, peaked on turn, weakened and eased early in straight.
Average to begin, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, peaked on turn, emptied early in straight, eased final furlong.
Took back, at rear along the rail, made ground along the inside rail, kept on to score by a neck.
Settled to race in box-seat, took lead on straightening until headed by winner passing 50M.
Began nicely, then eased to slot in behind midfield, 2 wide, swung wide, closed off strongly for 3rd.
Raced just behind midfield, along the rail, ran on nicely to the line.
Bumped start, settled in front of midfield, 2 wide, help up near 175M, closed off fairly thereafter. (See Incident Report)
Jumped awkwardly, prominent but wide until shifted to outside leader near 600M, was one paced. (Bled from both nostrils)
Took back, raced at the rear, 2 wide, made ground in the straight.
Rolled forward, sat outside lead, keen until took cover at 600M, couldn't find extra in final 100M. (See Incident Report)
Jumped smartly, rolled forward, took rail and led, emptied passing 250M.
Began well, settled just off the pace 2-wide, commenced move approaching the final turn and hit the front just inside the 300 metres, held on under pressure.
Settled some 3L back in 4th 2-wide, came under pressure rounding home bend and given reminders over 400 metres out, ran on under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Began awkwardly, settled just better than midfield some 4L back in 5th, saved ground on the inside turning in, fought on steadily without threatening.
Settled in last few, finished off the race well inside final 150 metres, ran out of room final strides.
Travelled in rear of midfield on the rail and close to heels at times in back straight, saved ground turning for home, fought on steadily under pressure without threatening.

Broke well from the one draw, gradually settled some 2L back in 3rd, became slightly further back but still in 3rd when pace quickened around home bend, kept on same pace without quickening under pressure in the run to the line.
Settled wide towards the rear from a wide gate, commenced move out wide rounding home bend, widest of all turning for home, made up good ground near the stands side of the straight.

Niggled along wide in first few, gradually settled 3-wide without cover in midfield travelling down back straight, commenced move from over 500 metres out and went wider into home straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Pressed forward from a wide gate to lead turning into back straight, obtained rails run shortly after, headed by eventual winner passing the 300 metres and soon weakened.
Travelled greenly in midfield in 7th, in similar position turning for home, made no impression in the run to the line.
Began moderately from the widest gate and inconvenienced shortly afterward, always struggling at the tail-end.
Crowded at start and soon dropped to last few despite niggling along, saved ground on the inside turning for home, gradually faded under pressure inside final 150 metres.
Settled in midfield along the fence, responded strongly from 250M, lead near 70M.
Positively ridden, crossed to the lead 1200M, led at even tempo, fought on well, headed near 70M.
Chased leader on the inside, kept on steadily from top of straight, not pace of first 2 final 200M, held on 3rd in photo.

Failed to muster early speed, held up 2-wide in midfield, became unbalanced top of straight when jockey's right foot slipped out of the stirrup iron, re-grouped and closed off well final 200M, just missed 3rd.
Caught 3-wide no cover chasing leaders, battled on to 150M, no extra late.
Held up in midfield 3-wide, pushed along 500M, kept on same pace on straightening, never a threat to leaders.
Dropped back to the rear from wide draw, 4-5Ls off the pace halfway, gave limited response turning home, never able to challenge. (Jockey : decided to ride the horse quietly from outside barrier.)
Not hurried after the start, eased back to race at the tail of the field, driven wide into straight, finished off only fairly.
Behind mid-division, raced keenly early stages when tempo was slow, bustled along home turn but failed to finish off.
Tracked the pace along the 2-path, came under pressure 450M, gave ground passing 300M.
Towards the rear, struggled to hold position passing 600M, already beaten turning for home.
Clean jump, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide, a length back on turn, took the lead 200M, kept on very well to the line and scored.
Commenced well, sat right behind the leader on rail, easy run on turn, finished off well to take 2nd without threatening.
Jumped well, positioned 2 wide slightly better than midfield, found rail near 500M, 3 lengths back turning in, made good progress in straight to take a place.
Moderately away, unable to slot in, trapped 3 wide in midfield, found a 2 wide spot near 500M, very wide into straight, made some progress in the run home.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, saved ground on turn, made reasonable headway in straight.
Slowly away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, similar position on turn, made some progress early in straight, awkwardly placed final 50M.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 7 lengths back, same margin back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length on turn, peaked and headed 200M, weakened gradually thereafter. (Abnormal movement in both hind legs.)
Stumbled at start, raced better than midfield on the outside, found a 2 wide spot near 600M, 2 lengths or so back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Began awkwardly, raced 4 wide at rear, bumped near 800M and 500M, very wide turning in, one-paced in straight. (Lame right front leg.)
Moderately away, raced very wide at rear, bumped near 800M and 500M, no cover throughout, made no progress in straight.
Began only fairly, raced 3 wide towards rear, bumped 800M, checked 500M, 7 lengths back turning in, showed no response in straight.

Began awkwardly and bumped, positioned a length behind the leader on the stands' side, took the lead 300M, made contact 250M, kept on very well to the line and scored.
Away well, positioned a length behind the leader, 2 away from the stands' rail, finished off well to take 2nd without threatening the winner.

Jumped well from gate 10, positioned 1-1/2L behind the leader on the stands' rail, hard ridden after passing 400M, not enough room near 300M, showed good response thereafter, no clear run and snatched up final 50M.
Moderately away, sent forward to take the lead, headed near 300M, made contact 250M, ran on evenly to 50M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Began well, positioned 1-3/4L behind the leader, 3 away from the stands' rail, showed limited response final 400M.
Veered right leaving stalls, raced prominently, nearer to the middle of the track, hard ridden after passing 400M, only showed limited response, weakened gradually final 150M.
Began fairly, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader, nearer to the middle track, hard ridden after passing 400M, showed limited response, weakened final 150M.
Away with them, raced at rear on the stands' side, made no progress final 400M.
Average to begin, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader in the middle of the track, peaked on run 400M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Crowded out start, raced at rear throughout, never a factor. (Lost left front plate after the race.)
Settled just off the leaders, closed off strongly 300M to score.
Shared the lead, after 200M momentarily dropped right rein, ran on well for 2nd.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, progressed steadily 250M.
Shared the lead, hung on well until 50M overhauled.
Prominent, ran on until 250M weakened.
Just behind the front runners, lack room 300M, just held ground. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
At back, on heels 700M, lack room 4-2, made ground when clear.
Eased to sit behind midfield, on heels 700M, unbalanced 600M, lack room 300M, ran on ok. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
At back, no dash.
Eased back, no progress.
Slow away and checked, never competitive.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, emptied 400M. Vet exam revealed that the horse was displaying an irregular heart rhythm after racing.
Never a factor.
Settled in handy position on rail, asked for effort passing 550M, quickened passing 200M to score.
Settled in front of midfield, placed pressure passing 600M, worked home strongly in the straight.
Niggled along to race midfield on rail, fought well in the straight, finished solidly.
Sent forward, travelled keenly in lead in middle stages, placed pressure near 500M, reponded nicely in the early part of straight, gave some ground near 100M.
Taken back at start, raced towards rear on rail, made up some nice late ground.
Settled behind midfield on rail, travelled keenly after 1700M, one-paced in the straight.
Settled midfield, tried to improve passing 700M, worked home one-paced.
Taken back at start, raced at rear on rail, placed pressure near 700M, limited response in the straight.
Raced behind midfield, asked for effort passing 600M, failed to make impression in the straight.
Raced in handy position, tried to improve near 600M, gave ground near 300M.
Urged along from wide barrier, raced behind the lead, placed pressure near 600M, weakened near 200M.
Taken back at start, raced at tail, no response throughout.
Taken back at start, came under pressure rounding the Home Turn, faded out in the straight.
Wide and without cover passing 1700M in behind midfield, weakened in the straight.

Ridden forward, shared lead in a line of three early before continuing on to take outright lead when racing one off the rail at 900m. Crossed to rail near 700m, engaged in two horse battle from the 300m & was too tough late.

Shared lead in a line of three between runners early before being crossed & racing 1,1 from 800m. Moved up to share lead at 300m, engaged in a two horse battled all the way to line but couldn't past leader. Clear of third.
Raced 3 wide with cover in midfield before being left without cover from passing the 800m mark. Cornered just over 2L from the lead & held that margin when running on to hold third.

Held the rail & shared lead in a line of three early before being crossed & racing on leaders back from near the 700m mark. Shifted off the rail near 350m when under 2L behind before finishing fairly to hold 4th.

Shifted down to rail after start & held position in midfield throughout. Travelled well before being checked 550m when horse in front stumbled. Shifted outwards passing 350m when 5L behind before closing well in late stages.

Steadied on jumping before shifting across behind runners to race a clear last. Continued at the tail, 7L behind entering last section, began making good progress, shifted outwards further at 200m & finished well to midfield.
Hard ridden after start but was trapped 4 wide without cover throughout. Continued wide on straightening before weakening a few lengths to midfield after having tough run throughout.
Raced in midfield between runners throughout early & middle stages before being crowded & checked near the 650m mark. Entered last section 3.5L from the lead before weakening to be beaten 6.5L.

Raced on leaders back early before shuffled a pair further back from half-way. Attempted to shift out when awkwardly placed at 650m before stumbling & losing ground at 550m. Weakened out tamely in final section, well beaten.
Steadied from wide barrier & shifted back to race near the rear. Shifted wider on straightening, entered last section 7L from lead, made no headway in straight & was not a factor.

Bumped & unbalanced at start before settling just worse than midfield between runners. Inconvenienced just prior to cornering when about 5L from the lead before weakening out in the final section to be well beaten.

Began only fairly & then bumped before shifting down to the rail & settling second from last. Continued along rail on straightening when around 7L from the lead before weakening poorly to be beaten over 11L.

Raced very wide in midfield in early stages after jumping from outside gate before drifting further back when tramping 4 wide with cover. Cornered the widest before weakening badly in straight to be beaten a big margin.
Began only fairly & was then shifted behind runners to race worse than midfield when 3 wide with cover. Entered last section with only 3 runners behind before weakening badly to be very long last.

Began fairly from gate 1, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, found daylight after passing 300M, hit the front 150M, ran on strongly to the line.
Out with rest, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, moved closer on turn, wider from 500M, closed off well to take 2nd. (Dead-heat 2nd.)
Taken back from gate 9, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, no clear running until passing 150M, finished off well to take 2nd. (Dead-heat 2nd.)
Began well from a wide draw, showed no early speed, raced 2 wide at rear, found rail near 700M, commenced move after passing 550M, made good progress in straight to make frame, nearest on line.
Jumped well, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross near 700M, angled out 500M, not enough room early in straight, made some progress final 200M. (Lame left front leg.)

Began well, raced prominently on the outside, took the lead after passing 1100M, found rail near 700M, challenged by rival turning in, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the inside, 2 wide on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared after passing 200M, made minor progress thereafter.
Clean jump, raced prominently but 3 wide early, slightly taken back after passing 1300M, commenced move 500M, challenged the leader early in straight, peaked on run 150M, weakened final 100M.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide towards rear, commenced move after passing 600M, very wide turning in, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Jumped with them, unable to slot in early, found a 3 wide spot in midfield near 1050M, carried wider 500M, showed some response early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened thereafter.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide in midfield, 4 lengths or so back, angled out 550M, no clear running early in straight, cleared 250M, peaked on run 150M, weakened thereafter.
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced 2 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, angled out 450M, failed to close off in straight.
Began well, taken back to race 3 wide with cover towards rear, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, failed to make any progress in the run home.
Bumped start, raced prominently, 2 wide, allowed rival to cross near 900M, challenged the leader turning in, weakened early in straight.
In midfield, along the rail, held up from Home Turn to 300M, ran on and scored comfortably by 1-1/4L
Taken back, raced at the tail, switched to centre course near 200M, closed off strongly for 2nd thereafter.
Raced at the rear, along the rail, continued to close off nicely after switching course at 200M.
Niggled along, took box-seat, ran on evenly to the line.
Didn't muster, in behind midfield, along the rail, ran on nicely despite switching across heels at 100M. (See Incident Report)
In front of midfield, along the rail initially, began to shift wider from 800M, one paced to the line.
Jumped well, niggled along, sat in front of midfield, wide and no cover until 800M, was one paced.
Sent forward, sat outside the lead, about 1L off, stayed on until emptied near 150M.
Crowded start, raced at the rear, 2 wide, saved no ground in the straight.
Sent forward, took rail and led, raced keenly, weakened and headed passing 200M.
One-out one-back initially, taken wider at 800M, showed nothing in the straight.
Travelled in behind midfield, along the rail, never in it.
Raced in behind midfield, 3 wide but had cover, not competitive.
In midfield, 2 wide, pressured from 600M, finished tailed out. Must trial. (Blood in trachea)
Began well, taken one back on the rail behind slow pace travelling keenly at times, shifted one out at the 600m and eventually obtained a run inside the 300m, gained upper hand final strides.
Midfield early stages, made steady headway around horses from the 1300m, shared the lead in a sound pace rounding home bend, hit the front momentarily 150m out only to caught near the line.

Took up running passing the winning post the first time, set sedate pace with a 1L advantage to the half-way mark, improved pace when joined coming out of the back straight, came under pressure but outlasted inside the final 100m.

Gradually settled some 4L back in 5th in the slow pace, commenced move from the 800m to track behind race leader turning in, did not find much room in most of the straight but fought on dourly in the run to the line.
Broke well, taken back to 4th within 3L of the slow pace, became 5th in a similar position passing the 1200m and 6th 900m out, failed to quicken in straight to feature in the placings.

Quickly settled behind midfield from a wide gate, in 9th about 4L off the pace rounding home bend, switched 4-wide for a run 600m out and wider into home straight, fought on steadily without threatening.

Wide early before pulling his way forward to be 1L 2nd onto back straight while travelling keenly in the slow pace, switched 3-wide from 3rd for a clear run 800m out holding some chance after straightening until the 200m.

Taken back to last few for cover 3-wide, moved closer from the 1200m to reach 8th in midfield coming onto home bend, inconvenienced for a stride inside the 500m, kept on at steadily without quickening in straight.
Settled well behind saving ground on the rail, switched out for a run after straightening, inconvenienced briefly 200m out, fought on steadily without threatening.

Settled in rear of midfield on the rail mainly in 7th, slightly further back in 10th when pace increased passing the 1200m, renewed effort rounding home bend and saved ground turning in, fought on without threatening.
Travelled 3-wide just worse than midfield, made headway from the 1200m to reach 5th some 2L back coming onto home bend, swung wider into home straight and weakened.
Always struggling at the back, given reminders over 600m out, found nothing.
Held up in midfield and saved ground along the inside, ran on to lead near 100M. Well in control final stages.
From draw 1 tracked leaders along the fence, moved out to challenge 500M, responded well to be vying for lead mid-straight, held by winner final 100M.
Emerged as leader 900M, lay out rounding home turn, fought hard and hung on to lead until near 100M, lost out on 2nd narrowly.
Chased leaders, within striking distance at 400M, tried hard to the line but always held by first 3.
Up with leaders but caught 3-wide no cover throughout, battled on well turning home, run ended 150M, weakened towards the finish.
Held up at the rear 6-7Ls off the pace, made limited progress on straightening, never reached contention. (Jockey : did not feel comfortable at any stage of the race)
Steadied to obtain cover early stages, raced 3-wide towards the rear, responded fairly inside 400M, no impression on leaders.
Restrained in midfield, proved very difficult to settle 1000M when steadied to obtain cover, not quickened when placed under pressure nearing 500M, never able to challenge.
Settled down 3-wide in mid-division, couldn't go on passing 400M, never threatened.
Raced towards the rear 6Ls off the pace, struggled to keep up nearing home straight, soon beaten.
Driven forward and vied for lead along the 2-path, quickly beaten on straightening, soon eased. (Jockey : action deteriorated after obtaining a forward position / Mucus.)
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, 2 wide from 800M, commenced move after passing 500M, wide into straight, finished off very strongly to score.
Moderately away, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground on turn, kept to inside after straightening and finished off strongly to take 2nd.

Jumped well, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield early, found rail near 800M, angled out after passing 600M, 3 lengths back turning in, made good progress in straight to take a place. (See Racing Incidents.)
Crowded shortly after start, raced 3 wide better than midfield, moved closer after passing 1100M, 2nd on turn, hit the front 250M, peaked and headed near 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Jumped well, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, commenced move after passing 600M, kept on well early in straight, peaked on run 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Taken back to race at rear on the inside, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, unable to obtain clear running until approaching final 100M, made some progress thereafter.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, there to turn, very wide into straight, made some progress in the run home.

Jumped well from gate 13, raced better than midfield but trapped very wide early, moved closer after passing 1450M, 2 wide from 1150M, 2 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Bumped start, positioned 4 lengths behind the leader on rail, similar position on turn, finished off evenly. (Lost left front plate near 1500M.)
Slowly away, raced at tail, 8 lengths back, commenced move after passing 700M, very wide on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, peaked early in straight, headed 250M, weakened final furlong.
Away well, raced 2 wide behind midfield, angled out 450M, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Made contact shortly after start, raced 2 wide, 5 lengths or so back early, 3 wide from 1200M, commenced move after passing 550M, very wide turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Jumped well, raced prominently on the inside, 1/2L back on turn, hit the front early in straight, kept on very well to hold off the challenger.

Made contact at start, raced prominently, 2 wide, allowed rival to cross near 700M, a length back on turn, hard ridden after passing 300M, finished off strongly to take 2nd, just beaten by a narrow margin.
Jumped with them, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, closed off well to take a place.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider turning in, no clear running early in straight, cleared 250M, made good progress thereafter to make frame without threatening.
Away with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, no clear running early in straight, found daylight approaching 200M, finished off evenly.
Moderately away, raced at rear on rail, saved ground on turn, made some progress in straight.
Crowded on jumping, raced better than midfield on the outside, 2 wide from 800M, hard ridden after passing 550M, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail better than midfield, angled out 500M, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to 100M, weakened thereafter.
Fast into stride, raced prominently but trapped 3 wide, 2 wide from 700M, shared lead turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Clean jump, sent forward to take the lead but trapped very wide, 3 wide from 700M, shared lead turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened gradually final 200M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Inconvenienced at start, raced at tail, 6 to 7 lengths behind the leader on turn, very wide into straight, failed to make any progress in the run home.
Crowded on jumping, raced 3 wide slightly behind midfield, similar position on turn, very wide into straight, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Had great run on leaders back throughout. Moved off the rail on straightening, dashed to lead passing 150m mark before drawing away for another very easy win.

Pushed forward to race outside the leader before being crossed & racing 1,1 from the 800m. Entered last section only 1L behind before making steady ground to steal second in final strides. No match for impressive winner.

Raced 4 wide without cover before improving position to race outside the leader from near the 800m. Dashed to lead at 250m mark, held lead until being headed by winner at 150m before caught for second in final few strides.
Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Entered last section just over 2L behind before finishing off steadily to move to 4th inside the final 100m without challenging first 3.

Was slow to begin & consequently settled third last on the rail. Stayed along the rail on straightening before finishing off nicely to midfield from the second half without threatening the first three. Promising debut effort.

Shifted behind runners & settled at the rear. Continued near the tail on straightening when around 5L from the lead before finishing off well to midfield from the rear. Maintained margin relative to impressive winner.
Raced just worse than midfield, three wide with cover throughout. Entered last section just under 4L behind before finishing off only evenly to midfield.
Showed early speed to lead. Continued in lead until behind headed at the 250m mark & weakening quickly in last furlong to be beaten 6.5L. (Blood in trachea post-race).

Crowded at start before being caught 3 deep without cover in midfield. Obtained cover momentarily near 900m before again left without cover from half-way. Cornered only 2.5L behind before weakening in final 300m. Well beaten.
Had no early speed before improving after start to race in midfield on rail. Cornered around 3L from the lead before peaking near the 300m & weakened sharply thereafter.

Shifted across behind runners from widest gate & raced three wide with cover near the rear. Hampered near 1100m & relegated to second last. Cornered widest when 5L behind before weakening significantly in straight.
Steadied & drifted back after first 100m & raced worse than midfield between runners. Continued near the rear on straightening when 5L behind before weakening poorly in straight to be very long last.

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began well, raced better than midfield on the outside, sent forward after passing 850M, 2nd on turn, finished off strongly to score.
Commenced well, positioned 2 wide, a length or so back, found rail after passing 600M, saved ground on turn, finished off well to take 2nd, just beaten by a head.
Began smartly from the widest draw, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the first two close home.
Jumped well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, checked near 1000M, 4 lengths back on turn, finished off strongly to make frame, nearest on line.
Away with them, trapped very wide in midfield early, moved a bit closer after passing 750M, found a 2 wide spot near 550M, angled out 400M, made good progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Began fairly, showed no early speed, raced towards rear on the outside, 7 lengths back on turn, made very good progress in straight without threatening.
Began well, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, 5 lengths back on turn, made minor progress in straight.

Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, checked near 1000M, saved ground on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 100M. (Lame left front leg.) (Roarer.) (See Racing Incidents.)
Away well, raced better than midfield but trapped wide, moved a bit closer after passing 800M, 2 wide on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, found rail near 550M, saved ground on turn, one-paced in straight.
Crowded start, raced at rear on the inside, 8 lengths back on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Slightly slow out, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Hard ridden to secure box seat, closed off well 300M to score.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2 wide, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Eased back, 2 wide, dashed well 200M.
Eased back, 2 wide, progressed steadily 250M, over the concluding stages shifted in towards heels and was not able to be properly tested.
Pushed to take rail and lead, hung on well until 100M weakened.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, made ground 200M.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, lack room 300M, just held ground when clear. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Prominent, 2 wide, soon emptied 250M. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Raced wide and without cover throughout the race just off the leaders, dropped off 500M. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Settled in box seat, improved on straightening, quickened passing 100M, scored unchallenged.
Ridden to take lead with nice early speed, fought nicely in the straight.
Raced behind midfield on rail, commenced to improve passing 500M, responded well in the straight.
Raced towards rear, placed pressure passing 450M, made up some nice late ground.
Fractious in barrier and began awkwardly, settled midfield on rail, worked home one-paced.
Urged along, raced in front of midfield, limited response in the straight, found tendon injury next day.
Always niggled, raced behind the lead, weakened passing 100M.
Raced at rear, made the turn near 550M awkwardly, gave ground in the straight.
Raced midfield, came under pressure rounding the Home Turn, gave ground in the straight.
Taken back at start, raced at tail, no response in the straight.
Settled midfield, passing 450M was checked then raced very wide, weakened in the straight.
Raced behind midfield, came under pressure rounding the Home Turn, faded out in the straight, bled and heard irregularity.

Showed speed, shared lead from the 1000m mark before leading outright & crossing to rail near 600m. Raced over a length clear on straightening, dug deep to hold off a wall of challengers in concluding stages.

Had no early speed & drifted back toward the rear when racing on rail. Niggled along at 600m, cornered near the back before finishing very strongly between runners in concluding stages to steal narrow second in final stride.

Raced third away from the rail for the majority. Cornered over 2L behind before making steady progress, moving to second inside the final 50m before being caught for that place on the line. Beaten under 1L.
Had nice position in midfield between runners throughout. Eased wider on cornering & finished off well to be beaten under 1L in a very bunched finish close to the line.

Hampered at start before drifting back & raced third last away from rail. Moved into 3 wide line but with cover mid-race. Near the back on cornering before closing well in late stages to be beaten only 1L in bunched finish.

Steadied at the start & taken back to the tail. Continued a clear last on cornering before making strong late headway between runners despite having limited room in final 75m. Only beaten 1L in much improved effort.

Showed speed to lead early before being headed near 1100m & crossed at 600m. Straightened over a length from the lead, battled on well before being swamped for minor placing in late stages, & only beaten 1.5L in busy finish.
Had a nice run in midfield throughout. Stayed along rail on straightening but could not go with rivals & gave a length or so to be beaten just under 4L.
Raced just worse than midfield on the rail throughout. Stayed on rail on cornering when around 5L behind, held up momentarily before making no real headway in concluding stages.
Shifted across after first bend to race just worse than midfield between runners. Entered last section 5.5L behind before offering no response in the straight & weakening to third last. (See report).

Raced wide at first bend from outside gate before shifting across at 900m mark to be 3 deep with cover in midfield. Eased wider entering last section when 5.5L behind before weakening out in straight to be beaten over 8L.

Began awkwardly before improving to midfield but caught 3 deep without cover throughout. Entered last section only 4.5L from lead but emptied on straightening & weakened badly in straight to be long last. (See report).

Shifted out at start, positioned on rail in midfield early, 2 wide after entering the back straight, a bit closer on turn, showed very good response early in straight, hit the front 150M, kept on very well to the line.
Away well, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, challenged the leader turning in, took the lead early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened gradually close home, just held 2nd.
Began smartly, positioned on rail in midfield, 3 lengths back, same margin back on turn, closed off well to take a place, nearest on line.
Made contact at start, positioned on rail behind midfield, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, closed off well to make frame.
Hampered at start, raced 2 wide at rear, 3 wide from 650M, 5 lengths or so back on turn, very wide into straight, made good progress in straight.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, similar position on turn, angled out 400M, made some progress in straight.

Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 6 to 7 lengths back on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 100M, made some progress thereafter. (Blood in trachea.) (Right front tendon injury reported next day.)
Commenced well, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, found rail near 650M, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, made no progress thereafter.

Made contact at start, raced towards rear of midfield on outer, 3 to 4 lengths back on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 100M. (Bled.) (Lame left front leg next day morning.)
Hampered on jumping, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover on turn, weakened early in straight when hard run took effect.
Average to begin, sent forward to take the lead, challenged by rival turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened and eased final furlong.
Niggled along, slotted into front of midfield, 2 wide, found extra at 100M to continue, scored by 1/2L.
Settled to race in box-seat, sat about 2L off, kept kicking to the line for 2nd, finished 1/2L behind.
Trapped wide initially, was allowed to roll along before settling one-out one-back, continued nicely to take 3rd.
Crowded start, travelled at the tail, along the rail, ran home nicely inside final 150M.
Jumped only fairly, raced towards the rear, 2 wide, saved ground and closed off nicely.
Eased back, raced in worse than midfield, along the rail, worked home fairly despite not quite finding clear ground along the inside track.
Bumped start, attempted to find cover in midfield, however was left wide throughout, was one paced only. (See Incident Report)
Inconvenienced at start, then raced in worse than midfield, 2 wide, ran on evenly before taken in over final strides.
Sent forward, settled to race outside lead, faded gradually in the straight.
In just behind midfield, 2 wide, ran on until inconvenienced passing 150M, and was awkward to heels going to the line.
Went forward, led on the rail, headed passing 200M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Awkward start, taken to rail and settled just behind midfield, raced tight 200M to 150M, ran on without threatening.
Soon took up running from the two draw, ceded advantage for one back 2nd 850 metres out, renewed effort to assert authority over 150 metres out, hung on well.
Settled in midfield on the rail in 5th, obtained run off the rail over 150 metres out, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Settled towards the rear on the rail after niggling along at the start, commenced move at the 400 metres approaching home straight, ran on steadily under pressure without threatening.
Settled in midfield, lost position and dropped towards the rear 700 metres out, commenced move entering straight, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
3-wide with leaders early, travelling keenly before moving forward to lead on the rail 850 metres out, led until finding no extra over 150 metres out, dropped out tamely inside final 100 metres.
Broke well, with leaders briefly before shifting back for 3rd over 2L back, remained similar into home straight, ran home one-paced.
Taken back for cover in last few, inconvenienced 800 metres out, remained well behind into home straight, produced good late impression closing stages.
Began awkwardly losing ground, trailed the field to home straight, kept on well without threatening.
Inconvenienced at start from a wide gate settling wide in last few, found nil under pressure inside final 400 metres.

Began awkwardly from a wide gate, improved steadily before settling in forward of midfield in 4th over 3L off the pace, came under pressure approaching home turn, kept on until finding no extra inside final 100 metres.
Taken back from a wide gate but remained wide without cover throughout back straight in rear of midfield in 6th, difficult to settle at times, faded gradually in home straight.
Jumped on terms from draw 1, settled ahead of midfield and never far off the leaders, responded strongly passing 300M, led near 100M, continued on well late stages.
Held up in mid-division, driven along 450M, chased on well to go 2nd near line, well held by winner.
Crossed to the lead 900M, led evenly, kept on well early straight, headed near 100M, lost 2nd close home.
Dropped back to near the rear, ran on well between horses on straightening, nearest finish. Pleasing debut.
Settled in midfield along the fence, awkwardly placed early straight, hampered 150M, shifted lane and finished well to the line.
Driven forward and soon crossed the fence, tracked leaders on settling, fought on same pace in the straight, always held by leaders.
Began only fairly, settled towards the rear, ran on mildly passing 300M, no serious threat to leaders.
Never better than midfield, wide into straight, responded only fairly, not reached leaders.
Dropped back to the tail of the field, was making progress when checked near 100M and stumbled, lost every chance.

From draw 12 went forward to settle outside leader, pressed along home turn, soon no extra from 250M and weakened. (Jockey : travelled only fairly in middle stages and came under pressure prior to 400M.)
Steadied to obtain cover early stages, held up near last, gave limited response turning in, already beaten when checked inside 100M.
Close up in 4th on settling, struggled to keep up 500M from home, faded away on straightening.

Shifted out at start and made contact, raced prominently on the inside, allowed the leader to cross near 600M, right behind the leader on turn, showed very good response after turning in, hit the front 150M, kept on well to the line.
Made contact at start, sent forward to take the lead, 2 wide, found rail near 600M, led by a length on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide at rear, found rail 600M, saved ground on turn, made good progress in straight to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, finished off well to make frame without threatening.
Jumped well from gate 10, raced in 3rd, 2 wide, same position on turn, finished off evenly.
Away well, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, similar position on turn, very wide into straight, made some progress in the run home.
Out with rest, raced towards rear on the inside, 8 lengths back on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Away with them, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Taken back from gate 9, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, no cover on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 9 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, finished off evenly.
Moderately away from the widest draw, raced behind midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, very wide turning in, weakened gradually in straight.
Slightly slow out, raced 2 wide behind midfield, there to turn, weakened early in straight, eased final 150M. (Blood in trachea.)

Began well, raced prominently on the outside, no cover throughout, hard ridden after passing 300M, hit the front 200M, kept on very well to the line.

Jumped well from a wide draw, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, 2 wide after passing 800M, angled out 500M, closed off well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner. (Lost left hind plate early in straight.)
Bumped start, positioned 2 wide slightly behind midfield, wider turning in, made good progress in straight to take a place without threatening. (Rider dropped whip near 100M.)
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, 5 lengths back, same margin back on turn, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home to make frame without threatening.
Taken back from gate 11, raced at rear on the outside early, moved a bit closer after passing 1000M, 4 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made minor progress in the run home.
Average to begin, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, showed some response early in straight, no extra final 150M.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced prominently, 2 wide, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, showed limited early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Crowded start, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, angled out 450M, failed to close off in straight.
Jumped well from gate 1, raced prominently on rail, led by a neck on turn, peaked early in straight, headed and weakened final 250M.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 6 lengths or so back, there to turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced at rear on the inside, 5 lengths back, same position on turn, showed no response early in straight, weakened final furlong. (Irregular heart rhythm.) (Mucus.)
Hold the rail in midfield, progressed steadily 300M to score.
Hard ridden forward, sat outside the leader, closed off strongly for 2nd.
Checked start, hard ridden to keep up in midfield along the fence, blocked most straight, made steady ground when clear.
Pushed to take rail and lead, overhauled 200M.
At rear, on the fence, blocked whole straight, not properly tested.
On arrival at the Start was noted to have blood in its mouth and was found to be suitable to race. Hard ridden early, trapped 4 wide at rear, progressed steadily 200M.
Hard ridden forward, trapped wide and without cover in the lead, out of fuel 200M.
At back, 3 wide, after the 900M lost ground as a result of being crowded for room, made some ground 250M.
Hard ridden early but not muster, throughout the race trapped wide and without cover, held ground in straight. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
At rear, 2 wide, no dash. Substantial blood in trachea after racing.
Pressed forward, 2 wide, weakened 300M. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Trapped 3 wide in front of midfield, son emptied 450M.
Took lead with nice early speed, asked for effort passing 300M, responded strongly to score.
Settled behind midfield, placed pressure on straightening, made up some nice late ground.
Raced in box seat, held up rounding the Home Turn and in the early part of straight, finished solidly.
Settled midfield on rail, asked for effort passing 450M, responded well in the straight.
Settled midfield, tried to improve near 500M, worked home one-paced.
At the start lost ground when crowded for room, raced towards rear, lay in in the straight, gained some ground passing 100M.
Wide and without cover throughout outside the leaders, one-paced in the straight.
Raced at rear on rail, came under pressure rounding the Home Turn, limited response in the straight.
Settled midfield, 3 wide with cover, limited response in the straight.
Fractious in barrier and slow to begin, detached in early stages, widest on straightening, lost left front plate near 150M, one-paced.
Raced outside the lead, weakened noticeably in the straight.
4 wide and without cover throughout in handy position, faded out passing 300M.

Raced three deep with cover in midfield throughout. Eased wider approaching corner, straightened the widest runner when around 3L behind before closing strongly in final furlong to strike lead in final few strides.
Had a nice run on leaders back throughout. Moved over the leaders' heels on straightening, dashed to lead near 250m mark before being headed by winner in final strides.
Began only fairly, before mustering speed & racing in midfield on rail. Improved along rail to enter last section under 2L from lead before finishing steadily to move to third near the 100m mark.
Raced just worse than midfield, 3 wide with cover throughout. Eased wider on cornering, entered last section over 4L behind before closing off steadily down the outside to get within 2L on the line.

Obtained good position 1,1. Held up behind the heels of a tiring runner near corner, shifted into clear running on straightening when under 2L behind, moved up to be under 1L from lead at furlong mark before weakening late.
Had no speed after start before improving position to race in midfield between runners. Entered last section 3L from the lead & finished off evenly to maintain that margin in midfield finish.

Shifted to last early before improving slightly along rail when racing rearward. Raced keenly passing 800m, stayed along the rail on straightening when just over 3L from the lead before giving a length in concluding stages.
Shared lead in early stages before gaining narrow outright lead approaching 800m mark. Cornered around a length in front before being joined near the 250m & weakening out thereafter.

Steadied in early stages & drifted back to race between runners near the tail. Entered last section 5L from the lead, commenced to make steady ground in final furlong before being held up over the concluding stages.

Shifted behind runners to race rearward, 4 wide with cover throughout. Lost ground when forced wider on cornering before being relegated to last entering final section. Made no ground & was well held.

Ridden forward to race three wide outside the leading pair before steadying & racing just under 2L behind from the 600m. Continued wide around bend before commencing to give ground from the 500m mark. (Lame next day).
Steadied after start, drifted back before being relegated to last passing 1000m mark. Hard ridden on cornering, stayed along rail on straightening before weakening a further few lengths. Well beaten.

Ridden forward from second widest gate to challenge for lead near the 1000m mark when racing 4 wide. Continued wide around bend, began losing ground before cornering & weakened badly to be long second last. (Must trial).

Began awkwardly before showing speed after start, led narrowly 1200m, shared lead at 1000m before racing at leaders flanks from 700m. Began yielding ground from before cornering & weakened to very long last. (Must trial).
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move after passing 450M, finished off very strongly to score.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground on turn, angled out 450M, took the lead 250M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner final 100M.
Bumped start, taken back to race at rear on the outside, 8 lengths back, a bit closer on turn, very wide turning in, finished off very strongly to take a place, nearest on line.
Shifted in at start and bumped, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, kept on well early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Jumped well, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, similar position on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, made minor progress thereafter.

Jumped well from the widest draw, raced prominently but very wide early, slightly taken back after passing 1300M, settled 3 wide in midfield in the middle stages, 4 lengths back turning in, finished off evenly.
Taken back from gate 9, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed some response early in straight, in traffic near 300M, angled out 200M, made minor progress thereafter.

Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide at rear, there to turn, unable to obtain clear running early in straight, then steadied off heels near 200M, one-paced thereafter. (Laceration to the left hind hoof.)
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide towards rear, 3 wide after passing 800M, very wide into straight, showed some response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Slowly away, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, unable to obtain clear running until passing 150M, one-paced thereafter.
Jumped well, sent forward to race prominently, found rail near 1200M, allowed rival to cross near 900M, easy run on turn, ridden after passing 300M, showed no response, weakened thereafter.

Commenced well, sent forward to race prominently on the outside, led after passing 1300M, found rail 900M, led by a length on turn, peaked and headed 250M, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Average to begin, raced 3 wide better than midfield early, hampered near 1100M, 2 wide from 1000M, a length back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Shifted in at start, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, raced tight near 1250M, commenced move 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened and eased final 250M.
Raced in front of midfield, wide and no cover throughout, kept finding and scored by a head.
Sent forward, settled to race outside lead, battled on for a tight finish, finished a head behind the winner.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, kept on well to the finish to take 3rd.
Travelled in front of midfield, along the rail, ran on well to the line.
Taken back, at rear 2 wide, showed nice dash inside final 200M.
Eased back, raced at the tail, wide but with cover, continued on fairly to the line.
Awkward start, then took cover in worse than midfield, 2 wide, ran on without threatening.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, in touch until run ended passing 150M.
Just behind midfield, wide and no cover until 700M, saved no ground.
Urged along, led until handed up lead at 800M, hampered near 350M, was one paced.
Gradually worked forward, led from 800M, headed soon on straightening, showed no turn of foot.
In worse than midfield, wide but with cover, did not threaten.
Jumped only fairly, in behind midfield, along the rail, emptied approaching 150M.
Slow to jump, at the tail throughout, never in it. Must trial.

Dropped to last few despite ridden along, picked up inside the 1000m to reach 6th just over 2L back home bend, obtained run 300m out, responded well to snatch victory from weakening race leader final strides.

Jumped best to lead setting a slow pace early stages, kicked over 2L clear upon straightening stretching the lead further under pressure in straight, only to be caught by the fast-finishing winner final strides.

Keen and wide in midfield early, allowed to move forward from the 900m to 2L 5th on top of home bend, remained wide into straight, quickened to reach distant 2nd 300m out, unable to sustain effort inside final 100m.
Slightly slowly away, soon recovered to rear of midfield in 8th on the rail, switched 2-wide to avoid heels on home bend going wider into the straight, ran on steadily without threatening.
Travelling just better than midfield before steadied and lost position in chain reaction 900m out, tight on rails early in straight, ran on under pressure without threatening in the run to the line.

Ridden forward settling one back on the rail, forced to steady on heels of race leader 900m out losing ground, remained some 2L off the leader turning into straight but folded up quickly after straightening.
Soon taken well back from the widest gate, trailed the field onto the 650m, kept on at the steadily in straight.
Soon taken back from a wide gate, travelling keenly and wide without cover just worse than midfield, dropped to last few into straight, made no impression thereafter.
Held up in 3rd some 2L back early stages, gained closer to 1L 2nd coming onto home bend, soon weakened after straightening.
Hampered at start, recovered quickly on the outside to join the leader rounding home bend, gave ground steadily from over 400m out after travelling wide without cover most of the way.
Soon dropped to last few, struggled under pressure from home bend.
Soon led, set fast pace up front, drew clear passing 400M, kept on strongly to the line giving rivals no chance.
Chased the pace along the inside, tried hard on straightening but couldn't get closer to winner, held on for 2nd just.
From wide draw taken across behind runners, settled towards the rear along the fence, closed off well turning in, just missed 2nd. No threat to runaway winner though.
Restrained in position behind midfield, driven wide into straight, closed off moderately final 300M, just missed a minor placing.
Steadied to obtain cover early stages, waited with at the rear, 6Ls to make up home turn, stayed on mildly for 5th not beaten far by placegetters.
Pushed along to be prominent chasing leaders, bustled along 600M, fought on to hold 3rd place until swamped by pursuers late stages.
Lost ground at the start, recovered to chase leaders along the fence, shuffled back to midfield middle stages, kept on same pace in straight, no further impression final 200M.
Held up in midfield 2-wide, gave limited response when asked 400M, never reached contention.
Behind mid-division, took closer order entering back straight, wide no cover after 800M, ran home same pace, crowded for room 100M, no extra. (Lame LF leg.)
Dropped back from wide draw, raced keenly from 1300M and wide no cover middle stages, failed to respond when driven along home turn.
Settled at the rear, bustled along 700M, soon struggled to keep up, never in the picture. (Jockey : raced too keenly early and middle stages, unable to finish off the race)

Towards the rear and caught wide no cover early stages, improved his position gradually to be 2nd going into home turn, gave ground rapidly on straightening. (Jockey : unbalanced 1400M commenced to travel keenly.)
Began smartly from the widest draw, sent forward to race prominently on the outside, took the lead near 800M, led by 1/2L turning in, kept on well in straight to hold off the challengers late.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 lengths back, there to turn, finished off very strongly to be nearest on line.

Moderately away, positioned on rail in midfield, steadied off heels near 800M, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, made very good progress in straight to take a place, nearest on line.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide behind midfield, commenced move after passing 500M, made good progress in straight to make frame.
Made contact at start, sent forward to take the lead, found rail near 900M, headed 800M, 1/2L behind the leader to turn, kept on evenly to 150M, weakened gradually thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Away well, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Out with rest, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, finished off evenly.
Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the inside, 5 lengths or so back, checked off heels near 800M, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Away with them, raced at rear on the inside, angled out after passing 600M, very wide turning in, made some headway in straight.
Began fairly, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide turning in, failed to close off in straight.
Commenced well, positioned on rail better than midfield, badly unbalanced near 800M, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Crowded on jumping, raced behind midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, wider from 500M, weakened early in straight when hard run took toll.
Began smartly, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably throughout, kept on strongly after turning in, easily scored.

Moderately away, raced 3 wide with cover towards rear, moved closer after passing 600M, 4 to 5 lengths back turning in, showed good response early in straight, took 2nd approaching 200M, no chance with the easy winner.
Taken back from gate 11, raced at rear on the inside, angled out after passing 450M, no clear running early in straight, made very good progress final 200M to take a place, nearest on line.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 2 wide at rear, wider from 600M, made good progress in straight to make frame without threatening.
Slightly slow out, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Jumped with them, positioned 2 wide, 4 lengths or so back, moved a bit closer on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly thereafter.
Average to begin, positioned 4 lengths behind the leader on rail, steadied off heels near 600M, 2 wide turning in, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, one-paced thereafter.
Away with them, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, similar position on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Moderately away from a wide draw, trapped very wide in midfield, no cover throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Fast into stride, raced in 2nd, travelled well in the middle stages, 2 lengths back turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Out with rest, raced 2 wide towards rear, 5 to 6 lengths back, wider turning in, failed to make any progress in straight.
Out in line, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, moved a bit closer in the middle stages, 3 wide on turn, peaked on run 400M, weakened early in straight.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail better than midfield, crowded near 650M, saved ground on turn, weakened gradually in straight. (Lame right hind leg next day morning.)
Average to begin, raced slightly better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, peaked on turn, weakened final 500M.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began well, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, finished off well to score.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably on turn, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the winner late.
Made contact at start, sent forward to race in 2nd, a length back on turn, kept on well in straight to take a place.
Away well, raced prominently but trapped wide early, slightly taken back after passing 1000M, raced 2 wide in midfield in the middle stages, made minor progress in straight to make frame.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, finished off evenly.
Began smartly from the widest draw, raced behind midfield on the outside, 8 lengths back turning in, made good progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Slowly away, raced at rear on the inside, still well back on turn, showed good response in straight.
Made contact at start, raced 3 wide better than midfield, no cover throughout, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Jumped with them, raced in midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly thereafter.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield early, found rail after passing 700M, angled out 450M, showed limited response early in straight, eased final 100M.
Raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Settled in midfield, 2 wide, made early move 800M, dominated 200M.
Pushed to obtain a prominent spot, made early move 800M, ran on well for 2nd.
Slow away, at back, trapped 3-4 wide, dashed well 300M.
Hard ridden to obtain box seat, just held ground in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield along the fence, little dash 300M.
Checked early, at rear, 2 wide, lack room 4-2, dashed well when clear.
Slow away, at back, made early move mid-race, little dash 250M.
Bumped start, but soon improved into the lead on the fence, weakened 300M.
At back, 2-3 wide, no dash. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Eased back, trapped 3-4 wide, ran on fairly in straight.
At back, never nearer.
For the majority of the race, SOCKET ELITE travelled wide and without cover, dropped off 500M.
Pressed forward, sat 2 wide, emptied 400M.
Trapped 3-4 wide, never competitive. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings
Niggled to race midfield on rail, lay in passing 400M, responded strongly when placed pressure, finished strongly to score.
Travelled keenly in early stages, settled at first half, placed pressure passing 400M, worked home nicely.
Ridden along to settle first half, placed pressure near 400M, finished well.
Niggled forward, commenced to improve passing 450M, came home well.
Settled at second half, tried to improve but worked home only one-paced.
Settled at second half, fought hard but finished only one-paced.
Raced at forward position close to outside rail, gave ground near 200M, finished to run on.
Slow to begin, raced at second half on rail, came under pressure passing 200M, weakened passing 100M.
Began awkwardly, raced at first half near central of the track, faded out near 200M.
Pushed forward after start & raced outside leader. Moved up to assume lead on straightening, raced nearly 2L clear nearing 100m mark, held 1.5L advantage on line.
Had nice run on leaders back throughout. Moved off the rail just prior to straightening, made continual steady ground in straight to move to second near the 150m mark, beaten 1.5L on line.

Drifted back after the start & was relegated to last after first furlong. Continued with only a couple behind on straightening before closing strongly in the final furlong when making many late lengths to third.
Didn't begin fast but mustered speed to drive to the lead passing the 950m mark. Joined in the lead on straightening, passed in second near the 100m before tiring late.

Had no early speed before mustering slightly to race in midfield between runners. Lost some ground passing the 500m mark before passing a few rivals in concluding stages when effectively holding beaten margin on line.

Ridden forward but caught 3 deep without cover outside leaders before steadying at 900m & racing just behind leading trio. Came under hard riding at 500m before weakening a few lengths to midfield. (Blood in trachea).
Began well but was allowed to drift back to race 4 wide in midfield. Hard ridden when continuing wide passing the 500m mark, finished only evenly to midfield but was well beaten.

Raced in midfield early before steadying after first furlong & settling worse than midfield. Continued rearward around bend, steadied & shifted over heels at 400m when about 6L from lead before holding margin to line.

Slow to begin losing a length or two before improving slightly along the rail to midfield near the 800m. Moved closer to lead nearing corner, 4L behind entering last section before weakening poorly in the straight.

Hard ridden to race prominently after start but was caught 4 deep without cover outside leaders before shifting to 3 wide near the 700m. Drifted wider when coming under pressure near 400m & weakened very poorly in straight.

Began awkwardly & lost ground & consequently raced near the tail throughout. Moved wider on the track near half-way, cornered very wide when 7L behind before weakening badly in straight, beaten over 20L. (Must trial).

Raced in midfield after the start before coming off the bit & giving ground near 800m. Became awkward near 700m & lost further ground & relegated to last soon after. Weakened very badly in straight. Long last. (Must trial).
Began smartly from the widest draw, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well on turn, kept on strongly in straight to hold off the challengers. (Lame right front leg next day morning.)
Commenced well, raced better than midfield on the outside, 2 lengths back turning in, closed off well to take 2nd, always held.
Began fairly, positioned on rail in midfield, slightly inconvenienced near 600M, angled out after passing 450M, made good progress in straight to take a place, nearest on line.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, there to turn, hard ridden approaching 250M, showed limited response, ran on evenly to the line.
Jumped well, sent forward to race prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross near 700M, brushed and unbalanced 600M, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Away with them, raced at rear on the outside, 6 lengths or so back on turn, very wide into straight, made some headway early in straight, no extra final furlong.
Jumped well from a wide draw, raced towards rear on the outside, 6 lengths back on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Began awkwardly, raced 3 wide behind midfield, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 100M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Away well, positioned 2 wide in midfield, shifted in abruptly near 400M, 5 lengths back turning in, failed to make any progress in straight.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide at rear, 7 lengths back turning in, made no progress in straight. (Roarer.)
Began awkwardly, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed nothing in straight. (Roarer.)
Raced in the box-seat, about 2L off the lead mostly, kicked away at 300M, scored by a very impressive margin of 9L.
Took back, raced at the rear, wide but with cover at turn, saved ground and closed off strongly for 2nd.
Sent forward, took rail and led, headed by winner passing 300M, just caught by the 2nd placegetter prior going to the line.
Raced just in front of midfield, wide but with cover, ran on well to the line.
Eased back, raced at the tail, disappointed for running at 200M, closed off nicely thereafter.
Settled to race in midfield, along the rail, kept finding to the line.
Didn't muster, settled to race in about midfield, wide but with cover, continued on moderately. (Rider dropped right rein near 400M)
Travelled in worse than midfield, 2 wide, ran on fairly late.
In front of midfield, 2 wide, ran on till awkward to heels at 150M, showed nothing thereafter.(Lame left front)
Jumped only fairly, ridden and failed to find cover, allowed forward to sit in front of midfield, no cover from 800M, only one paced. (See Incident Report)
Niggled along, raced outside the lead, weakened passing 150M.
Didn't show speed, settled midfield 2 wide, one paced in straight, no extra for final 100M. (Mucus in trachea and roarer)
Jumped only fairly and lost ground, at rear on the rail, no dash, wasn't in it.
Urged after the start, worked forward gradually, wide until 800M, under pressure 600M out, not competitive. (Lame right front and must trial)
Began well to lead from a middle gate, obtained rails run passing the 1000 metres setting a fast pace, kicked over 2L clear over 200 metres out, tired in closing stages but just held on to the line.
Ridden early settling mainly one back on the rail, came to challenge from over 300 metres out, ran on under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Crowded at start but not far off, became 5th some 2L back passing the 1000 metres, crowded 900 metres out, switched 4-wide entering home straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Gradually settled in last few from a wide gate, came under pressure in a similar position entering home straight, ran on steadily under pressure but did not find much room inside final 100 metres.
Taken back to last from a wide gate, went past one beaten one 900 metres out, switched wide onto the centre of the track upon straightening, fought on steadily without threatening.

Settled in midfield on the rail, hampered passing the 900 metres and lost considerable ground, made good progress on the rail entering home straight, baulked after straightening until the 250 metres, kept on to the line.
Moderate start, soon picked up to wide in forward of midfield, gained slightly closer to 6th some 3L back rounding home bend, faded under pressure in straight. (Blood in trachea)

Settled in rear of midfield, similar rounding home bend, saved ground on the inside turning in, reached 4th some 5L back on straightening, folded up quickly inside final 250 metres. (Blood in trachea)
Midfield early, improved from the 1200 metres to reach within half a length of race leader onto home bend, weakened under pressure on straightening.
Ridden along in first few 3-wide, some 2L back in 4th coming onto home bend, went wider into the straight, folded up quickly.
Settled one from last from a wide gate, niggled along from the 1100 metres, awkward when dropped to last over 900 metres out, never recovered. (Irregular heart rhythm)
Began fairly from draw 1, soon recovered to chase leaders, quickened past leader 250M, kept on well to the line.
Held up 3-wide towards the rear, responded well when brought to outside on straightening, nearest finish.
Soon guided to the fence, settled behind midfield 4-5Ls back, closed off well from 350M, held by first 2 late stages.
Unable to cross from draw 11, caught 4-wide no cover in midfield, fought on well in straight despite tough trip, steadied close home.
Raced in mid-division along the 3-path, ran on steadily over final 400M, hampered close home.
Settled towards the rear, stayed on fairly over final 400M, never dangerous.
Hard driven to chase leaders, outpaced by rivals final 200M, soon no extra.
Sent forward, vied lead on inside, headed near 250M, no extra and weakened away. (Jockey : made abnormal breathing noise when giving ground in the straight.)

Dropped back from wide draw, in last 6Ls off the pace, gave limited response on straightening, never threatened. (Trainer : instructed jockey to shift across behind runners to obtain cover from a wide barrier.)
Held up in mid-division, failed to quicken when driven out 450M, never reached contention.
Rushed forward from wide draw but unable to cross, raced 3-wide no cover outside leaders, unable to sustain run 200M, weakened and eased.
Driven forward, vied lead on outside, gave ground passing 300M, weakened to last.
