Began only fairly, showed no early speed, raced at tail, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide turning in, finished off very strongly to score by a neck.
Clean jump, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, challenged by rival turning in, kept on very well in straight but unable to hold off the winner late. (Blood in trachea.)
Began awkwardly, sent forward to race in 2nd, challenged the leader turning in, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Jumped well, raced prominently on the outside, no cover throughout, 2 lengths back turning in, made minor progress in straight. (Rider dropped whip shortly after start.)
Jumped with them, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, a bit closer turning in, made minor progress in straight.
Away well from gate 1, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Began awkwardly, raced 3 wide slightly behind midfield, 5 lengths back turning in, finished off evenly.
Slightly inconvenienced at start, raced at rear on the inside, wider turning in, no clear running early in straight, made minor progress final 200M.
Average to begin, positioned 2 wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.
Away with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, peaked on turn, weakened gradually in straight.

Began well from the widest draw, raced prominently but trapped very wide early, slightly taken back after passing 800M, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight. (Blood in trachea.) (See Racing Incidents.)
Moderately away from gate 11, raced slightly behind midfield on the outside, peaked and lost position on turn, weakened early in straight. (Mucus.) (See Racing Incidents.)
Settled in front, 1 out 1 back, closed off strongly 300M to score.
On entering the track bumped the running rail and was examined by the vet who said the horse was suitable to race. Took rail and lead, hung on until 250M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
Pressed forward, 2 wide, lack room 400M, progressed steadily when clear.
Slow away, at back along the fence, lack room 400M, made steady ground when clear.
On arrival at the Start was noted to have blood in its mouth and was examined by the vet who said the horse was suitable to race. Box seat, ran on well until 150M weakened.
From wide barrier was shifted across behind runners in the early stages to obtain cover, progressed steadily 300M.
Midfield, 2 wide, no dash.
Stumbled at start, resulting in its rider becoming unbalanced. Then was slow to muster speed. For the majority of the race travelled wide and without cover, ran on ok in straight.
From wide barrier was shifted across behind runners in the early stages to obtain cover, took rail, made minor ground 200M.
Slow away, behind midfield along the fence, ran on fairly.
At back, 2 wide, no progress.
Never a factor. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, ran on impressively in the Straight and scored by 3-1/4L.
Raced in front of midfield, box seated, stayed on to finish 2nd.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, made ground steadily in the Straight.
Raced in worse than midfield, along the rail, saved ground and closed off okay in the Straight.
At rear, wide but with cover, swung widest on straightening, made ground and ran on nicely.
Lost ground passing 1100M and raced in worse than midfield, 3 wide but with cover, raced tight passing 400M and then one paced thereafter.
At rear, 2 wide, made some ground only in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, wide no cover, pretty one paced.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, was steadied passing 300M, did not feature.
Raced in front of midfield, 3 wide no cover, lost ground after passing 100M.
Sent forward and raced next to the leader, nothing in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, raced tight near 400M and lost ground thereafter.
Began well & strode forward to race on-speed. Moved up to share the lead at the 400m mark before finishing strongly to win by over a length.
Bumped heavily at start before mustering speed & racing third. Continued to race close to the speed, under 1L behind entering last section before closing off well to move to second near the 125m.
Began fast to hold narrow lead in early & middle stages. Joined in the lead at the 400m mark by the winner before weakening to third, just under 3L behind.
Began awkwardly & lost ground at start before racing near the rear in early stages. Improved position to midfield approaching half-way, shifted innards near the 250m before finishing evenly late.

Bumped heavily at start & consequently lost ground before rebalancing & racing in midfield. Improved to forth position passing half-way when around 2L from the lead before battling on to hold midfield finish.

Slow to begin & consequently raced rearward early before improving position to midfield passing the 600m. Continued to race near the center of the track entering last section when around 3L behind before giving late ground.
Began only fairly & was crowded at start before improving position tp race in midfield by the 600m. Continued to be around 3L from the lead at the 400m before weakening to be beaten 7L in midfield.
Raced in midfield between runners for the majority. Continued just under 3L from the lead passing the 400m before weakening out to be well beaten in midfield.

Raced in midfield along stand side rail throughout. Continued to be close to lead in middle stages, passed the 400m just over 2L from the lead before weakening quickly in last furlong to be well beaten.

Raced in midfield along stand side rail in early stages. Drifted slightly further back passing half-way, passed 400m mark around 4L behind. Shifted inwards at 300m, awkwardly placed near 200m but was too far back to figure.
Was out-paced after the start & consequently raced near the tail. Was hard ridden near the 600m mark to remain in contact before making no headway & being well beaten. Never involved.
Showed some pace to race in midfield in early stages before coming under pressure at half-way. Weakened sharply in last section & was beaten a big margin.
Allowed to drift back from inside barrier & raced a clear last throughout. Gave significant ground in last section & was long second last.
Raced worse than midfield soon after the start before coming under heavy pressure approaching half-way. Weakened our poorly & was a very long last.
Slowly away, showed no early speed, raced at tail, 8 to 9 lengths back, moved closer on turn but still the last, taken wide in straight and finished off very strongly to score.
Away with them, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, very wide turning in, closed off well to take 2nd. (See Racing Incidents.)
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, 2 wide from 600M, finished off well to take a place.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed very good response in straight, every chance 100M, no extra final 50M.
Began smartly from gate 11, raced prominently on the outside, found rail near 850M, sat right behind the leader on turn, hard ridden after passing 300M, finished off evenly.
Moderately away, raced 3 wide in midfield, commenced move 550M, very wide turning in, made good progress early in straight, peaked on run 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced behind midfield on the inside, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, no clear running early in straight, ran on evenly thereafter.
Average to begin, positioned a length behind the leader on rail early, allowed rival to cross near 850M, 2 wide from 600M, showed some response early in straight, no extra final 150M.
Out in line, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, challenged the leader turning in, took the lead early in straight, peaked 150M, headed and weakened final 100M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 3 wide with cover towards rear, similar position on turn, no daylight early in straight, cleared 200M, showed limited response thereafter, eased final 50M.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider after passing 450M, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Away with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, there to turn, unable to obtain clear running early in straight, cleared 250M, failed to make any progress thereafter.
Average to begin, positioned 2 wide slightly better than midfield, wider after passing 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened and eased final furlong.
Fast into stride, raced prominently but trapped very wide, took the lead 1000M, found rail approaching 750M, challenged turning in, headed and weakened early in straight, eased final 250M.
Sent forward, settled outside the lead, kicked away on straightening, held on to score by 1/2L. (See Incident Report)
Settled to race in front of midfield, along the rail, kept kicking and finished off nicely for 2nd.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, ran on nicely to the line to take 3rd.
Niggled along, prominent but wide, continued on nicely to the line.
Travelled in about midfield, along the rail, kept on nicely to the line.
Crowded start then eased, in behind midfield along the rail, switched course at 200M, closed off fairly thereafter.
Settled to race in midfield, 2 wide, continued on fairly to the line.
Eased back, at tail and shifted to rail at 800M, made minor ground in the straight.
Fractious in the gate, then jumped up at the start and lost ground, recovered to be in behind midfield along the rail, showed no dash.
Awkward start then taken back, at rear 2 wide, ran on without threatening.
In worse than midfield, 2 wide, crowded at 300M, showed nothing thereafter. (Blood in trachea)
Slotted into behind midfield, 2 wide, hampered at 300M, showed nothing nonetheless.
Settled to race in box-seat, showed no kick and faded in the straight.
Sent forward to lead, on rail, headed on straightening, dropped off thereafter.
Ridden along in rear of midfield in 7th just over 3L off the pace, similar turning in, ran on under pressure to just defy runner-up's strong late challenge to the line.

Jumped awkwardly losing ground, trailed 5L back in last of the small field on the rail, angled out for a run entering home straight, ran on well near the centre of the track to just fail to get up on line. (Tactic questioned)
Close up early, settled some 2L back in 5th coming onto home bend, came to challenge under pressure after straightening, fought on steadily without threatening.
Held narrow lead out wide from a wide gate, crossed to the rail coming onto home bend, kicked 1L clear under pressure inside the 300 metres, collared 50 metres out.
Ridden forward to come within 2L of pace in 4th on the rail, behind runners early in straight, fought on steadily under pressure, hampered near finish. (Reported roarer)
Ridden forward to travel just outside race leader, in similar position in 2nd turning for home, unable to sustain inside final 180 metres.
Began well from the widest gate, travelled 3 wide without cover in prominently, in similar position swinging for home, soon weakened.
Settled well behind some 5L back, joint last into home straight, found nothing under pressure.
Moderate start, settled in 8th just over some 4L off the pace on the rail, in similar position turning in, made no further impression.
Settled wide in midfield in 5th within 3L of pace, gave ground steadily from approaching the 500 metres, widest runner turning in, dropped out noticeably while shifting ground.
Soon driven to the lead, set good pace, sprinted strongly final 400M and always holding off the persistent runner-up. Won in track record time.
Always prominent, vied for lead with eventual winner passing 350M, held final 100M. Pleasing return after long absence.
Settled just behind leaders, responded well from 400M, held by first 2 in the run home.
Held up towards the rear, made steady progress up the stands' rail over final 400M, failed to trouble first 3.
Crowded for room at the start, recovered to race in midfield, stayed on mildly over final 300M, never dangerous to leaders.
Chased leaders, outpaced by leaders 300M, no extra final 100M.
Held up towards the rear, driven out from halfway, stayed on fairly, never a threat to leaders.
Settled behind mid-division, not clearest run 400M and from 200M to 100M.
Close up behind leaders, hard driven 500M but not making progress, faded final 200M.
Outpaced in the rear, ran past beaten horses only.
Never far off the pace, scrubbed along halfway, couldn't sustain run from 300M, weakened away.
Obtained a midfield position, lacked a finishing response passing 400M, weakened final 200M.
Held up behind midfield, outpaced passing 400M, never involved. (Blood in trachea.)
Began well, positioned 2 wide in midfield, 3 wide on turn, commenced move after passing 500M, finished off very strongly to score.
Jumped well from the widest draw, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably throughout, kept on well in straight, just unable to hold off the winner late.
Slightly slow out, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, finished off well to take a place to be nearest on line.
Away well, positioned 1-1/2L behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, kept on evenly in straight.

Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, saved ground on turn, unable to obtain clear running early in straight, cleared after passing 150M, made some progress thereafter.
Began fairly, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 5 lengths or so back, commenced move after passing 500M, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 150M.
Began well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Slightly slow out, raced behind midfield on the inside, angled out 500M, showed limited response in early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, 6 lengths or so back on turn, very wide into straight, finished off evenly.
Made contact at start and unbalanced, raced behind midfield on the outside, wider turning in, failed to close off in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began fairly, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Slowly into stride, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, a length or so back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Clean jump, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover for the majority of the race, weakened early in straight when hard run took toll.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide behind midfield early, found rail near 900M, moved a bit closer on turn, finished off very strongly to score.
Jumped with them, taken back to race towards rear on the outside, 2 wide behind midfield in the middle stages, taken wide in straight and finished off very strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Commenced well, raced better than midfield on the inside, easy run on turn, hard ridden after passing 300M, hit the front 200M, peaked and headed 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, very wide turning in, made good progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Jumped well from the widest draw, sent forward to race prominently, 2 wide, there to turn, hit the front early in straight, peaked and headed near 200M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Taken back from gate 13, raced at tail, 7 to 8 lengths back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Away with them, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 3 wide from 800M, a length back on turn, showed limited response in straight, weakened final 100M.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced better than midfield on the outside early, sent forward 800M, shared lead turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide in midfield, wider turning in, showed limited response early in straight, eased final 150M. (See Racing Incidents.) (Mucus.)
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, 2 wide on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened and eased final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide at rear, hard ridden 500M, failed to close off in straight.
Bumped start, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Very slowly away, raced at rear throughout, never a threat.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, shared the lead with rival turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened thereafter.

Began only fairly, raced prominently, 2 wide, there to turn, took the lead early in straight, kept on well to the line, won by 1-1/4L.
Commenced well from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, finished off well to take 2nd.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, 5 lengths back on turn, made very good progress in straight to take a place, nearest on line.
Began fairly, positioned 2 to 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, closed off well to make frame without threatening.
Out in line, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Moderately away, positioned 3 wide with cover, 3 lengths back, same position on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from gate 9, raced at tail, 5 to 6 lengths back, saved ground on turn, made little progress in straight.
Moderately away, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, headed early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Clean jump, raced 3 wide with cover towards rear, 4 lengths or so back on turn, one-paced in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Average to begin, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, similar position on turn, taken wide early in straight, made no progress final 200M.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, moved a bit closer after passing 550M, weakened early in straight.
Pushed to take rail and lead, drifted away 300M to score.
Midfield, 2 wide, ran on well for 2nd.
Checked start, behind midfield, 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 300M.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, 2 wide, progressed steadily 250M. Noted to be lame right front leg on the morning after racing.
Eased back, 2 wide, made steady ground 200M.
Pushed forward, 2-3 wide, weakened 150M.
Box seat, out of fuel 300M. Lame right front leg after racing.
At back along the fence, no progress.
Checked start, never competitive. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Trapped 3-4 wide throughout, emptied 500M. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Pushed forward, trapped 3 wide, dropped off 400M.
Trapped 3 wide, never a factor.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, saved ground and closed off strongly to score.
Settled in one-out one-back, battled on to the line to take 2nd.
Sent forward, along the rail, stayed on but headed in the last 50M.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, passing 100M brushed a runner, made ground and ran on for 4th.
Settled in behind the lead, along the rail, only one paced in the Straight.
Slow to begin and at rear, along the rail, swung widest on Straightening, made some ground in the last 100M.
Raced in midfield, wide no cover after 600M, pretty one paced.
Raced in worse than midfield, along the rail, pretty one paced.
Worse than midfield, 2 wide, remained one paced in the Straight.
At rear, along the rail, did not improve in the Straight.
At rear, 2 wide, did not featured.
Sent forward, 2 wide, flattened after 150M and lost ground in the Straight.

Raced handy early before drifting back after first bend to race midfield along rail. Shifted away from the inside near 550m, eased into clear running on straightening before sprinting to lead inside final 100m to win easily.

Pushed forward, raced 5 wide around first bend before crossing to race two wide at leaders flanks at 700m. Continued to share narrow lead until 100m mark before past quickly by easy winner, battled well to narrowly hold 2nd.

Shared lead early before continuing on to take outright lead near the 850m before crossing to rail at 700m. Continued to share narrow lead until the 100m mark before passed by easy winner. Just headed for second on line.

Crowded after start & consequently raced near the tail throughout. Continued second last before being severely checked when close to heels 450m. Entered last section 6L behind before finishing strongly in concluding stages.

Raced prominent early before steadying after first bend & racing 3 wide in midfield before being left without cover 700m. Continued wide around bend, not far behind until peaking in late stages, shared 4th on line.

Didn't have early speed & shifted behind runners after first bend to race in midfield. Hung outwards around the bend & was awkwardly placed near the 450m & lost ground. Shifted wider in straight & closed off well to midfield.

Steadied from widest gate & shifted back near the tail when three wide with cover. Improved position in middle stages when continuing wide. Entered last section just over 3L behind, cornered widest before holding margin late.
Obtained good position 1,1 for the majority. Hard ridden entering last section when just over 2L behind before finishing only one paced to midfield in concluding stages.
Had a nice run in midfield on the rail throughout. Continued along rail on cornering, weakened a few lengths in final furlong & was no threat.

Pushed forward & shared early lead before being crossed & racing on leaders back from the 700m. Stayed on rail on straightening, batted well until emptying out approaching 150m & weakening late. (Must trial, see report).
Had no early speed & shifted down to rail & raced third last. Entered last section just over 5L behind, made no headway in the straight & was beaten about 6L on the line.

Badly crowded at the start & lost ground, consequently raced at the tail. Continued at the rear before being severely checked near the 400m & losing further ground. Was a long way back on straightening & never featured.
Began well, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, challenged the leader turning in, hit the front 150M, kept on well to hold off the challengers late.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, commenced move after passing 400M, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, finished off strongly to take a place, nearest on line.
Away well, sent forward to take the lead, led by 1/2L on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the inside, angled out after passing 400M, made good progress early in straight, no clear run final 50M.
Jumped well, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Made contact at start, positioned on rail behind midfield, saved ground on turn, made some progress early in straight, no clear run final 50M.
Lifted front feet on jumping, raced in midfield on the outside, 3 to 4 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, finished off evenly.
Jumped well, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Jumped with them, positioned 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, very wide turning in, failed to make any progress, eased final 100M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from gate 9, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Gradually worked forward, took rail and led at 1200M, kicked away on straightening, kept on to score by 1L.
Rolled forward, settled to race outside the lead, continued on well to the line to take 2nd.
Couldn't muster, in one-out one-back, switched off heels at 250M, ran on nicely thereafter.
Settled just behind midfield, 2 wide, continued on nicely to the line.
Took back, remained at rear, 2 wide, ran on fairly late.
Jumped only fairly, taken back, in worse than midfield, along the rail, closed off moderately.
Crowded start, raced in midfield, along the rail, continued one paced to the line.
Raced just in front of midfield, along the rail, showed no dash before weakening.
Urged along, crossed by eventual leader at 1200M, then raced in box-seat, faded 150M out.
Awkward start, at rear along the rail, made no ground in the straight.
Didn't muster, took back and remained at rear, wide until 800M, never a factor.
In worse than midfield, 2 wide, never in it.
Broke well to share early pace 3-wide, hit the front 2-wide passing the 900 metres, obtained rails run in the front over 600 metres out, held on well under pressure.
Amongst the leaders early, settled one back on the rail passing the 900 metres, became 4th some 2L back inside the 800 metres, fought on steadily along the rail in straight but never threatening.
Moderate start, settled in rear in 9th, commenced move 500 metres out circling the field on home bend, widest runner turning in, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Ridden along from wide gate, travelled one back 3-wide in 5th early, reached 3rd 2-wide 800 metres out, 3-wide rounding home bend, kept on same pace without quickening.

Held slender lead early, settled half a length back on the rail passing the 900 metres, crossed by race leader 600 metres out, switched out for a run entering home straight, ran home one-paced. (Performance questioned)
Taken back from the widest gate, trailed the field most of the way to straight, inconvenienced for a stride 200 metres out, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Jumped awkwardly and crowded, taken to the back for rails run, gained one closer passing the 900 metres, saved ground turning in, kept on well in straight.
Ridden along in midfield in 6th, drifted slightly further back to 8th passing the 800 metres, ran home one-paced.
Settled over 2L back in 5th, drifted further off the pace over 700 metres out, came under pressure rounding home bend, switched wide into straight, found nothing.
Travelled wide without cover in midfield, similar turning for home, made no impression in straight.
Slowly away, soon recovered to rear of midfield in 8th along the rail, dropped away quickly shortly after straightening.
Settled behind midfield, waited with on inside, quickened up smoothly to lead near 100M, soon in control.
From draw 9 caught wide no cover until crossing to the lead before home turn, fought on well in straight, headed 100M but held on well for 2nd.
Up with early pace, checked 550M when leader crossed to fence, kept on steadily to hold 3rd in straight. (Minor laceration LF pastern.)
From draw 10 caught wide in midfield, driven and kept on steadily over final 300M, held by first 3.
Reserved towards the rear, swung wide into straight, stayed on moderately from 300M, not reached contention.
Taken back to the rear, waited with on inside, gave limited response turning home, ran past beaten horses only.
Dropped back to a position near rear, swung wide home turn, ran on fairly down outside of straight, not troubled leaders.
From draw 1 chased leaders along the fence, checked 550M, kept on same pace in straight, never threatened.
Pushed along to chase leaders, couldn't go on turning home, weakened mid-straight.
Settled in mid-division, had difficulty obtaining clear run early straight but failed to respond passing 200M. (Jockey unable to explain for the disappointing run.)
Up with pace but caught wide no cover throughout, no extra mid-straight, weakened to last. (Jockey : did not travel strongly at any stage.)
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the inside early, angled out after passing 750M, very wide turning in, finished off very strongly to score.
Taken back from gate 9, raced 2 wide towards rear, similar position on turn, taken wide in straight and finished off strongly to take 2nd.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, moved closer after passing 800M, 4 wide on turn, made some progress in straight to take a place.

Taken back from gate 11, raced at tail early, moved closer after entering the back straight, 5Ls back on turn, very wide into straight, showed good response early in straight, inconvenienced 150M, made some progress thereafter.
Average to begin, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well in the middle stages, led by 3/4L turning in, kept on well early in straight, peaked 150M, headed and weakened final 50M.
Began well, raced in 2nd, 3/4L behind the leader, there to turn, finished off evenly.
Away with them, trapped 3 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, showed limited response in straight, short of room final 50M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Out in line, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, there to turn, raced tight early in straight, ran on well to 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Commenced well, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, saved ground throughout, kept on well early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Jumped well, raced better than midfield on the outside, 1 to 2 lengths back on turn, raced tight early in straight, peaked on run 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Average to begin, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Slowly away, raced behind midfield on the inside, peaked on turn, weakened gradually in straight.

Began only fairly, raced 2 wide at rear, 3 lengths or so back on turn, taken wide in straight and finished off very strongly to score on his debut, impressive.
Began smartly, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, travelled well to turn, hit the front 250M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner final 75M.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground throughout, finished off evenly.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide in midfield, no cover on turn, made some progress early in straight, peaked on run 200M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Moderately away from gate 9, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Average to begin, sent forward to take the lead, led by 1/2L on turn, peaked early in straight, headed 250M, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Shifted in at start and made contact, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 3 wide from 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M. (Mucus.)
Made contact at start, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Taken back to race at tail, 5 to 6 lengths back, peaked on turn, weakened final 500M, finished tailed out.
Pushed forward, on the fence, ran on strongly 300M to score.
Eased to rear, 4-5 wide, made steady ground 300M for 2nd.
At back, 2 wide, lack room 400M, progressed steadily when clear.
Eased to rear, 3-4 wide, progressed steadily 250M.
Whilst in the saddling stalls had its left front plate refitted. Pushed forward, sat just off the leader, led 350M, weakened 150M.
Pushed early, hold the rail behind midfield, progressed steadily 300M.
Eased back, 3 wide, lack room 4-2, made steady ground when clear.
Crowded for room on jumping, at rear, along the fence, made ground 200M.
Eased back, 3 wide, no progress.
Eased to sit in midfield, trapped wide and without cover throughout, emptied 200M.
Throughout the race traveled racing wide and without cover, checked 350M, out of fuel 300M.
Pushed forward, lack room 400M, weakened 250M. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Never better than midfield. Post-race vet inspection did not show any significant findings.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, emptied 400M.
Sent forward and took lead, ran on impressively to score by 2-1/4L.
Raced next to the leader, 2 wide, ran on strongly but never threatened the winner.
Settled in one-out one-back, made some ground the last 100M.
Raced in behind the lead, along the rail, saved ground and ran on well.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, made some ground only in the last 50M.
Taken back and at rear, 2 wide, made minor ground only in the Straight.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, found no extra approaching 100M.
Taken back, 2 wide, only one paced in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, emptied after passing 150M.
At rear, 3 wide no cover, nothing in the Straight.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, did not feature.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, did not improve in the Straight.
At rear, along the rail, never a factor.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, found nothing and emptied in the Straight.

Raced 3 wide early before coming over to position 1,1 from the 900m. Just over a length from the lead entering last section, asked for full effort near 300m, moved to lead approaching 150m & was too strong late.

Jumped well before drifting back to race just worse than midfield away from rail. Was third last on cornering, entered last section 3.5L from the lead before finishing strongly down the outside to be under a length behind.

Drifted back to race third last along rail in early stages. Cornered about 3L from the lead, shifted outwards passing the 300m to get clear running before finishing well to steal third in late stages, beaten just over a length.

Raced in midfield between runners early before becoming keen when crossed near the 900m. Entered last section just over 2L behind before finishing well in concluding stages to be beaten just over a length.
Pushed forward & held the lead when racing away from the rail & having second at his flanks in middle stages. Shared the lead on straightening, joined by the winner approaching the 150m, peaked late.

Raced in second along the rail when racing at the flanks of the leader. Improved to share the lead on the inside on straightening, continued close until peaking at 175m & giving a few lengths late. Not beaten far.
Not the fastest to begin but mustered speed to race in midfield on rail. Came under pressure on straightening when just over 2L from the lead before weakening a few lengths in final 250m.

Steadied after start & shifted back from widest gate to second last. Continued rearward on straightening, 5L from the lead, shifted to be the widest runner but made no meaningful headway into margin & was 4.5L behind on line.
Steadied after the start & shifted back to the tail. Continued to share last place on straightening, 5L from the lead before making no headway in dash to line & being beaten that margin when last.

Slightly slow out, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 3 wide from 1000M, moved a bit closer in the middle stages, showed very good response after turning in, hit the front 150M, kept on well to the line and scored.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced at rear on the inside, hard ridden after passing 550M, taken wide in straight and finished off strongly to take 2nd.

Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide in midfield, dropped towards rear of midfield in the middle stages, hard ridden from 600M, very wide turning in, made good progress in straight to take a place. (Lost left front plate.)
Bumped start, raced 2 wide towards rear, 3 wide from 900M, commenced move after passing 600M, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home to make frame.
Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, angled out 500M, made good progress early in straight, no extra final 50M.
Began awkwardly, raced in midfield on the outside, moved closer on turn, took brief lead early in straight, peaked and headed 200M, weakened final furlong.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear, 10 lengths back, closer on turn, only 4 to 5 lengths behind, very wide into straight, made some headway in the run home.

Began well from gate 1, positioned 4 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, angled out 450M, no clear running early in straight, cleared after passing 300M, showed limited response thereafter.
Bumped start and unbalanced, raced prominently, 2 wide, hard ridden after passing 600M, only showed limited response, ran on evenly to 100M, weakened thereafter.
Jumped with them, raced better than midfield but trapped 3 wide early, 2 wide from 1200M, commenced move approaching 600M, 4 wide turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.

Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared after passing 150M, made no progress thereafter. (Laceration above the back of the left hock.)
Bumped start and unbalanced, positioned 2 wide, a length back, found rail near 1000M, ridden from 600M, peaked early in straight, weakened and eased final 150M.
Began awkwardly, sent forward to take the lead, challenged by rivals turning in, peaked and headed 200M, weakened thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.) (Lost left front plate in the middle stages.)
Crowded start, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, saved ground throughout, unable to obtain clear running in straight, eased final 150M. (Blood in trachea.) (See Racing Incidents.)
Settled to race outside lead, continued in a close battle to the line, held on to win by a short-head.
Rolled forward, prominent but wide and no cover, kept kicking but couldn't pass winner, finished a short-head behind. (See Incident Report)
Travelled in about midfield, 2 wide, closed off strongly in last 200M to take 3rd.
Jumped smartly, slotted into midfield, wide but with cover, ran on well to the line.
Jumped only fairly, in midfield, wide but with cover, showed strong finishing dash in last 200M.
Taken back, raced at the tail, wide but with cover, swung widest into the straight, ran on fairly.
Sent forward and led, took rail from 800M, in touch until found no extra for final 100M.
In lead and on rail, handed up and sat in box-seat from 800M, held up passing 200M, closed off fairly to the line.
In one-out one-back after beginning awkwardly, was 1-1/2L off at 400M, raced on one paced.
Prominent and on rail early, shuffled back near 800M, one paced to the line.
Slow to begin, recovered in just behind midfield, along the rail, ran on evenly.
Eased after start, in worse than midfield, wide but with cover, showed dashes early, flattened late.
At rear, 2 wide, 5-1/4L off at 400M, improved slightly.
Sat front of midfield, keen early, wide and no cover at turns, gradually weakened near 250M.
Soon taken back from a wide gate settling in last few, came wide to challenge entering straight, ran on well to hit the front 100 metres out, won decisively.
Began well in close up 4th early, gradually came back to midfield coming onto home bend, came under pressure to challenge upon straightening, fought on steadily without threatening.
Began moderately from a wide gate and taken back to last, made significant progress inside final 250 metres to snatch 3rd late.
Led from a wide draw early, settled within 1L just outside race leader, hit the front under pressure approaching the 200 metres only to be headed 70 metres out, pipped for 3rd.
Ridden throughout early stages reaching 5th some 3L back passing the 1000 metres, kept on same pace without quickening in the run to the line.
Began well from the widest gate, soon taken back to rear of midfield in joint 7th, in similar position entering home straight, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Settled mainly one-out-one-back, just over 2L back in 4th rounding home bend, finished off the race tamely inside final 150 metres. (Lame next day)

Improved steadily along the rail early reaching one back in 3rd 1100 metres out, switched out for a run entering home straight, found nothing under pressure. (Questioned for disappointing performance  blood in trachea)
Hampered early before settling well back, saved ground turning for home, kept on well.
Picked up steadily along the rail before settling just worse than midfield in joint 7th, angled out for a run entering home straight, one-paced under pressure.
Broke well before taken back, pulled to the front shortly after and led until finding no extra over 200 metres out, folded up quickly. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Chased leaders in 4th, driven to lead mid-straight, dug deep final stages to hold off the persistent runner-up.
Settled behind mid-division, 4Ls off leader rounding home turn, closed well final 300M, pressed winner to the line but always just held. (Lost RF plate 300M.)
Tracked leader along the 2-path, took over early straight, out-finished by first 2 over final 200M.
Held up behind midfield, responded fairly on straightening, kept on mildly to the line. Never a threat to first 3.
Tracked leaders in 3rd, run ended 250M, faded away. (Lame Right Fore day after racing.)

Steadied for cover after the start, reserved at the back, 5Ls off the pace entering home turn, found disappointingly little in the finish. (Jockey : didn't feel comfortable in action concluding stages / Lame both fore day after racing.)
Steadied early stages to find cover, held up in the rear, 6Ls off the pace halfway, made no impression on straightening.
Led as expected, came under heavy pressure 550M, soon headed on straightening, weakened and finished tailed out (Unacceptable Performance.)
Jumped well, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move 500M, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to score. (Minor laceration to the right front coronary band.)
Began fairly, raced 2 wide behind midfield, angled out after passing 500M, closed off well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Crowded on jumping, raced 2 wide towards rear, commenced move 500M, very wide turning in, made very good progress in straight to take a place.
Clean jump, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, headed 250M, peaked 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from gate 10, raced at tail, 10 lengths back in the middle stages, closer on turn but still the last into straight, passed some tired runners in the run home.
Made contact at start, raced in 2nd, a length back, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced 2 wide better than midfield, angled out 500M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong. (Saddle slipped back on jumping.)
Began well, positioned on rail better than midfield, easy run on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the inside, moved closer on turn, angled out 500M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened and eased inside final furlong.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide at rear, very wide turning in, weakened early in straight.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, angled out after passing 500M, showed very good response after turning in, hit the front 200M, kept on very well to the line, won by a head.
Out in line, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, hard ridden after passing 350M, finished off very well to take 2nd, always held.

Crowded start, raced 3 wide at rear, moved a bit closer in the middle stages, carried wider after passing 500M, no cover for the majority of the race, made good progress in straight to take a place without threatening.
Began fairly, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out 500M, hard ridden from 300M, made minor progress thereafter.
Began well from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, there to turn, made some progress early in straight, peaked on run 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Average to begin, positioned on rail in midfield, wider turning in, showed limited response in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Clean jump, showed limited early speed, raced 3 wide behind midfield early, 2 wide from 900M, 5 lengths or so back on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide at rear, angled out after passing 500M, very wide turning in, finished off evenly.

Shifted in abruptly at start, raced 3 wide with no cover, a length or so back, found a 2 wide spot near 700M, same margin back turning in, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Away with them, raced behind midfield on the inside, angled out 450M, made some progress early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened thereafter. (Lame right front leg.)
Began smartly from a wide draw, raced prominently, 2 wide, there to turn, peaked early in straight, headed 250M, weakened thereafter.
Shifted in at start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Very slow away, raced at rear on the inside, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.

Raced 4 wide without cover in midfield throughout but was travelling comfortably due to moderate tempo. Cornered very wide, entered last section only 2L behind, sprinted quickly to lead near 200m, drew away late. Impressive.

Showed abundant early speed to lead before being headed near the 800m mark & racing second. Moved up to reassume lead passing the 300m mark before quickly being joined by winner at the 200m. Held second.

Steadied from outside barrier & taken back to last. Moved wide approaching the 700m mark, followed winner on cornering, straightened just under 4L from the lead before finishing strongly in late stages to just miss second.

Steadied in early stages to get cover before settling rearward. Relegated to last approaching corner, straightened 5L from lead, shifted inwards in the straight when making ground before closing steadily late stages.

Pushed forward, raced on leaders back early before coming off rail near 800m & racing just behind leading pair. Continued close, only 1L from lead on straightening before emptying inside final 100m & yielding a length late.

Not fast to begin, mustered speed & improved to midfield near 900m. Improved between runners near 750m before being steadied near 600m. Entered last section only 2L behind before holding midfield finish in concluding stages.
Didn't begin fast, mustered speed to race three deep with cover in midfield. Straightened in second half when 3.5L from the lead before finishing off steadily to midfield in concluding stages.

Raced worse than midfield away from the rail in early stages before racing very keenly & being awkwardly placed approaching the corner. Straightened 3.5L from the lead before failing to make any headway in dash to line.

Caught racing three wide without cover in midfield throughout. Cornered four wide, entered last section only 1.5L from the lead before peaking on effort approaching the 200m mark & weakening thereafter.
Didn't begin fast but improved quickly after start before continuing on to take lead near the 800m mark. Joined in the lead by the runner-up near the 300m before weakening in final furlong.

Steadied after the start & shifted back to rearward position. Continued along the rail on cornering, entered last section 3.5L from the lead before making no headway in the straight & finishing 6.5L behind on line.
Raced in midfield on the rail throughout. Stayed along rail on straightening, only 2L from the lead entering last section before weakening quickly in last furlong to be beaten just under 8L.

Raced in midfield between runners early before laying out badly & losing ground around first bend. Continued to hang outwards before being crowded & losing further ground at 600m. Weakened out to long last in straight.

Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length on turn, kept on well in straight to hold off the challengers.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide behind midfield, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide turning in, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, just missed.
Clean jump, raced 2 wide better than midfield, angled out 400M, closed off well to take a place, short of room close home.
Began well from gate 1, sat right behind the leader on rail, easy run to turn, kept on well in straight but always held, short of room close home.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the inside, 6 lengths or so back, commenced move 400M, very wide turning in, finished off very strongly to be nearest on line.
Began fairly, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, finished off evenly. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began well, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, angled out 350M, finished off evenly.
Commenced well, raced 3 wide better than midfield early, 2 wide from 750M, a length back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide in midfield, no cover on turn, very wide into straight, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Slowly away, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Away with them, raced 3 wide towards rear, wider on turn, one-paced in straight.
Taken back from gate 11, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, made all.
Eased to sit just off the leaders, 2 wide, dashed well 300M for 2nd.
Hard ridden to obtain box seat, held ground for 3rd.
Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, held ground in straight.
Midfield, 2-3 wide, dashed well 250M.
Checked early, behind midfield, on the fence, ran on fairly. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
At back, along the fence, throughout the race got its head on the side and lay out, little dash 200M. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Midfield, near 250M dropped left rein, no dash. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, 2 wide, no progress.
At back, 2 wide, no progress.
Trapped 3-4 wide at rear throughout, never improved. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Sent forward and took lead, battled on to the line and scored by a head.
Raced in behind the lead, ran on but headed by the winner in the last 30M.
Slow to begin and settled in midfield, along the rail, saved ground and closed off strongly for 3rd.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, made ground steadily to the line for 4th.
Rolled forward, 2 wide, continued on one paced to the line. (See Incident Report)
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, saved some ground and only one paced to the line.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide no cover after 1100M, pretty one paced. (See Incident Report)
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, found nothing in the Straight.
At rear, 2 wide, did not feature.
At rear, along the rail, not competitive in the Straight.

Steadied after first bend & drifted back to race just worse than midfield. Continued near the tail on cornering, shifted wider on straightening before finishing very strongly last furlong to strike narrow lead final strides.

Began well before getting good position in midfield away from the rail. Eased three wide to commence run approaching 400m when under 3L from lead, sprinted well despite shifting inwards, struck lead 100m, caught late.

Crowded on jumping before being steadied & settling near the tail. Moved wide on the track to commence run near 450m, cornered very wide before making strong late ground down the outside to be half length behind.

Began only fairly but mustered speed quickly to race on leaders back. Moved over heels after straightening, moved up to share lead at 150m before over-run by first three in late stages. Beaten under a length.

Steadied after start & shifted back from the widest barrier to race at the rear early. Stayed along the rail on straightening, made good ground to share lead near 125m before being over-run in last 100m. Only 1.5L behind.

Raced prominently after start before getting good position 1,1 from the 700m. Eased 3 wide approaching corner, dashed up to be within a neck of the lead at 150m before being over-run by fast finishers late. Not beaten far.
Raced in midfield away from the rail throughout. Entered last section 4L form the lead, momentarily awkwardly placed near heels 225m before finishing off ok to midfield beaten just over 2L.

Showed good speed to lead. Continued in lead until being joined & headed on the outside near the 700m. Regained lead near 450m, held a length advantage on straightening until emptying passing the 200m & weakening thereafter.

Steadied after start & taken back before being relegated to last near 700m. Continued at the back on cornering, stayed along the rail in straight before being badly blocked for room in final furlong & going to line untested.

Began fairly before making ground & improving to midfield along rail. Shifted away from rail near 450m when 4L behind, shifted inwards to avoid heels 275m, before being disappointed for clear running thereafter. Not tested.

Raced in midfield along the rail in early & middle stages. Held up for clear running on cornering, shifted inwards 300m before being badly held up for clear running from 225m when only a length behind. Not tested, see report.

Ridden forward, race wide around first bend before continuing on to eventually gain slender lead when racing on the outside near the 700m. Was joined by original leader near 450m before weakening to last in straight.
Jumped well from the widest draw, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide, challenged the leader turning in, hit the front 150M, kept on well to hold off the challengers late.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 lengths or so back, commenced move after passing 400M, very wide turning in, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, just narrowly beaten.
Moderately away, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, a bit closer on turn, angled out early in straight and finished off well to take a place, just narrowly beaten.
Began well, positioned 1-1/2L behind the leader on rail, easy run to turn, closed off well to make frame.
Jumped well from gate 10, sent forward to take the lead, challenged from 400M, peaked and headed 150M, weakened gradually final 50M.
Commenced well, positioned 2 wide, 5 lengths or so back, there to turn, angled out 350M, made some headway in straight.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground to turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Away with them, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened and eased final 100M.
Jumped well, raced 3 wide in midfield, no cover throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Average to begin, raced at rear, 8 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, showed some response early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Began awkwardly, raced at tail early, 8 to 9 lengths back, moved a bit closer after passing 800M, but still 7 lengths back on turn, made no impression in straight.
Clean jump, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Sent forward, took rail and led, kicked away on straightening, held off late challenges to score.
Jumped only fairly, raced in worse than midfield, along the rail, improved along the inside rail, hit the line strongly, just missed.
Ridden along, raced outside the lead, continued on nicely to the line to take 3rd.
Travelled in worse than midfield, 2 wide, swung widest, saved ground and closed off strongly.
Sent forward, settled to race in box-seat, ran on okay to the line.
Raced just in front of midfield, 2 wide, continued on fairly to the line.
Jumped smart, settled to race in midfield, along the rail, ran on evenly.
Jumped only fairly, behind midfield initially, improved to be midfield after 800M, was one paced.
Eased back, then raced at the rear, along the rail, unbalanced at 300M, saved no ground.
Awkward start, raced just behind midfield, 2 wide, showed nothing.
Awkward start, then urged forward to be handy, trapped wide, emptied passing 250M.
Fractious and lost ground at start, remained detached, wasn't a factor. Must trial.
Took up running under pressure after the first 200 metres, driven clear inside the final 200 metres, won confidently.

Ridden positively from the widest gate, travelled 3-wide without cover with the leaders down back straight becoming 2-wide past the Rock, unable to match winner's late burst of speed but kept on well to the line.
Ridden along wide without cover in forward of midfield, some 4L back in 5th rounding home bend, ran on steadily in straight without threatening.
Began well from a high gate, settled one back in 3rd one off the rail, in similar position turning for home, fought on steadily without threatening.
Ridden along after moderate start from the one gate, settled just over 2L back in 4th on the rail, slightly further back turning for home, one-paced in straight.
Very slowly away losing considerable ground, quickly recovered to one from last, remained well behind into the straight, produced good late impression in the run to then line.
Settled just worse than midfield on the rail, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Ridden along in midfield mainly in 6th after beginning from a high gate, in similar position turning in, ran home one-paced.
Slightly slow out, steadily improved to rear of midfield down back straight reaching 7th some 7L back coming onto home bend, made no impression under pressure thereafter. (Blood in trachea) (Roarer)
Began well, gradually settled towards the rear, made no show thereafter.
Soon dropped to the rear, never seen with a chance.
Moved up to track leader in a fast run race, led near 250M, kept on strongly to line, had enough in tank to hold off a pair of challengers late. Broke course record.
Chased leaders on the inside, pace fast throughout the race, fought hard in the straight trying to reel in the leader, nearest finish.
Settled behind midfield in a fast run race, 6Ls to make up at 400M, closed off strongly to claim dead-heat 2nd just in time, nearest finish.
Held up in mid-division, slightly hampered top of the straight, finished off mildly to take 4th, not troubled first 3.
Never far off the fast pace, bustled along 600M out, kept on steadily final 300M, not reached leaders.
From draw 1 went forward to lead as expected, set fast pace throughout, headed near 250M, soon no extra and weakened.
Settled midfield along inside, driven along 550M, not mustered the speed to challenge, never threatened.
Slow out, switched off to race in last 10Ls off leader in a fast run race, scrubbed along 550M, made limited progress in straight, ran past beaten horses only.
From wide draw soon taken across behind runners, held up near last, failed to respond when driven along home turn, never involved.
Caught 3-wide no cover chasing leaders in a fast run race, gave ground from top of straight after tough trip.
Held up towards the rear in a fast run race, failed to pick up speed when driven along home turn, made no impression in the straight.
Driven early but unable to find the lead due to fast pace, raced 3-wide in midfield further back than intended, weakened and gave ground from 400M.
Began smartly, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, easy run to turn, finished off strongly to score.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide turning in, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, just beaten by a neck.
Away with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move after passing 550M, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home to take a place, nearest on line.
Jumped well from gate 11, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 75M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Shifted in at start and bumped, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, made minor progress in straight.
Out with rest, raced 2 wide towards rear, 5 lengths or so back, found rail near 500M, same margin back turning in, kept to inside after straightening and made some progress.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the inside, moved a bit closer in the middle stages, angled out 400M, made some progress in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced towards rear on the outside, 6 lengths back, moved a bit closer on turn, made little progress in straight.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2 lengths or so back, there to turn, one-paced in straight.
Jumped with them, raced at tail, still 7 to 8 lengths back on turn, made little progress in straight.
Bumped start, unable to slot in, trapped 3 wide with no cover, a length or so back, similar position on turn, weakened early in straight when hard run took effect. (See Racing Incidents.)
Slightly slow out, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.

Began awkwardly, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, wider turning in, finished off very strongly to score.
Began smartly, raced 2 wide in midfield early, 3 wide after passing 1100M, commenced move 500M, closed off well to take 2nd.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced behind midfield on the inside, 2 wide on turn, taken wide in straight and made good progress to take a place.
Jumped well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, kept on well in straight without threatening.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide in midfield, wider turning in, made minor progress in straight.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide in midfield, moved closer after passing 1200M, no cover on turn, kept on evenly in straight.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced 2 wide towards rear, 3 wide in the middle stages, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home without threatening.

Away with them, raced 3w better than midfield early, moved closer after passing 1200M, 2w in the middle stages, challenged the leader turning in, took the lead 400M, kept on well to 100M, headed and weakened thereafter.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide at rear, 5 to 6 lengths back turning in, made some headway in straight.
Slightly slow out, raced behind midfield on the inside, slightly inconvenienced near 500M, 4 lengths back turning in, showed limited response in straight.
Jumped well, sent forward to race prominently, allowed rival to cross near 1250M, sat right behind the leader in the middle stages, one-paced in the run home.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Raced at rear throughout, never a factor. (Lame right front leg next day morning.)
Moderately away, sent forward to take the lead, challenged turning in, headed and weakened early in straight, eased final 250M.
Eased back, 3-4 wide, made steady ground 350M to score.
Midfield, 2 wide, on heels 900M, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Hard ridden early, trapped 4 wide in front of midfield, ran on well for 3rd.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, hung on well until 100M overhauled.
Eased to sit in midfield, trapped 3 wide, made ground 350M, run ended 100M.
Pushed to obtain box seat, ran on we until 150M weakened. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
At back, 3-4 wide, ran on ok in straight.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, ran on fairly.
Hard ridden early failed to muster to cross in front towards the rail, trapped 3 wide, weakened 250M. Noted to be lame right fore on the day after racing.
Hard ridden forward to sit outside the leader, out of fuel 250M.
Behind midfield, 2 wide, on heels 900M, no progress.
Pressed forward, 2 wide, emptied 350M. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Eased back, never a factor.
Never competitive. Substantial mucus in trachea noted on post-race scoping.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, battled on to the line and scored by a short head.
Raced in behind the lead, 2 wide, finished off very well to take 2nd.
At rear, along the rail, made ground steadily to the line.
Began awkwardly, worse than midfield, along the rail, raced tight near 200M and ran on only fairly to the line.
Raced in behind the lead, along the rail, kept on until 100M and only one paced thereafter.
Sent forward and took lead, lost ground after passing 300M. (See Incident Report)
At rear, 2 wide, nothing in the Straight. (See Incident Report)

Shared early lead when racing away from rail before being headed near the 1100m & racing second without cover. Assumed lead on straightening, under 1L in front at the 150m & dug deep late to hold similar advantage on line.
Had nice run 1,1 for the majority. Shifted over heels entering last section when just over a length from the lead, closed to be within 0.75L at the 150m mark & held that margin to line.

Mustered speed after not being fast away & improved along rail to midfield. Had no clear run early in straight when only 2L from lead before dashing through between runners in final furlong to steal third in dying stages.
Raced three deep with cover in midfield throughout. Cornered just over 2L from the lead before finishing off steadily down the outside to be just nosed out for third. Only beaten 1.5L.

Had no early speed before improving slightly to be worse than midfield on the rail in middle stages. Shifted away from the inside near 350m before closing off well between runners in concluding stages, only 1.5L behind.

Shared early lead before being headed near 1100m, crossed & raced on leaders back from 900m. Continued along rail on straightening, moved to second near 350m, battled well before tiring slightly late. Close behind.
Raced in midfield between runners throughout early & middle stages. Entered last section 3L from the lead before finishing off steadily to midfield when beaten under 2L in bunched finish.
Drifted back after the start to race just worse than midfield between runners. Cornered rearward, entered last section 4L from the lead before finishing steadily to midfield without threatening.

Shifted across behind runners after the start & settled in the final trio when racing between runners. Continued at the rear on cornering, entered last section 5L from lead before passing a few tiring rivals to midfield late.

Had no early speed & drifted back to race worse than midfield, 3 wide with cover throughout. Entered last section just over 4L from the lead before effectively holding position & margin in the dash to line. No threat.

Crowded at start before mustering speed to improve to the lead when racing wide near the 1100m. Continued in lead before crossing to the rail near the 900m. Headed on straightening before weakening in final 250m.
Began awkwardly before being shifted across behind runners to race second last on rail. Continued near the back on cornering before failing to make any headway in the dash to the line.

Raced wide in midfield before being left without cover from the 900m. Improved closer to the lead approaching the corner when continuing wide before emptying out at the 350m mark & weakened out thereafter. (See report).

Steadied after the start & was eventually relegated to last approaching the 1000m mark. Continued at the rear on straightening, was 5.5L from the lead entering last section before weakening very poorly to be long last.
Taken back from gate 10, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 6 lengths back turning in, finished off very strongly to score.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, carried wider after passing 550M, finished off well to take 2nd.
Bumped start, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, 3 wide turning in, closed off well to take a place without threatening.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide at rear, 6 lengths or so back, very wide turning in, made good progress in straight to make frame, no threat to the first few.
Quickly into stride, sent forward to race prominently on the inside, took the lead 800M, led by 2 lengths turning in, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, weakened thereafter.
Jumped well, raced better than midfield on the outside, 2 lengths or so back, no cover throughout, showed some response early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Bumped start, positioned 4 lengths behind the leader on rail, 2 wide from 450M, no clear running early in straight, cleared 150M, made minor progress thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out 450M, finished off evenly.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Bumped start, raced behind midfield on the outside, 5 lengths or so back, very wide turning in, failed to close off in straight. (Bled.)
Shifted out at start, sent forward to take the lead on the outside, headed 800M, 2nd on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Began fairly, raced at rear on the inside, 6 to 7 lengths back, there to turn, made no progress in straight.
Shifted out at start and bumped, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, failed to close off in straight.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced at tail throughout, never a factor.
Urged forward, took rail and led, maintained run throughout, ran on nicely to score by 1/2L. (See Incident Report)
Crowded after start, shifted to rail, in worse than midfield, kept improving and fought on well to the line to take 2nd.
Rolled forward, took up racing in box-seat, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Taken back, at the tail and on rail throughout, shifted wide rounding Home Turn, ran on well on centre-track for dead-heat 4th.
Raced towards the rear, 2 wide throughout, saved ground, closed off well for dead-heat 4th.
Settled to race in midfield, 2 wide, improving then switched across heels at 150M, ran on okay.
Eased back, at rear, 3 wide but with cover from 800M turn, made ground and dashed on till 100M.
Slow away, recovered to be in midfield, along the rail, ran on but found no extra for final 100M. (See Incident Report)
Niggled along, midfield and wide early, improved and sat outside lead at 900M, in touch until 250M, very one paced.
Slotted in behind midfield, raced keenly from 1600M and shifted wide, improved thereafter, no cover from 900M, found no extra in last 150M.
In midfield, trapped wide but had cover, showed limited dashes in straight only. (See Incident Report)
Sat outside and about 2L off lead initially, shuffled back at 800M, faded in the straight.
In about midfield, 2 wide initially, shifted 3 wide along back straight, had cover until taken wider at 700M, found nothing. (Roarer)
Bumped start, in one-out one-back until slotted back at 800M, not competitive in the straight. (See Incident Report)
Settled in rear of midfield, 3-wide rounding home bend, soon came to challenge after straightening, ran on well to assert authority 100 metres out.
Ridden early, shared pace on the rail most of the way, hit the front briefly passing the 200 metres but unable to sustain effort and headed 100 metres out.
Pressed forward from a wide gate, shared pace 2-wide most of the way, unable to sustain effort under pressure inside final 100 metres.
Settled not far off the pace, chased the leading trio into straight, came to challenge under pressure after straightening, fought on steadily without threatening.
Moderate start, ridden along to join the leaders 3-wide rounding home bend, dropped one back into straight and faded steadily under pressure.
Tighten at start, soon dropped to last few despite niggling along, trailed the field rounding home bend and into straight, obtained clear run 300 metres out, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Reared at start losing ground, settled in rear on the rail to straight, baulked for a run after straightening, produced good late impression inside final 150 metres.
Taken back from the widest gate, travelled well behind and 3-wide rounding home bend, fought on steadily for a reasonable debut.
Not far off 3-wide, lost position into straight, kept on at the one pace.
Began prominently from a wide gate, travelled wide without cover most of the way to straight, faded steadily.
Settled in midfield on the rail within 3L of pace, lost position in a tight run on top of home bend, faded steadily after straightening.
Crowded at start, travelled in midfield, racing keenly when checked and lost position passing the 900 metres, just worse than midfield into straight, found nothing under pressure.
Quickly recovered from moderate start to forward of midfield in 7th within 3L of pace, saved ground turning for home, soon weakened after straightening.
Driven early to be tracking leaders on inside, responded well to lead mid-straight, kept on final 100M to hold pursuers at bay.
Began fairly, recovered to race in midfield, wide into straight, closed off well down outside to take 2nd passing 100M, nearest finish.
From wide draw taken across behind runners, reserved near last, not clear run and hampered 300M, switched and closed well over final 200M, just missed 2nd.
Settled ahead of midfield, saved ground on the inside, lay out when placed under pressure from 400M, chased on steadily to line.
Stumbled badly at start, settled behind midfield, ran on mildly over final 300M, held by leaders.
From draw 12 shifted across to race along the fence, 7Ls off the pace middle stages, made steady progress on straightening, not beaten far.
Settled in midfield, never far off leaders, came under pressure 500M, found less than expected in the finish. Never likely.
Soon led, pressed by rival from 900M, headed mid-straight, no extra 100M, swamped by rivals.
Taken across behind runners, reserved in clear last 9Ls off the pace, hampered 300M before staying on moderately to line.
Failed to muster speed, settled ahead of midfield further back than intended, 3-wide no cover from middle stages, ran on mildly early straight, no extra 100M. (Mucus / Lacerations to RH heel bulb.)
From draw 1 obtained a spot in midfield, ran on same pace when driven 400M, no threat to leaders.
Caught wide no cover on settling, made forward move to join leader at 900M, lay out making the home turn, no extra passing 300M.
Travelled 3-wide behind mid-division, widest into straight, ran on fairly final 300M.
Began well, further forward than anticipated, chased leaders into straight, steadied 300M and soon weakened after, eased when no chance.
Moderately away, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, 2 wide after passing 450M, finished off very strongly to score.
Began awkwardly, raced at rear on the inside, 7 to 8 lengths back on turn, 2 wide from 500M, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, similar position on turn, closed off well to take a place.
Bumped start and unbalanced, positioned 2 wide, 2-1/2L back, there to turn, showed good response in straight, hit the front near 75M, headed 50M, no extra close home.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, 5 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, made good progress in straight.
Crowded on jumping, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, showed good response in straight, not enough room final 100M.
Made contact at start, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, kept on evenly in straight.
Began well from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked 150M, headed and weakened final 75M.
Inconvenienced at start, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Bumped start, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, a length back on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.) (Lame right front leg.)
Moderately away, raced at tail, still well back on turn, passed some tired runners in straight.
Began awkwardly, raced behind midfield on the outside, 7 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide at rear, 8 lengths back, there to turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Taken back from gate 11, raced 2 wide, 7 lengths back, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Away with them, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, 4 lengths back on turn, angled out 450M, finished off very strongly to score, impressive debut.
Away well, raced behind midfield on the inside, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, angled out early in straight, finished off strongly to take 2nd.
Moderately away, raced in 3rd, 1-1/2L behind the leader, 2 wide on turn, kept on well in straight to take a place.
Out in line, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide on turn, challenged the leader turning in, hit the front early in straight, kept on well but unable to hold off the first few late.
Average to begin, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, challenged turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, ran on evenly thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Clean jump, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Lifted front feet on jumping and away tardily, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 lengths or so back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, easy run to turn, kept on evenly in straight.
Taken back from gate 12, raced 2 wide at rear, 7 lengths back turning in, made some progress in straight.
Shifted in at start, raced in midfield on the outside, 4 lengths back, same margin back turning in, one-paced in straight.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, 7 lengths back on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail early, 9 lengths back, a bit closer on turn, finished off one-paced.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, 3 lengths or so back, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
