Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Bumped start, raced prominently but very wide early, took the lead 650M, found rail 550M, led by 2 lengths on turn, kept on strongly in straight and scored.
Bumped shortly after start, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, finished off well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.

Shifted out at start, raced prominently on the inside early, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader in the middle stages, showed good response early in straight, peaked on run 150M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Slightly inconvenienced shortly after start, positioned on rail behind midfield, saved ground on turn, kept on well in straight to make frame without threatening.
Lifted front feet on jumping and away tardily, raced at rear on the inside, commenced move 400M, very wide turning in, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Crowded start, raced 2 wide at rear, very wide turning in, made some progress in straight.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position to turn, one-paced in straight. (A small cut to the left front coronet.)
Slightly inconvenienced shortly after start, raced prominently early, 2 lengths or so back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, there to turn, very wide into straight, showed some response early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Jumped well from gate 10, raced 3 wide better than midfield, no cover throughout, 3 lengths back turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Bumped start, raced at tail, still 9 lengths back on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Bumped start, raced in midfield on the outside, very wide turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened approaching final furlong.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, drifted away 300M to score.
Slow away, at back along the fence, dashed well 200M for 2nd.
Hard ridden forward, for the majority of the race travelled wide and without cover, ran on for 3rd.
Slow away, at rear, 2 wide, dashed well 200M.
Hard ridden early, in front of midfield, 2 wide, held ground in straight.
Hard ridden forward, sat outside the leader, out of fuel 150M. After the race was reported to have lost its left front plate and sustained a small cut to the left front coronet.
Hard ridden early, trapped 3 wide in midfield, no progress. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Slow away, at rear on the rails, no dash.
Hard ridden forward, box seat, weakened 200M.
At rear, on the fence, lack room 300M, little dash 100M.
Slow away, at back, trapped 3 wide, raced greenly, no progress.
Hard ridden forward, emptied 350M. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Taken back, 2 wide, made ground and closed off strongly to the line and scored by 1-1/4L.
Crowded start and raced in midfield, 2 wide, closed off well to the line.
Sent forward and raced next to the leader, 2 wide, continued on well but headed in the last 50M.
Began awkwardly and settled in one-out one-back, ran on well to the line for 4th.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, made some ground only in the Straight.
Raced in behind midfield, wide no cover initially and 2 wide after 600M, made minor ground only.
At rear, along the rail, only one paced.
Settled in behind the lead, along the rail, shifted out at 250M causing rider to stop riding, only one paced thereafter.
Sent forward and took lead, flattened in the last 100M.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, did not feature in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, no progress.
At rear, wide no cover initially, 2 wide after 600M, never a factor.
Had lovely run on leaders back. Moved over heels on straightening, dashed to lead near 200m mark before racing clear to win by 2L.

Raced 1,1 momentarily near the 1200m mark before shuffled back to midfield away from the rail in middle stages. Cornered around 3.5L from the lead before making steady late ground to move to second in concluding stages.
Showed speed at the start to lead. Held length advantage on straightening, joined by winner near 200m mark, just caught for third on line, just over 2L behind.

Enjoyed soft run in midfield on the rail throughout. Was hard ridden prior to cornering, shifted away from inside after straightening before finishing only fairly to hold 4th but over 4L behind on line.

Shifted behind runners after the start & raced near the rear throughout. Moved wider & attempted to improved passing the 500m, was very wide on straightening before passing a few tiring rivals when running onto midfield.

Raced wide & without cover in midfield in early stages before improving position around the field to race outside the leader from 900m. Began yielding ground prior to straightening before finishing well beaten in midfield.

Ridden forward after the start, raced 3 wide leaving straight first time before getting nice position 1,1 from the 900m. Hard ridden from the 450m mark before finishing only one paced to well beaten midfield position.

Raced in midfield between runners in first half before drifting further back after half-way. Cornered in second half about 5.5L from the lead before only really holding place, 6.5L behind on line & may not have seen out trip.

Shifted across behind runners from outside gate & settled near the rear throughout. Forced very wide approaching corner when continuing last before making no noteworthy headway in straight. Well beaten.

Drifted back after the start & settled worse than midfield between runners. Continued third last along inside approaching corner, had clear running but failed to make any headway in straight. (Must trial, see report).

Raced three wide with cover when worse than midfield before being left wide & without cover from the 900m. Continued on second half, about 5.5L behind approaching corner before weakening poorly & beaten over 10L (See report).

Crowded for room at start, shifted down to the rail soon after before making some ground along the inside to race just worse than midfield. Hard ridden entering last section when 5L from lead before weakening poorly to last.
Bumped start and unbalanced, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, easy run to turn, kept to inside after straightening and finished off strongly to score.
Jumped well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, angled out 400M, finished off strongly, just narrowly beaten.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 2 wide at rear, commenced move after passing 400M, very wide turning in, finished off very strongly to take a place.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some headway in straight.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, angled out after passing 400M, very wide into straight, finished off evenly.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 5 lengths back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Bumped start, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, kept to inside after straightening and finished off evenly.
Began smartly from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, headed near 700M, 1/2L back on turn, retook the lead early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Commenced well, raced prominently, 2 wide, took the lead near 700M, led by 1/2L on turn, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Bumped shortly after start, raced towards rear on the outside, 7 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made no progress in the run home.
Average to begin, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover on turn, peaked near 400M, weakened early in straight.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight. (See Racing Incidents.) (Lame right front leg next day morning.)
Bumped start, taken back, at tail and on rail throughout, continued on strongly and caught 2nd placegetter in the final strides, won by 3/4L.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, closed off nicely but effort couldn't match the winner. (Rein dropped at 50M)
Settled to race in midfield, 2 wide, peeled out to improve at 450M, showed good kick early, even out for final 100M.
Hampered shortly after start, at rear 2 wide, swung widest, saved ground and closed off fairly.
Bumped start, travelled in midfield, along the rail, switched across heels at 300M, ran on evenly.
Rolled forward, raced in the box-seat, raced tight at 300M, continued one paced.
Jumped only fairly, recovered to lead on rail, emptied and headed passing 250M. (Must trial, see Incident Report)
Raced towards the rear as usual, along the rail, no extra gear for final 150M, faded out.
Raced in one-out one-back, taken back at 500M for some distance, showed nothing in straight.
Asked after start, 3 wide in midfield throughout, had cover from 1000M, not competitive.
Ridden along, sat 3 wide outside lead by 900M, no cover, faded on straightening.
Missed start, trapped wide early, improved to sit outside lead, gave ground from 500M out, finished tailed out. (Must trials)
Shared early pace 2-wide, settled one back with rails run inside the 800 metres, commenced move over 400 metres out and led into straight, stuck on well.
Broke well from the one draw, held rails run in 3rd within 2L of pace, angled out for a run on straightening, fought on steadily under pressure but never threatening.

Ridden forward from a wide gate to be prominent and wide, settled over 2L back in 4th, 3L back when come under pressure to challenge 500 metres out, fought on steadily in straight without threatening.
Soon dropped to last few despite niggling along, saved ground on the inside turning in, ran on well to narrowly miss place.
Soon dropped to wide in midfield despite ridden along, dropped further back towards the rear into back straight, commenced move from 6L 8th rounding home bend, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Settled some 3L back in 5th, in similar position entering home straight, fought on steadily to narrowly miss the placegetters.
Soon dropped to last few, remained well behind into home straight, made significant progress down the centre of the track.

Ridden positively from the widest gate, hit the front out wide rounding the 1000-metre bend, obtained rails run at the 800 metres, headed by winner on straightening, weakened inside final 100 metres. (Lame next day)
Crowded after moderate start, trailed the field to straight, ran on well to be nearest at finish.
Prominent early dropping to 6th over 4L back in midfield into back straight, ran home one-paced.
Began moderately, settled in rear of midfield in 7th on the rail, saved ground turning for home, made no impression thereafter.
Settled down behind midfield, held up for clear running top of straight, close off strongly final 200M, led close home.
Chased leaders, well placed to strike turning home, ran on well to the line, not pace of winner final 100M.
Driven forward to race outside leader, ridden to lead 250M, kept on well, caught by first 2 final stages.
Reserved towards the rear, swung wide into straight, hampered 300M when commencing his run, closed off mildly for non-threatening 4th.
Began awkwardly, taken keen hold in midfield, angled out 300M to challenge, ran on moderately to the line, no danger to first 3.
From outside draw taken back to last, proved difficult to settle 700M, still last turning for home, held up early straight, closed off well final 200M when clear.
Jumped fairly form draw 1, settled in rear, made limited progress on straightening, no threat to leaders.
Caught 4-wide no cover from draw 11, close up behind the leaders home turn, not quickened under pressure.
Chased leaders in a 3-wide position without cover, driven along 450M but failed to pick up, kept on one paced to the line.
Soon led, came under pressure 400M, soon headed on straightening, faded towards the line.
Jumped well, chased leaders on inside, couldn't go on passing 300M, no extra and weakened mid-straight.

Began only fairly, in midfield, proved difficult to settle from 1000M, lay out home turn and widest into straight, soon beaten and eased. (Jockey : failure to relax being principal reason for the disappointing run.)
Began well from gate 1, positioned 1-1/2L behind the leader on rail, easy run to turn, finished off well to score by a head.
Commenced well, sent forward to take the lead, led by 1/2L on turn, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the winner late, just beaten by a head.
Average to begin, positioned 2 wide, 4 lengths or so back, moved a bit closer on turn, finished off well to take a place.
Taken back from gate 10, raced at rear on the inside, commenced move after passing 550M, very wide into straight, made very good progress in straight, just beaten by a neck.
Jumped well, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, kept on well early in straight, no clear run final 100M.
Began only fairly, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some headway in straight.
Shifted in at start, positioned 2 wide, a length or so back, angled out after passing 700M, very wide turning in, finished off evenly.
Jumped with them, raced better than midfield on the outside, 4 wide on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, carried wider after passing 550M, failed to close off in straight.
Began awkwardly, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, 2 wide on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 150M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Fast into stride, raced prominently, 2 wide, pressed leader from 600M, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter, eased final 100M.
Bumped start, raced at tail, 7 lengths or so back, detached from the main group after passing 500M, emptied early in straight.

Began smartly, raced 2 wide, 2 lengths back, moved closer on turn, challenged the leader early in straight, hit the front 250M, kept on very well to the line.
Taken back from gate 10, raced at rear, 7 lengths back, moved closer on turn, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Moderately away, raced 3 wide slightly behind midfield, moved a bit closer on turn, finished off well to take a place, always held.
Made contact at start, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross 850M, sat right behind the leader on turn, kept on evenly in straight.
Clean jump, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Average to begin, raced in midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made minor progress in straight.

Made contact at start, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, travelled keenly in the middle stages, 2 lengths back turning in, showed some response early in straight, no extra final 150M. (Roarer.) (Blood in trachea.)
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 8 lengths back, closer on turn, wide into straight, made little progress in the run home.
Jumped with them, sent forward to race prominently, took the lead 950M, found rail near 850M, travelled well on turn, challenged early in straight, peaked and headed 250M, weakened final furlong.
Began well, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Slowly away, raced at rear throughout, never a threat.
Away with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, difficult to settle in the middle stages, checked near 500M, 5 to 6 lengths back turning in, failed to make any progress in straight.
Shared the lead easily, drifted away 300M to score.
Pushed to share the lead, ran on well for 2nd.
On arrival at the Start the tongue tie applied to the horse was replaced. Behind midfield, progressed steadily 250M.
Awkward away, hard ridden to obtain a prominent spot, just held ground.
Midfield, made minor ground 200M.
Pushed early, in front of midfield, lack room in majority of final 1.5 furlong, not properly tested.
At back, lack room 4-2, made steady ground when clear.
Hard ridden forward, weakened 150M. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
On heels early, at back, held up in majority of final 1.5 furlong, not properly tested.
Slow away, midfield, lack turn of foot.
Midfield, never improved.
Never competitive.
Never better than midfield.
Never a factor. Was found to have bled from both nostrils and to be lame in its left hind leg after racing.
Sent forward to share lead, on stand-side, battled on to the line in final two strides.
Raced prominently, on stand-side, kept on nicely to the line.
Began awkwardly and raced in midfield initially, behind the lead after 250M, on stand-side, saved some ground and closed off fairly.
At rear, on stand-side, made ground and closed off strongly in the last 100M.
Raced in midfield, on centre-track, only one paced to the line.
In midfield, on centre-track, pretty one paced.
At rear, on centre-track, flattened passing 75M.
Raced in behind midfield, on stand-side, lost ground after passing 100M.
Raced in midfield initially, on stand-side, did not improve and wakened after passing 250M

Steadied from widest gate, shifted to rear before improving along rail to race worse than midfield in middle stages. Straightened 4L behind before taking advantage of rails run & finishing strongly to strike lead final 50m.

Bumped after start before shifting down to the rail & improving along inside to midfield. Shifted off the rail near 500m, entered last section just under 4L behind before closing strongly last furlong to steal second on line.
Ridden along after start to be forward before obtaining nice position 1,1 throughout. Hard ridden prior to cornering before finishing well in dash to the line to be narrowly beaten for second.
Bumped at start but improved quickly to stride to lead approaching the winning post first time. Raced over 2L clear in front passing the furlong marker before being over-run in concluding stages.

Bumped at start before being steadied & shifting back to race worse than midfield away from rail. Shifted wider approaching corner when around 5L behind before making steady late ground down the outside to be beaten only 2L.
Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Eased wider on cornering when around 4.5L from the lead before finishing off only steadily to midfield in the dash to line.

Bumped at the start before being steadied & shifting back to be rearward throughout. Last of the main bunch on cornering when 6.5L from lead before finishing off steadily between runners when running on to midfield finish.

Raced three wide with cover in midfield throughout. Came under hard ridding passing 600m mark, wider on cornering when over 3L behind, continued a similar margin from lead before peaking at 200m & weakening late.

Steadied & taken back to race worse than midfield. Moved into 3 wide line with cover near the 1200m & improved to midfield in middle stages. Forced very wide & lost position on cornering before making no headway in straight.
Had no early speed & consequently raced near the tail throughout. Hard ridden on cornering when about 6L form the lead before failing to make any headway in straight. Well beaten.
Ridden forward before getting lovely position on leaders back throughout. Came under hard riding on cornering before weakening out poorly in the straight to be beaten 7L.

Ridden forward after the start but was caught 3 deep without cover just behind leading pair throughout. Moved to second place prior to straightening before emptying out approaching 200m & weakening sharply in late stages.

Didn't begin fast but mustered speed under hard riding to race outside leader. Came under hard riding at 600m, began to yield ground prior to straightening before weakening out badly to be distant second last. (Must trial).
Slow to begin, raced rearward before becoming detached near the 700m & finishing a distant last. (Unacceptable performance  must trial).
Clean jump, raced prominently on the outside, difficult to settle after passing 1000M, challenged the leader turning in, hit the front 300M, kept on very well to the line and scored.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, inconvenienced near 1050M, 3 wide on turn, made good progress in straight to take 2nd.
Shifted out at start, positioned 1 out 1 back, there to turn, kept on well in straight to take a place without threatening.
Commenced well, raced 3 wide better than midfield, no cover throughout, challenged the leader turning in, kept on very well early in straight, peaked on run 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Jumped well from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, kept on well early in straight, no extra final 100M.

Began awkwardly, raced behind midfield on the inside, angled out after passing 800M, 2 to 3 wide turning in, no clear running early in straight, cleared approaching 200M, made minor progress thereafter.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed some response in straight, no clear run near 100M, made little progress thereafter.
Bumped start, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Began awkwardly, sent forward to take the lead, found rail after passing 950M, challenged turning in, peaked and headed 300M, weakened final furlong.

Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, travelled keenly for some distance after passing 1000M, 3 wide on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final 250M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Moderately away, raced towards rear on the outside, 4 lengths back on turn, made no progress in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, one-paced in the run home.
Average to begin, unable to slot in, trapped very wide in midfield, moved closer on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Inconvenienced at start, raced 3 wide with cover slightly behind midfield, moved closer on turn, weakened early in straight.
Eased back, at rear and on rail, peeled out from 600M, directed out and contacted runner at 350M, closed off impressively to win by a neck.
Niggled along, showed speed to take up box-seat, ran on nicely to the line for 2nd.
Bumped start, raced in midfield, 2 wide, continued on well to take 3rd.
Eased and raced in behind midfield, wide and no cover, badly bumped at 350M, recovered well for a strong finishing effort.
Race in worse than midfield, along the rail, made nice inroad along the inside rail in the straight.
Took back, at rear, 3 wide but with cover, ran widest on turn, ran fairly in the straight.
Found cover in worse than midfield, 3 wide, ran on okay late. (See Incident Report)
Awkward start and lost ground, recovered in midfield along the rail, ran on without threatening.
Urged along, settling 1L off and outside the lead, showed no kick.
Travelled in behind midfield, 2 wide, saved no ground in the straight.
Awkward start, then was ridden to take lead on rail, headed passing 250M, faded thereafter.
Slightly slow to jump, at rear 2 wide, showed slight dashes early only. (See Incident Report)
Settled just in front of midfield, 2 wide, emptied passing 250M. (See Incident Report)
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, limited response, gave ground approaching 200M.
Soon took up running setting a sound pace, hung on well to defy runner-up's strong late challenge in closing stages.
Broke well from a wide gate, settled 2-wide just outside race leader, came to challenge under pressure inside final 250 metres but unable to peg back the winner throughout.
Tracked the leaders in 3rd to straight, unable to quicken to threaten but kept on steadily to the line.
Bumped at start, taken back from a wide gate for rails run in rear of midfield, angled for a run upon straightening, fought on steadily to the line.
Settled just over 2L back in 4th, came under pressure over 300 metres out, faded gradually inside final 100 metres.
Moderate start, settled just over 3L off the pace in 6th, fought on steadily under pressure without threatening.
Dropped gradually to rear of midfield, in similar position turning for home, kept on steadily without threatening.
Began well, settled not far off the pace on the rail, raced awkwardly rounding home bend, switched out for a run over 300 metres out but one-paced.
Taken back from a wide gate, remained in last few to straight, fought on well without threatening.
Taken back from the widest gate, trailed the field from the 800 metres, fought on well in straight.
Very slowly away losing considerable ground, recovered steadily to join the rear of the field 800 metres out, saved ground turning in, kept on at the same pace.
Quickly recovered from moderate start travelling wide without cover in midfield, niggled at to maintain position coming onto home bend, soon weakened in straight.
Bustled along after the start, tracked pace on outside from 900M, pressed leader strongly from 350M, got up close home.
Quickly into stride and led at steady pace, soon taken on by rivals on straightening, fought on well to the line and was only headed late stages.
From draw 10 caught wide no cover chasing leaders, laid down a strong challenge from 350M, every chance, outbattled 150M.
From widest draw taken across behind runners, reserved in the rear 5-6Ls off the pace, took time to muster on straightening, motored home final 200M, not clear run closing stages, just missed 3rd.
With leaders early, eased back to midfield spot on settling, ran on mildly final 300M but never a serious threat.
From draw 11 caught 4-wide no cover behind midfield, kept on steadily on straightening after tough trip, held by leaders final 150M.
Chased leaders on inside, outpaced passing 300M, soon out of contention.
Held up 3-wide towards the rear, swung wide home, stayed on fairly, not reached leaders.
Raced keenly behind midfield about 4Ls off the pace, ran on same pace final 400M, never a factor.
Started slowly, settled at the rear along the inside, responded fairly on straightening, ran past a couple of beaten horses late.
Held up behind mid-division on inside, couldn't go on turning for home, made no impression on this comeback run after injury-enforced absence.
Never far off leaders, 5th at 400M, couldn't sustain run passing 300M, weakened to last.

Commenced well, raced prominently on the inside early, allowed rival to cross near 1000M, sat right behind the leader on turn, no daylight early in straight, cleared 300M, finished off very strongly, led close home.
Jumped well from gate 12, unable to slot in, trapped very wide, a length or so back, moved closer on turn, hit the front 350M, kept on very well but unable to hold off the winner close home.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced in midfield on the outside, moved a bit closer on turn, showed some response early in straight, peaked on run 200M, ran on evenly to the line.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide behind midfield, similar position on turn, made some headway in straight.
Slowly away, showed no early speed, raced at tail, 8 lengths back, moved a bit closer on turn but still the last into straight, made good progress in the run home.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, kept on evenly in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced towards rear on the outside, very wide turning in, made some progress in straight.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, a bit closer on turn, finished off evenly.
Out in line, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from gate 13, raced 2 wide towards rear, similar position on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Away with them, positioned 1 out 1 back, there to turn, showed some response early in straight, peaked on run near 200M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, found rail near 1000M, challenged turning in, headed early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Moderately away, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, kept to inside after straightening and finished off evenly. (Lame left front leg next day morning.)
Bumped start, raced prominently on the outside, challenged the leader turning in, weakened early in straight, eased final 250M. (Blood in trachea.)
Made contact at start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well on turn, kept on strongly in straight and scored.
Jumped well, sat right behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, finished off well to take 2nd, always held.
Jumped with them, positioned on rail in midfield, difficult to settle after passing 1000M, 2 wide from 900M, 3 lengths or so back on turn, closed off well to take a place.
Average to begin, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, moved closer in the middle stages, hard ridden after passing 300M, only showed limited response, ran on evenly to the line.
Away with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, carried wider after passing 900M, no cover on turn, finished off evenly.
Out in line, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, 3 wide from 700M, 4 lengths back turning in, made minor progress in straight.
Slowly away, raced at rear on the inside, wider turning in, made minor progress in straight.
Began well, positioned 2 wide slightly better than midfield, moved a bit closer on turn, angled out 450M, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, one-paced in the run home.
Began awkwardly, raced towards rear on the inside, 2 wide from 700M, wider turning in, one-paced in the run home.
Slightly slow out, positioned on rail behind midfield, saved ground on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 3 wide from 700M, very wide turning in, made no progress in straight.
Made contact at start, taken back to race at rear, 10 lengths back, still 7 lengths back turning in, failed to make any progress in straight.
Average to begin, raced at rear on outer, 4 wide no cover on turn, weakened early in straight when hard run took effect. (See Racing Incidents.)

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Taken back from gate 12, raced 2 wide behind midfield early, sent forward after entering the back straight, took the lead 700M, led by 3Ls turning in, kicked clear early in straight, soon in command, eased final 100M.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 wide from 500M, 4 lengths back turning in, finished off strongly to take 2nd without threatening the winner.
Jumped with them, positioned on rail in midfield, lost position on turn, made some progress in straight to take a place. (Lame right front leg next day morning.)
Began well, raced prominently, 2 wide, dropped to 3rd on turn, 4 lengths back turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Average to begin, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, dropped to midfield after passing 700M, 4 lengths back on turn, showed some response early in straight, no extra final 150M.
Out in line, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 150M.
Began fairly, showed no early speed, raced at rear, 7 to 8 lengths back on turn, passed some tired runners in straight.
Average to begin, raced towards rear on the inside, 3 wide after entering the back straight, 6 lengths back on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, dropped towards rear on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Jumped with them, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, lost position on turn, weakened early in straight.
Jumped well from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, headed near 700M, 3 lengths back on turn, weakened early in straight.
Began fairly, raced 2 wide at rear, 9 lengths or so back, sent forward after entering the back straight, peaked near 650M, lost position on turn, weakened early in straight.
Hard ridden forward, drifted away 200M to score.
Behind midfield, 2-3 wide, unleashed strong finishing efforts 200M.
Behind midfield, along the fence, dashed well 200M for 3rd.
Pressed forward, sat 2 wide, dashed well 200M.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, passing the 1100M was bumped, approaching the 1000M was crowded for room, dashed well 200M.
Hard ridden to secure box seat, no progress. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Hard ridden forward to take rail and lead, out of fuel 150M.

At rear. 2-3 wide, passing the 1100M got its head on the side, shifted in and bumped another runner, near the 1050M despite being ridden along lost ground when reluctant to maintain its position between runners, ran on fairly.
Eased to rear, 2 wide, dashed well 100M.
Eased to sit in midfield with cover 2 wide, weakened 200M.
Midfield, on the fence, emptied 200M.
Raced greenly throughout, never competitive. Substantial mucus in trachea noted on post-race scoping.
Raced in midfield after 800M, 3 wide but with cover, swung wide on Straightening, made ground impressively and scored by 1-1/4L.
Rolled forward and shared the lead, 2 wide, stayed on but headed in the last 50M.
Raced in behind the lead after 850M, along the rail, stayed on for 3rd.
Settled to race in midfield, 2 wide, made some ground in the last 50M.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, closed off fairly to the line.
At rear, 2 wide after 600M, swung widest on Straightening, only made some ground in the Straight.
Settled in one-out one-back, pretty one paced.
Sent forward and shared the lead, along the rail, lost ground passing the 150M.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, badly unbalanced passing 450M, was one paced thereafter.
At rear, along the rail, did not feature.
At rear, along the rail, made no threats.
Raced in midfield, wide no cover, lost ground after passing 150M.

Began fast & assumed lead. Held narrow lead soon after straightening, engaged in two horse battle with runner-up all the way to the wire before holding SHD advantage on line. First two clear of third.
Showed good speed after start to race outside leader. Shared lead soon after cornering, engaged in two horse battle all the way to line but came up a short head behind. First two clear of third.

Bumped at start before shifting across & getting good position in midfield away from rail. Eased 3 wide approaching corner when 4L from lead before finishing off well in late stages to move to third near 100m.

Bumped & unbalanced at start before steadying & shifting across to race just worse than midfield. Entered last section around 6L behind, shifted widest in straight before making some late headway down the outside.

Began awkwardly before failing to muster speed & steadying to race in midfield along rail. Entered last section about 5L behind, moved off the rail on cornering before shifting wider & making up a few lengths late.
Had nice run on leaders back throughout. Shifted wider on cornering when about 2L from the lead before weakening a length or so to midfield in final 100m.

Steadied after start & raced at the tail. Continued near the tail entering last section when 8L from the lead before passing a few rivals in the straight when running onto midfield in a race not run to suit back-markers.

Inconvenienced at start & then failed to muster speed & consequently raced near the rear. Continued rearward entering last section, nearly 7L behind before making up some ground in concluding stages. (Mucus/roared post-race).
Hampered after start before improving position to race 1,1 in middle stages. Ridden along approaching corner before weakening out poorly in final furlong to be beaten over 5L.

Held position in midfield along the rail throughout. Ridden along passing 500m before coming badly unbalanced & losing ground just prior to cornering. Stayed along inside after incident but played no part thereafter. Excuse.

Bumped & unbalanced at start before being steadied at first bend & sharing last place. Was left wide & without cover at the rear from the 800m when 8.5L behind. Cornered last before making no noteworthy headway in straight.
Bumped at start before being steadied & racing third last away from rail. Moved wider passing the 500m before weakening out in the straight to be long last.
Began smartly, positioned 2 wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, there to turn, finished off strongly to score.
Fast into stride, raced prominently, 2 wide, 1/2L back on turn, closed off well to take 2nd.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced 3 wide with no cover, 2 lengths or so back, there to turn, finished off well to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Commenced well, sent forward to take the lead, led by 1/2L on turn, showed limited response early in straight, peaked and headed approaching 100M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Away with them, raced in midfield on the outside, 3 lengths or so back on turn, finished off evenly.
Began well, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the inside, 6 lengths back on turn, finished off evenly.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide towards rear, 7 lengths back on turn, one-paced in the run home.
Taken back from gate 8, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Moderately away from gate 1, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Slowly away, showed no speed, detached from the main group, finished tailed out, unacceptable performance.

Placing: DNF
Comment: Jumped with them, went wrong near 900M, quickly pulled up. (See Racing Incidents.)
Sent forward to take rail and led, maintained posi-tion all the way to score by 3/4L.
Jumped only fairly, settled midfield along the rail, kept battling to the line to finish 2nd, 3/4L behind.
Bumped start and lost ground, at rear and 2 wide, made nice ground and hit the ling strongly.
Crowded start, raced in worse than midfield, along the rail, saved ground and ran on nicely.
Settled to race in front of midfield, 2 wide, made turn 3 wide, ran on fairly to the line.
Taken back, at rear and on rail, improved steadily in the straight.
Eased and at rear, allowed to improve but was wide all the way, one paced and emptied late.
Crowded start, raced in behind midfield, on rail until 800M, made turn 2 wide, made minor ground.
Raced in the box-seat, sat about 2L off, faded gradually in the straight.
In midfield, wide until 1200M, shifted back 3 wide at 800M, under pressure, failed to find any in the straight. (See Incident Report)
Urged forward, sat outside lead, under pressure from 700M, gave ground gradually thereafter.
In worse than midfield, 2 wide initially, shifted 3 wide near 800M with cover, not competitive.
Began fairly but soon took up running, obtained rails run making first turn holding narrow advantage to home straight, went clear under pressure inside final 100 metres.

Settled 3-wide in forward of midfield after beginning from a wide gate, improved to over 1L back in 3rd without cover turning into back straight, gained 2nd under pressure after home turn, found winner too good.
Began well, within 2L of pace rounding first bend, slightly further back in 4th travelling down back straight, saved ground on the inside turning in, ran home one-paced.
Failed to muster, settled wide without cover in rear of midfield, commenced move under pressure 4-wide rounding home bend, fought on steadily without threatening.

Settled well behind from a wide gate, travelled wide without cover down back straight, circled the field rounding home bend and the widest turning in, unable to quicken further to feature in the finish.
Soon dropped behind midfield despite ridden along, amongst the line of last 4 horses from the 700 metres, given reminders from the 400 metres and saved ground making home turn, ran home one-paced.
Settled in midfield, in similar position into home straight, kept on before finding no extra inside final 100 metres
Settled at the back, niggled at briefly 800 metres out, commenced move inside the 400 metres, unable to sustain upon straightening.
Travelled keenly in forward of midfield on the rail early stages, baulked for a run on top of home bend and again approaching final turn, faded under pressure inside final 150 metres.
Slightly slow out and slow to muster despite ridden along, towards the rear most of the way, wide entering home straight and faded.
Ridden positively from the widest gate, 4-wide prominently coming onto first turn, joined race leader turning into back straight, weakened under pressure inside final 250 metres. (Blood in trachea)
Showed early speed, gained rails run before steadying for box-seat position turning into back straight, came under pressure rounding home bend but dropped away quickly after straightening.
Hard driven forward, crossed to the lead 600M, kept on strongly on straightening, always in control.
Chased leaders, driven out inside 400M, tried hard but always comfortably held by winner.
Reserved in last, about 7Ls to make up at 400M, closed off strongly to take 3rd, nearest finish.
Sent forward tracking leader, battled on steadily passing 300M but not pace to challenge, no extra final stages.
Held up towards the rear, saved ground on inside, kept on mildly in the straight, never a serious threat.
Settled towards the rear of midfield, ran on fairly passing 300M, not reached first 3.
Dropped back to near the rear, brought wide into straight, stayed on without threat.
From draw 11 caught 3-wide chasing leaders, gave limited response turning home, no threat to leaders.
Never far off the pace, 5th at 400M, failed to close off when ridden out early straight. (Jockey : did not handle HV track at its first time of asking. / Blood in trachea)
Settled in mid-division, ran home same pace over final 300M. Never involved.
Soon pushed along on jumping from widest draw, failed to muster speed and settled at the back 3-wide, couldn't go on turning into straight.
Fractious in stalls, began only fairly, ridden forward but caught wide no cover from 700M, failed to finish off. (Jockey : unable to lead comfortably as it had done in the past.)
Began smartly, raced prominently, 2 wide, shared lead on turn, kept on very well in straight to hold off the challengers.
Away well, sat right behind the leader, easy run to turn, finished off strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Began well from gate 1, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader, same margin back on turn, closed off well to take a place, just beaten by a neck.
Began awkwardly, positioned 4 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, made good progress early in straight, in restricted room near 200M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, 4 lengths or so back, there to turn, made some progress in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 3 wide behind midfield early, found a 2 wide spot near 750M, very wide into straight, made some progress in the run home.
Average to begin, raced prominently on the inside, shared lead on turn, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Shifted in at start and bumped, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, 2 to 3 lengths back, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Crowded start, raced at tail, 9 to 10 lengths back, still well back on turn, made some headway in straight.
Hampered start, raced towards rear on the inside, 7 lengths back, same margin back on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Bumped start, raced at rear on outer, 8 lengths back on turn, one-paced in the run home.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 7 lengths back on turn, failed to close off in straight.

Began awkwardly, soon recovered, took the lead 850M, ridden after passing 350M, kept on very well to the line.
Average to begin, positioned a length behind the leader on the stands' side, bumped near 500M, hard ridden approaching 300M, closed off well to take 2nd, always held.
Jumped with them, positioned 1-1/2L behind the leader on rail, hard ridden after passing 400M, showed limited response, no extra final 150M.
Jumped well, sent forward to race prominently, 2 away from the stands' rail, hard ridden after passing 400M but only showed limited response, peaked 200M, weakened gradually final 50M.
Made contact at start, positioned a length behind the leader, 3 away from the stand's rail, hard ridden 400M, showed limited response, weakened final furlong.
Jumped well, raced prominently on the stands' side, peaked on run 400M, weakened gradually final 300M.
Began fairly, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Made contact at start, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Midfield along the fence, progressed steadily 400M to score.
As the start was effected bounded in the air and lost ground, at back, near 800M was crowded for room and lost ground, near 350M rider momentarily dropped left rein, made good ground for 2nd.
Eased at start, 4-5 wide, progressed steadily 300M.
Took rail and lead easily, hung on well until 50M run ended.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 2 wide, just held ground.
Eased back, throughout the race, travelled wide and without cover, held ground in straight.
Box seat, ran on until 200M weakened.
Eased back, no progress, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Hard ridden forward, sat outside the leader, soon emptied 500m.
Eased back, never competitive.
Never a factor, after the race was reported to have displayed signs of heat stress.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, dropped off rapidly 600M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Raced in front of midfield, wide no cover, ran on and scored by 3/4L.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, closed off strongly in the last 150M.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, made ground significantly in the last 100M.
Sent forward, 2 wide, made some ground and ran on fairly for 4th.
Sent forward and took lead, 2 wide, passing 200M was directed out and only one paced thereafter.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, saved minor ground in the Straight.
Raced in behind midfield, wide no cover, pretty one paced.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, passing 200M was steadied and lost ground thereafter.
Raced in behind midfield, wide no cover, one paced only.
At rear, 2 wide, never a factor.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, did not feature.

Raced three deep but with cover in midfield throughout. Eased 4 wide approaching corner, entered last section just under 2L from lead, sprinted quickly to dash to lead at 225 before drawing away to win softly on line.

Began fast, led early before being headed passing 1000m & racing on leaders back. Continued on leaders back on cornering, shifted over heels entering last section, moved to second near 200m, fought well in late stages.

Raced on leaders back early before shuffled a pair further back from 900m. Awkward near heels when continuing along rail near 550m, held up on straightening before getting clear running near 350m & closing well to third.
Mustered speed quickly after the start to improve to lead after first 250m & crossed to rail soon after. Continued in lead until being joined & head by winner near 225m, over-run for placing late.

Shifted behind runners from widest gate to race at tail. Continued a clear last in middle stages, cornered over 6L from the lead before making up good late ground along the inside when running onto midfield from rear.

Shifted behind runners after start to race second last. Shifted to be the widest runner on cornering when still 6L from the lead before making steady late ground down the outside in late stages to midfield.
Obtained good position in midfield away from the rail throughout. Cornered only 2L from the lead, battled on until peaking on effort near the 250m & giving a few lengths in last furlong.

Improved to midfield after start before racing keenly in middle stages along rail. Improved close to heels near 500m before shifting out sharply & hampering rival on corner. Wasn't far behind 300m but weakened last furlong.

Began awkwardly & hampered before being steadied & racing third last. Continued rearward, 3 wide with cover in middle stages before being hampered on cornering when 4L behind. Made no headway in straight, well beaten.

Drifted back after the start to race midfield between runners. Was badly hampered by rival runner on cornering & consequently stumbled & lost ground. Entered last section around 5L behind but failed to run on after incident.
Pushed forward after the start but was left racing 3 wide without cover just forward of midfield. Was a beaten horse on straightening & weakened out to long second last.
Began well, raced second, about a length from the lead in middle stages. Was only a length behind on straightening but weakened out poorly in last 300m & was a long last.
Shifted in at start, raced 3 wide in midfield, 2 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, finished off strongly in straight to score, good debut.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide better than midfield, no cover on turn, hard ridden after turning in, hit the front 200M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner close home.
Jumped well, raced prominently but trapped wide, slightly taken back after passing 850M, 2 lengths or so back on turn, very wide into straight, finished off well to take a place without threatening.
Average to begin, sent forward to take the lead, found rail 700M, led by 3/4L on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed near 200M, no extra closing stages.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, made some progress early in straight, peaked 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Began well from the widest draw, raced prominently but trapped very wide early, 2 wide from 700M, 3/4L back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Bumped start, raced at tail, 6 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, passed some tired runners in straight.
Slightly slow out and crowded, raced towards rear on the outside, 4 to 5 lengths back turning in, failed to close off in straight.
Made contact at start, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross near 700M, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Taken back from gate 8, raced 2 wide towards rear, wider turning in, weakened early in straight.
Began only fairly and crowded, raced 4 lengths behind the leader on the inside, 2 wide turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Moderately away, positioned 2 wide behind the leader on rail, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight, eased final furlong. (Blood in trachea.)
Last to jump, sat towards the rear, on rail, no daylight till passing 300M, ran home nicely to win by 1/2L.
Eased and was close to the rear initially, on rail, improved and took up free ground at 800M, found extra at 200M, closed off nicely but wasn't enough.
Settled to race in one-out one-back position, kept ticking and continued on nicely to take 3rd.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, kept going and ran on well to the line.
Bumped start, took back and raced at the tail, on rail, saved ground and ran on fairly.
Travelled in just behind midfield, wide but with cover, improved steadily without threatening.
Niggled slightly, took rail and led with ease, emptied and headed approaching 200M.
Took back, raced at the rear, wide but with cover, no dash and didn't make ground in the straight.
Settled to race in box-seat, about 2L off, in touch till about 200M, found no extra thereafter.
Rolled forward, settled outside lead from 700M, run ended from 300M out.
Urged along then tried to find cover in midfield, however trapped wide, tightened at 300M, failed to run on. (See Incident Report)
Eased back, sat towards the rear, 2 wide, showed nothing, not competitive.
In midfield and 2 wide all the way, slightly crowded at 300M, showed nothing anyway.
Hampered at start, in worse than midfield, wide and no cover, lost ground from 600M and tailed out. (Must trial)
Jumped very awkwardly losing considerable ground, trailed the field into home straight, switched the widest turning in, finished off well down the centre of the track to snatch victory final strides.
Began well from a wide gate, shifted back steadily to wide in joint 6th in forward of midfield, hit the front briefly inside the 300 metres only to be caught close to home.

Broke well from the widest gate but soon taken back to rear for cover, commenced move when widest rounding home bend, ran on quite well under pressure down the centre of the straight, nearest at finish.

Close up early despite moderate start, some 3L back in 4th or 5th coming onto home bend when pace quickened, 2L back turning into home straight, fought on under pressure to narrowly miss the place-getters.
Gradually taken back to rear of midfield from a wide gate, remained without cover until home bend, switched out for a run after straightening, fought on quite well to be nearest at finish.

Shared pace early, shifted one back to 3rd 1100 metres out, 2L back in 3rd when inconvenienced 700 metres out on home bend, baulked for a run after straightening until the 250 metres, fought on along the rail to finish.

Prominent 3-wide early, hit the front briefly passing the 1000 metres before shifting one back coming onto home bend, disputed lead early in straight, unable to sustain effort inside final 200 metres.

Began well from a middle gate settling not far off the pace, became further back in 5th or 4th when pace quickened on home bend, re-gained closer-up position turning in, kept on until hampered 150 metres out, no further impression.
Travelled keenly on the rail with the leaders, moved 1L clear briefly coming onto home bend, led until finding no extra when headed shortly after straightening.
Ridden along to recover from moderate start, settled in joint 6th on the rail about 4 to 5L off the pace, did not find much room after straightening, fought on steadily to the line.
Settled in midfield, came under pressure after straightening, kept on before fading inside final 100 metres.
Bumped at start losing ground but quickly recovered to last few, remained similar most of the way, baulked for a run early in straight, ran home one-paced. (Lame)

Taken back from a wide gate, travelled keenly in rear of midfield before checked approaching home bend, shuffled backward on the rail but saved ground on the inside turning in, kept on before finding no extra inside final 100 metres.
Began well but soon taken back towards the rear 3-wide, clipped heels and stumbled over 900 metres out, not much room early in straight, found nothing.
Led from 1000M, lay out making home turn, responded well when driven and was always holding off the runner up final 150M.
Jumped fairly from draw 1, chased leaders, went 2nd 250M, tried hard to reel in winner final 200M but was always held.
Guided to the fence after the start, settled midfield, stayed on to claim 3rd near line, no threat to front pair.
Took early lead, tracked leader from home turn, fought on early straight, outpaced by first 2 final 200M, lost 3rd close home.
From wide draw taken back to last, stayed on over final 400M, not reached leaders.
Broke well, restrained to race ahead of midfield, kept on same pace when driven out in the straight, never able to challenge.
Sent forward from wide draw to be tracking leaders in 3rd, ran home same pace over final 400M.
Held up behind mid-division, driven wide into straight, stayed on fairly to the line, never dangerous.
Reserved in midfield, wide into straight, made some progress early straight but peaked on its run 200M from home.
Settled towards the rear, couldn't go on passing 300M. Never a threat.
Caught wide no cover chasing leaders, weakened passing 300M, eased. (Jockey : not able to finish off carrying top weight and having to race wide and cover.)
Dropped back to near the rear, came under pressure 500M, soon left behind.

Pushed forward from widest gate, raced 4 wide without cover in midfield throughout. Continued wide on bend, improved to 2nd prior to straightening when under 1L behind before dashing to lead 225m & holding late challenger.

Out-sped after start & consequently raced 5 wide without cover near the tail throughout. Continued very wide around bend. Straightening about 4L from lead before closing strongly late stages to get within half-length on line.

Had no early speed as per normal & raced near the tail, 4 wide but with cover throughout. Entered last section 3.5L from lead before making steady late progress to move to third in final strides, about 2L behind on line.

Pushed forward before racing 3 wide without cover outside leader throughout. Strode to lead prior to cornering, straightened just under 1L in front, and held lead until passed by winner near 225m, over-run for third late.

Raced on the leaders back throughout early & middle stages. Stayed along rail before racing tight around bend & on straightening. Continued to be in restricted room until shifting out at 200m & finishing off steadily late.

Began fairly & bumped before making some ground to midfield before being crowded & checked approaching 1000m mark. Continued 3 wide with cover, cornered under 2L from lead before weakening a couple of lengths in late stages.

Strode forward, raced outside the leader soon after start. Continued between runners under 1L behind in middle stages. Came under hard ridding at 500m, entered last section 2L behind before yielding a few lengths to midfield.

Relegated back to last soon after the start. Moved wider on the track passing half-way, long way back on cornering before passing a few rivals when running onto well held midfield finish. (Resented kickback-rider).
Drifted back after the start & raced worse than midfield along the rail. Moved away from the rail approaching the corner when only 3.5L behind before weakening to be well beaten on line.
Slow to begin, raced near the rear as a consequence. Checked & lost ground near 600m before weakening out further to be well beaten.
Showed customary early speed to lead. Joined & headed prior to cornering before weakening out poorly to long second last. (Failed to handle track-rider).

Hampered at start before mustering speed to improve to midfield between runners. Drifted further back when failing to hold position in middle stages before weakening badly in the straight to be long last.
Average to begin, showed no early speed, raced at tail, 7 lengths back, closer on turn, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to score.
Crowded on jumping, raced at rear on outer, 4 to 5 lengths back, a bit closer on turn, very wide into straight, closed off well to take 2nd on line.
Began awkwardly, raced at rear, 4 to 5 lengths back, a bit closer on turn, finished off well to take a place.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide with cover slightly behind midfield, similar position on turn, made reasonable progress in straight to make frame.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced towards rear of midfield on the outside, similar position on turn, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Bumped start, raced better than midfield on the outside early, moved closer on turn, showed limited response early in straight, peaked 200M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Jumped with them, positioned on rail better than midfield, moved closer along the rail on turn, took the lead early in straight, kept on well to 100M, headed and weakened thereafter.
Away well, raced better than midfield, 3 wide with no cover, challenged the leader turning in, kept on evenly early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Moderately away, raced behind midfield on the inside, 3 lengths or so back, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Bumped start, raced 2 to 3 wide better than midfield early, 2 wide on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped well, raced prominently on the inside, shared lead on turn, headed and weakened early in straight.
Began well, sent forward to take the lead, 2 wide, shared the lead with rival on turn, headed and weakened final 400M, finished tailed off. (See Racing Incidents.)

Raced in midfield 3 wide with cover throughout. Eased wider on straightening, only 2L behind, before dashing strongly to strike the lead near 200m mark & drawing away to win with something extra in hand.

Raced in midfield, 3 wide with cover throughout. Tracked eventual winner into corner, entered last section just over 3L from the lead before closing off strongly down the outside to steal narrow second in final stride.

Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Drifted slightly further back passing half-way, niggled along on cornering when around 4L from the lead, before closing off strongly to be nosed out for second on line.
Pushed forward to lead. Continued in the lead before being joined & headed by the winner near 200m mark, before being over-run late to narrowly miss first-three finish.

Steadied after start & shifted back to race near the tail, 3 wide with cover throughout. Shifted to be the widest runner on cornering when still about 5L behind before closing off steadily in late stages to midfield.

Very slow to begin & consequently raced at the tail. Continued at the rear on cornering when 5.5L behind before shifting to be the widest runner mid-straight & closing off steadily in concluding stages to midfield.

Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Commenced to travel keenly passing the 1200m when only 2.5L behind. Entered last section 3L from the lead before finishing off only one paced & holding midfield finish.

Steadied from wide gate & shifted back to race second last. Continued near the tail on cornering, around 5.5L from the lead, before making steady late progress, running on between runners to midfield in concluding stages.
Raced in midfield along the rail throughout. Momentarily awkwardly placed along the inside on straightening when under 3L behind before weakening in final furlong to be 7L behind.
Ridden forward from start & raced outside the leader throughout. Emptied out at the 200m mark before weakening out quickly thereafter. Well beaten.

Drifted back immediately after start & raced near the tail throughout. Continued well back along the rail on cornering, entered last section 4.5L from the lead before weakening further in straight. (Blood in trachea).

Caught 3 deep without cover just forward of midfield throughout. Entered last section just over 1L from lead before emptying out mid-straight & giving ground quickly in concluding stages after wide passage throughout.
Had a lovely run on leaders back throughout. Entered last section only 2L form the lead before weakening out badly in the final furlong to be long second last.
Obtained good position 1,1 throughout. Hard ridden prior to straightening before weakening very badly in straight to be distant last. (Must trial).
