Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced at rear on the inside, 5 lengths or so back, 2 wide on turn, angled out after passing 500M, finished off strongly to score.
Taken back from gate 11, raced 2 wide at rear, 5 to 6 lengths back, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide turning in, finished off well to take 2nd.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 wide after passing 800M, moved a bit closer on turn, hit the front 250M, kept on well but unable to hold off the first two final 50M.
Slightly inconvenienced at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 3 wide from 700M, hard ridden turning in, made good progress early in straight, peaked on run 100M, ran on evenly to the line.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 7 lengths back, a bit closer on turn but still the last, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home without threatening the first few.
Commenced well, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground to turn, angled out 450M, kept on well early in straight, no extra inside final furlong.

Jumped well from the widest draw, sent forward to race prominently but trapped wide, took the lead 950M, found rail approaching 700M, challenged turning in, peaked and headed 250M, weakened gradually final 150M.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 3 lengths back on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, lost place on turn, 4 to 5 lengths back turning in, failed to close off in straight. (Blood in trachea.)
Away well, raced prominently, 2 wide, a length or so back turning in, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide in midfield early, moved closer after passing 1000M, challenged the leader from 600M, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Average to begin, positioned 3 wide with cover, 4 lengths or so back, carried wider from 700M, very wide turning in, weakened and eased early in straight. (Roarer.) (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped well, sent forward to race prominently, allowed rival to cross 700M, saved ground on turn, weakened early in straight, eased final furlong. (Mucus in trachea.)
Took rail and lead easily, made all.
Eased to sit midfield early, progressed steadily 1200M to sit just off the leader, ran on well for 2nd.
Behind midfield, 2 wide, dashed well 250M for 3rd.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
In front of midfield, on the fence, lack room 400M, little dash 200M.
Eased back, 2-3 wide, dashed well 250M.
Pushed to obtain box seat, emptied 300M.
Midfield along the fence, dashed well 150M.
At rear, 2-3 wide, little dash 200M. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Eased back for cover, dash fairly in straight. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Eased back, took cover at rear, no progress. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Slow away, at rear, no progress.
Sat in midfield, on stand-side, closed off strongly to the line and scored by 3/4L.
At rear, on centre-track, showed strong dash in the last 200M and took 2nd.
Raced in front of midfield, along the outside rail, ran on fairly to the line.
Raced prominently, one horse from outside rail, closed off okay and finished 4th.
Began awkwardly and hard ridden to be in front of midfield, on centre-track, ran on only fairly to the line.
Raced in midfield, on centre-track, only one paced to the line.
Sent forward, along the outside rail, flattened passing 150M.
Raced in behind midfield, on centre-track, pretty one paced.
Raced in behind midfield, on stand-side, did not improve.
Prominent initially, lost ground and found nothing in the last 200M. (Bled 1st time)
At rear, on centre-track, made no impression.
At rear, on stand-side, found nothing.
At rear, on centre-track, did not feature.
Raced in midfield, on centre track, weakened from 200M.

Began fast before shifting down to rail soon after start & getting good run along the rail just behind the leading trio. Entered last section only 2.5L from lead, closed well to strike the lead at 150m & held late challenger.

Ridden forward at start to race just in front of midfield away from rail. Entered last section just over 2L behind before making continual steady ground to move to second 125m before closing to get with half-length on line.
Didn't begin fast but mustered speed after start to race in midfield away from rail. Cornered about 4L from the lead before making steady late headway to move to third placing in concluding stages.

Shared lead momentarily after start before racing second, a neck from lead when holding rail in middle stages. Shared lead passing 400m, raced tight with rival down straight until overtaken by winner near 150m. (See report).

Ridden forward from wide barrier & improved to lead near 1000m. Continued to hold narrow lead when racing away from rail middle stages. Shared lead passing 400m, lay inwards & raced tight in straight before weakening late.

Didn't begin fast, raced at the rear along the rail in early & middle stages. Continued near the back, almost 7L from the lead on cornering before making steady late ground in concluding stages to midfield, beaten 4L.

Began well before being checked & losing ground soon after the start & consequently settling worse than midfield between runners. Ridden along on cornering when 5.5L behind before making up a length late to midfield. (Lame).

Drifted back after the start & raced worse than midfield along the rail. Stayed along rail entering last section when 5.5L behind before making up a length when passing a few tiring rivals when finishing midfield.

Steadied after start & drifted back to race worse than midfield, 3 wide before getting some cover from 700m. Came under ridding approaching bend, entered last section 6L behind before making up a length without challenging.

Strode forward from widest gate before shifting across & getting lovely run just behind leading pair. Continued in third on straightening, only 1.5L from lead before emptying out at the 300m & weakening thereafter.

Raced in midfield away from rail before shifting down to the rail approaching 800m bend. Continued along the inside on straightening when just over 4L from lead before weakening a few lengths in straight to be third last.

Bumped at start, raced in second half when left 4 wide without cover early. Improved position passing 800m to be 3 wide in midfield thereafter. Cornered 5L behind before weakening a few lengths in straight after tough run.

Steadied for cover after start before commencing to race keenly when at the rear. Cornered awkwardly 800m & was consequently left wide thereafter. Cornered very wide, 7L behind, before failing to improve under limited riding.

Drifted back after start & raced third from last between runners. Made the turn awkwardly near the 800m mark & relegated to last soon after. Clear last on straightening, over 8L behind before making no headway in straight.
Average to begin, positioned 2 wide slightly better than midfield, commenced move near 500M, showed very good response, hit the front 150M, kept on well to the line.
Clean jump, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, challenged the leader on turn, took the lead near 500M, kicked clear early in straight, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner final 150M, finished 2nd.
Taken back from gate 7, raced behind midfield on the inside, 6 lengths or so back, moved a bit closer on turn, made very good progress in straight to take a place, nearest on line.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 to 7 lengths back, commenced move after passing 550M, very wide turning in, made good progress in straight to make frame.
Taken back from gate 10, raced at tail, 8 to 9 lengths back, hard ridden after passing 550M, 7 lengths back turning in, finished off well without threatening the first few.
Away with them, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, 3 lengths back on turn, finished off evenly.
Began well, raced better than midfield on the outside, found a 2 wide spot near 700M, 3 lengths back turning in, showed limited response early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide in midfield, lost position in the middle stages, 6 lengths back turning in, finished off evenly.
Taken back from gate 9, raced 2 wide at rear, 8 to 9 lengths back in the middle stages, had impossible task turning in and made only little headway in straight.
Began smartly, sent forward to take the lead, challenged by rival on turn, headed approaching 500M, weakened gradually in straight.
Settled to race outside the lead, locked in neck to neck battle to the wire, won by a short-head.
Raced in front of midfield, wide and no cover from 1100M, kept battling, just missed by a short-head.
In worse than midfield, wide but with cover, saved ground, hit the line strongly, closest at the finish.
Travelled just in front of midfield, 2 wide, kept on going, hit the line nicely for 4th.
Raced at the tail, wide but with cover, saved ground and closed off nicely.
Rolled forward, assumed lead near 900M, headed at 300M and lost ground gradually.
Bumped start, settled just behind midfield, along the rail, ran on fairly to the line.
Urged forward, led until crossed near 900M, had no extra gear, lost ground to leaders in straight.
Jumped smartly, eased to find cover in midfield, wide but with cover, very one paced in straight.
Sat in front of midfield, along the rail, one paced and couldn't find extra late.
Eased back, raced at the tail, wide and had no cover from 900M, did not close off.
Hampered at start, took back at rear 2 wide, saved no ground.
Awkward start, took back to be at rear, along the rail, did not improve.
Crowded start, in about midfield 2 wide, never threaten.
Waited with in last few, commenced move on top of home bend to come within 2L of pace 4-wide into straight, sustained effort to assert authority over 200 metres out, won readily.

Settled well behind from moderate start, trailed the field to the top of home bend at the 750 metres, went widest for a run entering home straight, ran on to be nearest at finish despite hanging in. (Tactic questioned)

Began well from the one draw but soon dropped to last few despite niggled at early, checked behind runners between 850 and 650 metres, snuck up from last on home turn, sustained good progress on the rail to be nearest at finish.
Travelled wide prominently early, raced keenly rounding home bend and pulled to the front 750 metres out, unable to sustain effort inside final 200 metres.
Settled in last few, fought on under pressure without threatening, tightened near the line.
Well there from a wide gate, gained narrow 2-wide over 1100 metres out, led until headed on home bend 750 metres out, found nothing under pressure inside final 200 metres.
Slow into stride settling in midfield, unable to quicken under pressure in home straight.
Broke well from a wide gate to lead, obtained rails run and ceded advantage 1100 metres out, remained one back on the rail rounding home bend, faded under pressure in straight.
Began fairly settling wide in midfield, made headway on the outside rounding home bend to reach within 1L of race leader into straight, soon weakened under pressure. (Irregular heart rhythm)
Soon recovered from moderate start to forward of midfield on the rail, became slightly worse rounding home bend, found nothing under pressure in straight.
Recovered steadily from interrupted start before settling within 2L of pace, became 3rd inside 800 metres, dropped away quickly upon straightening. (Irregular heart rhythm & blood in trachea)
Dropped in behind midfield, raced 3-wide throughout, quickened up smartly from 400M, hit lead mid-straight, soon clear from rivals winning his 4th race comfortably.
Settled towards the rear, driven along nearing 600M, responded well over final 300M, went 2nd near 50M, well held by the impressive winner.
Unable to slot in from draw 12, caught 4 wide no cover in midfield, moved closer to leader 600M, kept on steadily final 300M despite tough trip.
Bustled along after the start to go forward, chased clear leader in 2nd, moved up to challenge top of straight, not finishing pace of first 3 final 200M.
Began awkwardly, ridden to obtain the lead but raced keenly in middle stages, driven out 400M, caught mid-straight, faded towards the line.
From draw 1 ridden along to race in 3rd behind clear leaders, had difficulty obtaining clear running in straight, outpaced final 200M.
Held up in midfield 5Ls back, moved closer to the pace from 600M, finished off fairly on straightening, no extra final 150M.
Jumped fairly, held up in the rear, last at 400M, stayed on mildly to the line passing beaten rivals.
Jumped fairly, settled towards the rear on inside, gave limited response on straightening, not reached leaders.
Up with leaders early stages, dropped back to race in midfield, came under pressure home turn, kept on same pace in the run home. Never a factor.
Began awkwardly and crowded for room after start, settled midfield along the fence, niggled along 500M but failed to muster the pace to challenge. No impression.
From widest draw taken across behind runners, reserved in the rear, couldn't go on in the straight, never dangerous.

Up with pace early stages then restrained to settle ahead of midfield, came under pressure 600M, failed to finish off, gave ground noticeably from 200M. (Jockey : had come to the end of its initial racing campaign.)
Taken back from wide draw, settled 3-wide towards the rear, wide into straight, soon outpaced and left behind by rivals.

Began well, sent forward to take the early lead, found rail and headed approaching 800M, a length behind the leader on turn, showed good response in straight, hit the front after passing 100M, kept on well to the line and scored.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, there to turn, showed very good response early in straight, not enough room 200M, cleared 100M, finished off well to take 2nd, just held.
Average to begin, positioned 2 wide slightly better than midfield, angled out after passing 600M, 3 to 4 lengths back turning in, finished off strongly to take a place, nearest on line.
Slightly inconvenienced at start, raced at tail, 7 to 8 lengths back, very wide into straight, made very good progress in the run home.
Out with rest, raced 4 wide behind midfield, 5 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, closed off well without threatening the first few.

Away well, raced better than midfield but trapped very wide, sent forward after passing 1000M, took the lead 800M, led by 1-1/2L turning in, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, weakened thereafter.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, 5 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, made some progress in straight.
Clean jump, raced 3 wide better than midfield, bumped near 800M, 2 wide from 600M, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Jumped with them, raced behind midfield on the inside, angled out after passing 500M, made minor progress in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, 6 to 7 lengths back on turn, similar position on turn, made little progress in straight. (Lame right front leg.)
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Shifted out at start and bumped, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Away with them, raced 2 wide at rear, 6 to 7 lengths back on turn, similar position on turn, one-paced in straight.
Bumped start, positioned 2 wide, a length or so back, bumped near 800M, allowed rival to cross 600M, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Inconvenienced at start, raced at rear on the outside, 4 to 5 lengths back on turn, hard ridden after passing 350M, finished off very strongly to score by a neck.
Began smartly, raced 2 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, showed very good response in straight, hit the front 50M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner late.
Jumped well, sat right behind the leader on rail, there to turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared approaching 300M, finished off well to take a place, just held. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began well from a wide draw, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, challenged the leader turning in, took the lead early in straight, kept on well but unable to hold off the first few late.
Crowded on jumping, raced 3 wide better than midfield, no cover throughout, a length back on turn, kept on well early in straight, no extra final 150M.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, angled out early in straight, kept on evenly to the line.
Away with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, 4 lengths or so back, made some progress in straight.
Out in line, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, wider from 600M, made minor progress in straight.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, 3 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, finished off evenly.
Began well from the widest draw, trapped very wide in midfield, no cover throughout, 2 lengths back turning in, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Moderately away from gate 1, raced in midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail on the inside, 6 to 7 lengths back, very wide turning in, made little progress in straight.
Shifted out at start, sent forward to take the lead, led by 3/4L, challenged by rival turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, slightly inconvenienced near 300M, weakened thereafter.
Began awkwardly, raced behind midfield on the inside, 4 lengths back, same margin back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.

Commenced well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on very well in straight, easily scored.
Began well from a tricky gate, unable to slot in, trapped wide in midfield, no cover for the majority of the race, 2 to 3 lengths back on turn, closed off well to take 2nd without threatening.
Away with them, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield early, 2 wide on turn, taken wide in straight and finished off well to take a place.
Jumped well, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, allowed rival to cross near 700M, 2 lengths back on turn, finished off evenly.
Made contact at start, raced 3 wide, a length or so back, 2 wide from 700M, same margin back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 50M.
Began well from gate 1, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Made contact at start, raced at rear on the inside, 7 lengths back turning in, passed some tired runners in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, commenced move approaching 400M, very wide turning in, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced very wide at rear, no cover on turn, made no impression in straight.
Crowded on jumping, raced 2 wide in midfield, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight.
Bumped start, raced 4 wide towards rear, 3 wide on turn, weakened early in straight.
Away with them, raced 2 wide at rear, 6 lengths back on turn, weakened early in straight. (Mucus in trachea.)
Eased to rear, 2 wide, bumped 350M, lack room 4-2, made good ground when clear.
Eased to sit in midfield, trapped 3 wide, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, hung on well until 100M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Hard ridden early but not muster, on heels 1000M, sat 2 wide in midfield, blocked most straight, progressed steadily.
Hard ridden early, trapped 3-4 wide in midfield, held ground in straight.
Eased back, 2 wide, lack room 4-2 and bumped, made steady ground when clear.
At rear, trapped 3 wide, made ground 250M.
Bumped start, at back along the fence, bumped 350M, held up most straight, not properly tested.
Slow away, hard ridden forward, lack room 300M, no dash.
Hard ridden forward, sat outside the leader, out of fuel 250M, substantial blood in trachea after racing.
At back, on the fence, blocked whole straight, not properly tested.
Bumped start, hard ridden forward, raced greenly and was hampered several times throughout the race, emptied 300M. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, showed good kick approaching 100M, continued on to score by a neck.
Raced behind the lead after 500M, along the rail, showed dash after passing 100M, stayed on but headed in the last 25M.
Taken back and at rear, 2 wide, made ground and closed off strongly in the Straight.
Bumped start and lost ground, raced in midfield, along the rail, saved ground and closed off well, only inconvenienced close to the finishing line.
At rear, along the rail, saved some ground in the Straight.
Sent forward and took lead, weakened in the last 100M.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, flattened in the last 100M. (Roarer)
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, only one paced in the Straight.
At rear, 2 wide, swung widest on Straightening, nothing in the Straight.
Raced in front of midfield, wide no cover, emptied passing the 100M.
Sent forward, 2 wide, showed nothing in the Straight and eased down passing the 100M. Unacceptable performance, must trial.
At rear, 2 wide, failed to close off in the Straight.
Moderately away, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground to turn, finished off strongly to score by a neck.
Began smartly from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, hit the front 200M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner final 50M.
Taken back to race 2 wide at rear, 6 lengths back, moved closer on turn, very wide into straight, made some progress in the run home to take a place.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, angled out after passing 600M, very wide into straight, made some headway in the run home.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, led by 1/2L, travelled well to turn, peaked and headed 200M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide turning in, showed some response early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Out in line, raced at rear on the inside, 5 lengths or so back, a bit closer on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared near 150M, weakened final 100M.
Jumped well, raced prominently on the outside, 1/2L back, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, angled out 450M, inconvenienced near 250M, weakened thereafter. (Blood in trachea.)
Began awkwardly and bumped, sent forward to take the lead, enjoyed the easy lead to turn, kept on well in straight to score.
Shifted out at start and bumped, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, easy run on turn, kept to inside after straightening and finished off well to take 2nd, always held.
Bumped start, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, angled out 400M, closed off well to take a place.
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced towards rear on the inside, 4 lengths or so back, saved ground on turn, kept on well early in straight, no extra final 50M.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 2 wide at rear, 4 lengths or so back, there to turn, made good progress early in straight, no extra final 50M.
Average to begin, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide, 3/4L back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Moderately away, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, commenced move 450M, very wide turning in, showed limited response in straight.
Lifted front feet on jumping, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, carried wider after passing 450M, made no progress in the run home.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, peaked on turn, carried wider 400M, weakened gradually in straight.
Quickly into stride, raced better than midfield, 3 wide with no cover, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.

Bumped start and unbalanced, raced 2 wide behind midfield, stumbled 1050M, 3 wide from 450M, very wide turning in, showed limited response early in straight, inconvenienced 200M, eased thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.) (Bled.)
Raced just in front of midfield, along the rail, battled on before pulling away at 100M to win by 1-3/4L.
Took back, at tail 2 wide until 650M out, commenced to improve, closed off strongly and overtook to take 2nd prior going to the line.
Travelled in worse than midfield, 2 wide, made move at 600M, continued fairly to the line.
Taken back, raced towards the rear, on rail, saved ground, ran on fairly. (Minor laceration to the left front pastern)
Tightened after start, sat in behind midfield, on rail, held up 300M to 200M, closed off okay.
Bumped start, then rolled forward and slotted in front of midfield, 2 wide, showed dash early before running home one paced.
Niggled along, settled in box-seat, showed no change of foot in the straight. (See Incident Report)
Bumped start, then took back, at rear 2 wide, ran on without threatening. (See Incident Report)
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, pressured from 500M out, not competitive.
Sent forward, settled to race outside the lead, found nothing in the straight. (Lost right front plate)
In one-out one-back position, raced keenly in the middle stages, run ended on straightening. (Bled from both nostrils)
Went forward, led on the rail, emptied near 250M
Soon took up running on the rail travelling keenly early in back straight, kicked over 1.5L clear into home straight, kept on well under pressure.
Picked up under pressure to 2L back rail in 5th, became 4th in similar position rounding home bend and closer up into straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Well there early, restrained back to forward of midfield in 6th, came under pressure rounding home bend and saved ground turning in, kept on well for a placing.
Ridden along after slowly away, remained well back on the rail, made steady progress under pressure in straight to be nearest finish.
Not far off, 1L back in 3rd from the 800 metres, shifted 3-wide rounding home bend and wide into straight, kept on at the one pace.
Broke well 3-wide amongst the leaders gradually drifting back to forward of midfield, kept on one pace in straight.
Settled at the back from the widest gate, trailed the field until headway approaching home turn, swung very wide into the straight, ran on steadily down the centre of the track.
Crowded at start from a wide gate, travelled wide without cover in midfield, remained similar to straight, kept on at the one pace without threatening.

Broke well from the one draw but dropped quickly to just worse than midfield in 9th despite niggling along, gained closer to 8th passing the 850 metres and saved ground turning for home, made no further impression.
Began well from a wide gate, ridden positively 4-wide to join race leader 800 metres out, unable to sustain rounding home bend and dropped out tamely shortly after straightening.
Close up early, crowded approaching the 1000 metres dropping to just worse than midfield, came under pressure from around home bend, found nothing after wide into straight.
Crowded at start, ridden along from a wide gate before settling wide with cover in last few, lost cover in similar back-end position rounding home bend and dropped to last over 400 metres out.
Led as expected, set steady pace, quickened up home turn, skipped clear passing 300M, continued on well to hold pursuing rivals at bay.
Chased leaders on inside, tried hard on straightening but couldn't reel in the winner, claimed 2nd in photo.
From wide draw taken across behind runners, settled near rear until making headway passing 600M, chased on well in straightening, held by winner final stages.
Slow to begin, recovered to race in midfield along the fence, ran on mildly from 300M, disappointed for running 150M and again short of room late stages.
Caught 3-wide no cover after 1300M, ridden along to join leader 700M, kept on one paced turning home.
Dropped back to the rear, raced keenly, shifted out to a 3-wide position entering back straight, headway on outer home turn, stayed on without threatening leaders.
Slow to begin then lost ground, reserved near last, moved closer 500M, driven 300M but not pace to challenge leaders.
Restrained in midfield, raced keenly, shuffled back to rear passing 600M, ran past beaten horses on straightening.
Chased leader on outside, came under pressure home turn, weakened and no extra 250M.
Settled down 3-wide behind mid-division, scrubbed along home turn, couldn't go on in straight.
Failed to muster speed, unable to slot in, no close than 3-wide throughout the trip, soon beaten on straightening.
Not far off the early pace, came under pressure 650 and became badly unbalanced, eased from 500M as jockey felt something may have gone amiss. (No Vet findings / Unacceptable Performance.)
Commenced well, raced slightly better than midfield on the inside, angled out 400M, finished off strongly to score.
Moderately away, sent forward to take the lead, 2 wide, found rail approaching 600M, challenged turning in, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the winner final 100M.
Average to begin, raced slightly behind midfield on rail, saved ground to turn, made good progress in straight to take a place.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide better than midfield, a length or so back on turn, finished off evenly.
Began smartly from gate 1, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross after passing 700M, sat right behind the leader on turn, kept on evenly in straight.
Away well, raced 2 wide in midfield, 4 lengths back on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Away with them, unable to slot in, trapped very wide in midfield, sent forward after passing 800M, 2nd on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 200M.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Bumped on jumping, raced 3 wide with no cover in midfield, 2 to 3 lengths back, similar position on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide at rear, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, one-paced in straight.
Bumped start, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Began fairly, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, similar position on turn, weakened early in straight.

Clean jump, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on strongly in straight, won by 2 lengths.
Away well from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, kept on well in straight to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Crowded on jumping, raced 3 wide with cover, 2 to 3 lengths back, angled out 400M, finished off well to take a place without threatening.

Began well, raced 2 wide in 2nd early, allowed rival to cross after entering the back straight, 2 lengths or so back on turn, not enough room early in straight, cleared 200M, closed off well to make frame without threatening.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail early, 7 lengths or so back, moved a bit closer after passing 800M, very wide on turn, made good progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Taken back from gate 12, raced at rear, 6 lengths or so back, same margin back turning in, no clear running early in straight, cleared near 100M, made some progress thereafter.
Taken back from a wide draw, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, showed limited response early in straight, peaked 200M, weakened thereafter.
Began only fairly, raced 3 wide better than midfield early, moved closer after passing 1250M, 2 wide from 1000M, 2nd on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Jumped well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 3 wide after entering the back straight, a length or so back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide in midfield, 2 to 3 lengths back, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight.
Shifted out at start, raced behind midfield on the outside, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight.

Average to begin, raced very wide behind midfield early, sent forward after entering the back straight, positioned 4 wide, a length or so back in the middle stages, dropped position from 700M, eased early in straight.
Began awkwardly and shifted in, raced very wide slightly behind midfield, unable to maintain position after passing 900M, detached from 600M, eased final 500M.
Bumped start, raced wide in midfield early, unable to maintain position after passing 900M, eased final 400M.
At back, 2-4 wide, unleashed strong finishing efforts 300M to score with ease.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, closed off strongly for 2nd.
Eased to sit behind the leaders on the rails, ran on well for 3rd.
Hard ridden early, trapped 3 wide in front of midfield, dashed strongly 250M.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, out of fuel 200M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 2 wide, lack room 4-2, dashed well when clear.
Slow away, took rail at back, lack room 4-2, dashed well when clear.
At back, along the fence, no dash.
Slow away, at rear on the fence, little dash 200M.
Hard ridden forward, for the majority of the race travelled wide and without cover, weakened 300M.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2 wide, emptied 300M.
Eased at start, never competitive. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
For the majority of the race travelled wide and without cover behind midfield, tailed out.
Eased back, never a factor. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, swung wide on Straightening, made ground and win by 1-1/4L.
Raced behind the lead, along the rail, ran on well to the finish to take 2nd.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, closed off well to the line and finished 3rd.
Raced in midfield, wide no cover, ran on fairly and headed near 100M.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide and raced tight near 900M, made ground, ran on well to the line in the last 150M.
At rear, along the rail, saved ground and ran on okay to the line.
Raced in front of midfield, 3 wide no cover, ran on until flattened in final 150M.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, remained one paced to the line.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, pretty one paced.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, weakened passing 150M.
Raced in midfield, near the 1200M checked, 3 wide but with cover, near 900M travelled keenly, only one paced in the Straight.
At rear, 2 wide, did not feature. (Blood in trachea)
At rear, along the rail, nothing in the Straight.
Sent forward and raced next to the leader, lost ground after passing 200M.
Began fasted & led from gate 1. Raced over 1L clear approaching the 500m mark, dashed clear under quite riding in the straight to win by big margin.

Commenced awkwardly & lost ground at start before making headway to race in midfield on rail. Moved off the rail approaching corner, straightened just under 3L behind, moved to second at 200m but was 4L behind easy winner.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the inside, moved closer on turn, angled out approaching 400M, closed off well to take a place without threatening the winner.
Enjoyed good run behind the leader/winner throughout. Cornered only 1.5L from the lead, couldn't go with winner in straight, battled to hold distant 4th.

Hard ridden to be prominent, raced second outside the leader from 1250m before being crossed & racing 1,1 near 900m. Eased wider on cornering, straightened 3L behind before weakening in straight to be well beaten in midfield.

Shifted back from wide gate, eased near 1200m & raced 3 wide with cover at the rear. Shifted very wide approaching 500m to improve, widest on cornering, passed a few rivals when running onto midfield but still well beaten.

Raced second last between runners for first 600m before moving slightly closer after half-way. Travelled ok on cornering when 6L behind before passing a few tiring rivals when running onto well beaten midfield finish.

Improved after start to race prominently despite racing very wide out of straight first time. Continued 3 wide before improving to race outside the leader from 1000m. Hard ridden 500m before weakening in straight.

Raced 4 wide with cover in midfield for first 600m before being left wide & without cover from the 1000m mark. Continued very wide around bend, straightened 5L from lead but was soon beaten & weakened to be over 14L behind.

No early speed but mustered to make some ground to midfield leaving straight. Continued in midfield between runners in middle stages. Came under hard ridding 600m & began yielding ground. Long way behind in strung out finish.

Bumped start before being steadied from gate 13 to race last. Continued last approaching corner, eased very wide on straightening when 9L from lead before weakening to be beaten over 20L in strung out finish. (Must trial).

Began only fairly, mustered to midfield early before drifting back after the 1000m mark to race worse than midfield when 3 wide with cover. Relegated to second last near 550m before weakening badly in straight. (Must trial).

Steadied to midfield soon after start, raced 4 wide after first bend before being left wide & without cover from 1100m. Moved closer passing half-way before yielding ground from 550m, tailed out. (Lame next day, must trial).

Showed speed, shared lead momentarily in early stages before racing 3 deep with cover in midfield. Came under hard ridding near 900m before weakening through the field to be last before straightening. Long last. (Must trial).
Jumped with them, raced in midfield on the outside, moved closer on turn, hit the front 300M, kept on very well to the line and scored.
Moderately away, raced at rear on the inside, 6 to 7 lengths back, 2 wide on turn, finished off very strongly to take 2nd.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced prominently on the outside, 2 wide after passing 1200M, took the lead 400M, peaked and headed 300M, ran on evenly to the line.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide behind midfield early, 3 wide after entering the back straight, slightly improved on turn, finished off evenly.
Made contact shortly after start, positioned on rail in midfield, 2 wide on turn, finished off evenly.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide, 5 lengths or so back, angled out near 650M, commenced move after passing 550M, finished off evenly.
Bumped shortly after start, raced 3 wide towards rear, moved closer on turn, very wide into straight, one-paced in the run home.
Shifted out abruptly on jumping and made contact, raced at tail, 6 to 7 lengths back turning in, finished off evenly.
Out in line, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared approaching 300M, ran on evenly to the line.
Bumped shortly after start, raced 2 wide at rear, wider on turn, made no progress in straight.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide, 4 lengths or so back, 3 wide on turn, weakened early in straight.
Made contact at start, raced better than midfield on the outside early, took the lead near 1450M, found rail 1100M, challenged turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Away well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, peaked turning in, weakened and eased early in straight. (Blood in trachea.)

Shifted out at start and bumped, raced prominently on the inside early, positioned 1 to 2 lengths back on rail in the middle stages, unable to maintain position from 600M, eased early in straight. (Irregular heart rhythm.)
Rolled forward into the lead, on rail, stayed on nicely to maintain position, won by a neck.
Bumped start, raced in front of midfield, on rail, held up till 250M, fought on nicely once cleared, took 2nd in a close battle to the finish.
Very awkward start, recovered to be in box-seat, stayed on well to the finish to take 3rd.
Travelled in about midfield, 2 wide, continued nicely to the line.
Took back, at rear and on rail, held up early in the straight, closed off nicely thereafter.
Bumped start, ridden forward before settling in one out one back, ran on until flattened late.
Crowded start, recovered to be in midfield, on rail, ran on evenly to the line.
Travelled in worse than midfield, 2 wide, ran on without threatening.
Raced in worse than midfield, wide but with cover, showed no turn of foot. (See Incident Report)
Took back, raced at the tail, on rail, swung widest, ran on without improving.
Urged along, settled to race outside lead near 800M, faded gradually.
Eased back, raced at the rear, 2 wide, did not improve position in the straight.
Niggled along, sat in front of midfield, wide but with cover, found nothing in the straight.
Hard ridden forward, prominent but wide, gave ground from rounding home turn, not competitive
Ridden forward before settling 3-wide in 2nd, hit the front entering home straight and kicked 2L clear over 200 metres out, held on under pressure to finish.

Taken back from a wide gate for rails run just worse than midfield, commenced move rounding home bend from the 600 metres, sustained progress from 3L 6th into straight, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began well from the one draw, settled just off the pace in 3rd on the rail from the 1400 metres, came to challenge under pressure on straightening but failed to quicken to threaten.

Jumped awkwardly and soon dropped to midfield in 7th along the rail, gained closer before coming under pressure rounding home bend reaching 5th into straight, unable to sustain effort after straightening.
Settled well behind on the rail, commenced move on home bend from the 600 metres and saved ground turning in, fought on steadily for remote 5th.

Travelled wide in midfield around first bend, gained slightly closer in back straight and further closer under pressure around home bend, made no further impression in straight. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Ridden to soon take up running setting a sound pace, led until headed under pressure after straightening, folded up quickly.
Began fairly, travelled 3-wide in midfield before giving ground under pressure from rounding home bend.
Close up early, settled just over 2L back in 4th, gave ground steadily from home turn.
Settled at the back from the widest gate, tailed-off from rounding first bend, ran past well-beaten horses in home straight.
Soon dropped towards the rear despite ridden along, beaten when hampered over 600 metres out, made no impression in straight.
Settled in midfield, dropped away quickly after straightening.
Began from a wide gate, soon dropped behind midfield despite ridden along, never seen with a chance.
Gradually settled well behind after beginning from a wide gate, never seen with a chance.
Chased leaders 2-wide, quickened up swiftly to take lead 300M, soon clear, kept on well final stages to win comfortably.
Settled ahead of midfield, responded well passing 400M, tried hard to reel in leader but was always held.
Held up behind mid-division 3-wide, stayed on well final 400M for a fine 3rd, nearest finish.
Towards the rear, ridden along 500M, kept on steadily over final 400M, not reached first 3.
Restrained in midfield, kept on mildly in straight, never threatened
Dropped back to race near the last, no clear run 300M-200M, made non-threatening progress when clear.
Positively ridden, crossed to the lead 1100M, headed 300M, weakened and no extra final 150M.
Settled ahead of midfield, went wide from 550M, not quickened on straightening, one paced final 200M.
Slowly away, held up in last 9Ls off the pace, stayed on past beaten horses in the straight.
Held up 3-wide behind midfield, stayed on fairly when asked, never threatened.
Began only fairly then lost ground, held up in midfield along inside, no clear run early straight, kept on only fairly over final 300M.
Positioned ahead of midfield, caught wide no cover from 1000M, couldn't go on turning for home. (Jockey : circumstances of the race didn't suit.)
Chased leader on inside, weakened away passing 400M, eased when no chance.
Began awkwardly, went forward vying for lead on outside, had nothing left turning for home, weakened and finished tailed out. (Unacceptable Performance.)
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, no daylight early in straight, angled out 250M, cleared 200M, finished off very strongly to score by a neck.
Began well from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, 2 wide from 550M, hard ridden approaching 300M, hit the front 250M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner late.
Began fairly, positioned on rail in midfield, moved a bit closer along the rail in the middle stages, showed very good response early in straight, peaked on run 200M, ran on evenly to the line.
Jumped well from gate 11, sent forward to race prominently, 2 wide, travelled well to turn, took brief lead near 300M, peaked and headed 250M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Away with them, positioned 3 wide with no cover, 2 to 3 lengths back, similar position on turn, finished off evenly.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced 2 to 3 wide towards rear, 5 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Away well, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Began only fairly, raced at rear on the inside, slightly improved along the rail on turn, showed some response early in straight, peaked 200M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Began smartly from the widest draw, trapped very wide slightly behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back, 3 wide on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced 3 wide with cover, 4 lengths back, similar position on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Taken back from gate 10, raced at tail, 6 to 7 lengths back, very wide turning in, made no impression in straight.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide at rear, awkwardly placed near 800M, found rail approaching 700M, 5 lengths back on turn, showed limited response in straight, eased final 100M.
Out in line, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, 6 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, unbalanced early in straight, weakened final 300M. (Irregular heart rhythm.)
Began smartly, sent forward to race prominently on the outside, half-length back turning in, finished off well to score by a narrow margin.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, a bit closer on turn, hit the front early in straight, peaked on run near 100M, caught close home.
Began well from gate 10, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, 3 lengths or so back, there to turn, finished off strongly to take a place.
Jumped with them, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, closed off well to make frame.
Bumped heavily at start, raced 3 wide slightly better than midfield, 2 lengths back turning in, made some progress in straight.
Away with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, kept on well in straight without threatening.
Taken back from gate 13, raced at rear on the outside, 4 to 5 lengths back on turn, very wide turning in, made good progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Fast into stride, raced prominently but trapped very wide, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Moderately away from gate 1, raced prominently on the inside, travelled well to turn, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, 5 lengths back on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Bumped heavily at start, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, weakened final furlong. (Bled.)
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide at rear, 4 to 5 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Commenced well from a wide draw, raced behind midfield on the outside, 3 lengths or so back on turn, weakened early in straight.

Taken back from the widest draw, raced 2 wide at rear, moved a bit closer in the middle stages, 4 lengths or so back turning in, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, finished off strongly to score.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, a bit closer in the middle stages, finished off strongly to take 2nd.
Began awkwardly, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, a bit closer on turn, showed good progress in straight, hit the front approaching 100M, peaked and headed 50M, missed 2nd on line.
Jumped well from gate 11, raced 3 wide in midfield, no cover after passing 1200M, slightly improved on turn, finished off well without threatening.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide better than midfield, challenged the leader turning in, kept on well to 50M, no extra thereafter.
Jumped with them, sent forward to take the lead, found rail near 1000M, challenged turning in, kept on well to 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Taken back from gate 10, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, very wide turning in, made some headway in straight.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, a bit closer on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 250M, kept on evenly to 50M, weakened gradually thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)

Began only fairly, raced 2 wide behind midfield, a bit closer on turn, angled out 450M, showed some response early in straight, peaked 200M, hampered 150M, weakened gradually thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Shifted out at start and bumped, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, saved ground to turn, angled out 450M, made no progress in straight.
Bumped start, positioned 5 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the inside, 2 wide on turn, kept on evenly in straight. (Lost right hind plate near 1200M.)
Away well, chased leader, 2 lengths or so back in the middle stages, weakened gradually early in straight.
Began awkwardly, raced at rear throughout, never a factor. (Lame left front leg next day.)
Eased to sit in midfield, 2 wide, progressed steadily 300M to score.
Pushed forward, sat just off the leaders, closed off strongly 300M, just beaten by a narrow margin.
Pushed early, behind midfield, held up 4-2, made steady ground when clear.
Pushed forward to cross, sat outside the leader, out of fuel 150M.
Slow away, took rail at rear, lack room 400M, progressed steadily when clear.
Took rail and lead easily, hung on until 150M weakened. Post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Eased to sit in midfield, trapped 3 wide, weakened 200M.
Pressed forward along the fence, emptied 250M.
At rear, 3 wide, lack turn of foot.
At back, 2 wide, never improved.
Eased at start, trapped 4 wide, raced keenly, no progress.

Placing: DISQ
Comment: Slow away, trapped 3 wide, no progress. Jockey weighing in light and the horse was disqualified by the Stewards (see incident report).
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, swung wide on Straightening, made ground to score by 1-1/2L.
Raced in front of midfield, wide no cover, stayed on but headed in the last 100M.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, passing 250M shifted out to obtain clear running and then closed off strongly for 3rd.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, stayed on but headed in the last 75M.
Forward and raced next to the leader, 2 wide, weakened passing 50M.
At rear, 2 wide, made minor ground only.
Raced behind the lead, 2 wide, pretty one paced.
At rear, 3 wide with cover after 800M, only one paced in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, one paced only.
At rear, 3 wide with cover, did not improve in the Straight.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, one paced in the Straight.
Raced in behind midfield, wide no cover, lost ground in the Straight.
Showed good speed to lead when racing one horse away from stand side rail. Asked for full effort near 200m mark & drew away in late stages to win by over a length.
Showed early pace to race on the speed along stand side rail, under 1L from lead throughout. Asked to chase leader 250m mark, closed off well but founder leader/winner just too strong late.
Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Entered last section under 2L behind before closing off steadily in late stages to move to third inside final 50m.
Showed early speed to race second only a neck behind lead. Continued on speed in middles stages until being unable to go with winner in final 150m & being caught for third late. Not beaten far.
Showed some speed to improve & race forward of midfield early before moving closer at half-way & entering last section only a half-length from the lead. Battled on ok before peaking in late stages.
Shifted inwards at start before getting good position in midfield when racing on leaders back. Entered last section only 1.5L from lead before finishing off evenly to midfield without threatening.
Steadied after the start & raced in midfield throughout. Hard ridden approaching 400m mark when about 3L form the lead before finishing off evenly to hold midfield finish without threatening.

Badly unbalanced after start & consequently raced rearward throughout. Entered last section over 4L behind, began making steady progress before shifting inwards 125m before held up in concluding stages when closing late.
Began awkwardly before being steadied to race in midfield. Entered last section just over 3L from lead before holding midfield without making any headway in dash to line.

Crowded at start & consequently failed to muster any early speed & raced a clear last early. Shifted towards center of track mid-race & passed a few rivals approaching half-way before making no further ground in last section.

Badly crowded for room between horses on jumping before shifting to stand side rail & racing near the tail. Continued near the back, over 5L from the lead entering last section before weakening to be beaten 10L.

Bumped & unbalanced at start before mustering speed quickly to race only half-length from lead in early stages. Came under hard riding & began yielding ground from half-way before weakening badly in last section. Well beaten.

Began only fairly before being crowded after start & consequently raced rearward throughout. Relegated to last mid-race before weakening poorly in last section to be long second last. (Painful tendon next day).

Began awkwardly, bumped & unbalanced before improving to race in midfield near to center of track. Ridden along passing half-way, entered last section just over 3L from lead before weakening out poorly to be long last.
Crowded on jumping, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out after passing 500M, finished off very strongly to score.
Fast into stride, sent forward to race prominently, 2 wide on turn, hard ridden after passing 400M, took the lead 150M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner final 50M.
Made contact shortly after start, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, there to turn, kept on well in straight without threatening.

Shifted out at start and made contact, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, unable to obtain clear running early in straight, cleared after passing 200M, closed off well to make frame.
Moderately away, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed near 150M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Jumped with them, raced at rear on the inside, 5 lengths or so back, there to turn, angled out early in straight, finished off evenly.
Jumped well from gate 1, sent forward to race prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross near 700M, sat right behind the leader on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Average to begin, positioned 4 lengths behind the leader on rail, same margin back on turn, angled out 500M, no clear running early in straight, cleared 250M, ran on evenly to the line.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide in midfield, carried wider after passing 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 6 to 7 lengths back, very wide turning in, failed to close off in straight.
Began smartly from a wide draw, raced in midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, very wide turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.
Crowded on jumping, raced towards rear on the outside, 5 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, weakened early in straight.
Bumped start, settled to race in midfield, along the rail, showed nice kick from 250M out, ran on to win by 3/4L.
Settled to race in midfield, wide but with cover, kept battling to the line, hung onto 2nd.
Crowded start, raced in worse than midfield, wide but with cover, ran on nicely to the line for 3rd.
Travelled in about midfield, 2 wide, improving until hampered at 150M, continued on thereafter.
At rear, niggled along in early and middle stages, 3 wide but with cover, made ground steadily.
Raced in one-out one-back position, ran on fairly until weakened late.
Bumped start, settled in worse than midfield, 2 wide, continued evenly to the line.
Rolled forward, settled outside the lead, in touch until approaching 200M, faded thereafter. (See Incident Report)
Raced at the tail as usual, stayed 2 wide, stumbled at 500M, saved no ground in straight.
Shifted to rail from wide barrier, in worse than midfield, didn't improve and eased down at 150M.
Raced in front of midfield, wide and without cover, failed to run on. (Minor laceration right hind cannon)
Took back, raced at the rear, wide and without cover, never threaten.
Niggled along, took rail and led, raced keenly, emptied and headed approaching 300M.
Raced in box-seat, about 2L off, run ended at 350M. (Heart irregularity)

Moderate start, soon improved to within 3L of pace in 5th on the rail, gradually drifted slightly over 3L back on the bend, obtained a clear passage inside the 300 metres, ran on under pressure to just get up on line.
Settled in midfield, slightly worse rounding home bend, tight behind runners after straightening, ran on quite well inside final 300 metres to just fail to get up on line.

Began well but gradually taken back towards the rear, became last rounding home bend, did not find much room early in straight, quickened well under pressure inside the 200 metres, did best work late.

Ploughed a lonely furrow for the first 400 metres from the widest gate, came to join the leading few onto the course proper, chased the leader into home straight and came under pressure, hit the front momentarily 150 metres out.
Never far off settling just over 2L off the pace in 4th, slightly further off the pace turning for home, fought on until finding no extra inside final 100 metres.

Jumped awkwardly losing ground, soon recovered to just worse than midfield in 8th on the rail, remained in similar position to home straight, made modest headway under pressure in straight to be nearest at finish.
Soon dropped to rear despite ridden along settling off the rail at the back, commenced move out wide over 600 metres out and the widest making final turn, fought on steadily without threatening.
Shared the pace on the rail, shifted one back to 3rd over 1100 metres out, in similar position entering home straight, beaten when hampered 150 metres out.

Began well from a wide gate and gradually shifted back to midfield travelling mainly 3-wide without cover, in similar position turning for home, quickened to hold some chance until the 150 metres when found no extra.

Began moderately but soon came to join first few, became reluctant race leader passing 1400 metres travelling keenly in back straight, went over 1L early in home straight but unable to sustain effort inside final 200 metres.
Soon taken back to last few, made short-lived effort out wide rounding home bend, weakened under pressure inside final 300 metres.
Settled ahead of midfield, made steady progress passing 300M, got up near line to score a well-deserved victory on probably his final racecourse appearance.
Went forward, crossed to the lead passing 1000M, kept on well passing 400M, caught close home.
Chased leaders 2-wide, well place to strike at 400M, kept on steadily to the line.
Held up in midfield, stayed on mildly final 300M, got up for 4th 50M, held by first 3.
Bounded in the air and lost ground as the gate opened, recovered to race behind midfield, was making steady headway when hampered nearing 50M, might have cost 4th.
Reserved in mid-division along the 3-path, no cover from 1100M, plodded on under pressure in straight, not pace to challenge leaders.
Behind midfield early stages, shuffled back to near last home turn, stayed on moderately to line, no threat to leaders.
Tracked leaders on inside, ran on same pace in straight, no extra late.
Settled down behind midfield, wide into straight, stayed on without threat over final 300M.
Dropped back to near last from wide draw, went wide 600M, made limited progress to the line, no impression on leaders. (Mucus.)
Taken back to last from wide draw, switched wide making the home turn, stayed on fairly down the outside in straight. No threat.
Tracked leader, moved up to challenge near 500M, failed to quicken when driven in straight, swamped by rivals 150M, checked 100M when already beaten.
Settled down in midfield, driven and outpaced from 400M, soon out of contention. (Mucus.)
Taken back to race towards the rear, shuffled back to last home turn, failed to run on in straight. (Mucus.)
Began smartly, raced prominently on the inside, travelled comfortably to turn, took the lead after passing 600M, kept on very well in straight to score.
Taken back from gate 11, raced 2 wide at rear, 5 lengths or so back, there to turn, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Clean jump, sent forward to take the lead, 2 wide, travelled well to turn, headed near 600M, kept on well in straight to take a place, always held.
Average to begin, positioned 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, closed off well to make frame.
Shifted out at start and made contact, positioned 2 wide, a length or so back, same position on turn, finished off evenly.
Moderately away from gate 1, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground throughout, kept on evenly in straight.
Bumped start, raced behind midfield on the inside, 4 lengths back, a bit closer on turn, showed some response in straight, blocked final 50M.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide towards rear, 4 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, made little progress in straight.

Began smartly from the widest draw, unable to slot in, trapped very wide in midfield, no cover throughout, showed limited response early in straight, peaked on run 200M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Bumped start, raced at tail, 5 to 6 lengths back, there to turn, taken wide in straight, made little progress final 300M.
Bumped shorty after start, raced 3 wide, 2 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Bumped start, raced behind midfield on the outside, 4 lengths back on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Jumped with them, raced prominently, 2 away from the stands' rail, hard ridden after passing 400M, took the lead approaching 200M, hard pressed by rivals in the closing stages, just held on.
Bumped start, positioned a length or so back, nearer to the middle track, showed good response final 400M, just narrowly beaten.
Began smartly, positioned 3 away from the stands' rail, a length or so back, showed good response final 400M, just beaten by a narrow margin.
Clean jump, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on the stands' side, made very good progress final 400M, just narrowly beaten.
Bumped start, raced at rear, 6 lengths back at 400M, finished off very strongly to be nearest on line.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back, made good progress final 400M without threatening. (Minor laceration to the left hind fetlock.)
Began well, raced prominently on the stands' rail, took the lead approaching 400M, peaked and headed 200M, weakened gradually final 100M. (Lame right front leg next day morning.)
Began awkwardly, raced towards rear on the stands' rail, 4 to 5 lengths back, made good progress final 400M without threatening.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead on the stands' side, peaked and headed 400M, kept on evenly to 150M, weakened thereafter.

Bumped start, raced in midfield, nearer to the middle track, showed limited response after passing 400M, weakened gradually inside final furlong. (Lost right front plate near 800M and lost left hind plate near 500M.)
Began fairly from gate 1, raced better than midfield in the middle of the track, 2 lengths or so back, showed limited response after passing 400M, weakened final furlong.
Moderately away, raced behind midfield on the stands' side, 3 lengths or so back, one-paced final 400M.
Slightly slow out, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
