Moderately away, sent forward to take the lead, led by 3/4L on turn, kept on strongly in straight, easily scored.
Began well, raced better than midfield on the inside, a length back on turn, kept on well in straight to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, made some progress in straight to take a place.
Away well, raced 2 wide in midfield, slightly inconvenienced near 900M, moved closer on turn, kept on well early in straight, no extra final 150M.
Taken back from gate 8, raced 2 wide towards rear, 4 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, finished off evenly.
Began well, raced behind midfield on the inside, 2 wide on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Jumped well, raced prominently, 2 wide, 3/4L back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Taken back from gate 9, raced towards rear on the outside, 5 lengths back turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Slowly away, raced at tail, 5 lengths or so back, weakened from 500M, eased early in straight.
Hard ridden to obtain box seat, drifted away 300M to score with ease.
Eased back, trapped 3-4 wide, progressed steadily 300M.
Settled in front of midfield, 2 wide, progressed steadily 300M for 3rd.
Pushed to take rail and lead, drifted out abruptly 1350M, weakened 200M.
At back, 2-3 wide, lack room 400M, made ground 200M.
Hard ridden to sit in front of midfield, checked 1350M, ran on well until 200M weakened, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Hard ridden forward, sat outside the leader, badly hampered 1350M, out of fuel 300M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
At rear, 2-4 wide, ran on fairly.
At back, 2 wide, never improved, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Trapped 3 wide throughout in midfield, emptied 450M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Never competitive, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Never a factor, was noted to have heart irregularity after racing.
At rear, 2 wide, closed off strongly and scored by 1-1/4L.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, ran strongly from 250M to take 2nd.
At rear, 2 wide, made ground steadily and took 3rd
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, made ground strongly in the last 100M.
Settled in one-out one-back, showed little dash passing 250M only.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, pretty much one paced.
Sat behind midfield, wide no cover, only one paced.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail after 700M, found no extra for final 150M.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, passing 300M was brushed and only one paced in the Straight.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide after 800M, showed no turn of foot.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, run ended at 150M.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, not a factor.
At rear, along the rail, did not feature.
Sent forward, along the rail, flattened passing the 200M.

Ridden forward from second widest gate early before coming across to race midfield away from rail. Eased wider approaching corner, made continual ground inside last 100m & just got the bob on the line to score narrowly.

Widest of 6 runners sharing lead early before steadying & racing midfield, 3 wide with cover in middle stages. Widest on cornering when 4.5L behind before closing very strongly to just miss in a bob of the heads on line.

Not much early speed but improved after first furlong to race just worse than midfield away from rail. Entered last section just over 4L from lead, made continual steady ground between runners before closing to third final 50m.
Pushed forward to race outside the leader. Took narrow lead near 150m for short time before being over-run by winner inside the final 100m. Caught for third in late stages & beaten under 2L.

Shared lead when 3 wide in early stages before steadying & racing on leaders back from the 800m. Moved off the rail on cornering, finished off evenly in straight & maintained 2L deficit all the way to line.
Pushed forward to lead. Joined near the 150m mark before over-run by closers in late stages & gave a length in shadows to be just over 2L behind in midfield.

Began only fairly, raced third last away from rail after start. Checked & lost ground passing 650m & consequently cornered nearly 10L behind. Made significant late ground in the straight & had genuine excuse.

Began only fairly & was hard ridden to hold position in midfield along the rail. Continued along the rail on cornering when just under 4L behind, emptied out near the furlong marker & gave ground late. Well beaten.

Pushed forward after start, raced 4 wide in a line sharing the lead before continuing on & racing 3 wide without cover outside leading pair from 800m. Hard ridden prior to straightening & weakened out quickly in last 250m.

Ridden along after start to hold position in midfield away from the rail. Drifted further back in middle stages when racing along the rail. Cornered 6L from lead & gave a length in straight to be well beaten.

Drifted back after the start & raced rearward before being relegated to last approaching the 800m mark. Continued at the rear approaching corner when under pressure, cornered over 9L behind & did nothing in straight.

Had no early pace & raced last. Improved slightly when moving three wide around runners at 800m. Continued in second half, over 6L behind on cornering before losing action mid-straight & weakening quickly. (Blood in trachea).
Began well, raced wide, a length or so back early, slightly taken back after passing 800M, 4 lengths or so back turning in, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to score.

Bumped start, raced wide in midfield, moved closer in the middle stages, 4 wide turning in, showed very good response in straight, took the lead near 150M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner final 50M.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced very wide, a length or so back, no cover throughout, kept on well in straight to take a place.
Began well from a wide draw, raced in midfield on the outside, very wide into straight, finished off evenly.

Began smartly from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, hard ridden after passing 300M, showed some response, peaked on run 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Moderately away, sent forward to take the lead, found rail approaching 650M, challenged turning in, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, there to turn, unable to obtain clear running early in straight, cleared near 200M, finished off evenly.
Began well from gate 10, raced prominently on the outside, 2 wide from 650M, challenged the leader turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced at rear, 6 lengths back turning in, made no impression in straight.
Bumped start, raced towards rear on the inside, 3 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, weakened early in straight.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, 3 lengths or so back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened and eased final 150M.

Placing: PU
Comment: Started slowly, soon pulled up. (Bled.) (Lame in both hind legs.)
Bumped start, raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, closed off impressively in straight, won by 1-1/4L.
Rolled forward, settled outside lead, ran on well to the line, settled for 2nd, no match to winner.
At rear, wide but with cover, saved ground and closed off strongly for 3rd.
Sent forward along the rail into the lead, kicked on until 100M, headed and found no extra.
Settled to race in behind midfield, wide but with cover, taken out at 300M, ran on fairly.
Raced at the rear, along the rail, showed dashes and saved ground until emptied late.
Began only fairly, sat in behind midfield, on rail, slightly held at 400M and 300M, continued well before awkward to heels over final 50M.
Travelled in midfield, along the rail, ran on okay in the straight.
Bumped start, settled to race in about midfield, 2 wide, was one paced.
Settled one-out one-back, awkward to heels at 400M, didn't show a turn of foot.
Took back, raced at the rear, wide but with cover, did not threaten.
Stumbled at start, trapped very wide in midfield, improved from 800M, stayed on till weakened 200M out. (See Incident Report)
Asked and allowed forward gradually, remained wide and no cover, run ended from 350M.
Niggled along, sat in front of midfield, wide but with cover, showed nothing, not competitive.

Vied for early lead, obtained rails run in the front passing the 1200 metres, held narrow advantage until headed 500 metres out, renewed effort along the rail in straight to assert authority 150 metres out, eased near finish.
Pressed forward from a wide gate to join the leaders, disputed lead rounding home bend and hit the front into straight, unable to sustain effort and headed over 200 metres out.
Settled in midfield from a moderate start, inconvenienced and carried back to 11th some 5L back rounding home bend, finished off the race well inside final 150 metres, did best work late.
Settled in midfield on the rail, gained closer when pace slackened on top of home bend and came within 2L of the pace into straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Chased the leader into home straight, came under pressure to challenge upon straightening, unable to quicken to threaten.

Soon taken back for rails run, picked up steadily to 10th just worse than midfield 1000 metres out, snuck up into straight to reach 3L 7th 300 metres out, unable to sustain effort inside final 150 metres.
Taken back from the widest gate and trailed the field to the 600 metres, did not find much room early in straight, produced good late impression closing stages.

Crowded at start settling wide without cover in forward of midfield, made short-lived effort inside the 500 metres to join race leaders briefly when 4-wide into straight, no further impression. (Tactic questioned)

Very wide in midfield early, taken back to last few over 1100 metres out, circled the field rounding home bend to be briefly up with the pace when 5-wide over 500 metres out, weakened steadily in straight.

Crowded at start, soon picked up to 5th within 2L of pace, lost position passing the 900 metres dropping to midfield 700 metres out, re-gained closer 3-wide when pace slackened on home bend, unable to sustain effort after straightening.
Settled 3-wide in rear of midfield, became 4-wide on top of home bend and even wider into straight, never a danger.
Ridden along in first few settling one-out-one-back approaching first turn, switched out for a run entering home straight, soon weakened under pressure. (Tactic questioned)
Travelled 3-wide in last few, given reminders 500 metres out, found nil.
Settled in last few dropping to tail-end over 500 metres out, no further impression.
Went forward to be tracking leader on inside, travelled strongly into contention, moved up to lead 150M, kept on well to the line late holding rivals at bay.
Stumbled at the start and lost ground, failed to muster and ended up in last further back than intended, plenty to do 400M, flew home to claim 2nd before line, nearest finish.
From wide draw caught wide no cover throughout the race, moved closer home turn, fought on steadily to line, nearest line.
Chased leader 2-wide, vied for lead from 500M, driven to hold lead until near 150M, edged out to 4th near line.
Always in touch, scrubbed along 500M, moved up to 3rd mid-straight and had his chance, one paced final stages.
Held up behind midfield, pushed along 500M out, stayed on mildly to the line, always held by leaders.
Raced in midfield along the 3-path, swung wide into straight, stayed on moderately to the line, not reached leaders.
Settled towards rear of midfield, lost ground 700M when unable to improve between horses, made limited progress up the inside on straightening, no threat to leaders.
Never far off from leaders, kept on one pace when driven on straightening. Made no impression.
Went forward to lead as expected, joined by rival 500M, soon no extra 300M, weakened away.
Held up behind mid-division, couldn't go on turning for home, weakened passing 350M to finish last.
Commenced well from the widest draw, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, a length or so back on turn, travelled comfortably to turn, hard ridden from 350M, hit the front 150M, kept on very well to the line.
Began well from a wide draw, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2-1/2L back turning in, finished off well to take 2nd, always held.
Crowded start, raced towards rear on the outside, 6 lengths or so back on turn, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to take a place, nearest on line.
Bumped start, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, 2 wide turning in, closed off well without threatening.
Began well from gate 10, sent forward to take the lead, enjoyed the easy lead to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Shifted in at start and made contact, raced 3 wide with cover slightly behind midfield, 5 lengths back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Taken back from gate 13, raced 2 wide at rear, 7 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home without threatening.
Crowded start, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, finished off evenly.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, still 7 to 8 lengths back on turn, passed some tired runners in straight.
Shifted out abruptly at start, raced 3 wide in midfield, no cover throughout, there to turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.

Average to begin, raced 2 wide behind midfield, very difficult to settle near 900M, 5 lengths or so back turning in, showed limited response early in straight, eased final 200M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began fairly, raced towards rear on the inside, angled out 450M, made no progress in straight.
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced 2 wide in midfield, 4 lengths or so back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Began smartly, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground throughout, showed no response early in straight, weakened and eased final 300M.

Began fairly, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, angled out after passing 500M, showed very good response in straight, hit the front 200M, kept on very well to the line.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move after passing 550M, very wide into straight, finished off strongly to take 2nd, always held.
Began smartly, raced prominently, 3 wide, there to turn, took the lead early in straight, peaked and headed near 200M, ran on evenly to take a place.
Jumped well, sent forward to race prominently, 2 wide, challenged the leader turning in, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Moderately away, positioned 2 wide, a length or so back, unable to obtain clear running until final 150M, made some progress thereafter.
Out in line, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, carried wider after passing 550M, showed limited response in straight.
Average to begin, positioned on rail in midfield, angled out after passing 600M, showed limited response in straight.
Slowly away, raced towards rear on the inside, 7 lengths back, moved closer in the middle stages, angled out 500M, showed limited response in straight.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, very wide into straight, made no progress in the run home.
Taken back from gate 13, raced at tail, 9 lengths back, still 6 lengths behind the leader on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced 2 wide at rear, 6 to 7 lengths back on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Fast into stride, sent forward to take the lead, led by 1/2L, challenged turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened final 350M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped well from gate 1, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, peaked on turn, weakened and eased early in straight, unacceptable performance.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Began smartly from gate 1, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, commenced move after passing 400M, finished off very strongly to score by a narrow margin. (Lost right hind plate near 400M.)

Began well, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move after passing 500M, showed very good response in straight, hit the front approaching 100M, kept on very well but unable to hold off the winner close home.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, wider turning in, closed off well to take a place without threatening the first two.
Average to begin, raced towards rear on the inside, 4 lengths or so back on turn, kept to inside after straightening and made good progress to make frame.
Jumped with them, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, challenged the leader on turn, kept on well to 100M, no extra thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the outside, 5 lengths or so back, very wide into straight, finished off well without threatening.
Moderately away from gate 11, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back, commenced move 450M, very wide turning in, made some headway in straight.

Clean jump, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, 3 lengths or so back, wider turning in, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line. (Lost right front plate in the early stages.) (See Racing Incidents.)
Out in line, sent forward to take the lead, challenged on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked 150M, headed 100M, weakened thereafter. (Lost left front plate on jumping.)
Taken back from gate 9, raced 2 wide at rear, 5 lengths or so back, wider turning in, one-paced in the run home.

Away with them, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M. (Had a very restricted action all round and a sore back on the morning after racing.)
Moderately away, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, unable to maintain position from 500M, eased early in straight. (Irregular heart rhythm.)
Pushed early, sat in front of midfield, 2 wide, dashed strongly 300M to score.
Hard ridden to cross in front, obtain box seat, bumped 250M, closed off strongly.
Pushed early, took rail in midfield, unleashed strong finishing efforts 250M.
Hard ridden forward, 2-3 wide, made early move 450M, just held ground in straight.
Progressed steadily forward to sit outside the leader, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, out of fuel 200M, on heels 150M.
Slow away, at back, raced keenly, 2 wide, ran on ok.
Eased at start, took rail, little dash 200M.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, little dash 200M.
Eased back, 2-3 wide, no progress, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
In front of midfield along the fence, soon emptied 350M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Sent forward, raced next to the leader after 400M, closed off nicely to score by 1-3/4L.
Taken back, passing 1000M lay in, 2 wide, fought on nicely to the line in the last 50M.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, ran on reasonably for 3rd.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, showed little dash only in the last 100M.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide passing 500M, only one paced to the line.
Sent forward and raced behind the leader, found no extra for final 100M.
Taken back, crowded for room near 1000M and 2 wide, closed off fairly late.
At rear, 2 wide after passing 500M, ran on only fairly.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide after 500M, only one paced to the line.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, wakened passing 200M.
Sent forward and took lead, showed nothing after passing 150M. (Lame left hind and roarer)
Taken back and at rear, never a factor. Unacceptable performance, must trial.
Obtained good position 1,1 throughout. Travelled strongly approaching corner, cruised up to the lead under little ridding approaching 125m mark, pushed out late to hold half-length advantage on line.

Steadied after start, raced in second half before being left 3 deep & without cover from 1100m. Continued to improve position around field when racing wide, cornered only 1L behind before fighting strongly to hold second.

Raced prominently after start, settling second, away from rail in early & middle stages. Moved up to take lead 250m, continued to hold narrow advantage until being joined by winner near 125m, overpowered late, only beaten 1L.

No speed at start & drifted back to be third last early. Moved 3 wide with cover 1100m & improved to midfield passing half-way. Continued to improve position passing 600m, cornered 2.5L behind before finishing steadily late.

Raced in midfield along the rail throughout. Shifted off the rail soon after straightening when just over 2L from lead before finishing off steadily down near the rail in the late stages to be beaten under 2L.
Raced 3 wide in midfield leaving straight first time before getting one off rail near 1100m. Cornered just over 3L behind, finished off one paced to midfield without threatening.
Had soft run on leaders back throughout. Stayed close to the rail on cornering, emptied mid-straight & gave a few lengths late. Plain.

Shifted across to race in midfield, away from the rail throughout. Drifted slightly further back when racing between runners near half-way. Entered last section 4L behind, only held margin in dash to line.

Didn't begin fast, shifted down to rail soon after start & raced in midfield after start. Shuffled further back passing 600m mark, soon second last, stayed close to the inside in straight but never challenged.
Ridden forward after start to come across from gate 9 to lead. Joined & headed near the 250m before weakening out thereafter. Well held.
Shifted behind runners from outside gate & raced at tail. Cont'd last entering last section, shifted to be widest runner in straight before failing to make an impact in run home.
Drifted back after start & raced rearward throughout. Shifted 4 wide to commence run passing 600m, widest on cornering before weakening out in straight to be last. (Lame post-race).
Made contact at start, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, angled out near 350M, finished off strongly to score.
Moderately away, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, there to turn, angled out early in straight, finished off strongly to take 2nd, just beaten narrowly.
Away well, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, taken wide in straight and finished off strongly to take a place, nearest on line.
Out in line, sent forward to race prominently, 2 wide, 1/2L back on turn, hit the front 200M, peaked and headed near 75M, weakened gradually thereafter. (Blood in trachea.)
Taken back from gate 9, raced 2 wide at rear, moved closer on turn, found rail approaching 400M, made good progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Jumped with them, raced towards rear on the outside, 5 lengths back on turn, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced slightly behind midfield on the outside, very wide into straight, finished off evenly. (Lost left front plate.)
Away with them, sent forward to take the lead, led by 1/2L on turn, peaked early in straight, headed 200M, weakened final 100M.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Average to begin, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Out with rest, raced better than midfield on the outside, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight when hard run took effect.
Missed the start, at tail throughout.
Jumped smartly, found spot and cover in front of midfield, 2 wide, ran on nicely to win by 1-1/4L.
In midfield, along the rail, closed off strongly inside final 100M, finished 2nd, 1-1/4L behind.
Bumped start, in midfield 2 wide, keen near 800M, stayed well to the line to take 3rd.
Outside lead and about 1L off initially, shuffled back when allowed another to cross at 600M, was one paced.
Rolled forward along inside rail, took lead, emptied and faded passing 100M.
Slotted in behind midfield, 2 wide, made ground in the straight, closed off fairly.
Steadied and shifted across, sat behind midfield, on rail, saved ground and ran on okay.
Bumped start, taken back and at rear, drifted away from rail at 500M, made ground, ran on ok.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, was one paced until late when awkward to heels.
Awkward start, midfield initially, gradually moved forward and sat outside lead at 600M, stayed on till 150M.
Bumped start, then taken back, at rear 2 wide, did not feature.
Hard ridden, sat in midfield, wide and no cover all way, gave ground 400M out and was eased down.

Settled well behind after crowded at the start, trailed the field until headway over 450 metres out, angled off the rail but baulked for a run on straightening, quickened well inside final 200 metres to snatch victory close to home.

Ridden along from the widest gate travelling wide with occasional cover in prominent position in 5th, remained similar turning in home straight, quickened under pressure to hit the front briefly over 100 metres out.
Jumped well, gradually settled in rear of midfield in 8th mainly 3-wide, went the widest turning for home, ran on well down the centre of the track.

Jumped awkwardly losing ground, soon recovered to one back position behind leading trio in 4th, niggled along from rounding home bend, tight between runners early in straight, fought on steadily without threatening.

Broke well from the middle draw but soon dropped over 3L back in midfield in 7th approaching the back straight despite ridden along, renewed effort rounding final bend, fought on steadily without threatening.
Ridden up with the pace, gained narrow advantage at the 700 metres, found no extra when headed 150 metres out.

Ridden to slender lead on the rail early, ceded advantage to share the pace turning into back straight, held every chance early in final straight, could find no extra under pressure inside final 100 metres.
Crowded at start, dropped to last few despite ridden along, saved ground on the inside turning for home, kept on same pace under pressure without quickening.
Niggled along in first few after moderate start, gradually drifted back to 3L 6th in back straight and further back in 7th 3-wide rounding home bend, went wider into home straight, one-paced.

Jumped well from the one draw, gradually settled in forward of midfield in 7th just over 3L off the pace, drifted further back to 9th over 700 metres out, snuck up on the rails turning in, no extra inside final 150 metres.
Settled in rear, made short-lived effort inside the 800 metres, disappointed for a run inside the 200 metres, made no further impression.
Shared the lead 3-wide, shifted back slightly coming onto home bend, soon weakened after straightening. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Held up 3-wide in mid-division, driven and made good progress from top of straight, got up just in time.
Began awkwardly, gradually moved up to be chasing leaders entering home turn, ran on well on straightening, briefly led near 50M, caught last stride.
Always prominent, caught wide no cover chasing the pace until moving closer to the fence 550M, fought on steadily inside 300M, not pace of first 2 final stages.
Began only fairly, reserved in mid-division, did best work late staying on strongly final 200M, nearest finish.
In touch, in 5th place home turn, kept on moderately under top weight over final 300M, held by first few final stages.
Soon led, upped the tempo 600M, went clear early straight, no extra and caught by rivals 50M out.
Soon dropped back to the rear, 7Ls behind rounding home turn, wide into straight, ran on to the line but never seriously threatened.
Never far off the pace, moved up to 3rd entering home turn, battled on to 200M, weakened towards the line.
Taken back from wide draw, settled near last, made no real progress in the straight, never dangerous on his Hong Kong debut.
Restrained to race towards the rear, failed to quicken when asked on straightening. No impression.
Began awkwardly, driven to chase leaders early stages, shuffled back to a position behind midfield home turn, couldn't go on in the straight.
Chased leader early stages, came under pressure midway, gave ground noticeably rounding the home turn, soon eased as the rider thought the horse may have gone amiss.

Commenced well from gate 1, raced better than midfield on the inside, 2 lengths or so back, 2 wide from 400M, showed very good response in straight, hit the front approaching 150M, kept on strongly to the line.

Bumped shortly after start and unbalanced, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 5 lengths or so back, commenced move 500M, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Bumped start, positioned on rail in midfield, 3 to 4 lengths back, easy run on turn, angled out 350M, bumped early in straight, made good progress thereafter to take a place.
Clean jump, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, took the lead approaching 400M, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed near 150M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Slow to begin, raced at rear on the inside, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced 3 wide better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, a length or so back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 to 7 lengths back, very wide turning in, made some progress in straight.
Slowly away, raced at tail, 7 lengths behind the leader on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Shifted in at start, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, bumped early in straight, showed limited response thereafter, weakened final 100M.
Jumped with them, raced behind midfield on the inside, angled out 400M, bumped early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out 400M, bumped and unbalanced early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Clean jump, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, peaked and headed approaching 400M, weakened final furlong. (Lame left front leg.)

Always in touch, made steady headway form 350M, stayed on well final stages to lead 50M from home.
Away well, positioned 2 wide, 3 lengths or so back, same position to turn, closed off well to take 2nd on line.
Went forward from wide draw chasing the leader, had his chance, outsprinted by winner final 50M, lost 2nd final stride.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, led by 3/4L on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked on run 100M, headed 50M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide behind midfield, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run to be nearest on line.
Awkward away, recovered to a midfield position, stayed on steadily passing 400M, held by leaders late stages.
Away with them, raced behind midfield on the inside, 2 wide from 500M, made reasonable progress in straight.
Average to begin, raced at rear, 7 lengths back, 3 wide with cover on turn, very wide into straight, made some progress in the run home. (Blood in trachea.)
Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, carried wider from 500M, finished off evenly.
Bumped start, raced at rear on the outside, 7 lengths or so back, very wide turning in, made little progress in straight.
Dropped back to last, switched wide to challenge on straightening, made limited progress. No impression on leaders.
Bumped start, held up in midfield along the fence, pushed along 550M but failed to quicken, never a threat.
Caught wide no cover chasing leaders, no extra from 350M, weakened away. (Roarer.)
Moderately away, chased leader on the inside, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M. (Epiglottic entrapment.)
Eased to sit just off the leader, closed off strongly 300M to score.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, hung well until 150M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
In front of midfield, 2 wide, progressed steadily 300M for 3rd.
Midfield along the fence, lack room 400M, progressed steadily when clear.
Slow away, at rear, on the fence, held up 4-2, made steady ground when clear.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, 2 wide, blocked 4-2, progressed steadily when clear.
Pushed early, trapped 3 wide in midfield, made ground 250M.
At back, trapped 3-4 wide, made ground 250M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Eased to sit in midfield along the fence, no progress.
Pushed forward, trapped 3 wide, out of fuel 250M.
Slow away, at back, 2 wide, never improved, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Pushed forward, emptied 300M, was found have blood in the mouth, substantial mucus in trachea noted on post-race scoping.
Never competitive at rear.
Taken back and at rear, 2 wide, made ground impressively and scored by 3/4L.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, passing 300M was disappointed for running and showed strong dash passing 200M after shifting in.
At rear, 2 wide, made ground steadily to the line for 3rd.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, battled on to the line but headed in the last 50M.
Raced in worse than midfield, 3 wide but with cover, kept up until weakened at 50M.
At rear, along the rail after 800M, made ground but ran on only fairly in the Straight.
Began awkwardly, in midfield, 2 wide, after 850M travelled keenly, pretty one paced.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, swung widest on Straightening, showed no turn on foot.
Sent forward and raced next to the leader, 2 wide, weakened after passing 100M.
At rear, along the rail, not competitive in the Straight.
Settled in one-out one-back passing 850M, in the Straight lost ground.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, nothing in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, did not featured.
At rear, wide no cover after 850M, showed nothing.
Lovely run 1,1 throughout. Moved up to the lead at the 200m mark before drawing away in concluding stages to win by over 2L.
Showed good speed after start to race outside the leader. Moved up to share lead near 300m before being passed by winner soon after before battling well to narrowly hold distant second.

Drifted back & shifted behind runners form outside gate to settle 3 wide in midfield with cover. Eased wider passing 500m, cornered widest before closing off well in concluding stages to just miss second on line.
Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Entered last section 3L form the lead before working home evenly to be just behind second, beaten 2.5L on line.
Steadied from second widest gate & dragged back to last soon after start. Continued at the rear on cornering, widest in straight before making late headway form the rear when running onto midfield.

Commenced awkwardly & was a clear last immediately after start before improving along the rail to race in midfield from the 800m. Shifted outwards approaching 300m mark before finishing only fairly to midfield.

Raced along the rail, following the leader before improving onto leaders back from half-way. Entered last section under 2L from the lead before emptying at furlong mark & weakening out quickly thereafter.
Began very fast to lead. Joined & headed passing 300m mark before weakening out in last furlong to be nearly 6L behind.

Steadied after start & drifted back to race third last along the rail. Shifted away from the inside on cornering, entered last section 5L from the lead before making no notable headway in straight & being well held.
Raced 3 wide with cover in midfield throughout. Eased 4 wide on cornering, straightened just over 3L from the lead before weakening out in final 300m to be over 6L behind.
Didn't begin fast & raced 4th from last, 3 wide with cover. Shifted wider on straightening when about 5L form the lead before failing to improve in the straight & weakening to be well beaten.

Steadied after the start & shifted towards the rear before being relegated to second last approaching 800m. Straightened 6L from the lead before being hampered by fallen rider & playing no part over final 300m.

Began awkwardly & bumped before improving position passing 900m to race 3 wide without cover outside leading pair. Began losing ground passing 500m before weakening out very badly to be distant last. (Irregular heart rhythm).

Placing: UR
Comment: Raced just worse than midfield between runners. Travelled strongly approaching corner before clipping heels near the 400m mark & dislodging rider.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably throughout, ridden after passing 300M, showed very good response, easily scored.
Jumped well, positioned 2 wide, 3 lengths or so back, angled out after passing 450M, finished off strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide behind midfield, commenced move 450M, very wide turning in, made good progress in straight to take a place without threatening.
Clean jump, positioned 1 out 1 back, there to turn, kept on evenly in straight.
Jumped with them, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, saved ground on turn, made some progress in straight.
Began well from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Moderately away, raced 3 wide slightly behind midfield, no cover on turn, peaked early in straight, kept on evenly thereafter.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide at rear, 8 lengths back, very wide turning in, made minor progress in straight.
Moderately away, raced at rear on the inside, 7 lengths or so back, there to turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the outside, 8 lengths or so back, very wide turning in, one-paced in straight.
Average to begin, raced in midfield on the outside, 4 lengths or so back, 2 wide on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 150M. (Mucus.)
Began fairly, raced 2 wide behind midfield early, found rail 900M, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide behind midfield early, 2 wide from 900M, 7 lengths back turning in, showed no response early in straight, eased final 150M.
Stumbled at start and bumped, raced in 2nd, 2 wide on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Raced in one-out one-back position, kicked away on straightening, kept on well to the line to win by a neck.
In about midfield, along the rail, battled on nicely to the line for 2nd, finished a neck behind.
Began only fairly, settled behind midfield, on rail, ran on well to take 3rd.
Rolled forward, took up the box-seat, bumped at 350M, continued on well to the line.
Bumped start, sat just behind midfield, wide but with cover, held up near 400M, ran on fairly.
Eased and shifted across to rail, at rear, showed dashes, switched course at 200M, continued on fairly.
Settled to race in midfield, 2 wide, ran on moderately only.
Bumped start, hard ridden to sit outside lead, stayed on till 200M and then emptied.
Travelled in midfield, wide and without cover, showed no dash.
Ridden forward to take rail and led, bumped and headed at 350M, faded out thereafter.
Jumped well, in midfield but found no cover, wide throughout, one paced and emptied late.
Bumped start, took back and raced at the tail, 2 wide, saved no ground in the straight. (Mucus in trachea)
Crowded start, raced in worse than midfield, 2 wide, did not threaten.
Bumped start, then taken back, at rear and wide but with cover, green throughout, never a factor. (minor laceration below the right hock)
Settled in mid-division of the main body of the field and distant 7th overall, commenced move rounding home bend and quickened well to hit the front 200 metres out, hung on well to the line.

Ridden along in first few, settled in distant 3rdsome 9L off the fast pace, commenced move from approaching home bend and hit the front briefly over 200 metres out, unable to sustain effort closing stages.

Settled in joint 5th and just over 1L behind the leader of the main body of the field, commenced move from approaching home bend reaching joint 4th some 4L back into straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Settled in last few, ridden and given reminders rounding home bend, fought on steadily in straight without threatening.

Prominent early, came to take up running in fast tempo turning into back straight establishing quick sectionals, came back steadily from over 5L clear onto home bend and headed 300 metres out, no extra. (Jockey warned)
Crowded early settling in mid-division of the main body of the field and 8th overall, hampered a couple of times rounding home bend between 600 and 500 metres, kept on well in straight.
Travelled wide without cover in last few, commenced move rounding home bend, kept on one pace without quickening.

Began well from the one draw settling in joint 5th some 11L off the pacemaker but within 2L of leaders of the main body of the field, left flat-footed briefly rounding home bend, saved ground turning in but found no extra in straight.
Settled in last few on the rail, angled out for a run entering home straight, made no further impression.
Soon taken back from a wide gate, never seen with a chance.
Settled well behind from the widest gate, never seen with a chance.

Pressed forward to lead rounding first bend, ceded advantage to fast-paced leader into back straight, remained in distant 2nd until approaching home straight, weakened steadily straight.(Questioned for disappointing performance)
Settled in 3rd and a joint leader of the main body of the field some 9L off the pacemaker, similar when 4th over 1000 metres out, dropped out under pressure inside final 300 metres.
Never far off leaders in a fast run race, in touch passing 400M, quickened past leader near 100M, held on late to win in track record time.
Reserved in midfield, 5Ls off the fast pace middle stages, driven and ran on well under top weight from 400M, got up for 2nd close home, nearest finish.
Led passing 1400M, set fast pace upfront, kept going well in straight, headed near 100M, weakened late, held on for 3rd just.
Unable to cross from wide draw, dropped back and held up near last in a fast run race, lay out from 800M, made good progress over final 300M, just missed 3rd.
Held up in midfield, stayed on mildly final 300M, safely held by first 4.
Dropped back to a rearward position along the 3-path, no cover from 1000M, not going the pace to challenge on straightening, no impression on leaders.
Slowly away, settled towards the rear in a fast run race, steadied from heels of rivals 350M losing momentum, ran on without threat over final 300M.
Chased leader in a fast run race, failed to quicken turning home, run ended 200M, weakened towards the line. (Lame RF leg.)
In 3rd chasing the fast pace, held ground early straight, lacked further response passing 200M, faded away.
Soon ended up in last, always under pressure, didn't travel well at any stage, never in the picture.
Settled ahead of midfield, came under pressure 600M, gave ground passing 300M and finished last.
Began smartly, showed good speed to take the lead, travelled comfortably on turn, kept on very well in straight, easily scored.

Began well, raced better than midfield but trapped very wide early, moved closer after passing 1000M, 2 wide from 800M, 2nd on turn, kept on well in straight without threatening the winner. (See Racing Incidents.)
Away well, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, 2 lengths back on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared near 250M, finished off well to take a place without threatening.
Jumped well from a wide draw, raced better than midfield on the outside, moved closer on turn, kept on evenly in straight.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, similar position on turn, finished off evenly. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began smartly from gate 1, positioned right behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, showed limited response early in straight, one-paced final furlong.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 6 to 7 lengths back, angled out after passing 550M, very wide into straight, closed off well without threatening.
Crowded start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, there to turn, finished off evenly.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide behind midfield, carried wider after passing 500M, kept on evenly in straight, never dangerous.
Bumped start, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Moderately away, raced at rear on the outside, very wide turning in, showed limited response in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Crowded shortly after start, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the inside, 6 lengths back on turn, unable to obtain clear running until final 150M, made no impression thereafter.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.

Jumped well from gate 1, positioned 1-1/2L behind the leader on rail, easy run on turn, angled out early in straight, hard ridden 300M, hit the front 150M, kept on strongly to the line, easily scored.
Bumped start, positioned on rail in midfield, 3 lengths back, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, closed off well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Clean jump, raced 2 wide in midfield, 2 to 3 lengths back, there to turn, kept on well in straight to take a place without threatening.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed near 150M, weakened gradually final 50M.
Jumped well from gate 11, raced prominently, 2 wide, there to turn, kept on well to 150M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Taken back from gate 12, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, bumped early in straight, made good progress thereafter without threatening.
Away with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider turning in, bumped early in straight, one-paced in the run home.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, very wide turning in, one-paced in straight.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide better than midfield, travelled keenly near 900M, 1-1/2L back on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened and eased final 150M.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, 7 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, failed to close off in straight.
Taken back from gate 10, raced at rear throughout, never a factor. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced in midfield on the outside, similar position on turn, weakened early in straight.
Jumped well, raced 3 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Had nice run in midfield on rail. Entered last section just over 2L from the lead, shifted over heals approaching 300m, dashed to lead at 225m before continuing on to win softly on the line.

Raced in midfield away from the rail without cover in middles stages. Moved closer to lead approaching corner, entered last section just over 2L behind before finishing well to move to second place passing 150m.

Raced in third place in the clear behind the first two who raced well clear in middle stages. Moved off rail on straightening, entered last section under 2L from lead, dashed to share second at 150m, held third on line.

Steadied from the widest gate & drifted back to second last. Was a long way behind passing half-way before moving wide to improve at 600m. Very wide on cornering when 5.5L behind before making significant late ground to 4th.
Steadied & drifted back to race worse than midfield along the rail. Continued along the inside on cornering when about 6L behind before closing off steadily from the rear to halve margin on the line.

Showed early speed to lead before being headed at 1100m & racing second, 2L behind easy leader in middle stages. Moved over heels 500m, dashed to lead at 400m until being joined by winner 225m & weakening a few lengths late.
Crowded at the start & consequently got further back & raced worse than midfield between runners. Straightened over 6L behind before making up a few lengths to finish in midfield without threatening.

Drifted back to race third last away from rail in early & middle stages. Shifted wider on cornering, entered last section over 7L behind before making steady late progress when running onto midfield from rearward position.

Raced prominently early before improving along rail to take the lead near the 1100m. Continued in lead holding 2L advantage in middles stages, joined & headed on straightening before weakening out poorly in final 250m.

Shifted across to midfield but was left racing 3 wide without cover throughout. Continued wide around bend, straightened just over 4L behind before emptying early in the straight & weakening final 250m.

Crowded at start & consequently raced rearward before making up some ground along the rail to midfield in middle stages. Was hard ridden prior to straightening before weakening out further in the straight to be well beaten.

Was slow to begin & then had no early speed & was tailed out a long last soon after start. Continued to be hard ridden down back straight & raced 12L from lead at the 800m. Failed to run on from the rear & was never a factor.

Began awkwardly, shifted across to midfield when 4 wide early before getting cover in 3 wide line near the 900m. Continued wide around bend, straightened just over 6L behind before weakening poorly to be long second last.
Bumped at start before obtaining position in midfield between runners throughout. Was hard ridden prior to straightening when about 5.5L behind before weakening badly in the straight to be long last.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jumped with them, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground to turn, finished off very strongly to score.
Crowded on jumping, raced at tail, 8 lengths back, a bit closer in the middle stages, commenced move 400M, taken wide in straight and finished off very strongly, nearest on line.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide towards rear, 3 wide approaching 600M, very wide into straight, finished off well to take a place without threatening. (Mucus.)
Made contact at start, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, a bit closer after passing 800M, hard ridden 400M, kept on well to 50M, no extra thereafter.
Began smartly from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Out in line, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, kept on well early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Away with them, raced 2 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, kept on evenly early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.

Moderately away from the widest draw, trapped very wide in midfield early, moved closer after passing 1300M, raced in 2nd, 2 wide in the middle stages, wider turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Out with rest, raced at rear on the outside, 7 lengths or so back on turn, very wide into straight, one-paced in the run home.
Shifted out at start and made contact, positioned 2 wide in midfield, dropped to rear on turn, weakened and eased early in straight.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced behind midfield on the outside, peaked on turn, emptied early in straight.
Bumped start, raced slightly better than midfield on the outside, peaked on turn, emptied and eased early in straight.
Pushed to take rail and lead, made all.
Pushed forward, obtained box seat, ran on well for 2nd.
Midfield, 2 wide, dashed well 300M for 3rd.
Hard ridden forward, sat outside the leader, weakened 100M.
Checked start, at back, trapped 3 wide, dashed well 250M.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, no progress, rider concerned horse's action during racing.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, ran on fairly.
Very slow away, at back, trapped 3 wide, ran on ok, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
At back, 2 wide, no dash.
Hard ridden forward, travelled wide and without cover, emptied 300M.
Very slow away, never a factor.
Slow away, never competitive.
Sent forward and raced behind the leader after 700M, along the rail, kept on going and held off challenge to score.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, battled on to the line and took 2nd.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, stayed on and finished 3rd.
Settled to race in midfield, along the rail, in the Straight made ground steadily to the line.
At rear, 2 wide, saved ground and ran on well to the line.
Raced in front of midfield, lay in near 650M, 2 wide, flattened after passing 100M. (Blood in trachea and see incident report)
Sent forward and raced prominently, 2 wide, only one paced in the Straight.
At rear, along the rail, showed nothing in the Straight.
Raced in front of midfield, wide no cover, showed no turn on foot.
At rear, along the rail, did not improved in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, lost ground in the Straight.
At rear, 2 wide, did not feature.
Ridden forward from second widest gate & raced outside the leader. Moved up to assume lead near the 125m before continuing on to hold 1L advantage on line.

Shifted across to midfield after the start bit was left racing three wide & without cover throughout. Moved to third place soon after cornering before closing off well to move to second in late stages despite wide passage.
Raced in midfield on rail throughout. Moved into clear running on straightening before closing off strongly in last furlong to be fast finishing third.
Showed early speed to lead. Headed & passed by winner near the 125m mark before over-run for minor placing in final stages.

Raced just worse than midfield between runners throughout. Hampered & lost ground when rival horse fell near 500m, entered last section 5L behind before finishing well down outside to be 2L behind. Good given circumstances.
Obtained nice position on leaders back throughout. Entered last section only 2L behind before doing not much in the straight & weakening a length or so to midfield.
Raced 1,1 throughout early & middle stages. Crowded & lost ground near the 500m mark before entering last section 4L behind. Failed to improve in straight & was never a threat.

Steadied early before niggled along to hold rearward position. Continued rearward before being badly checked & losing ground behind fallen rival at 500m. Gave further ground in straight but never in contention after incident.
Had no speed at start & raced second last on rail. Continued near rear before being checked & losing a length or two near 500m before weakening out poorly in the straight to be long way behind.

Reared at start & lost ground before rejoining field near the 1000m. Continued last before being badly checked & losing significant ground behind fallen rival near 500m before being eased out of race. Forget run.

Placing: FE
Comment: Had no early speed before getting position just worse than midfield when racing three wide with cover. Clipped heels near the 500m mark & fell heavily. Vet inspection post-race revealed horse to be lame.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide better than midfield, a length or so back on turn, finished off strongly to score by a narrow margin.
Jumped well, raced prominently, 2 wide, took the lead after passing 450M, led by 1/2L turning in, kept on very well in straight, just unable to hold off the winner on line.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 2 wide towards rear, 3 wide from 500M, made very good progress in straight to take a place, nearest finish.
Taken back from gate 11, raced at rear on the outside, 5 lengths or so back, very wide into straight, finished off strongly to make frame.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 6 lengths back on turn, no clear run early in straight, cleared 250M, closed off well without threatening.
Began awkwardly, raced behind midfield on the inside, 2 wide from 500M, 5 lengths back turning in, made some progress in straight.
Began only fairly and bumped, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, commenced move 500M, very wide turning in, weakened early in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began well, raced 3 wide better than midfield, no cover for the majority of the race, peaked 400M, weakened early in straight.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, headed near 450M, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Bumped start and unbalanced, raced in midfield on outer, similar position on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Jumped well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, unable to maintain position from 500M, showed no response early in straight, eased final 100M.
Failed to find cover early, allowed forward into the lead near 1300M, didn't look back to win impressively by 3L.
Led on rail until crossed near 1300M, maintained position in box-seat, closed off nicely for 2nd, but no match to winner.
Settled to race in midfield, along the rail, kept on well to the line for 3rd.
Travelled just in front of midfield, 2 wide, no dash to catch leaders, pretty one paced to the finish.
In worse than midfield, shuffled back to be at rear near 1000M, improved steadily to the line.
Rolled forward, sat outside lead until 700M when crossed, lost touch from 500M, was ordinary in the straight.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, ran on but didn't threaten.
Failed to muster, at rear until commencing to improve near 1000M, wide and no cover throughout, saved no ground.
Took back, at rear before commencing to improve at 1000M, outside lead by 700M, gradually faded in the straight.
In worse than midfield, 2 wide then shifted 3 wide near 700M, had cover, made no impact.
Bumped start, sat just behind midfield, wide but with cover, not competitive.
At rear, on rail until shifted 2 wide at 900M, failed to run on.
Travelled well without cover in prominent position, came to join the leaders 3-wide rounding home bend and hit the front over 200 metres out, won readily .
Ridden positively from the one gate, taken one back passing the 800 metres, in similar position turning in, held some chance on the inside early in straight but unable to quicken to threaten.
Settled behind midfield from a wide gate, ran on well down the centre of the track from wide into the straight.
Taken back to wide in midfield after beginning from the widest gate, in similar position entering home straight, fought on steadily without troubling the place-getters.
Sharing the pace before gaining slender advantage over 450 metres out, led until finding no extra over 250 metres out.
Settled at the back from a wide gate, trailed the field into the straight, ran on well between runners for a promising debut.
Settled in midfield on the rail within 3L of the pace, in similar position entering home straight, kept on same pace.
Never far off in one-out-one-back position, one-paced from a similar position into the straight.
Prominent and wide when gradually taken back to midfield, remained wide without cover throughout back straight and around home bend, widest runner turning for home, kept on well to the line.
Crowded shortly after the start settling in rear on the rail, tightened 600 metres out, saved ground turning for home, made no impression in straight.
Pressed forward from moderate start to lead after the first 100 metres, obtained rails run shortly after, joined passing the 600 metres and weakened under pressure after straightening.
Prominent and wide without cover from a wide gate, found nothing under pressure into the straight. (Bled)
Chased leaders early stages, wide no cover form 950M, moved up to take lead 700M, hard driven in the straight to hold off the persistent 2nd. (Protest from 2nd for interference near 550M overruled.)
Crossed to the lead soon after the start, led until 700M, hampered 550M, driven and fought on well in the straight, pushed winner to the line (Protest on winner for interference near 550M overruled.)
Reserved behind mid-division along the 3-path, closed off fastest last 400M, just missed.
Held up in mid-division, ran on steadily from 300M but couldn't get on terms with first 3.
Tracked the pace, kept on well to press first 2 on straightening, no extra final 50M.
From draw 11 caught 3-wide in midfield throughout the race, driven out 350M, kept on moderately to the line, not reached leaders.
In touch behind leading trio, had every chance turning home, lacked extra final 200M and always held by rivals.
Began very awkwardly and lost ground, settled towards the rear, found disappointing little when asked on straightening, made no real progress on leaders.
Held up behind mid-division, 6Ls to make up turning home, stayed on without threat.
Lost ground when crowded for room on jumping, settled at the rear, ran past beaten horses in the straight, never a threat to main rivals.
Settled midfield early and middle stages, came under pressure when pace quickened up 700M, soon beaten turning into straight.
Held up near last, driven along from 600M but failed to muster the speed. Never in the picture.
Began smartly, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2 lengths or so back on turn, finished off very strongly to score by a neck.
Crowded start, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 lengths back on turn, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Moderately away, raced better than midfield on the outside, 3 lengths or so back on turn, closed off well to take a place.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide in midfield, 4 lengths back on turn, made good progress in straight, blocked close home.
Taken back from gate 11, raced at tail, 7 lengths back on turn, hard ridden 400M, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to be nearest on line.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Made contact at start, raced better than midfield on the outside, sent forward after entering the back straight, 2nd on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced behind midfield on the outside, 5 lengths back on turn, finished off evenly.
Average to begin, raced at rear on the outside, 7 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made minor progress in the run home.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, eased final 100M.
Began well, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground to turn, crowded near 400M, soon beaten, eased final 200M.
Began fairly, raced towards rear on the inside, 7 lengths back turning in, showed no response early in straight, eased final furlong. (Lame right front leg next day.)
