Jumped with them, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, similar position on turn, finished off very strongly to score.
Taken back from gate 12, raced at rear on the inside, angled out after passing 600M, made very good progress in straight to take 2nd.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide behind midfield, commenced move after passing 550M, finished off strongly to take a place.
Began well from the widest draw, taken back to race at tail, 7 lengths back, very wide turning in, made very good progress in straight to make frame.
Away well, raced prominently on the outside, same position to turn, kept on well early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Jumped with them, raced slightly better than midfield on the outside, similar position on turn, made some progress early in straight, no extra final furlong.
Began well from gate 1, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, angled out 450M, no clear run early in straight, cleared 250M, finished off evenly.
Moderately away, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened thereafter.
Missed the start, recovered, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground to turn, no clear run early in straight, cleared 300M, only showed limited response thereafter.
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position to turn, made no progress in straight.
Average to begin, taken back to race towards rear on the outside, very wide turning in, failed to close off in straight. (Roarer.)
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 1 to 2 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M. (Blood in trachea.)
Average to begin, raced better than midfield on the outside, a length or so back, no cover on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Away well, positioned a length behind the leader on the inside, saved ground to turn, weakened early in straight. (Multiple limb lameness next day morning.)
Settled behind the leader, closed off well to score, rider dropped his whip 100M.
Eased to sit off the leader, progressed steadily 250M for 2nd.
Eased to sit off the leader, ran on well for 3rd.
Hard ridden to keep up at the back, lack room 4-2, made steady ground.
Led easily, hung on well until 100M weakened, returned lame right fore after racing.
Stumbled after start, midfield, ran on ok.
Hard ridden to keep up with the field, never improved, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Pushed early to keep up with the field, soon emptied 300M.
Sent forward and raced next to the leader, 2 wide, scored by an impressive margin of 2-3/4L.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, in the Home Straight proved difficult to ride and lay in. Racing manners unacceptable. Must trial.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide after 800M, made ground steadily and continued on well for 3rd.
Raced behind the leader after 850M, along the rail, ran on well to the line and finished 4th.
At rear, along the rail, made ground in the Straight and ran on fairly.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail after 850M, approaching 50M was hampered and unable to be properly tested over the concluding stages.
At rear, 2 wide after 750M, closed off fairly in the Straight.
At rear, 3 wide no cover after 800M, did not improve in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, one paced only.
Settled in one-out one-back position, passing 100M was checked and lost ground, weakened thereafter.
Raced in worse than midfield, 2 wide, did not feature.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, nothing in the Straight.

Obtained good position in midfield away from the rail. Travelled strongly approaching corner, moved into clear running at 400m when 3L from lead before sprinting strongly to strike lead approaching 100m & winning strongly.

Pushed forward from gate 10 but was trapped racing three wide without cover outside the lead for the majority. Moved up to share lead near 350m, continued to battle hard before passed by the winner near 100m, held second.

Pushed forward to race outside the leader. Moved up to share narrow lead at the 350m mark, continued to battle hard to share lead until being over-taken by winner approaching 100m mark. Just missed 2nd, clear of fourth.
Had nice run on leaders back throughout. Finished off only evenly in straight to hold 4th but was over two lengths behind the place-getters who was just in front of him on straightening.
Raced in midfield away from the rail before bumping with winner at 900m mark & racing 3 wide with cover thereafter. Entered last section 3L from lead before finishing off steadily in dash to line.

Didn't begin fast & got back to the tail soon after start. Continued to drift further back in middle stages, 8L behind at the 600m. Shifted wide in the straight before making good late ground for eye-catching midfield finish.

Slow to begin & raced near the tail. Shifted wider approaching the corner when continuing second last, eased wider on straightening before passing a few tiring rivals when running onto midfield from the back.

Steadied from wide gate & drifted back to race 3 wide near the tail. Commenced to improve position passing the 700m when continuing wide. Entered last section about 4L behind before battling away ok in the straight.
Drifted back after the start to race just worse than midfield away from the rail. Straightened 5L from the lead before finishing only one paced in the dash to the line. No threat.
Came across from gate 11 before settling three wide with cover in midfield throughout. Straightened under 2L from the lead before peaking on effort at the 250m mark & giving ground thereafter.

Outpaced after the start & drifted back to settle just worse than midfield on rail. Continued along the rail on straightening when 5L from the lead before giving a length or two in straight when out-sprinted to the line.
Bounded & began very awkwardly at start before mustering speed to position 1,1 throughout. Only 2L behind entering last section before weakening out in final 300m to be well beaten. (Lame).
Began very fast & strode to lead. Was headed at the 350m mark before weakening very badly thereafter to be long last.

Clean jump, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2 to 3 lengths back, travelled well to turn, hard ridden after passing 300M, showed very good response, hit the front 200M, kept on very well to the line.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, there to turn, hard ridden after passing 500M, finished off well to take 2nd, always held.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced towards rear on the inside, 2 wide from 500M, closed off well to take a place.
Began well, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, saved ground to turn, kept on well in straight to make frame without threatening. (See Racing Incidents.)
Away well, raced slightly behind midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, kept on evenly in straight.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, very difficult to settle and bumped near 900M, 5 lengths or so back on turn, made some headway in straight.
Jumped well from a wide draw, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length, travelled well to turn, peaked on run 200M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Began only fairly and crowded, raced slightly behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, finished off evenly.
Moderately away, raced in 2nd, a length behind the leader, there to turn, hard ridden approaching 300M, showed limited response, weakened final 100M.
Bumped and unbalanced shortly after start, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, very wide into straight, made minor progress in straight.
Taken back from gate 13, raced at tail, 9 lengths back, still last turning in, one-paced in straight.
Away with them, raced in midfield on the outside, no cover in the early stages, found cover near 700M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Began fairly, raced 2 wide behind midfield, bumped near 900M, hard ridden after turning in, only showed limited response, weakened thereafter.
Taken back from gate 8, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Bumped start, jumped into lead on outside rail, trotted up to win impressively by 3L.
In the lead with the others, on centre track, continued well to the line to take 2nd.
Bumped start, remained at rear on the outside rail, made nice ground when shifted in for clear running from 400M out.
Bumped start, raced behind the leaders on standside, continued on fairly to the line.
Raced with the leaders on the first line, standside, stayed on until weakened approaching 100M.
Bumped start, sat in behind midfield, on centre track, showed dashes from 400M to 200M, one paced from thereon.
Urged along before settling in midfield, on centre track, ran on only one paced.
Settled in midfield, 2 off the outside rail, maintained one paced home.
Bumped start, in worse than midfield, on outside rail, slightly crowded approaching 400M, then ran on until awkward on heels at 50M.
Always at rear, 2 off the rail on stand side, crowded at 400M, minor dash in final furlong.
Bumped start, in midfield on stand side, shifted away from heels at 200M, showed no kick nonetheless.
Raced prominently, 2 away from outside rail, gradually weakened from about 400M out.
Lost ground at start, in behind midfield on centre track, no kick and run ended passing 300M. (Lost its left front plate)
Sat towards the rear, on centre track, pressured from half way and weakened out, not competitive.
Moderate start, settled in midfield on the rail, checked on heels over 800 metres out, switched out for a run upon straightening, quickened well inside the 200 metres to take charge 50 metres out.

Began well from a low draw, checked behind steadying pace over 800 metres out, travelled keenly behind leader on home bend, quickened well under pressure to hit the front briefly inside the 100 metres, found winner too strong.
Settled just worse than midfield, quickened well inside final 200 metres to be nearest at finish.
Soon picked up a prominent position, came to dispute lead rounding home bend and hit the front narrowly upon straightening, headed inside final 100 metres.
Broke well from the widest gate, obtained rails run in front passing the 900 metres, led until headed into home straight, folded up quickly inside final 50 metres.
Settled in 5th within 3L of pace, gained closer rounding home bend, found nothing under pressure in straight.
Soon dropped to the rear, trailed the field to home straight, did not find much room until closing stages, made up good late ground.
Crowded at start, travelled in last few on the rail, fought on steadily under pressure in the run home.
Well there early, gradually taken 2L back and remained 3-wide without cover, gained steadily closer rounding home bend, unable to sustain effort after straightening.
Gradually taken back from a wide draw, remained wide in last few to straight, fought on steadily under pressure, never nearer.
Settled 3-wide in midfield, weakened noticeably after straightening. (Mucus in trachea)
Bustled along after the start to obtain a handy spot ahead of midfield, into clear 350M, closed off strongly to lead near 150M, driven clear.
Settled 3-wide in midfield, close enough to leaders turning in, kept on well in straight but no match for winner over final 150M.
Reserved in mid-division, 3Ls off the pace at 400M, kept on mildly in straight to go 3rd near line, no impression on first 2.
Held up in midfield along the fence, 3-4Ls off leader in a slow run race, stayed on moderately final 300M for a non-threatening 4th.
Caught wide no cover chasing leaders, challenged for the lead passing 500M, outpaced by pursuing rivals final 150M.
Dropped back to settle towards the rear, 3-wide making the turn for home, kept on moderately final 300M, held by leaders.
From wide draw soon taken across behind runners, reserved at the rear 6-7Ls off the slow pace, stayed on final 300M without troubling leaders.
Went forward to race one out one back, challenged for the lead on straightening, run ended 150M, weakened away.
Towards the rear 5Ls off the pace in a slowly run affair, ran past beaten horses in straight, never in contention.
From wide draw shifted across behind runners to obtain cover, held up near last 6Ls back in a slow run race, ran on fairly in straight, never dangerous.
Dropped back to race towards the rear, no closer than 3-wide during the race, gave only limited response in straight, never threatened.
Soon led, set slow pace in the lead, collared by rivals 300M, fought to 150M, no extra and weakened to near last.
Tracked leaders in a slowly run race, lay out early stages, failed to respond on straightening, weakened mid-straight to finish last.
Shifted out at start and bumped, positioned 2 wide, 3 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, finished off very strongly to score.
Clean jump, raced 2 wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, travelled well throughout, hard ridden approaching 300M, finished off well to take 2nd.
Away well, raced better than midfield on the outside early, moved closer after passing 1100M, sat outside to the leader in the middle stages, kept on well in straight to take a place.
Taken back from gate 13, raced towards rear on the outside, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, taken wide in straight and finished off strongly to make frame, no threat to the first few.
Jumped well from a wide draw, sent forward to take the lead, shared lead on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, weakened thereafter.
Commenced well, unable to slot in, trapped wide slightly behind midfield, very wide into straight, made some progress in the run home.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield early, 4 lengths or so back, 2 wide on turn, finished off evenly.
Began fairly, raced behind midfield on the inside, 4 lengths back, there to turn, finished off evenly.
Away with them, raced 3 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, angled out 500M, failed to close off in straight.
Began only fairly, raced at rear on the inside, bumped and unbalanced near 900M, saved ground on turn, one-paced in the run home.
Began well from gate 10, raced prominently but wide, slightly taken back near 800M but still 3 wide with no cover, peaked on run 400M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Began awkwardly, raced at tail, 7 lengths back, bumped near 900M, same margin back on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, showed no response early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Commenced well, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, took the lead 500M, kept on strongly in straight to score.
Moderately away, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, angled out after passing 500M, finished off well to take 2nd without threatening.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, kept on well in straight to take a place without threatening. (See Racing Incidents.)
Bumped start, positioned 3 wide, 3 lengths or so back, a bit closer on turn, finished off evenly.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 lengths back, there to turn, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, made some progress in straight.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide with cover towards rear, 4 lengths or so back, very wide into straight, made little progress in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 5 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, finished off evenly. (Left front suspensory ligament injury.)
Jumped with them, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover in the middle stages, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, showed limited response early in straight, weakened inside final furlong. (Roarer.)
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced at rear on outer, no cover on turn, very wide into straight, made no progress in the run home.
Began only fairly, raced towards rear on the inside, 4 lengths or so back, angled out 500M, failed to make any progress in straight.
Bumped on jumping, sent forward to take the lead, peaked and headed near 500M, eased early in straight. (Irregular heart rhythm.)

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began smartly, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well throughout, kept on strongly in straight, won comfortably.
Jumped well from the widest draw, positioned in 2nd, a length back on turn, kept on well in straight to take a place without threatening.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, 3 lengths back on turn, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide slightly behind midfield early, 2 wide turning, made some progress in straight to make frame.
Slightly slow out, raced behind midfield on the inside, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, finished off evenly.
Began well from a wide draw, raced slightly better than midfield on the outside, moved a bit closer after passing 700M, peaked early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Moderately away, raced towards rear on the outside, 7 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made some progress in straight.
Bumped shortly after start, raced at tail, 8 lengths back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the outside, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, made no progress in straight.
Away well, raced 2 wide behind midfield, found rail near 550M, 7 lengths back turning in, made no progress in straight.
Bumped shortly after start, raced in midfield on the outside, no cover on turn, weakened gradually in straight.
Moderately away from gate 1, showed limited early speed, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Eased back, took rail, lack room 300M, unleashed strong finishing efforts when clear and scored.
Eased to sit in midfield, 2 wide, dashed strongly 300M.
Took lead easily, hung on well until 50M overhauled, was found to be coughing in sampling stalls after racing, an endoscopic exam did not reveal any significant findings.
Slow away, took rail at back, dashed well 250M.
Hard ridden forward, box seat, weakened 200M.
Slow away, at rear, 2-3 wide, dashed strongly 200M.
Hard ridden forward to sit outside the leader, out of fuel 200M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Eased back, 2 wide, checked early, lack room 4-2, little dash when clear.
Hard ridden forward, 2 wide, emptied 250M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
At rear along the fence, brushed the running rail near the 550M and was awkwardly placed inside heels, no dash.
Behind midfield, 2 wide, lack room 300M, no progress, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Failed to muster speed despite being ridden along for some distance, throughout the race travelled wide and without cover in midfield, weakened 300M.
Sent forward to take the rail, led all the way to score by 1/2L.
Crowded start and raced in midfield, 2 wide, closed off strongly to the line for 2nd.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, swung wide on Straightening, made significant ground to finish 3rd.
Crowded start and raced in midfield, along the rail, made ground steadily to the line.
Sent forward and raced behind the leader after 1000M, along the rail, stayed on but flattened in the last 100M.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, only one paced in the Straight.
Raced prominently, 2 wide, pretty one paced to the line.
At rear, 2 wide, did not improve in the Straight.
Settled in one-out one-back position, showed no turn of foot.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, did not threaten in the Straight.
At rear, along the rail, never a factor.
Taken back, 2 wide, eased down in the Straight. (Lame right front)

Not fast away but hard ridden to improve & settle outside the leader throughout. Moved up to take lead soon after straightening, was never a long way clear but dug deep in concluding stages to hold neck advantage on line.

Began well & came across from the middle of the line to get good position 1,1 for majority. Hard ridden from the 450m mark but continued to make continuous steady ground in the straight to be only a neck behind on line.

Began well from gate 11 before coming across to midfield, 3 wide early before getting one off rail from about the 600m. Shifted wider passing 400m mark, wider on cornering before closing well to third place in final strides.
Showed early speed to lead. Headed in the lead by the winner soon after cornering but battled well in concluding stages to only be beaten about a length on line.
Crowded soon after the start before getting position in midfield on rail. Cornered about 3.5L behind, stayed close to rail in straight before closing well in concluding stages to only be beaten 1.5L.

Raced in midfield three wide with cover before being left without cover momentarily from the 500m when racing around bend. Cornered about 4.5L from the lead before making up a few lengths when running onto midfield.
Bumped & hampered at start before racing behind the leader throughout. Ridden along on cornering as first two raced clear before finishing off one paced to be beaten just over 2L in midfield.

Badly hampered at start & clipped heels soon after & consequently raced worse than midfield on the rail. Entered last section 5L behind before halving margin in the straight when closing to midfield. Only beaten just over 2L.

Raced in midfield away from rail before failing to hold position in middle stages & drifting slightly further back. Cornered over 4.5L from lead before failing to challenge in the sprint to line. Rider questioned, see report.

Steadied at the start & taken back to worse than midfield between runners. Ridden along entering the last section when 6L behind, shifted wider on straightening, halved margin but still third last in race not run to suit.

Taken back from outside gate to race a clear last after the start. Hard ridden entering last section when over 7L behind, only beat one runner home but ran fastest last section but was too far back in the run.

Slow to begin & settled second from last away from the rail. Moved wider on the track around the bend, continued near the back over 6L from the lead on cornering before failing to make any headway in straight. Last.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide at rear, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to score.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back on turn, closed off well to take 2nd.
Made contact at start, raced prominently but 3 wide, 2 wide from 600M, 2 lengths back on turn, kept on well in straight to take a place.

Began well, sent forward to take the early lead, 2 wide, found rail and headed near 600M, positioned right behind the leader on turn, kept on well in straight, took brief lead 100M, peaked and headed final 50M.

Jumped with them, raced prominently but trapped wide early, took the lead approaching 600M, led by a length on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Made contact shortly after start, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, similar position on turn, finished off evenly.
Bumped start, positioned on rail in midfield, awkwardly placed near 400M, kept on evenly in straight.
Shifted out on jumping and made contact, raced in midfield on the outside, no cover on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 6 lengths or so back on turn, very wide into straight, made minor progress in straight.
Bumped start, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Average to begin, raced towards rear on the inside, 5 lengths back on turn, made no progress in straight.
Away with them, raced behind midfield on the outside, peaked on turn, weakened gradually in straight.
Travelled in front of midfield, 2 wide, kept bat-tling, ran home spiritedly to win by a neck.
Attempted to lead, eased to sit 1L off and outside lead approaching 1000M, battled to the last strides, finished a neck behind in 2nd.
Eased and raced at the rear, on rail throughout, dashed home nicely in final 100M to take 3rd.
Settled to race in midfield, along the rail, ran on fairly to the line.
In midfield initially, 2 wide, raced keenly, shuf-fled back near 800M, away from heels at 50M, was one paced nonetheless.
Took back, raced at the rear, rounded home turn 3 wide, ran on without threatening.
Worked forward gradually, took lead finally near 1000M, headed and weakened passing 200M.
Forward to race in box-seat, sat about 1L behind lead, stayed on until emptied passing 150M.
Bumped start, took back and raced towards the rear, 2 wide, showed no kick. (Bled from both nostrils)
Niggled along, trapped very wide into first turn, settled midfield but stayed wide, eventually found nothing in straight.
Began fairly, ridden along in 4th or 3rd one back 3-wide, swung wider turning for home, fought on resolutely to just get up on line.
Broke well to lead, obtained rails run after the first 200 metres, held half a length advantage rounding home bend gaining 1L clear early in straight only to be pipped at post.
Well there, travelled alongside race leader rounding home bend, shifted wider turning in, kept on same pace without quickening.
Travelled 3-wide without cover in last few, widest runner turning into straight, ran on without threatening.
Taken back to last from a wide gate, saved ground on the rail turning in, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began well from a wide gate settling 3-wide in midfield in 7th, switched in for a run early in straight, kept on steadily without threatening.
Soon dropped towards the rear, in similar position turning into home straight, kept on at the one pace under pressure.
Settled one back within 2L of the pace on the rail, faded steadily under pressure in straight.
Settled wide in last few from the widest gate, trailed the field into the straight, kept on steadily without quickening.
Slightly slow out, soon picked up towards the rear on the rail, gained closer towards midfield in 8th 700 metres out, saved ground turning for home, unable to sustain effort in the straight.
Travelled wide without cover throughout and in prominent position early, folded up quickly inside final 200 metres. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Not far off early in back straight, steadied and drifted backward rounding home bend, folded up quickly after straightening.
Soon emerged as the leader, had uncontested lead, kicked on strongly final 250M, well in control 150M from home to win by dominant margin.
Chased the pace set by eventual winner, tried hard in straight but couldn't close the gap on the winner, fought on to the line to hold 2nd.
Eased back to race at the rear, 6Ls to make up 400M, driven and closed off well over final 250M to go 3rd, not reached winner.
Never far off from the pace, shoved along 500M, closed off only moderately for a non-threatening 4th.
Niggled along at the rear, saved ground along the fence, made some progress passing 300M but never a serious threat to leaders.
Up with leaders early stages, reigned back to sit in mid-division, ran home one-paced, out of contention 200M.
Jumped well, soon switched off to race towards the rear, swung widest from 400M, ran past beaten horses in the straight. No impression on leaders.
Restrained in a position behind midfield, 4Ls to make up turning home, ran on fairly final 300M, never reached leaders.
From wide draw dropped back for cover, settled 3-wide towards the rear, failed to finish off.
Began fairly, strode forward to track leader, lacked further response from 300M, weak in the finish.
From wide draw caught wide no cover in midfield early stages, strolled closer to pace passing 800M, no extra 200M from home, weakened to last.

Fast into stride, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length on turn, kept on strongly in straight and scored.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced 3 wide with cover towards rear, 3 to 4 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, finished off strongly to take 2nd.
Commenced well, raced 3 wide in midfield, no cover for the majority of the race, kept on well in straight to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 7 lengths back on turn, taken wide in straight and finished off strongly make frame.
Bumped start and unbalanced, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Average to begin, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some progress in straight.
Slightly slow out and bumped, raced slightly behind midfield on the inside, 4 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Away well, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross near 900M, sat right behind the leader on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Average to begin, raced prominently, 2 wide, a length back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Crowded on jumping, raced 2 wide towards rear early, 3 wide from 1000M, very wide turning in, peaked early in straight, one-paced thereafter.
Shifted out at start, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, failed to close off in straight. (Roarer.)
Moderately away from the widest draw, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2 to 3 lengths back on turn, weakened early in straight.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, difficult to settle near 1000M, wider turning in, failed to close off in straight.
Pushed to obtain box seat, ran on well to score.
Hard ridden early, took cover behind the leaders, 2 wide, dashed well 300M.
Took rail and lead easily, hung on well until 100M overhauled.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, dashed well 200M.
Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, emptied 150M.
Pressed forward, throughout the race travelled wide and without cover, weakened 150M.
Very slow away, at back, 3-4 wide, no progress, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
At back, 2 wide, no progress.
Very slow away, never competitive.
Slow away, never a factor, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Hard ridden to keep up with the field, dropped off 600M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Began awkwardly and lost ground, in front of midfield, 2 wide, ran on fairly to the line by 3/4L.
Sent forward and raced next to the leader, 2 wide, stayed on but only headed in the last 100M.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, closed off okay for 3rd.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, stayed on well to the line.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, made ground and closed off strongly in the Straight.
At rear, along the rail, made minor ground in the Straight.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, weakened in the last 200M.
At rear, 2 wide, pretty one paced. (Substantial mucus and roarer)
Began fairly and raced in front of midfield, wide no cover, flattened in the last 300M.
Crowded start and failed to muster speed, behind midfield, 2 wide, did not feature.
Bumped start and raced behind midfield, 3 wide but with cover, nothing in the Straight.

Drifted back after start & shifted down to rail to settle third last. Stayed close to rail entering last section when 4L behind before shifting outwards at 300m & finishing very strongly final 150m to strike lead last 25m.

Steadied after 150m & taken back to race second last. Continued rearward approaching corner, shifted widest runner before closing strongly down the outside to strike lead fleetingly in late stages, hung in & headed late.

Held position along the rail just forward of midfield throughout. Straightened under 2L behind, sprinted through along rail to move to second near 250m, continued close until over-run in concluding stages, held third.

Began well before being steadied & drifting back to midfield when three wide with cover. Eased wider to improve approaching 500m, dashed well to lead near 250m mark before being over-run last 75m, close behind.

Raced in midfield on rail throughout. Entered last section under 3L behind before being held up for clear running from 400m to about 250m mark before closing off well to be beaten just over a length in a bunch just behind.

Drifted back after start to race just worse than midfield away from rail. Eased wider just prior to straightening, entered last section 4L behind, closed steadily until be hampered in late stages, only about a length behind.

Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Entered last section only 3L from lead, held up for clear running passing 350m until angling outwards at 250m, before closing well to only be beaten 1.5L on line.

Settled in a good position in midfield away from the rail. Travelled well approaching corner, eased wider on straightening, entered last section only 2L from lead before emptying at the furlong mark & weakening thereafter.

Hard ridden from second widest gate before settling third, just behind the leading pair. Moved to second about a length form the lead entering last section before peaking at 250m & giving a few lengths late.

Was slow to begin & consequently raced at the tail. Continued a clear last approaching the corner when two lengths behind second last, straightened over 6L from lead before passing only a few tiring rivals late.

Ridden forward from outside gate & held narrow lead when racing off the rail in middle stages. Held a length advantage entering last section before peaking at 300m mark & weakening out quickly thereafter.
Raced in midfield but was left three wide without cover from the 900m. Wider on straightening, entered last section just over 3L behind before weakening poorly to be long second last.
Pushed forward, raced second a neck from the lead when holding the rail position throughout. Was beaten soon after straightening & weakened poorly to be long last.

Placing: PU
Comment: Hard ridden in first 100m before becoming badly unbalanced & retired out of the race. (See report).
Moderately away, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2 lengths or so back, there to turn, showed good response in straight, hit the front 150M, kept on well to hold off the challenger.
Bumped start and unbalanced, sent forward to take the lead, led by 3/4L on turn, headed 150M, fought on doggedly without pegging back the winner.

Shifted in at start and bumped, sat right behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, no daylight early in straight, cleared approaching 200M, closed off well to take a place without threatening. (Mucus.)
Bumped start, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, a length or so back, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Shifted out on jumping and bumped, positioned 4 lengths behind the leader on rail, same margin back on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Slightly slow out, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, 2 wide from 500M, kept on evenly in straight.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide at rear, 7 lengths back turning in, very wide into straight, made some headway in the run home.
Taken back from gate 9, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 lengths or so back, commenced move after passing 500M, made minor progress early in straight, no extra final furlong.
Began awkwardly, raced towards rear on the inside, angled out 500M, kept on evenly in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 9 lengths or so back, still 7 lengths behind on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced in midfield on the outside, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong. (Lame left hind leg next day morning.)
Jumped well, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 5 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Forward to take rail and led, kept position before kicking away at 100M to win comfortably by 2-1/4L.
Asked along, settled outside lead, ran on nicely for a comfortable 2nd but was no match to winner.
In worse than midfield, wide but with cover, saved nice ground on center track, finished 3rd.
Bumped start, in midfield and 2 wide, ran home fairly but not enough for minor placings.
Raced close to the rear, on rail at turns, kept kicking and showed nice dash home in final 100M.
Bumped start, settled in front of midfield, 2 wide, continued on fairly until weakened late.
Hard ridden along the rail, settled behind the lead, one paced and run peaked prior to the final 100M.
Travelled in midfield, wide but with cover, continued only one paced.
Raced in front of midfield, wide and no cover howev-er, no dash and faded 200M out. (See Incident Report)
Settled in midfield, wide and without cover, made no impact in run home.
Shifted to rail after start, at rear throughout, showed nothing in the straight. (Lame right hind)
Took back, was wide on the track, had cover, never looked likely.

Ridden along in 5th just over 2L back, dropped slightly further back when pace quickened rounding home bend, 4-wide into home straight, hit the front under pressure 200 metres out, hung on well to the line.
Crowded at start and soon dropped to last few, remained well back to the straight, finished off the race strongly down the centre of the track, nearest at finish.

Settled just better than midfield in 6th on the rail, in similar position rounding home bend, briefly baulked early in straight, quickened to hold every chance inside the 200 metres, unable to sustain effort close to home.
Gradually settled in worse than midfield on the rail, came under pressure rounding home bend, fought on steadily without threatening.
Settled one back in 4th on the rail, improved under reminders to hold some chance 200 metres out, unable to sustain effort closing stages.
Began fairly from the one draw, improved to take up running narrowly 1200 metres out, held slender lead until headed under pressure 150 metres out.
Settled in last few, improving towards the rear when inconvenienced passing the 1200 metres, commenced move entering home straight, produced good late impression inside final 200 metres.
Soon taken back from a wide gate dropping to tail-end passing the 1000 metres, given reminders turning into straight and baulked for a run until inside the 200 metres, did best work late.
Moderate start, soon recovered to midfield, given reminders rounding home bend, ran home one-paced.
Began well, gradually taken just behind the leaders 2-wide coming onto home bend, prominent entering straight but unable to quicken to threaten.
Soon taken back from a wide gate, remained in last few to straight, never nearer.
Travelled wide without cover just worse than midfield, in similar position turning into home straight, found nothing.
Gradually settled wide in last few, never seen with a chance.

Ridden along from the wideset gate settling 3-wide without cover with the leaders, obtained 2-wide position coming onto home bend and disputed lead to the straight, folded up quickly inside final 300 metres.
Began well from inside draw, always in touch behind leaders, into clear 400M and kicked on strongly when asked, drew clear 150M winning decisively.
Ridden along early before being steadied to a 3-wide spot near the rear, ran on strongly from 400M, got up for 2nd close home, not troubled winner.
Jumped well, reigned back to sit 3-wide in mid-division, stayed on well final 400M without threatening winner, went 2nd 100M out, lost 2nd close home.
Steadied early stages for cover, reserved towards the rear on inside, responded mildly when driven inside 400M, not reached winner, held by 2nd and 3rd late stages.
Went forward to be vying for the lead on inside, pace fast middle stages, headed near 200M, faded and lost several places passing 100M.
Began awkwardly, eased back to the rear, badly held up for clear running nearing 300M and again 150M, could have finished closer.
Pressed along after the start, positioned ahead of midfield, caught 3-wide no cover from 1000M, kept on moderately early straight, weakened final 150M.
Eased back to race at the rear on settling, 7Ls to make up 400M, ran past beaten horses only, never threatened.
Bustled along after the start to race outside leader, pace fast middle stages, challenged for the lead from top of straight, run ended 200M and faded away.
Began fairly, recovered to race in midfield, kept on same pace in straight, no threat to leaders from 200M.
Steadied early stages for cover, settled towards the rear, 7Ls off the pace 400M, ran on fairly in straight, steadied 200M, never reached leaders.
Held up in midfield along the fence, outpaced passing 300M, soon no impression.
Began awkwardly, settled down behind midfield, pressed along 550M, failed to finish off.
Chased leaders 2-wide, came under heavy pressure 500M, soon gave ground on straightening.
Average to begin, raced towards rear of midfield, 3 away from the stands' rail, hard ridden after passing 300M, finished off strongly to score.
Commenced well from gate 11, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on the stands' rail, moved a bit closer in the middle stages, closed off well to take 2nd.
Shifted out at start and bumped, positioned a length behind the leader, nearer to the middle track, hard ridden after passing 400M, finished off well to take a place without threatening.
Jumped well from gate 1, raced prominently, 2 away from the stands' rail, hard ridden 300M, kept on evenly to the line.
Bumped start, raced prominently on the stand side, hard ridden 300M, ran on evenly to the line.
Began smartly, sent forward to take the lead on the stands' rail, hard ridden after passing 250M, peaked and headed 100M, weakened thereafter.
Bumped start, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on the stands' side, hard ridden 400M, showed some response, not enough room final 50M. (Rider dropped whip near 400M.)
Bumped on jumping, raced better than midfield, 2 away from the stands' rail, hard ridden 300M, only showed limited response, weakened final 100M.
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced at rear on the stands' side, failed to make any progress final 400M.
Jumped with them, positioned behind midfield, 2 lengths or so back, hard ridden 300M, showed no response, weakened final furlong.
Bumped start, raced towards rear, nearer to the middle track, weakened gradually final 300M.
Average to begin, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, finished off very strongly to score.
Away well, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, kept on well in straight to take 2nd, useful debut.
Made contact shortly after start, sent forward to race prominently, took the lead near 950M, led by a length turning in, kicked clear early in straight, peaked 100M, headed and weakened final 50M.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 lengths or so back, angled out 500M, closed off well without threatening.
Taken back from gate 9, raced towards rear on the inside, 4 lengths or so back, 2 wide from 550M, no clear running early in straight, cleared 300M, made some progress thereafter.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced 3 wide with cover, 4 lengths back, very wide into straight, made some headway in the run home.
Taken back from gate 13, raced at rear on the outside, 5 to 6 lengths back, very wide turning in, made some progress in the run home.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear, 6 lengths or so back, saved ground on turn, made some progress in straight.
Jumped with them, showed no early speed, raced 2 wide at rear, wider turning in, made some headway in straight.
Began well from gate 11, raced better than midfield but trapped very wide, a bit closer in the middle stages, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Made contact shortly after start, sent forward to take the early lead, 2 wide, headed near 950M, 2nd on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Slowly away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, carried wider 550M, one-paced in straight.
Jumped with them, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Began well, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, very wide turning in, weakened early in straight.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Commenced well, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off strongly to score.
Away well, positioned on rail in midfield, 2 wide from 900M, commenced move 450M, closed off well to take 2nd.
Began awkwardly, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, just held 3rd.
Moderately away from gate 1, raced behind midfield on the inside, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, made some headway in straight to make frame.
Began well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, made minor progress in straight.

Jumped with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, commenced move after passing 900M, 3 wide on turn, a length or so back, kept on evenly early in straight, no extra final 100M. (Rider dropped whip early in straight.)
Jumped with them, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, a length back on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 wide from 900M, dropped towards rear on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced behind midfield on the outside, similar position on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Slightly slow out, raced at tail, 6 to 7 lengths back on turn, made no impression in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced towards rear, 6 to 7 lengths back, a bit closer on turn, very wide into straight, made no progress in the run home.
Bumped start, hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, dashed well 300M to score.
Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, closed off well for 2nd.
Took rail and lead easily, ran on well for 3rd.
At back, 2 wide, made early move 900M, led 600M, overhauled 100M.
Bumped start, pushed early, took rail, dashed well 250M.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, just held ground in straight.
At rear, 2 wide, dashed well 200M.
Midfield, 2 wide, no dash, was found to be a "roarer" which had previously been reported.
Bumped start, checked early, at back, near the 800M was left racing wide and without cover, no progress.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, made significant ground in the last 100M and scored by 2L.
Sent forward and took lead, stayed on but headed in the last 100M and finished 2nd.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, ran on well but emptied in final 100M.
Bumped start, raced behind the leader, along the rail, ran on well to the line.
Rolled forward, 2 wide, stayed on well to the line.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, was one paced.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, pretty one paced.
Slow to begin and at rear, along the rail, did not improve in the straight. (See Incident Report)
At rear, along the rail, saved no ground in the straight.
At rear, 2 wide, did not feature.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, did not run on.
Sent forward, 2 wide, lost ground in the Straight. Performance unacceptable. Must trial.
Had perfect run on leaders back throughout. Stayed inside the leader on straightening, dashed through to take lead passing 150m mark before finishing well to win by over 1L.
Used advantage of low draw to push forward to lead. Continued to hold narrow lead before being joined by the winner who came up the side at the 150m mark before narrowly holding second on line.

Shifted across behind runners after the start to race third last along rail. Entered last section over 5L from lead, stayed close to the rail in straight before closing strongly in concluding stages to narrowly miss second.
Obtained good position 1,1 after the first bend. Entered last section just over 2L behind before finishing off steadily to be beaten about the same margin on line.
Raced three wide with cover in midfield throughout. Entered last section 5L from the lead before making up a few lengths when closing off down the outside to be beaten 3L.
Raced outside the leader throughout. Came under pressure early in straight before peaking at 175m & weakening late. (See report).

Ridden forward to improve approaching the first bend before being caught 3 deep without cover in third thereafter. Only a length from lead on straightening before peaking 125m & weakening late. (Rider questioned-see report).

Steadied from the widest barrier after the start & got back to race second last. Eased wider to improve entering last section when 6.5L from lead before making up a few late lengths out wide. Too far back to challenge.

Began fairly, shifted outwards at first turn when improving along rail to midfield. Raced keenly & hung outwards in middle stages checking at 800m. Continued to hang outwards around bend & in straight & wasn't tested late.

Shifted behind runners when outpaced at start & raced clear last. Continued at rear, 7L behind entering last section before making up length or two in straight but never challenging after getting too far back. Needs further.

Began awkwardly, made first turn very awkwardly & consequently racing 4 wide before racing 3 wide with cover in midfield from 800m. Began losing position approaching 400m mark before weakening in straight. Well beaten.
Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Hard ridden entering last section when just under 5L from the lead before weakening out poorly in straight to last. (Blood in trachea post-race).
Quickly into stride, raced better than midfield on the inside, a bit closer on turn, angled out early in straight, hit the front 100M, kept on strongly to the line and scored.
Away with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, angled out and made contact near 650M, 4 lengths back on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, finished off strongly to take 2nd.
Began well, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 lengths back, similar position on turn, closed off well to take a place without threatening.

Began well from a wide draw, sent forward to take the lead, 2 wide, found rail near 750M, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Made contact shortly after start, raced towards rear on the outside, made contact near 650M, no cover on turn, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home, nearest on line.
Moderately away from gate 10, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, there to turn, showed limited response in straight.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide behind midfield, 3 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, one-paced in the run home.
Began well, sent forward to race prominently on the inside, unbalanced near 800M, 2 wide in the middle stages, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Slightly slow out, raced at rear on the inside, 5 lengths or so back, saved ground throughout, showed limited response in straight.
Made contact shortly after start, raced 2 wide at rear, 5 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, made no progress in straight.
Began only fairly, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Moderately away from the widest draw, unable to slot in, trapped wide with no cover in midfield, moved a bit closer in the middle stages, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
In just behind midfield, 2 wide, battled hard all way in the straight, caught leader in final strides to win.
Settled to race in midfield, 2 wide, dashed on nicely from 250M out, looked likely until caught late.
Bumped start, at rear and wide but with cover, swung widest, saved ground and closed off strongly for 3rd.
Took back, raced at rear, stayed 2 wide, made ground and ran on well to the line.
Jumped well, allowed to be prominent but wide and no cover throughout, was one paced.
Jumped and niggled along, sat in box-seat, about 1-1/2L off, showed no turn of foot.
Awkward start, on rail towards the rear, awkward to heels early in the straight, didn't make ground.
Pushed from the start, sat midfield on rail, showed no response when asked, faded from 150M out.
Rolled forward to take rail, led by about 1/2L, weakened and headed at 200M.
Niggled along, sat in one-out one-back position, dropped out of contention from rounding home turn.
Bumped start, raced in worse than midfield, wide but with cover, found nothing. (Lame left front)
Urged forward, assumed position outside lead near after 1200M, run ended on straightening.
Soon taken back from the widest gate for rails run towards the rear in 9th, saved ground turning for home, quickened well inside final 100 metres to assert authority final strides.
Soon took up running, quickened up pace going 2L clear passing the 700 metres, held same until finding no extra inside final 100 metres.
Broke well settling just off the pace on the rail, chased 2L behind pace rounding home bend and into straight, fought on steadily under pressure without threatening.
Began fairly but soon ridden forward to 2L 3rd, drifted backward to 3L 5th passing the 800 metres, came under pressure to match increased pace rounding home bend, fought on to be nearest at finish.
Settled in worse than midfield in 7th or 8th one off the rail, found no room upon straightening and switched in for a run over 200 metres out, ran on under pressure to be nearest at finish.

Niggled at after moderate start, travelled 3-wide in worse than midfield back straight, widest runner turning for home, bumped and unbalanced early in straight before lying in badly, fought on to the line
Began very awkwardly losing considerable ground, remained well behind to the straight, made up good late ground under pressure. (Questioned)

Began well from a middle gate, wide without cover in 2L 4th before improving to 1.5L 2nd at about 900 metres, joint 2nd rounding home bend and into straight, kept on until folding up quickly inside final 100 metres. (Bled)
Wide without cover in midfield from a wide draw, travelled keenly early in back straight before picking up to joint 4th, kept on steadily from a similar position into straight.

Taken back from the one draw towards midfield 3L off the pace, travelled keenly on heels and steadied early in back straight, saved ground on the inside turning for home, unable to quicken under pressure.
Very slowly away, trailed the field most of the way, never nearer.
Settled in last few from a wide gate, came under pressure rounding home bend and the widest runner on straightening, never nearer.
Crossed to the fence vying for the lead on inside, responded strongly turning for home and soon established a clear lead, kept on well final stages to win in course record time.
Led on outside setting fast pace in middle stages, brushed aside by winner mid-straight, continued on well to hold 2nd.
Never far off from leaders, 5th at 400M, did best work final 200M, almost got 2nd at the line but no threat to the clear cut winner.
Unable to slot in from wide gate, wide no cover in midfield from 600M, ran on mildly final 250M to go 4th close home.
Began well from draw 1, shuffled back to a position behind midfield on settling, bustled along 500M out, kept on steadily to the line but always held by leaders.
From wide draw taken back to race at the rear, still last at 400M about 8Ls off the pace, made some progress to the line but never reached contention.
Reserved near the rear, 10th at 400M with 6Ls to make up, stayed on fairly to line, not reached leaders.
Jumped on terms, settled down in midfield, gave limited response turning in, never a threat to leaders.
Never far off from the pace, went 3rd early straight, fought on same pace before weakening badly over final 100M.
Began fairly, held up in a 3-wide spot behind midfield, swung wide home, made no real progress in straight.
Strode forward form wide draw to be tracking leaders, caught wide no cover until 600M, not quickened when driven along home turn, soon gave ground, eased when no chance.
Lost ground soon after the start, settled near last, failed to run on when driven 400M.

Began well from gate 1, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, hit the front approaching 150M, kept on strongly to the line and scored.
Began smartly, raced prominently on the inside, led by half length on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed near 150M, ran on evenly to take 2nd.
Away well, raced behind midfield on the inside, 2 lengths or so back on turn, no clear run early in straight, cleared approaching 200M, made good progress thereafter to take a place.

Bumped start, raced at rear on the outside, commenced move after passing 850M, positioned 4 wide, a length or so back on turn, showed good response early in straight, peaked on run 150M, ran on evenly to the line. (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped well, positioned 2 wide, a length or so back, similar position on turn, finished off evenly.
Made contact shortly after start, raced prominently on the outside, 3 wide throughout, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Average to begin, raced at rear on the inside, difficult to settle, 2 to 3 wide after passing 800M, 2 lengths back on turn, made no progress in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Made contact shortly after start, raced prominently, 2 wide, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, very wide on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Pushed early, lack room 300M, made steady ground when clear.
Behind midfield, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Took lead easily, hung on well until 100M overhauled.
Pressed forward, just held ground in final stages.
Hard ridden forward, made ground 200M.
At back, checked 700M, lack room 400M, progressed steadily 200M.
Pushed early, in front of midfield, just held ground, checked 100M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Eased back, made ground 100M.
Hard ridden forward, emptied 200M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Midfield, never improved, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
At rear, ran on ok.
At back, crowded for room 700M, no progress.
Eased back, never a factor.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, showed a good kick and closed off strongly to the line and scored by 2-1/4L. (Right front tendon injury)
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, closed of well to the line for 2nd.
Sent forward took lead, along the rail, stayed on but headed in the last 200M.
At rear, along the rail, made ground, ran on okay to the line for 4th.
Settled in behind midfield, after 1400M checked and lost ground, 2 wide, made ground steadily to the line in the Straight.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, swung widest on Straightening, pretty one paced.
Raced in front of midfield, wide not cover, one paced in the Straight.
Sent forward, along the rail, emptied in the last 300M.
At rear, 2 wide, did not feature.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, no progress in the Straight.
Sent forward, 2 wide, lost ground in the Straight.

Shifted behind runners at start before improving quickly to race in midfield on rail. Stayed close to rail on straightening, 2L from lead before making strong ground to strike lead 225m, held off fast finisher by a nose.

Drifted back after first furlong to race just worse than midfield away from rail. Moved closer approaching final corner, shifted into clear running at 400m when 3L behind before flying home in last 150m to be beaten a nose.

Began fast, held rail position when in a line of 5 at the front early before easing in middle stages & racing on leaders back from 650m. Moved into clear running, only neck behind 250m, finished off well be beaten under 1L.

Raced wide early before steadying & drifting back to race second last away from rail. Hard ridden before cornering, straightened about 5L behind before closing off well in last furlong to move to 4th in the final stages.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide with cover. Obtained clear running on straightening, entered last section under 2L from lead, peaked on effort at 150m mark before weakening a few lengths in late stages.

Hard ridden at start, improved to race two wide in a line of 5 at the front early before continuing on to take narrow outright lead near 700m. Continued to hold narrow lead until passed by winner 225m before weakening late.
Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Entered last section only 2.5L from lead, shifted outwards abruptly passing 250m before weakening out in run to line.

Steadied from second widest barrier before shifting down to rail & settling third last along the inside. Entered last section 3L from the lead before finishing off only one paced along the inside to midfield.
Had no early speed & shifted behind runners to race last. Cornered about 5.5L from the lead before passing a few tiring rivals when running onto midfield but beaten 10L.
Raced three wide in a line of 5 at the front before shifting slightly closer to rail when outside the leader from the 600m. Emptied mid-straight before weakening out poorly to be beaten over 10L.
Raced 4 wide in a line of 5 at the front in early & middle stages. Bumped, crowded & lost position near 700m before weakening out from the 500m mark to be long second last.

Raced the widest in a line of 5 in the lead before assuming narrow lead when continuing very wide in middle stages. Was beaten off approaching the corner before weakening badly to long last in straight. (Must trial).
Average to begin, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, angled out 500M, hard ridden after passing 300M, finished off well to score.

Moderately away from gate 11, raced prominently but wide early, took the lead 1200M, found rail near 900M, led by 3/4L turning in, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the winner final 50M.

Shifted out at start and bumped, raced prominently on the inside early, allowed rival to cross near 900M, sat right behind the leader on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 100M, ran on well to take a place.
Began only fairly, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, finished off well to make frame without threatening.
Shifted out on jumping and made contact, raced 2 wide at rear, angled out 450M, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, angled out 500M, showed limited response early in straight, no extra final 150M.
Away well, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, 3 wide turning in, showed limited response early in straight, no extra final 200M.
Bumped start, raced prominently, 2 wide, 3/4L back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Commenced well, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, very wide turning in, failed to close off in straight.
Inconvenienced at start, raced at rear on the outside, no cover on turn, weakened gradually in straight.
Away with them, raced 3 wide behind midfield, wider turning in, weakened early in straight.
Sent forward to take rail and led, pulled away near 200M, kept kicking to win by 2-3/4L.
Travelled in midfield, 2 wide, fought on spirited-ly in straight, took 2nd just prior going to the line.
Settled to race in midfield, wide and had no cov-er, continued on well to take 3rd.
Took back, in worse than midfield, 3 wide with cover, closed off fairly.
Niggled along, settled outside lead near 900M, ran on only one paced.
Raced in worse than midfield, along the rail, ran on without threatening.
Travelled in front of midfield, 2 wide, in touch until weakened approaching 150M.
Eased and shifted to rail, at rear throughout, held up early until 300M, ran on okay thereafter.
Took back and at rear, 3 wide but with cover, ran on but saved no ground.
Settled to race in box-seat, about 3L off however, showed no turn of foot.
Bumped start, raced in midfield along the rail, in touch until faded at 200M out.
Bumped start, sat just behind midfield, 2 wide, showed nothing in the straight.
Urged but settled in worse than midfield, 2 wide, last on turn exit, did not respond. Must trial. (See Incident Report)
Broke well from the widest gate, soon taken back to the rear and waited with, switched out for a run entering straight, ran on well to assert authority 100 metres out.
Ridden forward from a wide gate, travelled keenly alongside race leader rounding home bend, gained narrow advantage over 350 metres out but unable to sustain effort and headed inside the 100 metres.
Settled 2L back in 4th, came under strong pressure after straightening, held every chance until overhauled by eventual winner over 50 metres out.
Began fairly, soon took up running narrowly, obtained rails run over about 1300 metres out, led until headed shortly after straightening, kept on steadily to the line.
Settled one off the pace in 3rd on the rail, did not find much room early in straight and checked 200 metres out, fought on steadily without threatening.
Very sluggish at start despite ridden early, trailed the field to home straight, made up good late ground inside final 200 metres.
Settled some 3L back in 5th on the rail, switched out for a run on straightening, kept on steadily without quickening under pressure.

Broke well from a wide gate, settled in midfield in 6th over 3L back, hung wide and lost balance making home turn, ran on to hold some chance early in straight but unable to sustain effort 150 metres out.
Never better than midfield, came under pressure rounding home bend, hung in and a difficult ride early in straight, made no further impression.
Settled just worse than midfield on the rail, found nothing in home straight.
Reserved behind midfield, 4Ls to make up top of straight, took a while to get going, did best work final 200M to get up just in time.
From inside draw shaken up early to take the lead, pressed by rival soon on straightening, briefly headed 300M, rallied to regain lead mid-straight, caught by winner last few strides.
Chased leaders on inside, held up for clear running early straight, fought on well final 200M, nearest finish.
Always close up behind leaders, 5th on settling, responded well turning in and one of the possible winners at 250M, kept on steadily late stages, just missed 3rd.
Driven forward from wide barrier, prompted the pace on outside, battled for the lead from top of straight, run ended 100M, edged out late to 5th.
Switched off to race towards the rear, brought wide to challenge top of straight, stayed on mildly, not reached leaders.
Positively ridden out the gate, chased leaders 2-wide, kept on one pace turning home, faded 200M.
Not hurried after the jump, dropped back to near the rear, 5Ls off the pace 400M, made no real progress in straight, never threatened.
Began awkwardly, restrained in midfield, responded only fairly early straight before weakened over final 200M.
Began only fairly, recovered to race behind midfield, failed to quicken when niggled along 500M, no extra final 200M.
Shifted across behind runners early stages, soon detached from field, eased passing 900M. (Jockey : reluctant to stretch out when ridden / No Vet findings.)
Average to begin, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on very well in straight, easily scored.
Moderately away, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, angled out 350M, finished off well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.

Clean jump, raced 3 wide better than midfield early, moved a bit closer after passing 1100M, positioned 1 out 1 back from 1000M, angled out 500M, hard ridden 250M, showed limited response, ran on evenly to the line.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail better than midfield, angled out after passing 500M, finished off evenly.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out 550M, very wide into straight, made some headway in the run home.
Jumped with them, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, travelled keenly after passing 1000M, same position on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, angled out 500M, finished off evenly.
Taken back from gate 8, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground throughout, one-paced in the run home.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced behind midfield on the inside, angled out 550M, finished off evenly.
Began awkwardly, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, one-paced in straight.
Jumped with them, raced behind midfield on the outside, very wide turning in, made no progress in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 6 lengths or so back on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Jumped well from gate 1, positioned on rail better than midfield, easy run to turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 300M, hit the front 100M, ran on strongly to the line and scored.
Began smartly, took the lead easily, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the winner final 100M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Away well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, found cover near 900M, travelled well to turn, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Began well, positioned 2 wide in midfield, angled out 550M, finished off evenly.
Clean jump, raced 3 wide behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Average to begin, raced towards rear on the inside, angled out 550M, finished off evenly.
Began awkwardly and lost ground, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, not enough room early in straight, showed limited response when clear thereafter.
Commenced well, unable to slot in, trapped wide in midfield early, sent forward after passing 1250M, 2nd on turn, peaked on run 200M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Taken back from gate 10, raced 2 wide at rear, 4 lengths or so back on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made no progress in straight.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, angled out 650M, 3 lengths or so back turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
