Began smartly, took the lead easily, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on very well in straight and scored.
Began well, sat right behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, finished off well to take 2nd.
Away well, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 wide from 450M, made good progress in straight to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Taken back from gate 8, raced at tail early, a bit closer after entering the back straight, positioned 4 to 5 lengths behind the leader in the middle stages, made some progress in the run home.
Slowly away, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, finished off evenly.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back, 3 wide from 600M, kept on evenly in straight.
Began awkwardly and crowded, raced 2 wide at rear, 6 lengths or so back on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Made contact at start, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, peaked on turn, weakened gradually in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, made all.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 2-3 wide in midfield, unleashed strong finishing efforts 250M.
Hard ridden to hold the rail behind the leaders, little dash 300M.
Eased back, took rail, lack room 4-2, dashed well when clear.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, lack room most straight, dashed well.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 3 wide throughout, out of fuel 200M.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2 wide, no progress.
Hard ridden early, trapped 3 wide throughout, no dash.
Eased at start, 2-3 wide, no progress.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, emptied 350M.
At rear, 2 wide, showed good kick in the Straight and made significant ground to score by 1-1/4L.
Raced behind the leader, along the rail, ran on well but headed in the last 50M.
At rear, along the rail 700M, saved ground and closed off strongly for 3rd.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, passing the 100M was crowded for room and only one paced thereafter.
Raced in front of midfield, wide no cover, kept on until 100M and faded gradually.
Settled in midfield position, 2 wide, pretty one paced in the Straight.
Raced next to the leader, 2 wide, rounding the Home Turn hung in and proved difficult to ride.
Sent forward and took lead, ran on fairly but passing 100M was checked and lost ground.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, only one paced in the Straight.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, did not feature. Performance unacceptable. Must trial. (See incident report)
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, made no ground.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, no progress. (See incident report)
Out-sped at start but improved after first 100m to race in midfield on rail. Moved off rail on cornering, waited for run which cane at 275m before dashing through to strike final 75m. Soft on line.
Showed good early speed to lead. Continued in lead until passed by winner inside final 75m. Narrowly held second.
Raced wide early before coming over to get lovely position 1,1 from the 650m. Closed off well in the straight despite hanging outwards & only just missed second. (Rider suspended, see report).
Steadied after not having the speed of horses drawn inside & raced three wide without cover when just worse than midfield. Wide on cornering before making steady ground to 4th in run to line.

Raced near speed in first furlong before drifting further back to midfield away from rail. Moved wider near 400m, wide on straightening, was finishing off steadily before being crowded & losing running in concluding stages.

Steadied from wide gate & settled second last throughout. Was a long way back approaching corner, began making good ground passing furlong mark before being hampered & not ridden out final 75m when closing well.

Raced in midfield between runners before slightly further back after getting close to heels & racing keen before stumbling nearing 650m. Third last on cornering before finishing off only steadily, beaten just over 3L.
Strode forward to race near the speed before shifting across to race outside the leader from the 650m. Continued in second place on straightening before peaking at 175m & weakening out in last 100m.
Raced outside leader early before steadying & shifting to race on leaders back from 600m. Was close enough on straightening but weakened out in straight & was no threat.
Was the slowest to begin before racing worse than midfield on the rail throughout. Stayed along the rail on straightening when around 4L behind weakening out to be second last. No threat.
Was completely outpaced at the start & raced a long last throughout. Made no real improvement in straight & was well beaten.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide into straight, finished off strongly to score.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, hard ridden after passing 450M, very wide turning in, made good progress in straight to take 2nd.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, 5 lengths or so back, very wide into straight, finished off strongly to take a place without threatening the first two.
Began well, positioned on rail in midfield, 2 to 3 lengths back, saved ground throughout, inconvenienced and badly unbalanced early in straight, made some progress thereafter.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, there to turn, took the lead early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Began well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, no clear running until final 100M, made minor progress thereafter.
Moderately away, trapped wide in midfield early, sent forward after entering the back straight but still 3 wide with no cover, 1/2L back on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced behind midfield on the inside, angled out after passing 500M, finished off evenly.
Began well, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 100M. (Bled.)
Taken back from gate 11, raced at tail, 6 lengths back on turn, showed limited response in straight, blocked final 50M.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, led by 1/2L on turn, peaked and headed 200M, weakened final 100M.
Bumped start, raced towards rear on the inside, 5 lengths or so back, saved ground on turn, showed limited response early in straight, blocked final 100M.
Always in led, 2 wide until shifted to rail near 600M, ran home comfortably to win by 2-1/4L.
Sent forward, sat off pace and about 1L off, took 2nd by running on spiritedly to the line.
On rail and 1/2L off lead until near 600M, then eased to take box-seat, ran on fairly to take 3rd.
Travelled in just behind midfield, along the rail, continued on evenly to the post.
Took back and raced at the rear, 2 wide, made ground slowly in straight, then hit the line fairly.
Sat in behind midfield, remained 2 wide, checked at 700M, played no part in the straight.
Settled in front of midfield, 2 wide at turns, no turn of foot and weakened passing 200M. (See Incident Report)
Urged after start, slotted into midfield 2 wide prior to first turn, was one paced and emptied in last 100M.
Didn't muster, at rear along the rail throughout, was never in contention.
No speed, settled in behind midfield, wide and no cover, last into the straight and was hampered at 300M, never a factor.
Tracked the leader, came to challenge after straightening and hit the front under pressure inside the 200 metres, hung on well to the line.
Soon took up running setting a slow early pace, quickened up from the home bend and led until narrowly headed inside the 200 metres.
Settled just worse than midfield on the rail mainly in joint 6th, came under pressure entering home straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Broke well settling over 2L back in 3rd, commenced move and joined the 2nd 750 metres out, kept on steadily without quickening under pressure.
Began well, taken gradually back to 4th over 3L back on the rail, came under pressure when pace quickened rounding home bend, ran home one-paced.
Began awkwardly, travelled keenly to half-way and towards the rear, came under pressure rounding home bend, kept on steadily in the straight.
Jostled at the start and soon dropped well behind, commenced move rounding home bend, saved ground turning in, made modest impression in straight.
Taken back from a wide gate travelling 3-wide with cover, stuck to the rail making home turn, ran home one-paced. (Lame next day)
Taken back for rails run in last few, saved ground turning for home, one-paced.
Settled in midfield in 5th some 4L off the pace, shifted 3-wide rounding home bend, made no impression in straight.
Travelled wide without cover mainly just worse than midfield, yielded ground rounding home bend dropping to last into straight, ran home one-paced.
Chased the pace, travelled strongly turning for home, quickened up to lead nearing 200M, drew nicely clear, well in control late stages.
Settled just ahead of midfield after jumping from inside draw, stayed on steadily when driven out 300M, no impression on winner.
Quickly into stride, sat behind leaders and always within striking distance, kept on steadily over final 300M, not going the pace to challenge winner.
From wide draw bustled along early before being restrained to race towards the rear, raced keenly from 1000M, driven 450M, stayed on mildly and got up for 4th late.
Caught wide no cover chasing leaders, challenged for the lead passing 500M, run ended 150M, faded towards the line.
Shifted across behind runners early stages, held up behind mid-division, ridden and no impression over final 300M.
Eased back to race near the rear on settling, 6Ls to make up 400M, ran past beaten horses only, never threatened.
Ridden forward after a fair start, improved to take lead from 800M, headed near 200M, no extra and weakened. (Jockey: raced too keenly in middle stages and failed to finish off.)
From draw 9 taken to a 3-wide spot in midfield, swung home widest, ran on fairly to line, no impression on leaders.
Jumped on terms, settled down in midfield, brought wide 350M, kept on same speed, never able to challenge.
From wide draw taken back to race in clear last, failed to respond on straightening, never involved.
Led early, lay out along back straight, tracked leader from 700M, soon under heavy pressure, eased when beaten. (Jockey unable to explain the manner in which his horse weakened in the straight.)

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Away well, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, travelled comfortably throughout, ridden to challenge 300M, hit the front 200M, kept on very strongly, easily scored.
Began well, raced in 2nd, a length back, there to turn, took the lead 300M, peaked and headed 200M, kept on evenly to take 2nd.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off well to take a place without threatening.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, made some headway early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Missed break, recovered to race behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Taken back from gate 9, raced 2 wide at rear, 7 to 8 lengths back on turn, bumped early in straight, made some progress in the run home.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 10 lengths back, still well back on turn, passed some tired runners in straight. (Rider dropped whip near 200M.)
Average to begin, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed limited response early in straight, peaked 200M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Jumped well from a wide draw, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length on turn, peaked and headed 300M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Taken back from gate 10, raced at rear on the outside, 8 lengths or so back on turn, bumped early in straight, made no progress thereafter.
Taken back from gate 7, raced 2 wide behind midfield, peaked on turn, weakened gradually in straight.
Eased to rear for cover, 3 wide, lack room 400M, made steady ground when clear to score.
Eased to rear, trapped 4 wide, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Hard ridden to keep up with the field, trapped 4 wide, made steady ground 350M.
At back, 2 wide, lack room 250M, progressed steadily when clear.
Slow away, hard ridden to obtain box seat, ran on well until 150M weakened.
Pushed to take rail and led easily, drifted away 400M, emptied 50M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Slow away, at rear 2 wide, made steady ground 250M.
Slow away, at rear, took rail, made ground 300M, run ended 100M.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, weakened 200M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Behind midfield, 2 wide, no progress.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 4 wide, out of fuel 350M.
Slow away, hard ridden to keep up in midfield, emptied 400M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Rolled forward and took lead from barrier 12, along the rail, kept on very well in straight and scored.
Sent forward and raced behind the leader, along the rail, finished off well to take 2nd.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, swung wide in the Straight and closed off strongly in the last 100M.
At rear, 2 wide, swung widest on Straightening, made ground and closed off strongly in the last 150M.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, ran on fairly inside final 100M once cleared.
At rear, 2 wide, ran on only fairly in the Straight.
Midfield, along the rail, pretty one paced.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, remained one paced to the line.
Slow to begin, at rear, along the rail, made minor ground only in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, did not run on.
Midfield, 2 wide, weakened in the last 200M.
Raced prominently, 2 wide, lost ground in the Straight. (See incident report)
Mustered speed to improve after start before racing in midfield away from rail. Eased wider on straightening, made continual steady ground to strike lead in final few strides to win narrowly.

Pushed forward from widest gate, raced 3 wide without cover in a line of 3 at the front. Shared lead on straightening, moved to narrow outright lead passing 200m mark before being caught in final few strides.
Not fast away but improved along the rail from inside draw to share lead near 850m. Continued to share lead until passed near 200m mark before holding third beaten just under 2L.

Raced close to lead in early stages before being crossed & racing just behind the leading trio from the 700m. Entered last section 2.5L before holding that margin & place when finishing steadily to line.

Improved after the start to share the lead in the middle of a line of three near the 800m. Continued only a neck behind on straightening before peaking at 250m mark & weakening a few length to midfield late.

Raced only a length from the lead in first furlong before steadying & getting position in midfield. Was ridden along approaching 600m, stayed on rail on straightening when about 3L behind before yielding a few lengths late.

Raced in midfield early before drifting back when failing to hold position in middle stages. Cornered wide when over 7L behind before making up a couple of lengths in late stages when running onto midfield from the back.

Reared at start & lost ground and consequently raced a clear last. Was about 10L behind entering last section, moved wide on straightening before making up a few late lengths when running onto midfield from last (See report).
Drifted back to second last after first furlong when racing away from the rail. Cornered 6.5L from the lead before making no headway into that margin & was never likely.

Crowded & unbalanced at start before being ridden along to improve position to midfield along rail. Hard ridden before straightening, entered last section 5L behind before weakening. (Irregular heart rhythm, lame next day).
Steadied after the start & shifted back to race just worse than midfield away from rail. Entered last section 7L behind before weakening in straight to be long second last.
Inconvenienced after start before shifting across down to the rail behind runners when near the tail. Continued a long way back approaching corner before weakening out poorly to be long last.
Average to begin, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on very well in straight to hold off the challengers.

Commenced well, sat right behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, not enough room early in straight, cleared 300M, finished off strongly to take 2nd, just narrowly beaten. (Had abrasions to the left hind heel.)
Began smartly, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, there to turn, challenged the leader after turning in, kept on well until final 100M, no extra thereafter.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced 3 wide with cover, 3 lengths or so back, there to turn, made minor progress in straight, no threat to the first few.
Began awkwardly, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Made contact at start, raced 2 to 3 wide at rear, 6 lengths back turning in, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Jumped well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2 lengths back, same margin back on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Bumped start, raced behind midfield on the outside, 4 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, finished off evenly. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from the widest draw, raced towards rear on the inside, 5 lengths or so back, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Bumped start, raced at tail, 7 lengths back, there to turn, failed to close off in straight.
Jumped well from a wide draw, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, 2 lengths back turning in, weakened early in straight when hard run took effect.
Began well, raced 2 wide behind midfield, similar position on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Sent forward to lead, kept kicking and held onto the lead to win by a short-head.
Raced just behind midfield, 3 wide with cover, closed off nicely to miss by a short-head.
Bumped start and lost ground, recovered in worse than midfield, on rail, progressed steadily.
Bumped start, in midfield on rail, awkward to heels at 350M, dashed home nicely in final 100M.
Raced in worse than midfield, 3 wide with cover, saved ground and ran on fairly.
Awkward start, travelled in midfield 2 wide, kept on one paced to the line.
Niggled along, settled one-out one-back, main-tained run until emptied approaching 100M.
Raced in box-seat, sat about 2L off, stayed on till 150M and emptied.
Took back, at rear and 2-3 wide, held ground only in the straight.
Jumped well, prominent before easing back to sit midfield, wide and no cover, found nothing.
At rear as usual, along the rail, never ran on in the straight.
Worked forward, settled outside lead near 700M, run ended passing 350M.
Awkward start and lost ground, sat in behind midfield, wide and keen throughout, finished tailed out. Not competitive, must trial.
Began well to lead from a wide gate, pressed forward hard to cross for the rails 900 metres out, held 1L advantage around home bend and further ahead early in straight, hung on well to the line.

Settled in prominent position on the rail, inconvenienced and dropped to 3L back in 5th coming onto home bend, renewed effort down the inside after straightening, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Settled towards the rear over 4L off the pace in 7th on the rail, saved ground turning for home, did not find much room the length of the straight, never nearer.

Travelled wide with the leaders in early stages, restrained over 2L back to 4th passing the 1200 metres, hung in badly inside the 300 metres, quickend to reach 2nd briefly over 200 metres out, unable to sustain effort closing stages.
Settled well back from a wide gate, went wide into home straight, improved near the centre of the track, did best work late.
Niggled along just worse than midfield, in last few turning for home, kept on well to the line.
Settled at the back from the widest gate, trailed the field into home straight, kept on same pace without quickening.
Well there on the rail alongside race leader, shifted one back for cover coming onto home bend, dropped away quickly out of contention after straightening.
Driven forward out wide in back straight, gained 2-wide in joint 2nd rounding home bend, folded up quickly after straightening. (Bled)
Made some early use to go forward chasing the pace, took on leader 700M, quickened clear mid-straight, had enough to hold on when seriously challenged late stages.
Jumped on terms, never far off from leaders, travelled well into straight, driven and stayed on strongly final 200M, just held by the odds-on favourite. Sound debut.
Began only fairly, settled midfield in a fast run race, brought wide to challenge 500M, ran on strongly, nearest finish. Encouraging debut.
Close up to the early pace before dropping back to a spot ahead of midfield, kept to inside turning home, not clear run early straight, fought on steadily final 250M for modest 4th.
Began very awkwardly and lost ground, recovered to chase leaders 2-wide, hampered nearing 300M, kept on moderately to line, not pace to challenge leaders.
From wide draw steadied to obtain cover early stages, towards the rear in a fast run race, stayed on final 400M without troubling leaders.
Chased leaders in a fast run race, caught wide no cover on the turn, had every chance in straight, run ended 150M then weakened rapidly.
Unable to slot in, caught wide no cover ahead of midfield, failed to respond on straightening, never threatened.
Lost ground soon after the start, taken back from wide draw to settle behind midfield, made no impression on straightening.
Failed to muster speed, soon in detached last, still 7Ls to make up 400M, made no real progress to the line.
Away with them but soon got outpaced, towards the rear always, never a factor.
Bustled along early, led at fast pace, soon headed turning home, weakened badly and eased.
Began well from gate 10, raced prominently but wide, took the lead 1000M, led by 1/2L turning in, kept on very well in straight to hold off the challenger late.

Began fairly, raced 2 wide towards rear, inconvenienced near 650M, 3 lengths or so back turning in, no daylight early in straight, cleared 200M, finished off strongly, just beaten by a neck. (See Racing Incidents.)
Moderately away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, inconvenienced near 650M, angled out 550M, showed good response early in straight, peaked on run 150M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, carried wider after 550M, made some progress in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 3 wide with cover towards rear, inconvenienced near 650M, very wide into straight, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 3 wide better than midfield early, 2 wide from 950M, 2nd on turn, kept on well early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Bumped start, raced at rear on the inside, severely checked near 650M, wide into straight, made minor progress in the run home.
Bumped start, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, ran on evenly to the line.

Away well, sent forward to take the early lead, headed near 1000M, allowed the leader to cross 800M, sat right behind the leader on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Jumped well from a wide draw, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Began well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2 lengths or so back, there to turn, raced tight near 300M, weakened final furlong.
Average to begin, showed no early speed, detached from the field, never a factor.
Bumped start, positioned on rail in midfield, very difficult to settle and checked off heels near 700M, soon dropped towards rear, eased early in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)

Placing: UR
Comment: Reared and unseated rider leaving stalls. (See Racing Incidents.)
Moderately away, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on the inside, travelled keenly near 900M, 2 wide on turn, finished off strongly to score.
Taken back from gate 9, raced 2 wide at rear, 5 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, made very good progress in straight to take 2nd. (See Racing Incidents.)

Began smartly from the widest draw, raced prominently on the outside, challenged the leader on turn, took the lead 500M, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Bumped start, positioned on rail in midfield, 2 to 3 lengths back, there to turn, angled out early in straight, made some progress in the run home, no threat to the first few.
Crowded on jumping, raced behind midfield on the inside, 4 lengths back, same margin back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Slightly slow out, raced at rear, 6 lengths or so back, slightly hampered 450M, made minor progress in straight.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide behind midfield, slightly inconvenienced near 450M, ran on evenly in straight. (See Racing Incidents.) (Abnormal respiratory noise.)
Jumped well, raced behind midfield on the outside, very wide into straight, finished off evenly.
Began well, sent forward to take the lead, challenged on turn, headed near 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, 7 lengths back on turn, one-paced in straight.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, 4 lengths back turning in, showed no response early in straight, weakened and eased thereafter.
Made contact shortly after start, raced in midfield on the outside, 4 lengths back turning in, emptied early in straight.

Bumped start, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, same position on turn, hard ridden approaching 300M, showed very good response, hit the front 250M, kept on strongly to the line and scored.
Began well from gate 1, positioned 1-1/2L behind the leader on rail, angled out after passing 550M, finished off strongly to take 2nd, always held.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, wider turning in, closed off well to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Shifted in at start and bumped, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, peaked early in straight, headed near 250M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Commenced well, raced 3 wide better than midfield, no cover throughout, a bit closer on turn, peaked on run 200M, weakened gradually thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, 2 to 3 lengths back on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Bumped start, raced at rear on the inside, 4 to 5 lengths back, angled out 500M, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 150M. (Bled.)
Made contact at start, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground throughout, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Taken back from gate 9, raced 2 wide at rear, 5 lengths back on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, wider turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Jumped well from a wide draw, taken back to race at rear on the outside, 4 lengths or so back, very wide into straight, failed to make any progress in the run home.
Took rail and lead easily, drifted away 300M to score.
Pushed forward, sat outside the leader, ran on well for 2nd.
Slow away, behind midfield along the fence, dashed well 300M for 3rd.
Slow away, 2 wide at back, lack room 400M, dashed well when clear.
Pushed to sit in midfield, 3 wide, dashed well 300M.
Eased back, 3 wide, dashed well 300M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Eased at start, 3 wide in midfield, little dash 250M.
Pushed to obtain box seat, weakened 200M.
Eased at start, took rail, lack room in straight, dashed well to the line.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, out of fuel 200M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, emptied 350M.
Never a factor, substantial mucus in trachea after racing. confirmed it to be a '"roarer" which had previously been reported.
At rear, 2 wide, swung widest on Straightening, made significant ground and kept on going and win by 3/4L.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, ran on well to the finish line to take 2nd.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, made ground and closed off strongly for 3rd.
At rear, along the rail, passing 300M raced tight and ran on only fairly thereafter.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, headed passing 150M and only one paced thereafter.
Raced next to the leader, 2 wide, only one paced in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, pretty one paced. (See incident report)
Sent forward, along the rail, flattened passing 100M.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, unable to obtain clear running in the Straight.
At one-out one-back, weakened passing 250M. Finished tailed out. Must trial. (See incident report)
Strode forward to race outside the leader. Dashed to lead at 400m, raced clear & held off late challenger to win by a neck.

Began awkwardly, rider unbalanced & consequently lost ground before improving to midfield on rail. Moved away from rail & improved between runners 700m, cornered 2L behind before closing well to fall a neck short.

Steadied soon after start before settling just worse than midfield away from rail. Moved three & 4 wide to commence to improve approaching 600m, widest on cornering before closing well to third, only half length behind.

Shifted behind runners after start & raced a clear last throughout. Shifted to be widest runner on straightening when 4.5L from the lead before making late ground down the outside to be beaten under a length. Too far back.

Steadied after start & drifted back to settle third last away from the rail. Eased wider on cornering when continuing third last before making up a length or so when running on to midfield from the back.

Steadied after start & shifted behind runners, settling second last. Shifted back inwards on cornering when continuing second last, held up 400m until 300m before shifting outwards & closing well late stages.
Soft run in midfield along the rail throughout. Stayed along the rail on straightening when just over a length from the lead before weakening few lengths to midfield. No threat.

Raced in midfield but was left three wide without cover from the 1400m. Forced 4 wide nearing 600m mark & then 5 wide on cornering before peaking on run mid-straight & weakening a few lengths after tough run throughout.

Began awkwardly before improving position after the start & getting nice position 1,1 throughout. Eased three wide just prior to straightening, only half length from lead passing 400m, weakened last furlong.
Had nice run on leaders back throughout. Raced close to heels on straightening when continuing on leaders back, flattened out mid-straight, hampered near 200m before yielding further late ground.
Raced in misfiled between runners for the majority. Niggled along prior to cornering, entered last section 3L from the lead before weakening in the straight to be beaten over 6L.

Steadied soon after start & shifted across to race forth last along rail. Moved away from the inside approaching corner, held up momentarily in early part of straight before getting clear 350m but offering little thereafter.
Raced in midfield away from rail throughout. Eased 3 wide approaching 600m mark, 4 wide on cornering, weakened poorly in last 250m, second last.
Pushed forward to lead. Headed in the lead soon after cornering, began weakening soon after, hampered & lost ground passing 200m mark but was already a spent force. Long last.
Began smartly, raced prominently on the stands' rail, travelled comfortably throughout, hit the front 300M, kept on very well to the line, easily scored.
Began fairly, tracked leaders, hard ridden after passing 400M, closed off well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Commenced well, sent forward to take the lead, hard ridden from 400M, peaked and headed 300M, weakened final furlong.
Began only fairly, soon outpaced and well behind, made very good progress final 400M to make frame. (Roarer.) (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped with them, raced in midfield, 2 away from the stands' rail, bumped and unbalanced near 600M, kept on evenly final 400M.
Began fairly from gate 1, raced in midfield, 3 away from the stands' rail, hard ridden after passing 400M, showed limited response, ran on evenly to the line.
Moderately away, raced towards rear, ridden from 500M, showed limited response, weakened final furlong.
Began awkwardly and inconvenienced, raced in midfield, badly hampered 600M, hard ridden approaching 300M, showed limited response, weakened inside final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began well from gate 10, raced towards rear on the stands' side, badly hampered near 600M, made no progress final 400M.
Away with them, raced in midfield on the stands' rail, severely checked near 600M, eased thereafter. (Lost left hind plate.) (See Racing Incidents.)
Settled to race in midfield, 2 wide, ticked from 250M out, stormed home to win by 2L.
Forward to take box-seat, drifted away from rail near 800M, on terms with lead by 700M, continued on nicely but was no match. (Lost right hind plate)
Urged along, sat in front of midfield, no cover and made Home Turn 4 wide, was one paced.
Bumped start, slotted in behind midfield but wide, had cover, made ground and hit the line well.
Niggled along, allowed forward when trapped wide, sat 2L off the pace, continued on fairly.
Travelled just in front of midfield, 2 wide, ran on okay until flattened going to the line.
Sent forward from wide barrier, took rail and led near 800M, headed near 300M, weakened 200M out.
Eased back, raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, ran on to the line without threatening.
Began only fairly, in midfield along the rail, made minor ground in the straight.
Hampered at start, took back, at rear and on rail, crowded at 350M after taking run on inside rail, con-tinued evenly.
Crowded start, then took back, at rear 2 wide, swung widest, slight dashes early, held ground towards the end only.
Bumped start, in midfield, wide but with cover, run ended approaching 200M. (Lame left front)
Jumped only fairly, in worse than midfield, along the rail, showed nothing and was eased down.
Urged and sat in front of midfield, on rail, improved to box-seat at 600M, run ended 300M out.

Broke well from a wide gate and with leaders early, gradually taken over 2L back 3-wide, improved to over 1L back in 3rd coming onto home bend, quickened well to taken charge over 250 metres out, won unchallenged.
Inconvenienced at start, settled towards the rear on the rail, came to challenge under pressure after straightening, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Jumped moderately settling in rear of midfield in 7th over 4L back, went slightly wider entering home straight, fought on steadily under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Niggled along in first few, gradually settled nearly 3L back in 4th on the rail coming onto home bend, angled out for a run entering straight, failed to quicken to threaten under pressure.
Jumped moderately, pressed forward to lead off the rail, gained 1L advantage but unable to cross to the rail throughout home bend, worn down by strong winner over 250 metres out.
Soon dropped well back, widest runner turning into straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Settled in midfield in 6th on the rail, improving when steadied from heels passing the 900 metres, saved ground turning for home, kept on before weakening inside final 100 metres.
Ridden along for prominent position early, gradually settled back in midfield in 6th coming onto home bend, became 5th rounding home bend, unbalanced over 300 metres out, found no extra.
Began well from the one draw, well there to the 300 metres and weakened under pressure. (Jockey expressed trip concern)
Jumped awkwardly, quickly taken back to last on the rail from the widest gate, never seen with a chance.
Chased leaders, quickened up well 350M to lead nearing 200M, driven out to hold off pursuing rivals late stages. (Jockey fined for weighing in 2 lbs over.)
Not hurried early stages, settled at the rear, had to shift out for his challenge after being held up passing 400M, finished off well.
Bumped at the start, reserved in midfield along the stands' rail, ran on well from 300M to go 3rd near line. (Jockey dropped left rein 50M.)
Bumped at the start, held up in mid-division, headway from 300M, chased leaders home, just missed 3rd.
Chased leaders, loomed a threat 300M out, run ended 100M and no extra late stages.
Led early before sitting back behind leaders from 700M, ran home one paced and always well held by leaders.
Restrained and shifted across behind runners early stages, towards the rear 4Ls off the pace, ran home fairly, never a threat to leaders.
Began awkwardly, pressed forward to be vying for the lead, outpaced by rivals 200M out, faded towards the finish.
Began fairly, held up towards the rear, driven and stayed on fairly final 400M, not reached leaders.
Vied for the lead in first half of the race, fought hard to stay in contention from 350M, got outpaced 200M and soon no extra.
Settled in midfield early stages, couldn't pick up when the race got serious passing 500M, never dangerous.
Urged to take up a forward position just off leaders, failed to respond when driven along passing halfway, weakened towards the finish.
Vied for the lead, outpaced going into 300M, weakened rapidly over final 200M.
Shifted across behind runners early stages, raced near the rear, came under pressure 600M, soon beaten.
Jumped well from the widest gate, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, there to turn, hit the front 250M, kept on strongly to the line and scored.
Away well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2 lengths back turning in, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, always held.

Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide behind midfield early, 3 wide after passing 950M, commenced move 550M, made good progress in straight to take a place, no threat to the first two. (See Racing Incidents.)
Moderately away from gate 1, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 150M.
Taken back from gate 11, raced 2 wide towards rear, commenced move after passing 600M, very wide into straight, made minor progress in the run home.
Average to begin, showed no early speed, raced at rear on the inside, 2 wide on turn, angled out after passing 500M, made minor progress in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide at rear, carried wider 800M, very wide turning in, passed some tired runners in straight.
Shifted in at start, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Away with them, raced 3 wide with no cover in midfield, similar position on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.

Reared leaving stalls and missed break, recovered to race behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, angled out 450M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Moderately away, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, made no progress in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped well from a wide draw, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length, travelled well on turn, peaked early in straight, headed 250M, weakened final furlong.
Average to begin, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Jumped with them, raced at rear on the outside, very wide turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Commenced well, raced prominently, 2 wide, travelled well throughout, hard ridden after passing 350M, hit the front 150M, ran on very well to the line.
Moderately away, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, finished off well to take 2nd close home.
Began well, sent forward to take the lead, led by 1/2L on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, ran on evenly, lost 2nd close home.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, kept on well in straight without threatening.
Lifted front feet on jumping and away tardily, raced at tail, 7 to 8 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to be nearest on line. (See Racing Incidents.)
Bumped start, raced 3 wide with cover, 3 to 4 lengths back, commenced move 500M, very wide into straight, made some progress in the run home.
Jumped with them, raced prominently, 3 wide, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, similar position on turn, finished off evenly.
Began only fairly, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Quickly into stride, raced 3 wide with cover better than midfield, wider turning in, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide towards rear, very wide into straight, one-paced in the run home.
Taken back from gate 12, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Away with them, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, 5 lengths back turning in, showed no response early in straight, weakened thereafter.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jumped well from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, led by 1/2L, challenged turning in, kept on strongly in straight and scored.
Clean jump, positioned 2 wide in midfield, moved a bit closer on turn, hard ridden after passing 400M, finished off well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Inconvenienced at start, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, a bit closer on turn, angled out 350M, made very good progress final 150M to be nearest on line.
Moderately away, sat right behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, kept on evenly in straight.
Slowly away, raced at tail, 6 lengths or so back, closer in the middle stages but still the last, bumped early in straight, made some progress thereafter.
Jumped well, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide, challenged the leader turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Began well, raced 2 wide, 3 lengths or so back, a bit closer on turn, very wide into straight, bumped near 200M, one-paced thereafter.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide at rear, moved closer after passing 650M, 2 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, made all.
Sat outside the leader, ran on well for 2nd.
Sat in front of midfield, lost ground 600M, raced flat until 200M progressed steadily for 3rd.
Pushed forward, box seat, ran on fairly.
Slow away, at back, 2 wide, progressed steadily 250M.
At back along the fence, lack room most straight, made steady ground.
Midfield, 2 wide, ran on fairly, noted to be lame left fore on the day after racing.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, blocked whole straight, not properly tested.
Eased back, 2 wide, blocked most straight and checked, ran on ok.
Eased at start, trapped 3-4 wide, made early move from 600M, run ended 300M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Eased at start, took rail, no progress, substantial blood in trachea after racing.

Pushed forward early, near the 1500M whilst being shifted across to obtain cover clipped heels and stumbled, trapped 3 wide throughout, emptied 300M, sustained lacerations in right fore fetlock after racing.
Raced prominently and took lead, along the rail, continued on strongly and won by a Neck.
Sent forward and raced next to the leader, 2 wide, ran on nicely but effort couldn't match the winner.
At rear, 2 wide, fought on steadily under pressure but never threatening.
Sent forward, 3 wide no cover, ran on fairly to the line for 4th.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, fought on steadily to the line.
At rear, wide but with cover, made limited progress on straightening, no threat to leaders. (See incident report)
Sat in front of midfield, 2 wide after 600M, pretty one paced.
Travelled in midfield, along the rail, not quickened under pressure.
Stayed in midfield, along the rail, faded towards the line.
Settled in behind midfield, wide no cover, swung widest on straightening, remained one paced to the line.
Settled in worse than midfield, wide but with cover, did not feature.
At rear, 2 wide, showed nothing in the Straight.

Shifted behind runners at start & settled third last along rail. Held up on cornering, shifted outwards after straightening, shifted out further 150m before flying home in final few strides to snatch lead late.

Pushed forward to race second away from the rail. Headed for second place near the 600m mark, cornered between runners only half length from lead, raced tight when moving to share lead 150m until over-run by closer late.

Obtained good position 1,1 in early stages. Moved three wide near the 700m & improved to second place near the 600m when improving. Shared lead most of straight until overpowered by fast finishing winner in closing stages.
Pushed forward to lead. Joined & headed approaching 200m mark before weakening a length or two to well beaten 4th.
Had nice run on leaders back throughout. Stayed along the rail on cornering, only 1L from lead approaching 100m mark before emptying & weakening a few lengths late.

Raced in midfield along the rail in early stages. Moved away from the rail approaching 600m bend, only 2L from lead at 400m, awkwardly near heels at 150m, peaked on effort before weakening a few lengths thereafter.
Raced just worse than midfield away from the rail. Moved three wide with cover approaching 600m bend, only 2L behind entering last section before weakening a few lengths in dash to line.

Shifted back & raced second last. Moved 4 wide with cover in middle stages when improving to midfield, hampered & taken very wide around home bend & relegated to last, well beaten before shifting in 100m to avoid incident.

Raced in midfield away from rail, moved 3 wide near 900m before improving around the field to be third near 650m but racing 4 wide without cover. Began yielding ground at 500m, severely checked 100m but already beaten.

Placing: UR
Comment: Steadied after start & raced at tail. Shifted second widest when travelling strongly on cornering, began closing strongly down outside, looked winner before breaking down badly at 100m mark. Failed to finish.

Prominent early before steadying at first corner & shifting down to the rail in midfield. Hampered near 850m & lost a length. Moved away from rail approaching the corner, sprinted quickly to lead 125m, held late challenger.

Began awkwardly & bumped before drifting back to race worse than midfield away from rail. Shifted wider on straightening when over 5L behind before making strong late headway down the outside to be only a neck behind.

Not fast away, shifted behind runners after start & raced second last on rail. Shifted away from inside just prior to straightening before shifting out further at 100m when closing strongly, beaten only half-length on line.

Bumped at start before striding forward to get nice run 1,1 throughout. Eased three wide on cornering, peaked on effort at 150m mark when only about a length form the lead before holding similar margin to line.

Out-sped after start & drifted back to race just worse than midfield along rail in early & middle stages. Entered last section just under 5L behind, made steadily late headway between runners when running onto midfield late.

Ridden forward, wide at first bend before steadying & shifting back to midfield away from rail. Entered last section over 4L behind, eased wider on cornering, made up a length or so when running on to midfield.

Slow to begin raced a clear last throughout. Continued a clear last passing 400m mark when 8L from the lead, cornered very wide before making good late ground to be beaten 3L in midfield from a long way back.
Began fast to lead. Continued to lead until being joined by winner approaching the 100m mark & weakening a few lengths thereafter.
Had nice run on leaders back throughout. Continued on leaders back entering straight, not much room after 150m mark when tight between runners but was never running on enough to challenge.
Was three wide around first bend before continuing on & shifting in to be outside the leader from 900m. Continued in second until emptying out at the 150m mark & weakening thereafter. (See report).

Raced very wide around first bend before shifting in to race two wide in midfield for the majority. Entered last section just under 3L behind before emptying at 200m, steadied away from heels at 100m but was already beaten.

Steadied in early stages & shifted back to third last away from rail. Was second last entering last section when just under 7L from the lead, second widest on straightening, failed to run on in straight. Last.
Took back and raced at the tail, on rail, angled widest on exit, closed off strongly to come out top in a blan-ket finish.
In worse than midfield, shifted 3 wide no cover near 800M, ran home gamely, only caught by winner in the last strides.
Sat in midfield, 2 wide, ran on nicely to the line in a very tight finish.
Raced at the rear, 3 wide with cover at turns, saved ground and closed off nicely in a blanket finish.
Worked forward gradually, 2 wide and about 1-1/2L off, kicked on early before weakening late.
Travelled in midfield, along the rail, in touch with the contenders until 100M out when couldn't find extra.
Awkward start, in worse than midfield and on rail, showed nothing and lost ground in the straight.
Ridden forward, on rail and led, shuffled back near 1000M, no turn of foot and weakened near 200M.
In midfield, wide and no cover, made early move and took lead at 600M, emptied approaching 200M.
Niggled along before settling in box-seat, about 3L off however, pressured 600M out, showed nothing. (See Incident Report)
Sent forward and was 2 wide, pressed on and took rail near 1000M, run ended approaching 200M. (See Inci-dent Report)
In front of midfield, 2 wide, raced keenly, found nothing and eased down at 200M. (See Incident Report)

Stumbled at start, travelled keenly in 5th within 3L of pace, became 6th in similar position rounding home bend, quickened well but veered right sharply inside the 150 metres, hit the front 50 metres out.

Began well from a wide gate, improved to join the leader 800 metres out gaining slender advantage 600 metres out, came under strong pressure to hold place around home turn but worn down by fast-finishing winner over 50 metres out.
Taken back from the wide gate, commenced move passing the 500 metres circling the field on home bend, widest runner turning in, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Broke well to lead, narrowly headed 700 metres out, kept on under pressure until the final stages.

Broke well from the widest gate, taken back to midfield but raced 3 wide without cover most of the way in back straight and around home bend, ran on under pressure to be nearest at finish. (Tactic questioned)
Inconvenienced at start, gradually picked up to rear of field on the rail, hampered and lost position over 450 metres out, finished off the race strongly.
Travelled keenly outside the leader, taken one out one back to 3rd passing the 800 metres, came to challenge making home turn, badly hampered inside the 150 metres, kept on to the line.
Jumped fairly settling just off the pace in 4th on the rail, came under pressure shortly after straightening but only one-paced.
Travelled keenly in midfield, checked and lost about 2L passing the 500 metres, in last few turning into home straight, kept on one pace.
Settled in last few, wide rounding home bend, never seen with a chance.
Settled in rear of midfield on the rail, lost position rounding home bend though saved ground entering straight, folded up quickly.
Jumped well from draw 1, restrained to race just ahead of midfield, switched out nearing top of straight and closed off strongly to lead inside 150M, well in control late.
Settled in a 2-wide spot ahead of midfield, taken wide for his challenge nearing 400M, stayed on well and just couldn't match winner's pace final 150M.
Not hurried, settled towards the rear in a race run at even tempo, ran on steadily turning for home, got up for 3rd nearing 50M.
From draw 9 dropped back to race near last, 6Ls to make up 400M, picked up strongly over final 200M to be nearest at the line, just missed 3rd.
Held up behind mid-division 4-5Ls back, taken wide into straight, ran on mildly final 300M, no threat to first 4.
Chased leaders 2-wide, loomed a threat passing 300M, challenged for the lead mid-straight, not pace of rivals closing stages.
Began only fairly, restrained in midfield, raced keenly after 650M, kept up with rivals early straight, got held up 150-100M and lost every chance.
Began fairly, recovered to race behind leaders, well placed to strike turning in, chased on well early straight but was out-finished final 150M. (Jockey concerned his horse's action pre-race.)
Crowded for room at the start, taken back to last, 5-6Ls to make up turning for home, made non threatening progress final 300M.
Positively ridden, crossed to the lead 1000M and set even tempo, fought on early straight before being caught by rivals 150M, no extra late stages.
Settled down 3-wide in midfield, wide no cover from 900M, widest into straight, failed to finish off.
Strolled forward to track leader one out one back, lacked further response from 350M, weakened to finish last. (Jockey : horse would not relax outside the lead.)
Began smartly from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on very well in straight, easily scored.
Began only fairly, raced behind midfield, moved a bit closer after passing 800M, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Commenced well, raced prominently, 2 wide, wider turning in, kept on well in straight to take a place without threatening.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 3 lengths back on turn, finished off evenly.
Moderately away, unable to slot in, raced 3 wide better than midfield, 3 lengths or so back on turn, kept on evenly in straight.
Lifted front feet on jumping, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground throughout, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the inside, 6 lengths back on turn, passed some tired runners in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 7 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made minor progress in the run home. (See Racing Incidents.)
Slightly slow out, raced behind midfield on the outside, commenced move after entering the back straight, 2nd on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide, 3 lengths or so back, lost position on turn, made no impression in straight.
Away with them, raced in midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Average to begin, raced in midfield on the outside, peaked in the middle stages, emptied early in straight when hard run took effect. (See Racing Incidents.)

Away well, raced in midfield on the outside, 2 lengths or so back on turn, finished off strongly, just prevailed in bobbing finish.
Began fairly from gate 1, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, finished off very well, just held in bobbing finish.
Slowly away, raced at tail, 10 lengths or so back, still well back on turn, made very good progress in straight to take a place, nearest on line.

Began well, positioned a length behind the leader on the inside, easy run on turn, showed good response early in straight, took the lead near 150M, peaked and headed near 50M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Began smartly from a wide draw, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length turning in, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed after passing 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Slow to begin, raced towards rear on the outside, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide turning in, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 150M.
Began well, raced 2 wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, no clear run early in straight, peaked on run near 200M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Began smartly, raced prominently on the outside, a length or so back, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move after passing 450M, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.
Moderately away, raced behind midfield, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Slowly away, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide in midfield, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Hard ridden to lead, drifted away 300M to score.
Took prominent position, ran on well to the line whilst hanging in.
Bumped start, midfield, made steady ground 400M.
Eased to sit in midfield, progressed steadily 250M.
Eased to sit behind the leaders, weakened 100M.
Midfield, ran on ok.
At rear, raced flat until 150M made ground.
Pressed forward, out of fuel 250M, lame left fore after racing.
Very slow away, at rear, ran on ok.
At back, no progress.
Settled in front, emptied 200M, substantial blood in trachea after racing.
Never competitive.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, dropped off 300M.
Never a factor, tailed out.
Sent forward and took lead, kept on strongly to the line and scored by 3/4L.
Raced in front of midfield, 3 wide no cover, showed good kick in the last 150M and finished off strongly to take 2nd, always held.
At one-out one-back, ran on fairly to the line to take 3rd.
Raced behind the leader, along the rail, ran on fairly and headed near 100M.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, had difficulty obtaining clear running early in straight and showed little dash in the last 100M.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, swung widest on Straightening, made minor ground in the last 100M
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, only one paced in the Straight.
Sent forward and raced next to the leader, 2 wide, lost ground after passing 200M. (See incident report)
At rear, along the rail, one paced only.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, failed to close off in straight.
At rear, along the rail, did not feature.
At rear, wide but with cover, failed to make any progress in the run home.
At rear, 2 wide, never dangerous.
Raced in worse than midfield, wide no cover, lost ground in the Straight.
Raced in midfield along the rail. Improved closer to lead approaching corner, entered last section under 2L behind before shifting out soon after & closing off well to strike lead 150m.

Crowded & had no early speed & consequently raced at the tail between runners. Shifted to be second widest on cornering, entered last section 6.5L from lead before closing strongly down outside to move to second late.
Raced in midfield on rail. Moved closer to be on the leaders back approaching corner, dashed up to lead at 300m before being over-run in final 150m. Held third but had every chance.

Was prominent early but was very wide & consequently steadied & drifted right back to worse than midfield. Cornered very wide when about third last before making steady late ground down the outside to well beaten 4th.

Steadied away from heels when shifting down to rail after start before improving slightly & raced just worse than midfield on rail. Obtained clear running on straightening when 3L behind, finished only steadily in straight.

Raced in midfield, 3 wide early before 2 wide after first bend. Eased wider passing 500m mark, about 4L from lead on straightening & could only maintain that margin when holding midfield finish on line.

Began well before steadying & drifting back to just worse than midfield. Raced a touch wide but with cover around first bend before being hampered on corner. Straightened 4.5L from lead & effectively held that margin to line.

Out-sped after start & shared last place when racing on rail. Moved off the rail passing 500m, entered last section about 5L from lead before finishing off steadily in the run to the line to be beaten about the same margin.

Shifted behind runners after start to race worse than midfield between horses throughout. Shifted 3 wide to improve passing 550m, forced second widest on cornering when 5L from lead before finishing only one paced to line.
Began fast to lead. Raced 2L clear approaching corner before emptying at 250m & weakening out in final furlong.
Had a nice run just behind the leaders in fourth. Eased 3 wide passing 600m mark, entered last section just over 2L behind before emptying early in straight & weakening poorly in concluding stages.

Drifted back from outside gate & raced on the outside in a line of 3 at tail. Relegated to a clear last after first turn, over 8L behind on straightening when continuing at tail before making no real headway in straight.
Ridden forward to be prominent but was caught 3 deep without cover in third for the majority. Began losing ground from the 600m mark & weakened significantly in straight to be long second last.
Ridden forward, moved to second place after the first furlong when away from the rail. Was beaten before the corner & weakened out poorly in the straight to be long last. (Lame next day).
Began awkwardly, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably throughout, kept on strongly in straight, easily scored.
Began well from a wide draw, raced behind midfield on the outside, no cover after 850M, very wide turning in, finished off strongly to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Away with them, raced at rear on the inside in the early stages, angled out 800M, still well back on turn, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to take a place, nearest on line.

Began fairly from a wide draw, raced better than midfield on the outside, moved closer after entering the back straight, 2nd on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Commenced well from gate 1, raced better than midfield on the inside, angled out 500M, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Made contact at start, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, 8 lengths back on turn, made minor progress in straight, blocked close home.
Fast into stride, raced better than midfield on the inside, 2 to 3 lengths back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Moderately away, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced towards rear on the outside, 9 lengths back on turn, finished off evenly.
Began fairly, raced 3 wide slightly better than midfield, wider turning in, made no progress in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear, 9 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, failed to close off in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, peaked on turn, weakened gradually in straight.
Made contact at start, raced prominently on the outside, allowed rival to cross near 900M, peaked on turn, weakened final 400M.
Raced at rear throughout, never a factor. (See Racing Incidents.)
Worked forward gradually, took rail and led prior to 900M, kept going and won comfortably by 2-1/2L.
Bumped start, raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, kept finding and finished 2nd just in front of some others.
Eased and shifted to behind midfield, 2 wide, showed good dashes in the straight, hit the line well for 3rd.
Ridden along, claimed box-seat, about 1-1/2L off, ran on one paced to the line.
Eased back, raced towards the rear, 2 wide, saved ground and hit the line fairly.
Niggled along, settled one-out one-back, almost 3L off, found no extra passing 200M. (Lame right front)
Bumped start, raced in midfield, 2 wide, held up slightly near 350M, was one paced nonetheless.
Took back, at the tail and remained 2 wide until about 600M, ran on without threatening. (Lame left hind)
Slow to jump, ridden to recover, sat outside lead, weakened gradually in the straight. (Lost left front plate and See Incident Report)
Awkward start, sat just in front of midfield, wide and no cover, never threaten.
Bumped start, in behind midfield, along the rail, showed no kick.
Slightly slow away, raced towards the rear, on rail, found nothing in the straight.
Ridden along, raced in front of midfield, on rail, found no more approaching 200M.
Crowded start, recovered in midfield on rail, run end-ed after 300M.

Ridden forward from the widest gate, settled over 1L back in 3rd 3-wide without cover into back straight, held similar position turning for home, hit the front under pressure 200 metres out, won readily.
Niggled along at the back, came to challenge under pressure upon straightening, finished off the race well to snatch 2nd late but never threatened the winner.
Ridden early before settling in 2nd outside the leader, unable to quicken to threaten in straight and lost 2nd late.
Jumped well but slow to muster settling towards the rear, commenced move out wide rounding home bend and very wide into straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Took up running from the one draw, held half a length advantage most of the way until finding no extra inside final 200 metres.
Close up early before settling back in 4th some 2L off the speed, came under pressure rounding home bend and given reminders into straight, found nothing.
Slow to muster, travelled wide without cover behind midfield, lay out on the bend and the widest of all turning into straight, ran on past well-beaten horses in the run to the line.
Ridden along before settling in midfield, dropped slightly backward passing the 900 metres, renewed effort rounding home bend, ran home one-paced.
Never better than midfield, kept on under pressure early in straight before finding no extra inside final 200 metres.
Settled over 2L back in joint 4th on the rail, became 6th before coming under pressure rounding home bend, folded up quickly inside final 300 metres.
Travelled wide without cover in midfield, made steady headway on the outside from the 900 metres to reach 4th briefly rounding home bend, dropped away quickly after straightening.
Crowded shortly after the start, tailed-off most of the way and never seen with a chance.
Pressed forward from a wide gate travelling just better than midfield, dropped out under pressure from the 700 metres.
Reserved towards the rear, taken wide from 500M, closed off strongly to lead 50M out, won going away.
From wide draw chased leaders in a 3-wide spot without cover, gained lead inside 300M, kept on but unable to hold off the fast finishing winner final stages.
Never far off the pace, in 5th place making the home turn, kept on steadily when driven out in straight, got up for distant 3rd near line.
Tracked leader, moved up to challenge 500M out, vied for lead early straight, outpaced final 200M.
Settled in mid-division, wide into straight, kept on fairly passing 300M, not reached leaders.
Failed to muster speed after beginning fairly, settled towards the rear, made non-threatening progress final 300M on his AWT debut.
From wide draw taken back to race near the rear, ridden along 500M but responded only fairly, never a threat to leaders.
Ridden along but not showing enough speed to lead, chased leaders into straight, failed to quicken when asked, out of contention 200M. (Jockey: appeared to resent the kickback / Lame next day.)
Held up midfield, ridden 2 1/2f out, outpaced turning for home, faded mid-straight.
Settled 3-wide behind midfield, widest making the home turn, made no progress in the run home.
Began awkwardly, taken back and always towards the rear, failed to finish off on straightening.
Led as expected, pressed by rival from 600M, soon headed turning home, weakened away final 200M. (No vet findings.)
Bumped start, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, there to turn, closed off well to score by a head.
Began smartly, raced prominently on the inside, travelled comfortably on turn, kept on very well in straight, just unable to hold off the winner close home.
Clean jump, raced 3 wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, no cover throughout, finished off well to take a place, nearest on line.
Taken back from gate 9, raced at rear on the inside, 6 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, made good progress in straight to make frame.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide in midfield, a bit closer on turn, kept on well in straight without threatening.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back, 3 wide turning in, made some headway in straight without threatening. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began well from a wide draw, raced behind midfield on the outside, angled out after passing 550M, made minor progress in straight.
Commenced well, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide at rear, 6 lengths back, wider turning in, no clear running early in straight, cleared near 200M, finished off evenly.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced towards rear on the outside, 5 to 6 lengths back, very wide turning in, one-paced in straight.
Jumped with them, raced behind midfield on the inside, 4 lengths back, angled out 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Jumped well from a wide draw, sent forward to take the lead, 2 wide, headed near 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Slightly slow out, raced at rear throughout, never a threat.
Began awkwardly, positioned on rail in midfield, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight.
Jumped well from gate 13, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, easy run on turn, finished off well to score.
Began smartly from the widest draw, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length on turn, kept on very well in straight, just unable to hold off the winner late.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide better than midfield, no cover throughout, kept on well in straight to take a place.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced 3 wide behind midfield early, found a 2 wide spot near 1000M, commenced move 550M, made good progress in straight to make frame without threatening.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide in midfield, a bit closer on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 lengths or so back, wider turning in, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Moderately away, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Bumped start, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Shifted out at start and bumped, positioned on rail in midfield, angled out after passing 550M, showed limited response in straight.
Average to begin, showed no early speed, raced at rear on the inside, 7 lengths back, saved ground on turn, made no impression in straight.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide at rear, 7 lengths or so back, commenced move 550M, very wide into straight, made no impression in the run home.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 9 lengths back, same margin back on turn, made minor progress early in straight, peaked 200M, not enough room final 50M.
Made contact at start, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
