Average to begin, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on the inside, similar position on turn, no daylight early in straight, cleared 250M, finished off strongly to score by a neck.
Jumped well from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, 5 lengths or so back, a bit closer in the middle stages, made very good progress in straight to take 2nd, nearest on line.

Began well, raced slightly behind midfield on the outside, found cover near 1000M, a bit closer in the middle stages, showed good response after turning in, hit the front 150M, kept on well but unable to hold off the first two late.
Commenced well from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, easy run to turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared after passing 200M, finished off well to make frame.
Away with them, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, challenged the leader on turn, took the lead 300M, peaked and headed 150M, weakened gradually final 100M.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide at rear, carried wider after passing 700M, very wide into straight, bumped near 300M, made minor progress thereafter.
Bumped start, raced at rear on the inside, angled out after passing 700M, bumped near 300M, finished off evenly.
Jumped with them, sent forward to take the lead, challenged by rival on turn, peaked early in straight, headed 300M, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Shifted out on jumping and bumped, raced 2 wide, 2 lengths back, 3 wide from 1000M, closer on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 300M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, closer on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened and eased final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Bumped start, raced at tail throughout, never a factor. (Injured right front tendon.)
Behind midfield, 2 wide, made steady ground 400M to score.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, 2 wide, lack room 4-2, ran on strongly when clear.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, progressed steadily 400M for 3rd.
Hard ridden to take rail and share the lead, hung on until 200M overhauled.
Box seat, blocked 4-2, ran on ok.
Eased at start, 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 300M.
Eased back, took rail, lack room 4-2, made steady ground when clear.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, made ground 200M.
Pushed to share the lead, emptied 250M.
At back, never improved, bled from both nostrils after racing.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, checked 1000M and 200M, no progress, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Hard ridden early, trapped 3 wide in midfield, out of fuel 350M, substantial blood in trachea after racing.
Hard ridden to keep up in front of midfield, weakened 300M, was noted to make abnormal breathing noise during racing and was found to be a "roarer".
Eased to sit just off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, emptied 300M.
Raced in worse than midfield, 2 wide, improved strongly and made significant ground in the last 250M and scored by a neck.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail after 850M, headed in the last 25M and still stayed on and took 2nd.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, only obtained a clear run after 300M and made some ground in the Straight for 3rd.
At one-out one-back after 900M, 2 wide, kept on going to the line.
Raced behind the leader after 950M, along the rail, remain one paced to the line.
At rear, along the rail, made ground and travelled strongly in the last 200M.
Began awkwardly and lost ground, behind midfield, along the rail, bumped a runner at 200M and ran only fairly. (Roarer)
At rear, 2 wide, made minor ground only.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, bumped at 200M and flattened thereafter.
At rear, 2 wide, swung widest on Straightening, did not improved in the Straight.
Began awkwardly and at rear, along the rail, only one paced in the Straight.
Settled in midfield, 2 wide, passing 350M raced tight, nothing in the Straight.
At rear, 2 wide, nothing in the Straight.
Sent forward and raced next to the leader after 900M, 2 wide, lost ground in the Straight.

Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Shifted to the center of the track entering last section when 4L from the lead before closing very strongly in final 100m to strike lead inside final 50m & win running away.
Began fastest to lead. Held a length advantage passing the 400m mark, held similar advantage at the 100m mark before over-run by winner in late stages.
Raced second early before getting nice position 1,1 from the 800m. Hung outwards entering the last section when 2L from the lead before finishing well to be third only 1.5L behind.

Raced wide after start before steadying & drifting back to race just worse than midfield away from rail. Shifted wider approaching the corner, entered last section 5L from the lead before closing well in the late stages.

Raced wide in early stages before shifting to be 2 wide in midfield from the 800m. Eased 3 wide approaching corner, entered last section just under 3L from lead before pretty much holding position in run to line.
Shifted behind runners & raced second last away from rail. Straightened a clear second last, over 7L from the lead before finishing very strongly in the late stages to be beaten under 3L. Good debut.
Had nice run on leaders back throughout. Continued on leaders back on straightening when just under 2L behind before finishing only moderately when weakening slightly to midfield.

Raced in midfield, attempted to stay off the rail before being steadied away from heels & consequently shifting down to rail near 800m. Straightened about 3L from the lead & only held position in the run to the line.

Raced 3 wide on speed early before improving to race 2 wide outside the leader from the 800m. Entered last section 1L from the lead in second before peaking at 150m mark & weakening a length or so late.

Crowded on jumping before shifting behind runners before making up some ground along the rail to race in midfield from 1000m. Stayed along the rail on straightening when 4L behind before running on only fairly to midfield.
Steadied & shifted back to race 4th last away from rail. Shifted to be wide on straightening when just under 7L from the lead, made up a few lengths in run to line but was unable to pass many rivals.
Shifted across behind runners to race third last on rail. Over 6L behind on straightening & never challenged in run to line.
Shifted behind runners & raced at the tail. Continued last on straightening when 7.5L form the lead & failed to really run on in last section.

Raced in midfield between runners before hanging out around the 900m bend & racing wide thereafter. Was the widest runner on straightening when just over 5L from the lead before weakening out to last in straight.
Taken back from gate 12, raced 3 wide at rear, made contact near 1250M, moved closer in the middle stages, 4 wide turning in, hit the front 250M, kept on very well to the line and scored.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the outside, made contact near 1250M, moved a bit closer on turn, very wide into straight, finished off strongly to take 2nd.
Bumped start, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, 2 wide from 500M, unable to obtain clear running until final 150M, made good progress thereafter to take a place.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide better than midfield early, moved a bit closer after passing 1100M, 2nd on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked 150M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 3 wide after passing 700M, ridden 550M, made some headway in straight, not clear final 50M.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide at rear, 6 lengths back, very wide turning in, made some progress in straight.
Made contact at start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 200M, weakened final 100M.
Slowly away, raced at tail, 7 to 8 lengths back, moved a bit closer after passing 700M, very wide turning in, made some headway in straight.
Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the inside, 2 wide on turn, finished off evenly.
Began well from gate 13, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, angled out 500M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Away with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, travelled keenly in the early stages, similar position on turn, one-paced in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Crowded on jumping, raced at rear on the inside, angled out 550M, weakened gradually in straight.
Moderately away, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Settled in midfield, wide and had no cover until about 700M, ran on very nicely to win by a neck.
In about midfield, loose one off, made sound ef-fort home but not enough to hold off winner.
Bumped start, in worse than midfield, wide but with cover, dashed nicely, kept on to take 3rd.
Raced towards the rear, 2 wide, saved ground and closed off fairly.
Slotted in to race in about midfield, 2 wide, no daylight until near 200M, one paced thereafter.
Took back, raced at the tail, 2 wide, made minor ground, finished off fairly.
Urged along and slotted in front of midfield, wide and no cover at times, nothing for final 150M.
Sent forward, took rail and led, peaked and headed passing 200M.
On rail in worse than midfield, keen and couldn't handle turn at 900M, crowded at 300M, showed no turn of foot. (See Incident Report)
Niggled along, settled box-seat 2L behind, showed no kick and faded out at 150M. (See In-cident Report)
Stumbled at start, took position one-out one-back, about 2L off, faded near 250M.
Bumped start, sat outside lead, emptied ap-proaching 300M.
Began well, restrained towards the rear, shifted 3-wide rounding home bend and wider into straight, quickened well inside final 250 metres to just get up on line.
Soon took up running and setting a sedate pace, remained unchallenged for lead to home straight, kicked 1L clear under pressure inside the 200 metres but only to be pipped at post.
Settled in forward of midfield on the rail, gained steadily to reach 2L 3rd 950 metres out, did not find much room behind leaders after straightening, fought on steadily to the line.
Travelled keenly in midfield of the slowly-run race, did not find much room early in straight, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Restrained behind the slow pacemaker, improved to alongside race leader rounding home bend, came to challenge under pressure shortly after straightening, found nothing.
Settled in last few, ran on steadily inside final 300 metres to be nearest at finish.
Travelled wide from a wide gate, improved from midfield to some 3L back in 4th becoming 5th rounding home bend, kept on same pace without quickening in straight. (Tactic questioned)
Broke well from the widest gate and soon taken back, trailed the field and widest into home straight, ran home one-paced.

Taken back from a wide gate for rails run near the rear, gained closer towards midfield in 7th over 1200 metres out, snuck up on the rail rounding home bend to come within 2L of the pace, weakened inside final 200 metres.
Settled not far off in 3rd or 4th, kept on before making no further impression inside final 200 metres.
Settled down in midfield after beginning fairly, 3-wide making home turn, responded well from 400M, led nearing 150M and always holding on final stages.
From wide draw dropped back to near the rear, 4-5Ls off the slow pace, brought widest 400M, ran on well to be nearest at the line.
Began fairly, caught wide no cover after 1000M, took closer order behind leaders 800M out, joined leaders mid-straight, outpaced by first 2 late.
Restrained from wide draw, settled midfield 3-wide in a slowly run race, stayed on steadily final 300M when driven out, nearest finish.
Soon led, took them along slowly, quickened up 600M, headed inside 200M but kept fighting on to be beaten not far at the line.
Raced towards the rear in a slowly run race, ran on steadily turning in, held by first few final stages.
Slowly away, soon shifted across behind runners, held up midfield on inside in a slow run race, pushed along 450M, ran on moderately, awkwardly placed 100M, got 7th late.
Taken back after the jump, settled in last further back than intended, not clear run turning in, was making headway when denied running again final 150M, not properly tested. (Jockey questioned.)
Stumbled at the start, always close up behind leaders, held up for clear running early straight, steadied 150M and not clear run again late.
Taken back for cover, unable to obtain clear running over final 300M, not tested.
Moved up to race just outside leader, fought on one paced in straight, swamped final 150M.
Tracked leaders along the fence in a slow run race, held ground on straightening, steadied near 100M, not beaten far despite finishing last.
Moderately away, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on strongly in straight, easily scored.
Began well, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move after passing 600M, finished off well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Began smartly from the widest draw, raced in 2nd, 2 wide on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked on run approaching 200M, ran on evenly to take a place.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider from 600M, made some progress in straight to make frame, no threat to the first few.
Jumped with them, raced 2 to 3 wide towards rear, wider turning in, passed some tired runners in straight.
Crowded start, raced behind midfield on the outside, no cover on turn, very wide into straight, made minor progress in the run home.
Taken back from gate 9, raced towards rear on the inside, angled out after passing 550M, made minor progress in straight.
Bumped start, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross near 1000M, saved ground on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, wider after passing 700M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Taken back from gate 13, raced at rear on the outside, 8 lengths or so back on turn, made little progress in straight.
Crowded on jumping, raced at rear on the inside, 9 lengths back, a bit closer in the middle stages, very wide turning in, one-paced in the home run.
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced slightly better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Away with them, raced behind midfield on the inside, 2 wide from 600M, showed some response early in straight, peaked 200M, weakened thereafter.
Out with rest, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths back, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Clean jump, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, easy run to turn, hard ridden approaching 200M, finished off strongly to score by a narrow margin.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length, travelled comfortably on turn, kept on very well in straight, just unable to hold off the winner on line.
Moderately away, positioned 2 wide behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to be nearest on line.
Moderately away from a wide draw, unable to slot in, trapped very wide, 2 lengths or so back, closer on turn, kept on well in straight to make frame.
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced in midfield on the outside, very wide turning in, kept on well in straight without threatening.
Away with them, raced in midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Moderately away, raced towards rear on the inside, angled out 500M, made minor progress in straight.
Taken back from gate 13, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, very wide into straight, made some progress in the run home.
Average to begin, raced at tail, 7 lengths back, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, kept to inside after straightening and made minor progress.
Out in line, raced in 2nd, 2 wide on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong. (Blood in trachea.)
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out 600M, showed limited response early in straight, made contact near 300M, weakened final furlong.
Began well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2 lengths back on turn, no clear running early in straight, made contact 300M, weakened gradually final 150M.
Out with rest, raced 2 wide at rear, checked near 1000M, 5 lengths or so back on turn, made no progress in straight.

Made contact at start, sat right behind the leader on the inside, saved ground throughout, finished off very strongly to score.
Began smartly from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length on turn, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the winner final 50M.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2 lengths or so back, there to turn, made some progress early in straight, peaked on run 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Bumped start, raced at rear on the outside, 7 lengths or so back on turn, made good progress in straight to make frame, nearest on line.
Made contact at start, positioned on rail in midfield, 3 lengths back, saved ground throughout, kept to inside after straightening and finished off evenly.
Began awkwardly, raced at rear on the inside, 6 lengths back, same margin back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Bumped start, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, a length back on turn, kept on well early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, very wide into straight, finished off evenly.
Jumped with them, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Began well from a wide draw, raced 3 wide slightly better than midfield, no cover throughout, peaked on turn, weakened gradually in straight, eased final 100M.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, made no progress in straight. (See Racing Incidents.) (Lame right front leg.)
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide towards rear, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight.
Eased at start, took cover at back, worked around the field from 600M, closed off strongly 300M to score.
Eased to sit in midfield on the fence, lack room 400M, progressed steadily when clear.
Hard ridden forward, box seat, ran on well for 3rd.
In front of midfield, 2 wide, was bumped 400M, on heels 300M, progressed steadily.
Eased to sit off the leaders, 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, made ground 250M.
At back, 2 wide, ran on ok.
At back along the fence, ran on fairly.
Bumped start, hard ridden to take rail and lead, out of fuel 250M.
Eased back, trapped 4 wide throughout, faded rapidly 500M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Hard ridden early, behind midfield, trapped 3 wide, emptied 400M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Pushed forward, but trapped 3-4 wide throughout behind the leaders, dropped off quickly 600M, noted the horse to be lame left fore on the day after racing.
Raced behind the leader, along the rail, battled on to the line and scored by 1L.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, ran on well but headed in the last 100M.
At rear, along the rail, saved ground and closed off strongly for 3rd.
At one-out one-back after 700M, continued on in the early part of the Straight but emptied in the last 50M.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, swung widest on Straightening, made ground strongly in the last 100M.
Bumped start and settled in midfield, wide no cover after 700M, pretty one paced in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, was held up for clear running in the early part of the Straight, one paced thereafter.
Pressed forward from a wide barrier, 2 wide after 700M, weakened passing 100M and lost ground.
At rear, along the rail, made no ground in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, lay in passing 600M when making the turn, no progress. (Mucus in trachea)
At rear, 2 wide, made no ground in the Straight. (Roarer)

Raced wide in midfield after jumping from widest gate before being left without cover near 700m when improving to third. Continued 3 wide outside leaders around bend, dashed to lead at 150m, drew away late for impressive win.
Ridden forward after start, left wide around first bend until improving position to be 2 wide & outside leader from the 700m. Shared lead 200m, boxed on well but no match for impressive winner.
Pushed forward to lead. Held lead until joined at 200m, boxed on to hold well beaten third. (Substantial blood in trachea post-race)

Crowded for room on jumping & consequently raced worse than midfield on rail. Shifted wider on straightening & wider again passing 200m before making up a length or so when running onto 4th place in late stages.
Raced handy before being crossed & racing on leaders back from 800m. Stayed close to rail in straight, finished only moderately to midfield.
Raced in midfield away from the rail throughout. Eased wider on straightening but made no headway, finishing off only one paced to midfield.
Raced in midfield along the rail throughout. Stayed closer to the inside on straightening before making no real headway when finishing off one paced in the run to the line.
Slow to begin & raced rearward for the majority. Over 6L from the lead entering last section, shifted wider after straightening before passing a few tiring rivals late, too far back to challenge.

Crowded & checked after start & raced rearward early before improving position near 800m to be racing 3 wide with cover in midfield from 700m. Cornered about 3L from the lead before peaking mid-straight & weakening late.
Raced close to the lead early before being crossed and racing 1,1 from the 700m. Peaked on effort soon after straightening & weakened out meekly in final furlong.
Shifted across behind runners at start & raced a clear last. Continued a clear last, 8L from the lead entering last section before failing to make any headway.
Began awkwardly & shifted out before racing worse than midfield away from the rail. Was third last 5.5L from lead entering last section before weakening poorly in the straight to be long last.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, commenced move 500M, finished off very strongly to score.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, moved closer on turn, very wide into straight, finished off strongly to take 2nd.
Lifted front feet on jumping and bumped, sent forward to take the lead, challenged on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, ran on evenly to the line.
Shifted out at start and bumped, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground to turn, angled out after passing 350M, finished off evenly.
Moderately away, positioned 1 out 1 back, commenced move after passing 550M, 2nd on turn, kept on well early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, found rail near 500M, 2 to 3 lengths back on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide towards rear, 5 lengths or so back, 3 wide on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Taken back from gate 9, raced at rear on the inside, 2 wide on turn, clipped heels and stumbled 400M, showed limited response in straight.
Hampered start, raced slightly behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made no progress in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 7 to 8 lengths back, a bit closer on turn but still the last, showed limited response early in straight, eased final 100M.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide in midfield, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight.
Made contact at start, sent forward to race prominently on the outside, peaked on run 600M, weakened on turn, eased early in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Sent forward, took rail and led making 600M turn, kept grinding and held off challenge to win by a nose. (Bled, both nostrils)
Sent forward, took rail before crossed to sit in box-seat, pushed leader to the line, just missed by a nose.
Bumped start, then urged along to be in front of mid-field, on rail, ran on well to the line to take 3rd.
Raced in about midfield, wide but had cover, saved ground whilst laying in, finished strongly.
Niggled along, allowed forward to be one-out one-back, kept on one paced to the line.
Bumped start, hard ridden to recover before interfered at 750M, in midfield 2 wide, tight near 300M, ran on fairly thereafter.
Began only fairly, sat in behind midfield, 2 wide, hampered after 800M, improved position slightly.
Settled in midfield, along the rail, crowded near 450M, fairly one paced.
Attempted position 2 wide in about midfield, kept wide however, hampered at 700M, one paced and was eased down late. (Mucus in trachea)
Eased back, remained at rear on the rail, ran on with-out threatening in the straight.
Outpaced early, settled at rear, 2-3 wide at turns, nev-er in it.
Crowded after start, raced towards the rear, 3 wide at turns, not competitive.
Settled over 4L back in 7th or 8th on the rail, saved ground on the inside turning into home straight, ran on well inside final 200 metres to take charge close to home.
Began well, settled one off the pace on the rail, commenced move rounding home bend and hit the front narrowly 300 metres out, outsprinted by the eventual winner inside final 50 metres.

Ridden positively to take up running turning into back straight, obtained rails run passing the 900 metres, steadied pace rounding home bend and was joined into home straight, unable to sustain effort inside final 100 metres.
Ridden up with the pace, settled 2L back in 3rd 2-wide, commenced move 3-wide rounding home bend, kept on same pace without quickening.
Began well settling in midfield in 6th over 4L off the pace, slightly closer when pace slackened rounding home bend, baulked early in straight but fought on steadily to the line.
Travelled in last few, widest into home straight, finished off the race strongly down the centre of the track.
Travelled 3-wide with cover in rear of midfield, slightly closer when pace slackened rounding home bend, kept on to the line.
Recovered swiftly from moderate start to forward of midfield sharing 4th 3-wide without cover in back straight, came under pressure approaching home bend, one-paced while hanging in in straight.

Ridden to be up with the pace early, restrained to share 4th about 3L off the pace on the rail, raced keenly in slackened pace rounding home bend, saved ground one back the rail into straight, folded up quickly.
Travelled worse than midfield most of the way, ran home one paced.
Minor bump at start, never seen with a chance.
Inconvenienced at start, soon dropped to last few despite ridden along, dropped away quickly after straightening.
Quickly into stride, tracked leader from 1000M, moved up to lead near 200M, held on well when pressed by runner up final stages.
Began on terms, always close up in 5th, chased on well into straight, held by winner final 100M.
Guided to the fence soon after the start, settled midfield, kept on well final 300M, not finishing pace of first 2 late stages.
From wide draw taken back to the rear, switched widest passing 400M, stayed on to take 4th near line, not reached first 3.
Jumped well from draw 1 to be tracking leader, responded only fairly coming off the bend, faded mid-straight and out of contention thereafter. (Blood in trachea.)
Held up behind mid-division, pushed along 400M, kept on fairly in straight, never able to challenge.
Dropped back to near the rear, ran past beaten horses in the straight, never reached contention.
Began only fairly, settled towards the rear 6Ls back, made some progress over final 300M without troubling leaders.
Took up running behind midfield, saved ground on inside, not quickened when urged from 400M, never dangerous.
Unable to slot in from draw 11, caught wide no cover chasing leaders, fought on early straight, no extra passing 200M.
Away with them, emerged as leader passing 1000M, found no extra nearing 200M, soon headed and weakened badly. (Jockey: raced keenly not able to finish off.)
Caught 3-wide in mid-division, swung wide into straight, soon beaten.
Hampered start, raced in midfield, 4 to 5 lengths back, commenced move 500M, wide into straight, finished off strongly to score.
Shifted out at start and made contact, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, easy run throughout, hit the front near 150M, ran on well but unable to hold off the winner final 50M.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, angled out 400M, kept on well in straight to take a place, always held.
Moderately away, raced behind midfield on the inside, 5 lengths back on turn, made some progress in straight to make frame, no threat to the first few.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, 4 lengths or so back, very wide turning in, finished off evenly.
Made contact at start, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened final 50M.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced at rear on the outside, 5 lengths or so back on turn, one-paced in straight.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced in midfield on the inside, 4 lengths back, saved ground throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Jumped with them, raced behind midfield on the outside, no cover on turn, very wide into straight, made no progress in the run home.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear throughout, never a factor. (See Racing Incidents.)
Away with them, raced at rear on the inside, 7 to 8 lengths back on turn, made no progress in straight.
Average to begin, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, peaked 400M, weakened early in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Fast into stride, sent forward to take the lead, hard ridden after passing 300M, kept on very well, easily scored.
Began well from gate 13, raced in 2nd, hard ridden from 400M, outpaced by clear winner final 250M, kept on well to take a place.
Bumped start, raced slightly better than midfield, 2 to 3 lengths back, hard ridden after passing 400M, made some progress to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Bumped on jumping, raced towards rear, 6 lengths back at 400M, finished off well to make frame without threatening.
Moderately away, raced better than midfield, 1 to 2 lengths back, hard ridden approaching 300M, peaked 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Away well, raced behind midfield nearer to the middle track, hard ridden from 500M, showed limited response, weakened final furlong.
Average to begin, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader, hard ridden 400M, peaked 300M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Slightly slow out, raced towards rear on the middle of the track, hard ridden after passing 400M, only showed limited response, weakened final furlong.
Bumped start, raced towards rear on the stands' side, failed to make any progress final 400M.
Moderately away, raced at rear on the stands' rail, 9 lengths back at 400M, made no progress thereafter.
Began awkwardly, chased leader on the stands' rail, peaked approaching 300M, weakened thereafter.
Slightly slow out, raced towards rear on the stands' side, peaked in the middle stages, weakened final 300M.
Away well, raced at rear, peaked in the middle stages, weakened final 400M.
Bumped on jumping, raced behind midfield early, weakened in the middle stages, eased final 250M. (Irregular heart rhythm.) (See Racing Incidents.)
Midfield, trapped 3 wide, dashed strongly to score.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, hung on well until final stride overhauled.
Box seat, lack room 400M, dashed well when clear.
Eased back, trapped 3-4 wide, unleashed strong finishing efforts 250M.
Slow away, midfield along the rails, blocked most straight, dashed well.
Slow away, at back along the fence, lack room 4-2, little dash when clear.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 3 wide, weakened 200M.
At back, 2 wide, little dash 250M.
Eased back, 2 wide, little dash 200M.
For majority of the race travelled wide and without cover in midfield, ran on ok in straight.
Eased to sit behind the leaders, 2 wide, out of fuel 300M.
Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, emptied 400M.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, ran on gamely to the line and scored impressively by 2-3/4L.
Raced behind the leader, along the rail, continued on to the line for 2nd.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, made ground steadily to the line.
Settled to race behind midfield, 3 wide but with cover, swung wide on Straightening, showed some dash in the last 100M.
At rear, 2 wide, made minor ground in the Straight.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, pretty one paced.
Sent forward, 2 wide, one paced only in the Straight.
At rear, along the rail, at 100M rider dropped whip and only made minor ground in the last 75M.
At rear, 2 wide, swung widest on Straightening, closed off only fairly.
At rear, along the rail, did not feature.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, failed to make any progress in the run home.
Slow to begin and at rear, 3 wide but with cover, failed to close off in straight. (See incident report)
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, lost ground after passing 200M.
Raced in midfield, wide no cover, lost ground in the Straight.

Began well, raced prominently before being crossed & racing 1,1 from 1000m. Dashed to narrow lead near 200m, hung inwards when continuing narrow lead before holding half-length advantage on line. Protest 2nd v 1st dismissed.

Bumped & unbalanced at start before racing wide early before improving to race outside the leader near the 1000m. Continued close all the way & was only beaten half-length on line. Protested against winner unsuccessfully.
Raced on leaders back throughout. Stayed along rail on straightening, moved to be just behind lead at 200m, continued on well to be third beaten only a length on the line.

Raced in midfield but was caught three wide without cover throughout. Forced wider on cornering when about 4L behind before closing strongly down the outside in late stages to move to 4th in final few strides.
Raced in midfield along the rail throughout. Shifted out away from the rail & bumped heavily at the 400m when just under 3L from the lead before closing steadily to be only 2L behind on line.
Raced in midfield away from rail. Eased wider on cornering before being bumped heavily at 400m when just under 3L from the lead before finishing evenly in run to line. Only beaten about 2L.

Raced in midfield along rail throughout. Moved away from rail on straightening when 4L from lead, began closing strongly near the inside before being badly crowded & checked away from heels at 75m. Still only beaten 2L.
Not fast away, mustered to race in midfield between runners. Entered last section 4L from the lead, closed off one paced in last section. Beaten just under 3L but never looked likely.
Pushed forward to lead. Joined approaching the 200m mark before weakening slightly in late stages.

Lost ground when steadied away from heels at start before shifting across & raced just worse than midfield between runners. Drifted slightly further back to third last on cornering, closed off ok but never a real challenger.

Had no speed after the start & raced at the tail. Shifted very wide when continuing at the tail approaching the corner, straightened 6.5L from the lead, made up some ground but only passed a few & was never a threat.
Steadied & drifted back to race at the trail. Entered last section in last place, nearly 7L from the lead before making up some ground but being unable to pass many in straight.

Bumped heavily at the start and became unbalanced & consequently lost ground before settling worse than midfield on the rail. Continued near the back, over 5L from the lead on cornering before failing to improve. (Bled).
Drifted back after the start & settled third last away from rail. Over 5L from the lead on straightening, was finishing only one paced before being checked near the 200m & relegated to last.
Away well, raced 2 wide in midfield early, 3 wide from 900M, commenced move 500M, finished off strongly to score.
Jumped with them, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, closed off well to take 2nd.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide behind midfield, found rail 600M, made good progress in straight to take a place without threatening.
Began well form gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, weakened gradually final 50M.
Out in line, raced behind midfield on the inside, 2 wide after passing 800M, no clear running early in straight, cleared 300M, made good progress thereafter to be nearest on line.
Moderately away, raced in midfield on the outside, very wide turning in, made some progress in straight.
Began only fairly, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked on run 150M, weakened final 100M.
Bumped start, raced at tail, 8 lengths back, moved closer on turn, 4 lengths or so back, very wide into straight, made minor progress early in straight, peaked 200M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Away with them, raced at rear on the inside, angled out after passing 500M, unable to obtain clear running early in straight, cleared 300M, one-paced thereafter.
Began only fairly, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, wider on turn, failed to quicken in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear, 7 lengths back, the last turning in, failed to close off in straight.
Average to begin, trapped wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, no cover throughout, weakened early in straight. (Minor laceration to the outside of the right hind heel.)
Jumped well from gate 11, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, weakened 500M, eased final 300M, unacceptable performance.
Bumped start, recovered in front of midfield, 2 wide, kicked away at 200M, kept going to win by 3/4L.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, held up till 350M, battled on well to the line to finish 3/4L behind.
Bumped start, in worse than midfield, sat 2 wide un-til taken to rail near 700M, held up early, closed off nicely once cleared and took 3rd.
Rolled forward, in one-out one-back position, con-tinued on well to the line.
Travelled in midfield, along the rail, ran on fairly.
Raced prominently, but trapped wide with no cover, no extra for final 150M.
Sat just behind midfield, 2 wide, was one paced in the straight.
Crowded at start, at rear and 2 wide throughout, ran on without threatening.
Niggled along, settled outside lead, faded gradually passing 300M.
Jumped only fairly, at rear and on rail, did not threat-en.
Rolled forward, led on the rail, stayed on until weak-ened approaching 250M. (See Incident Report)
In worse than midfield, 2 wide at turns, not competitive.
Travelled wide and keenly at times in last few, remained similar into home straight, quickened well inside final 300 metres to snatch victory 50 metres out.

Trailed the field to the 500 metres, baulked at the 400 metres before switching back inside for a run near the rail, quickened under pressure to hold every chance inside the 150 metres, unable to sustain effort close to home.
Travelled prominently 3-wide without cover after beginning from a wide gate, hit the front under pressure 200 metres out only to be caught close to home.
Close up early, drifted steadily backward to be midfield rounding home bend, fought on steadily under pressure without threatening.
Checked at start, soon taken back across for rails run in last few, angled out for a run entering home straight but baulked until the 250 metres, produced good late impression in closing stages.
Settled in forward of midfield in 6th about 3L off the pace on the rail, gained closer around the bend and switched out for a run on straightening, kept on one pace.
Pressed forward from the widest gate to lead, obtained rails run over 1100 metres out, led until headed into straight, fought on to hold 2nd place until overhauled inside final 150 metres.
Not far off in 4th or 5th to home straight, kept on under pressure until finding no extra inside final 100 metres, inconvenienced shortly after.
Broke well from a wide gate, settled just off the pace in 2nd 2-wide, came to hit the front on straightening only to be overshadowed inside final 200 metres.
Settled wide without cover towards the rear, widest runner turning into home straight, one-paced.
Hard ridden after moderate start, settled one off the pace in 3rd on the rail, came under pressure after straightening, soon weakened under pressure.
Badly crowded at start, settled in last few, tight behind runners after straightening, made no impression inside final 150 metres.
Gradually settled just worse than midfield, slightly further back entering home straight, found nothing under pressure.
Never better than midfield, switched for a run into straight, soon faded.
Sped to the front as expected, had uncontested lead, going well into 300M, responded strongly and opened up sizable lead mid-straight, well in control late, never challenged.
Reserved behind midfield, 4-5Ls to make up on leader (eventual winner) top of straight, ran on well to claim 2nd inside 100M, not reached winner. (Minor laceration RH heel).
Positively ridden from draw 11, crossed to track leader before home turn, battled on under pressure from 400M, drifted out final 200M, just held 3rd.
Dropped back from wide draw and settled near last, awkwardly placed behind rival rounding home turn and early straight, directed out 400M, stayed on well to just miss 3rd.
From draw 1 settled down in midfield along the rail, kept on steadily in straight, held ground final stages.
Began awkwardly, soon taken across behind runners, towards the rear 5Ls off the pace turning home, ran on mildly, not troubled leaders.
Tracked leaders on inside, battled on fairly early straight, run ended passing 200 and weakened towards the line.
Jumped only fairly, recovered to race in midfield, tried hard to stay in contention early straight, faded final 200M.
Unable to slot in, caught wide no cover in midfield, fought on same pace in straight, never dangerous. (Bled.)
Taken back to last from wide draw, swung wide home turn, never going the pace to challenge on straightening.
Jumped on terms, restrained to race towards the rear, wide on the turn, not quickened when asked top of straight, never threatened.
Chased leaders 2-wide, outpaced from 300M, soon out of contention and weakened to last.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader, saved ground to turn, hard ridden after passing 350M, finished off strongly to score by a narrow margin.
Began only fairly, sent forward to take the lead, led by 1/2L turning in, hard ridden after passing 350M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner late.
Began well, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, travelled well on turn, made good progress in straight to take a place. (See Racing Incidents.)
Made contact shortly after start, raced prominently, 2 wide, 1/2L back on turn, hard ridden after turning in, only showed limited response, ran on evenly to the line. (See Racing Incidents.)
Made contact shortly after start, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 wide from 550M, made minor progress in straight.
Made contact at start, unable to slot in, trapped very wide, 2 lengths back, found a 2 wide spot near 800M, showed limited response early in straight, peaked 200M, ran on evenly to the line.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide better than midfield early, found rail 800M, 4 lengths back on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, angled out 500M, finished off evenly.
Average to begin, positioned on rail in midfield, 2 wide from 550M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Made contact at start, raced at tail, 8 lengths or so back on turn, one-paced in straight.
Slightly slow out, showed no early speed, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Began fairly, raced at rear on the inside, 6 to 7 lengths back on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Began well, raced prominently on the inside, travelled comfortably throughout, hit the front early in straight, hard pressed from 300M, kept on very well to score by a narrow margin.
Away well, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, found rail near 900M, commenced move after passing 550M, challenged the leader from 300M, kept on very well to the line, just missed by a narrow margin.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground to turn, angled out early in straight, finished off well to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced towards rear on the outside, commenced move after passing 600M, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home to make frame without threatening.
Crowded start, raced at tail, 7 lengths back, closer on turn but still the last into straight, made good progress in the run home without threatening.
Jumped well from gate 12, raced prominently on the outside, no cover for the majority of the race, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Slightly slow out and bumped, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Began well from a wide draw, unable to slot in, trapped very wide in midfield, bumped near 1100M, no cover on turn, failed to close off in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began awkwardly, raced 3 wide slightly better than midfield, wider turning in, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final 200M.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, bumped near 500M, no clear running until 150M, failed to make any progress thereafter.
Commenced well, sent forward to take the lead, 2 wide on turn, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Crowded on jumping, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong. (Bled.)
Jumped well, raced 3 wide with cover slightly behind midfield, bumped near 1100M, losing place when bumped 500M, soon went wrong and then pulled up.

Bumped start, raced slightly behind midfield on the outside, a bit closer on turn, very wide into straight, showed very good response in straight, hit the front 150M, kept on well to hold off the challenger.
Away well, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, 2 lengths or so back on turn, angled out early in straight, finished off strongly final 200M to take 2nd, just narrowly beaten.
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced slightly better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, showed good response early in straight, peaked near 100M, ran on evenly to the line.
Jumped well from a wide draw, raced prominently on the outside, 2nd on turn, hit the front early in straight, peaked and headed near 150M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Bumped start, raced at rear on the outside, a bit closer in the middle stages, made minor progress in straight.
Crowded start, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, commenced move 500M, showed some response early in straight, peaked 200M, ran on evenly thereafter. (Bled.)

Bumped start and unbalanced, raced slightly better than midfield on rail, checked and dropped to midfield 700M, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Crowded start, raced at tail, 8 lengths back on turn, one-paced in straight.
Moderately away from the widest draw, raced towards rear on the outside, very wide into straight, failed to make any progress in the run home.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, peaked on turn, weakened gradually in straight.
Bumped start, raced at rear on the inside, 6 lengths back on turn, weakened early in straight.
Took rail and lead easily, made all.
Hard ridden but failed to muster, on heels 1400M, progressed steadily 300M.
Eased to sit off the leaders, 2 wide, ran on well for 3rd.
Eased back, on the fence, made minor ground 250M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 2 wide, out of fuel 300M.

Pushed to hold the rails in midfield, ran on until 200M weakened, 150M got its head on the side and shifted out abruptly, resulting in rider becoming badly unbalanced, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings
Eased back, never a factor.
Pushed forward to sit outside the leader, dropped off 500M, eased out of race, was found to be displaying an epiglottic entrapment with associated ulceration after racing.
Sent forward and took lead from the outside barrier, kept on going to score rather comfortably by 1-3/4L.
At rear, along the rail, made significant ground in the Straight but was no match to the winner.
At rear and 3 wide but with cover initially, after 800M raced wide and no cover, kept rolling and closed off well.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, swung wide on Straightening, made ground steadily to the line.
Raced in midfield, wide but with cover, swung wide on Straightening, ran on well to line.
At one-out one-back, weakened in the last 50M.
At rear, along the rail, pretty one paced.
Raced in behind midfield, wide no cover after passing 800M, swung widest on Straightening, only one paced.
Midfield, wide no cover, showed no progress in the Straight.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, not competitive in the Straight.
Raced next to the leader, 2 wide, in the Straight lost ground.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, did not feature. Finished tailed out. Must trial. (See incident report)
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, eased down in the Straight and finished tailed out. Must trial.

Placing: UR
Comment: On jumping stumbled and dislodged the rider.

Ridden forward from widest gate, raced 3 wide outside lead before continuing on to take narrow lead near the 700m when continuing wide. Raced a length clear on straightening before drawing away for easy win.
Raced 1,1 for the majority. Continued in 4th place, 3.5L from the lead on straightening before closing off steadily to move to narrow second in final few strides. Well behind easy winner.

Hard ridden for first 250m to improve to third place when racing between runners. Continued to be only a half-length from the lead in the middle stages when splitting runners. Held second until caught in final few strides.

Raced in midfield away from the rail throughout. Hard ridden passing the 600m when only holding position. Straightened 5L from the lead, beaten a similar margin when finishing off steadily to 4th late.

Didn't have the early speed of others & raced just worse than midfield when 3 wide. Shifted very wide when continuing 7L from the lead on cornering before passing a few tiring rivals when running onto midfield late.

Steadied at start & drifted back to race rearward. Lay outwards around first bend & consequently failed to improve position. 8L behind on cornering before passing a few runners when running onto midfield late. (See report).

Out-sped after the start & consequently raced just worse than midfield along the rail. Shifted wider passing 500m, 7L behind on cornering, shifted inwards away from heels on straightening before making no headway in straight.
Had no early speed & drifted back to third last. Continued near the rear on cornering when along the rail, about 8L behind before making no headway in the run to the line.

Shifted back to last after the start. Shifted to be very wide just prior to cornering when continuing last & 8L from the lead before passing only a few tiring runners when holding beaten margin in run to line.
Had nice run in midfield along the rail throughout. Saddle shifted when laying outwards around 700m bend, disadvantaging rider. Cornered only 4L behind before weakening out sharply in the final 300m.

Ridden forward from gate 11, held narrow lead early before being headed near the 900m & racing second when holding the rail. Held third entering last section when only 1.5L from lead before weakening badly. (See report).

Crowded after the start losing ground before shifting down to the rail and improving to midfield in middle stages. Came under heavy pressure passing the 600m mark before weakening out to distant last.

Jumped well from gate 11, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 wide on turn, commenced move after passing 600M, showed very good response in straight, hit the front near 200M, kept on strongly to the line and scored.
Moderately away, raced at rear on the outside, sent forward after passing 900M, 2nd on turn, took the lead early in straight, headed and peaked near 200M, ran on well to take 2nd.
Average to begin, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, a bit closer on turn, made some progress in straight to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Slowly away, raced behind midfield on the inside, 2 wide from 900M, a bit closer on turn, made minor progress in straight. (Laceration on the chest.)
Away well, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground to turn, angled out 450M, kept on evenly in straight.
Shifted out on jumping and bumped, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, 5 lengths back turning in, finished off evenly. (Rider dropped left rein near 150M.)
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, took the lead 600M, found rail 400M, peaked and headed 300M, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Bumped start, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, saved ground throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear, 9 lengths or so back, a bit closer on turn, made no impression in the run home.
Taken back from gate 10, raced towards rear on the inside, 7 lengths back on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Shifted out at start and bumped, sent forward to take the lead, peaked on turn, headed 600M, weakened gradually in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from a wide draw, raced behind midfield on the outside, 6 lengths back on turn, made no progress in straight.
Lifted front feet on jumping and away tardily, raced towards rear on the outside, peaked on turn, emptied early in straight.
Bumped start, in worse than midfield, 2 wide then shifted wider near 600M, showed dashes, found extra near 200M and ran home smartly to win by 1/2L.
Bumped start, raced towards the rear, wide but with cover, widest at exit, made ground, closed off nicely.
Crowded and lost ground at start, at rear and on rail at turns, made nice ground and hit the line strongly.
Bumped start, ridden along before settling outside the lead, led in the straight until swamped at about 50M.
Asked to be forward, front of midfield at 700M, wide and no cover, on terms exiting Home Turn, ran on until couldn't find more late.
Urged along before settling in midfield, 3 wide with cover, ran on until final 100M, no extra.
Travelled in midfield, along the rail, continued one paced to the line.
Jumped smartly, ridden before taking position one-out one-back, ran on fairly before awkward to heels late.
Raced towards the rear, made turns 2-3 wide, had cover, ran on without threatening.
Crowded start, settled midfield 2 wide, awkward to heels near 350M, found nothing thereafter.
Bumped start, niggled along, settled for box-seat, one paced before emptied for final 200M. (Continuous displacement of the soft palate)
Sent forward, took rail and led, weakened out passing 300M.
Began well, settled 3-wide without cover in prominent 3rd, remained similar rounding home bend, soon came to challenge into straight and hit the front over 200 metres out, won readily.
Broke well from a low gate settling just off the pace in 2nd, came to challenge after straightening but found eventual winner too strong.
Driven forward from a wide gate to obtain rails run in the front rounding first bend, led the field until headed inside the 200 metres when found no extra.
Settled 3-wide towards the rear, commenced move rounding home bend and the widest runner into straight, produced good late impression in the run to the line.
Ridden along early stages, settled mainly 3L off the pace in 5th, in similar position entering home straight, kept on steadily to the line.
Slow to muster after minor crowding at the start, remained one from last on the rail some 6L off the pace, came under pressure rounding home bend, made up good late ground inside final 200 metres.
Settled not far off the pace in 4th on the rail, gained closer entering home straight but soon outsprinted after straightening.
Began well from a wide gate settling wide without cover in midfield in 6th, commenced move entering home straight, had no more to give inside final 200 metres.
Settled at the back from the widest gate, came under pressure rounding home bend, found nothing.
Settled just worse than midfield, faded under pressure into home straight.
Settled just worse than midfield on the rail, saved ground turning for home, made no further impression.
Obtained a midfield spot on settling but no closer than 3-wide throughout, quickened up well rom 350M, took lead near 70M, held on well from persistent 2nd.
Dropped back after the start, settled near the rear, swung wide into straight, chased on well final 300M, pushed winner to the line.
Began awkwardly, soon emerged as the leader, fought on well turning home, headed near 70M, just held on for 3rd.
Taken back on jumping from draw 12, waited with at the rear, 7Ls to make up top of straight, closed off well but too much to do, just missed 3rd.
Shaken up early, pressed leader on outside, battled on steadily turning home, held 2nd to 100M, outpaced and lost several places late.
Held up in mid-division, 4-5Ls to make up at 400M, gave limited response only, never going pace to challenge leaders.
Chased leaders in 3rd, kept on same pace only when driven out from 400M, no extra passing 200M, faded away. (Lame RF leg.)
Jumped only fairly, guided to the fence, behind midfield turning home, failed to quicken and never pose any threat.
Settled ahead of midfield, came under heavy pressure 550M, soon beaten turning home.
Switched off to race at the rear, hard driven 500M, failed to make any progress. (Jockey: resented the kickback and didn't travel comfortably.)
Stumbled at start, recovered to track leaders, made home turn awkwardly and unbalanced 700M, soon came off the bridle, failed to finish off in the straight.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Away well, raced slightly behind midfield on the outside, moved closer after passing 800M, 3rd on turn, finished off strongly to score.

Moderately away, trapped wide in midfield early, moved a bit closer after entering the back straight, 2nd on turn, took the lead early in straight, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner final 50M.
Commenced well, raced behind midfield on the inside, 4 lengths back, saved ground on turn, made good progress in straight to take a place.

Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the inside, inconvenienced near 550M, commenced move 400M, no clear running early in straight, found daylight 200M, made good progress thereafter to make frame.

Moderately away from the widest draw, raced at rear, 6 lengths back, moved a bit closer after the 1st turn, 4 lengths back in the middle stages, very wide turning in, made good progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 wide from 550M, very wide turning in, finished off evenly.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, 2 wide from 500M, kept on evenly in straight. (Blood in trachea.)
Average to begin, raced better than midfield on the outside early, took the lead 1050M, challenged turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened and eased final 100M.
Away with them, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 3 wide on turn, showed limited response in straight.
Out in line, raced 2 wide at rear, 4 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, made no progress in straight. (Roarer.)
Clean jump, took the early lead, headed near 1050M, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight.
Missed the break, raced at tail throughout, never a factor.
Pushed the hold the rail in the lead, made all with ease.
Hard ridden forward to sit outside the lead, ran on well for 2nd, substantial blood in trachea after racing.
Settled just off the leaders, 2 wide, held ground for 3rd.
Midfield, 2 wide, made ground 200M.
Slow away, at back, lack turn of foot.
Slow away, at back, trapped 3 wide, no dash.
Slow away, hard ridden forward, emptied 400M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, kept on well in straight to hold off the challenger.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail after 600M, kept on well in straight to take 2nd, always held.
At rear, along the rail, saved ground, made good progress in straight to take a place.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, swung wide and made some ground in the straight for 4th.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide after 600M, made ground steadily but emptied in the last 50M.
At rear, 3 wide, held up in the early part of the Straight and then able to make some ground in the last 100M.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, pretty one paced
At rear, 2 wide, passing 200M was awkwardly placed and only one paced thereafter.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Raced in behind midfield, 3 wide, never a factor.
Sent forward and shared lead, 3 wide no cover, lost ground in the Straight.
Sent forward and raced next to the leader, 2 wide, nothing in the Straight.
Pushed forward to lead, held narrow lead all the way down straight & held head advantage on line.
Raced just worse than midfield between runners. Shifted wider on straightening, raced tight between runners passing 250m mark before closing strongly in final 150m to fall a head short.

Had no early speed but ridden along after start to race in midfield on rail. Shuffled slightly further back mid-race, stayed close to the rail on straightening before finishing well to third, beaten only 1.5L.

Raced near the rear after the start before making mid-race-move near the 1000m & improving to race 3 wide no cover outside the leaders from the 850m. Continued to be close to lead until peaking last 100m, under 2L behind.
Steadied after start & shifted behind runners to race near the tail. Continued near tail in middle stages, shifted to be wider in straight, closed off ok to be beaten about 2L in midfield.

Checked near the 1400m before racing in midfield when 2 wide. Shifted to be 3 wide with cover from the 900m. Shifted 4 wide on cornering, raced tight at 250m before finishing off only moderately in final furlong.
Raced worse than midfield on rail before relegated to the tail near half-way. Shared last place entering last section, held up 300m to 100m before making some late headway in concluding stages.
Had nice run on leaders back throughout. Shifted over heels after straightening, offered little in straight & weakened to be beaten just under 4L. (Blood in trachea & distressed post-race).
Pushed forward and raced outside the leader. Emptied out soon after straightening & weakened in final furlong to be about 6L behind.
Shifted across pass the 1400m & obtaining good position 1,1 throughout. Hard ridden prior to straightening before weakening poorly in final furlong. (See report).

Midfield early, relegated to second last near 1100m before moving into 3 wide line & improving to midfield with cover from the 800m. Moved 5 wide at 450m, very wide on straightening, weakened last furlong. (See report).

Steadied & raced last early before commencing mid-race-move from the 1000m mark before racing 4 wide no cover in midfield from the 800m. Began yielding ground from the 450m mark & was last, nearly 10L behind.

Moderately away, no early speed, raced at tail, 8 lengths or so back, slightly improved along the rail in the middle stages, showed very good response in straight, hit the front 150M, kept on well to hold off the challengers late.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 5 lengths back, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Jumped well from gate 9, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, there to turn, kept on well in straight to take a place.
Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the inside, 2 wide after entering the back straight, commenced move 450M, very wide turning in, made some progress in straight to make frame.

Bumped start, raced 3 wide, a length or so back, moved a bit closer after passing 1600M, 2 wide from 1400M, 2nd on turn, took the lead early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Began awkwardly from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, 2 wide turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Began well, raced 2 wide at rear, 5 lengths back on turn, showed some response early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Moderately away, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, commenced move 750M, peaked on turn, weakened gradually in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)

Jumped with them, raced wide in midfield early, sent forward after passing 1750M, took the lead approaching 1600M, challenged from 700M, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, peaked on turn, weakened and eased early in straight.
Commenced well, positioned 2 wide in midfield, 3 wide after passing 1000M, carried wider and peaked near 450M, weakened and eased thereafter.
Crowded start, in worse than midfield, 2 wide, in close battle before kicked away late to win by 1-1/4L.
Bumped start, front of midfield 2 wide, on par with winner until about 50M, finished 2nd 1-1/4L behind.
Crowded start, settled towards the rear, 2 wide, ran on strongly but wasn't enough to catch first two.
Attempted to take cover, raced at the rear in the end, on rail, swung widest, improved and ran home fairly.
Niggled along, settled in box-seat, was pretty one paced. (See Incident Report)
Took back, found spot on rail in worse than midfield, away from heels at 150M, ran on not too badly.
Bumped start, raced just in front of midfield, along the rail, failed to impact in the run home.
Worked forward gradually, 1-1/2L off and outside lead at 800M, stayed on until about 200M out only.
Slow to jump, recovered to be in midfield, along the rail, showed dashes before eased down late.
Settled in midfield, 2 wide, showed nothing in the straight.
Crowded start, allowed forward to sit one-out one-back, did not close off. (See Incident Report)
Hard ridden forward, trapped wide until took lead near 1000M, run ended at Home Turn.

Broke well to lead and made all, steadied pace midway down back straight, renewed effort on top of home bend kicking 2L clear into straight, drifted out inside final 150 metres causing interferences, just held on to the line.
Settled in last few dropping to last on home bend, quickened well inside final 200 metres to just fail to get up on line.

Settled in midfield, commenced move over 500 metres out circling the field 4-wide round the bend, came within 2L of the pace into straight, hampered and badly unbalanced inside final 100 metres. (Blood in trachea)
Travelled wide around first bend before settling prominently in 3rd or 4th in back straight, ran on to hold every chance in straight, badly hampered inside final 100 metres and checked on the line.

Settled just off the pace, mainly in 4th on the rail before improving to 3rd passing the 900 metres, came to challenge under pressure entering straight but could only keep on at the same pace without quickening.
Prominent early, gradually settled in midfield on the rail just over 3L off the pace, saved ground on the rail turning for home, fought on steadily without threatening.
Settled the back from the widest gate, commenced move at the 600 metres travelling wide around the bend and the widest into straight, produced good late impression down the centre of the track.
Settled in rear from a wide gate, found nothing under pressure in the run to the line.

Pressed forward from a wide gate circling the field to hit the front briefly passing the 1100 metres, settled outside the leader in back straight, dropped away quickly on top of home bend. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Quickly into stride, track leader on settling, moved up swiftly from 250M, led 100M out, won cosily.
Away with them, held up in mid-division never far away, chased on well final 300M, went 2nd close home but too late to trouble winner.
Sent forward, emerged as leader 950M, going well early straight, caught by winner 100M out before weakened to 3rd.
Began awkwardly, chased leaders keenly, moved up to 2nd home turn, kept on steadily in the run home but couldn't find the extra gear. (Jockey : horse would not relax early and middle stages.)
Switched off to race near the rear, moved closer nearing 400M, stayed on mildly on straightening, not reached leaders.
Obtained a midfield spot in midfield from the inside draw, bustled along 400M, ran home only fairly, no threat to leaders.
Lost ground soon after the start when bumped into a rival, settled down at rear on inside, kept on same pace final 300M, made no impression.
Not hurried early stages, got severely checked 900M, stumbled and shuffled back to the rear 3-wide, made no real progress in straight. (Blood trachea.)
Steadied early stages on jumping from wide draw, caught in a 4-wide spot towards the rear, covered more ground than rivals, failed to respond turning home.
Heavily restrained to sit in midfield 3-wide, gave little response on straightening, never dangerous.
Urged to chase leaders, pushed to a 3-wide spot without cover passing 900M, gave ground passing 250M, eased when well beaten.
Crowded for room at the start, in midfield further back than intended, 4-wide and no cover into straight, soon beaten. (Jockey concerned the manner his horse gave ground so quickly home turn.)
Quickly into stride, raced prominently on the inside, travelled well to turn, kept on very strongly in straight to score.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 lengths back on turn, finished off well to take 2nd without threatening the winner.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 6 lengths or so back on turn, kept to inside after straightening and finished off very strongly to take a place, good debut.
Crowded on jumping, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, saved ground to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Began fairly, raced behind midfield on the inside, 2 wide on turn, made some progress in straight.

Moderately away from gate 11, unable to slot in, raced very wide slightly better than midfield, moved closer after passing 800M but still 3 wide, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Bumped start, raced at rear, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home without threatening.
Jumped well, sent forward to race prominently, 2 wide, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Began well from gate 1, raced in midfield on the inside, peaked on turn, made no impression in straight.
Crowded on jumping, raced 3 wide slightly better than midfield, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Jumped well from a wide draw, positioned 1 out 1 back, there to turn, peaked early in straight, hampered 150M, weakened thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began very awkwardly and bumped, raced towards rear on the outside, 4 lengths or so back, very wide turning in, weakened early in straight.
Began smartly, sent forward to take the lead, enjoyed the easy lead to turn, kept on well in straight to hold off the challengers late.
Crowded on jumping, raced 3 wide towards rear, no cover from 600M, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Taken back from gate 8, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, kept to inside after straightening and finished off strongly to take a place.
Commenced well, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, closed off well to make frame, nearest on line.
Began well, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, kept on well in straight without threatening, short of room close home.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 2 wide at rear, 7 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made reasonable progress in the run home.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some progress early in straight, blocked near 150M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, similar position on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Made contact at start, unable to slot in, trapped very wide behind midfield, moved a bit closer after passing 600M,very wide turning in, showed no response in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Made contact at start, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, same position on turn, weakened gradually in straight.
Jumped with them, positioned 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, failed to close off in straight.
Average to begin, trapped 3 wide in midfield early, moved a bit closer after passing 850M, 2 wide on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
