Fast into stride, sent forward to take the lead, led by 1/2L on turn, kept on well in straight hold off the challengers.
Began well from a wide draw, sent forward to race in 2nd, 1/2L back on turn, kept on well in straight, just beaten by a narrow margin.

Began well from gate 1, positioned 1-1/2L behind the leader on rail, saved ground to turn, no clear running early in straight, angled out 200M, cleared 150M, closed off well to take a place, just narrowly beaten.
Away well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, not enough room early in straight, cleared after passing 150M, made some progress thereafter to make frame without threatening.
Slightly slow out, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground to turn, made some progress in straight without threatening.
Moderately away, raced in midfield on the inside, there to turn, no clear running early in straight, made contact near 250M, cleared 150M, made minor progress thereafter.
Bumped shortly after start, raced in midfield, 2 to 3 wide with cover, there to turn, made contact near 250M, ran on evenly to the line.
Bumped shortly after start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, commenced move after passing 400M, raced tight early in straight, ran on evenly thereafter.
Moderately away from the widest draw, trapped wide in midfield, very wide turning in, raced tight early in straight, ran on evenly thereafter.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced slightly better than midfield on the outside, no cover for the majority of the race, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Bumped start, raced at rear on the outside, commenced move 500M, very wide turning in, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Began only fairly, no early speed, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Settled in midfield, sat 2 wide, made ground around the field 600M in 4 wide, dashed well to score.
Eased at start, took cover at back, made ground around the field 600M in 5 wide, dashed well, just missed by narrow margin.
Eased to sit in midfield, trapped 3 wide throughout, made early move 700M, led 500M, overhauled 100M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Hard ridden to keep up in front along the fence, held up badly 5-3, dashed well 200M.
Hard ridden early but not muster, at back, dashed well 250M.
Rider concerned horse's actions at the Start, was found suitable to race, eased at start, took cover at rear, moved forward from 800M around the field, ran on until 100M run ended.
Hard ridden forward, 2-3 wide, weakened 400M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Pushed to take rail and lead, weakened 400M.
Rider concerned horse's actions at the Start, was found suitable to race, very slow to begin, at rear, never a factor.
Checked early, behind midfield, no progress.
Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, out of fuel 400M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Hard ridden early, trapped 3 wide throughout, emptied 400M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Raced in behind midfield, 3 wide but with cover, finished off very strongly to score by 3/4L.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, closed off well to take 2nd.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, made good progress in straight to take a place.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, ran on well but headed in the last 75M.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, made some progress in straight.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover after 600M, only one paced in the Straight.
Hardly ridden to be forward, 2 wide, made minor ground in the early part of the straight, weakened gradually thereafter.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, pretty one paced.
At rear, 2 wide, made the turn awkwardly after 600M and lost ground, finished off evenly.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, lost ground after passing 150M.
Raced in front of midfield, 3 wide no cover, nothing in the Straight.
At rear, along the rail, never a factor.
Raced third away from the rail throughout. Pushed three wide passing 500m, only about a length behind on straightening, dashed well to strike lead near 175m mark before drawing away late.

Steadied at first bend & shifted in to settle in midfield between runners. Improved closer to lead approaching 400m when 2.5L behind, closed off well in run to the line to snare second in final few strides.
Ridden forward to lead from widest gate, race 3L clear at the 800m, continued in lead before being joined & headed by winner near the 175m, battled on to hold third, 2L behind.
Shifted out & bumped at start before being outpaced early & racing worse than midfield on rail. Moved slightly closer to midfield after 900m mark, passed a few when running onto 4th over 3L behind.
Steadied & taken back to race third last. Shifted very wide passing 400m mark when just under 6L from the lead before making steady late progress down the outside to halve margin on line. (Roarer)
Raced second, 3L from lead at 800m before improving to be at the leaders hindquarters on straightening. Peaked early in the straight before weakening a few length to midfield.

Slowest away before being steadied & taken back to last. Shifted wider on the track entering the last section when just under 8L behind before making late progress down the outside to midfield from the rear.

Bumped at start before being shifted behind runners & settling just worse than midfield away from rail. Entered last section just under 5L behind & only held position to be beaten the same margin on line.
Raced in midfield on the rail throughout. Straightened just under 3L from lead, stayed on rail in straight before weakening poorly to be over 10L behind.
Bumped at start before being left racing three wide without cover in midfield throughout. Came under pressure at 600m, began yielding ground soon after, weakened further to be long second last.
Had no speed after start & raced second last. Relegated to last near 450m mark, weakened to be long last. (Substantial blood in trachea).
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, 3 wide in the middle stages, finished off strongly to score by a head.

Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield early, sent forward after passing 900M, took the lead 750M, led by a length on turn, kept on well in straight, just unable to hold off the winner close home.
Taken back from gate 7, raced behind midfield on the inside early, 2 wide from 850M, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home to take a place, nearest on line.
Out in line, raced at rear on the outside, last on turn, 4 lengths or so back, made good progress in straight to make frame without threatening.
Jumped with them, sent forward to take the lead, headed approaching 750M, sat right behind the leader on turn, kept on evenly early in straight, weakened final 50M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Out with rest, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Began well from gate 1, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, 2 wide on turn, showed limited response early in straight, eased final 150M. (See Racing Incidents.)

Stood flat-footed as the start and lost a significant amount of ground, detached early, latched on to rear of main group after the 1st turn, moved closer in the middle stages, very wide turning in, weakened early in straight.
Bumped start, settled in front of midfield, 3 wide no cover throughout, kept going and chased down leader in final strides to win by a short-head.
Slight slow away, ridden forward and assumed lead at 1000M, on rail thereon, travelled keenly in lead, battled on in the straight before caught a few strides out.
Forward and in lead until crossed at about 1200M, stayed 2 wide outside lead, tired near 100M, just held on for 3rd.
Eased early to attempt for cover, just behind midfield before moving at 800M, ran home okay.
Travelled in midfield, along the rail, one paced but held ground to the line.
Sat near the rear 2 wide, moved 3 wide prior to 600M turn to avoid runner, saved ground and ran on fairly.
Settled in midfield 2 wide, hampered when angled out at 850M, held ground in run home.
Raced in worse than midfield, along the rail, never threaten.
Took back to be near the rear, very wide and no cover, moved to midfield by 600M, showed nothing. (Lost right front plate)
Jumped awkward, forward to take box-seat, 4L off at 800M however, lost ground approaching 200M and faded.
Bumped start, at rear throughout, 2 wide, never in it.
One-out one-back initially, dropped back to midfield after leader built margin, lost ground from 600M, finished tailed out. Must trial.
Soon taken back to the rear from the widest gate and waited with, commenced move 400 metres out and saved ground on the inside turning for home, quickened well to take charge over 100 metres out.
Settled just over 2L back in 4th after moderate start, commenced move on top of home bend, hit the front under pressure briefly 200 metres out and soon overhauled.
Niggled along in rear of midfield in 7th, came under stronger pressure when losing position inside the 700 metres, renewed effort from 9th onto home bend and sustained good progress in straight.
Lacked early pace and soon dropped to last, trailed the field to the 450 metres and one of the widest turning into home straight, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Began awkwardly losing ground, soon took up running obtaining rails run rounding the 1200 metre bend, led the field until joined over 400 metres out, weakened inside final 150 metres.
Settled in last few on the rail, commenced move passing the 600 metres, snuck up to 1L 3rd briefly turning for home, unable to sustain effort after straightening.
Began well from the one draw, settled in midfield in 6th on the rail, became closer rounding home bend reaching within 2L of pace inside the 200 metres, but soon found no extra.
Pressed forward from a wide gate, settled 2-wide in 2nd just offside race leader, quickened to join the lead approaching home straight but unable to sustain effort inside final 150 metres.
Taken back from a wide gate to travel 3-wide without cover in midfield in 5th, commenced move rounding home bend and one of the widest into straight, unable to sustain effort after straightening.
Quickly obtained one back position in 3rd on the rail, remained same until folded up quickly inside final 200 metres.
Settled 3-wide with cover in last few, dropped away quickly inside final 500 metres.
Positioned ahead of midfield, pushed along 600M, got going 250M, closed off nicely to take lead 50M out, won going away.
Always in touch, well placed to strike turning home, quickened to lead 150M, couldn't match finishing pace of winner late stages, caught 50M from home.
Led until passing 900M, tracked leader into straight, fought on steadily to the line for modest 3rd.
Began fairly, settled behind midfield 4Ls off the steady pace, ran on mildly inside 300M, always held by top few.
Taken back from wide draw, settled 3-wide at the back of the field, wide into straight, closed off well to be nearest at the finish.
Chased the pace in 3rd, moved up to the lead 300M, couldn't sustain run over final 100M and lost several places late.
Emerged as leader 900M setting even pace, joined by rival top of straight, fought on to 200M, soon no extra and weakened away.
Held up towards the rear 6Ls behind leader, brought wide 400M, gave limited response only, never troubled leaders.
Restrained to race behind mid-division, pushed out from 400M, failed to make progress, no impression on leaders.
From wide draw settled in midfield along the 3 path, had no more to offer on straightening, never threatened.
Began only fairly, settled at the rear, couldn't go on passing final 350M, never involved.
Raced ahead of mid-division, 3-wide no cover after 900M, no extra turning home, weakened to last.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Commenced well from gate 1, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, 5 lengths back on turn, finished off strongly to score by a neck. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began only fairly, positioned on rail behind midfield, 2 wide from 700M, commenced move 500M, very wide into straight, finished off strongly to take 2nd, just beaten by a neck.
Began smartly, raced prominently on the outside, took the lead 1000M, found rail near 800M, kept on well after turning in, peaked and headed 50M, stayed on evenly to take a place.
Jumped well, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, 3 wide turning in, finished off well to make frame without threatening.
Away with them, raced prominently, 2 wide, allowed rival to cross near 900M, found rail near 750M, 2 lengths back on turn, kept on well early in straight, no extra final 50M.
Crowded start, raced in midfield on the outside, a bit closer in the middle stages, finished off evenly.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 5 lengths back on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Crowded start, raced 2 wide at rear, 7 lengths back turning in, made some progress early in straight, not enough room final 200M.
Crowded start, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made very good progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 8 to 9 lengths back on turn, made good progress early in straight, blocked 150M, eased thereafter.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide towards rear, 3 wide on turn, very wide into straight, finished off evenly. (Lame right front leg.)
Away well, sent forward to take the lead, headed 1000M, 2nd on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened thereafter.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced better than midfield on the outside, found rail near 1000M, 5 lengths back turning in, weakened early in straight. (Mucus.)
Began fairly, raced behind midfield on the outside, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight, eased thereafter. (Lame right front leg next day morning.)
Pushed to take rail and lead, made all.
Settled in front of midfield on the fence, ran on well for 2nd.
Pushed to keep up in midfield along the rails, lack room 400, clipped heels, progressed steadily 250M.
Hard ridden early but not muster, behind midfield along the fence, checked 1200M, made steady ground 300M.
Eased back, 2 wide, blocked 4-2, progressed steadily when clear.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3 wide, made ground 200M.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 2 wide, on heels 800M, lack turn of foot, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Slow away, at back, hampered 1200M, took rail, ran on ok in straight, lack room 150M.
Pushed forward to sit outside the leader, out of fuel 300M.
Eased back, checked badly1200M, trapped 3-4 wide, ran on fairly, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Pressed forward, sat 2 wide, weakened 300M.
Pushed forward, trapped 3-4 wide, emptied 400M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Eased at start, trapped 4 wide, no progress.
Slow away, at back, checked badly 1200M, never improved.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, made ground and closed off strongly in the last 50M to score.
Sent forward and raced next to the leader, 2 wide, kept on going, only headed in the last 25M.
Forward and took lead, along the rail, emptied in the last 100M.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, made ground steadily and ran on for 4th.
Began awkwardly, lost ground and at rear, along the rail, made some ground in the Straight.
At rear, along the rail, saved ground and closed off well in the Straight.
At one-out one-back position, pretty one paced in the Straight.
At rear, 2 wide, only one paced in the Straight.
Settled in midfield position, along the rail, remained one paced in the Straight.
At rear, 2 wide, did not improve in the Straight.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, lay in through out the Straight and could not be tested out properly. (See incident report)
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, did not feature. (Blood in trachea)
Raced in midfield, 3 wide, lost ground in the Straight.
Sent forward and raced next to the leader, wide no cover, lost ground in the Straight. Performance unacceptable. Must trial. (Blood in trachea)
Had a nice position in midfield in the clear for the majority. Entered last section only 2L from lead, dashed well, moved to lead near 150m & continued well to the line to win with something in hand.

Steadied at start & taken back to race near the tail. Shifted over heels into clear running passing 400m when just under 5L behind before closing very strongly in late stages to move to fast finishing second in final 50m.

Ridden forward after start, shared lead momentarily before being headed near 950m & racing second. Moved over leader's heels on straightening, lay outwards at 200m when improving to share lead, battled well to hold third.
Didn't begin fast but improved to take the lead passing the 950m mark when racing wide before crossing to rail near 750m. Continued in lead until headed passing 150m & weakening a length late.

Bumped heavily & unbalanced at start before settling worse than midfield between runners. Shifted into clear running on straightening when just over 3L behind before finishing off steadily to midfield without threatening.
Ridden forward before improving to race in third position from the 900m. Was just over a length behind on straightening before weakening a few lengths in last furlong to be 3.5L behind in midfield.
Raced in midfield along the rail. Stayed along the rail on straightening, entered last section only 1.5L from the lead before weakening a few lengths to be just under 4L behind in midfield.

Began awkwardly & bumped heavily at the start before drifting back to race worse than midfield on the rail. Shifted off the rail on straightening when about 3L behind before failing to improve in the dash to the line.

Began only fairly & was then shifted behind runners to race rearward along the rail. Straightened about 5L behind, stayed along the inside, had no clear run in late stages but was probably too far back to challenge anyway.

Got head up when being steadied after first 100m before drifting back & racing three wide with cover at the tail. Was a clear last on cornering, entered last section 6.5L behind, shifted to be widest but failed to improve.
Raced wide without cover when positioned worse than midfield throughout. Wide on straightening when 5L behind before weakening further in the straight & finishing second last. (Roarer).

Raced in midfield away from the rail before hanging outwards around the 900m bend & racing slightly wide thereafter. Hard ridden before straightening, just over 4L behind at the 400m before weakening badly to long last.
Jumped well, positioned right behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, no daylight early in straight, cleared 250M, finished off strongly to score by a nose.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, finished off strongly, just narrowly beaten.
Began smartly, raced prominently, 2 wide on turn, took the lead 400M, kept on very well, just unable to hold off the first two late.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear, 6 lengths back, a bit closer on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, finished off well to make frame.
Made contact shortly after start, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, found daylight near 150M, only showed limited response, no extra final 50M.
Crowded on jumping, raced behind midfield on the inside, 5 lengths back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Away well, raced 3 wide better than midfield, no cover in the middle stages, showed limited response early in straight, peaked 200M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 3 wide in the middle stages, very wide turning in, made some progress early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened thereafter.
Moderately away, raced at rear on the outside, 5 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, one-paced in the run home.
Shifted out on jumping and bumped, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, similar position on turn, peaked on run 300M, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, found rail approaching 800M, challenged near 500M, headed early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Made contact shortly after start, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, angled out 450M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Began awkwardly and bumped, trapped wide in midfield, no cover for the majority of the race, peaked early in straight, weakened and eased final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Bumped start, raced behind midfield on the outside, peaked on turn, weakened early in straight.
Sent forward, on rail, in lead until about 700M, dashed home nicely along the inside to share win in a close finish.
Asked before shifted behind midfield, 3 wide with cover, ran home spiritedly to share the prize in a blanket finish.
Niggled along, outside lead until crossed near 700M, ran on nicely in a tight finish to take 3rd.
Bumped start, in behind midfield 2 wide, closed off nicely from 250M out, just missed the placings.
Sent forward, wide until near 700M, then led 2 wide, kept kicking until found no extra for final 100M.
Bumped start, race in midfield 2 wide, continued one paced to the line.
Settled in about midfield, on rail, crowded at 500M, held ground before easing down late.
Sat just front of midfield, 3 wide and lost cover near 700M, ran on until passing 250M only.
Took back, at rear 2 wide, did not threaten.
Slow into stride, at rear and on rail, no kick and emp-tied last 150M.

Began well from a wide gate travelling wide with the leaders, taken one-out-one-back for cover passing the 1300 metres, just over 2L back in 4th rounding home bend and into straight, hit the front narrowly inside the 200 metres.
Gradually settled outside race leader, in similar position rounding home bend and into straight, fought on dourly to hold every chance in straight but unable to draw level throughout.
Ridden forward along the rail, took up running 1400 metres out and led the field to straight, narrowly headed under pressure 200 metres out but hung on well for a placing.
Hampered at the start, settled at the back and waited with, remained in last into straight, did not find much room early on, angled out for a run 100 metres, finished off the race well.

Settled some 3L back in 6th on the rail, became 5th in similar position rounding home bend, saved ground turning in, baulked for a run in straight until inside the 100 metres, fought on to the line where checked.
Crowded at start, settled in 7th in rear of small field, commenced move switching 4-wide to challenge 600 metres out, one-paced without quickening in straight, inconvenienced 100 metres out.

Taken back to 2-wide over 3L off the pace, in similar position in 6th rounding home bend, shifted 4-wide into straight, inconvenienced twice early on, one-paced when inconvenienced again 100 metres out.
Settled just off the pace on the rail and mainly in 3rd, baulked for a run inside the 300 metres and lost position, never recovered.
Never far off behind leaders in a fast run race, quickened up smoothly to lead 300M out, drew clear 150M to win comfortably.
In touch behind leaders, fought on steadily from 400M, moved up to 2nd 100M out, not able to challenge winner.

Chased the pace, raced strongly early and middle stages, responded fairly when asked nearing 300M, kept on same pace to line, ran well below market expectations. (Trainer unable to explain the disappointing run.)
Began only fairly, sat behind midfield 4-5Ls off the fast pace, made some progress final 300M without troubling winner.
Tracked leaders in a fast run race, ran on fairly final 400M, no threat to leaders.
Chased the pace along the stands' rail, held up by a weakening rival passing 400M, shifted lane nearing 200M to improve, ran on without threat.
Held up in midfield, driven midway but not going pace to challenge leaders.
Crowded for room at start, shifted across behind runners 6Ls off the fast pace, ran into heels of rivals from 200M, not properly tested.
Shifted out abruptly at start, lacked early pace and ended up 7Ls back near the rear, could not muster the speed to challenge passing 400M, never threatened.
Settled midfield, pushed along 600M out and tried hard to stay in contention, no extra final 200M.
Held up midfield, came under pressure midway, struggled over final 400M.
Led from 800M setting fast pace, caught inside 300M, soon no extra and weakened.
Began awkwardly, soon outpaced and ended up in rear, headway passing 350M but ran into back of rivals over final 150M and not able to be tested.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide behind midfield, found rail 500M, finished off very strongly to score.
Taken back from gate 9, raced at rear on the outside, 5 lengths back on turn, closed off well to take 2nd.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 6 lengths back turning in, finished off very strongly to take a place, nearest on line.
Shifted out at start and made contact, sent forward to take the lead, enjoyed the easy lead to turn, kept on well in straight, just unable to hold off the first few final 50M.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, kept on well early in straight, peaked on run 100M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Jumped well, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, hard ridden early in straight, showed limited response, ran on evenly to the line.
Commenced well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 3 lengths back turning in, made minor progress early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Away well, raced towards rear on the inside, angled out approaching 500M, no clear running early in straight, only showed limited response thereafter.
Began well, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move 550M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Made contact start, raced slightly behind midfield on the outside, no cover in the middle stages, very wide turning in, weakened early in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped well from gate 13, raced in midfield on the outside, 3 to 4 lengths back turning in, finished off very strongly to score.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back on turn, commenced move 500M, finished off well to take 2nd.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 2 wide at rear, 6 lengths back turning in, finished off strongly to take a place, nearest on line.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide behind midfield, angled out 500M, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home to make frame.
Began only fairly, positioned on rail better than midfield early, commenced move 650M, 3 wide turning in, kept on well early in straight, peaked 100M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Hampered start, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, made good progress in the run home.
Commenced well from gate 1, raced prominently on the inside, travelled well to turn, took the lead 400M, peaked and headed approaching 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Began well, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, similar position on turn, one-paced in the run home.
Began only fairly, raced slightly behind midfield on the inside, moved closer along the rail on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, showed limited response early in straight, blocked near 150M, eased thereafter.
Began smartly, sent forward to take the lead, 2 wide, headed early in straight, kept on well to 150M, weakened thereafter.
Missed the start, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Away well, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, carried wider from 650M, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Shifted in at start and made contact, raced slightly behind midfield on the outside, peaked 500M, weakened gradually in straight.

Away well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 3 wide after passing 600M, showed very good response in straight, took the lead approaching 100M, kept on well to hold off the challengers late.
Taken back from gate 11, raced at rear, 7 lengths or so back, commenced move after passing 700M, very wide into straight, finished off strongly to take 2nd, just beaten by a narrow margin.
Bumped start, raced behind midfield on the outside, 4 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, made very good progress in straight to take a place.
Began well, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, made some progress in straight to make frame without threatening.

Out in line, raced 2W better than midfield, difficult to settle 1250M, sent forward 1050M, 2nd in the middle stages, challenged the leader on turn, hit the front 250M, peaked and headed approaching 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Average to begin, showed limited early speed, raced slightly better than midfield on the outside, 3 lengths back, no cover for the majority of the race, same margin back on turn, finished off evenly.

Bumped start, took the early lead, headed approaching 1100M, sat 1 to 2Ls behind the leader on rail in the middle stages, saved ground throughout, showed some response early in straight, peaked on run 150M, weakened thereafter.
Began well from gate 1, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.

Moderately away from a tricky draw, trapped wide in midfield early, sent forward after passing 1200M, took the lead 1100M, challenged by rival turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Taken back from gate 12, raced at rear on the inside, commenced move after passing 400M, wide into straight, made no progress in the run home.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, very wide turning in, failed to close off in straight.
Away with them, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground to turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Eased back, 2 wide, progressed steadily 300M to score.
Sat outside the leader, led 400M, hung on until 50M overhauled.
Prominent, sat 2 wide, just held ground in final stages.
Behind midfield, trapped 3 wide, progressed steadily 250M, rider reported that his saddle shifted back in the early stages.
Took rail and lead, ran on until 200M weakened.
Eased back, 2 wide, made ground 200M.
Box seat, 250M was crowded for room whilst weakening and hanging in.
Hard ridden early, trapped 3 wide throughout in midfield, emptied 300M.
Eased back, trapped 3 wide, no dash.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, no progress, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Midfield on the fence, never improved.
Eased back, never a factor.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail after 800M, kept on going and scored impressively by 2-1/4L.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, lay in passing 300M but closed off attractively for 2nd.
Sent forward and raced behind the leader, along the rail, ran on well for 3rd.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, swung wide on straightening, made ground and closed off strongly.
Bumped start and raced in midfield, along the rail, made ground, weakened in the last 100M.
At rear, 2 wide, swung wide on Straightening, made ground strongly in the last 200M.
Sent forward and raced next to the leader, 2 wide, only one paced and emptied in the last 75M.
At rear, 2 wide after 450M, only one paced in the Straight.
Raced in front of midfield, wide no cover, flattened in the last 100M.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, lay in under pressure in the Straight and did not feature.
At rear, along the rail, no progress.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, nothing in the Straight.
Pushed forward to lead, set moderate mid-race sections, straightened only a neck in front before digging deep in final furlong to fend off all challengers.

Lifted feet at start & began awkwardly before improving after the start to race on leaders back for the majority. Moved away from the rail just before straightening, closed to second at the 125m, only a neck behind on line.

Raced just worse than midfield between runners throughout. Travelled strongly between runners entering last section when 3L behind before having no clear run from the 200m until final 50m when closing strongly.
Had nice run 1,1 throughout. Hung outwards on straightening before closing off steadily down the outside in the final stages to be beaten only a length.
Steadied after start & raced in midfield along the rail. Stayed close to the inside on straightening before finishing off well to be only 1.5L behind on the line in a bunched finish.

Shifted behind runners at start & raced at the rear. Continued rearward, about 5L behind on cornering before closing off well between runners in the late stages to be under 2L behind in a bunched finish.

Raced on leaders back early before racing outside the leader from the 1300m. Straightened only a neck from the lead, battled hard before emptying at 100m & being passed late. Under 2L behind in bunched finish.

Caught three wide without cover in midfield throughout. Drifted further back before cornering, entered last section 3.5L from the lead before weakening out of the contest after having tough run throughout. (See report).
Taken back after the start & raced at the rear. Continued at the tail entering last section before failing to make any headway in the straight.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, hard ridden from 200M, finished off very strongly to score by a narrow margin.
Jumped well from a wide draw, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, there to turn, finished off strongly, just narrowly beaten.
Jumped with them, raced prominently, 2 wide, took the lead approaching 400M, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the first two late. (Dead-heat 3rd.)
Began awkwardly, raced at rear on the outside, 4 to 5 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, finished off strongly to be nearest on line. (Dead-heat 3rd.)
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, made good progress in straight without threatening the first few.
Out in line, raced 3 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Bumped shortly after start, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 5 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Moderately away, sat right behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, unable to obtain clear running in straight. (Blood in trachea.)
Bumped shortly after start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back, there to turn, made little progress in straight.
Fast into stride, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, headed approaching 400M, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Jumped well from gate 11, trapped very wide in midfield, no cover throughout, moved a bit closer in the middle stages, weakened gradually in straight when hard run took effect.
Prominent, about 1/2L off and outside the lead, ran on gamely to the line and won by 3/4L.
Opted for cover in midfield, along the rail, kept go-ing but failed to chase down leader, settled for 2nd. (See Incident Report)
Raced in just behind midfield, 2 wide, continued on well to the line for 3rd.
Urged along, slotted in front of midfield, 2 wide, one paced and emptied passing 100M.
Took back, raced at the tail, along the rail, made ground before flattening late.
Slow to jump, recovered in behind midfield, on rail, showed no turn of foot in the straight.
Jumped well, in lead before eased to take box-seat, no extra for final 150M.
Didn't muster, raced keenly at rear, 2 wide at turns, held ground without threatening.
Forward, took rail and led, run ended passing 300M.
Settling in striking position one back in 3rd on the rail, switched out for a run entering home straight and soon hit the front, held on under pressure to the line.

Restrained to rear from a wide gate and waited with, commenced move entering home straight, obtained a run between runners upon straightening, ran on well under pressure to just fail to get up on line.
Settled in midfield on the rail, switched wide into straight, fought on steadily under pressure but never troubled first two.
Settled in midfield in 6th in strung-out field, gained closer when pace slackened round the bend, fought on steadily in straight without threatening.
Began well but settled in 5th some 6L off the pace, gained closer when pace slackened round the bend, kept on at the one pace without quickening in the run to the line.
Settled at the back from the widest gate and waited with, improved wide round the field on home bend and widest of all turning in, ran on well to be nearest at finish.

Moderate start, settled some 4L back in 4th on the rail, commenced move rounding home bend and 4-wide into straight, closer but carried wider turning in, found no extra inside final 100 metres. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Settled towards the rear on the rail, improved under pressure when pace slackened on the bend, snuck up to within 1L of pace turning in, unable to sustain effort inside final 100 metres.
Settled in last few from a wide gate, commenced move 3-wide rounding home bend, went wide into straight, kept on steadily without threatening.
Awkward early but pressed forward to join the lead 2-wide round first bend, remained in similar position to home straight, folded up quickly.
Well there from the one gate, gained slender lead around stables bend, steadied pace in the front approaching home bend, renewed effort entering home straight but soon weakened.
Settled worse than midfield, dropped away quickly inside final 500 metres.
Steadied early stages to obtain cover, reserved near the rear, picked up strongly 250M, got up close home.
Positively ridden out the gate, up with early pace before taking the lead from 500M, continued well under a firm ride in straight, caught by winner 50M out, held on 2nd just.
Settled down midfield, chased on well turning home, just failed to catch 2nd.
From wide draw urged along to chase the pace, wide no cover from 550M, kept on steadily in straight, held by top 3 final 100M.
In mid-division early, moved closer to chase leaders from 600M, ran on at same pace on straightening, well held by leaders.
Began very awkwardly, ended up behind midfield, brought wide into straight, stayed on only fairly, never a threat to leaders.
Vied for early lead, sat behind leaders passing 600M, found less than expected on straightening, weakened final 200M. (Unacceptable Performance.)
Raced along the fence in mid-division, attempted a run on inside, crowded for room 250M, eased over final 150M.
Settled near last 6Ls behind leader, failed to quicken when pushed along inside 400M. Made no impression on its debut.
Switched off to race at the rear, 8Ls off the pace 400M, made no real progress in the run home.
Used early stages to obtain a forward position, caught wide no cover until 600M, gave ground in the straight after coming under pressure home turn.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 4 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, hard ridden 250M, finished off very strongly, won by a length, impressive.
Away well, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, showed very good response in straight, hit the front after passing 150M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner late.
Taken back from gate 8, raced at tail, 6 lengths or so back, still last turning in, finished off very strongly to take a place.
Began well from gate 10, raced slightly behind midfield on the outside, 4 lengths back on turn, taken wide in straight and finished off strongly to make frame.
Away with them, sat right behind the leader on the inside, saved ground on turn, took the lead early in straight, peaked and headed approaching 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, 5 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home without threatening.
Average to begin, positioned 2 wide, 3 lengths back, same position on turn, taken wide in straight and finished off evenly.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced prominently on the outside, no cover throughout, showed some response early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened final 100M.
Began well, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, challenged the leader turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final furlong.
Taken back to race at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made no impression in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began fairly from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, 3 lengths back, saved ground throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, challenged turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened 200M, eased final 100M. (See Racing Incidents.)

Quickly into stride, raced prominently on the stands' rail, took the lead near 400M, kept on very well to the line and scored.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced prominently on the stands' side, hard ridden 300M, finished off well to take 2nd, always held.
Away well, raced prominently, nearer to the middle track, kept on well final 400M to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Began well, sent forward to take the lead, headed near 400M, weakened gradually final 150M.
Average to begin, positioned a length behind the leader, nearer to the middle of the track, showed limited response final 400M.
Bumped start, raced prominently on the middle track, hard ridden 400M, peaked on run 250M, weakened final furlong.
Began awkwardly, settled in midfield, 2 away from the stands' rail, kept on evenly final 400M.
Jumped with them, raced towards rear on the middle track, showed limited response final 400M.
Made contact at start, raced behind midfield on the stands' side, hard ridden 400M, only showed limited response, never in contention.
Jumped with them, raced towards rear on the stands' side, no clear run near 300M, one-paced thereafter.
Bumped start, raced at rear, 4 lengths or so back, showed limited response after passing 400M, weakened final furlong.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced behind midfield on the stands' side, peaked 350M, weakened thereafter.
Average to begin, positioned a length behind the leader, nearer to the middle of the track, peaked 300M, weakened thereafter.
Bumped start, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, hung on well to score.
Behind midfield along the fence, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Pushed forward, ran on strongly until 100M weakened.
Pushed forward, 2-3 wide, held ground in straight.
Eased back, 2-4 wide, progressed steadily 300M.
Hard ridden early but not muster, at rear, 2-3 wide, made ground 200M.
Eased back, 2-3 wide, ran on ok.
At back, 2-3 wide, no dash, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, no progress.
At back, never improved, substantial amount of blood in trachea after racing.
At rear, never a factor, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, made ground steadily and closed off okay to the line.
Raced behind the leader, along the rail, saved ground but headed in the last 100M to take 2nd .
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide after 1000M, closed off strongly to the line in the last 100M to take 3rd.
At rear, along the rail, saved ground and ran on fairly.
At rear, 2 wide, swung wide on Straightening, closed off okay in the Straight.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, weakened in the last 150M.
Sent forward and raced next to the leader, 2 wide, only one paced in the Straight.
Raced behind midfield, wide no cover after 800M, only one paced in the Straight. (See incident report)
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, nothing in the Straight.
At midfield initially, Sent forward and took lead after 1100M, along the rail after 800M, lost ground in the Straight. Finished tailed out. Must trial (Mucus in trachea)
In front of midfield, wide no cover, did not feature. Finished tailed out. Must trial. (Blood in trachea)

Had nice run on leaders back throughout. Moved to the lead soon after straightening before dashing clear in the final stages to win by easy 2.5L. Trainer questioned regarding improved performance  see report.
Shifted behind runners at start & raced at the tail. Stayed close to the rail entering last section when just over 5L behind before making strong late ground to move to second inside the final 25m.

Had soft run in midfield on rail. Moved away from the rail approaching the 500m, moved to second near the 250m mark before continuing to finish off steadily before being caught for second in final 25m.

Drifted back after the start & raced second last. Entered last section with only two runners behind and 5.5L from the lead before closing off steadily in final 250m to move to 4th near the 100m mark. Only 3L behind on line.

Steadied from gate 13 & raced just worse than midfield away from rail. Eased wider passing 600m, widest on straightening, entered last section about 5L behind before passing a number of rivals when making up some ground late.

Drifted back after the start & raced third from last between runners. Was relegated to last place on straightening when 6L from the lead before making up some steadily late ground down the outside to midfield.
Raced a touch wide early before improving to race at the leaders quarters. Only a length form the lead on straightening before emptying out near the 250m mark & weakening thereafter.
Raced in midfield away from rail. Eased three wide passing the 600m mark, entered last section 4.5L from the lead before weakening a length or so to hold well held midfield position.
Obtained nice position in midfield away from the rail. Entered last section about 4L from the lead before emptying mid-straight & weakening a few lengths to be well beaten in midfield.
Raced in midfield on the rail throughout. Stayed towards the inside on straightening when 4L from the lead before weakening in the straight to be beaten over 6L.

Awkwardly placed just after start before racing worse than midfield on the rail. Moved away from the rail approaching 600m, entered last section just under 5L behind before weakening poorly to be beaten over 8L.

Shifted behind runners from wide gate & raced near the tail before being left wide & without cover from the 1200m. Shifted to be the widest entering last section when 6L behind before weakening further. See report.
Strode forward from outside gate to lead. Headed by the winner soon after entering last section before weakening badly in late stages to be over 10L behind.
Obtained good position 1,1 for the majority. Came under hard riding passing the 700m mark, hung outwards passing the 600m before weakening very poorly in the straight to long last.
Bumped start, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, closed off well to score by a neck, good debut.
Made contact at start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the winner late.

Fast into stride, raced prominently on the outside, slightly taken back after passing 1000M, raced 3 wide with cover on turn, made good progress in straight to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Jumped well from gate 11, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover from 700M, kept on evenly in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, 6 lengths back, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home.
Average to begin, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, finished off evenly.
Away with them, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, angled out 450M, made minor progress in straight.
Commenced well, raced prominently but 3 wide in the early stages, 2 wide from 700M, 2nd on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced at rear on the inside, 8 lengths back on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced towards rear on the outside, 5 to 6 lengths back, similar position on turn, one-paced in the run home.
Away well, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 300M but only showed limited response, weakened final 150M.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Slightly slow out, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, failed to close off in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced 2 wide towards rear, 8 lengths back turning in, failed to make any progress in straight.
Eased back, at the tail and stayed 2 wide, ran home impressively to win by a neck.
Took back, at rear, 3 wide with cover, closed off nicely in a tight finish to take 2nd.
Bumped start, raced just in front of midfield, 2 wide, battled on nicely to finish 3rd.
Sent forward, settled outside the lead, ran on nicely but not enough to hold off the first three.
Took back, raced the rear 2 wide, raced keenly, held up early, stormed home inside 200M.
Jumped awkwardly, settled in worse than midfield, wide and no cover, continued on well to the line.
Inconvenienced at start, then hard ridden to take box-seat, ran on nicely to the finish.
Jumped awkward and lost ground, recovered in mid-field along the rail, showed dashes at times, ran on ok.
Sent forward to lead on the rail, locked in until about 250M and then faded gradually.
Slightly crowded at start, sat just in front of midfield, on rail, held up in straight, unable to be tested.
Raced just behind midfield, 2 wide, had interrupted run in the straight, was unable to be part of the finish. (Lame right front)
Shifted across to rail after taken back, at rear, im-proved and showed dashes in interrupted run home.
Urged along, raced one-out one-back, run ended passing 300M.
Jumped ok, eased to attempt for cover near the rear, remained wide however, pressured 700M out, emptied approaching 200M.

Settled not far off in midfield in 7th, in similar position within 4L of the pace when becoming 4th onto home bend, quickened well to hit the front just over 200 metres out, just fended off late challenges.
Quickly taken back to rear from a wide gate, saved ground on the rail turning for home, tight on the rail 400 metres out, ran on under pressure to just fail to get up on line.

Began well from a wide gate, travelled wide in first few before gradually taken back towards the rear while wide with cover, obtained a run 400 metres out and fought on dourly to the line. (Tactic questioned)

Jumped awkwardly losing ground, soon recovered to rear of field in 9th on the rail, gained closer to 7th just off 3L off coming onto home bend, baulked for a run in straight until the 250 metres, finished off the race well.
Taken back to last from the widest gate, commenced move at the 600 metres swinging the widest making final turn, ran on well to be nearest at finish.

Ridden forward to 2nd inside of race leader, switched 2-wide for a run when pace slackened approaching home turn, hit the front briefly early in straight but dropped away quickly inside final 250 metres.
Broke well from a middle draw to lead 2-wide, obtained rails run in front coming onto home bend, headed shortly after straightening and overhauled inside final 200 metres.
Settled just worse than midfield in 8th, tight between runners early in straight before eventually switched out for a clear run about 180 metres out, produced good late impression.
Settled some 3L off the pace in 5th, slightly further behind rounding home bend before renewed effort approaching home turn, 4-wide turning in and soon found no extra. (Blood in trachea.)
Ridden positively to prominent 3rd chasing the leaders into straight, faded under pressure 250 metres out.
Ridden along 3-wide in midfield, gradually settled slightly worse approaching home bend, renewed effort out wide rounding home bend, weakened under pressure in straight.
Settled midfield on inside, moved up to challenge 550M, led inside 350M and quickened away to score, never seriously challenged.
Held up behind midfield along the 3-path, crept closer 600M, very wide into straight, tried hard over final 300M to chase winner but always held.
From wide draw switched off to race in last, ran on well final 350M but always held by first 2.
Guided to the fence soon after the start, settled 5-6Ls back near the rear, lay out under pressure in straight, closed off fairly, no impression on first 3.
Not hurried early stages, taken back to race near last, very wide into straight, stayed on without threat to leaders.
From wide draw urged along to chase leader, ran on same pace turning in, soon out of contention.
Began only fairly, settled towards the rear 5-6Ls back, wide into straight, made limited progress, never troubled leaders.
Bustled along to obtain a prominent spot behind leaders, driven 500M out but lacked response, faded final 250M.
Sent forward to lead from 1300M, set steady pace, found no extra inside 350M, quickly swamped by rivals.
Reserved in midfield, driven 550M, held up passing 450M, checked top of the straight, eased.
Never far off the pace, taken to 3-wide 800M and soon pushed along to chase leaders, emptied turning for home, weakened away.
Chased leaders early stage before settling just ahead of midfield, came under pressure 600M, gave ground rapidly.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, a bit closer in the middle stages, angled out 500M, finished off strongly to score by a narrow margin. (Jockey dropped right rein near 100M.)

Moderately away, raced prominently on the inside, slightly taken back 900M, angled out 800M, 3 wide on turn, unable to obtain clear running early in straight, cleared 300M, closed off strongly, just missed in a ding-dong finish.
Commenced well, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, there to turn, took the lead early in straight, headed near 250M, kept on well to take a place.
Out in line, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, angled out 700M, 4 wide on turn, hit the front 250M, kept on very well, just unable to hold off the first few close home.
Average to begin, raced in midfield on the inside, 2 wide on turn, angled out 500M, showed good response early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, 4 lengths or so back turning in, made good progress in straight without threatening.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced towards rear on the outside, very wide into straight, made some headway in the run home.
Crowded on jumping, raced at rear, 8 lengths back, closer on turn, no clear running early in straight, made some progress when clear thereafter.
Moderately away, raced slightly behind midfield on the inside, saved ground throughout, no daylight early in straight, cleared approaching 100M, failed to make any progress thereafter.
Away with them, raced in midfield on the outside, very wide turning in, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Began fairly, trapped wide in midfield, sent forward 850M, took the lead 650M, 3 wide turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened final furlong. (Bled.)
Shifted in at start, sent forward to take the lead, found rail near 800M, headed 650M, 2nd turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened and eased final furlong.
Jumped well from gate 12, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, same position on turn, took the lead 250M, kept on very well to the line and scored.
Away well, raced better than midfield on the inside, easy run to turn, not enough room early in straight, cleared 150M, ran on well to take 2nd.
Began only fairly, raced slightly behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, closed off well to take a place without threatening.
Jumped well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, made some progress early in straight, peaked 100M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Bumped on jumping, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, commenced move 550M, very wide turning in, made good progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, similar position on turn, finished off evenly. (Jockey dropped whip near 200M.)
Away well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, peaked and headed 250M, weakened final 100M.
Began fairly, raced at rear on the inside, 4 lengths or so back on turn, no clear running in straight, just ran on evenly to the line.
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide at rear, 4 lengths or so back on turn, finished off evenly.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide in midfield, wider turning in, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Bumped start, raced at rear on the outside, 6 lengths back turning in, finished off evenly.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide in midfield, no cover for the majority of the race, wider turning in, weakened early in straight when hard run took toll.
Away well, unable to slot in, trapped wide in midfield early, slightly further back in the middle stages, very wide turning in, weakened early in straight when hard run took effect.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, wider turning in, weakened early in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)

Average to begin, positioned on rail in midfield, 3 to 4 lengths back, finished off strongly to score.
Moderately away, raced towards rear on the outside, 6 lengths back, same margin back on turn, taken wide in straight and finished off strongly to be nearest on line.
Began fairly from the widest draw, raced 3 wide in midfield, found a 2 wide spot near 800M, commenced move 400M, finished off well to take a place.
Jumped well, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 5 lengths back, commenced move after passing 450M, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home to make frame.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead but trapped wide in the early stages, found rail near 600M, led by a length on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked 100M, headed final 25M.
Bumped start, taken back to race at tail, 8 lengths back, still last turning in, showed good response early in straight, no clear run near 100M, cleared 50M, showed some response thereafter.
Bumped start, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross 600M, sat right behind the leader on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Began fairly, positioned 6 lengths behind the leader on rail, same margin back on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Jumped well, raced prominently, 3 wide, slightly taken back after passing 900M but still 3 wide, 2 lengths or so back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Away well, raced prominently, 2 wide, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Bumped start, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Pushed to obtain box seat, closed off strongly to score.
In front of midfield along the rails, progressed steadily 400M, just missed by a narrow margin.
Prominent, 2 wide, ran on well for 3rd.
Slow away, took rail at rear, held up 600M, dashed strongly 300M.
Began very awkwardly, rider lost the use of left stirrup iron shortly after the start, eased to sit in midfield, 2 wide, little dash 300M
Bumped start, at rear, 2-3 wide, unleashed strong finishing efforts 200M.
Slow away, at rear, 2 wide, raced ungenerously, dashed well 200M.
Trapped 3-4 wide in midfield, ran on ok, got its head on the side and lay out under pressure in Straight, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Behind midfield along the fence, on heels 600M, held ground in straight.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, weakened 200M, rider concerned horse's actions during racing, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Eased back, 2-3 wide, no progress.
Pushed forward, emptied 400M, heart irregularity noted after racing.
Settled in behind midfield, 2 wide, saved ground and closed off strongly, winning impressively by 1/2L.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide initially, along the rail after 550M, closed off strongly in the last 100M, always held.
Sent forward, 2 wide, ran on evenly to the line.
Settled in midfield, 2 wide after 550M, made some ground in the last 50M.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, only made minor ground in the Straight.
In front of midfield, along the rail, weakened in the last 100M. (Roarer and mucus in trachea)
Slow to begin, at rear, 2 wide, swung widest on Straightening, made some ground only.
At rear, along the rail after 700M, only one paced to line.
At rear, along the rail, showed some dash in the early part of the Straight, one paced after passing 50M.
Raced in midfield, wide no cover after 500M, did not feature. (Roarer)
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, made no threats.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, lost ground after passing 200M.

Pushed forward & had cheap lead in middle stages. Raced a couple of lengths clear on straightening, continued to hold the lead & maintained half-length advantage over fast finishing challenger on the line.

Steadied from outside gate & settled second last away from rail. Continued rearward entering last section when over 5L behind, closed strongly to second near 75m before charging at winner in final strides to miss narrowly.

Steadied after start & raced in midfield between runners throughout. Entered last section just over 4L from lead before closing strongly in final furlong to move to third in final stages, beaten only a length on line.
Pushed forward to race second at the leaders flanks. Ridden along before straightening, dropped off the leader who kicked away before being passed for second in the final 75m.

Had a good position in midfield away from the rail throughout. Entered last section just under 3L from the lead before finishing off one paced in the straight & pretty much holding position all the way to line.

Inconvenienced at start before racing in midfield on the rail. Moved away from the inside on straightening when about 4.5L behind before having no clear run near 150m when closing well, got clear late & was only 2.5L behind.

Began awkwardly before being shifted back to the tail. Commenced to improve position when very wide passing the 500m, very wide around final corner when 6L behind before making late ground from the back in on-speed race.
Didn't begin fast, crowded after 100m & raced in the second half. Moved into 3 wide line but with cover from the 900m, entered last section 5L behind before making up a length or so to midfield.

Bumped & unbalanced at start before mustering to race in midfield on rail. Entered last section 3.5L behind, stayed along rail before being checked near 300m & then held up until inside the final 100m. Genuine excuse.
Had a soft run on leaders back throughout. Was only 2L from the lead on straightening before weakening a few lengths in the straight to be third last.
Raced three wide without cover in midfield throughout. Ridden along before straightening before weakening out in the straight to be second last.
Began awkwardly & bumped & consequently raced third last on rail. Came under pressure passing the 500m mark before failing to make any headway in the straight & finishing last.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move 350M, finished off very strongly to score.
Hampered start, raced at rear on the outside, moved closer after passing 550M, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to take 2nd.
Away well, raced prominently, 2 wide, allowed rival to cross 700M, a length back on turn, closed off well to take a place.
Made contact at start, raced prominently but trapped very wide, 2 wide after passing 650M, 2nd turning in, took the lead early in straight, peaked 150M, headed 100M, weakened thereafter.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide in midfield, a bit closer on turn, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 150M.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced behind midfield on the outside, very wide turning in, finished off evenly.
Average to begin, positioned slightly behind midfield on the inside, 4 lengths back on turn, finished off evenly.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide towards rear, 4 lengths or so back, 3 wide turning in, one-paced in the run home.
Moderately away from the widest draw, trapped wide in midfield, sent forward after passing 600M, took the lead 450M, peaked and headed 200M, weakened thereafter.
Began well from gate 1, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Bumped start, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Shifted out at start and made contact, sent forward to take the lead, headed 450M, weakened early in straight.
Took back and raced at the rear, more than 10L off at 600M, dashed nicely before storming home inside 150M to win by 1L.
Raced in one-out one-back position, ran home nicely but was not enough to hold off the impressive win-ner.
Settled to race in midfield, 2 wide, showed dashes in the straight, closed off well for 3rd.
Stumbled at start, prominent but wide and had no cover, ran on until emptied late.
Crowded at start, settled in behind midfield, 2 wide, closed off fairly from about 150M out.
Sent forward, raced outside the lead, about 1L off, stayed on until weakened inside final 100M. (Rider lost whip at 200M)
Crowded at start, raced towards the rear, 3 wide at turns but with cover, made minor ground only.
Travelled in behind midfield, along the rail, showed no kick.
Settled in front of midfield, wide and no cover how-ever, lost ground in the straight.
Asked and took box-seat, about 2-1/2L off at 600M, run ended passing 200M.
Bumped start, hard ridden forward, took rail and led at 600M turn, run ended approaching 200M. (Blood in trachea)
Jumped only fairly, sat towards the rear, remained 2 wide, never in it.

Settled well back from a wide gate, trailed the field from 800 metres out, came under pressure rounding home bend and saved ground turning in, quickened well inside final 200 metres to snatch victory on the line.
Held up just outside race leader, hit the front entering home straight, came under pressure to maintain advantage only to be pipped at post.
Settled mainly in rear of midfield in 7th, came to challenge approaching home straight swinging widest on the turn, ran on well down the centre of the track.
Slightly slow out settling towards the rear on the rail, gained slightly closer towards midfield along back straight and saved ground turning for home, ran on along the rail to narrowly miss a place.
Settled not far off the pace in 3rd on the rail, held some chance in home straight but unable to quicken to threaten.
Broke well from a low draw settling one-out-one-back in 4th, in similar position turning into home straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Soon taken well back after moderate start, travelled keenly the majority of back straight, saved ground turning for home, produced good late impression.
Settled in midfield in 6th on the rail, commenced move rounding home bend and switched wide for a run entering straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Settled towards the rear, turned home near the rail, hampered over 100 metres out and made no further impression.
Pressed forward to lead on the rail from a wide gate setting a standard pace, headed soon after straightening at the 300 metres and weakened badly.
Prominently early, hampered approaching the winning post the first time, travelled in forward of midfield in 5th in back straight, went wide turning for home, soon weakened.
In touch, steadied 550M when pace slackened, pushed along 450M, quickened up strongly to lead inside 200M, drew clear winning comfortably.
Steadied to obtain cover after the start, held up towards the rear, tried hard to chase winner over final 300M, always held.
Settled down midfield, brought wide 400M, stayed on well without troubling winner, just missed 2nd.
Positively ridden, chased leaders into straight, challenged for the lead passing 300M, briefly went 2nd mid-straight, lost 2 places late.
Began very awkwardly and lost ground, settled near last 8Ls off the pace, plenty to do turning in, stayed on well without troubling leaders.
Chased the pace early, moved up alongside leader when pace slackened 600M, vied for lead until 200M, soon outpaced by pursuing rivals.
Started slowly, held up behind midfield, checked 600M when pace slackened, soon ridden along, ran on fairly over final 300M.
Soon led, restrained 600M and joined by rival in the lead, fought hard to 150M, no extra and weakened. (Jockey suspended for steadying his horse 600M causing interference to rivals.)
Settled in midfield after jumping from draw 1, checked 550M and lost ground, failed to quicken turning home, never involved.
From wide draw taken back to race in detached last, made no real progress over final 400M. Never in the picture.
Jumped well enough, hampered near 1000M and shuffled back to midfield, 3-wide no cover nearing 500M, already beaten turning home.
Chased leaders, checked away from leader 550M when pace slackened, failed to respond from 300M, weakened to last. (Irregular Heart Rhythm.)
Jumped with them, positioned on rail in midfield, 2 wide turning in, hit the front 200M, kept on well to the line and scored.
Away well, positioned 2 wide, 1 to 2 lengths back, a bit closer on turn, finished off well to take 2nd.
Moderately away, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, headed 200M, ran on well to take a place.
Bumped start, positioned right behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, kept on well in straight to make frame without threatening.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced at rear, 7 lengths back, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, unable to obtain clear running in straight, ran on evenly thereafter.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, 4 lengths back, angled out 450M, very wide turning in, made some progress in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 10 lengths back, closer on turn but still the last, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home to be nearest on line.
Taken back from gate 9, raced behind midfield on the inside, 2 wide turning in, finished off evenly.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail better than midfield, angled out 700M, 3 wide turning in, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider turning in, made no progress in straight.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide, 2 to 3 lengths back, carried wider after passing 700M, 4 wide turning in, weakened early in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Away with them, raced 2 wide at rear, 7 lengths back, moved a bit closer after passing 600M, very wide turning in, failed to close off in straight.
