Began well, raced 2 wide in midfield, similar position on turn, finished off very strongly to score.
Out in line, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, angled out 550M, closed off well to take 2nd.
Began well from a wide draw, raced prominently but trapped wide, no cover throughout, a length back on turn, kept on well in straight to take a place without threatening.
Began well from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 150M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Began smartly from gate 13, raced in midfield on the outside, wide into straight, finished off evenly.
Jumped well, sent forward to race prominently, 2 wide on turn, challenged the leader early in straight, peaked 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Slightly slow out, positioned on rail slightly behind midfield, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, found daylight 200M, finished off evenly.
Taken back from gate 9, raced towards rear on the inside, 5 lengths back on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Moderately away, raced in midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, made minor progress when clear thereafter.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, unable to obtain clear running in straight.
Commenced well, sat right behind the leader on rail, saved ground to turn, no clear running in straight, not able to test properly.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, very wide turning in, one-paced in the run home.
Slightly slow out, raced at tail, 6 lengths or so back on turn, made no impression in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide towards rear, angled out 450M, failed to close off in straight.
Eased back, 3 wide, made steady ground 300M to score.
Eased at start, took cover at back, 2 wide, lack room 400M, progressed steadily when clear.
Box seat, ran on well for 3rd.
Pushed forward, trapped 3 wide, held ground in straight.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, weakened 100M.
Failed to muster, tailed out at rear, lack room 4-2, progressed steadily when clear.
Behind midfield along the fence, lack room 4-2, made steady ground when clear.
Eased back, 3-4 wide, progressed steadily 250M.
Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, no dash.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, blocked most straight, not properly tested.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3 wide, ran on fairly.
Pushed early, 2 wide behind midfield, lack room 400M, no progress when clear.
Eased back, trapped 4 wide throughout, held ground in straight, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Pushed to take rail and lead, soon emptied 400M, was found to be a "roarer" after racing.
In midfield and at centre-track initially, raced next to the leader after 650M, on stand-side, continued on and finished well to score by 1-3/4L.
Send forward and took lead, on stand-side, headed in the last 300M and never a threat to the winner.
Raced prominently, on centre-track, kept on nicely but one paced after passing 100M.
In midfield, centre-track, made ground and closed off okay for 4th.
At rear, on centre-track, made ground steadily to the line.
Raced in midfield, stand-side, remain one paced to the line.
At rear, on centre-track, only one paced to the line.
Ridden to be prominent, on stand-side, flattened passing 400M.

Raced worse than midfield on rail, held up on straightening after moving away from inside, continued to have limited room early in straight before dashing between runners near 200m, striking lead at 125m before winning well.

Began well, shared early lead before getting 1,1 near 950m but then a pair further back from 850m. Shifted out on straightening, dashed well to lead passing 275m, held narrow lead until joined at 125m, beaten only a neck.
Race din midfield away from rail throughout. Raced tight early in straight before getting clear passing 350m before closing off well to hold third, beaten under 1L.
Steadied & taken back towards the rear. Shifted wider on straightening, over 4L behind at the 400m before making good late headway in the closing stages to be beaten only 2L on the line.

Steadied after first 100m & raced just worse than midfield when wide with cover. Moved wider passing the 600m, bumped on straightening when the widest runner before making steady late ground, just over 2L behind in midfield.

Improved position after first furlong to race second before being crossed and racing 1,1 from the 850m. Eased wider on cornering, continued only a neck from the lead at the 200m before weakening slightly late. Not beaten far.

Raced in midfield before being steadied to be just worse than midfield between runners. Moved into 3 wide line near 800m, forced wider on turn, hampered on straightening when only 2.5L behind, finished evenly late.

Raced in midfield on the rail throughout. Moved away from rail on straightening when just over 2L behind giving a length or so despite being awkwardly placed near heels in concluding stages. No threat.

Steadied form outside gate & got back to last. Continued near the rear on cornering, straightened 4.5L from lead, shifted away from rail mid-straight, passed a few tiring rivals when running onto midfield.
Raced on leaders back throughout. Held in a pocket when just behind lead on straightening & then had no room to improve for most of straight when rivals went by. Had excuse.

Worked hard from gate 13, improved to assume narrow lead passing the 800m when racing away from rail before sharing the lead from the 600m. Continued to share lead until emptying at 275m & giving ground late after tough run.
Raced in midfield but was left three wide no cover from the 850m. Hampered on straightening when only 2.5L from the lead before weakening in final 300m.

Hard ridden after start, improved to lead near 1200m before being headed near 800m when holding the rail. Improved again to share lead from 600m, joined passing the 300m before weakening out after doing too much work early.
Steadied & shifted behind runners to race near the tail. Relegated to last passing the 900m mark, straightened 6L from the lead before weakening further to be beaten over 9L in last.
Crowded on jumping, raced behind midfield on the inside, slightly improved along the rail on turn, kept to inside after straightening, finished off very strongly to score.
Shifted out at start and made contact, positioned on rail in midfield, angled out after passing 700M, 3 wide turning in, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, just beaten by a narrow margin.
Began well from gate 1, raced better than midfield on the inside, travelled well to turn, commenced move 550M, hit the front 250M, kept on well but still headed 100M, missed 2nd close home.
Began awkwardly and made contact, raced 2 wide towards rear, angled out 1000M, moved closer on turn, finished off well to make frame without threatening.
Average to begin, raced at tail, 9 to 10 lengths back in the middle stages, moved closer on turn, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home, no threat to the first few.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide at rear, 5 lengths or so back on turn, angled out 550M, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home without threatening.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider on turn, made minor progress in straight.

Jumped well from the widest draw, raced prominently but trapped very wide early, took the lead 1500M, found rail 1300M, led by 2Ls in the middle stages, challenged on turn, headed 500M, kept on well to 200M, weakened thereafter.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move 800M, took the lead 500M, peaked early in straight, headed 250M, weakened inside final furlong. (Blood in trachea.)
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 3 wide at rear, very wide turning in, one-paced in straight.
Began smartly, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, 3 wide turning in, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.

Moderately away, sent forward to take the early lead, headed 1500M, allowed rival to cross 1300M, challenged the leader turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from gate 13, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground to turn, showed limited response in straight, eased final 50M.

Away well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, found rail near 1200M, 2 wide from 800M, unable to maintain position on turn, emptied early in straight, eased final 300M. (Lost left hind plate near 700m.)
Settled to race in midfield, 2 wide, took ground off leader gradually and kicked nicely 150M out, contin-ued on to win by 3/4L.
Eased back, at tail, wide but with cover, made nice ground and battled on strongly to take 2nd.
Raced at the rear, along the rail, bumped passing 200M, closed off fairly once clear passage devel-oped.
Sent forward, in lead in 3 wide position before shift-ed in near 750M, kept on one paced to the line.
Prominent, inside lead until crossed approaching 700M, stayed 2 wide, kept kicking until ran out ab-ruptly near 200M and was corrected, one paced thereafter. (See Incident Report)
Settled behind midfield, on rail until shifted 2 wide near 700M, held ground only.
Took back, raced towards the rear, 2 wide, ran on without threatening.
Prominent, on rail about 1-1/2L off, hampered at 200M, no progress thereafter.
Bumped start, raced front of midfield 2 wide, run ended when checked at 200M.
Bumped start, in midfield on rail, emptied approaching 300M.
Held up in rear and waited with, quickened up well inside final 300 metres to assert authority over 100 metres out, won readily.
Broke well, settled in 1L 2nd 2-wide, hit the front momentarily 200 metres out but soon outsprinted.
Settled just some 3L back in 4th, commenced move passing the 500 metres and hit the front under pressure briefly 250 metres out, unable to sustain effort closing stages.
Held up in 5th some 4L off the slow pace, switched off the rail rounding home bend and came under strong pressure after straightening, ran on dourly to be nearest at finish.
Ridden to lead after moderate start setting a sedate pace, quickened up rounding home bend but soon joined after turning into straight and eventually headed over 200 metres out.
Pulled hard in 3rd on the rail in the slow early pace, in similar position around home bend and into straight, soon found no extra.
Travelled in rear, 3-wide rounding home and into straight, soon found no extra.
Soon led, set slow tempo in early and middle stages, quickened up pace 800M, sustained run under pressure from 400M, held on gamely.
Slow to begin, raced back in the field early stages, moved up from 1400M to press leader, shifted in under pressure early straight, dug deep final 150M, just held.
In midfield, settled 3-4Ls behind leader in a slowly run race, stayed on mildly turning for home, got up for 3rd late but always held by first 2.
Reserved near the rear in a slowly run race, fought on moderately from 400M, went 3rd near 150M but not able to challenge first 2, lost 3rd late.
Chased leaders on inside, not quickened turning in, raced in restricted room nearing 200M, kept on one paced to line thereafter.
Taken back to race in last, pace slow early and middle stages, brought to outside for his challenge 450M, kept on steadily but no impression on first 2.
Prominent early, had no cover until 1200M, tracked leaders going into home turn, fought on to 300M then weakened. (Jockey : not suited by the slow tempo.)
Away with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, angled out after passing 550M, very wide turning in, finished off very strongly to score by a nose.
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide better than midfield, carried wider after passing 550M, finished off strongly, just narrowly beaten.
Commenced well, positioned on rail in midfield, angled out 550M, hard ridden 300M, finished off well to take a place, nearest on line.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, angled out after passing 550M, 3 wide turning in, kept on well in straight, just narrowly beaten.
Jumped well, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, travelled comfortably to turn, challenged the leader early in straight, led narrowly 250M, kept on well but unable to hold off the first few late.
Average to begin, raced slightly behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Jumped with them, raced towards rear on the inside, 4 lengths back on turn, made minor progress in straight.
Began well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably to turn, peaked early in straight, headed 300M, weakened final furlong.
Out in line, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move approaching 500M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, one-paced in the run home.
Away well, taken back to race 2 wide at rear, commenced move 600M, very wide turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened 300M, eased final 150M.
Moderately away from a wide draw, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on very well in straight, easily scored.
Began well from gate 1, positioned 1-1/2L behind the leader on rail, there to turn, kept on well in straight to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced in midfield on the inside, 2 lengths or so back, saved ground on turn, kept on well in straight to take a place without threatening.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide in midfield, carried wider after passing 550M, made some headway in straight to make frame, no threat to the first few.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, finished off evenly.
Bumped start, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, same position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Commenced well from gate 10, positioned 3 wide cover behind midfield, very wide turning in, made minor progress in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide towards rear, 5 lengths back on turn, no clear running early in straight, made little progress thereafter.
Away with them, raced slightly behind midfield on the inside, angled out 500M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 150M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began only fairly, raced at rear on the inside, 8 lengths back, a bit closer on turn, made no impression in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the outside, very wide into straight, made no impression in the run home.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, angled out 600M, no clear run early in straight, made no progress thereafter.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, wider after passing 700M, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Shifted out at start and bumped, tracked leaders on the outside, no cover throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M.

Shifted out at start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on strongly to the line, won by 2 lengths.
Commenced well, raced prominently but 3 wide early, 2 wide from 650M, 3/4L back on turn, kept on well in straight to take 2nd without threatening the winner.
Slightly slow out, raced behind midfield on the inside, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, closed off well to take a place without threatening.
Moderately away, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Inconvenienced at start, raced 3 wide in midfield early, 2 wide on turn, kept on well early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Away well, raced 2 wide in 2nd early, allowed rival to cross 650M, 2 lengths back on turn, failed to close off in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced at rear, 6 lengths back on turn, finished off evenly.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide towards rear, 3 wide on turn, one-paced in straight.
Moderately away, positioned 2 wide in midfield early, slightly inconvenienced 550M, 5 lengths back turning in, showed no response early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Eased to in behind midfield on the fence, progressed steadily 300M to score.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, on heels 550M, progressed steadily 250M.
Pushed to obtain box seat, closed off strongly for 3rd.
Pushed forward to cross, 2 wide in front of midfield, progressed steadily 300M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 2 wide, made ground 250M.
Eased to sit in midfield, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, held ground in straight.
At back along the fence, on heels 550M, ran on ok.
Pressed forward, took rail and lead, hung on well until 150M weakened.
Pushed early, at back, 2 wide, no progress in straight, near 250M rider dropped whip, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Trapped 3 wide throughout in midfield, emptied 600M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Pushed early but never muster, never nearer.
Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, dropped off 500M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
At one-out one-back, ran on impressively in the Straight and scored by 3/4L.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, tried hard on straightening but couldn't get closer to winner, held on for 2nd.
Raced prominently, 2 wide, ran on well but emptied in final 50M.
Raced behind the leader, along the rail, kept on going but one paced after 100M.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, pretty one paced.
At rear, along the rail, swung widest on Straightening, made ground steadily to the line.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, weakened approaching the 100M.
At rear, 2 wide, made minor ground in the Straight. (Blood in trachea)
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, did not feature.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, no progress.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, lost ground in the Straight. (Lame right hind)
At rear, along the rail, failed to close off in the Straight.
Had nice run in midfield away from the rail. Moved closer passing the 500m mark, made continual ground to share lead at 75m before holding narrow advantage on line.

Raced forward before settling third in the clear early before improving to race on leaders back from 700m. Travelled strongly approaching corner, stayed on rail on straightening, shared lead at 75m, just fell short on line.

Drifted back, raced worse than midfield, awkwardly placed close to heels at 500m, entered last section 8L behind, shifted outwards mid-straight before flying home in final stages, beaten diminishing neck. (Rider questioned).
Raced in midfield on the rail throughout. Made continual ground between runners in final furlong to be beaten only half a length on line.
Ridden forward after the start, was three wide early before improving to lead near the 1200m. Continued to hold narrow lead until joined at the 75m & over-run late. Only beaten about a length.
Raced in midfield along the rail throughout. Shifted away from the inside on straightening before closing off steadily in the straight to be only 2L behind in midfield on the line.

Held early lead before being headed near 1200m & racing on leaders back. Moved off the rail & improved to be at leaders flanks from 600m. Continued only a length behind at 200m before emptying, weakened a few lengths late.

Raced worse than midfield away from the rail before being steadied when disappointed for running between horses near 550m. Shifted wider approaching corner when 6.5L behind before making up a few lengths without threatening.

Hampered start before shifting behind runners to race third last away from rail. Ridden along from 500m, forced 4 wide around bend when 6.5L behind before making some ground without improving finishing position.
Hampered at the start before shifting behind runners to race at the tail. Continued near the tail entering last section when 8.5L from the lead before failing to make any headway in the straight.
Hampered at start before shifting behind runners to race near the rear. Relegated to last approaching the corner when over 9L behind before weakening further to be long second last.
Raced in midfield away from the rail throughout. Ridden along passing 600m mark when hanging out slightly, began yielding ground before straightening & weakened poorly to long last.
Away well, positioned 1 out 1 back, there to turn, ridden after passing 200M, showed very good response, hit the front approaching 100M, ran on very well to the line.
Clean jump, positioned 1-1/2L behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, closed off well to take 2nd.
Made contact at start, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground throughout, made good progress in straight to take a place.

Began well from a wide draw, raced prominently but trapped wide, 2 wide from 750M, took the lead 500M, led by 1/2L turning in, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed approaching 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Began smartly from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, headed near 500M, 1/2L back turning in, peaked on run 200M, weakened final 100M.
Began only fairly and bumped, raced at rear on the inside, 5 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, made little progress in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 8 lengths back, still well back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 lengths back on turn, finished off evenly.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, difficult to settle, 7 lengths back turning in, one-paced in the run home.

Bumped start and unbalanced, raced 2 wide in midfield, travelled keenly in the early stages, 4 lengths back on turn, showed no response early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Bumped start and unbalanced, raced slightly behind midfield on the outside, no cover after passing 700M, peaked 400M, weakened early in straight.
Raced just in front of midfield, along the rail, dashed home impressively, won by 1L with something in hand.
Rolled forward, raced in the box-seat, battled on nicely to the line but winner was too good.
Sent forward, shared lead along the rail, headed approaching 100M, was one paced anyhow.
Took cover and position towards the rear, 2 wide, made ground before closing off nicely in-side final 100M.
Raced in one-out one-back position, was pretty one paced.
Travelled in front of midfield, 2 wide, showed no turn of foot in the straight.
Niggled along, sat front of midfield, wide and no cover, in touch until weakened passing 150M.
Awkward start and lost ground, recovered in behind midfield, along the rail, held position until 200M, lost ground thereafter.
Missed start, detached early, made up ground to be 5-3/4L behind when cornering, no further improve in the straight.
Contacted at start, settled just behind midfield, wide but with cover, not competitive.
Sent forward, shared lead, 2 wide, pressured 450M out and faded. (Heart irregularity)
Soon taken back and waited with, went very wide rounding final bend, quickened well nearer the stands side in straight to score impressively despite covering ground.
Settled in midfield in 6th on the rail, saved ground turning for home, hit the front inside the 200 metres only to be worn down close to home.
Travelled keenly in rear of midfield in 6th, commenced move and given reminders rounding home bend, sustained progress under pressure in straight but never threatening.
Bumped at the start, settled towards the rear, commenced move rounding home bend, went very wide into straight, kept on well to finish.
Checked at start, niggled along throughout at the back of the field, saved ground on the inside turning for home, one-paced in the run to the line.
Jumped awkwardly but soon came to join the leaders, worked hard to obtain rails run in front making the 1000 metre bend, led until joined 400 metres out, swamped inside the 200 metres.
Settled some 3L back in 4th on the rail, became 5th in a similar position rounding home bend, faded under pressure in straight.
Began awkwardly and tightened shortly after, settled towards the rear on the rail, switched off the rail for a run 450 metres out, ran home one-paced.

Began awkwardly, ridden forward with leaders 4-wide onto first bend, shifted 2L back in 3rd for cover shortly after, renewed effort home bend and shared lead into straight, folded up quickly inside final 150 metres.
Began fairly, pressed forward to chase behind the leaders settling some 3L back in 5th approaching back straight, commenced move 4-wide rounding home bend but soon weakened after straightening.
Travelled just off the pace on the rail racing keenly early in back straight, switched off the rail for a run 500 metres out sharing pace briefly into straight, folded up quickly after straightening.
Jumped well from draw 1 then restrained to race in midfield, quickened up well from 300M, led near 120M and going clear towards the line.
Chased the pace on inside, unbalanced near 300M when shifted in towards the rail, not finishing pace of winner from 200M, fought on to hold 2nd just.
In midfield along the 3-path, raced keenly nearing 800M, wide into straight, closed off well to claim 3rd near line, not troubled winner.
Positively ridden from draw 10, crossed to race outside leader, fought hard early straight, not pace of winner final 150M, just missed out on 3rd.
Stumbled on jumping, soon recovered to take the lead passing 1000M, battled on to hold lead until 120M, edged out to 5th last few strides.
Prominent behind leaders, shifted out to 3-wide 450M, kept on same pace turning home, no longer a threat to leaders from 150M.
Began well, eased back to sit in midfield from 1000M, well held by leaders on straightening, not able to be tested when no clear run final 75M.
Dropped back to a rearward spot, driven out 400M but not quickened, never troubled leaders.
Fractious in stalls, began awkwardly and lost ground, settled at the back 5-6Ls behind leader, failed to finish off turning for home. Never threatened.
Crowded for room after the start, ended up towards the rear, brought wide on straightening, made no real progress over final 300M.
Jumped fairly, caught 3-wide no cover in the group chasing the pace, not quickened leaving the bend, no extra 200M.
Taken back to near last on jumping from draw 12, failed to make any progress turning home, never involved on its return after a long break.

Quickly into stride, raced prominently on the stands' side, hard ridden 250M, finished off well to score by a narrow margin.
Made contact at start, tracked leaders on the stands' side, took the lead 400M, headed near 200M, kept on very well but always just held.
Away well from gate 1, positioned 2 lengths or so back on the middle track, hard ridden 350M, closed off well to take a place.

Began smartly from gate 14, positioned a length behind the leader on the stands' side, hard ridden after passing 400M, showed some response but blocked final 150M, not able to be fully tested. (See Racing Incidents.)
Slowly away, raced at rear, nearer to the middle of the track, not enough room from 500M, cleared 200M, kept on well to the line without threatening.
Made contact at start, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on the stands' side, kept on evenly final 400M.
Commenced well, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader, 3 away from the stands' rail, awkwardly placed near 350M, cleared 200M, showed limited response thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Reared on jumping and started slowly, positioned 2 to 3 lengths behind the leader on the stands' side, kept on evenly final 400M.
Moderately away, positioned a length behind the leader, 2 away from the stands' rail, moved closer in the middle stages, peaked 200M, weakened thereafter.
Jumped with them, raced prominently, nearer to the middle of the track, hard ridden 400M, showed limited response, weakened gradually final furlong.
Began smartly, raced prominently on the middle track, hard ridden 400M, only showed limited response, weakened final 150M.
Moderately away, positioned 1-1/2L behind the leader on the middle track, hard ridden approaching 400M, peaked 300M, weakened thereafter.
Average to begin, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on the middle track, peaked 450M, weakened thereafter, eased final furlong.
Away with them, raced prominently, 3 away from the stands' rail, unable to maintain position from 450M, weakened thereafter, eased final 250M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Behind midfield, 3 wide, progressed steadily 400M to score.
Pushed forward to cross, sat 2 wide, ran on well for 2nd.
Pushed to take rail and lead, hung on well until 100M overhauled.
Box seat, just held ground in straight.
Slow away, at rear, 2-4 wide, made steady ground 300M.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, lack room 400M, progressed steadily when clear.
At rear, made ground 250M.
Slow away, hard ridden to keep up in midfield on the rails, lack room 400M, ran on ok.
Midfield, trapped 3 wide, made ground 400M, run ended 200M.
Slow away, at back along the fence, ran on fairly.
Eased to sit in midfield, 2 wide, weakened in straight.
Eased to sit just off the leaders, 2 wide, emptied 300M.
Eased to rear, 2 wide, no progress.
Slow away, trapped 3-4 wide, never competitive, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, closed off strongly in the last 250M and caught the leader in the last 50M.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, kept on going but weakened in the last 100M.
At rear, wide but with cover, swung wide on Straightening and closed off strongly for 3rd.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover after 750M, made ground steadily to the line.
At rear, 2 wide, made ground and closed off fairly in the Straight.
Raced prominently, 2 wide, emptied after passing 200M.
At rear, wide with cover, showed some dash only in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, crowded at 700M and wide with cover, pretty one paced.
Sent forward, 2 wide after 650M, flattened in the last 200M.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, did not feature.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, nothing in the Straight. (Mucus in trachea) (See incident report)
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, eased down after passing 300M. (Bled 1st time)

Drifted back from widest gate & raced worse than midfield, 3 wide with cover throughout. Wider on straightening when 3L from the lead before closing strongly in final stages to strike lead inside final 100m & win well.

Steadied & shifted behind runners after start before racing third last on rail. Moved away from the inside before straightening when about 3L behind before closing strongly between runners in final furlong to be second.

Pushed forward but was left racing three wide no cover outside the leader. Forced 4 wide passing 600m mark, moved up to share lead at 200m, finished well to hold third, only 1.5L behind after wide run throughout.
Had nice run 1,1 for majority. Eased 3 wide before straightening, shared lead at 200m, hung in late but fought on well to be beaten under 2L.
Raced three wide in midfield with cover throughout. Entered last section under 2L from the lead and pretty much held that deficit all the way to line. Not beaten far.

Not fast to begin & drifted back to race 4th from last between runners. Shifted to be the second widest entering last section when 5L from the lead before closing strongly down the outside to be beaten only 2L on line.
Raced in midfield along the rail throughout. Straightened just over 2L behind & pretty much held margin all the way to line, beaten a similar margin in midfield on line.
Ridden forward from gate 12 to assume lead before crossing to rail near 1100m. Continued to hold narrow lead until being headed approaching the 200m before weakening a few lengths in final furlong.
Raced in midfield between horses throughout. Entered last section under 2L from the lead, was awkwardly placed momentarily near the 350m before offering little in the final 250m, beaten just over 3L.
Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Steadied approaching 600m, raced tight entering last section when 3L from the lead before making no headway in the dash to line. Never threatened.

Began best, strode forward & raced second, away from the rail. Moved up to the leaders flanks passing 600m, continued close until emptying out passing the 300m mark & weakening a few lengths thereafter.
Raced midfield on rail before improving to be on the leaders back from 600m. Stayed close to the rail entering last section when just over a length behind before awkwardly placed in final 75m.

Shifted behind runners & raced near the rail throughout. Hung outwards & was awkwardly placed passing the 600m, cornered very wide when 5.5L from the lead before failing to make any real headway, second last.

Shifted behind runners after the start & raced at the tail throughout. Stayed along the rail on straightening when 4L behind, was beginning to make steady headway before being held up pretty much most of the final furlong.
Began smartly, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, travelled well to turn, hit the front 300M, kept on very well to the line and scored.
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced towards rear on the outside, 4 lengths or so back, very wide into straight, finished off strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Average to begin, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on the inside, angled out after passing 600M, made good progress in straight to take a place.
Quickly into stride, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, peaked and headed 300M, weakened final 100M.
Began well from a wide draw, raced prominently, 3 wide, there to turn, hard ridden after passing 350M, only showed limited response, ran on evenly to the line.

Moderately away from the widest draw, unable to slot in, trapped very wide in midfield, no cover throughout, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Moderately away, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, finished off evenly.
Jumped with them, raced at tail, 4 to 5 lengths back on turn, finished off evenly.
Began awkwardly, raced at rear on the inside, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, no clear running in straight, not able to test properly.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, wider after passing 600M, showed limited response early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Began well, raced 3 wide with cover, 2 lengths back, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Travelled in midfield, 2 wide, kicked from 300M out, continued nicely to win by 1-1/4L.
Niggled along, settled one-out one-back position, about 2-1/2L off, in touch until losing ground to winner near 100M, ran on nonetheless.
Eased back, at rear 2 wide, shifted across heels at 300M, closed off nicely from thereon.
Awkward start, raced further back, at rear wide with cover, made ground and ran on fairly.
Began only fairly, hard ridden to recover, settled front of midfield, on rail, remained one paced.
Hampered at start, then sent forward to take rail and led, couldn't find extra approaching 250M and was headed.
Bumped start, in behind midfield, wide but with cover, swung wide, held ground in the straight.
Travelled in front of midfield, 2 wide, one paced before eased down approaching 50M.
Eased and slotted in behind midfield, remained 2 wide, bumped at 300M, did not threaten.
Rolled forward before settling outside lead, fad-ed gradually passing 300M. (Roarer)
Urged out of the machine before shifted across to 2-3 wide, at rear throughout, did not threaten.
Settled to race in box-seat, about 2L off, stayed on till emptied approaching 200M. (See Incident Report)
Began only fairly, sat just behind midfield, on rail, made no impression.
Bumped start, hard ridden to be prominent, trapped wide however, crowded near 400M, gave ground thereafter.
Steady headway on the rail early, settled just over 2L back in 4th and becoming 3rd rounding home bend, hit the front inside the 300 metres and soon driven clear.

Settled in midfield in 6th on the rail, closer up in 2.5L 5th when pace slackened home bend, baulked for a run early in straight and checked 350 metres out, renewed effort inside the 150 metres and snatch 2nd late.
Settled towards rear on the rail, made headway to midfield in 7th 600 metres out, obtained clear run shortly after straightening, fought on steadily for a placing late.
Settled in midfield, shifted wide into straight, fought on steadily under pressure to narrowly miss a placing.

Ridden from the widest gate, shifted back gradually for cover eventually obtaining cover in 8th just worse than midfield 1100 metres out, ran on steadily inside final 300 metres to be nearest at finish.

Soon recovered from moderate start, settled in forward of midfield in 4L 5th, closer up when pace slackened home bend, quickened to hold some chance 200 metres out but unable to sustain effort closing stages.
Soon taken well back, widest runner turning for home, ran on well down the centre of the straight to be nearest at finish.
Settled in rear, slightly closer when pace slackened rounding home bend, kept on steadily without quickening in the straight.
Began awkwardly losing ground, trailed the field to straight, shifted off the rail for a run on home turn, made modest progress under pressure to the line.
Pressed forward from a wide gate to lead on the rail over 1350 metres out, found no extra under pressure and headed inside the 300 metres.
Broke well, settled mainly in 3rd 2-wide, became 4th in similar one-out-one-back position rounding home bend, kept on until folded up quickly inside the 200 metres.
Began well settling just off the pace, switched outside the leader rounding home bend, soon weakened after straightening.
In touch early, moved up to press leader from 1000M, wrestled the lead inside 350M, drew away final 150M to win quite comfortably.
Led from 1200M, set good pace to straight, unable to fend off winner 300M out, kept on well enough final stages to hold 2nd.
In mid-division on settling, kept up with the chase on leaders early straight, went 3rd nearing 300M, held ground final stages.
Dropped back to a 3-wide spot behind midfield, ran on well from 350M and was closing on 2nd and 3rd towards the finish.
From draw 1 obtained running in midfield along the inside, kept on evenly from 400M but never going the pace to challenge leaders.
Settled behind midfield, pressed along 600M out, stayed on final 400M but no serious threat to leaders.
Away with them, gradually dropped back to race at the back, 5Ls to make up 400M, stayed on passing beaten horses only. No impression on leaders.
From a low draw moved forward to chase leaders, restricted room 400M out, outpaced over final 300M.
From wide gate taken across behind runners, settled at the rear on inside, shifted out a number of horses to obtain running from 300M, ran on only fairly never troubled leaders.
Fractious in barriers, slowly away, soon guided to the fence racing near the tail of the field, lay in under pressure early straight, kept on same pace to line, never dangerous.
From wide draw restrained to settle at the back of the field, 3 wide swinging for home, failed to pick up over final 400M.
Up with early pace, sat behind leaders passing 900M, had every chance turning in, weakened 300M out.
Crossed to settle 3-wide in midfield, lost cover from 900M, failed to go on passing 300M, soon dropped to last.
Began well from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, finished off strongly to score.
Moderately away, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, 3/4L back turning in, hard ridden 200M, hit the front 150M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner late.
Away with them, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, similar position on turn, made very good progress in straight to take a place, nearest on line.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably to turn, hard ridden 300M, headed near 150M, ran on well, just missed place close home.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide behind midfield, there to turn, made some headway in straight.

Lifted front feet on jumping and away tardily, raced behind midfield on the inside, 5 lengths or so back, slightly improved along the rail on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked near 150M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Quickly into stride, raced 3 wide better than midfield early, 2 wide from 750M, moved a bit closer on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 6 lengths back, still last turning in, made minor progress in straight.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, dropped to midfield on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Bumped start, raced 2 to 3 wide at rear, 5 lengths or so back, there to turn, made no progress in straight.
Taken back from gate 11, raced at rear on the outside, very wide turning in, failed to close off in straight.
Average to begin, positioned on rail in midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the inside, 2 wide on turn, angled out 500M, hard ridden 350M, showed very good response, hit the front 150M, won comfortably.
Moderately away from gate 1, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, took the lead 250M, peaked and headed 150M, ran on evenly to take 2nd.
Began well, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, wider from 550M, closed off well to take a place without threatening.
Commenced well from a wide draw, unable to slot in, raced behind midfield on the outside, very wide into straight, finished off evenly. (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out after passing 600M, 2 lengths back turning in, made little progress early in straight, peaked 200M, ran on evenly to the line.
Away well, sent forward to race prominently on the outside, 1/2L back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 150M.
Started slowly, raced at rear on the outside, commenced move 550M, very wide into straight, made some headway in the run home.
Away well, sent forward to take the lead, led by 1/2L on turn, peaked early in straight, headed 250M, weakened final furlong.
Began awkwardly and made contact, raced 2 wide at rear, 4 lengths or so back turning in, no clear running early in straight, showed limited response thereafter.
Shifted in at start, positioned 1 out 1 back, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced 3 wide with cover towards rear, wider turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Moderately away, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Slowly away, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, angled out 500M, no clear run early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Jumped well from gate 13, raced 3 wide, a length or so back, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 200M.

Clean jump, positioned 1-1/2L behind the leader on the inside, easy run to turn, hit the front 200M, kept on very well, won comfortably.
Jumped well from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, peaked and headed 200M, ran on evenly to take 2nd.
Away well, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, same position on turn, finished off evenly.
Began fairly, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, passed some tired runners in straight.
Jumped with them, raced towards rear, 4 lengths or so back, a bit closer on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong.
Away with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move approaching 600M, outpaced 400M, weakened final 250M.
Taken back from gate 7, raced at tail, 5 to 6 lengths back, moved a bit closer after passing 800M, 3 to 4 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, weakened gradually in straight.
Slow away, hard ridden to obtain box seat, drifted away 200M to score.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, hung on until 200M overhauled.
Hard ridden early, midfield 2 wide, progressed steadily 200M.
At rear along the fence, made steady ground 250M.
On jumping lost ground when crowded for room, took rail at rear, progressed steadily 200M
Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, out of fuel 200M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings
Hard ridden forward, 2 wide, no dash.
At back, trapped 3-4 wide, ran on ok.
Trapped 3-4 wide in front of midfield, ran on fairly.
Never muster at rear, 2 wide, no progress.
Slow away, at back, never improved, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.

Placing: UR
Comment: After travelling a short distance commenced to buck for a considerable distance, resulting in its rider being dislodged near 850M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Settled in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, swung wide on Straightening, made ground and scored by 1/2L.
Raced next to the leader, 2 wide, ran on well to the finishing line to take 2nd.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, closed off well to the line and finished 3rd.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, raced keenly throughout, made some ground and ran on okay for 4th.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, had difficult to obtain clear running in the Straight, ran on only fairly.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, weakened and headed in the last 100M.
At rear, along the rail, made minor ground in the Straight only.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail after 600M, only one paced.
Raced prominently, wide no cover, weakened after passing the 100M.
At rear, 2 wide, no progress.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, near the 300M became unbalanced when crowded for room, weakened thereafter.

Crowded at start & settled second last. Began to improve from 700m, raced to midfield & was 4L behind entering last section, hampered early in straight before dashing between runners to take lead inside 100m, drew away late.

Raced in midfield before drifting further back & relegated to third last at 550m. Crowded, checked & lost ground near 400m before shifting wider & finishing very strongly in concluding stages to snare unlucky second on line.

Had a nice run on leaders back throughout. Moved over the leader's heels on straightening, moved to second place passing the 100m mark before caught for that place on line by fast finisher, only 1 length behind.
Pushed forward after start to assume lead. Continue in lead until headed inside the final 100m, weakened slightly to hold 4th, just over 2L behind.

Raced worse than midfield early before improving along rail to midfield in middle stages. Improved between runners 450m, travelled strongly but had limited room until getting out at 150m & finishing only fairly thereafter.

Shifted across behind runners after the start & raced third last on rail. Moved away from the rail nearing the 400m when 4.5L behind, was awkwardly placed between runners at 250m before finishing off evenly in closing stages.
Raced in midfield along the rail throughout. Entered last section under 3L behind, stayed along rail in straight but peaked mid-straight & gave a few length in last furlong.

Shifted across behind runners after start & settled last. Improved slightly along rail passing 500m, checked away from heels when awkwardly placed near 400m, stayed along the inside in the straight but failed to challenge.
Pushed forward to race at the leaders flanks throughout. Was beaten on straightening & weakened out in the run to the line to be nearly 6L behind.

Raced wide in midfield around first bend before getting position away from the rail with cover from the 1100m. Shifted 3 wide approaching 500m, was the widest on straightening before weakening out quickly in last furlong.
Failed to muster speed at the start & consequently raced rearward. Was relegated to last near the 650m, was a clear last on straightening & made no impression in straight.
Obtained good position 1,1 from the 1200m. Moved three wide at the 450m, hung inwards on straightening when under 3L behind before weakening out poorly in final 250m. Last.
Away with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 wide from 750M, slightly improved on turn, hit the front 250M, kept on well to hold off the challenger late.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced towards rear on the inside, angled out 400M, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, just beaten by a neck.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 6 to 7 lengths back, commenced move approaching 400M, very wide turning in, made very good progress in straight to take a place.
Moderately away from gate 1, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross 650M, sat right behind the leader on turn, not enough room early in straight, cleared 150M, finished off evenly.
Began well from a wide draw, raced behind midfield on the outside, moved closer on turn, made contact 450M, showed very good response early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Began well, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, hard ridden after passing 400M, finished off evenly.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, 2 wide, found rail near 650M, led by a length on turn, peaked and headed 250M, weakened inside final 150M.
Out in line, raced better than midfield on the outside, moved closer in the middle stages, 2nd on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 100M.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide behind midfield, made contact 450M, wider turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Away well, raced prominently early, travelled keenly near 1000M, dropped towards rear in the middle stages, last turning in, made no progress in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began fairly, raced in midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Taken back from gate 9, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Sent forward, took rail prior the first turn, led all way and battled on to the end to win by a head.
Travelled in midfield, along the rail, took run on centre track, closed off strongly, missed by a head.
Took back, at rear 2 wide, took inside rail turning home, ran on fairly to the line.
Hard ridden, settled in box-seat, stayed on until emptied approaching 50M.
Forward, inside the lead until crossed by it near 600M, weakened out inside final 100M.
Hampered at start, settled in midfield, 2 wide, remained one paced to the line.
Hampered at start, at tail and on rail, improved slightly only.
Took back, raced at the rear, wide but with cover, did not threaten.
In midfield, wide and without cover, found nothing in the straight.

Placing: PU
Comment: Went amiss at 900M, was eased out of the race. (See Incident Report)

Broke well, taken back for coveted position on the rail about 2L off the lead, commenced move passing the 450 metres, fought on under pressure the length of the straight and gained upper hand inside the 50 metres.
Ridden along in first few early before settling over 2L back 2-wide coming onto back straight, came to tackle leaders approaching home straight, ran on under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Broke well from a wide gate, obtained 2-wide position in 2nd turning into back straight, improved to hit the front approaching home straight, found no extra and headed 50 metres out.
Settled in midfield, commenced move rounding home bend swinging 4-wide into straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Settled in last few on the rail, angled out for a run entering home straight going 5-wide, ran on well inside final 250 metres down the centre of the track, did best work late.
Ridden forward after moderate start, obtained lead on the rail 1000 metres out, led until narrowly headed approaching home straight, swamped for minor placing inside final 150 metres.
Taken back to last from the widest gate, commenced move from well behind over 400 metres out swinging 5-wide into home straight, ran on steadily down the centre of the track to be nearest at finish.

Steadied to midfield on the rail early, minor interference 1000 metres out, checked and lost over 1L over 500 metres out, soon recovered and reached 3L 5th on straightening, found no extra inside final 100 metres.
Lost position in midfield when hampered shortly after start dropping well behind, trailed the field on the rail turning for home, made good late impression in the run to the line.

Began awkwardly losing ground, improved swiftly to 9th early in back straight, travelled greenly 700 metres out, gained further closer rounding home bend, unable to sustain effort after straightening.

Inconvenienced at start, travelled wide in last few before improving to forward of midfield in 5th within 3L of pace, remained 3-wide without cover rounding home bend, swung wider into straight and dropped out tamely.
Midfield early and gradually taken back for cover, dropped towards the rear behind runner 700 metres out, weakened out of contention on top of home bend.
Settled well in mid-division, came with a well timed challenge on straightening, fought on well to the line getting up just in time.
Led as expected, set a good pace to the straight, rallied on strongly when challenged by rivals, caught by winner last few strides.
From draw 1 obtained a trailing spot behind leaders, chased well turning home to be vying for lead mid-straight, outstayed by first 2 late stages.
Went forward, prompted the pace on outside, vied for lead passing 400M, fought on well to the line, faded final 50M, edged out to 4th late.
Towards the rear always, saved ground along inside, 5Ls to make up 400M, stayed on well, had to shift ground final 50M to continue improving, nearest finish.
Held up behind midfield, pushed along 500M but kept on at same speed only, never going the pace to challenge.
Settled towards the rear, hard pressed 600M and swung widest for home, stayed on mildly final 300M, not troubled leaders.
Restrained to settle behind midfield, ran on fairly when asked from 400M, never dangerous.
Chased leaders, wide no cover until 900M, pushed along near 400M, found disappointingly little in the finish, out of contention 300M.
Caught wide before obtaining a midfield spot passing 1200M, wide again from 700M, gave limited response turning for home. Never threatened.
In touch behind leaders, lay out 500M, soon came under pressure, weak in the finish.
Began awkwardly, settled at the rear early stages, wide no cover from 700M then strode forward to race in midfield, already beaten turning home, eased when no chance.
Bumped start, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, angled out 350M, not enough room early in straight, cleared 150M, finished off strongly to score.
Away with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, very wide turning in, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Shifted out at start and bumped, positioned 1-1/2L behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, angled out 350M, hard ridden 200M, hit the front 100M, peaked and headed close home.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide at rear, 6 lengths or so back, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to be nearest on line.
Clean jump, positioned 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, showed good response early in straight, no extra final 50M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped with them, raced behind midfield on the inside, 2 wide on turn, made minor progress in straight.

Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the inside, moved a bit closer along the rail on turn, angled out 350M, made minor progress early in straight, not enough room 100M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Bumped start, positioned 2 wide, 1-1/2L back, similar position on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final 100M.
Out in line, raced prominently but very wide early, 2 wide from 850M, shared lead on turn, showed limited response early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, weakened thereafter.
Crowded shorty after start, raced at tail, 7 lengths back, same margin back on turn, made good progress early in straight, not enough room approaching 100M, made no impression thereafter.
Bumped start, raced prominently but 3 wide early, found rail after entering the back straight, shared lead on turn, headed 150M, weakened thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Away well, sent forward to take the lead but trapped 3 wide, headed near 700M, dropped towards rear on turn, emptied early in straight when hard run took toll.

Average to begin, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, travelled well to turn, finished off well, won by 1/2L.
Moderately away, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the winner late.

Jumped with them, raced better than midfield on the outside, found a 2 wide spot near 800M, 2 lengths back on turn, kept on well in straight to take a place, no threat to the first two. (See Racing Incidents.)
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, moved a bit closer on turn, very wide into straight, made some progress in the run home. (Blood in trachea.)
Away well, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly thereafter.
Began well from gate 1, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, one-paced in straight.
Slightly slow out, raced 2 wide at rear, 6 lengths back turning in, made no impression in straight.
Away with them, raced 3 wide, 3 lengths back, moved a bit closer after passing 800M, 2 lengths back turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Out in line, raced 2 wide in midfield, peaked on turn, weakened gradually final 300M.
Lifted front feet on jumping and away tardily, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground throughout, failed to make any progress in straight.
Pushed to take rail and lead, made all.
At back, trapped 3-4 wide, dashed strongly 300M for 2nd.
Hard ridden forward, sat outside the leader, held ground for 3rd.
Pushed to obtain box seat, just held ground.
Slow away, at rear, 2-4 wide, unleashed strong finishing efforts 200M.
Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, weakened 100M.
At back, trapped 3 wide, dashed well 250M.
Slow away, hard ridden to keep up with the field, dashed well 200M.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 3 wide, emptied 200M, post-race vet exam not show any significant findings.
Behind midfield, checked 400M, no progress, post-race vet exam not show any significant findings.
Trapped 3-4 wide at rear, never a factor.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, swung wide on Straightening, battled on to the line and scored by only 1/2L.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, ran on gamely, only to miss by 1/2L.
Raced next to the leader, 2 wide, kept on going to the line and finished 3rd.
Raced behind the leader, along the rail, closed off well to the line.
At rear, 2 wide after 800M, closed off well to the line in the last 50M.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, passing the 700M was steadied, remain one paced to the line.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, only one paced to the line.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, remain one paced to the line.
At one-out one-back, weakened after passing 150M.
At rear, along the rail, swung wide on Straightening, emptied in the last 200M.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, lost ground in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, wide no cover, no progress.
Lovely run on leaders back throughout, moved to second when travelling strongly before cornering, dashed to lead approaching 200m, drew away to win.

Steadied after start & drifted back to the rear when racing wide but with cover. Shifted wider to improve near 500m, widest on straightening when 6L behind before making late closing ground to move to second in late stages.

Raced in misfiled between runners throughout. Niggled along at half-way to hold position, shifted wider passing 600m, cornered just under 5L behind before making good late ground down the outside before being caught for second late.
Pushed forward to lead. Continued in lead until being joined by winner near the 350m, battled on ok before being over-run for a minor placing in final 50m. Beaten about 2L on line.
Raced just worse than midfield along the rail throughout. Stayed along the rail on straightening when just over 4L behind before making up a length or two when finishing steadily to midfield on line.

Hard ridden after start before only being able to hold position in midfield on rail. Improved to third place just before straightening when 3L from the lead before finishing off only one paced to midfield.

Steadied after start & shifted across to race worse than midfield between runners throughout. Ridden along passing 700m, cornered just under 6L behind before making some steady late ground despite not ridden out final 50m.

Had no early speed & consequently raced near the tail throughout. Stayed along the rail on straightening when 6L behind before passing only a few tiring runners when making up a length or two to finish midfield.

Shifted back after the start & raced worse than midfield when 3 wide with cover. Was 6L behind on straightening & made no headway into that margin in dash to line. (Blood & mucus post-race, must trial).
Slow to begin by 1L & then shifted back to race at the tail. Hard ridden from 600m when continuing last, shifted wide approaching corner, widest in straight but was too far back &was never involved.

Had good position 1,1 throughout. Shuffled a pair further back mid-race before moving 3 ide passing half-way. Straightened only 3.5L from the lead before weakening out to be beaten just under 10L. Poor.

Trapped 3 wide no cover in midfield after start before improving position to be outside the leader from the 950m. Came under heavy pressure nearing 600m mark, began weakening from 500m & was beaten nearly 12L.

Shifted across & raced three wide with cover in midfield before being left without cover from the 900m. Came under hard ridding passing the 600m, pushed 4 wide from the 500m before weakening badly to long second last.
Pushed forward & raced outside the leader. Obtained cover & raced 1,1 from the 850m mark, hard ridden from the 700m & began losing ground from 600m before weakening out to be distant last.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, enjoyed the easy lead on turn, kicked clear early in straight, kept on well to hold off the challenger late.
Made contact at start, raced better than midfield on the inside, 3 lengths back turning in, finished off strongly to take 2nd, just beaten by a head.
Jumped with them, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, made good progress in straight to take a place without threatening.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, 3 wide on turn, finished off evenly.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced in 2nd, 2 wide on turn, dropped to 3rd in the middle stages, 4 lengths back turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide towards rear, wider after passing 600M, 8 lengths back turning in, made minor progress in straight.
Began smartly from a wide draw, unable to slot in, taken back to race at rear, 10 lengths back on turn, made minor progress in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Shifted in at start and made contact, raced 3 wide with cover towards rear, 9 lengths back on turn, made little progress in straight.
Began only fairly, raced in midfield on the outside, no cover after passing 700M, very wide turning in, weakened early in straight.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Stumbled at start and bumped, raced at rear on the inside, a bit closer on turn but still 8 lengths behind, showed nothing in straight. (Bled.)
Bumped start, raced at rear on the outside, still well back on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Crowded at the start, settled in behind midfield, 2 wide, held up early but dashed home impressively once cleared, won by 1/2L.
Jumped awkwardly, recovered to take box-seat, no clear run early, closed off thereafter but winner was too good.
Bumped start then ridden positively, sat in front of mid-field, wide but with cover, ran on well to the line to take 3rd.
Took back, raced at the rear, made the turns on the rail, dashed home well from approaching 200M.
Forward, took one-out one-back position, one paced and lost ground from 200M out.
Bumped start, raced towards the rear, 2-3 wide but with cover, improved slightly only.
Bumped start, settled midfield, along the rail, held up early, raced flat.
Hard ridden before settling in midfield, wide but with cover, did not threaten.
Slotted into midfield, 2 wide, run on slightly early but no extra for final 150M.
Crowded start, sat towards the rear, on rail, held up till 300M, showed dashes once cleared before evened out.
Took back, at rear throughout, wide initially, shifted to 2 deep prior to first turn, wasn't in it.
Bumped start, settled outside lead in 2 wide position, stayed on until weakened near 250M.
Jumped smartly, shared lead with 2 others, on rail, emptied approaching 300M. (See Incident Report)
Forward to share lead, 3 wide no cover however, run ended passing 350M.
Disputed lead on the rail, took up running narrowly over 600 metres out but headed into straight, asserted authority over 200 metres out and soon drew clear.
Settled about 2L back in 5th on the rail, snuck up along the rail making home turn but soon shuffled back to 5th some 2L early in straight, fought on dourly between runners to snatch 2nd late.
Led or disputed lead 2-wide, gained narrow advantage from eventual winner on straightening, headed under pressure over 200 metres out and lost 2nd late.
Niggled along in midfield in 6th just over 3L back, came under pressure entering home straight and produced good late impression closing stages.
Niggled along one-out-one-back in 4th, became 5th rounding home bend, renewed effort to reach 3rd 200 metres out, swamped for a placing late.
Began well from the widest gate, settled just off the pace in 3rd 3-wide without cover to straight, faded under pressure.
Settled in rear from a wide gate, remained similar into straight when carried very wide, fought on well down the centre of the track.
Moderate start, settled just worse than midfield in 7th, inconvenienced behind heels 650 metres out, went very wide into straight, kept on steadily under pressure.
Slightly slow out settling well back, went very wide and last into straight, fought on well nearer the stands side of the track.
In touch chasing leading pair, responded well when asked inside 400M, wrestled the lead nearing 50M, driven out.
Moved forward to be prompting the pace, travelled well going into 400M, led 250M out, not pace of winner final 100M, held on for 2nd just.
In midfield early, took closer order from 600M, held up behind leading trio from 400-200M, ran on well towards the line, just missed 2nd.
From a middle draw moved forward and crossed to lead along stands' rail, driven out 350M but unable to shake off pursuing rivals, headed inside 250M, dropped to 4th place 100M out.
Urged along after the start, never far off from the pace, fought on one paced inside 400M, no threat to first few from 250M.
Towards the rear, stayed on without threatening first 4 over final 400M.
Settled near the rear early stages, ran on fairly passing midway, never troubled leaders
From draw 1 shifted across behind runners, dropped to rear halfway, responded only fairly when asked, ran past beaten horses towards the line.
Lacked early speed, ended up near the rear, came under pressure halfway, never going the pace to challenge.
Raced in midfield, hard pressed from 600M, failed to finish off.
Obtained running in midfield, not quickened when driven out 500M, no extra final 200M.
Inconvenienced at the start, ended up racing towards the rear, found nothing when driven out halfway. Never involved on its debut run.
Held up behind mid-division, struggled to keep up passing 600M, weak in the finish.
Driven to chase leaders along stands' rail, came under heavy pressure 600M from home, soon beaten, eased when no chance. (Roarer.)
Made contact at start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on very well in straight and scored.
Bumped start, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, made good progress in straight to take 2nd.
Began fairly, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, angled out 650M, improved on turn, very wide into straight, finished off evenly.
Taken back from gate 13, raced behind midfield on the inside, 4 lengths or so back, saved ground on turn, made some progress in straight to make frame, no threat to the first few.
Away with them, raced 2 to 3 wide at rear, moved closer after passing 600M, very wide turning in, made some headway in straight.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, 4 wide on turn, made minor progress early in straight, no extra final 200M.
Stumbled leaving stalls, positioned on rail better than midfield, saved ground on turn, angled out 450M, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide behind midfield, commenced move 500M, very wide into straight, finished off evenly.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide better than midfield, there to turn, made no impression in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the inside, 5 to 6 lengths back, same margin back on turn, one-paced in the run home.
Away well, positioned 3 wide, a length or so back, wider turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Moderately away from a wide draw, trapped wide in midfield early, dropped to rear on the first turn, 5 lengths or so back turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Jumped well, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, peaked 450M, weakened thereafter, eased final 150M.
Made contact at start, trapped very wide behind midfield, no cover throughout, weakened from 500M, finished last.
Began smartly, raced prominently on the inside, took the lead 1100M, led by a length on turn, kept on very well in straight, easily scored.
Shifted in at start and bumped, raced 2 wide at rear, found rail 750M, saved ground on turn, finished off strongly to take 2nd. (See Racing Incidents.)
Moderately away from gate 1, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground throughout, kept on evenly in straight.
Crowded start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, there to turn, no daylight early in straight, cleared after passing 200M, made good progress thereafter to make frame. (Mucus.)
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the inside, moved a bit closer along the rail in the middle stages, kept to inside after straightening and finished off evenly.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Jumped with them, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, similar position on turn, finished off evenly.
Made contact on jumping, raced 3 wide better than midfield, no cover throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong.
Away with them, raced towards rear of midfield on the outside, very wide turning in, made no impression in straight.
Jumped with them, raced prominently, 2 wide, a length back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 200M.
Made contact on jumping, trapped 4 wide in midfield, 3 lengths back turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide with cover towards rear, wider after passing 550M, 6 lengths back turning in, failed to make any progress in straight.
Began well from gate 13, unable to slot in, trapped very wide in midfield, moved closer after passing 750M, 2nd turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back from gate 12, raced at rear on the outside, very wide into straight, failed to make any progress in the run home.
