Jumped well, raced prominently, 2 wide, found rail near 1100M, a length behind in the middle stages, saved ground on turn, hit the front approaching 200M, kept on strongly to the line, won by 2-1/4L.
Began well, raced 2 wide behind midfield, closer on turn, made good progress in straight to take 2nd.
Made contact at start, raced in midfield on the outside, commenced move 650M, a length or so back on turn, very wide into straight, showed good response early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the inside, 2 wide on turn, made some headway in straight to make frame, no threat to the first few.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail early, moved closer after entering the back straight, 2-1/2L back on turn, very wide into straight, passed some tired runners in straight.
Clean jump, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide, shared lead turning in, peaked early in straight, headed near 200M, weakened final 100M.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail slightly better than midfield, saved ground on turn, kept on well early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Stumbled at start, positioned on rail in midfield early, dropped towards rear in the middle stages, made some progress early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened thereafter.
Made contact at start, raced at rear on the outside, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, made no impression in straight.
Taken back from gate 9, raced at rear on the inside, angled out after passing 850M, moved a bit closer 750M, very wide on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Away well, sent forward to take the lead, led by 3/4L, shared lead with rival on turn, peaked early in straight, headed near 200M, weakened thereafter.
Jumped with them, raced better than midfield on the outside, 3 wide from 600M, a length back on turn, weakened early in straight.
Pushed to take rail and lead, hung on well to score.
Eased back for cover, 2-3 wide at rear, closed off strongly 250M.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 400M for 3rd.
Eased back, 2-3 wide, made steady ground 300M.
Eased at start, 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 250M.
Eased back took rail, made ground 200M.
In front of midfield, ran on fairly in straight.
Eased back, never improved, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Trapped 3 wide in midfield early, moved forward 1000M to sit outside the leader, weakened 200M.
Box seat, out of fuel 250M.
Midfield, emptied 400M, on heels 350M.
Pushed forward, 2 wide, faded 600M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
At rear, along the rail after 700M, saved ground and closed off strongly to win by 1-1/2L.
At rear, along the rail, swung wide on Straightening, showed strong dash in the last 200M.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, stayed on but lay out near 50M and then headed by the winner.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, ran on well initially but hampered near 50M and finished 4th.
Raced behind the leader, along the rail, showed some dash but hampered passing 50M.
At rear, 2 wide, swung widest on Straightening, improved well to the line.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, only one paced.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, pretty one paced.
Raced prominently, 2 wide, weakened after passing 100M.
Settled in midfield, 3 wide no cover after 650M, did not feature.
Raced in behind midfield, 3 wide but with cover, found nothing in the Straight.
Race in front of midfield, 2 wide, lost ground in the Straight.
Raced second away from rail throughout. Entered last section 2L behind leader who raced clear, made continual strong ground to strike lead inside final 30m & won dashing clear.

Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Eased wider entering last section when just under 3L behind, made continual ground despite hanging inwards near the 75m mark before snaring second place in final strides.
Began very fast to assume lead easily. Was 2L clear on straightening, held lead until caught inside final 30m. Caught for second in final strides.
Raced third on the rail throughout but 3L from lead in middle stages. Closed off well to only be beaten 1.5L on line.

Crowded at the start, raced third last early before settling worse than midfield on rail. Moved off rail on cornering when 5L behind, shifted inwards when making ground in straight before being checked near 75m, unlucky.

Crowded at start & consequently raced rearward. Over 8L from lead entering final section, stayed close to the inside in straight, was closing off very strongly before being hampered for room & not tested in concluding stages.
Trapped racing three wide without cover in midfield throughout. Entered last section just over 3L behind before making steady ground to be beaten about 2L in midfield after wide passage throughout.
Raced in midfield along rail throughout. Straightened about 4L from the lead, stayed on rail, failed to challenge but wasn't beaten far in a bunched finish.
Out-paced after the start & drifted back to the tail. Was last on straightening nearly 9L from the lead before making steady ground under limited riding to be beaten only 3L but never looked likely.

Ridden forward from outside gate but was left very wide before steadying at 900m & racing worse than midfield when 3 wide with cover. Just under 7L behind on cornering, made up a few lengths late but still finished rearward.

Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Travelled strongly at 400m when 4L from lead, steadied at 250m when disappointed for clear running, was then closing evenly before steadied & losing ground passing 75m. Unlucky.
Crowded & lost ground at start before improving to race three wide in midfield. Raced keenly in middle stages & cornered awkwardly at 550m. Failed to improve in straight & was last.
Jumped well from gate 12, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide, shared lead on turn, kept on well in straight to hold off the challenger.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, commenced move 350M, finished off very strongly, just beaten by a narrow margin.
Bumped start, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 150M, closed off well to take a place without threatening the first two.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced behind midfield on the inside, angled out after passing 500M, very wide into straight, finished off well to make frame, nearest on line.
Bumped start, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, a bit closer on turn, showed good response early in straight, peaked 100M, weakened thereafter.
Away with them, raced 3 wide better than midfield, no cover throughout, a length or so back on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly thereafter.
Shifted out at start, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Made contact at start, raced behind midfield on the outside, 5 to 6 lengths back turning in, made minor progress in straight.
Crowded out start, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made no impression in straight.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, led by 1/2L, shared the lead with rival on turn, peaked and headed 200M, weakened thereafter.
Taken back from gate 9, raced 2 wide towards rear, 3 wide on turn, failed to close off in straight. (Lame right front leg.)
Taken back from gate 11, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Eased back, sat just behind midfield, 2 wide, dashed home impressively, caught leaders late, won by a neck.
Sent forward, prominent but trapped wide, bat-tled on gamely, only headed by winner in final strides.
Took back, checked at 1000M, settled towards the rear, 2 wide before making turns 3 wide, ran home strongly to take 3rd.
Sent forward to lead, shifted in to race 2 wide at 700M, battled on but peaked at 100M.
Took back, shifted to rail, in worse than mid-field, dashed early before running on one paced. (Lame left hind)
Slotted in just behind midfield, wide but with cover, was one paced in the straight.
Ridden forward, shared lead until 700M, re-mained 2 wide, lost ground to leaders 150M out.
Settled to race in midfield, along the rail, was one paced before weakened inside final 100M.
Took back, at rear on rail, showed no turn of foot in the straight.
Contacted at start, in about midfield, 2 wide, wasn't a factor.
Forward, share lead on the rail, emptied passing 250M.
In front of midfield, wide with cover, gave ground from 400M out. (Blood in trachea and heart irregularity)
Bumped at the start, settled in rear on the rail, quickened up with the increasing pace passing the 800 metres, commenced move rounding home bend, fought on dourly in straight to just get up on line.

Restrained to midfield early, gained closer to 6th over 2L back 700 metres out, switched wide for a run entering straight, ran on under pressure to hit the front over 50 metres out but pipped at post.

Settled just over 2L back in 4th on the rail, improved to just behind race leader over 700 metres out, saved ground turning for home, drew level momentarily under strong pressure 100 metres out, found no extra late.

Settled well back from the widest gate, made steady headway to reach 3L 8th briefly 900m out, carried back to second last at the 600 metres, renewed effort very wide round home bend, ran on well in straight. (Tactic questioned)
Began well, taken one back just behind race leader, came under pressure to challenge entering home straight, unable to quicken to threaten.

Travelled keenly wide behind midfield, made swift progress wide in back straight to share pace inside the 800 metres, disputed lead into home straight, unable to sustain effort inside final 100 metres. (Tactic questioned)

Ridden along early, settled in midfield on the rail, carried backward just behind midfield early in back straight, re-gained midfield when 7th 800 metres out, saved ground turning in but found no extra inside the 100 metres.

Soon came forward to make the running on the rail coming onto first bend, quickened up pace when joined in the lead passing the 800 metres, headed under pressure when found no extra over 200 metres out.
Soon taken back from a wide gate, remained towards rear in back straight, came under pressure from the 600 metres, some 4L back turning into straight, made no further impression.
Settled well back from a wide gate, saved ground on the inside making home turn, unable to quicken to threaten.

Pressed forward from a wide gate, settled just over 2L back in 2nd, drifted back to 8th over 3L back at the 600 metres when pace increased, 3-wide rounding home bend and very wide into straight, soon found no extra.

Wide without cover 4-wide onto first bend, raced keenly and allowed to move forward to outside race leader 800 metres out, drifted back to 2L 5th 3-wide without cover 500 metres out, weakened further inside the 400 metres.
Not hurried after the start and taken back to race at the rear, still 8Ls to make up 400M, shifted out 250M for clear running, stormed home to win it last stride.
From draw 1 obtained running in midfield, into clear 300M, quickened up well to be challenging for the lead 150M, caught by fast winner last stride.
Settled down midfield along the fence, closed off well on straightening, vied for lead final 100M, narrowly beaten by first 2.
Held up behind midfield, pushed along nearing 400M, wide into straight, closed off mildly to go 4th 70M, no impression on first 3.
Close up chasing leaders early then held back to sit just ahead of midfield, disappointed for running 250M then stayed on moderately towards the line, never near to challenge leaders.
Reserved near the rear, over 6Ls to make up 400M, had to shift lane 250M then stayed on without troubling leaders.
Emerged as leader 900M, took them along at a good pace, kicked 2Ls clear early straight, caught near 100M, no extra late.
Began only fairly, settled towards the rear on inside, ran on fairly over final 300M, not reached leaders.
Set early pace, took a trailing spot behind leaders from 800M, fought on to 150M then weakened.
Chased leaders, wide no cover from 700M, not quickened on straightening, no extra final 150M.
From wide draw made some early use to go forward chasing the pace, weakened from 300M, soon out of contention.

Placing: PU
Comment: Not able to muster speed despite ridden along early stages, eased out of the race prior to 600M. (Lame Left Hind Leg.)
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide better than midfield, a length or so back on turn, finished off very strongly to score.
Out in line, raced 2 wide in midfield, 3 wide from 700M, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Began well from gate 1, positioned in midfield on the inside, 2 wide on turn, closed off well to take a place.

Away with them, unable to slot in, trapped 3 wide with no cover in midfield, moved a bit closer in the middle stages, 2 lengths back on turn, finished off well to make frame, not quite able to challenge.
Began smartly from a wide draw, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide, challenged the leader near 400M, took the lead early in straight, kept on well but unable to hold off the first few final 50M.
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide behind midfield, there to turn, made some progress early in straight, not enough room final 50M.
Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made good progress early in straight, no extra final 50M.
Moderately away from the widest draw, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground to turn, angled out 400M, taken wide in straight and made reasonable progress.
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide towards rear, commenced move after passing 500M, very wide turning in, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Clean jump, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, challenged by rival near 400M, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Slowly away, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Jumped with them, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, showed limited response early in straight, weakened final 150M.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Clean jump, raced 2 wide in midfield, wider turning in, finished off strongly to score.

Began well, sent forward to take the early lead, 2 wide, headed shortly after passing 1200M, 2nd on turn, bumped early in straight, took the lead 100M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner final 50M.
Slowly away, raced at tail, 6 lengths or so back, moved closer on turn, very wide into straight, made good progress in straight to take a place.
Bumped start, raced prominently on the inside, took the lead shortly after passing 1200M, travelled well to turn, challenged early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, weakened gradually close home.
Bumped start, raced slightly behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, unable to obtain clear running until approaching 100M, made some progress thereafter, blocked again close home.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide behind midfield, angled out 500M, no clear running early in straight, cleared 150M, finished off evenly.
Bumped start, raced towards rear on the inside, angled out 600M, very wide into straight, finished off evenly.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced better than midfield on the inside, angled out 500M, bumped early in straight, peaked 200M, weakened thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Eased to sit in midfield, 2 wide, lost its left hind plate in the early stages, closed off strongly 300M to score.
Hard ridden early, trapped 3 wide in front of midfield, progressed steadily 400M for 2nd.
Slow away, midfield, 2 wide, lack room 400M, made steady ground when clear.
Eased to sit in midfield, trapped 3 wide, ran on ok in straight.
Eased at start, trapped 3-4 wide, made steady ground 400M.
Slow away, at back, 2 wide, lack room 400M, progressed steadily when clear.
Slow away, at rear, 2-4 wide, made ground 200M.
Behind midfield, trapped 3 wide, made early move 600M, run ended 200M, was found to have a small wound to right hind heel after racing.
Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, weakened 300M.
Eased back, trapped 3-5 wide, no progress, was noted to have bled from both nostrils.
Slow away, at rear, never improved.
Behind midfield, never competitive.
Took rail and lead, out of fuel 300M.
Box seat, soon emptied 400M.
Raced in front of midfield, 2 wide, kept on strongly to the line and won by 1L.
Raced behind the leader, along the rail, finished off strongly to take 2nd, always held.
At one-out one-back, ran on fairly to the line to take 3rd.
At rear, 2 wide, bumped at 400M and then made ground steadily to the line.
Raced in behind midfield, 3 wide but with cover, swung wide on Straightening, bumped at 400M and showed some dash only.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, kept on going but crowded near 100M, one paced thereafter.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, only one paced in the Straight.
At rear, 2 wide, made ground steadily to the line.
At rear, along the rail, showed some dash in early part of the Straight but weakened after passing 100M.
Raced next to the leader, 2 wide, weakened after passing 100M.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide no cover, did not feature. (See incident report)
At rear, along the rail, failed to make any progress in the run home.
At rear, wide but with cover, never dangerous.
Sent forward and took lead, lost ground in the Straight. (See incident report)

Drifted back & raced second last on rail. Eased wider passing 500m, straightened 4L from the lead before finishing strongly down the outside to sweep to lead near the 75m mark & win drawing away. Strong staying performance.

Had lovely run stalking two co-leaders throughout. Moved wider & moved to lead on straightening, rolled into the rail mid-straight, continued in lead until passed by winner passing 100m mark, well clear of third, big effort.

Raced in midfield away from rail, travelled strongly approaching corner, tracked leading pair on straightening, moved to second at 350m, finished steadily to old third but was no match for the superior stayers in front.
Drifted back & raced third last away from rail. Was about 4L behind on straightening, finished steadily to well held 4th but didn't having the staying stamina of first two.

Pushed forward, raced second before applying mid-race pressure & sharing lead in middle stages. Shared lead on cornering with the runner-up before emptying soon after straightening & weakening to be over 8L behind.
Raced in midfield on the rail for the majority. Stayed along inside in straight but weakened poorly to be long third last.
Over-raced in early stages before eventually being steadied & racing at the tail. Never improved & was long second last.
Obtained easy lead before being pressured mid-race & setting fast mid-race sections. Was beaten before cornering & weakened out dramatically to be distant last.
Moderately away from gate 1, raced towards rear on the inside, moved a bit closer on turn, angled out 450M, finished off very strongly to score.
Away with them, raced 3 wide with cover slightly behind midfield, slightly hampered by faller near 500M, finished off strongly to take 2nd.
Began well, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, there to turn, took the lead early in straight, peaked and headed near 75M, inconvenienced close home.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced in midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, kept on well in straight without threatening.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, badly hampered by the faller near 500M, kept on evenly in straight.
Bumped start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, headed early in straight, kept on evenly to 150M, weakened thereafter.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 5 to 6 lengths back, hampered by the fallers near 500M, made no impression in straight.
Average to begin, trapped 4 wide in midfield, badly hampered by the fallers near 500M, eased final 400M.

Placing: FE
Comment: Began fairly, raced towards rear on the outside, collided with the fallers and brought down near 500M.

Placing: FE
Comment: Commenced well, raced 3 wide better than midfield, found cover near 800M, badly hampered by the fallers and brought down near 500M.

Placing: FE
Comment: Slightly hampered at start, raced behind midfield on the outside, badly hampered by the fallers and brought down near 500M.

Placing: FE
Comment: Jumped well, raced prominently on the outside, went amiss and fell near 550M.
Urged forward to lead, headed briefly in the straight before fighting back, pulled away at 100M to win by 1L.
Jumped smartly, allowed to take box-seat, level with winner until 100M out, ran home nicely anyhow.
Settled in front of midfield, 2 wide, battled on gamely to the line to take 3rd.
Prominent, just less than 2L off and outside the lead, ran on okay till 100M, no extra thereafter
Travelled in midfield, along the rail, switched across heels at 300M, continued on fairly.
Eased back, in worse than midfield, 2 wide, slightly held early, ran on ok in last 300M.
Slotted in to race just behind midfield, 2 wide, was pretty one paced. (See Incident Report)
Jumped only fairly, at rear and was 1-2 wide, made no impression.
Took back, at rear, gradually peeled out to 3 wide from 700M out, didn't close off. (See Incident Report)
Began only fairly, raced towards the rear, on rail, never threaten.
Eased then sat in worse than midfield, trapped wide, no dash and gave ground from 200M.

Restrained behind midfield early, pulled forward steadily along the rail to 6th just over 3L back 950 metres out, angled out for a run on top of home bend, obtained clear passage 300 metres out and soon took charge to win readily.
Settled in 3L 6th one off the rail, became 8th in similar position rounding home bend, fought on well under pressure to snatch 2nd late.
Soon came to share the lead on the rail, gained half a length advantage passing the 1200 metres, worn down quickly by eventual winner inside the 250 metres and lost 2nd late.
Slow out settling in rear, wide rounding home bend and even wider into straight, ran on under pressure down the centre of the track to be nearest at finish.
Inconvenienced at start settling behind midfield, switched 3-wide with cover rounding home bend, fought on steadily without threatening.

Bumped at start, travelled keenly gaining steadily on the rail to reach 2L 5th some shortly afterward, snuck up to 3rd coming onto home bend and saved ground turning in, kept on until finding no extra inside final 150 metres.

Began well settling 3-wide without cover in prominent 4th, shifted backward to 5th some 3L off passing the 1000 metres, widest runner turning for home, fought on nicely down the centre of the track, never nearer.

Settled well back on the rail, travelled keenly and moved up towards the rear in 9th around the 1000 metres, gained closer into straight holding some chance early on, unable to sustain effort closing stages.
Taken back from a wide gate trailing the field to straight, saved ground turning in, switched out off heels for a run 300 metres out, ran home at the one pace.

Began positively settling one-out-one-back in joint 3rd, became 4th some 2L back coming out of back straight, commenced move 3-wide 600 metres out, carried wider entering home straight, found nothing under pressure.
Pressed forward from the widest gate, obtained prominent 2-wide position at about the 1300 metres, gradually weakened after straightening.
Always prominent behind leaders, kicked on strongly from 300M, got up nearing 50M to win on her final start before retirement.
Given a waiting ride at the rear, pushed along nearing 600M, wide into straight, picked up strongly from 400M, outgunned by the classy winner late stages.
Reserved in midfield along the 3-path, moved closer from 600M swinging wide for home, quickened to lead 350M, battled on well only to be caught by first 2 nearing 50M. Career best performance.
Settled towards the rear, barged through a narrow passage 300M to challenge, stayed on well to be nearest at the line.
Held up at the rear, waited with until 400M, stayed on moderately to line. Career best performance.
Began awkwardly, restrained in midfield, raced keenly 1300M, responded fairly when asked early straight, never a threat to leaders.
Settled behind midfield, switched wide 700M from home, responded mildly early straight, not finishing pace of leaders final 200M.
Chased leaders in a 3-wide spot, left with no cover from 850M, soon outpaced by rivals early straight, hampered 300M, no impression after.
Went forward disputing for the lead, caught wide no cover until 850M, fought on to 300M then weakened.
Disputed for the lead early and middle stages, emerged as leader 800M, headed 350M, soon no extra.
From draw 1 settled down behind leaders along the fence, checked top of straight when attempting to improve through a narrow gap on inside, lost ground and dropped to last, out of contention.
Up with the slow early pace, tracked leaders from 1000M, came under pressure 600M, first to be beaten turning home.
Clean jump, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well in the middle stages, led by a length turning in, hard ridden after passing 300M, kept on strongly to the line and scored.
Made contact shortly after start, sat right behind the leader on rail, saved ground to turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 250M, kept on well to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out 500M, closed off well to take a place.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider turning in, no daylight early in straight, cleared approaching 200M, finished off well to make frame, nearest on line.
Away with them, raced behind midfield on the inside, a bit closer on turn, bumped near 350M, showed good response early in straight, peaked 100M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Crowded on jumping, raced towards rear on the inside, angled out after passing 550M, no clear running early in straight, cleared 250M, made minor progress thereafter.
Began well, raced 4 wide with cover, 2 lengths or so back, wider turning in, finished off evenly.
Bumped start, positioned 3 wide with cover, 2 lengths or so back, angled out after passing 550M, made minor progress early in straight, peaked on run 200M, weakened final 50M.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced behind midfield on the outside, very wide turning in, one-paced in the run home.
Began awkwardly, raced towards rear on the outside, 4 lengths or so back on turn, one-paced in straight.
Bumped start and unbalanced, unable to slot in early, taken back to race at rear on the outside, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, finished off evenly.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, similar position on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually final 250M.
Away well, raced prominently but 4 wide, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.
Moderately away, raced prominently, 3 wide, same position on turn, bumped early in straight, weakened thereafter, eased final 150M.
Began only fairly, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, unable to obtain clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, finished off very strongly to score by a head.

Moderately away from a wide draw, raced prominently on the outside, slightly taken back 1100M, 1-2Ls back on turn, showed good response in straight, hit the front near 125M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner close home.
Taken back from gate 13, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, 5 lengths back on turn, no clear running early in straight, cleared 200M, finished off strongly to take a place.
Jumped well from the widest draw, raced in midfield on the outside, very wide turning in, closed off well to make frame without threatening.
Began smartly, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, steadied off heels near 850M, same margin back on turn, no daylight early in straight, cleared 300M, made some progress thereafter.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced at rear on the outside, 7 lengths back turning in, made reasonable progress in straight.
Average to begin, raced in midfield on the inside, 3 lengths back, saved ground on turn, made some progress early in straight, peaked on run 200M, ran on evenly to the line.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, led by 2 lengths on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 125M, weakened final 50M.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, unable to obtain clear running until near 100M, made some progress thereafter.
Began awkwardly and bumped, raced 2 wide behind midfield, there to turn, bumped early in straight, finished off evenly.
Moderately away from gate 1, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground throughout, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly, eased final 50M.
Bumped start, raced slightly better than midfield on the outside, similar position on turn, bumped 350M, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Average to begin, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Out in line, raced in 2nd, 2 wide turning, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M, eased final 100M. (Irregular heart rhythm.)

Crowded out start, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 3 wide turning in, finished off strongly to score.
Clean jump, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, angled out after passing 400M, finished off strongly to take 2nd, just beaten by a narrow margin.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move after passing 450M, made good progress in straight to take a place.

Jumped well, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross near 750M, 2 wide thereafter, hard ridden after passing 400M, took the lead 300M, kept on well but unable to hold off the first few final 50M.
Shifted out at start and made contact, raced in midfield on the outside, no cover for the majority of the race, moved closer on turn, kept on well early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Bumped start, raced in midfield on the inside, 2 wide from 400M, finished off evenly.
Bumped start, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, made little progress in straight.
Bumped start, raced towards rear on the outside, very wide turning in, finished off evenly.
Inconvenienced at start, raced at rear on the inside, 2 wide on turn, finished off evenly.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide at rear, 3 wide on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Moderately away from gate 1, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Made contact at start, sent forward to take the lead, found rail near 750M, challenged turning in, peaked and headed early in straight, weakened final furlong. (Lost left front plate near 1000M.)
Eased at start, on heels early, sat 2 wide, moved forward 1000M, dashed well 300M to score.
Pushed forward, sat outside the leader, closed off strongly for 2nd.
Midfield, 2 wide, made early move 800m, ran on well for 3rd.
Pushed to hold the rail in midfield, on heels 250M, closed off well 200M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 2 wide, lack room 4-2, dash well.
Eased at start, trapped 3 wide, dashed well 250M.
Slow away, took rail, behind midfield, little dash 200M.
Eased back, 2-3 wide, little dash 200M.
Pressed forward, 2-3 wide, weakened 200M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Slow away, hard ridden to keep up with the field, no progress.
Took rail and lead, under pressure 700M out of fuel 500M.
Rolled forward, sat 2 wide, made early move 800M in 4 wide, on heels 700M, emptied 500M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, showed strong dash in the last 100M to win by a head.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, lay out when placed under pressure from 200M until the end of the race.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, swung wide on Straightening, battled on to the line for 3rd.
Sat one-out one-back, ran on well for 4th.
Sent forward and raced next to leader, 2 wide, kept on going but headed in the last 50M.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, made minor ground only.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, only one paced.
At rear, 2 wide initially, 3 wide no cover after 600M, swung wide on Straightening, pretty one paced.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, weakened after passing 150M.
Slowed to begin and at rear, along the rail after 1000M, showed nothing in the Straight.
At rear, made no impression. (bled)
Raced behind the leader, along the rail, checked at 200M and then weakened thereafter.

Missed the start by 1L before making some ground & settling worse than midfield along rail. Moved closer approaching the corner, moved off rail on straightening before making continual ground to strike lead in final strides.

Pushed forward, raced outside leader before being crossed & getting cover in 1,1 near 600m. Dashed well near 200m, assumed lead at 175m, continued in lead until headed in final few strides. Narrowly beaten, clear of third.
Raced in midfield between runners throughout. Just under 3L from the lead on straightening before finishing off steadily to steal third place in final stride. Better than before.
Had a soft run in midfield on the rail throughout. Cornered only 1.5L from the lead but failed to challenge despite soft run & was caught for third in final few strides.
Drifted back from outside gate & raced near the tail when 3 wide with cover. Continued back & wide entering last section when 4L behind before making up some late ground down the outside to midfield.
Won the early speed battle to lead. Headed in the lead soon after straightening, battled away & was still close at 150m before giving a few lengths late.

Raced prominent but was left three wide no cover outside lead before improving & crossing to be 2 wide outside the leader from the 600m. Dashed to lead soon after straightening, joined at 175m, weakened late.

Steadied & raced near the rear between runners throughout. Continued rearward entering last section when just over 4L from the lead before failing to make any headway into that margin in the dash to line.

Raced three wide in midfield where he had some cover before being left without cover from the 600m. Just over 2L from the lead entering last section, cornered wide before weakening in last furlong after wide passage.
Drifted back after the start & raced a clear last. Continued at the rear, 5L behind on straightening, stayed along rail in straight but failed to improve & was last.
Slowly away, raced behind midfield on the inside, 2 wide after passing 800M, angled out 350M, finished off very strongly to score.
Bumped start, raced in midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off strongly to take 2nd.

Shifted in at start and bumped, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 3 wide after entering the back straight, commenced move 500M, very wide turning in, hit the front 100M, peaked and headed 50M, ran on evenly thereafter.
Bumped start, sat right behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, showed good response early in straight, no extra final 50M.
Away well, sent forward to take the lead, led by 1/2L on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed near 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 5 lengths back on turn, no clear run in straight, eased final 50M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 3 wide on turn, showed some response early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, commenced move 400M, very wide into straight, finished off evenly. (See Racing Incidents.)
Hampered start, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 100M, eased close home.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced towards rear on the outside, very wide into straight, made no progress in the run home.
Bumped start, raced better than midfield on the inside, 2 wide after passing 800M, 1 to 2 lengths back on turn, showed some response early in straight, blocked approaching 100M, eased thereafter.
Made contact at start, raced prominently, 2 wide, 1/2L back on turn, weakened early in straight.
Raced at the tail, on rail, unleashed smart effort home from 200M, caught leader late to win by 1/2L.
Easy into the lead, on rail, kept on going until caught by winner about 25M out, settled for 2nd.
Positive out of the barriers, sat in front of midfield, wide with cover, ran on nicely to take 3rd but was no match to first two.
Took back, settled towards the rear, 2 wide, saved ground and hit the line nicely.
Sent forward, prominent but wide, continued one paced home after enduring a tough trip.
Jumped well, settled outside lead, no strength to fight out final 100M.
Showed early pace, slotted in to find cover in midfield, ran on without threatening.
Urged along, settled one-out one-back, no dash and lost ground from 200M out. (Roarer)
Travelled in midfield, 2 wide, never found daylight in the straight, not fully tested.
Eased, settled in behind midfield, wide but with cover, never threaten.
Urged forward, sat in box-seat, about 1-1/2L off, weakened passing 200M.
Slow out, recovered in behind midfield, on rail, lost ground after being crowded at 150M.
Settled just over 3L off the pace in 5th, commenced move at the 400 metres and carried wide into straight, hit the front narrowly under pressure 150 metres out.
Broke well, settled just off the pace outside the leader, hit the front shortly after straightening but headed 150 metres out.
Taken back to last few on the rail, commenced move at the 400 metres and saved ground turning in, ran on under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Settled worse than midfield in 8th, became 7th rounding home bend, fought on steadily under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Settled one-out-one-back in 3rd, drifted out entering home straight, made steady progress without threatening.
Made running until headed early in straight, faded under pressure.
Travelled keenly at times at the back, trailed the field into straight, ran on under pressure but forced to steady close to home.
Travelled 3-wide without cover in rear of midfield, came under pressure when widest into straight, ran on down the centre of the track to be nearest at finish.
Restrained to last few, came under pressure entering straight, kept on steadily without quickening.
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, settled in midfield in 6th on the rail, came under pressure rounding home bend, making modest headway when checked over 70 metres out.
Taken back from the widest gate, switched 3-wide passing the 850 metres, went wider into straight, no further impression.
Settled some 2.5L back on the rail, became 3rd while coming under pressure on home bend, saved ground entering straight, soon weakened.
Settled down in midfield, wide no cover from 700M, came with a sustained run in the straight, got up near line.
Had uncontested lead, continued on well in the straight, caught by winner dying strides.
Chased the pace, fought on well in the straight, just held by first 2 at the line.
From draw 1 settled along the fence ahead of midfield, chased on steadily turning home, held by leaders final 150M.
Reserved behind mid-division, swung wide for home, closed off well final 300M to be 5th beaten only 0.8L.
From wide draw dropped back to race at the rear, swung wide into straight, stayed on moderately to be beaten not far in a blanket finish.
Began only fairly from a wide draw, soon shifted across behind runners to settle behind midfield, responded mildly over final 300M, comfortably held by leaders.
In mid-division, driven out 400M, kept on moderately, always held by leaders.
Never far off from leaders, lay in early straight, kept on same pace from 300M, never able to challenge.
Went forward chasing leaders, caught wide no cover until 700M, came under pressure nearing 400M, soon gave ground on straightening.
Fractious in stall, began very awkwardly and lost ground, gradually got back to the rear of the field, failed to run on in the straight. Never involved.
Settled towards the rear, pushed along 450M but found nothing in the run home.

Taken back from gate 11, raced towards rear on the outside, 4 lengths or so back, very wide turning in, finished off very strongly to score, impressive debut.
Away with them, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, shared lead on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, ran on evenly to the line.
Taken back from the widest gate, raced at rear on the outside, 5 lengths or so back, very wide into straight, made good progress in straight to take a place, nearest on line.
Moderately away, raced 2 wide better than midfield, inconvenienced near 850M, found rail near 750M, angled out 450M, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Crowded out start, raced behind midfield on the inside, inconvenienced near 800M, saved ground on turn, showed good response early in straight, no clear run final 100M.
Shifted out at start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider turning in, made minor progress in straight.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, shared the lead with rival on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened final 100M.
Slowly away, raced at rear on the inside, angled out 500M, no clear running early in straight, cleared 150M, showed limited response thereafter.
Moderately away, raced 3 wide in midfield, very wide into straight, showed limited response in the run home.
Moderately away from gate 1, raced in midfield on the inside, inconvenienced near 850M, 2 wide turning in, no clear run in straight, eased final 100M.
Shifted in at start, raced 3 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final furlong. (Blood in trachea.) (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped well, raced in midfield on the outside, moved closer on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Box seat, lack room 4-2, closed off strongly to score.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, 3 wide, unleashed strong finishing efforts 300M.
Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, checked 700M, ran on well for 3rd.
Hard ridden forward, sat outside the leader, ran on fairly in straight.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, weakened 200M.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 3 wide, raced flat in straight.
Eased back, took rail, checked 700M, blocked most straight, dashed well.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, 3 wide, blocked most straight, little dash.
Eased back, 2 wide, little dash 200M.
Hard ridden early, behind midfield, 3 wide, lack room 400M, ran on fairly, was found to be a "roarer" which had previously been reported.
Eased back, trapped 4 wide, bumped 400M, no progress.
Eased at start, trapped 4 wide, never improved.
Sent forward and raced behind the leader, along the rail, kept on going to score rather comfortably by 1-3/4L.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, kept on going but headed in the last 200M.
At one-out one-back, kept rolling and closed off well.
Raced prominently, 2 wide, stayed on well to the line.
At rear, 2 wide, bumped with a runner on a number of occasions near 600M, made minor ground in the Straight.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, pretty one paced.
Raced in front of midfield, along the rail, saved ground but weakened in the last 150M.
At rear, 2 wide, swung wide on Straightening, made minor ground in the Straight.
At rear, 3 wide no cover, one paced only in the Straight.
Taken back, 2 wide, not competitive in the Straight.
At rear, along the rail, no progress.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, nothing in the Straight.
At rear, along the rail, bumped with a runner on a number of occasions near 600M, did not feature.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, lost ground in the Straight.

Obtained good position in midfield away from the rail throughout. Shifted wider passing the 500m, straightened 4L from the lead before making continual ground to strike lead inside final 50m & win strongly.
Raced in midfield along rail throughout. Straightened about 3L from lead before closing off steadily all the way to line to share second, beaten under a length.

Drifted back after the start & raced third last when three wide with cover. Shifted wider from the 500m, was the widest runner on straightening when 6L behind before making significant late ground to share second on line.
Raced wide early after beginning from outside gat ebefore being used up to improve position & assume lead near the 700m. Continued in lead until over-run in the final 50m. Not beaten far.
Raced in midfield, three wide with cover throughout. Entered last section about 5.5L behind before making up steady late ground to be beaten only 2.5L.

Slow to begin & consequently raced at the tail throughout. Continued at the tail on straightening when a long way behind before passing a few tiring rivals to finish midfield but was never likely (Blood in trachea post-race).

Showed speed after start to lead before being headed near the 700m & racing second along the rail thereafter. Under 1L from the lead on straightening but weakened out in last furlong & was beaten just under 6L.

Slow to muster speed after the start & consequently raced just worse than midfield along the rail. Entered last section 5L from the lead before failing to make any headway in the straight & being beaten 6L on the line.

Began awkwardly before racing prominently in early stages before being forth in the clear in middle stages. Was hard ridden before straightening when about 3.5L behind before weakening out in final 250m to be well beaten.
Outpaced after the start & raced a clear second last throughout. Steadied approaching bend, stayed close to rail in straight but failed to improve & was beaten 11 lengths.

Hard ridden after the start to improve position & momentarily raced second before racing third away from rail from 700m. Emptied out soon after straightening & weakened out quickly in final 250m to be long second last.
Had no early speed & raced worse than midfield between runners throughout. Was hard ridden prior to cornering when over 7L behind before weakening poorly in the straight to be long last.
Out with rest, raced in midfield on the outside, a bit closer on turn, hard ridden after passing 350M, finished off strongly to score.
Moderately away, raced in midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, cleared 250M, finished off very strongly, nearest on line. (Lame left hind leg next day morning.)
Shifted out at start, raced 3 wide better than midfield, moved closer on turn, kept on well in straight to take a place.
Moderately away, raced prominently, found rail near 900M, took the lead 700M, challenged by rivals early in straight, kept on well to 50M, headed close home.
Jumped well from gate 12, raced prominently on the outside, 2 wide turning, challenged the leader early in straight, kept on well to 50M, no extra thereafter. (See Racing Incidents.)
Made contact at start, positioned a length behind the leader, 2 wide on turn, kept on evenly in straight.
Crowded on jumping, raced at tail, 6 lengths or so back on turn, very wide into straight, closed off well without threatening.
Slowly away, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Jumped with them, positioned a length behind the leader on the inside, saved ground on turn, kept on evenly early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide towards rear, 4 lengths back, angled out 500M, showed some response early in straight, blocked near 250M, cleared 150M, one-paced thereafter.
Slightly slow out and made contact, took the early lead, slightly taken back 1150M, positioned 2 wide in midfield on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Crowded on jumping, raced behind midfield on the outside, commenced move 550M, very wide turning in, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly, eased final 50M.
Jumped well from the widest draw, taken back to race 3 wide with cover at rear, very wide turning in, failed to close off in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at rear on the outside, very wide into straight, failed to make any progress in the run home.
Niggled along, took position front of midfield, wide no cover, ran on gamely, caught 2nd placegetter late to win by a short-head.
Settled to race in box-seat, fought on till the end, only to be beaten by winner late.
Took back, in worse than midfield, wide but with cover, closed off well to take 3rd.
Took back, raced at the tail, 2 wide, switched widest, made ground and closed off fairly.
Shifted across to race in midfield, 2 wide, con-tinued on without threatening.
Bumped start, sat just behind midfield, on rail, was one paced in the straight.
Raced towards the rear, 2-3 wide, made minor ground only.
Began only fairly, sat towards the rear, on rail before angling out after 550M, did not threaten
Jumped well, slotted in front of midfield, 2 wide, did not close off. (See Incident Report)
Sent forward, sat outside lead, faded gradually from approaching 250M.
Bumped start, settled just in front of midfield, on rail, no turn of foot.
Worked forward, on rail and led, gradually weakened from 300M.
Began well from the widest gate, gradually settled 3-wide with cover in midfield about 4L off the pace, switched wider turning in, ran on under pressure to assert authority close to home.

Jumped fairly, gradually improved to just behind race leaders on the rail, one back in 3rd coming onto home bend, soon came to challenge after straightening holding every chance but able to peg back the winner throughout.

Niggled at early, settled 2-wide in 6th just behind the leaders, dropped slightly further back coming onto home bend, was 7th some 3L back turning for home, finished off the race well inside final 150 metres.
Began quickly, took up running after the first 200 metres setting a regular pace, came under pressure to hold place after straightening only to be caught nearing the finish.
Moderate start, improved steadily to midfield and further closer to 6th within 3L of pace onto home bend, sustained progress under pressure after straightening but never threatening.
Settled well back from a wide gate, one of the wide runners into home straight, ran on well down the centre of the track inside final 300 metres, did best work late.
Settled towards the rear, saved ground near the rail most of the way, did not find much room early in straight, finished off the race well inside final 100 metres.
Broke well but soon taken back to last few, 3-wide rounding home end and slightly wider into straight, kept on well to the line.
Crowded at start, gradually improved to prominent position while travelling 3-wide without cover, slightly further back on home bend before going wider into straight, found nothing 200 metres out.
Began well but taken back for cover towards the rear, dropped further back to last few into home straight, soon came under pressure and only ran past a couple of beaten horses.
Ridden to be up amongst the leaders, shifted one-out-one-back in 4th coming onto home bend, switched out to challenge on straightening, soon dropped out. (Tactic questioned)
Began well from a wide gate, travelled wide without cover up with the pace, obtained position outside the leader coming onto home bend, gradually weakened under pressure after straightening.
Soon taken back to last few, came under pressure rounding home bend, failed to make any impression dropping to last into straight.
Began awkwardly, moved up to obtain a midfield position along the fence, found clear run on inside passing 300M, responded strongly to lead 80M from home, held on well late stages.
Began only fairly, recovered to race behind mid-division on inside, shifted out a number of horses for clear running in straight, closed off well final 200M, just held.
Tracked leaders along the fence, had no clear run early straight, stayed on well final 300M, not finishing pace of first 2 late stages.
Held up towards the rear, 4Ls to make up leaving the bend, ran on mildly down outside, got up for 4th close home.
Strolled forward from wide draw, pressed leader from 900M, established narrow lead from 350M, headed inside 100M, lost several places late stages.
Dropped back to race near the rear, 4Ls to make up top of straight, stayed on without troubling leaders.
Soon led, pressed by rival from 900M, fought on well turning home, weakened passing 150M. (Jockey : didn't feel comfortable in its action over the latter stages.)
Held up 3-wide in midfield, driven along nearing 500M, responded well initially, run peaked 200M, no extra late stages. (Jockey : not able to detect any reason for the disappointing performance.)
Settled ahead of midfield, responded fairly from top of straight, flattened over final 200M.
Settled in midfield, disappointed for running near 400M then badly held up until 150M, no clear run again late.
Chased leaders 2-wide, not quickened when asked on straightening, outpaced from 300M.
Unable to slot in from wide draw, raced behind midfield, 4-wide no cover entering the turn, struggled from 500M, soon beaten.
Chased leaders, wide no cover from 900M, fought on to mid-straight, weakened over final 200M.
Steadied early stages to obtain cover, ended up as the back-marker, failed to make any progress on straightening, never in the picture.
Crowded start, raced 2 wide in midfield, 4 lengths or so back, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to score.
Shifted in at start and made contact, raced towards rear on the outside, 6 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, made very good progress in straight to take 2nd.
Began smartly from gate 1, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 50M, weakened thereafter.
Began well from a wide draw, positioned 2 wide better than midfield, similar position on turn, finished off well to make frame without threatening.
Away with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, wider from 600M, made good progress early in straight, no extra final 50M.
Bounded in the air on jumping and lost ground, raced 2 wide at rear, similar position on turn, made some progress in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Made contact at start, raced prominently, 2 wide, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Bumped start, raced slightly behind midfield on the inside, 4 lengths back, same position on turn, finished off evenly.

Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the inside, 6 to 7 lengths back, saved ground on turn, made some progress early in straight, not enough room 150M, cleared 100M, one-paced thereafter.
Began awkwardly and bumped, sat right behind the leader on the inside, angled out after passing 600M, showed some response early in straight, peaked 250M, weakened gradually final 150M.
Taken back from gate 9, raced at rear on the outside, 7 to 8 lengths back, same margin back on turn, failed to close off in straight.
Jumped well from a wide draw, raced prominently, 3 wide, there to turn, peaked early in straight, weakened and eased final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began smartly, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably throughout, kept on very well in straight, easily scored.
Commenced well, positioned a length behind the leader on rail, enjoyed the easy run to turn, kept on well in straight to take 2nd, no threat to the winner.
Began well, raced in midfield on the inside, 2 to 3 lengths back on turn, closed off well to take a place, nearest on line.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the outside, 5 to 6 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, finished off strongly to make frame, nearest on line. (See Racing Incidents.)
Jumped with them, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, there to turn, peaked early in straight, kept on evenly to the line.
Moderately away, raced slightly better than midfield on the outside, 2 lengths or so back on turn, peaked early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Crowded start, raced at tail, 6 to 7 lengths back on turn, made some progress in straight.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide slightly behind midfield, 3 to 4 lengths back on turn, one-paced in straight.
Crowded start, raced behind midfield on the outside, 5 lengths back on turn, showed limited response early in straight, inconvenienced 200M, made no progress thereafter.
Moderately away, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, wider from 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened inside final furlong. (Lost left front plate near 1200M.)
Average to begin, raced 2 wide towards rear, 4 to 5 lengths back on turn, not enough room early in straight, cleared 300M, inconvenienced near 200M, made no progress thereafter.
Began only fairly, raced towards rear on the inside, 6 lengths back turning in, made no progress in straight.
Average to begin, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed no response early in straight, eased final 150M. (Roarer.)
Shifted out on jumping and bumped, trapped wide with no cover, slightly better than midfield, peaked turning in, weakened early in straight.

Away well, raced 2 wide, a length or so back, found rail after entering the back straight, saved ground on turn, finished off strongly to score.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, led by a length on turn, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the winner late.
Jumped with them, raced 2 wide better than midfield, angled out after passing 500M, very wide into straight, finished off well to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Lifted right hind leg on jumping, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, closed off well to make frame.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 lengths back, closer in the middle stages, blocked early in straight, made some progress thereafter, no threat to the first few.

Taken back from gate 9, raced 2 wide behind midfield, difficult to settle near 800M, moved closer on turn, very wide into straight, showed some response early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Average to begin, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on the outside, same margin back on turn, bumped 300M, weakened gradually final furlong.
Out with rest, positioned on rail behind midfield, saved ground on turn, made no progress in straight. (Roarer.)
Clean jump, positioned 4 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened and eased final 150M.
Shifted out at start and made contact, sent forward to race prominently on the outside, 2nd on turn, peaked 400M, bumped early in straight, weakened thereafter.
Began awkwardly, raced at rear, 6 to 7 lengths back, similar position on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail throughout, never competitive.
Hard ridden forward to sit outside the leader, closed off strongly 300M to score.
Pushed to take rail and lead, overhauled 300M.
Eased back, 2 wide, lack room 300M, dashed well 200M.
Bumped start, hard ridden forward, 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Checked start, took rail at back, lack room 300M, dashed well when clear.
Behind midfield, 2 wide, little dash 200M.
Box seat, emptied 250M.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, lack dash in straight, substantial blood in horse's trachea after racing.
Trapped 3 wide throughout, weakened 150M.
Eased back, took rail, never improved.
Eased at start, trapped 3 wide at rear, no dash, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, 2 wide, no progress.
Raced in midfield, 3 wide but with cover, swung widest on Straightening, showed strong dash and won by a length.
At rear, 2 wide until 500M, saved ground and showed strong dash in the last 50M.
At rear, 3 wide but with cover, swung wide on Straightening and close off strongly to the line in the last 50M.
At rear, along the rail after 600M, only showed strong dash in the last 50M.
Raced behind leader after 600M, along the rail, stayed on but only one paced in the Straight.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail after 600M, weakened in the last 50M.
Raced in front midfield, wide no cover, pretty one paced.
Rolled forward, 2 wide after 600M, remained one paced to the line. (See incident report)
Slow to begin and at rear, along the rail, saved ground but only one paced.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, did not feature.
Sent forward and at one-out one-back after 600M, lost ground in the Straight and did not threaten.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, nothing in the straight.
Had nice run on leaders back throughout. Moved over heels & into clear running on straightening before finishing strongly to dash to lead passing the 100m mark before continuing on to win strongly.

Raced prominently after start before drifting back to settle ahead of midfield. Moved wider at 800m, improved to share lead near 700m, moved to outright lead near 175m before overtaken by winner inside final 100m.
Pushed forward to lead. Challenged from the 700m but continued to hold narrow lead until headed near the 175m & being over-run late. Held third.
Drifted back to race 4th last on rail. Was 4.5L behind entering last section before closing off steadily in late stages from the rear but was too far back to be a winning chance.
Raced second last for the majority. Was 7L from the lead passing the 400m mark before staying along the rail in the straight & making up a length or two to midfield late.
Raced in midfield along the rail throughout. Cornered just under 4L from the lead but made no headway in straight & was beaten a similar margin on the line.
Taken back & raced at the tail throughout. Straightened about 7L form the lead, stayed close to the inside in straight before making a few lengths when running onto non-threatening midfield finish.
Raced prominently before being crossed & racing 1,1 from the 1200m. Was shuffled a pair further back from the 700m, entered last section 3L behind before weakening a further length in straight.

Raced a touch wide early before getting good position in midfield away from the rail from the 1400m. Moved wider to improve near the 500m, cornered the widest when about 4L behind before weakening to be beaten about 6L.

Drifted back & raced worse than midfield away from the rail in early & middle stages. Relegated to second last near 650m, was 7L from the lead on straightening before weakening poorly to be long second last.

Raced very wide without cover in midfield early before improving position to eventually get outside the leader near 1200m. Came under heavy pressure at 700m & weakened to be long last after working far too hard in first half.
Began awkwardly, raced 2 wide in midfield, commenced move 450M, finished off strongly to score.
Average to begin, positioned 5 lengths behind the leader on rail, 2 wide from 450M, unable to obtain clear running until 100M, finished off strongly to take 2nd.

Made contact shortly after start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled comfortably to turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 50M, missed 2nd close home. (Lost right hind plate on jumping.)
Away well, positioned 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, similar position on turn, kept on well in straight to make frame.
Clean jump, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on the inside, saved ground throughout, kept on well in straight without threatening.
Began well from gate 1, positioned on rail in midfield, saved ground to turn, kept on well early in straight, no extra final 50M, crowded close home.
Taken back from gate 11, raced towards rear on the outside, 6 lengths back on turn, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home without threatening.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced towards rear on the inside, angled out 500M, made some headway in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail early, 8 to 9 lengths back, moved a bit closer in the middle stages, very wide into straight, made minor progress in the run home.
Crowded start, raced 2 wide behind midfield, wider from 600M, very wide turning in, showed limited response early in straight, ran on evenly to the line.
Shifted out at start and bumped, raced 2 wide at rear early, found rail near 950M, saved ground on turn, showed some response in straight, eased inside final 50M.
Crowded start, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, there to turn, peaked early in straight, one-paced thereafter.
Settled to race in box-seat, showed nice kick from passing 200M, ran on smartly to win by a head.
Travelled just in front of midfield, along the rail, an-gled centre track on turn exit, drifted ground, contin-ued on well to take 2nd nonetheless.
Sent forward, took rail and led prior to 850M, emptied and headed passing 150M.
Crowded at start, settled in worse than midfield, on rail, continued on fairly to the finish.
Jumped well, shifted across to race in behind mid-field, 2 wide, improved steadily to the line.
Hard ridden early, then eased to be just behind mid-field, wide but with cover, ran on one paced.
Bumped start, hard ridden to be just front of midfield, 2 wide, was one paced.
Took back, raced at the rear, 2 wide, swung wide, never threaten.
Bumped start, niggled along and sat one-out one-back, keen throughout, did not close off. (See Incident Re-port)
Lost ground after start, remained at the tail, 2 wide, showed nothing significant in the straight.
Hampered after the start, forward and shifted across to sit outside lead at 700M, weakened approaching 200M.
Sent forward, only to be in front of midfield, wide and no cover from 700M, no response and eased down at 200M.
Settled just off the pace on the rail, stuck to the rail turning for home, hit the front inside the 100 metres, pushed out.

Ridden to be up with the pace early, gradually taken one back to 3rd, drifted slightly further back to 5th passing the 600 metres, switched wide for a run turning in, fought on steadily but drifted under pressure.

Jumped awkwardly losing considerable ground, quickly recovered to midfield some 3L back before the 1000-metre bend, edged closer along the rail to joint 5th turning for home, fought on steadily without threatening.

Pressed forward from a wide gate to share the pace early, gradually shifted back to 1L off the pace over 600 metres out, renewed effort on straightening hitting the front momentarily 200 metres out, soon found no extra.
Led or disputed lead on the rail, kicked half a length clear passing the 700 metre and 1L clear on the bend, unable to sustain effort after straightening and headed inside the 200 metres.
Gradually dropped to last few, saved ground on the rail making home bend, fought on under pressure to produce late impression close to home.
Settled in rear from a wide gate, travelled 3-wide with cover in back straight, switched widest for a run entering straight, fought on steadily in the centre of the track but without threatening.

Broke well from a wide gate but soon shifted back to 5th some 2.5L back while 3-wide without cover, gained steadily closer from the 800 metres to be one of the first few entering home straight, soon weakened.
Settled in last few from a wide gate, one from last turning for home, kept on steadily under pressure without threatening.
Ridden along early but soon dropped towards midfield in 6th nearly 3L off the pace, lost position coming onto home bend and made no impression in the run to the line.
Began from the widest gate, travelled 3-wide in midfield with cover to the straight, ran home one-paced.
Soon dropped well behind and never seen with a chance.
Soon led, set even pace to straight, challenged by rival from 250M, found the necessary to hold on. (Abrasion RH Leg.)
Chased leaders, shifted out 300M to obtain clear running, continued on well to press winner all the way to the line, just held.
Sent forward, chased leader on outside, fought on steadily turning home, always held by first two 150M.
Unable to slot in from draw 6, caught wide for most of the way, stayed on moderately in the straight, just missed 3rd.
Jumped on terms, caught wide no cover after 600M, move up to chase leaders home turn, fought on to 150M, no extra late.
Soon taken across to the fence, settled down midfield, kept on same pace early straight, faded final 150M.
Slow to begin, towards the rear always, gave limited response on straightening, never dangerous.
In midfield early stages, lost ground 900M shuffled back to the rear, made no impression on straightening.
Never far off from leaders, couldn't go on from 300M, weakened towards the finish.
From wide draw taken across behind runners, settled near last, failed to run on passing 400M. Never in the picture.
Away well, raced in 2nd, 2 wide, same position on turn, showed very good response in straight, hit the front 100M, kept on very well to the line and scored.
Made contact at start and unbalanced, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2 lengths or so back on turn, finished off well to take 2nd.
Taken back from gate 9, raced 2 wide towards rear, 4 lengths or so back, same margin back on turn, angled out 350M, finished off very strongly to take a place, nearest on line.
Began only fairly, raced 2 wide, 3 lengths or so back, there to turn, angled out early in straight, made good progress thereafter to make frame.
Crowded on jumping, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, made good progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, led by 1/2L on turn, kept on well early in straight, peaked and headed 100M, weakened gradually thereafter.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, made some progress early in straight, no extra final 100M.
Began smartly from gate 1, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground throughout, kept on well early in straight, inconvenienced near 100M, weakened thereafter.
Taken back from gate 11, raced 3 wide with cover at rear, commenced move 400M, very wide into straight, showed some response early in straight, no extra final 150M. (See Racing Incidents.)
Commenced well, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, angled out 350M, made no impression in straight.
Average to begin, unable to slot in, trapped very wide at rear, 5 lengths or so back, no cover throughout, peaked early in straight, weakened and eased final furlong.
Made contact at start and unbalanced, raced 3 wide with no cover, slightly better than midfield, similar position on turn, weakened early in straight when hard run took effect.
