Average to begin, raced 2 to 3 wide slightly behind midfield, there to turn, no daylight early in straight, cleared 200M, finished off strongly to score.

Away with them, raced 2 wide in midfield, inconvenienced 700M, angled out after passing 500M, showed good response in straight, hit the front 50M, kept on well but unable to hold off the winner close home. (Lost left hind plate.)
Out in line, raced 2 wide behind midfield, angled out 500M, no clear running early in straight, cleared approaching 200M, finished off strongly to take a place, nearest on line.

Average to begin, raced in midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, angled out early in straight, found daylight 300M, showed very good response, hit the front 150M, peaked and headed 50M, missed 3rd on line.
Moderately away from gate 1, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, took the lead 300M, peaked and headed 150M, ran on evenly to the line.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced at tail, 9 lengths back, closer on turn, very wide into straight, finished off well without threatening.
Began awkwardly, raced slightly behind midfield on the outside, no cover for the majority of the race, 3 lengths or so back turning in, made minor progress in straight.
Average to begin, raced towards rear on the outside, commenced move 550M, very wide into straight, showed limited response in the run home.
Jumped with them, raced prominently on the inside, allowed rival to cross 1000M, 2 wide from 750M, wider turning in, showed some response early in straight, peaked 150M, weakened thereafter.
Reared leaving stalls and started very slowly, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed some response early in straight, peaked 100M, weakened thereafter.
Away well, raced prominently on the outside, difficult to settle in the early stages, 2nd on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 150M.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, peaked and headed 300M, weakened final furlong.
Began smartly, raced 2 wide better than midfield, carried wider after passing 750M, 2 to 3 lengths back turning in, peaked early in straight, weakened final 300M.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, 3-5 wide, unleashed strong finishing efforts 300M.
Hard ridden to sit in front of midfield, 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 300M.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, hung on until 100M overhauled.
At rear, 2-5 wide, dashed well 250M.
Eased back, 2-4 wide, lack room 400M, progressed steadily when clear.
Pushed to hold the rail in front of midfield, lack room 4-2, just held ground when clear.
Hard ridden early, midfield along the fence, blocked most straight, made ground when clear.
Eased back, 3-5 wide, made ground 200M.
At back, 2-4 wide, never improved, was reported to have bled after racing.
Eased to sit outside the leader, weakened 250M.
Pushed early, sat in front of midfield, 2 wide, no progress.
Slow away, at back, blocked most straight, ran on ok.
Slow away, at rear, lack room in straight, no progress, was reported to have bled after racing.
Pushed forward, trapped 3 wide, emptied 250M.
Slow to begin and raced in midfield, 2 wide after 1500M, showed strong dash in the last 150M and won by 1/2L.
Sent forward and took lead, along the rail, weakened in the last 100M, headed in the last 50M and beaten by 1/2L.
At rear, along the rail after 1400M, swung wide on Straightening, made significant ground and finished off well.
Raced in midfield, along the rail, made ground steadily to the line.
Rolled forward, along the rail, only showed some dash in the Straight.
Sent forward, 2 wide, emptied after passing 150M.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, pretty one paced.
At rear, 2 wide, only one paced in the Straight.
Settled behind midfield, along the rail, nothing in the Straight.
Soon led, kicked on strongly when asked 350M and went 2-3Ls clear, maintained that advantage to line and was never challenged.
Steadied to obtain cover, settled down behind midfield, switched wide passing 600M, driven to go 2nd near 250M, tried hard but couldn't get close to winner over final 200M.
Taken across behind runners early stages, held up at the rear 6-7Ls off pacesetter, wide into straight, closed off soundly from off the pace to go 3rd late stages.
Always in touch, 3rd at 400M, kept on steadily in the run home but not going the pace to challenge.
Went forward, proved very difficult to settle when steadied for cover 1000M, tracked leader going into straight, fought on one paced to the line.
Began well, restrained to sit in midfield, wide no cover from 800M, kept on mildly turning for home, not pace to challenge leaders.
Held up in mid-division, fought on one paced over final 400M, never threatened.
Chased leader, not quickened when asked turning in, gradually outpaced by rivals over final 200M.
From wide draw shifted across behind runners, settled at rear, gave limited response on straightening, not reached contention.
Unable to slot in on jumping from draw 13, no closer than 4-wide throughout, not quickened on straightening, no impression on leaders from 250M.
Began awkwardly and lost ground, settled towards the rear, ran on fairly on straightening, never dangerous.
Failed to muster speed despite ridden along, obtained an inside spot behind mid-division, couldn't go on final 400M.
In midfield, couldn't pick up 400M, never involved.
Dropped back to race at the back of the field, went very wide from 600M, couldn't go on in straight.
Slowly away, gradually recovered, positioned a length behind the leader in the middle stages, hard ridden 350M, hit the front 300M, kept on well to the line and scored.
Clean jump, showed no early speed, raced at rear on the stands' side, hard ridden after passing 500M, made very good progress final 400M to take 2nd, nearest on line.
Jumped with them, raced better than midfield, nearer to the middle track, hard ridden 300M, challenged the leader until no extra final 100M, dropped to 3rd close home.
Made contact at start, raced behind midfield, 2 away from the stands' rail, not enough room near 250M, cleared 150M, made some progress thereafter to make frame, no threat to the first few.
Bumped start, raced behind midfield on the stands' side, hard ridden 250M, made some progress thereafter.
Moderately away, positioned a length behind the leader, 3 away from the stands' rail, hard ridden 350M, showed limited response, weakened final 100M.
Jumped well from gate 14, raced prominently on the stands' rail, took the lead approaching 400M, peaked and headed 300M, weakened final furlong.
Jumped well from gate 1, raced in midfield on the middle track, moved a bit closer in the middle stages, hard ridden 450M, showed limited response, peaked 250M, weakened final 200M.
Made contact at start, raced at rear, 5 to 6 lengths back, hard ridden approaching 400M, passed some tired runners in straight.
Quickly into stride, sent forward to take the lead, peaked and headed 400M, weakened final 300M.
Commenced well from gate 12, sent forward to race prominently, peaked 400M, weakened thereafter, hampered near 250M.
Began well, raced better than midfield on the middle track, weakened from 500M, eased final furlong.
Bumped start, raced in midfield on the stands' side, hard ridden 400M, showed limited response, blocked and severely checked near 250M, eased final furlong.
Slowly away, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Raced just in front of midfield, along the rail, dashed home once fully cleared at 200M, won comfortably by 1-1/2L.
Jumped smartly before eased to be about mid-field, wide no cover, very keen throughout, ran on and held off late challenge to take 2nd.
Settled in midfield, along the rail, found day-light at 300M, ran on nicely for 3rd.
Sent forward, took rail and led, kept on until weakened and headed passing 150M.
Awkward start, settled worse than midfield, 2 wide, improved and ran home nicely.
Raced towards the rear, stayed close to the rail, saved ground and closed off to the line.
Eased back, sat towards the rear, 2 wide, awk-ward when being switched to the outside at 400M, closed off fairly well.
Crowded at start, ridden to be front of midfield, 2 wide, one paced only.
Asked to be prominent, took box-seat, in touch until weakened inside final 100M.
Took back, at rear and on rail, always chasing, made minor ground when dashed home late.
Began smartly, then eased to be in midfield, 2 wide, held ground until approaching 150M.
Jumped well, slotted in to be in midfield, 2 wide, did not run on.
Settled one-out one-back, raced keenly, dropped out from passing 300M. (See Incident Report)
Urged forward, sat outside lead, raced keenly, run ended approaching 250M.
Soon taken back to last from the widest gate and waited with, went the widest entering home straight, ran on under pressure down the centre of the track to prevail by a narrow margin.

Well there early and travelled wide throughout, drifted back steadily to be 10th over 4L back coming onto home bend, shifted wider entering home straight and ran on under pressure only to be denied by a small margin.
Disputed lead before taken one back though remaining 2-wide onto home bend, hit the front 500m out kicking 1.5L clear under pressure early in straight, only to be worn down 50m out.
Began well from a low gate settling just off the pace, came to challenge after straightening but failed to quicken to threaten.
Slightly slow out, soon picked up to 7th about 4L back, ridden briefly coming out of back straight and made steady headway on the rail around home bend, kept on steadily from 2.5L 5th into straight.
Prominent from a wide gate early but gradually shifted back to last few, switched wide rounding home bend and wider into straight, produced good late impression inside final 150m.
Travelled one back behind the leaders very wide with cover, shifted 2 back sharing 6th 3 wide without cover coming onto home bend, kept on under pressure until finding no extra inside the 150m.
Broke well from a high draw, held narrow lead off the rail before obtaining rails run at the 1000m, led until headed 500m out, faded in straight.
Moderate start, settled towards the rear, switched wide for a run entering home straight, kept on same pace without quickening.

Slowly away, recovered steadily along the rail, reached 11th some 6L back coming out of back straight and further closer just over 3L off turning for home, baulked for a run early in straight and found no extra inside final 200m.
Settled well behind, snuck up on the rail to about 4L of pace turning in, soon found no extra.
Niggled along and improved to 7th some 3L back, became 8th in similar position rounding home bend, soon weakened after straightening.
Broke well from a wide gate niggling along without cover in first few, gained steadily closer rounding home bend, folded up quickly after straightening. (Blood in trachea)
Prominent to straight, soon weakened.
Obtained a trailing spot behind leaders, drifted away from fence 500M, quickened smartly to lead 300M out, soon drew well clear for a dominant win. Impressive.
Held up in mid-division along the fence, ran on moderately from 400M to go 2nd inside 100M, no impression on the runaway winner.
Given a waiting ride near the rear, crept closer home turn, stayed on to take 3rd close home, no chance with runaway winner.
Chased leaders, not finishing pace of winner from 400M, kept on steadily and stayed in contention for minor placings, just missed 3rd at the finish.
From wide draw dropped back to the rear early stages for cover, proved difficult to settle passing 1100M, ran home fairly over final 400M, not reached contention.
Settled ahead of midfield, had a 3-wide trip and lost cover from 800M, kept on evenly in straight, never going the pace to challenge. (Jockey questioned re riding position.)
Dropped back and taken across behind runners, settled towards the rear 5Ls off leaders, kept on one paced in straight, never dangerous.
Emerged as leader 1250M, pressed by rival from 900M, headed by winner 300M out, fought on to hold 2nd until near 100M, no extra after.
Taken back from wide draw, had a wide trip throughout, stayed on fairly on straightening, never troubled leaders.
Travelled towards the rear, dropped to last at 400M and 6Ls to make up, ran past beaten horses.
Caught wide down the back-straight, moved up to race outside leader from 900M, outpaced from 250M, lost momentum when checked 150M, dropped out.
Raced behind midfield, unable to slot in, caught 4-wide no cover home turn, found very little early straight, no extra final 200M.
Settled down behind midfield, failed to quicken early straight, weakened passing 200M.
Chased leaders early stages, over-raced, shuffled back to midfield home turn, didn't finish off in the straight. (Jockey: travelled too keenly with blinkers in early and middle stages)

Shifted out at start and bumped, raced behind midfield on the stands' side, moved a bit closer in the middle stages, hard ridden from 400M, hit the front approaching 100M, kept on well to the line and scored.

Average to begin, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on the stands' side, a bit closer in the middle stages, hard ridden after passing 450M, took the lead 250M, peaked and headed approaching 100M, ran on evenly to the line.
Jumped well from gate 14, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader on the stands' side, hard ridden from 450M, closed off well to take a place without threatening.
Bumped start and unbalanced, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well in the middle stages, hard ridden 350M, showed limited response, peaked and headed 250M, ran on evenly to the line.
Away with them, positioned 2 lengths behind the leader, nearer to the middle track, hard ridden after passing 450M, closed off well without threatening.
Jumped with them, positioned 1 to 2 lengths behind the leader, 3 away from the stands' rail, kept on evenly final 400M.
Bumped start and unbalanced, raced better than midfield, nearer to the middle track, hard ridden 400M, only showed limited response, weakened gradually inside final 100M.
Moderately away, positioned 4 lengths behind the leader, nearer to the middle track, hard ridden from 400M, finished off evenly.
Began very awkwardly and bumped, positioned a length behind the leader, nearer to the middle track, hard ridden 350M, showed limited response, weakened final 100M.
Began fairly, raced towards rear, 3 away from the stands' rail, one-paced final 400M.
Bumped shortly after start, raced at tail, 5 to 6 lengths back, passed some tired runners final 400M.
Moderately away, in touch in midfield, nearer to the middle track, weakened gradually final 300M.
Away well, raced prominently on the stands' rail, peaked near 400M, weakened gradually final 300M.
Bumped shortly after start, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Shifted out on jumping and made contact, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, moved closer along the rail on turn, finished off strongly to score.
Commenced well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well in the middle stages, led by a length turning in, kept on well in straight but unable to hold off the winner close home.
Moderately away, positioned a length behind the leader, 2 wide, same position on turn, kept on well in straight to take a place, no threat to the first two.
Began well from gate 1, raced prominently on the inside, saved ground on turn, angled out after passing 500M, kept on well early in straight, no extra final 200M.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide at rear early, 3 wide from 800M, angled out after passing 550M, very wide into straight, made good progress in the run home without threatening.
Crowed on jumping, raced at tail, 7 lengths back, same margin back on turn, very wide into straight, made some headway in the run home.
Shifted in at start and made contact, raced towards rear on the inside, saved ground on turn, finished off evenly.
Average to begin, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, travelled keenly after 1200M, wider turning in, finished off evenly.
Began smartly, raced better than midfield on the outside, no cover throughout, similar position on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually final 300M.
Made contact at start, raced 2 wide towards rear, 5 lengths back on turn, failed to close off in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Made contact at start, raced 3 wide slightly better than midfield, dropped towards rear after passing 600M, failed to make any progress in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Moderately away, raced 2 wide in midfield, angled out 700M, 4 wide turning in, weakened early in straight.
Made contact shortly after start, trapped 4 wide, 3 to 4 lengths back, similar position on turn, failed to make any progress in straight.
Inconvenienced shortly after start, raced wide in midfield early, sent forward after passing 1150M, 2nd on turn, weakened from 500M, finished last.

Began well from the widest draw, raced at rear on the outside, 5 to 6 lengths back, very wide into straight, finished off very strongly to score by a neck.
Average to begin, raced 2 wide behind midfield, 4 to 5 lengths back on turn, angled out early in straight, finished off well to take 2nd.
Moderately away from a wide draw, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 2 lengths back on turn, took the lead approaching 250M, kept on well but unable to hold off the first two final 100M.

Average to begin, positioned 4 lengths behind the leader on rail, saved ground on turn, no clear run early in straight, cleared near 250M, pressed leader briefly inside final furlong, no extra final 100M.
Bumped start, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, wider on turn, made some headway in straight.

Shifted in at start, showed no early speed, raced at tail, 8 to 9 lengths back, still 7 lengths behind the leader on turn, very wide into straight, finished off strongly to be nearest on line. (See Racing Incidents.)
Began well, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn, showed limited response early in straight, weakened gradually inside final furlong. (Lost right front plate.)
Began smartly, raced better than midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, no daylight early in straight, cleared 200M but only showed limited response, weakened final 100M.
Jumped well from a wide draw, sent forward to take the lead, 2 wide, led by 1/2L on turn, peaked and headed near 250M, weakened final furlong.
Jumped with them, raced in midfield on the outside, no cover for the majority of the race, weakened early in straight when hard run took effect. (Lost left front plate.)
Shifted out on jumping and bumped, raced at rear on the inside, 6 lengths back, saved ground on turn, made some progress early in straight, blocked near 200M, eased thereafter.
Away well, raced prominently on the inside, 1/2L back on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened final 250M.
Eased back, took rail, progressed steadily 300M to score.
Took lead easily, hung on strongly until 100M overhauled.
Eased back, 2 wide, progressed steadily 250M for 3rd.
Pushed forward, trapped 4 wide early, parked outside the leader in back straight, out of fuel 200M.
Settled just off the leaders, 2 wide, never improved, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Hard ridden to hold the rail just off the leaders, weakened 300M, substantial blood in trachea after racing.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 3 wide, dropped off 500M, post-race vet exam did not show any significant findings.
Sent forward and took lead, kept on going and won impressively by 1-3/4L.
Slow to begin and raced in midfield, along the rail, closed of well to the line for 2nd.
Raced in midfield, wide no cover, made ground and ran on strongly to the line.
Raced in front midfield, 2 wide, only made minor ground in the last 100M.
Raced prominently, 2 wide, weakened in the last 100M.
At rear, along the rail, pretty one paced.
Raced in behind midfield, along the rail, only one paced.
Raced in midfield, 2 wide, made no ground in the Straight.
Raced in behind midfield, 2 wide, swung widest on Straightening, did not feature.
At rear, 2 wide, nothing in the Straight.
Restrained on jumping from wide draw, held up 3-wide behind midfield, wide into straight, finished off well to lead inside 100M, drew away late stages.
In midfield early, pushed wide from 1200M and lost cover after, chased leaders into home turn, led inside 300M, gave ground grudgingly to winner final 100M.
Not hurried, switched off to race at the rear, driven wide into straight, closed off willingly final 300M to secure 3rd place, nearest finish.
Settled down in a midfield spot along the 2-path, urged along 600M, stayed on steadily final 250M.
Reserved in mid-division, kept up the chase on leaders turning home, checked 150M and lost momentum. Would have finished closer.
Held up behind midfield 5Ls off the pace, ran on mildly from 350M, always held by leaders.
Always prominent, pressed leader on outside from 1300M, briefly took over early straight, was out-finished over final 200M.
Settled in mid-division along the 3-path, driven near 500M, ran on well in straight, looked likely to feature in the finish but checked 150M and lost every chance.
Taken across behind runners, settled 6-7Ls towards the rear, had no clear run from 400M to 100M. Inconclusive run.
Dropped back to race at the rear 8Ls off leader, had plenty to do turning home, stayed on fairly to line passing beaten rivals only.
Chased leaders in a race run at good tempo, driven 600M out but gave limited response, weakened 250M.
From draw 1 shaken up early to track leaders, came under pressure home turn, weakened 300M out.
Obtained outright lead from draw 2, led at good pace middle stages, under pressure home turn, found no extra from 300M. (Jockey unable to explain the disappointing run / Unacceptable Performance.)
Held up towards the rear, driven along 600M, stayed on fairly and never going to reach contention, eased 150M out. (Lame RF leg.)
Jumped well, raced in midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, no clear run early in straight, angled out 250M, finished off strongly, won by 2 lengths.
Began well, raced 2 wide better than midfield, 3 wide turning, took the lead 250M, peaked and headed 150M, ran on evenly to take 2nd.
Shifted out at start and bumped, sat right behind the leader on rail, same position on turn, showed good response early in straight, peaked on run 150M, weakened gradually final 100M, finished 3rd.
Taken back from gate 12, raced 2 wide towards rear, 6 to 7 lengths back, commenced move after passing 550M, very wide turning in, made some headway in straight.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced 2 wide at rear, 8 lengths back, wider after passing 550M, very wide turning in, made some progress in straight.
Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail, 10 lengths or so back, closer on turn, showed good response early in straight, blocked near 250M, made some progress thereafter.
Jumped well from gate 1, positioned 3 lengths behind the leader on rail, 2 wide turning in, bumped and unbalanced near 300M, kept on evenly thereafter.
Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, made contact 700M, similar position on turn, angled out 450M, no daylight early in straight, showed limited response thereafter.
Made contact shortly after start, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well to turn, peaked and headed 250M, weakened final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Moderately away, raced 2 wide slightly better than midfield, 3 wide on turn, bumped and unbalanced near 300M, peaked 200M, weakened gradually inside final furlong.
Away with them, sent forward to race in 2nd, 2 wide, same position on turn, peaked early in straight, inconvenienced 250M, eased final furlong.
Taken back from gate 11, raced at rear on the inside, peaked on turn, detached from 600M, unacceptable performance.
Crowded start, raced behind midfield on the inside, saved ground on turn, showed no response early in straight, weakened and eased final 250M
Away with them, raced behind midfield on the outside, no cover after 1300M, made contact 700M, peaked on turn, inconvenienced 400M, weakened and eased early in straight.
Slotted in to race in midfield, wide but with cover, dashed home strongly to win impressively by 2-1/4L.
Worked forward gradually, very wide on track and no cover, battled on to the line but winner was too good.
Rolled forward, shared lead on the rail, stayed on but was no match to first two.
Slotted in to race in midfield, 2-3 wide with cover, continued on fairly.
Awkward start then ridden forward, prominent but wide and no cover, weakened and faded at 150M.
Slow to jump and didn't muster, settled in front of midfield, on rail, in touch until near 200M, no clear running until 100M anyway.
Urged along, sat in front of midfield, 2 wide before drifted out at turns, was one paced in straight.
Jumped only fairly, in behind midfield, very wide but with cover, did not threaten. (See Incident Report)
Forward to lead, 2 wide, stayed on until faded near 250M.
Bumped start, raced towards the rear, 2-3 wide, wasn't in it.
Crowded at start, in worse than midfield, on rail, did not run on.
Bumped start, at rear throughout, never a fac-tor.
Settled 3-wide without cover just worse than midfield, commenced move rounding home bend, quickened well under pressure inside final 300 metres to take charge 100 metres out.
Settled in last few from a wide gate and waited with, 3-wide coming onto home bend and wider around the bend and into straight, ran on under pressure to reach 2nd late but never threatening.
Began awkwardly settling in last few and waited with, last and wide into home straight, ran on under pressure down the centre of the track to narrowly miss 2nd.
Very slowly away, soon recovered towards the rear, awkwardly placed when pace slackened around home bend, switched off the rail for a run passing the 300 metres, ran on to be nearest at finish.

Ridden forward before taken back just off the pace, travelled keenly outside race leader most of the way in back straight, hit the front turning for home, led and until finding no extra 100 metres out.
Settled in distant 4th over 3L off the pace, given reminders 750 metres out and switched wide for a run, shared the lead 4-wide into straight, kept on steadily without quickening.

Soon dropped to midfield despite ridden early, came under pressure from the 950 metres and reminders 650 metres out, snuck up on the rail to just behind race leaders turning in, made no impression inside final 200 metres.
Settled well back after moderate start, went past well-beaten horses in home straight.

Broke well, went forward from wide in midfield round first bend, wide without cover in 1L 3rd and refused to settled early in back straight, tightened in a similar position on straightening, made no further impression.
Pressed forward from the widest gate to lead coming onto first bend, obtained rails run passing the 1300 metres and made running to home straight, gradually weakened.
Began well but soon taken back, about 5L back in midfield in 5th in back straight, became 6th rounding home bend and worse into straight, soon faded.
Settled towards the rear, looked beaten when inconvenienced on straightening, never featured.
Not hurried after the start, dropped back to a 3-wide spot behind midfield, travelled well during race, responded strongly passing 400M to get up just in time.
Began only fairly, recovered to sit behind midfield, picked up well passing 200M, charged home late, just denied.
In touch behind leaders, came with a strong run to lead 150M, caught by first 2 close home.
Began awkwardly, positioned behind midfield, proved difficult to settle after 1100M, shuffled back to near rear approaching 400M, closed off well to be nearest at the line.
Caught 3-wide no cover outside the pacesetter, responded to pressure early straight, fought on to final 100M, lost a few places late.
Given a waiting ride at the back, saved ground on inside, stayed on moderately over final 250M but always held by leaders.
Tracked the pace early before moving up to press leader 800M, kept on steadily on straightening, was out-finished over final 150M.
Up with early pace but unable to cross, eased back to sit 3-wide behind leaders, came under pressure 500M, fought on one paced in straight and always held by leaders. Hampered 100M out.
Driven forward, crossed to the lead passing 1000M, set even pace, fought on to 200M then weakened towards the line.
From draw 1 raced handily behind leaders, kept on same pace when driven out nearing 400M, no threat from 200M.
Dropped back to race at the rear, didn't find much turning home, never dangerous.
Taken back from wide draw, raced 3-wide at the rear, failed to quicken on straightening, never involved.
